Review: customer service is absolutely awful. cannot complain about any restaurants but god the people who work specifically for just eat are disgusting. was promised a refund for order which had to be cancelled on new years day because there were no drivers. i kept getting pre-written responses from the team and they were obnoxious. opening the chat takes time so if you wanna check your order number you have to close it and then go through it again. also they ask for questions such as what did you order! as if its not enough to give the irder number!!  the agent didnt even wait 5 mns for me to reply and disconnected after teling me the refund had been completed and if i dont have it : check this with your bank. this is insane its been over 10 working days and i still have not receive my money back so thanks for nothing. next time im paying through paypal and ifni have an issue with refund im putting the claim. and i recommend this action to everyone.

Title: worse experience ever
Review: worse experience ever. They lied about driver being on their way, told to call the restaurant they could not do anything as driver had not been assigned. called again and after waiting for over 20 min they told me to call the restaurant again. Worse deluverybservice ever and worse customer service. that was after waiting for over 2 hours for order that had yet  not arrived

Title: Avoid or expect the worst from Just Eat.
Review: Like many others, my food wasn’t delivered and after talking to someone on a chat the order changed to ‘delivered’. I knew this was a lie and way to get out of issuing me a refund. I was told to wait 20 minutes for a call and was also told to wait 1minute for the driver to leave my order at the door. There was no driver.  I had to call twice, the first time the phone was put down and I was instead asked to leave a review of an order I never recieved. When i got through I was told that my order was still in the queue two hours later and was asked if I wanted to cancel. I finally got a refund but I would avoid Just Eat. The amount of lies I’ve heard as well as labelling my order as ‘delivered’ is just unacceptable. Just Eat have no integrity, AVOID.

Title: Fake restaurant reviews and no drivers
Review: Absolutely awful last two experiences. For the first, I chose the restaurant with the highest positive reviews (>600, only dropped half a star). Clearly faked by bots, because the food was terrible. Four pieces of tough chicken in a box of plain white rice, a wrap I could have made at home, cold soggy chips and a garlic sauce that tasted like pure garlic and water. Next week (we still had a voucher), ordered from a familiar, decent restaurant. After an hour and a quarter the website STILL said driver at the restaurant. Got through the customer services after 15 minutes on the line and was told there still had not been a driver allocated. We couldn't get through to the restaurant so I'm not even convinced it was open. The only reason I'm giving 2 stars and not 1 is because I got an immediate food cancellation and refund.

Title: Driver is a absolute scum
Review: Driver is a absolute scum, gave me someone else order and now have no dinner as the food given was cold and horrible food I don't like, now have to wait 72 hours to speak to investigation team. The company policy is a absolute joke

Title: We orded  two hours ago still haven't…
Review: We orded  two hours ago still haven't received my meal, keeps saying the driver is at KFC .

Title: Absolutely disgraceful company ordered…
Review: Absolutely disgraceful company ordered food never arrived the courier said it had arrived lost my money to a thief of a delivery driver

Title: Same thing happened to me.
Review: Same thing happened to me.. no food arrived although the delivery shows that it has been arrived. No refund, no food just disappointment.

Title: The last 2 deliveries were very late
Review: The last 2 deliveries were delivered cold because the drivers to so long to get here... its a 4 minute drive.Just Eat need to review their driver recruitment

Title: do not use this service for ordering .
Review: do not use this service for ordering .these people are absolutely not helpful.SPECIALLY FOR RESTAURANT PARTNERS  THEY ARE NOT INTERESTED TO LISTEN OR HELP WITH ISSUES .USE UBEREATS INSTEAD.OOOOOOOOOO STARSSSSSSSSSSS.

Title: Delivered not delivered
Review: I had to report a delivery as not delivered even though their record shows it was delivered. They wouldnt give me my refund until it was 'investigated', got an email today to state that I would not get my money back because it was delivered on the system. No one called for my side of the story. I am very unhappy and will never use JustEat again. I will go to Ubereats which may be more expensive but much more reliable so worth it. Disappointed by the so called investigation and disappointed by the customer services.

Title: Thanks for the reminder on why I haven't used JustEat for years
Review: Years ago, we used JustEat and for some reason, they never even forwarded our order to the restaurant so I have stayed away from JustEat since then.  I recently got a voucher for JustEat, however, and decided to give them another chance.  What a mistake!  I made an order, albeit to the wrong address, but I ordered 6 hours in advance.  Plenty of time to cancel and make the same order again!  So I called up and asked them to cancel it as I wanted to change the address on it, but wait, the lady on the phone assured me that she was able to change the address on the order and there was no need to cancel and that the order would, indeed, be coming to my address.  Great news!  I was a little nervous though so I contacted them on their online chat about an hour later to ask if the address was really changed on the order.  I was assured for the second time that the address had been updated and that the order should turn up at my address.  So instead of cancelling and reordering, I let them tell me that the address on the order had changed.  6 hrs later, I'm waiting for the order.  It doesn't arrive. It gets marked as delivered. Turns out it still went to the original address.  I don't understand why they bothered telling me that they were able to change the address when they clearly weren't and then wasting my money instead of letting me cancel and reorder it.  What a waste of time.  Then I tried to contact JustEat about this and it went to their "Investigations Team", who then emailed me 2 days later with a blank email.  Great.  Contacted JustEat again, and again it went to their Investigations Team.  Now 4 days later (cited to take 2 days) - I've heard nothing from them.  She clearly told me it was passed back to the Investigations Team because she didn't want to deal with me anymore.  Amazing customer service, well done.Edit: Well the timing seems somewhat interesting, I sent them another email and then left this review and then they sent me a refund so I've upped my rating but considering how much hassle this has caused me, it's not going any higher until I see some actual better service

Title: Liars Liars deliver bag's on fire!
Review: My delivery was due at 18.20. At 18.15 the website claimed a driver was there and waiting on the restaurant. At 18.25 the restaurant called me to tell me that the driver wasn't there, they were contacting just eat but I might want to too. The chat now rep lied to me, first telling me a driver had it and would be with me within 10 minutes, which 35 minutes later still isn't the case, then told me that the restaurant was struggling to allocate a driver. As my partner works in a Just Eat utilising restaurant, I know that restaurants don't allocate drivers. Just eat does. So they are lying to customers to pass the buck for their failings. I've been told a supervisor might be able to help me with my FOOD order, and will be in touch within 72 hours! :')

Title: The food was late,missing items
Review: The food was late,missing items. Delivery driver very ride and customer service of no help.Uber is couple ponds more but alot better service.

Title: WAITIED OVER 2 HOURS FOR MY ORDER
Review: I have just waiting over 2 yes TWO hours for my order to be delivered. I had to call 3 times for them to tell me what was going on. Uber eats is usually my go to. I will never order from them EVER AGAIN!!

Title: Atrocious
Review: I’ve used just eat before and had quite a a bad experience with them. Didn’t use them again for years and decided to use them again just now as I couldn’t order through Uber eats. Waiting for the order and they just cancelled it for no reason. I will never ever use them again. They’re absolute crap.

Title: I would rather give zero stars  I was a…
Review: I would rather give zero stars  I was a loyal customer of just eat and haven't had to complain often but today My son ordered food to help. Me out as I am unwell he ordered from greggs order stated it was delivered he checked front door nothing back door nothing this was 2seconds after claimed deliver he called the restaurant only to be told he needed to call just eat as his food had been stolen aand consumed by the driver...Angry obviously he called just eat to be told he would have to wait for a full investigation to be done which will take 48 hrs... So not only is my son out of pocket but he has no food...  JUST EAT I'M DISGUSTED NO CUSTOMER SERVICE AT ALL..

Title: Today was the second time in just a…
Review: Today was the second time in just a couple of weeks that a driver seemingly stole our food and JustEat wouldn't offer a refund or even give us a new order for free. So we are stuck here with a 3 year old crying for food when we were expecting it to be delivered over an hour ago.

Title: Do not use!
Review: I am deleting this app and making sure friends and family do so too. In the last 3 orders we've had 1 delivered with items missing and 2 haven't turned up at all! Customer service is non-existent....Good luck if you want a refund! They don't deserve even 1 star to be brutally honest. This company should be investigated and shut down.

Title: If your going to order food, go to Uber eats.
Review: I placed an order last night from love desserts. It wouldn’t allow me to add my card details in and kept timing out. So I used to option of paying with cash. Firstly my order was late, secondly the waffle was cold and my milkshake was tasteless and frozen. I contact customer service through the chat service and they have told me to contact the restaurant to get compensation as I paid with cash just eat can’t do anything for me. Absolute joke of a service.

Title: Ordered burger king
Review: Ordered burger king, tracked delivery and it was late anyway.. next thing i know it says delivered.. erm to who ???? Cos Ive got nothing!! Thieving gits

Title: Never using just eat again!!
Review: Ordered from greggs at 11:45, said that the driver picked up the food very fast and then about 10 minutes later we got a notification to say that the food had been delivered. There was no knock on the door which was the first thing I found a bit unusual because normally they knock on the door, leave the food on the doorstep and then wait for you to pick up the food. This did not happen!! I went to look outside and there was no food. I looked all around the little close that I live in but it was no where to be seen. We asked in the street group chat if anyone had been delivered a greggs but everyone said that they hadn’t had anything. We phoned up just eat and told them what had happened, the person who answered the phone was just reading from a script (that was very obvious) and said that they couldn’t do anything and it would take 4 days for them to investigate what has happened to my food. What crappy customer service!!! We then phoned up the greggs that I ordered from and they said that the driver picked up the food but they can’t do anything after it leaves the shop so they don’t know what’s happened either. Definitely would not recommend using just eat as they do not care about the customers experience.

Title: Would give zero stars if I could
Review: Would give zero stars if I could. Ordered mcdonalds through just eat. Food never arrived, terrible customer service. Now waiting 48 hours to hear from an "Investigation Team" to see if I'm trying to obtain a burger by deception. Smh

Title: Can't leave zero stars unfortunately
Review: Can't leave zero stars unfortunately. Overcharging compared to shop prices and then website cunningly set-up to 'drop' voucher when ordering and charge you full price. Incompetent in best case, but more likely  fraudulent (and forget about trying to get any sense out of customer services who appear to have very little wiggle room). AVOID AT ALL COSTS. My experience of Uber Eats is infinitely better!

Title: Took over 4 hours to deliver
Review: Took over 4 hours to deliver. Couldn’t cancel to make alternative arrangements. Didn’t accept delivery as cooked a pizza and chips instead. At first a refund was refused but then they said the will with a £5 voucher for my troubles. Almost two weeks later no refund and no voucher. My advice is order your food direct from the restaurant. Save time, save money.

Title: Usual crap from just eat
Review: Usual crap from just eat, restaurant cancelled my order but just eat told me I wouldn't be charged, I have been charged. Can't speak to a person, the machine keeps hanging up on me, the chat bot is as useless as ever! How comes they can take my money in two days but to refund takes 7-10 days, that if I get a refund! Crooks!

Title: Failed for the 3rd time to deliver
Review: Failed for the 3rd time to deliver. Failed to call me back and now saying another 72hrs. Failed to refund me the amount of money stated verbally on a recorded call . Avoid avoid avoid

Title: FRUSTRATED
Review: FRUSTRATED. THIEVES! Don’t ever order there!!!Ive ordered 5 meals (Mc donalds) on Sunday. The driver brought just three drinks and no meals. Payed 25.42 for the while order.When I made the complaint nobody will tell me why the ordered was no complete and that a supervisor will call me. Nobody called me.  I will START LEGAL ISSUES AS THEY ARE THIEVES!

Title: Con artists, avoid like the plague.
Review: As with many others here, I had several calls from the restaurant saying they couldn't find my house, so in the end after an hour of me waiting on my drive with a torch to guide them in, they called and told me to take it up with Just Eat for a refund.Just Eat are saying that the restaurant marked it as delivered so they can't give me a refund, and I've since been in touch with the restaurant who said they did not mark it as delivered, so Just Eat are lying completely. Avoid like the plague.

Title: THIEVES Avoid
Review: THIEVES! AVOID!Food not delivered for over an hour after arrival time was sent (well over hour & half after local order), phoned actual restaurant who said no one had collected and "yes of course food is already cold" and np idea when it would be delivered!  Then i phoned Just Eat customer service, after first being hung up on before talking to anyone the next assistant said they could not refund me until my delivery arrived and so I must call back when the food arrived if it was cold, which we all already knew it was, and she had no idea when it may be delivered either! Eventually food arrived nearly 2 hours after ordering, driver said he was 2nd driver and had no idea why no one had arrived before. Food was cold obviously.I phoned again and got through to another operator, who hung up on me when he heard it was a complaint!Called again and got a different person again, who spoke entirely from script like a robot, he eventually said that he would refund a maximum of £20. BUT my order was for £35. to start with, let alone any compensatory credit to apologise etc for now being starving over 2 hours later with no food or money back.He repeated and repeated and repeated that he could not refund me and that I could not speak to a supervisor or manager for 72 hours! and that there was no supervisor there at all!Eventually after about 30 minutes, as i would not hang up and held my ground about the theft of my money, he said a supervisor would call back in 10 minutes!  Oh he insisted he was in a call centre in the UK by the way...Surprisingly I did receive a call back & the very friendly woman sounded genuine but still would only give £20 back with £5 as credit to have to spend on scamming Just Eats again so only useable if giving them more money, total scam. She said she could only give £20 back maximum whatever amount an order had cost and they would not refund delivery fees or added costs at all as they had delivered, even though they had failed to collect the food when it was ready and all of the above etc. I could literally hear dogs barking in the background and quite amazingly Cockeralls crowing! - she confirmed that they are based in Asia but couldn't say where because she wasn't allowed and shouldn't be going of script at all, her tone of voice and inflections etc implied that she was exasperated and ashamed of the responses she clearly has had to give a LOT! And the non refunds. Anyway Just Eats have stolen half the cost of my order, not delivered edible food, made me have to spend an hour & half on the phone on 6 seperate phone calls! Wasted 3 hours of my day and meant i couldnt do work i was supposed to do as a result and forced me out into the supermarket for food in the pandemic.Cheers for all that....Great first experience with them. Avoid, Avoid, Avoid.

Title: Another one whose order was marked as…
Review: Another one whose order was marked as delivered but no food turned up. The helpdesk are useless - one told me it would be 48 hours while they investigate before they will talk about refund, when asking to speak to a manager I waited for around 20 minutes before I was disconnected. On my second try I was told I couldn't talk to a manager and if I wanted to escalate it it would be 72 hours! Marking something as delivered doesn't absolve you of your rights under the consumer rights act - I paid for a service which I did not receive. If you have internal process issues to investigate you can do that in your own time - refund my money!

Title: If I could give no stars I would
Review: If I could give no stars I would. Showed as delivered when it hadn’t been, don’t keep you updated at all regarding delivery time. Worst still you can’t complain to them.

Title: Just eat customer service is poor quality.
Review: I have used Just Eat for a while (mostly since the start of Covid when it became safer to get a delivery than to collect). I have had a few complaints about things but the customer service team at Just Eat is poor quality. It takes ages to get through to their chat; they hang up on your chats before the issue is dealt with; you only get a refund for the item not delivered (you don't get compensation for the rest of the meal that went cold when you were on the phone to the restaurant trying to get the missing item(s) delivered. I am going to wait until the latest issue is as resolved as I can get it and then delete my account.

Title: ordered food whoch did not arrive…
Review: ordered food whoch did not arrive saying its delivered which it was not and now saying need investigation .we been using at least once weekly for a long time but it that stops now we willl only be ripped off once avoid !!!!!!

Title: Pretty sure this company is about to go bust…
Review: Pretty sure this company is about to go bust. 4th time in a row I've had no delivery now. Disgusting.

Title: Our order is late but only said this at…
Review: Our order is late but only said this at time of delivery when it said it was on its way. Called helpLine and after pressing ridiculous amount of numbers finally it just said look on the website. This is very poor service, it is not the restaurant

Title: I  ordered food from my local takeaway…
Review: I  ordered food from my local takeaway to be delivered at 7pm food arrived 630 I askrdcthe driver why it was so Early  he said he didn't know.The reason I wanted it for 7pm is my wife was comi g home then. Also I phoned the takeaway and the owner didnt seem care This will be the last time after many years of using this takeaway I won't be using it againI also feel thag just eat should be looking at these places. Tam  Jordan Illogan Cornwall

Title: This is the third order and the last
Review: This is the third order and the last. Second and third orders missing dishes. Phone line to restaurant not working, Just eat help sends you in a loop. Honestly, don’t bother. I never write bad reviews but this site is the worst!

Title: Not impressed!!
Review: This is the 3rd order now, and the very last time I use just eat! it was freezing cold, the drink was flat, “what was left of it” as the bag was soaked! the burger was soggy, the drink had leaked over the 2 packets of 6 chicken nuggets that I didn’t even order!! The chips were soggy! Very disappointed!

Title: Food missing and not delivered at all!
Review: We order some food on the Just eat app, the drive single got lost and food never arrived spoke to a member of just eat via the live chat system. She told us the food was delved and that this would be passed to an investigation team....There was no offer to replace the order for us or a refund at the time we as the customer was left with 0 options.....Disgraceful customer experience and with all the competition out there for food delivery this is not up to mark.Back to UBER and Deliveroo STAY AWAY been warned.

Title: I ordered a meal on NYE as I was…
Review: I ordered a meal on NYE as I was leaving work at my studio. When I got home, I realsied that the delivery time would be too late to eat. I rang the restaurant to check if they'd started my order, and they hadn't. So I went to JUST EAT www to cancel. However, I was only given two options; to continue or cancel but have half of the cost of the order taken - in this instance it totalled - £18.20. After cancelling, I instantly went onto chat to explain that they weren't justified in taking half the cost as I had checked with the restaurant first. I waited for nearly 90minutes to chat to someone - but the numbers went up and down and then eventually I was told they had closed the chat. I then tried to call their landline, and was sent on a loop to then be cut off - this happened several times that evening, and the next day, and the day after that. I rang the restaurant back, they confirmed that they had received my order on NYE and also said that they would not receive a penny of that 50% cancellation fee. So, this seems a major con, and I would appreciate advice as to how I can report them, as I believe this to be not only extremely bad practice but also scam/fraud-like! I have tried to resolve this with JUST EAT - but they are ignoring me, and each time I go back onto to chat I am told to wait to wait for an email response. I WILL NO LONGER USE JUST EAT AND WILL ADVISE FRIENDS, FAMILY AND ANYONE ELSE TO AVOID USING THEM ON SOCIAL MEDIA. It seems that the 'old fashioned' way of contacting restaurants directly, is the way forward for take away food - also the restaurants at least get all the cash from customers!

Title: Food never arrived
Review: I don’t know what happened but in the last month the service they’re providing is beyond ridiculous...Assigning a driver can take up to an hour so if they say “40min delivery time” don’t get excited because I’m reality it takes up to 2 hours and the food is cold on arrival. It’s not the restaurants fault, whoever is running Just Eat and updated the system obviously did a horrible job...in one of the fast food restaurant I work for we get 10 delivery orders per shift on average but only about 5 of them actually gets picked up because drivers choose not to pick them up for some reason. Don’t bother with JustEat if you want your food delivered on time

Title: Another non delivery scam
Review: Ordered a meal on new years eve, restaurant said it was delivered but it never was had same problems as everyone else has with just eat, I think we should all enter our reviews on Martin Lewis site and maybe he might pick it up I'm going to they can't get away with this

Title: Stay away from these thieves.
Review: Stay away from these thieves.. They Employ bunch of clown that have no clue how to found a simple Address. App shows it will take approximately 20 to 30 mint max, after one a hour drive calls me asking where is the house, so I even give them A big clue (right opposite the cinema) still the clown didn't arrive, so I tried call her didn't answer and hanged up the phone!!  I ordered Macdonald which is in the same road where my address is approximately 2 minutes walk, never delivered and charged me money.. Its taken them 4 day just to send 1 email.. I have escalate to PayPal.. Please please avoid this Just rubbish they take your money and don't give a monkey.. Terrible!!! learn from uber and sont employee some thieves

Title: Do no use just eat
Review: Do not use just eat, absolute shambles of a company. Ordered my meal for New Years Eve collection more than 24 hours in advance. Arrived at the restaurant, just eat had not sent the order to them. Had to wait 45 mins & pay again for my meal. Tried to get my money back from just eat & they will not refund me even though they admit the fault was with their system, now they are ignoring my emails. Customer service is a joke, how are they allowed to get away with such bad customer service?! Avoid just eat!!!!!

Title: Stick with Deliveroo and Uber Eats
Review: My order didn't arrive. I contacted the restaurant via phone who said the order was collected by a JustEat driver so it was up to JustEat to sort. I contacted JustEat via instant chat who said that delivery was attempted and returned to the restaurant. This is a lie: I was by the front door since placing the order and the restaurant confirmed that the order was not returned.I informed JustEat and was assured it would be investigated, that I would hear back within 48 hours and that I should leave a review for the restaurant so it doesn't happen to others (...even though it was a JustEat driver who was to blame, not the restaurant...). 48 hours passed and I heard absolutely nothing.Contacted JustEat again. I asked when I would hear because last time I was told a set time frame that wasn't stuck to. No answer.I asked if I could contact the investigations team and was told no unless they email me first. I asked if they could email me same day. No answer and had the conversation shut down by the customer service operative.I Tweeted, Facebook messaged and posted on their page. No answer.Was left out of pocket with no idea when I would get my money back or where the investigation was up to. I had paid for food and a service - neither of which was delivered.Messaged the following day - same 'sorry', another customer service operative telling me I had their word it would be sorted, which was meaningless as four people previously gave me their word and didn't keep promises.They tried to shut the conversation down without answering any questions again. I asked how to make a formal complaint about the whole situation and miraculously had an email back within the hour saying I can have my money back in a week.This whole thing has been ridiculous. Customer service has been appalling throughout - I was blamed for not answering the door first (as I say, no one even tried to deliver) and then the restaurant was blamed despite them using JustEat drivers. The fault laid with JustEat but every opportunity to pass blame was shamelessly taken.Lots of empty platitudes, no action unless you tell them you're going to complain. Ridiculous. Been using JustEat for 7 years - never again. Stick to Deliveroo or Uber Eats.

Title: Very poor service!!
Review: Very poor service!!! Ordered food from McDonald’s, driver said it’s been delivered where it never did. He never read the note about going to the right place and he went to the wrong one. Rang just eat, they said to ring the restaurant, restaurant told me there’s nothing they can do and said to ring just eat. Rang just eat just for the woman to be speaking like a robot and didn’t let me say a word and said all I’m gonna get is an email resolving the investigation. I’ve spent my last money on food just to hear there’s nothing else she can do and I can wait for up to 48 hours for a refund. I now have no food and no money. Never been more dissappointed with just eat, will never use their service again and I hope the driver gets sacked!!!!

Title: Thieves - DO NOT USE
Review: Unfortunately, like a lot of others on here, I too have recently experienced issues with an order not turning up.I placed an order for an Indian takeaway on Christmas Eve via Just Eat. The order didn't turn up, despite Just Eat claiming it had arrived. I called the takeaway a number of times to chase the order up, who said they never received the order in the first place. After waiting a long time to get in touch with Just Eat customer service via live chat that evening - I was told they will have to create a request for their investigations team to look into this and there was nothing else that could be done...they also said I'd hear back from them within 48 hours - which was not the case. After a couple of days, I decided to chase this up again via live chat...and was told the exact same thing again. Another 72 hours passed and still nothing - despite being told twice, their investigations team would be in touch within 48 hours!Their customer service is an absolute disgrace! The money has been taken from my account - and I'm unable to get through to Just Eat on the telephone as their ridiculous automated phone system goes round in circles and you can never actually get through to a human being.Almost 2 weeks has passed and I still have no refund and no response from Just Eat - therefore this is effectively now theft - as they have taken my money and not provided the food.

Title: Mcdonalds whiterose
Review: Mcdonalds whiterose. Never turned up. Rang restaurant didn't want to know blamed Uber driver. Got in touch Just Eat reviewed 48 hrs later saying food was delivered. Shocking service

Title: £35 McDonalds order that never arrived
Review: I placed a large McDonalds order on 30th December, the money was taken from my account. 20 minutes after the expected delivery time the app informed me the driver was at the restaurant waiting to collect, an hour later still nothing, then a text to inform me my order was cancelled. I'm still waiting for my refund, almost a week later.I drove to the local McDonalds, ordered, collected and was home within 10 minutes.I use Just Eats regularly and am appalled by their non existent customer service.They've lost me as a customer.Thieves !!!

Title: Ordered some food via Just Eat Saturday…
Review: Ordered some food via Just Eat Saturday evening, just over an hour passes and the app then says keep an eye for the driver, he's 5 mins away.  Then the app says delivered, that's odd - nobody has knocked the door, checked the porch just incase...no food, no foot steps in the fresh snow on the drive and cctv coverage to prove no delivery.Followed the problem with your order instructions on Just Eat, says phone lines closed and to use the web chat.  Basically told that the operator could not process any refund and it would have to be passed onto their investigation department, and should have a response from them within 48hrs.  Ended up having to re-order but this time with Uber Eats and food delivered within 15/20 minutes of ordering.Absolutely shocking customer service from Just Eat, paid for a meal we have not received and had to pay again to get an alternative from elsewhere.   I can prove that we have not received our order, and unable to process any refund.  Will see what Monday brings (the 48hr response time) but not holding my breath.   If no response and no refund after Monday, this will be escalating to small claims.

Title: NYE Chinese takeaway delays & missing items
Review: My husband ordered a Chinese takeaway on NYE. The order took over 2 hours to arrive & only after several phone calls to the restaurant did we get an update. No ability to follow up with Justeat as they were not answering their online chat. The restaurant admitted they had taken over 150 orders in an hour & were overwhelmed. When the order eventually arrived it was missing a few items. We couldn’t reach justeat on either NYE or NYD, finally made contact on Sunday 3rd Jan to be told they couldn’t do anything as it was over 48 hours, we explained they were closed and not contactable but we were told this was incorrect. After asking for customer complaint details the JustEat operative ended the chat.

Title: My son bought me a £40 just eat gift…
Review: My son bought me a £40 just eat gift card when I came to use it wouldn't work. I contacted just eat on their chat site they have said I have lost the £40 because I logged out of my account. I wasn't told that this would happen I'm still in dispute with them but they say there's nothing they can do. All I know is just eat have had my £40 and I've had nothing I'm so angry.

Title: Rubbish service, but you already know that!!
Review: Placed and order with an Indian restaurant, the food was very late, warm and missing one of the main items. I called the restaurant who could not send he missing item and so I asked for a refund. I was told to call Just Eat.  Just spent over an hour on a web chat and they eventually agreed to refund the £8.95, big deal.  They refused to refund the cost of the spoilt meal.  The restaurant said it was Just Eat's problem and that if I had not used Just Eat then they could have issued a full refund.  Meal was rubbish. I will never use Just Eat again, nor the restaurant.  Beware it's like trying to get blood out of a stone

Title: Basically thieves.
Review: Ordered two pizzas, two hours later get a message saying they’ve been delivered. They haven’t. Call Just Eat to be put in a queue saying I’m 99th place. Order two more pizzas from Deliveroo which arrive within the hour. The next day call Just Eat again and am on hold for 40 mins before giving up. Call again the next day, make the complaint, am told that it’s being forwarded to the complaints department. A few hrs later receive an email saying that their records state the pizzas were delivered so no further action will be taken. Call again to speak to the complaints department but am told this is impossible and I can only reply to the email. Ridiculously awful customer service basically amounting to theft. We will never use them again.

Title: If I could give no stars I would.
Review: If I could give no stars I would.Wouldn't allow payment for order.No apologies from them.Will never use again.

Title: Theft
Review: Same experience as others NYE ruined as food £40 ordered earlier for 8 pm arrived at 11pm . We sent it back and asked for a refund . After getting nowhere with just eat I have accused them of theft . I am going to publicise what a criminal outfit they are

Title: After a 12 hour shift ordered a 44.58…
Review: After a 12 hour shift ordered a 44.58 wildwood takeaway at 7.50 pm said it would be delivered 8.26 pm  and with the driver by 9.30 pm I rang the restraunt to be told just eat should have rang us an hour ago as no burgers so order was sat at restraunt just eat then put on my order it was delivered absolute lieI have cctv on my driveway and restraunt said it was still there they lied said they would investigate with 48 hours heard nothing now with official complaint people I will take to claims courtShocking service and liars it’s fraud taking money for goods that are not delivered

Title: Nightmare on Just-Eat street.....
Review: What an experience. It started great but spiralled Into WW3. I purchased a digital gift card for an Xmas gift, super, very straightforward. Unfortunately I put the wrong email address on for the lucky recipient (we all love free food and looking down at myself a little too much 🐽) yeah so anyway, my fault, I openly admitted the mistake, so I quickly purchased another and got my magnifying glass out and put the right one on, Great, worked a treat. So I try to contact them via there live chat, again pretty straightforward until drumroll 🥁 🥁 🥁 THEY BOOT ME OFF WHEN I MENTION A REFUND. This happened not once, not twice, not three, not four but five times, five times, again Five times!!! Uno dos tres quatro cinqo. Very rude advisors that swayed from the issue and they took me for a bit of a ride around the just eat roundabout. I gave up on the live chat, headed straight to my best mate resolver, on Xmas day of all days, I get a reply, again they do not understand the issue, that is until I ask for a manager to call me back immediately to resolve. The next day, yes boxing day, at 9am I get a call from just eat. I sharply answered, again the complaints advisor had no idea what had gone on 😭 (will to live lost at this point) , after a further explanation I was promised my refund, within 2 hours of that call, my refund was in my bank. Every advisor I spoke too, promised me the chat transcript from the live chats, not one transcript arrived, I have screenshots after chat 1 because my faith was shot to pieces, and in black and white, 'do you promise to send me the chat transcript after this convo!?' JE 'yes you will receive', chat ends by them booting me as I persist for a manager to enter the chat....... computer says NO, not one chat transcript recieved 🙄. It was a very straightforward query that they turned into a freddy kruger nightmare. I got my money back but I feel that I was very very very lucky to awake from it with my hard earned coin. I have not used just eat since, it's been hard because I love food and now I have to call my local eatery and order like I'm in the 90's but Sandra down my local pizza shop is loving the new friend down the phone every other day 😁🍕😂. Silver linings for Sandra as my craic is second to none.Sandra thanks you justeat, I find you rude, obnoxious, don't listen and very very devious in your ways for a refund. Don't get trapped in the nightmare, call the restaurant up, save yourself the 0.50p service charge and make a new friend like Sandra. 👫Small update. Get signed upto resolver, it's free and you will get your money back as it gets logged with trading standards so they don't have a chicken leg to stand on. Pardon the pun. 🤟

Title: Legal robbery
Review: More often than not I've had missing items. More often than you can't get hold of Just Eat and when you do they either can't speak English or lie. They promise refunds that you never receive. These type of companies should be illegal because they blame the restaurant who blame them. So the customer runs round in circles and eventually gives up. Someone is getting rich on slave labour and charging customers when no goods are delivered. Will not associate with Just Eat ever again. It's pot luck. Better off playing the lottery.

Title: WHAT A TOTAL SCAM!!!!!!!!!
Review: delivery guy turns up, goes to give me 2 small items. i say to him, where's the rest? I ordered a large meal, additional burger and donut. that's all they gave me he says. i refuse to take the order. he goes back and tells mcdonalds (Newport town center) the order was delivered. now i get nothing and no refund because just eat say it was marked as delivered. WHAT A TOTAL SCAM!!!!!!!!!

Title: They didn’t delivered food and said…
Review: They didn’t delivered food and said they delivered.And don’t want give me a refund.They believe the word from their partner driver and restaurants but not from customers.What a disgraceful company.Never use them.

Title: I am still trying to get a refund I was…
Review: I am still trying to get a refund I was promised because of an order I got from Burger King it was cold stuff missing and wasn't the burger I paid for finally nearly two weeks later after being on hold for an hour and speaking to two different people I was told they would refund 14 pound of the 16 pound order I though okay cool but here we are next day and it's not been refunded to my account when it should have been so i am currently on hold again for 50 minutes now as the first person i got through to after 25 minutes on hold said i got through to wrong department even though i pressed the rite option in the phone menu.honestky i will never use them again because when a mistake is made the restaurant say they cant help as its through just eat and trying to get through to just eat is an absolute joke.all these places like uber just eat ate all the same,they dont care about you just your money and once they have it it's good bye and dont care

Title: just crap , bunch of thieves
Review: Had to leave 1 star unable to give none!!ordered food late, by 40 mins, and wrong!!no coffees no sandwiches rang and rang, no answer went to greggs in person still no joy. sorry not us its "just sheet!"total garbage company, now have to wait to see if we can get £25 refund , absolute joke of a company and system. customer services......total misnomer.

Title: JUST TERRIBLE!
Review: mcdonalds taken money, ordered over 2 hours ago. still not here.... aparently it is on its way, but has been on its way for over an hour. so it is either going to be stone cold or it was never going to come to begin with. cannot contact anyone about it apart from a bot who wont cancel the order as the restaurant are probably still preparing it (i ordered breakfast and seeing as it is now 12.45 and they stop breakfast at 11 im doubtful). just eat have lost a customer today as these things keep happening. uber eats here i come!

Title: Dreadful service
Review: Pre ordered our £76 meal at 3pm for 8pm delivery, by 9.30pm still no food and we cannot contact either the restaurant or just eat, so we had frozen pizza for NYE!, food eventually turns up at 23.30, terrible customer service from just eat, this is the second time this has happened and we’ve only used the service 5 or 6 times, but will never be using this site again

Title: 2020 new year
Review: 2020 new year, after a rubbish year just eat let us down, dinner over 1 hour 30 minutes late, no way to complain or follow up, take away took phone off the hook, really bad /non existing service.

Title: Just-Thieves
Review: On the 29th of December 2020 at pproximately 7:06pm I ordered a Mcdonalds for myself and my boyfriend through Just-Eats. We chose them over Uber Eats due to their lower delivery fees.However this was a big mistake. The App stated a delviery time for 7:12pm which seemd odd at the time, later revised t 7:14pm.When the order was running approx. 20 minuteslate I contacted Just-Eat via the app. I was concerned that the food would turn up cold. Their Cutomer Support team put me on hold and were unable to locate the delivery and they told me to contact them again in 15-20 minutes if the order still hadn't turned up.20 minutes lates I contacted them and they were still unable to locate or contact their driver and offered us a £5 credit on our account which didn't nearly cover the cost of the order. I asked for a full and immeidate refund, we were very hungry and angry at this point. They proceeded to send what can only be described as robotic/scripted responses and certainly didn't come across like tney cared either way. No refund was offered.My boyfriend then contacted them half an hour later. The delivery was now well over an hour late. He asked for a full and immediat refund and was told the order had been "rejected" by us! After explaining the above situation (again) we asked for a full investigation & refund as it was clear the driver was not telling the truth and we were still not offered a refund.In the end they told us to wait for an email (no email has been sent a day later as I write this). They also promised an investigation would happen with a decision within 48 hours. When we checked the order later that evening the status on their app had beem updatd to "delivered at 7.41pm!".  I then called their Helpdesk at 9.25pm and was able to briefly speak to an agent who was sympathetic but couldn't help and just re-iterated we would have to wait for an "investigation".So essentially we have paid for food, it never showed up and now we are currently out of pocket with no expectation of a refund. We are therefore having to seek compensation through Paypal and/or our bank.We’ve also reported it to the fraud department.

Title: Would be 0 stars if I could leave that…
Review: Would be 0 stars if I could leave that option. I can understand that places are busy on New Year’s Eve but to have preordered food at 6pm so arrive at 9pm and for food to still not be here by 11:30 is a joke, ruined our New Year’s Eve ....thanks 👌🏻

Title: Ken’s restaurant in Reading offered a…
Review: Ken’s restaurant in Reading offered a terrible service. I am quite sympathetic about delays but I ordered our food after 6 pm and I was told that it would arrive 50 minutes later. That was fine. After one and half hours, I called and i was  told that our food was on the way. I called two more times and was told the same thing. This is the dishonesty that I object to. Had I been told that there was a problem earlier, I could  have, graciously, cancelled the order and ordered from somewhere else. By the time that I did this, nowhere was taking orders and Ken’s had already taken the money. Just Eat showed a message that the food had been delivered. We were told that we needed to call Just Eat to obtain reimbursement.As I commented that this was not our responsibility, Ken’s takeaway worker hung up. I won’t be ordering from them again.

Title: JUST W--- !!!
Review: JUST W--- !!! at least that's a happy ending. Nobody allowed out the one treat a Take Out !!! Money taken no food .Ordered at 6pm was supposed to arrive 19.40 still no sign . 2020 just keeps on giving. Dreadful year and Dreadful service. Load of rubbish!! This has got to be the biggest scam ever, no food received but all money taken . This night needs to be investigated with prosecutions for fraud ....

Title: Worst service I have ever seen
Review: No food. Says delivered. Can’t contact restaurant. Can’t contact justeat. Most appalling service I have ever seen from anywhere. Completely inexcusable as have now been left without any dinner whatsoever.

Title: £45 order 6.30pm now 10.10pm and we’re…
Review: £45 order 6.30pm now 10.10pm and we’re having cereal for nye dinner!!! Order says delivered. Kids waited nearly 4 hours for no show!! Can’t get hold of just eat or the Chinese restaurant.The door knocked at 12.30am with the chinese!!!!!

Title: HORRENDOUS SERVICE - DON’T USE
Review: My food should have been here after 35 minutes, it’s now been an hour and 25 and it still hasn’t left the restaurant. Spent 40 minutes on hold and can’t find another way to complain. No dinner on 2020 New Years Eve, thanks Just Eat, absolutely DISGUSTING SERVICE.Update - Food arrived after 1 hour 40 with multiple items missing. When I finally got through to customer service a week later, I was offered an insulting £5 voucher (5% order value) for my troubles!

Title: Just try to complain, I dare you. Hi
Review: Food over an hour late despite pre-ordering, take away phone obviously off the hook unless everyone from Huntingdon trying to locate their order! Obviously no way of actually contacting “Just Eat” this is without doubt the last time I will be using your site!

Title: I had terrible food from a Thai…
Review: I had terrible food from a Thai restaurant ordering food from just eat and I payed cash lesson learnt. Myself and my mother became ill the food the next day it was disgusting and we decided after trying it, it really wasn't edible. After contacting just eat even after reading there policy on there own Web page about help. They were awful and unwilling to help. I will have to go to the food standards agency now. I would warn anyone not to use this app and especially don't pay cash the shocking thing is they still have the restaurant on there site after telling them how ill we have been shameful.

Title: STAY AWAY FROM CREEPY JUST EAT
Review: They are official thugs please stay away from them. They are putting hidden delivery charges for orders below certain amount. It's fair but as a customer I need to know, they shortlist restaurants under free delivery but in backend there are delivery charges. Please stay away guys, worst is there are no one you can talk to. They are a disgrace and suck in what they do. Welcome to the official thieves making more misery for customers. Shame on you just-shiet!

Title: Kfc delivered wrong order
Review: Kfc delivered wrong order. Shop would not answer phone( rung them 3 times). Sent driver back to shop. Complained to just eat; who said refund would wait until they had investigated. Will try another food delivery service.

Title: No food still charged
Review: Order food it never arrived so I requested a refund they informed me they wouldn’t be able to due to system constrains. Poor customer service won’t be using again

Title: Shocking BAD Service
Review: I ordered food. It was supposed to arrive. It was collected from the restaurant and then went missing. I speak to JUSTEAT and they tell me that there is nothing they can do. I will get a code and I have to apply for a refund. WOW. Ridiculous!

Title: Did somebody say Just Scam? Just Read? Can’t read?
Review: Omg! This company is a joke!Same story as everyone on here.Unbelievable.Ordered three hours ago...I watched the driver on the map delivering my food to another house on the adjacent road.Thinking in vain they would realise that’s not my address.Not the case. No food delivered still and yet just eat say it’s been delivered.This why..My full address is correct. I know this. I live here. On the map my address becomes a different house on another road. So there’s something technically wrong with the app. Unfortunately they must hire drivers that can’t read road signs. As there is no number 28 on the adjacent road.Lol. Third time unlucky. Fu*king fuming again. Abysmal service. WHY NOT STOP SPENDING ALL YOUR CASH ON TERRBILE  AD CAMPAIGNS AND SORT OUT THE ACTUAL DELIVERY ASPECT OF YOUR COMPANY while you are at it...YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE TOO. Taken my money but no food. No product. SCAM. Fraudulent and well...I cannot say anymore can I?! Exactly the same as everyone else on here.

Title: Aboustly discussed...allways ordered…
Review: Aboustly discussed...allways ordered from just eat I got McDonalds from them it was stale the food sent pics and emails and I was unwell for couple days and I got was we gave you a 5 pound voucher.   And that's not even going on about the other takeaways I have ordered .the staff all go by a script so the longer they keep you on chat more chance you got of your food comming if theres a delay ..... i waited hours for food and when i said can i cancel it they tried charging me becuse it was preped....instead of paying millions to snoop dog and advertising how about paying drivers that want to pick up orders and looking after customers just eat are a joke  ...... should be called just take your money and end up with crap

Title: awful
Review: awful. orders never delivered or completely wrong. Will never order from them again. This has happened too many times.

Title: Stole my money and food!!
Review: I wouldnt even give them 1 star so Christmas eve i make a £30 order to get my children some food as a treat before santa comes but no nothing even arrived even though it was stated delivery was made at 7.03pm which it had not I have cctv on my house so can clearly prove it did not arrive!! Yet your stating it did and still no refund!! Absolte disgrace of a company

Title: Zero stars
Review: Terrible service. Website says restaurant now delivers to my address but driver refuses to deliver and says my order has been delivered when it has not. Terrible company and I will not be using again.

Title: By far one one of the worst companies…
Review: By far one one of the worst companies ever. There is zero support provided to users and poor training guidance to drivers. My orders always get lost delayed and now marked as delivered when I got nothing instead. Trying to speak with someone from the customer service is like trying to find a mermaid. They cannot provide resolutions or help or guidance. It is particularly ridiculous when we are in lockdown and people depend of such services. It is just a shame of the miserable experience people like me have to have with Just Eat.

Title: Ordered food food delivered to wrong address
Review: Ordered food from mcdonnalds told on website delivered at 18:04 found delivered 6 doors up the close in freezing weatherYour rubbish and should not be allowed to deliver anything

Title: Awful customer service or lack of
Review: Awful customer service, food never arrived no refund even after complaint stage.  I received an email saying after investigation they found the food was delivered and no further action.  For the sake of a £13 order i find this comical.  These cowboys will be reported to trading standard i suggest others do too.

Title: Don't waste time
Review: Ordered food. Waited nearly two hours and then we canceled with just eat. Got hanged up on the customer service chat 4 times. Said they would refund "if they could". Not even worth one star the worst

Title: Wish there was less than 1 star!
Review: Wish there was less than 1 star! Ordered an e-voucher for someone, been a week they haven't got it. Go on constant webchats with useless people who say the same stuff and just say ill get called in 48 hours, which I don't get. Go on another webchat, another call in 48 hrs. I called their helpline..if you're a customer EVERY option just cuts you off and fobs you off to their website. Finally I selected the option as if I was the restaurant and they answered straight away ,(shows who they value the most!) And again just basically got a live version of a webchat. They cant speak to a manager directly, can't access account details without a supervisor and how long will it take for a supervisor to contact me...yep 48hrs. I honestly at this point believe I won't get a voucher or my £25 back. Last time I use this absolutely disgusting company. If or when I order something it will be with someone else.

Title: driver stole my order
Review: order a big kfc order waited over 2 hr for the driver to mark as delivered i will be informing police as this was a mugging from a company that dont care what there drivers steal from customerscustomer service is useless avoid at all cost

Title: Horrendous
Review: Horrendous, didn't receive order, told I would get a refund, I didn't. Ever since the chat agents hang up on me. They wont speak to me

Title: Really should be MINUS
Review: Really should be MINUS, not 1 star.Don't bother with JUST EAT! . Ordered food from McDonald's at 6.30. Was told it would be with us by 7.05, was still  waiting at 7.25 so rang mcdonald's who told ne to contact just eat McDonald's  shut, whilst I was waiting to chat to just eat as there were 700 people in front of me I managed to speak to just eat and they tell me It had been delivered, whilst I'd been chatting to her!! Status did change so they must be able to do thst. Funny how she saud it had been delivered, cos I had a I had a text, saying its cancelled, from a driver that had turned up after Mcdonald's had shut!! Now I  have to wait 48 hours (which will be longer as its Xmas) for it to be looked into, before I can even get a, refund. Ended up ordering a kfc from uber, who delivered within 20 minutes Won't be using them again!!!

Title: Waited 3 hours for food on Christmas eve
Review: Waited 3 hours for food on Christmas eve. Tried to cancel an hour in because it was taking too long and I couldn't as it said the restaurant was cooking my order, which it wasn't as there was still no assigned driver. 30 mins later the restaurant actually closed meaning an hour and a half of my wait was when they were actually shut, but I still could not cancel my order...Ordered KFC from deliveroo in the end which came in 30 mins. Just use deliveroo, don't put yourself through justeats awful customer service

Title: Just awful
Review: placed order at 18.19, estimated 18.55 delivery. Changed to 19.05 and didn't update from there.Partner ended up driving to restaurant where there were piles of food left by drivers that had abandoned it due to not keeping up with the demand. McDonald's manager said the worst company they have ever dealt with. 27 back logged orders and no drivers.Called ended up on hold forever, used online chat, was stuck on 99 in queue for half hour, took nearly an hour to chat to an agent. Never again, terrible service.Eventually cancelled order.

Title: Driver contacted us to let us know the…
Review: Driver contacted us to let us know the food is on the way. Driver then logged our delivery as delivered. We received no food at all. Just Eat drivers are thieves.

Title: Awful service
Review: Awful service, I have been waiting 2 and a half hours for a delivery, it was estimated 50 mins, all the message says is allocating driver. I have tried to cancel the order but it says I have wait inline on live chat , currently waiting behind another 100 people ,never again will I order anything through this crappy app

Title: Dont order from Justeat
Review: Dont order from Justeat, unless you want to wait a very long time for your order. Justeat is f***** up. Probably better off ordering from ubereats

Title: Incorrect addresses on their system.
Review: Their postcode finder brings up my road for one around the corner so I have just had a driver hammering on my door at 10 at night, AGAIN, for something which is nothing to do with me. Impossible to contact them to sort this out.

Title: Generally very good
Review: Generally very good, I have ordered lots of times and food arrives on time specified 99% of the time and only once did the order not turn up...I was promptly refunded next day. Dunno where the order went the driver disappeared off the tracking map and that was the last I saw of my burger!

Title: Ordered a gift card for Xmas for my dad…
Review: Ordered a gift card for Xmas for my dad off his grandchildren with a cute note. Hasn’t turned up. Live chat not helpful and have no idea what to do. No way of getting through to an actual person on the phone, can’t even get a refund, sure this is theft? Told me to contact post office and can’t even give me a tracking or reference number so obviously the post office didn’t have a clue.

Title: Their app won’t let me write a review…
Review: Their app won’t let me write a review about the business I ordered from!

Title: Food never arrived and the driver said…
Review: Food never arrived and the driver said he'd delivered. Had to contact my bank to get money bank. Don't ever use this company!

Title: Would give this zero stars if I could
Review: Would give this zero stars if I could.  Ordered 3 KFC meals, message said was delivered it wasn't.  Tried contacting KFC who said driver had left with the order and couldn't do anything, absolute joke KFC why are you not vetting your drivers better going on these reviews you will soon have no business.

Title: Well i see why the ratings are so bad…
Review: Well i see why the ratings are so bad such a terribly frustrating service where the customer gets punished. I ordered food the driver said it arrived (it hadnt) i can only assume he took it himself! I got straight on contacting them about this tried phoning its a web of dead ends impossible to get through to a sales advisor so i went on to the live chat which i had to retype 5 times as the page kept refreshing losing my place in the 'queue' which i dont actually think is real how can i be in position 2 for 40 mins. Its a very strange business and it seems that the more the drivers are aware of your lack of help towards customers who haven't received items the more they will continue to go off with peoples orders! Do not order unless you like gifting random thieves free food

Title: Wow what a shocking company
Review: Wow what a shocking company! It’s not physically possible to speak anyone on there ‘customer helpline’ number and when you try speak to them via email or social media they don’t want to know! Waiting for £70 worth of vouchers paid for 48 hour delivery and it’s been over a week now complete joke!!!

Title: They don't care and 'chat' doesn't work on MS Edge
Review: Both dips missing from chicken despite being on the receipt - a pretty essential part of the meal, very dry without. Reading complaints about that branch of McDonalds I can see they do it all the time - many reviews were from the SAME DAY let along hundreds of others. I complained and got offered... 40p!  40 pence is a derisory and insulting offer of compensation for the missing dips, as this made the chicken virtually inedible. Looking at other complaints the restaurant does this all the time. You can't complain further as it forces you to go to a 'chat session' whcih appears conveniently not to work on MS Edge browser.

Title: Food was bad
Review: Would have hoped you could rely on a company like this how wrong will never use again bought  a meal on sunday by monday you no the rest everytime you try and be honest it gets taken down why comment on the experience

Title: AVOID AVOID AVOID!
Review: AVOID AVOID AVOID!THIS COMPANY IS A COMPLETE SHAMBLES. MY KFC ORDER NEVER ARRIVED AND I WAS TOLD BY THIER CHATBOX THERE IS NOTHING THEY CAN DO. AN INVESTIGATION WAS SUPPOSEDLY RAISED AND THAT I WOULD RECIEVE AN OUTCOME IN 48 HOURS . What a joke, none has made contact. Its impossible to speak to someone they just fob you off with fake numbers and emails, so they have basically just robbed me! I WOULD NEVER USE THIS COMPANY AGAIN!!!

Title: My food never arrived
Review: My food never arrived but the app said it was delivered.I tried to contact just eat through the app but I was talking to a bot. I told the bot my food never arrived and it answered "we're sorry your food is late". After trying several different answers to the bot's various questions I managed to talk to a real person.This person said they would pass it onto the investigations team and I would hear back in 48 (!!!!!) hours. This was 2 days ago and I have not heard back. They also said I would receive another email shortly after the chat ended but I did not receive that email either.So here I am 2 days after my order didn't arrive with no food and no refund, despite my best efforts. What is going on with their refund policy? They seem to be making is as difficult as possible to get a refund.UPDATE: after almost a month of pestering them and threatening to take them to the small claims court, they gave me my refund "as a gesture of goodwill".

Title: Lucky to get a 1 star
Review: Lucky to get a 1 star! Would five less if I could. Food never arrived, tracker stopped working, "CHAT" kept loading with no actual person to chat to and when I called i was just left on hold! Absolute joke of a company.

Title: Honestly save yourself the hassle and…
Review: Honestly save yourself the hassle and use Deliveroo or Uber eats. They will say that they have delivered the food and charge you and then when you call up they will question you as if you were trying to steal when really and truly day are the one stealing. Avoid this like the plague avoid this like the pandemic the customer service is horrendous and the food mostly always arrived damaged or late

Title: Pity I cant give zero stars
Review: Pity there's no zero stars option. Avoid Just Theft - potential risk of no food, no money back. Just Theft 1st order McDonald's £11.08,    2nd Just Theft order Kebab World £20 = Total Just Theft £31.08. I will Never, Never Ever use Just Eat again. They are bandits who wash their hands of any responsibilty when the service goes wrong. They took my money and, I received nothing in return, somebody got a free dinner, maybe the dispatch driver. Disgusting!! But hey, what do they care, they just shrug that its not their issue to resolve. Zero customer service and bad business practices, when things go wrong. It will eventually catch up with them, word is getting around, they are losing custom and will eventually go out of business. Just Theft!!!!! 1st order McDonald's £11.08, 2nd order Kebab World £20 = Total Just Theft £31.08.

Title: Abasoutey crap do not order from them…
Review: Abasoutey crap do not order from them as it’s such a crap service and you probably won’t receive your food but they seem more then happy to take the money from your account really pissed of with there service will never use them again and I will get on social media to let other people no not to use just eat bluddy crap stay away from them

Title: Twice our order never turned up but they took the money and refused to refund
Review: Lied twice about food order being delivered,  yet app said driver on his way , then signal.lost but dont worry , driver will.be with you soon , an hour and phone calls later app states order delivered,  this happened this weekend , and investigation team said driver had delivered the food when he clearly hasnt been near us let alone delivered our orders , day light robbery and lies

Title: Just Eat don’t care about customers
Review: I use Just Eat for myself and business regularly (2-3 times a week) then this week they failed to deliver an order (from Greggs).  No problem I thought, I’ll raise with their Customer Support team and I’m sure they’ll just refund (the princely sum of £8).  However I was wrong and after an ‘investigation’ I was told the order was delivered (it wasnt) so no refund for me. No apology, no proof, no redress or way to escalate. I feel cheated. There are many options when it comes to takeaway delivery and I wont be using Just Eat again, their loss.

Title: Despicable
Review: Ordered through the app and it was rejected by the restaurant. Ordered elsewhere through the same app. JUST eat contact the original restaurant and insist they do our order WITHOUT TELLING US. We then have two orders arrive, charged for both and we sent one back believing it was the restaurants error. Cannot get to speak to anyone about the matter on any forum. Horrific customer service.

Title: AVOID JUST EAT AT ALL COSTS.
Review: AVOID JUST EAT AT ALL COSTS.Ordered food on 18th of December from just eat. It was a McDonald's order. It didn't arrive. They won't give me my money back. Absolute shambles of an outfit. I've been on to them numerous times and got nowhere. STAY CLEAR!!! This company are thieves and are not be trusted. Amazed a firm of this size has got to where it is. Disgusting. They stole my money. They only got one star because I can't give a zero.

Title: Worst place ever
Review: Worst place ever. Waited 3 hours for food and still didn’t receive order had to cancel after waiting so long

Title: Absolutely diabolical!!
Review: Absolutely diabolical!!! Never came across a business like it!!! Disgusting....last night no order turned up!!! Was sorted out this afternoon and I was given a 20 pound refund!! So, tonight I attempted to order another one!!! No order turned up....phoned the restaurant and they didn't even have my order!!!! Company needs boycotting....really dont understand how they haven't gone bust!!!!

Title: Worst delivery company ever!!!!! AVOID
Review: Just ordered mcdonald's breakfast from the stratford mall mcdonald's. Driver marked as delivered but I did not receive my order. I was standing on my door step waiting to receive my order, I went to investigate after 10mins and asked the concierge if a delivery driver had come and he said the driver came inside saw what floor i lived on and left with my food!!! I reported this to Just eat and they did absolutely nothing! Apparently as long as its been marked as delivered then it has been delivered. I have never had this issue with Uber eats or Deliveroo. Just eat is the worst delivery partner! Avoid at all costs!!!!

Title: Just Eat worst of the worst
Review: When I saw on my phone the delivery had been made, despite the fact that I was standing at my doorstep waiting for my food I phoned Just Eat and spoke to a man who gave his name as best I could understand as Jalla  Lowden that's what it sounded like to me. He said he would investigate but we would  not get our food, he also said the drivers don't work for just eat they work for KFC so he could not contact the driver to find out where he had delivered our food to, this to me was a ridiculous excuse to give.As  both me and my husband are diabetics we had to have our meal so we jumped in the car and went to the KFC the meal was ordered from. I explained what had happened and the manager phoned Just eat. While she was on the phone the driver turned up and said he delivered the order, I said to him you did not deliver to me or my husband, he agreed to that showed me a photo on his phone where he had delivered to a property in Venmore street which is 3 streets away from me. He said that was where the GPS took him to which means he obviously put the wrong post code in,even a change of just 1 letter can send him to the wrong address. But as my full address was on the bill he should have checked that before handing out food to someone else. I seriously think you should retrain your staff and drivers.KFC however know how to treat their  customers. Even though we had to pay again for our food we did eat and she assured me we would receive a refund from just eat within 48 hours. I sincerely hope this is correct and she has not been lied to.Gail Wilsonthis is the e-mail I sent them on12th December following my bad experience with just eat, since then I have tried for a week to contact them Email get no replyPhone gives option buttons to press but never puts you through to a operatorOn line can't find siteThis is beyond doubt the worst company I have ever dealt with in all my 63 years.I will NEVER repeat NEVER use them again and implore people to take heed read the reviews,they do not lie unlike just eat who do

Title: Ordered Mcdonalds at 17.30 tonight for…
Review: Ordered Mcdonalds at 17.30 tonight for delivery approx 18.10 ....... 2 hours later the app said delivered but no one came to our house, So I joined the complaints process, 35 mins later was told it has been re ordered. Great I said after another hour waiting joined the complaint process once again also held in another long queue eventually spoke to somebody who lied constantly. Lie after lie, I was extremely frustrated being told the driver was in the restaurant. Unknown to the person I was on the phone to the restaurant on my partners phone, I was being told there was no order. I asked just eat to track the driver with my order to be told yet again & lied to once more, saying that he was at the restaurant waiting for my order to be processed. Then after catching them out was put on hold. Until I received an email saying my order was cancelled. So 4 hours after my enitial order i had to drive to McDonalds for my food, my partner has diabetes and was starting to feel unwell. Told the operator this who could not care. I will never use Just Eat again. And promise to tell everyone not to bother. Absolutely disgusting service and attitude.

Title: Food poisoning in a box
Review: To me you will accept any one that serves food. If I make food in my garage you would accept me. Clearly you dont vet the premises we order from. I have seen your logo on many windows and I was put off of the poor hygiene on the food premises. Dirty premises and will never forget kebab meat left on the shop floor over night. Why dont you vet companys? Never will I use just eat.

Title: Money taken Twice and ZERO order received
Review: Tried twice to order, payment didn't go through twice. Checked my card issuer and the payment has been taken twice but no successful order at all. Went onto live chat help to find myself number 99 in the queue! I've phoned my bank to report this fraud. Wouldn't use Just Eat ever again even if it was the last option on earth! Disgraceful app and quite possibly the worst customer service I've ever encountered.

Title: Terrible
Review: Company is terrible. They have drivers who mark orders as delivered but don’t actually deliver the food. You raise issue with the company but they don’t do anything. No refund or anything! Goodbye justeat, will never order from you again

Title: Obligatory “if I could give 0 star”…
Review: Obligatory “if I could give 0 star” statement.Three hours and still waiting and on hold for an hour for refund....never again!

Title: Just eat the service is always late and dirty
Review: Just eat the service is always late very poor and they trick you with refund and you don’t receive it and the driver are dirty I see a delivery driver play with he’s nose nasty pice work can you imagine what happens to the food you eat nasty

Title: Did Somebody Say Don’t Eat!!!!
Review: Like many others, I would give this company 0 stars if I could. Ordered my food, the delivery driver turns up, gives us the wrong order. He states he will return in 10 minutes with the correct order. He never came back. Contacted Customer Services to request a refund. Hung up on me 3 times. Finally, got through on live chat to be told they would conduct an investigation and report their outcome. The outcome is I had no food & still waiting for a refund. This company should be boycotted.

Title: Dont use lowestoft just eat the theres…
Review: Dont use lowestoft just eat the theres a food thief among their  drivers.  We got a text from just eat saying our £25 food order has been delivered  but we never the door knock a car pull up.nothing at all. So the driver stole our food. The restuarant said we had get in touch with just eat Rang customer services who said they cant help.  and to try and get a refund is a nightmare shitbag company

Title: Zero, zero, zero
Review: Unfortunately I can not put a zero star. I'm absolutely furious this evening we ordered our food and it hadn't been delivered to our house, but someone else's. I spoke to just eat customer service to them to tell me I had to wait 48 hours for my a email to investigate the issue, so no food or refund. My partner then went to the restaurant where we ordered from, to be told that someone had rung up and said they had our order. Still waiting for that confirmation email they said I would receive, absolutely disgusting shame on you just eat and maybe u want to make sure ur drivers are properly trained to deliver to the right bloody house. Oh and want a refund, much thanks

Title: Food not delivered or even picked up
Review: Second time my food didn’t arrive. This time it hadn’t even been picked up from the restaurant. Just Eat was adamant that it was delivered. The restaurant also said Just East has been a shambles. I had to collect the food myself. Still no refund. Will never use again_______Just Eat response: Having investigated this and spoken to the relevant parties, it appears that you order was in fact delivered. In which case, this will require no further action———They obviously haven’t spoken to the restaurant and the customer. The two main parties. I’ve even got CCTV showing that nothing was delivered. Absolutely shameful. Exact response I got when this happened a few months ago. Use at your own risk... this company isn’t fit for purpose

Title: Use my order from a well known local…
Review: Use my order from a well known local burger restaurant... they were running late and I had to wait quite a long while for my order to be given to the driver who by then must have got fed up with waiting cuz after it said my food was in the way the driver turned their signal off on google maps and ran off with my food order !!! It never arrived !!! Not much help from just eat customer service!!! 48 hours to be investigated and no guarantee of a refund !!! What absolute tosh !!! Won’t be using again .Hope u enjoyed ur free meal just eat driver !

Title: Food put as delivered
Review: Food put as delivered, restaurant confirm driver didn't turn up my food was still there, still no option for a refund.....never again just eat are complete parasites.

Title: No food, no refund, no customer service
Review: After an hour and 20 minutes of waiting we received a message to say our food has been delivered, as it wasn't delivered we applied for a refund, we get told the driver has confirmed the delivery and has delivered the food so they can't process the refund. This is our second order in a row with a problem, first we got charged for part of our order that never arrived and now we're being charged for food that hasn't arrived at all. The fact that just eat drivers can just say that the order has been delivered and then take your food is the easiest scam I've ever seen. Just eat does nothing to prove if you're right or wrong they just say they'll investigate for 48 hours. Now I'm sorry but we got told that over a month ago too and we still haven't been refunded for a previous order and now this happens and our entire order isn't here but our money is in their pockets and our food is probably eaten by the driver. Don't get me wrong ive had deliveries that have gone right, however it shouldn't be a risk reward scenario of whether you'll get food or you'll get charged and the driver gets your food. Absolutely disgraceful. The customer service even has the cheek to ask how your service was after effectively scamming people. Do not use just eat! The risk outweighs the reward every time!

Title: This company is a disgrace..
Review: This company is a disgrace... ordered food at 4.50pm, waited and waited for them to assign a driver... an hour passed, I tried to cancel. The website said I couldn’t. Next thing an alert comes through to say it’s been delivered.... It hadn’t!!! Tried and tried to get through to customer service... no chance...THREE HOURS LATER... I get an alert to say my food is on the way!!! The courier was really understanding and said he would try and contact Just Eat. I tried again today through online chat explaining all the above, to which the first question I was asked was if I can confirm the food was cold?..... seriously?!!!! Anyway... the person on the other end said as a gesture of goodwill they would credit my account with £20.... my order was over £25!!!Apparently they can’t refund to your bank and when I requested to speak with a supervisor, there were none available and was told that they would just say the same!!!!To say I am furious is an understatement!!!! Just Eat is a rip off with no respect for their customers. Pathetic. Do not use this company.

Title: Crooked delivery drivers
Review: So I ordered a burger and some chicken and a happy meal for my daughter after 40 mins no delivery, contacted just eats, said it had been delivered!! Which clearly hadn't happened or why would I contact them, obviously crooked delivery drivers who turn there in car GPS off, very dodgy indeed, just eats say they are investigating, in the mean time I have to wait 48 hrs for a decision, what a joke, feel totally robbed, I am furious, it was only £16 but to be robbed so easily is unbelievable, I will never order from them again, oh and live chat cut me off to add insult to injury, had to make us beans and toast in the enx, single parent with a small budget, not working because of virus situation, very limited funds this was a treat for us, more like a disaster

Title: delivery driver, he says 'YOUR FOOD IS IN THE DUSTBIN'
