Review: Useless support staff when an order hasn't been picked up. Cannot trust the delivery service.

Title: Food Order never arrived
Review: Food Order never arrived. Can understand a mistake. But JustEat attitude sucks. Customer service non existent. 2 Bot attempts, 3 calls later and 2 emails, justEat wont refund says restaurant delivered. No poof they even delivered or to the correct address. Utter rubbish, family sat with no food for 2 hours waiting. Food never arrived. Avoid at all costs. Will never use them again.

Title: AVOID - Terrible customer service.
Review: I tried to make a complaint via just eat after ordering food last night. The food took 2 hours 45 minutes to deliver and when it arrived it was cold. I tried to speak with the restaurant (1 successful attempt out of 65) and was fobbed off with an excuse about traffic (even though there was none - food arrived at almost 9pm and roads were empty according to google maps). I spoke to the bot service who put me through to a live chat. I was told just eat can’t help and I need to speak with the restaurant. So I tried the restaurant one more time as requested of me, of course they hung the phone up. I went back to just eat and was told it’s down to the restaurant, they can’t help - even though I had followed every single step asked of me. I then asked for the complaints procedure and was completely ignore, the response was “you need to contact the restaurant”. I then asked again around 10 more times and did not receive an answer as to what their complaints procedure was or given a number/email etc. The service was absolutely shambolic. They don’t want to take any responsibility, yet they are offering their service on their website.

Title: Customer service as good as catching Covid-19
Review: Worst customer service I’ve ever experienced. Ordered peri peri chicken tonight ate a bit and realised it was so off and rotten it smelled like roadkill. Immediately rang the takeaway who offered to give refund through justeat. Contacted justeat via the “bot” which agreed to issue the £6. Nothing then happened, so I rang up the helpline as I was now feeling nauseous 3 hours after the eating a small piece of rotten chicken. I suspect food poisoning. The guy couldn’t understand my problem so put me on hold for an hour. I hung up and tried again, to speak to a woman who couldn’t understand and she put the phone down on me. I then contacted the “bot” site again for them to tell me they take no responsibility for food poisoning and that I should contact the council. Words cannot express how utterly useless and unethical they are as a company. They take a large cut of your money for literally no effort, responsibility or due care for there customers. Avoid at all costs, they wouldn’t care if you died of salmonella.

Title: same again disgusting
Review: same again, very disgusting service of justeat, wrong ordered delivered, contacted just eat and after half an hour talk they said some one will investigate and contact me and no one ever contacted back..

Title: I ordered food which never arrived
Review: I ordered food which never arrived, when I checked the site it said it had been delivered; nobody had called my phone, buzzed my building, or knocked at my door. I rang Just Eat to find out what was happening, after a long drawn out process I was finally put through to one of their customer service team, I explained what had happened and they told me what I already knew - the restaurant had marked it as delivered - though they also told me an investigation would be launched. A few days later I received an email telling me I would not be receiving a refund as they had checked their records and the restaurant marked it as delivered... I don't know if I need to point out why this is a problem. So a restaurant marks my order as delivered when it wasn't, I call and explain that, their "investigation" means simply asking the restaurant again? And what a surprise, the restaurant stuck to their lie. I was frustrated when I didn't receive my food, but I was really getting annoyed now, who wouldn't? Not only am I being refused a refund for food I didn't receive, I'm essentially being accused of lying and Just Eat have not put any effort into determining what is correct - their "investigation" is as lazy as they come. So I get in contact with Just eat again and explain all of this, I'm told they will look into my issue more thoroughly, sounds all good right? Today I get another email from them, the exact same email I received last time (word for goddamn word). What is the point in pretending you're going to deal with my issue if you're going to put such little effort into concealing the fact that you have done absolutely nothing? Do Just Eat just assume their customers are too stupid to realise? Or too lazy to persist? Nothing annoys me more than companies who take their customers for granted in this way, I order food occasionally out of convenience and thankfully it was just me on my lonesome this time, what if I was ordering for a family? I've been ordering from Just Eat for as long as I can remember, yeah I don't get a bucket in every week, but I've given them enough over the years and I've NEVER claimed food wasn't delivered to me. Welp what can ya do? The most annoying thing about this (and I take full responsibility for being duped twice) is that this all happened to me with Deliveroo! Both have terrible customer service, basically you're fine on 99.9% of your orders, but pray that a restaurant doesn't F you over because believe me, these guys will not lift a finger to solve it.

Title: Appalling Service - I will never use them again!
Review: My daughter had got to Outstanding at school so I decided to order a Macdonalds to deliver to the house, through Just Eat, as a surprise to say well done. Not only was the order a hour and a half late, it was stone cold and the delivery driver made no attempt at an apology. She simply said that she did not speak English, shrugged her shoulders and walked off. I tried to request a refund and complain to Just Eat. What a joke! Seven different operators all asking me what the problem was with no solution, no refund, barely an apology and just talked nonsense at me for an hour! I asked how to get a card refund as I had no intention of ordering from them again and no one could tell me. Their site is ridiculous when it comes to a complaint as you just get passed through one 'call' to another and there is no direct way to request a refund anywhere! When I called Macdonalds they could not believe it had taken so long and told me that next time I visit the restaurant they would give me a free meal as a way of saying sorry. They were polite, apologetic and very professional. In comparison Just Eat said to leave a review for the restaurant and they would feed back to them how dreadful they were with no one wanting to share the blame etc. I am utterly appalled by the lack of customer service, empathy, helpfulness or regard for my two tired, hungry and tearful children who I had promised a treat to! In the end I had to cook for them otherwise they would not have eaten till late and would have had to go straight to bed! This simply is not good enough and I will never use this company again!

Title: Surprised by all the negative reviews
Review: Surprised by all the negative reviews. I've ordered from Just Eat 100's of times over the years and I don't recall ever having any problems. I've lived in 4 different towns/cities over the last couple of years and Just Eat has been reliable in every location. I've taken off 1 star because the delivery fees are sometimes extortionate. I don't know what Just Eat charge the restaurant for the use of their service but in most cases I can order from the restaurant directly and get free delivery so I don't get how Just Eat can charge £3 for delivery from the same restaurant.

Title: I ordered a takeaway and despite living…
Review: I ordered a takeaway and despite living exactly one mile from the shop for two hours the delivery driver couldn’t find my house. I was verbally abused by the man in the shop and the delivery driver. The delivery driver sent me abusive text messages and I didn’t receive my delivery. I complained to just eat and explained as a woman living on her own being abused by two men who knew my address and phone number I had felt scared and vulnerable. Just eat “investigates” the matter and said the takeaway shop said my food had been delivered so basically saying I was lying. I have screenshots of the messages to prove I’m not lying I also had to order another delivery from just eat straight after. Why would I do that if I’d already received the first order? As a nurse finishing a 12 hour shift during the pandemic all I wanted was a quick meal as I hadn’t eaten all day. The way just eat didn’t care that I was abused or didn’t receive my food was shocking. The takeaway has numerous complaints like this and they have done nothing probably because they make more money from having them on the site and don’t care how they treat their customers b

Title: They spent so much money greasing Snoop…
Review: They spent so much money greasing Snoop Dogg`s palm that they can`t get the basics down. They`ve got a `gangsta` operation running that would make even the most seasoned `G` go green with envy. I can`t believe they can get away with this; does Snoop Dogg know what`s been going? I guess some white middle-class advertising executives have decided to get down with the whole `hood` thing from the comfort of their privileged status (have a look at Les Grossman in Tropic Thunder for more of that, or perhaps listen to Vanilla Ice). Just Eat: Get Rick Quick Or Die Tryin`, eh? :(

Title: Very Poor Service
Review: They are expensive unless a discount code is used, typically use 20-25%.I transferred money in to give account credit not knowing that this then can't be used with any discount codes - effectively meaning I lose 20-25%!All other payment methods including PayPal allow codes to be used with an order. Can not see any way of getting my money back.Customer services are useless: robot, then stock answers from a human which don't help. They kept me on the chat for over 90 mins and passed me through several staff who made no attempt to resolve the issue.Shocked to come here and find 1 star rating - looks like everyone else also has an unacceptable poor experience!But I like the 5 star p' take review from "Sno man" the best - search it out, you'll love it, both funny and probably spot on! :)Note that we have had good experiences with both Deliveroo and Uber Eats so you know where I will be sticking!

Title: I don't think I have ever had an order…
Review: I don't think I have ever had an order there hasn't been an issue with. Missing items and missing meal. The worst so far was this weekend just gone. We ordered kfc through just eat spending £60 on 6 meals sides and drinks. For once the delivery driver actually arrived by the predicted time...however. he passed me 2 little bags ,so I asked him where is the rest .he replied that's all they gave me ...I said to him does it look like there are 6 meals in there ,I opened the bag and it only had the sides in it .I phoned just eat who were as about much use as a chocolate teapot and suggested I phoned the restaurant. So I phoned kfc who quickly informed me that the driver had actually left the bag behind and he seemed in a hurry. KFC where very helpful and said I could go and collect a fresh order. The staff at kfc explained my order was ready to go the driver just didn't take it . Just eat always pass the buck and never take responsibility or offer to resolve the problem. You plan a nice evening and it just ends up being headache. I will never use just eat again and I would seriously advise against using them . If I could give 0 stars I would.

Title: I would advise everybody to use…
Review: I would advise everybody to use deliveroo or Uber eats as they are so much more helpful in the case of any problems this is the worst food delivery service I have ever come across If I could give this service a 0 that wouldn’t be Low enough My food came incomplete I then phoned up customer services which was terrible the women on the phone was very rude and actually hung up on me the restaurant blamed it on just eat and just eat blamed it on the restaurant will never be using this service again and wouldn’t recommend anyone else to do so either.

Title: Just eat was good, food was bad
Review: Ordered food from Jones grill, the delivery was on time the guy that delivered it was nice and polite and as for the order it was brought to the door with no issues.  Unfortunately, although the online experience was very good the food was not. Ordered 2 lamb dishes and it was fat and tough Was not able to eat the food.  I have had a chicken order before which was lovely, but tonight I have paid £14 for food that I was unable to eat. Just eat was good the delivery was good but the food was bad

Title: Terrible service from just eat this…
Review: Terrible service from just eat this evening ordered food over two hours ago. Spoke to McDonald’s who had cooked order three times and had to throw away - update on app says looking to assign a driver. Eventually got through to Just Eat customer service who were useless just said they would cancel order!! Pointed out it had ruined my evening didn’t care a bit. When I asked why they had taken money and app had not been updated to say no drivers in LONDON (not in middle of nowhere) she just kept reeling script off. Then went quiet and wouldn’t speak or answer questions- this reflects badly not only on Just Eat who used to be good but also on the likes of McDonald’s and the other companies they are representing! Checked app now says delivered even though they haven’t!!! Should be investigated by trading standards

Title: LiveChat Kristine Ruined My Night More Than Non-Delivery
Review: Waiting over 1.5 hours with no driver assigned. Spoke to customer service and KRISTINE was absolutely ABYSMAL to deal with because of her obsession with POINTLESS security questions for data protection. I was already logged into the account and speaking to her via live chat so if I were a fraudster/hacker I could easily read all the stuff she was asking for anyway, her questions served no purpose than to infuriate me even more. Surprised she didn't ask my bleeding shoe size, it was like 4 or 5 security questions she asked, she even asked me 4 my name which was written in the live chat FACEPALM- HOW IS THAT MORE SECURE?! When you're fuming and hungry you are not in the mood to do a quiz about your old self (the account was set up years ago with old phone numbers, email and delivery address so i had to try and guess my answers several times while fuming and just being repeatedly quizzed

Title: Ordered from Mc Donalds
Review: Ordered from Mc Donalds, not even half my order came. The Delivery Driver took the order back to McDonalds, and told me to contact Just Eat as it was not the restaurants fault. I was given nothing, zilch, zero, no food! I paid to have a man knock at my door and tell me that the order was wrong! I contacted Just Eat and they said I would have to wait 72 hours before I even got a response, and that I might not get my money back. So basically Just Eat, Mcdonalds, whoever is responsible, have robbed me of £20.17p. Nice going guys, you lost another customer!

Title: Impossible to get a refund. Contacted Just Eat immediately when my…
Review: Impossible to get a refund. Contacted Just Eat immediately when my order didn't arrive. Was promised a refund and told to re-order. Refund never arrived. Contacted them again and told to wait up to 5 days for it to be refunded. Contacted them again 4 times and spoke to 4 agents all who took my details of my missing order and promised a refund. Was then told they couldn't refund as they didnt have the details of the missing order. Gave them details again then told it was over 48 hours (remember I rang them immediately) The agent promised to escalated to a manager who promised to call within 24 hours but never did. Spent 2 hours on chat bot and was assured by 3 different agents I'd be given a credit to my account or refund. Never got either. They also disconnect the chats frequently. Disgraceful do not use. Go direct to the restaurant as its cheaper and save money and hassle. They should be investigated.

Title: Customer service is absolutely awful
Review: Customer service is absolutely awful. Order never arrived and have had 5 separate conversations with no resolution to a simple request of a refund.Stay clear and use deliveroo or Uber Eats much more customer friendly

Title: Sad at lunch
Review: I ordered from Just Eat for my lunch break. I received someone else's order, returned it, then lunch break was over while waiting for a replacement. Also, I didn't receive any replacement after and I ate my morning biscuits. In the end, I was hungry and have to explain things to get my money back.That wasn't very nice.

Title: Worst Company EVER
Review: For the sake of your sanity, DO NOT use Just Eat...UberEats or even deliveroo are a much better optionI placed an order, Just Eat driver marked the order "delivered" and did not actually deliver anything.After many days and numerous attempts, I have not received my money back yet and I've honestly just given up now, the time wasted is not worth it anymore.Listen to this.... they said they will open an "investigation" and make a decision in 48 hours looolThen.... after their investigation, they decided to not refund me because the order was marked "delivered". I mean..... sometimes i actually do wonder if it's really actual people or donkeys working behind the scenes at this pathetic excuse of a company.Oh... and good luck trying to speak to a manager or supervisor... no, they're so busy stealing customers money that they have to call you back, I've still not received any call from them by the wayAll i can say is, if you actually do decide to order on just eat, may the force be with you

Title: I downloaded the app
Review: I downloaded the app, I ordered my food but as I got to payment it came up with an error saying payment wouldn’t go through...stupidly clicked it again...no order and just eat took 2 payments from my bank. Doesn’t look hopeful I’ll get the money back! Order with Uber eats if you can

Title: Absolutely terrible service     I…
Review: Absolutely terrible service     I ordered a takeaway for deliver and it never arrived. Tried to request assistance to no avail, they were quick enough to take the money   I have not managed to get it back yet. Will never use again

Title: If you are unlucky enough to have a bad…
Review: If you are unlucky enough to have a bad experience with a restaurant, dont expect just eat to help you out. They will tell you a manager will call within 24 hours (Which is a lie) & they will only offer you a partial refund or credit on your account when you are entitled to a full refund.

Title: I got a refund credit on my account but…
Review: I got a refund credit on my account but it will not let me use it 9 phone calls later and I am just being palmed off. Amazing when I un tick the credit and go to pay  full price it soon allows me to pay. Bunch of thieves

Title: They keep your money if you have to alter an order!!
Review: I made a error on my order but couldn’t alter it so ordered a second time. Rang the restaurant to cancel my first order and they said just eat don’t let them I would have to do it through just eat. So I did and just eat kept half of the value of my cancelled order value. They kept £34 of mine for no reason whatsoever and have totally ignored email correspondence from me querying it. BE VERY WARY OF USING THIS APP. no wonder they can afford to pay for an ad with snoop dog on a private jet!!!!

Title: I was promised a refund for disgusting…
Review: It is not even worth one star I was promised a refund for disgusting food and got passed to 10 different robotic chat helps they promised 20.00 refund made me put another orser in and charge me in full i am going to the trading standards please use takeaways direct stop using just eat they do not deserve the businrss

Title: I placed an order and I received a text…
Review: I placed an order and I received a text saying that you’re order is going to be late.within 1 minute of Ordering it.I called the restaurant. they said we are not open for another Hour and a half. I don’t know why they’re letting you order on the app. I cancelled the order thinking that I’m gonna get my money back but they’ve taken £10.88 for cancellation. They said I can’t get it back. Second time this just eat have robbed me. Never agen usen them stay away.

Title: No refunds
Review: This company is impossible to get a refund from. Their customer service team don’t know anything apart from pre-loaded generic answers who just bounce you to a different department, “investigations team”. After investigation for s few days they tell you what you already know and can’t help. To me this is tantamount to fraud or extortion. The restaurant had to call and insist on my refund. How can you expect me to pay for a cancelled order. Pile of ****.

Title: Read for refund
Review: I ordered a takeaway pizza and it never arrived. I call the customer service team and they passed it on to the investigation team. I then phoned back after 3 days and we were no further than the conversation from our first call. I then called back a week later and still no further progress had been made. I then asked to speak to a manager who directly told me she would deal with this personally. A further two weeks later it’s still sat with the investigation team. If you experience this their is hope contact your bank explain your situation and keep the evidence of your calls, as you do have to try and resolve it with just eat and then too no avail the bank will return your transaction.

Title: Papas at green lane rm8
Review: Papas at green lane rm8Is the worst place to order from and for some reason just eat giving them a high rate of customer service this not correct everyone please go in there and see it for yourself the staff unless u speak their language they won’t hekp you it’s filthy they way they work and timing for the food or anything takes twice long as they fava and serve others food before you.  Worst place in history then I thought let me order it over the phone OMG waited almost two hours for delivery.

Title: SHOCKING
Review: Hello,I’m really sorry to even be having to email, but I have no clue where else to go or turn. Over two and a half weeks ago I made an order through just eat to Pizza Hut. Myself and two children waited over two hours and it never turned up. When I rang Pizza Hut directly They said the driver never turned up and had also not picked up three other orders I then went on to ring just eat 6 days in a row and no one was helpful or clear. I kept being promised a refund within 24 hours and it never happened. I have chased and chased and got no where. I then just tried to speak on line to someone who cut me off! Purposely I have recorded everything and I’m beyond angry and upset. This is my last reach out before I feel I must go public as I’m disgraced that I’m chasing my own money for something that never turned up!

Title: Just Eat going downhill fast.
Review: They used to be able to deal with problems quite efficiently when their customer service department was in the UK. Now you have absolute 0% chance of resolving anything with these 1diots.  They have become so incompetent over the last few years, customers (the people actually ordering the food) and their partners (which are the food establishments that provide the food) are finding it impossible to deal with this company. Avoid Just Eat,Uber Eats and Deliveroo  if you can because the food establishments will inevitably increase their prices or reduce their offers on these platforms to cover the costs. They can charge the restaurants anywhere between 20%-35%. If a food establishment has their own delivery service ringing them directly or using their website will normally be cheaper. Food Hub is another good option at the moment (they charge the restaurants 0% commission) so they should be able to give better deals on this platform. One thing is definitely for sure Just Eat is becoming a joke, but I suppose they had to cut some corners to give Snoop Dogg his 5 million.

Title: The worst customer service! AVOID AT ALL COSTS
Review: I have had the exact same experience! My order turned up wrong, the delivery driver then said he would go to try and get the right order! ..... and then never returned! I phoned Just Eat 1 hour after the order was placed to say he had not returned and I had not got my food! They then responded with “unfortunately we cannot do anything as the order was marked as complete” so your customers don’t matter? Then they said the only way they could do anything would be to send this to the investigations team who would take 48 hours to reply! Then I also got a reply saying “the investigation team have spoken to the restaurant and can confirm the order was delivered and will be unable to issue a refund” I phoned back immediately to which I was told “I’m sorry about this I will pass this onto the investigations team who will contact you in 48 hours” I heard nothing! So phoned back for a 3rd time (one week later) and was told exactly the same thing again! It seems no one has ‘authority’ to refund or even do anything! How can they think not giving customers a service they’ve paid for is acceptable!? I’m never going with them again!

Title: I'm not sure how JustEat can say they…
Review: I'm not sure how JustEat can say they are easy to work with you can't even get pass the job app they ask for papers then are not in this country. Even when my job coach has a talk with them all lies they told him.

Title: McDonald’s although supposed to be is…
Review: McDonald’s although supposed to be is not on my just eat app...

Title: Disappointing
Review: Same as others, my order never arrived, the restaurant were quite happy to help me with this issue and even rang just eat for me so they were aware of my case. It was the just eat driver that never turned up. Its been 2 weeks, multiple conversations on the phone and over chat and nothing has changed, "issue been looked into further" yeah sure it has!!!!! Im never using the app again.

Title: Absolutely shocking
Review: Absolutely shocking. My order never came. They claimed they had an investigation team looking at my failed order. I spent hours trying to resolve it. Empty promises that they will look at it. Still no response even after one week and four tries (only from my side). They are bad. Never again I m going to use them and I ll make sure everyone I know will hear of their bad customer service.

Title: After spending literally thousands of…
Review: After spending literally thousands of pounds with just eat I encountered my first ever none delivery.  I contacted customer service 3 times without any joy.  Each time they said an investigation e-mail would be sent but one never arrived.  I asked for an e-mail address to send a complaint to and e-mailed it over.  I got a response to say that they had spoken to the restaurant and a refund would not be issued.  What a great way to resolve the dispute without even speaking to me.  I have evidence myself that proves the delivery was not even attempted, but they are not interested.  I am now having to take this issue further and will pursue all the way to small claims if i have to.

Title: Customer service sucks.
Review: I used to use just eat regularly. On one occasion I ordered some food which was never delivered dispute the app saying the driver was on his way for 45 mins. Phoned the restaurant they had no record of my order so it became apparent no food was coming. Phoned just eat explained the problem and said I wanted my money back. The lady was understanding until she went to cancel and said she could only give me 50% back. I demanded I wanted full money back as I had paid them and not received anything. Not my fault. After 30 mins back and forth and me literally arguing with the customer service assistant eventually I got a full refund but by this time I was fuming. Wrote an email complaining about my customer service experience and didn't get any kind of reply. I've now cancelled my account and deleted the app. Will not be using again. I understand things don't always run smoothly but it's how you deal with those issues and just eat highlighted their customer service is awful.

Title: Disgusting
Review: On the 8th of September i ordered a kfc for home delivery from your Downham store on Bromley road, my delivery was delivered by just eat the entire bottom half of the bag was soaking wet with gravy and started to drip over the floor as the bag was being passed to me. The just eat driver said that he could not take it back and had told the staff when he picked it up to wrap the bag some more to which they refused. He said to complain to just eat and get a refund. I live at the top of a three storey block of flats and was not prepared for carrying a bag with gravy dripping everywhere, the entire communal stairway is now covered in gravy as is the carpet within my property, i have also burnt my hands trying to stop more gravy from pouring all over the carpets. I will attach some photos of how my food was delivered and i am sure you will agree that it is just an absolute disaster. To make matters worse i complained to just eat and had to have a 15-20 minute message conversation with someone who would only refund 20 of the £25 i have spent on the food and then i would have to completely reorder. I can’t believe how bad the entire service was and i even had missing items from my original order. Disgusting customer service!

Title: Avoid if you want food delivered
Review: Avoid if you want food delivered. Food never turned up, restaurant even called us to say they cannot locate the driver and the food was getting cold. Spoke to JustEat Customer service, who deceitfully tried to claim that the restaurant was closed and it was our fault for booking food with a closed restaurant, despite the restaurant calling us to say the driver hadn't arrived?! Recommend using any of the other delivery services - much less of a headache, and you get food at the end of it.

Title: Reliable service
Review: I think the average reviews is just a consequence of no-one bothering to come here to review the simple act of delivering food. I've ordered JustEat about 50 times and had no issues so far

Title: Do yourself a favour and order from a…
Review: Do yourself a favour and order from a more reputable company. Just eat fail to take any responsibility for the poor service they provide. 2 weeks of attempting to get a refund for an order over 90 mins late and stone cold on arrival, and still no closer.

Title: Only got 1 star as lowest could go
Review: Only got 1 star as lowest could go. Their system pulled through old details on the app hence I got no food. Tried dealing with the restaurant directly and service was appalling.  Contacted Just Eat and the only good thing was the rep I spoke to. They didn't acknowledge the system fault, backed the restaurant.  No food or refund  as a result I say DO NOT USE.

Title: Didnt receive order
Review: Didnt receive order. Contacted justeat no refund. App shows delivered. I have cctv and could catch the delivery driver out if justeat would actually bother to look into this. I get theres a lot of people who try get a free meal but I can't believe ive lost £22 and even with cctv footage and other proof that its possible to have a company take your money. I know its only 22. I'll call mcdonalds leisure park themselves tomorrow as I went straight to justeat who's investigations team have refused to refund me and its been 48+ hours. Bit embarrassed I have to speak to a mcdonalds about this now. Just think twice about using themUpdateSpoke to mcdonalds today who have said they just make the food and justeat put on the drivers so sent back to them again. I can't believe this can happen and I know people just probably take what I'm saying with a pinch of salt but I didnt receive the delivery

Title: Worst customer service ever experienced
Review: I tried to order 2 orders in the last two days form different restaurants. Both times the order was marked delivered at road 15 minutes away from my house. Each time the driver rang to say they were outside when I said they weren’t they said they would have a look and then hang up, then I get a notification saying delivered! The address they mark as delivered is clearly different to what I put on the order. I put it down to my house being new and their systems not picking up my postcode (although no other delivery company have a problem) I contacted the online help was and told my case will be investigated then I got any email today to say they won’t refund me. I rang and was told the same thing over and over not actually listening to what I say but just saying the same line that refunded there’s nothing they can do! I will be taking this further and I will never use just eat again.

Title: It must be due to COVID that orders…
Review: It must be due to COVID that orders placed through just eat are being stolen by the hungry drivers. We placed an order today about an hour ago and like the reviews below the order was marked as delivered yet we’d not received our food, we also did not receive a phone call. We spoke with just eat who said they would refund us and investigate. Why doesn’t just eat add a tracker like Uber? So in the end we placed an ordered through UberEats and we tracked and received it in the estimated time and delivery was 50p cheaper than just eat. My advice - JustEat? JustDont!

Title: Last 2 orders didn't come and for one…
Review: Last 2 orders didn't come and for one of them they are not in a rush to refund us. Pathetic!

Title: Avoid at all costs
Review: Currently having a nightmare with an order I have placed. Food ordered for delivery at 12.30 today. Received notification that it would be 20 minutes late. 25 minutes after the changed time and we still had no food. Called the restaurant and was told the driver had turned up early and the food was not ready. The driver then left the restaurant and did not return. Advised by the restaurant to call Just eat directly. On hold to Just Eat for half an hour who can give no explaination as to why the driver did this. They have put a request in for another driver to collect and deliver the food. Food that has been sat in the restaurant waiting for an hour and a half. Still waiting for delivery. Very poor show. We are nurses on a tight lunch break and probably won't have time to eat the food, even if it arrives!!! Very poor show and will not be using again. Deleting the app when the food arrives.

Title: Pray you receive your order
Review: Ordered a KFC through justeat and it never turned up. Followed the driver and watched them go the opposite way to a nearby business park which they then turned their phone off. (Probably to eat my order) got in touch with online customer services told it needed to go to investigation team and will take 48 hours to come back with resolution. In the meantime I then went to KFC and my order was nearly £10 cheaper then justeat as they are not passing over the 5%vat reduction. After pestering them 3 times and posting on their fb page still nothing. The only way to get your money back is to go through your bank. I urge everyone to do this and not let them get away with keeping your money.

Title: Order never arrived
Review: Order never arrived, no refund.Customer service took ages to email and then didn't offer any support. Terrible, avoid.

Title: RIP OFF
Review: RIP OFF. They inflate the cost of all the items on the menus, plus they charge you for delivery. Go to your local takeaway and get your own menu and their telephone number, it will save you A LOT of £££.

Title: My food didn't arrive and they won't refund me.
Review: My food didn't arrive, I couldn't contact the driver as it just went through to a just eat voice mail. It said my order has been delivered when I think the driver ate it or gave it to the wrong place. Instantly I went to their customer service... A chat bot. After it not understanding anything I said, I got through to a human - after being number 72 in line for the chat. They give copy and pasted responses and told me it would be investigated; if they could see my activity on the app, they could see I ordered more food due to that not arriving and that I contacted the driver after it was 'delivered' One week later, after a lot of chasing, I get told I'd have my account credited for the cost of the food. They said they couldn't refund me because it was over two days... Well yes, because you made me wait a week! Unacceptable, I was told I'd receive a full refund initially, why should I pay for a service they didn't provide? I then get told this is being investigated again. I also demanded to speak with a manager and the staff kept ignoring me or leaving the chat. I finally get a manager to agree to talk to me but they don't. I get an email and a line that they couldn't reach me (I was sat with my phone all day). It's been over a week and it's still not sorted. I just want my refund so I can never use this awful service again. You can't just steal money from your customers without providing the advertised service. I did also request all of my data on this case as per data protection laws but, once again, they didn't deliver. I think I'm going to have to get my solicitor involved out of principle as this is just not fair.

Title: Absolutely shocking service!
Review: Absolutely shocking service!! Do not use this company, half my food was missing from my KFC order, food was cold! had to go out to get more food as not enough!! Took over 2 hours to get through to someone, who said I would get a refund, but lied as no refund, spoke to them again today was told they cannot give me a refund as not their policy! Even after first person I spoke to said they would What kind of company is this!! Absolutely appalling, please save yourself the stress and money and use someone else

Title: Awful service
Review: Awful service! Will never use Just-Eats again, giving restaurants a bad reputation.

Title: Your food might never arrive and you won’t receive a refund!
Review: Pretty sure there is some kind of scam going on with Just Eat drivers right now. They seem to be picking up the order, driving near your house in order to prove correct GPS, likely eating the food, marking the order as delivered and then leaving. There is no way to report this on the site as you’re put through to a chat bot with no automated system of receiving a refund. Please avoid Just Eat and use another delivery service. Deliveroo have extremely efficient customer service which is all done in-app.

Title: Shocking service
Review: Shocking service, the worst service anyone could offer. The just eat drivers never turn up, so only option is to order from places with their own drivers. The telephone support isnt in the UK and are very hard to understand and in my many calls to just eat ive found they dont have a clue what they are talking about either and will just cancel the order and send a refund, even after waiting hours. They wont help if the order is wrong that your receive, if the driver was near your house at any point they treat it as a good delivery, which is rarely is if its involving their drivers. They put their own phone number on instead of the restaurant so you cant even speak to the place you order from in most cases. The drivers are the worst ive ever experienced in any delivery service, making out they are collecting your food when they are nowhere near and likely wont even both to pick it up no matter how long you wait. I dont believe a word of the 5star review below, theres no way anyone has ever had a good service from just eat, i just wont accept that, id guess the review was left by one of their employees. Maybe time to stop spending so much money on advertising for new customers and actually look after the ones you already have/had. Uber eats is a million times better and is reliable, ive never had a failed deliver from uber eats and sorting out missing items is simple to do in the uber app. I really dont understand how they are still in operation when the service is just so poor. I really hope they go out of business soon as they have made me on another level of angry on so many occasions that even hearing the stupid adverts (and lets be honest "did somebody say just eat" is a really stupid slogan and makes absolutely no sense) makes me angry. This was your last chance at getting it right, I wont be back, just a shame the local takeaways have to suffer because of just eats incompetence .

Title: Compared to Ubereats! 5⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Review: Compared to Ubereats.co.uk, just eat customer support for partners is miles ahead, they have an optional chat customer support as well as a dedicated telephone support service, there was a delay in getting through to speak to an agent, due to covid this is and was understandable, agent was fully attentive and sympathetic, had my issue resolved within a few minutes! Well done Jacinta at Customer Support,  5 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Title: Robbers hidden charges everywhere eg…
Review: Won't offer deals restaurant offers eg kfcAdd on charges no bother my local Chinese 750 yards away free delivery £4 if u use the robbing b@#tards that is Just Puke sorryEat

Title: No food, no refund
Review: Ordered food. guy buzzed my intercom. mumbled something and then left. no food. contacted them for a refund. they have refused. they said "we tracked it to your home by GPS". well yes I did tell them he was here and then left and didn't leave the food so that proves nothing.  disgraceful.

Title: What a useless company!
Review: Again missed items. Restaurant told me they were far too busy too sort it and it was pretty much tough as they have no drivers as it has to be Just Eat drivers, although last week they did sort their error by sending out a driver.Rep was just rude and needs to have customer service training, especially if they are answering the phones!Just Eat put me in a loop. Called back and told that the "specialist" dept had to deal with it! One person's meal ruined by missing items and another's because they have to be in a LONG call to sort it!Poor performance from both McDonalds and Just Eat. One simple mistake over a single drink can ruin a whole experience.Spend less money on Snoop Dogg and more on customer service!

Title: Literally the worst customer service ever
Review: On July 29th we ordered food that was not delivered. We were told "Investigations" would be in touch within 24 hours. Chased it up two days later told another 24 hours. Another two days later, told another 24 hours. Requested a manager at this point, told they would ring within 24 hours. One week later we chased it up again and asked for another manager call back, told to wait 24 hours. Each time told it was marked as urgent for investigations. Put formal complaint in writing, no reply. Over the next few weeks, continued to chase, three more failed manager callbacks. Today, after 9+ hours of collective contact time as supervisor played messenger between us and a manager who we waited an hour to speak to, an they never came to the phone. Offered us £5 credit which we refused. After much argument, the supervisor who "couldn't issue refunds" Offered to process our refund of £17.85 and further offered £5 credit which we refused. Account closed, life's too short.

Title: Absolute trash delivery service
Review: Absolute trash company. Waited for an hour and a half for my food, no arrival so I called customer service only to be told a driver hadn’t  been assigned yet. They have now assigned a driver and I have to wait another half hour. Trash delivery service, stick with Ubereats or deliveroo or just cook your own food, all of which will be way faster than Justtrash

Title: I never received my order
Review: I never received my order, but it was marked as delivered. I called to complain and find out what has happened to my food and what they are going to do about it. This was on Saturday, its now Wednesday the next week and I still haven't heard anything back from them. I have called everyday to find out what they are going to do about taking my money and not delivering my food and all they say is they will look into it and it will take 24 - 48 hours, they've had 5 days and still can't tell me anything other than it will take 24-48?!?!? Worst customer experience you can get, if it's going to take you a week then say, also how hard can it be to find out why my food wasn't delivered?? I re-ordered of DELIVEROO and they delivered it quicker and cheaper without any problems.

Title: TERRIBLE SERVICE
Review: I tried to place an order. The order did not go through but just eat took my money anyway and now saying I have to wait up to 10 days to get my money back. Bad customer service too as they don't even want to try and help

Title: DO NOT USE JUST EAT!
Review: I ordered £22 of food on the 31st Aug 2020 through Just Eat. The food did not arrive but I received confirmation that my food was delivered! I spoke to the Just Eat and the Restaurant several times and no one could help me as they use a third party delivery company! I am disgusted by this and urge no one to use Just Eat! I have been messed around whilst out of pocket and have no way of getting a refund!!!

Title: Dont bother using just eat. Terrible service.
Review: My son is waiting on a refund for 2 orders we made. The first order gave me food poisoning & the second my son ordered a double vegetarian burger but received a double burger with one veggie burger & one meat burger. Both restaurants were happy to give him a refund but he was told he had to through just eat as the payment was through just eat not the restaurant. He was told to send an email which he did but still no reply.Has contacted just eat since a few times. Still no refund these orders were over a month ago. Customer service is useless & on one occasion the person was quite rude. Crap company.

Title: Fobbed off
Review: Ordered food which was then delivered to wrong address . I called JUSTEAT to get a refund & they said they would call me back within 24hrs as their investigation team would look into this. No one called me back and I have rang numerous times and they just say still investigation, 2 weeks passed now and still no refund despite the restaurant manager admitting in writing their driver sent the food to the wrong address. Come on JUSTEAT - sort it out and stop giving me excuses

Title: So ordered food on 16/08/20
Review: So ordered food on 16/08/20, money was taken from my account, 5 mins later order cancelled told refund within 5-10 working days. Made a phone call yesterday and today, to be told the refund is been processed (no explanation why it’s taken so long). Not only that but then they say check with your bank, basically giving me the runaround. I will never use them again, if I’m having so much hassle, I wonder how many others have been robbed by this unscrupulous company. And secondly any company that outsources their call centres abroad to give their customers the most awful experience do not deserve any customers.

Title: Nasty terms and conditions, steals funds.
Review: Just-Eat have recovered money from the takeway (for non-delivery) but REFUSE to refund.  After an hour I managed to get them to say that they will give me a "credit" instead... but they DO NOT REFUNDI asked what would happen if they credit my account with a positive balance, and then I close the account.  Would they THEN refund me the balance?Their answer... NO, WE KEEP IT.  ITS IN THE T&CsSo, I told them to keep the money... and lose all the commission on a family who spend 300 a month on takeaway through JE.How idiotic are these folks?This company accepts NO liability, gives you NO protection - but will cheerfully keep your money any way it can.I told the takeaway, showed them the chat-log, and they were so upset at how JE is handling their customers that they gave me cash straight out of the till to make the matter right.For now on I'll be deleting my account and dealing with the takeaways direct.  It's cheaper for me, and more profitable for them.JE's T&Cs are unconscionable... so bye bye o/

Title: Food not delivered and got refund from bank
Review: We ordered via JustEat and our food was not delivered though JustEat marked it as delivered. When we requested a refund they said we'd hear within 48 hours and though we chased we never heard back. We neither had our food or a refund as JustEat refused to refund us. Fortunately we made contact with the fraud team at our bank who got the money back for us. Would recommend contacting your bank if this also happens to you as it seems JustEat are not keen to refund for food not delivered. Wouldn't use again.

Title: Service... What service?
Review: Absolutely terrible service, only gave 1 star because I had to to get to comments section. Ordered from McDonald's, the tracking said driver was behind our house so went looking for him but no sign of him. Got 2 calls from Blackburn and 1 from Paris which apparently was the driver trying to contact us, we live to the west of Birmingham, driver returned order to restaurant . Contacted just eat who eventually agreed to refund half of what we had paid. Ordered kentucky via uber and food arrived within 10 minutes. In short just eat are completely rubbish!!

Title: Disappointing customer service
Review: Got sent a voucher which I copied and pasted into the box. Due to expire tonight at 23.00. Voucher said it had expired so went onto chat where the advisor told me that the code was a match and that I should double check it? If it’s a match then it doesn’t make sense to double check, especially as it was copied and pasted into the box!

Title: 1 star is too much..
Review: 1 star is too much... I ordered food it never came. The restaurant called just eat and asked them to fully refund and just eat decided that £20 (£18 short of what I paid) was acceptable and onto my just war account. I did not want nor agree to this and now completely out of pocket!

Title: Just eat did not deliver food and are trying to keep my money
Review: Food paid for online but did not turn up.  Just eat refused refund because apparently driver couldn't complete delivery which is probably because he never came anywhere near my house and didn't try to call me.  Just eat said food was returned to restaurant, restaurant said it was not and that this was the third time this weekend that just eat drivers have taken food and not delivered, he said deliveroo is much more trustworthy.Don't think just eat live chat will help, you end up in endless cycle of chat bots and eventually case got referred for investigation. The result of investigation was a one line email saying food was not late. I will get my refund!

Title: I wouldn't even bother.
Review: Ordered our food from subway an hour and 20 mins ago. It's been sitting there for an hour awaiting driver. I called the restaurant who told me to call just eat. Live chat is rubbish. Tells you you're 55 in the queue. Waited 15 mins waiting to speak to someone on the phone, no answer. Now I'm on the phone trying to cancel the order and it's already been 9 minutes with no answer. Don't offer a service if you can't deliver it!

Title: Orders from McDonald’s for me and my…
Review: Orders from McDonald’s for me and my son order came without a problem sat down to eat opened my Big Mac to find no actually burgers in it. Contacted just eat straight away who assured a refund waited 2 weeks and no refund. Contacted them for them to tell me it was put on my account as credit. Went to order again on another day what a surprise no credit so I contacted them again to be told it was too late for a review. What a joke just eat are I’ve now deleted the app and will never use agai

Title: Food not delivered.passed around via…
Review: Food not delivered.passed around via calls to no one that could sort out issue as working from home.pointless to have the phone line open if this is the case.So after returning from camping last week we decided to order the kids kfc on just eat.£23 of food just eat claimed would be delivered within 20mins.30 mins later the Delivery driver called to say he was lost.there are 16 houses on my road he said he was outside 16 I live at 14?....I directed driver to my address after looking out the door to see if he was there.no one there-shock! So I called him back and he claimed to be looking for my road.by this time the kids are nearly ready for bed as it was getting late.i had ordered Chinese for me and the mrs and had to go collect it.on my way to collect my food from another shop the driver was definitely sat at the top of the road next to mine.i pulled up next to him and asked if he was from just eat/kfc...his response was laughable..he said er er no not today I don’t work for them today🤣✊🏽💦I just drove away!When I returned within 10mins with my food from another shop the kfc had still not been delivered so I called said driver back and guess what.could not connect my call.and yes driver had marked the food delivered on just eat.so we have a pissed off dad.a lying delivery driver.hungry kids and pissed off mrs.I proceeded to try contact just eat who suggested primarily I contact the kfc myself.you try calling a drive thru franchise and see if you get an answer.no.so I’m back in the tormenting loop of automated calls and  webchat with just eat who were less than totally useless but informed me that investigation team would contact me within 48hrs.so 48hrs passed if emailed just eat again and still no contact from just eat so I called back again to be told the same.i told them this wasn’t good enough and I wanted the issue raised with a manager to which I was told this had been done and a manager would contact me within 24hrs.yes I’m still waiting today for any kind of contact from just eat.tomorrow will be 7 days.Absolutely disgusting customer service and pretty much daylight robbery.charge me for ordering food and then not deliver or investigate to where my order is.Avoid just eat at all costs if you are wanting to eat.if they don’t deliver you won’t get your money back.Use Deliveroo or Uber eats do not use just eat!

Title: The worst experience!
Review: Judging by the comments already posted on here, Just Eat does not take customer service very seriously. On Friday evening I made a McDonalds order via Just Eat - I can see in the app that the food was collected and scheduled to be delivered about 10 minutes later. Twice from that moment, even though the driver collected, the app said the driver may have lost signal "don't worry he is on the way". 35 minutes later the food arrives, completely cold! driver apologises and said he was "waiting for Just Eat to resend the address". What?!!! I tried to send it back because we would be able to eat it (the kids were very hungry by this point) but the driver wouldnt take, so the food is in the bin. I am not naive, I get that these things happen, however after numerous situations like this I just want to leave Just Eat. 3 times I have been on a call since Friday to resolve, and nobody has been able to give me my refund. I have been offered an account credit, which is not helpful seeing as I want to leave Just Eat. Awful experience!

Title: Appalling
Review: Told us the driver was at the restaurant waiting for order, an hour and half late than it should of been delivered it was cancelled as they could not deliver it, lies about a driver being there when they did not have one.  Tried to speak to customer services, got a bot ,which was as much use as a chocolate fireguard and then asked to speak to human, was in position 80 and finally someone typed back and said they needed to put me onto another department and put me back in the queue again at position 80 !!! Will not be using these cowboys again.

Title: Basically this company is a joke
Review: Basically this company is a joke. Took 2 hours to get a sandwich delivered. Told me it would be 30-45 mins, then delayed, then delayed again. NOT to be trusted

Title: Avoid!
Review: My order was never delivered!

Title: Local Chinese order 27% mark up.
Review: Local Chinese order, £33.20, looked online, found same Chinese, ordered direct for £26.10. Just eat £7.10 more expensive, that’s a mark up of 27%. Ridiculous

Title: Stolen Order
Review: Ordered a Subway from the Irvine store. Checked the app about 15 minutes later to tell me it's already been delivered (Definitely had not been). So I phoned Subway directly and they said I'd need to contact Just Eat which I did. They then said that it will take 48 hours to investigate however they cannot re deliver the food ( Even though it wasn't delivered in the 1st place). Some fat driver probably sat in his car munching down in his 10th stolen sub of the day. Usually have no issues with Just Eat at all.

Title: The last time I’ll ever use JustEat
Review: The last time I’ll ever use JustEat! Ordered a delivery last night at 6.20pm spending £38.80. I get a text 6.49pm saying delivery is on its way. At 7.10pm still no sign of delivery so I try to call the restaurant = no answer. I then tap the “ask for an update” button on justeat website which says the restaurant will contact me within 5 minutes via text with an update....I didn’t get a text. I try calling the restaurant many times no answer so I start to use the live chat via Justeat at 7.25pm. The live chat agent “Ivan” tells me that the order is marked as completed when clearly it didn’t arrive. He refused a refund and advised he will escalate it for a resolution within 72 hours. He said I would get an email with a reference number and a copy of the live chat...I’m still waiting! I asked him to call the restaurant for me, he said he couldn’t call them. So basically £38.80 out of pocket, no food and kids who are hungry and upset. And get this, at 8.40pm I receive a call from a mobile number from the delivery driver saying he can deliver me our food!!!! So not only did justeat tell me it’s completed on the system and didn’t bother trying to contact the restaurant for me because they wouldn’t answer to me. The driver then confirms nearly two hours later that they didn’t even deliver and could deliver now!!! I demanded a refund with them but again got told to deal with justeat.Still waiting for Justeat to contact me. So disappointed as I used to use justeat all the time but clearly there is something really wrong with the company now.

Title: They're stealing
Review: Ordered food, waited 40 minutes, tried to get a refund but they refused saying it says delivered while for me it says on its way and driver's signal lost.Talked to two different people on customer service, no answers whatsoever, just empty apologies. No money, no food.Won't ever try again.

Title: Used just eat to order A KFC
Review: Used just eat to order A KFC, driver marked it as delivered even though I’m still waiting, had no phone call about my order, spoke to kfc and they’ve asked me to ring just eat, I’m still on hold after an hour, the first woman I spoke to didn’t help one bit as the line who deals with orders isn’t available, all I want to know if where the food is, avoid

Title: Ordered a KFC - NO FOOD NO REFUND
Review: Ordered a KFC at 1945. Still waiting for food at 2145.... tracked order delivery and it says the order was delivered - NOT THE CASE! Called Just Eat and have been on hold for 30minutes, advisor palmed me off to the “specialist team”.... After 30 minutes an advisor finally told us that it would need to go to investigation team as it has been marked as delivered and we would get a call in 48 hours with resolution. So - NO FOOD AND NO REFUND.NIGHTMARE.WILL NOT BE USING JUST EAT AGAIN.

Title: Picking up my order myself!
Review: I ordered from McDonalds the driver was over 30 minutes late and then delivered the wrong order. I had to go McDonald’s myself to correct the order. I tried to complain to just eat who passed me from chat to chat and after 30 mins on hold I lost the will. Avoid just eat as their service has rapidly gone down hill

Title: The non existent delivery
Review: The app marked my food as delivered though the driver had clearly brought it to the wrong address as the food was nowhere in sight. It should have only taken a short while as the restaurant was only half a mile away. 1 hour and 20 minutes after placing the order and it having been ‘delivered’ I called the restaurant who had the bare cheek to say the driver had tried calling me a few times as he couldn’t find the address (complete lies). Long story short I’m  waiting for a full refund but that was only after having been sent round the houses on the app to speak to an adviser.If you live anywhere that’s even slightly awkward address wise do NOT use this app as you are guaranteed to have issues with drivers finding your address.

Title: wait half an hour for an order to be…
Review: wait half an hour for an order to be cancelled for no reason . poor service. will not use again !

Title: Absolutely disgusted with Just Eat
Review: Absolutely disgusted with Just Eat. I ordered a KFC at the end of last week, for around £25. Not long after the order was made, I get a notification that the order was on its way. I tracked the delivery person via the app to make sure it went to the right place. As the tracker approached a nearby street near my house, I kept looking outside my window but saw no car or bike. Suddenly, I get a notification that the order has been delivered!! Surprised, I'm now outside my house trying to see if the driver has gone to one of my neighbours, but still saw nothing. So I got onto customer service only to get told the delivery has been made and there is nothing they can do! They said they'd get back to me within 72 hours. Angry and frustrated, I hung up my phone, I looked out of my window to see a woman and a young girl I don't recognise, holding a KFC bag and a bottle of drink coming towards my house!! Sure enough, the woman knocks on my door and hands me my order. She tells me she lives in the next street over. It was nice of the woman to walk on over to me with my order (though I am not altogether sure why she accepted it), however, the order was cold AND the seal was partially ripped. So, not only can the driver not read the address, not only is customer service utterly dismal, but in a time of the pandemic, when you want your food touched by as few people as possible (with respect to the woman), my order has now been passed through at least two hands before it has reached me, and cold! Didn't eat much of the order at all! An evening ruined!I am still waiting to hear back from customer services by the way! The 72 hours has come and gone!This is utterly disgusting!

Title: Ordered KFC and never arrived!
Review: Ordered a KFC delivery and paid £24.49 and my order didn't arrive!I contacted support, which I waited ages on the line for. Person I spoke to had a terrible accent, most likely not from the UK. They told me the order was delivered, likely to the wrong house and that they couldn't do anything about it. No replacement was sent out or refund made!Told me they would investigate this, but I never heard back from anyone ever again.Absolutely terrible service. Complete Scammers!I have no money or food that night. Do NOT use Just Eat!

Title: THIEVES
Review: THIEVES !  Take your money, don't deliver, ignore calls and emails.  They constantly use the "currently being investigated" spiel !  They should be closed down, I have reported to trading standards and have left bad reviews on their website !  I will pursue them, the money has long gone and now it's principal !  AVOID AVOID AVOID

Title: Missing entire meal... joke
Review: Pre-ordered breakfast for me and my partner, turned up on time but was missing his whole order, rang just eat to see were it was and we got a £5 refund and had to re order meal and pay an extra £3.50 ....such a joke, took an hour for his food to arrive.

Title: Just Eat Macdonald's Disappointment
Review: I ordered a Macdonald's big Mac meal. It turned up stone cold.

Title: awful
Review: awful, delivery from 3 miles away, in birmingham CC took over and hour, tried to call just eat see whats going on, nothing, re routes you to nothing, cant speak to no one, not mcdonalds fault there liturally fast food, just eat, slow as fk, assigned driver, means we think someone may bring it, but were really not bothered

Title: Lied about a refund!!
Review: My order got cancelled. Spoke to just eat, they said it’s been refunded on the system and to speak to my bank. Spoke to my bank and the bank told me they are committing fraud! No proof of any refund!! Disgusting service! Need shutting down!!!!

Title: Ordered food never got it or my money…
Review: Ordered food never got it or my money back after a month of them talk rubbish about investigation they like to steal !

Title: Didn’t deliver food
Review: Didn’t deliver food! Lied that they had! Contacted them to be told it would be sent to an investigation team and I’d hear back in 48hrs 6 days later still no reply! Emailed again and still no reply! These people take your money and refuse to refund you !

Title: Had a very bad meal (burnt not edible)…
Review: Had a very bad meal (burnt not edible) from El Murrino in Bournemouth and gave a bad review. The review never showed up on the site or was quickly removed!!!So not a lot of belief in Just Eat and their reviews.

Title: Justeat are an absolutely appalling…
Review: Justeat are an absolutely appalling company who simply should not be allowed to trade. Used for the first time yesterday. The food turned up cold and an hour and 15 minutes late (it took 2 hours altogether after multiple calls to the restaurant). We even had a third eaten garlic pizza bread sent to us. Justeat just can't be contacted and have 'refunded' us one third of the amount we paid. This is after contacting them three times. However, it is not really a refund as it has been added to my account so I have to use them again, which I won't. Their actions are utterly appalling!!!

Title: Offensive Tv Ad and hiked up prices.
Review: Offensive Tv Ad and hiked up prices.Is it just me or is there anyone else out there who thinks that the latest tv ad, featuring Snoop Dog, for Just Eat is offensive? I feel that the advert itself is disproportionately incorrect and aimed only to attract custom from one small part of our society, and we are not included, also, I find the ad cheap and chavvy.  We have used Just Eat in the past for our favourite local Thai restaurant but on our last order the bill had gone up massively, I’m not sure why but I suspect that someone will have to pay for Snoop Dog, so not only does the advert appeal to a small part of our society and I must add that all our previous delivery drivers look nothing like the one featured in the ad, not only am I offended but feel like I’m being ripped off as well, so on that note Just Eat we will be taking our custom elsewhere.

Title: The worst of the worst
Review: Having ordered KFC from Just eat I was assured that the delivery would be here at 12:15, at 13:00 I contacted KFC local to be told that the driver hadn’t arrived and to contact Just Eat,.After dealing with their bot I was no further forward so I phoned their customer service and held for so long that I gave up! So no food, no refund and no apology, people be aware that their service is the worst of the worst

Title: Don’t order from KFC Walworth rd
Review: Don’t order from KFC Walworth rd. 2 hrs waiting for order then on just eat app it said it had been delivered.Very poor service

Title: McDonald's Old Kent Road SE16
Review: McDonald's Old Kent Road SE16, I left a review and they doctored it and removed my written complaint so I came here to give you the real story.At 16.00 I ordered 2 meals with vanilla milkshake and a double cheese burger and fries, delivery was 16.20 as I googled the distance under 1 mile, 4 minutes by car/bike, over 1 hour late no update and you cant cancel. The meals were freezing cold I tried to take the burgers out of the buns to warm them mess everywhere with sauce the fries were ruined I ate about half a dozen, funny enough the milkshakes were warm, lol warmer than the food tasted horrible so binned the bloody lot of them.I like to give positive reviews but there is no way I can with this order. I said Just eat have bitten of more than they can chew they haven't got enough delivery staff to cover the new contracts.I will use Uber eats next time at least previous food arrived early and hot. I have used Just eat dozens of times without any problems the food arrived early and hot and I gave excellent reviews but not this time.Thanks

Title: My husband and I wanted a treat during…
Review: My husband and I wanted a treat during lockdown and were able to order via their website very simple and food came - not the best standard of food but not their fault as it all comes out of different restaurants

Title: This is ridiculous not the first time…
Review: This is ridiculous not the first time we have been mugged off by them we got told the restaurant doesn’t deliver when it does they took our money when there was knowone to deliver our food

Title: Absolute nightmare
Review: Absolute nightmare1hour and 50 minutes in live chat help button.I got absolute no where,I had two simple complaints ,and got cut off 5 times and had to repeat all over again. My complaint was not resolved, so I said I will delete my account, and guess what ,they were happy to help me with that.Jokers

Title: JUst eat are just a load of thieves…
Review: JUst eat are just a load of thieves taking full payment for orders that are then not delivered. Then on complaint they refuse to refund the cash and instead insist on giving a credit refund to you account thereby ensuring that you have to go back to them with more business to get what you are legally entitled to A REFUND

Title: Watching just eat adverts on the telly…
Review: Watching just eat adverts on the telly and it now makes perfect sense where all of the money they STEAL off people go towards paying snoop dog to appear in their blinged up ad's.Shame on you just eat. The authorities need to be called in and large scale criminal investigations need to be carried out for fraud!!!!!!!!

Title: I placed order 2hours ago got…
Review: I placed order 2hours ago got notification that it was here went out side NO FOOD  didn’t even knock saw driver going past contacted just eat told me it had been delivered but wasn’t them said it will need to be investigated  I won’t hold my breath bearing in mind nearly £20  down and nothing to feed the kids every body is struggling at this this time but this is not right

Title: Just Eat an absolute cow boy of a company
Review: Please refrain from using The Just Eat service.I placed an order on the 16th of august which cost just over £22 and after waiting for 2 hours I was told that the the order was delivered. The order never arrived at my door step I have cctv around my house and a ring door bell I am very certain if someone had rang the bell I would have known. I checked all footage for that day and can confirm there was no sign of the driver or the food. I later that day used Uber eats who were able to deliver the same order in a timely manner.I reported this to an agent who I spoke to via the just eat chat function and they informed me that the investigation team will need to review this and revert back to me in 48 hours. 2 weeks have now gone by and I have still not received a refund or an update email from the  just eat investigations team or a manager which is very poor service. I have chased them consecutively across the 2 weeks with no avail. I have just been told that all the agents can do is pass this on to our investigations team who are still awaiting feedback from the restaurant. This is absurd since how can it take 2 weeks to communicate with a fully operational restaurant? I should not have to chase to get an update since I am the victim of fraud here, who has been charged for a product he never received.I would strongly recommend to avoid using Just Eat and find an alternative service provider.

Title: Very happy.
Review: Used for the first time today, very easy & quick to use with multiple payment options. Happy to use again.

Title: Shocking service
Review: Shocking service The good reviews are definitely bogus Was charged £22 for something that would normal cost just over £14 I’m flabbergasted by how they get away with it

Title: DO NOT USE JUST EAT!!
Review: DO NOT USE JUST EAT!!! We ordered from our local takeaway using Just Eat, not only did the food not turn up after saying it was delivered. But Just Eat are now refusing to refund us. Awful service and the restaurant have said there’s nothing they can do as the food was collected, so the problem is with Just Eat. It’s a shame that that I can’t rate this service as a 0. Why aren’t these companies being held accountable for stealing customers money!

Title: This is full of s**t system !
Review: This is full of s**t system !! No food no refund.. they are saying that is delivered but not to where .. Avoid them!!!!!

Title: Just eat stole my food
Review: For the love...Ok ordered food an hour and 15 minutes ago. Food never showed up, called the restaurant and it left ages ago. The restaurant cant do anything, we need to contact Justeat. Just eat states to go online and to sort the issue where you are palmed off onto a useless bot who periodically says "I'm transferring you to a different team".I'm hungry. Angry. Hangry. Absolutely hangry. Justeat stole my food.

Title: Do not use this place!!!!...had a nice…
Review: Do not use this place!!!!...had a nice relaxing evening with the girlfriend planned so had a night off cooking and ordered a kfc . 3 hours later no delivery !!!...app saying it had been delivered!!..went on site to complain and just got ignored which obviously made me really angry. Finally got a call from someone who couldn’t speak English who said I have to wait 48 hrs for a refund whilst it goes through investigations. 5 times I had to ask her to repeat what she was saying cos couldn’t understand her!!!...ruined the evening and never using again . Fingers crossed for refund but not much hope I don’t think ...you have been warned!!!.....update...after a week of trying and constant pestering I finally got my refund...account deleted...!

Title: Funny how you can’t leave a review on…
Review: Funny how you can’t leave a review on there page, gives you an option to cancel and that is all. This company is so poor it’s frustrating, never had an order turn up complete yet and then they try and say it’s your fault. Just eat just delete!!

Title: Good platform for collecting or ordering food locally
Review: I never had bad experience compared to the other people, generally is good but mainly is good for london

Title: The worst customer service I never got
Review: The worst customer service I never gotBought a thermal bag from them didn't receive it till now for 3weeks ,I emailed  them for sort it out,but never get answer , If that about a bag ,I think if you get injured delivering with them no body will hear about you definitely don't recommend them

Title: the worst ever customer service i ever…
Review: the worst ever customer service i ever had to deal with they just lie to me twice and then they told me they have spoke to driver and the food is gone be der soon and after 2 hour waiting and 3 phone call to make and after they lie to me they cancel the order

Title: Took my money
Review: Took my money, didn’t even bother to pick the food up from the takeaway. Will never use again, avoid at all costs.

Title: Rude and disgusting driver
Review: I was just picking up some food from KFC in Quedgeley (Gloucester) and there was a Just Eat driver also waiting to collect an order. He was rude to the KFC staff and then while waiting, turned and spat on the floor of the restaurant. This is disgusting behaviour anyway but absolutely abhorrent during a pandemic when hygiene could be the difference between life and death for some. I made a point of looking at it and he spotted me and just stared back at me defiantly, wasn’t even apologetic about it. Absolutely vile behaviour.

Title: The food is fine but the driver just…
Review: The food is fine but the driver just tried to bash my door down and was so rude when I explained to him how it worked, furious!

Title: Had a fake order yesterday and today .
Review: Had a fake order yesterday and today .. called the number given on receipt from the driver to speak to just eat. The lady said she couldnt do anything and advised to report authorities. What a waste of time !!!!

Title: I made an order a few weeks ago
Review: I made an order a few weeks ago. The driver drove into my block, drive out again, waited on the road and then lied saying my Order was delivered when it wasn’t. I contacted just eat immediately and they said it would be investigated and I would be contacted in 48hrs. 4 weeks later and I’ve been told the “48hr” nonsense 3 times now ! This is not acceptable and I waisted nearly £30 with them and had to reorder through Deliveroo who I’ve never had this problem with !

Title: DO NOT ORDER - SCAM
Review: DO NOT ORDER. FOOD NEVER ARRIVED. Tried to ring them and pressed the correct option.Ordered at 16.45 delivery said 18.00 (which was ridiculous in itself) got a notification to say delivery driver had left at 17.30. Got to 19.00 - 2 hours 15 after I ordered so called the restaurant and they said "the driver picked it up" and "we can't do anything" so called Just Eat and pressed the correct option but told me I was through to wrong department. At this time my app said the driver's location was lost. Very odd.They said they were transferring me. Waited 30 mins and nothing so hung up.Got through on live chat where they told me it had been delivered and that they would pass it to investigations and would be dealt with within 48 hours, in the mean time I should order another.Couldn't believe the cheek of it, they refused to refund me. I told them I would never order again I have no trust in them whatsoever and someone MUST be able to refund me.They then left the chat.Went on Twitter and on here and COUNTLESS people from one evening, from multiple different parts of the country are having the EXACT same situation.Seems very odd to me. I trusted Just Eat but I genuinely think this could be a scam that will end up on Watchdog. They pass the buck between JE and the restaurant. Very very worrying and I will NEVER use them again. I've lost my money and no order. And can't speak to anyone.

Title: Would give 0 stars if I could
Review: Would give 0 stars if I could. Customer service is appalling! Order was late, food cold and soggy. Talked to a customer service rep who repeatedly suggested we speak to the restaurant when our issue was with the drivers timing. The contract of food order is with Just Eat who should resolve and issue with their employee.No solutions offered and will not be using them again. Disgusting

Title: Just eat didn't send the driver on time…
