Review: Just eat didn't send the driver on time call the restaurant they knew food will be cold but been told it's not their fault. GDK worried about money not the GDK repetition. I was passed around just eat and GDK no one wants to help the end customer at the end been told by just I will get £20 refund and £5 credit on my account we will see if this happens. Very disappointed with GDK knowing food is cold still willing to send it out.It been 8 days still no refund will not let me talk to a manager for complaint and will not tell me which country they are calling for. Waste of space company like this should not be trading.

Title: Just Eat should be investigated
Review: Do you know that if your item(s) don't arrive Just Eat do not refund you? They tell you to take it up with the restaurant? And if an item(s) are missed you are still forced to pay delivery fees in any case.Just Eat said they would give me a credit but will not refund my money. Been on chat with them, now five times, and I still do not have any credit to my account.  I'm so angry.The restaurant says they will refund but they don't and it has been 3 days and paypal is instant.The chat person said "Leave a review of the restaurant"   Telling me what I should do!!! How F'*&*^$ dare they.I said "Do you READ the reviews???" the restaurant that didn't deliver my order has mostly negative reviews, like 90%, but Just Eat refuses to remove them. Buyer beware, and Just Eat assumes NO LIABILITY while putting this restaurant top of searches and giving it a special promotion spot. They will not refund my money even though the restaurant agreed they'd missed items and were over 30 mins late and all was cold.If it was Amazon, they'd do it right away, and investigate the seller based on so many negative reviews.I will not ever use Just Eat again. Will use Uber Eats.

Title: It's a scam
Review: It's a scam! Same as others here that the food never arrived!! Waiting for the McDonald's delivery, seeing it live time on the map, it stops outside my building and I'm expecting the driver will buzz my door but not he went to the next building! Phone the restaurant straight away and said they don't know and will phone just eat to check who's the driver. The restaurant suggested I phone just eat myself as well, the guy on the phone just reading out from the script I suspeted, said he will pass it on to the investigation team and it took 48 hours! I asked him so what about my foods? He said you have to reorder it again!!  And the money would be refunded if they found fault!According to it's victims here, the chance is slim to get my money back.I will not order with them again.

Title: Waste of time and money, what a scam
Review: Food never arrived, despite it being marked as ‘delivered’ on the app. Called customer services, they put the phone down twice as they were ‘transferring me to the correct department’. They refused to give a refund or provide the food I had paid for.

Title: Food never arrived
Review: My food order never turned up, Rang customer services to discuss getting my money back spoke to someone who said they will put it in for investigation and I will hear back in 48hours, still not heard anything 2 weeks later have rang twice since and both times been told there is nothing more they can do as it has already been forwarded to investigation team. No point of having customer service as they cannot provide any help.

Title: So bad it's dangerous..
Review: It's scary to see so many reviews saying the same thing about Just Eat. Sh#t customer service, late delivery service (by over 2hrs) and then, when it does turn up, after multiple phone calls, it's the wrong order. So, not only is my order wrong, i'm guessing someone else's is as well.Then the fun starts... Have you tried their customer service. Holy sh#t it is bad! Robotic, script reading, people that have no scope to solve a problem. Not their fault, it's the system they work in.However, the most concerning aspect of it all is their complete lack of responsibility by openly encouraging customers to keep the wrong order. And by keep, the insinuation to eat it is clearly there. They have no knowledge of a person's allergies and should in no way be advising this. Would they take responsibility if somebody are it and something happened? Given their customer service up to this point I reckon they'd put in a request for a refund...The person who's previous comment about this being the perfect business model was so accurate its worrying. Shocking, absolutely shocking. They do not care about the customer at all. App deleted. Deliveroo, i'm all yours.

Title: 5 stars for a perfect business model
Review: 5 stars for a perfect business model, brilliantly executed for zero accountability from either party vendor or courier. Don't have to worry about customer satisfaction or bother about who they employ, Failed deliveries brushed off as lies, helpline useless and company endorsed attitude to not refund a penny regardless of any circumstance out of the customers control. So hats off to Just Eat being absolutely untouchable in any regard. Whoever was the brains behind this business needs knighting preferably by Prince Andrew.

Title: Food never delivered
Review: Ordered a happy meal for my daughter, I could see on the GPS that the driver was driving away from my street and as they don’t have an option to contact the driver unlike Deliveroo, the order appeared as delivered, i could see that it had been delivered to the wrong address. Called customer service and wished I’d never bothered! Still waiting for an email from them to acknowledge my complaint. Don’t bother wasting your time or money with this company and judging by others complaint wish I hadn’t either. I’m glad it was only the price of a happy meal, I will cut my losses and never spend a penny with them again! **updated**Thought it would only be fair to add that Justeat have refunded my money and even offered me some credit towards my next meal, however I still won’t be using them again. Not having the ability to contact the driver increases the chances of something like this happening again especially when there are other companies that offer this very convenient option I’d rather spend my money elsewhere. Also I noticed that Just eat don’t send any emails confirming or acknowledging your complaint? I had called them and used their online web chat help to log my complaint and each time they said I would get an email I never did, it felt like they were not acknowledging my complaint. I ended up messaging them through my Twitter account which is where I finally got the refund sorted!

Title: My subway order never arrived and I…
Review: My subway order never arrived and I rang just eat to help me out in getting my money refunded and they told me it was my problem.Never using again. I used you for years and now you've lost a loyal customer.

Title: Tragedy
Review: Tragedy, used several times and never received complete order las one never arrived.  Trying to get your money back? Good luck! One of the worst customer services ever. Delete apo and avoid.

Title: Awful customer service
Review: They are fine when it all is going well.But...The moment something goes wrong they become the worst people to deal with.Still waiting for a refund on 12 August for a messed up delivery on 21 July. Four lots of contact, all their hopeless online people following scripts. "Contact your bank" - no, they are the ones responsible, they need to fix it. Never, ever again. App will be deleted once I get the refund.

Title: Terrible website log in issues & attrocious customer service.
Review: Tried to get refund for unsatisfactory food ordered from KFC via Just Eat but neither were helpful.  Food were  missing from delivery and was delivered cold too.  Just Eat kept saying refund was credited back to my account numerous times; despite my protests that this was not the case and basically said theres nothing more I can do and implying its now my problem.  Very bad technical issues trying to use log in and even after changing passwords more than once.  Despicable service from Just Eat.  Maybe they were good once but not anymore.  I think the service centre is not UK based but I could be wrong; judging by staff I spoke to online.  No offence, but I get better service if in UK. Had similar issues with other non UK based customer services too previously.  Customers do not come first in such situations it seems.

Title: Food cold no vat receipt which I made…
Review: Food cold no vat receipt which I made clear I needed when placing order e-chat with Adisesha for an hour didn’t get anywhere apart from wait for the investigation team. What a joke that’s the last time I use them

Title: Shocking
Review: Shocking. My food never arrived and just eat are refusing to give me a refund. I have called 6 times and been hung up on every time. Disgraceful company

Title: Just eat customers service is a joke…
Review: Just eat customers service is a joke been waiting for a refund for cold food which went in to  the Bin!!!! For ten days!!!8!!!!live chats and still no refund don't order from this site

Title: Wolverhampton - I placed an order with JustEat from KFC …
Review: I placed an order with JustEat from KFC on the Penn Road in Wolverhampton at 11/08/20 - 18:50hrs - £15.00 order.It was only 5 minutes away but I couldn't go myself so as a treat I thought - why not! :-)On ordering, I then received a text message telling me that it will arrive 19:02hr - happy days!So on JustEat's website - I watched as my delivery in "realtime" making its way to me, so I'm super excited, not least to mention of course, very hungry!As I watched, my order getting closer and closer which by now was 4 minutes away, all of a sudden the driver had turned around and went in the opposite direction - now 14 minutes away?After nearly 15 minutes I decided that he was lost, tried calling KFC - it just rang out so, I decided to cancel the order and try somewhere else.I called JustEat and explained why I had cancelled the order, they told me that I am only entitled to a refund 50% as costs had to be compensated to KFC for loss of "product".The JustEat representative then went on, talking over me, quoting "chapter and verse" of his T&C's script?! As a big fan of KFC, I was shocked to hear this - what an attitude?!!During this discussion with JustEat's cancellation team, the driver eventually arrived - 22 minutes later - 19:22 - at which I informed him it was cancelled.He shouted - "sorry mate!"And only when I then pressed my point to JustEat that I was "not at fault" and provided evidence i.e. map, txt message, etc they then went onto say that it was not JustEat's fault as they use a "third-party drivers"?!Now some of you out there may be saying ..."As the driver had eventually arrived, I COULD have taken the order ..."Sure, I could have but with me, this is all that's wrong with this country, we never complain about poor services!And as this example proves, JustEat thinks more of it's "vendors" than that of us, the customers.I DON'T REWARD POOR SERVICE!Now you may be thinking I was a tad harsh?But looking at TrustPilots reviews (which I wished I had done so beforehand rather than listen to the BS Adverts) I would have discovered the 87% negative reviews of JustEat!Needless to say and knowing what I now know, I will be steering well clear of JustEat in the future!!CC to KFC - hello (at) kfc.co.uk

Title: I placed an order with a McDonalds that took almost 3 hours to arrive
Review: I placed an order with a McDonalds that is a 10 min walk away but at 8.12pm.  It is now 10.35 pm and still no order - 30 mins of the phone complaining and the delivery time just kepps being moved.  It's 10.40pm now.  I am diabetic and need to eat regularly to keep my sugar levels correct.  This episode has literally made me ill and when I asked for comepensation I was told they woud compensate me I was told I could have a full refund only if I cancel my order!  The lady I spoke to on the phone was doing her best but to be told that the first driver just decided not to do the delivery was a complete insult. I felt I didn't matter as a customer at all. The whole exerience has been very distressing.

Title: Just eat won’t refund me when half my order was missing
Review: Ordered from somewhere that forgot half my order, phoned them, they said they’d send the missing items along. Waited 30 mins no missing items we’re delivered so I phoned the restaurant & they blocked my number! Waited so long my kebab turned rock solid & inedible is tha was £10 wasted on a small portion of kebabs meat and one pita bread.  Ridiculous. I never even got my missing items. Sent photos to just eat after ONE HOUR on the phone to them for them to email me and tell me they’re not refunding sod all. Disgusting company, disgusting customer service, 8 now see why people went to deliveroo instead.

Title: Don't bother
Review: Don't bother. Terrible customer service team who quite clearly dont care. Ordered a pathia, yet a complete different tasting dish arrives. The restaurant blamed just eat saying they have described the dish incorrectly so I need to get in touch with them. I notify just eat, they say they will get in touch with the restaurant. 15 days pass and still no response from just eat. I email them again, they now ask me for my details due to data protection laws which they did not ask me the first time round. Did they not even bother looking into the case the first time around? I pass over my details and they respond a day later saying there is nothing they can do. I check the restaurant and notice that the description on the just eat menu is still incorrect. Not only are they refusing to refund my dish they didn't even bother to get the description changed on the menu. I have been using just eat weekly for over five years, not any more. I see many other people are having problems with their lack of customer care also. I do not see how they will survive as a business if they continue at this rate.

Title: Thieves.  £40 food not delivered or refunded
Review: Ordered £40 of food for delivery last week.  Watched the order progress until it was picked up by driver.  Then the tracking showed the driver not leaving the restaurant for ages.  I got two calls from Just Eat asking if the food had arrived and I explained reach time that it was showing as on its way but not arrived.  After 40 minutes I contacted them and they told me it would not be coming at all.  Then they told me in order to get a refund an "investigations team" would review the issue and get back to me within 48 hours.  They didn't.  And 4 days later I chased just eat to be fobbed off with the "wait for investigation team" line.

Title: Received wrong order, poor customer service
Review: I received someone else’s order as the driver had swapped my order. Called customer services twice, first was in the queue then finally connected, spoken halfway to agent, then hung up on after 30 mins! Next day I call again to chase the matter, was advised that the case will be INVESTIGATED and could take 24-48 hours for a refund?!? Why so deep for just a order for FOOD?!? All I wanted is to receive my correct food order. Absolutely horrible customer service. Drivers are absolutely inconsiderate. Not checking orders. Rude. Avoid ordering from JUSTEAT.

Title: JUST EAT - NEVER AGAIN - Stay clear from !!!
Review: I've ordered from The Corner Terrace in Ealing my favorite food through Just Eat, and after 2.5 hours and numerous calls to Just Eat realised that I will not be receiving any food today. Restaurant have waited over an hour for driver to turn up, but he never arrived. I am still waiting for my refund, which should take between 3 and 7 working days (but the money was taken immidiately). This is by far the worst possible service ever!!!!

Title: Great and handy!
Review: Don’t know why they’ve got so many bad reviews.. never let us down!

Title: Only ever had good experiences with…
Review: Only ever had good experiences with just eat app

Title: Delivery time changed twice so I had to…
Review: Delivery time changed twice so I had to wait over an hour only For a delivery driver to pick up and complete the order within seconds. I had to go to the restaurant myself ( German doner kebab in Ilford) and was told that the driver Probably stole the food and that there was nothing they could do. Really bad customer experience and has put me off from using just eat again. Where’s my refund and I expect a goodwill gesture too! Not pleased.

Title: I was visiting relatives and decided to…
Review: I was visiting relatives and decided to try the PAK LOK Chinese take away in Gosforth. The man behind the counter had  skurvy dead white skin on his arms ( which were uncovered ) his hands ( no gloves ) and on his forehead which he was picking and when he wrapped our chips up he touched all 3 good of our chips which I found DISGUSTING needless to say we threw the chips in the bin. Then whilst we were waiting the Chinese lady behind the counter was trying to flirt with my son which SHOCKED me as he is ONLY 15. now the food.....BLAND BLAND BLAND rice was all sticky too.

Title: Just liars
Review: Delivery driver was reassigned then never picked up order. Customer service begged for an extra 20 minutes, promised compensation. Then next agent tried to buy more time and promised a refund in 20 minutes, which wouldn’t arrive for a week.

Title: Really poor
Review: Really poor. Had confirmed order, said delivery driver had picked up but time kept getting later and later. Then cancelled the order by email blaming the restaurant. No explanation and a hungry family waiting for food.

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service. I've been a long time customer and have had many issues and never any support. I cancelled an order immediately after placing it as it was in error and the agent said they would be deducting 50% in order to provide a refund. I got passed to 3 different agents without even being told I would. The agents stopped responding and took me an hour to get it cancelled. Appalled with the service and won't be using them again

Title: Use UberEats!
Review: Like so many other people on this site I ordered something that never showed up, but I still got charged for it. I contacted them on chat where, like others, I was referred to an investigations team where the response would be 48 hours. After 48 hours and hearing nothing I went back on chat, they apologised and said they would chase it up - but could ultimately achieve nothing. I registered a complaint, and was told I'd be contacted withing 24 hours. After another 24 hours, I still haven't heard back - I'm over trying to get it back, it's clearly some off-shore call centre that don't really know what they're doing. So I remove all my cards and try to delete my account, but you can't. You can only deactivate it from the 'My Account' page, and they say they keep some of your info on file..I went on chat to see how I could go about deleting my account, they said it would take 30 days and involve going through security. I'm not sure what security they were proposing, I'd recently changed my account name to Mandango Fandango with an address of something like; Just Eat has terrible customer service Road. So I doubt I'd have passed this 'security' Looking at the other reviews, it does seem like they've outsourced this to somewhere that is taking advantage of it to take data from JustEat users. It's also slightly worrying that they just accuse people of lying about not receiving deliveries rather than looking at their drivers. Anyway I just changed all my details and deactivated my account, UberEats is better.

Title: After using the app for 4 years I have…
Review: After using the app for 4 years I have been forced to review over here because of a recent order where it was never delivered but I was charged for it. Upon summiting a complaint the "investigations" team implied that I was scamming them, pathetic!! this is pathetic!! They should improve their procedures or someone should take them to court for this!

Title: Referral Code UNV19X If you are…
Review: Referral Code UNV19X If you are interested to register please use the code below 👇👇👇👇👇👇, Based on my experience To be realistic it depends on your area, they pay high Rates for their deliveries with or without daily Fees For Just Eat up to £100 Reward Use Referral Code UNV19XFor insurance per hour/day use Zego with this referral Code R9X1X7 to get £10 Extra after your Registration Done When you refer a friend to the Just Eat Network and they complete 15 deliveries within 90 days of their sign-up date, you will receive £100 and they’ll get £50. Start referring your friends in Barnstable, Newquay or Weymouth today.

Title: Unfortunately even though I have been…
Review: Unfortunately even though I have been using just eat for years. Getting a refund processed by them is such a waste of time. I ordered food from Burger King and didnt receive it, at first the just eat bot people said that I'd have to wait 48hrs for a call from a supervisor, when I called the just eat on the phone the agent logged that the delivery driver was infact suspicious and that I would get a full refund. I received an email that day saying theyd cancelled the order and that I was due a full refund within 5-7 days. 7days later no refund, I call them to again the agent tells me the refund wasnt processed hell do it manually just wait 30mins for it to reach my account, I wait 1hr call them again another agent tells me that I infact will wait 5-7 days. Dont trust them went to my bank filed a dispute, won that and due to get my money in 24-48 hrsThis is the customer service number for just eat 020 3826 9530

Title: never let me down
Review: never let me down . even though all these reviews are bad . im not sure why . maybe they been bombed by fake reviews . its down to a resturant for bad food or late deliverys . they the ones on the other end of the computer that accept and change the time delivered . as for food. how can just eat be blamed for your rubbish takeaways in the area . makes no sense to me . ive used them for years and never had a problem with the service provided . not sure whats going on with this .

Title: Someone paid me to eat their food
Review: Ordered a few dumplings, received three different dishes I never ordered! Tried to call the restaurant but only voicemail available. I mean, I got more food than I expected for much less, I don't want to eat other person's food but I'm hungryyy. Got nothing against the restaurant itself, food is always awesome but someone messed up a bit this time. lol I feel someone will come and claim the order as soon as I start eating it

Title: Very poor customer service
Review: Very poor customer service! Ordered food over the weekend, after over 2 hours waiting still no food. Phoned the restaurant they just hung up on me. Restaurant changed the status to order delivered, to where I don't know... definitely wasn't delivered to my house! Next day I asked for a refund from the restaurant through just eat, it was denied. Opened a complaint with just eat direct who also denied a refund. Ended up having to go through my banks fraud team and they did a charge back. Definitely going back to the good old fashioned ringing the restaurant to order, and paying cash on delivery from now on. Will never order via just eat again!

Title: Krishna kitchen rubbish
Review: I ordered a meal from Krishna kitchen in Bristol They eventually called me 15 minutes after the order was ready complaining that the driver hadn't turned up like that was my problem? then they phoned me telling me they were shutting in 2 minutes like I could do anything about it being on the other side of bristol. very vague. I contacted just eat to be told they were very sorry which they obviously weren't as judging from the feedback this is a regular thing. Rubbish company with poor interaction last time I use them and don't think Ill be using Krishna Kitchen again either

Title: ATTROCIOUS
Review: Just Eat customer service Is ATTROCIOUS. I've been back and forth with them for MONTHS and not going anywhere, this has seriously affected my business and all because of their incompetence.We need a VERIFICATION CODE so the delivery drivers can contact the customers BUT there's no verification code on the receipts and when we call customers services, they're unable to provide one.So we're between a rock and a hard place with Just Eat.

Title: Order marked as delivered but I never…
Review: Order marked as delivered but I never received my food. Restaurant claim its not there responsibility, just eat say sort it with the restaurant. No one takes responsibility, no refund given so basically, money stolen. I wonder how many thousands of pounds just eat have made from food people have never received. Disgusting service, NEVER AGAIN

Title: Dont order breakfast
Review: Dont order breakfast been waiting nearly 2 hours for Mcdonalds breakfast to be delivered you shoudnt be allowed to order if they dont have drivers to deliver wont be doing this again

Title: Same as below!
Review: Same as below!Probably me with your order if it was Toby Carvery!Nearly £30 worth of KFC is with someone else and Just eat are absolutely useless. Chat online chat told to call KFC and ask them why they have sent me Toby Carvery! Seriously.Ended up on the phone and next to no help.72 hrs I have to wait.

Title: Utterly Pathetic
Review: Utterly, utterly pathetic.I made an order - I waited. It eventually said "delivered." I had no food. No knock at my door. The driver had just handed my food to someone else - God knows who - and that was that.I called Just Eat - no refund. "Wait 48 hours." GREAT.I tried livechat - same response. The livechat agent didn't listen to me at all - just "wait 48 hours, we'll investigate."In the meantime, I've paid for someone else to eat my food. No one offered to re-order my food so I might actually get something tonight. MAYBE I'll get a refund, who actually knows?I can't believe these useless drivers will just hand your order to anyone, after knocking on the wrong door. Why don't they text you a code? That only you get? Then they ask for that code when you answer the door? HEY, A MUCH BETTER SYSTEM OFF THE TOP OF MY HEAD.As I said - pathetic.Oh, and I said TWICE to raise a complaint on the live chat. This was ignored completely. I wish I could just ignore everything a customer says in my job! It'd be so much easier.This may seem predictable - but I'm NEVER EVER using Just Eat again

Title: The worst app for food delivery
Review: The worst app for food delivery. Now App upgraded and is even slower than before.Restaurants on the app are the worst, noway of checking on location of restaurants or even contacting them, might as well google them and order direct and they do free delivery! So why the need for this app...at least the other apps have more of a choice..Account now closed😀 can you really afford bad reviews!!

Title: Just Google the restaurants number and order directly.
Review: I just had to pay for an order that the restaurant couldn't honour. I had to do this because they had accepted the order before they realised they didn't have the dish. I called the restaurant but they didn't know how to cancel the order and JE customer service said they couldn't do anything about it either and instead I should leave the restaurant a review. I verified that JE only provide facilities for delivery drivers and a service directory so my suggestion is use someone else or call restaurants directly. Don't expect JE to chase your money and respect your business. Remember you can go to a restaurant directly, don't let your laziness facilitate profits for a company that doesn't care about you plus the restaurants will appreciate the greater profit margin. Use your Just Eat account to get the restaurants details then ring them up directly; more power to you and less to these.

Title: Zero stars
Review: Zero stars. Initially delivery said 1 hour, when the hour was up it extended to another hour which is ridiculous. I was not notified of this and tried calling the restaurant who did not pick up multiple times. I wanted to cancel my order as it was taking SO long. I contacted Just Eat customer services who were also helpless. No update of where my order was - just had to wait for the driver to turn up. In the end I waited 2 HOURS. No apology given.

Title: Ordered food and told arrival time…
Review: Ordered food and told arrival time would be 1/2 an hour. Now 2.5 hours later they still haven’t assigned a driver and we’ve had to cancel the order!!! We won’t bother using these again. Wasn’t even offered compensation.

Title: KFC ordered off Just Eat
Review: KFC ordered off Just Eat. Tells me it’s been delivered. However I do not know where the food went but it did not come to our house!! We eventually ended up driving to KFC to tell them we had not in fact received any food. To then be informed it was a Just Eat driver who had not delivered.

Title: Been waiting for a kfc order for 2 and…
Review: Been waiting for a kfc order for 2 and half hour the web said said delivered not to me i did not receive my order just eat said they need to investigate will take 48 hours so out of pocket £24  no food please do not use just eat this is 2nd time this as happen to me it will not happen again.

Title: Total rubbish
Review: Food never turned up when contacted theseeople there reply was we have no drivers to pick the food up so no delivery this service us not fit for purpose will never use again

Title: Avoid like the plague!
Review: Ordered through the app, got confirmation through app driver was on the way, after 45 minutes called restaurant to be told that it left 45 minutes prior and that it would be cold and ruined by now, got on to just eat and basically got told to wait 48 hours for an investigation!! It’s not rocket science as to what has clearly happened here, got a email the following day to say they agreed in my favour and to allow 3-7 days for refund! As just eat relies on customers for profit surely they should really look at keeping those customers happy and spread the word that they are a good customer focussed business!

Title: Delivery was battard
Review: Waited over an hour for delivery. When the food was dropped off it looked like they had dragged it here behind there car. Food was all out the containers and greese dripping through the bag. Will never use just eat again! Terrible service!

Title: Absolute shocking service
Review: Absolute shocking service, they take your payment, if there is a problem with delivery of the food they blame the restaurant and offer no refund, deal with the restaurant, shocking behaviour will never use again

Title: Basically totally crap
Review: Basically totally crap. Things missing from my order and the refund was only for the missing parts of my order. The Person on the phone couldn’t care less. I personally would like to shove the chips that I paid for that never turned up and I paid a fee to just eat for down the throat of the owners of just eat and then shaft them with the chicken like they shafted me with their company policy. If this was a small business you would be reported for it.

Title: Waiting 2 n half hours for my order…
Review: Waiting 2 n half hours for my order never arrived the customer services was terrible blamimg mcdonalds when just eats never sent out a driver never use again!!!!!!

Title: Do not buy from here if you do you…
Review: Do not buy from here if you do you could get food positioning from them and not even get your full order there have robbed me out of money and then try to treat me for no reason at all and been so abusive towards me and refuse to refund or replace my order due to the food been so cold and taste out of date and now feel unwell

Title: Very poor service!
Review: Very poor service!Part of the order was missing. The restaurant (KFC - Linwood, Paisley) told me to contact just eat as they provide the drivers. However just eat hasn't offered me any redelivery, only a refund for the missing part, refund to be used only on just eat, not to my card!! then why would I want to use just eat again after the service provided? And if I order again using the refund, I have to pay another delivery. A strategy to always win. Very disappointed with the service provided by just eat and with the restaurant missing part of the order.

Title: Delivery left outside
Review: I’m not someone who complains a lot but I just wanted to say that my last order from noodle bar was great but the driver that delivered the food was not. I left my number, we were in the house, we waited for the food for a good forty minutes until we found out the Food was outside the front door. Not too pleased with the driver doing this to be honest.

Title: Undelivered takeaway
Review: A recent order was never delivered despite the restaurant marking it as delivered. Just Eat used this to excuse themselves from any responsibility regarding the order. The restaurant claims they delivered, I am left out of pocket while Just Eat sit back and take their share of the profit without any regard for consumers.

Title: Don't waste your time with these
Review: Useless company they are no help whatsoever when one of their supported companies screws you out of your order and your money. Better going direct.

Title: Food 2 hours late and cold shambolic delivery + customer service
Review: Food 2 hours late and cold.  Restaurant phoned to apologies multiple times that no delivery driver had turned up and food was going cold.Just eat then blamed restaurant and didn’t pay them.Just eat, if your responsible for the delivery bit and your 2 hours late then take some responsibility.  Sort out your shambolic operation or close down if your not up to it.

Title: It’s been a week now and still no…
Review: It’s been a week now and still no refund for food not delivered, investigation gone to investigation team,

Title: Really Poor Experience
Review: Last evening I ordered food at 6:30pm with Just Eat from the Dragon View Restaurant, 9 Moffat Close Bolton. Delivery time was quoted at time of order as between 35-45 minutes. At 8:15pm the food arrived. It was stone cold, and had multiple items missing. I contacted the Dragon View who could not help and referred me to Just Eat. I contacted Just Eat and then  spent another 90 minutes attempting to secure a refund. Many words spring to mind such as inept, incompetent but I guess the main word is just simply uncaring. They clearly value their commission from the sale more than their customers. Absolutely shocking actually. Avoid at all costs. Contact the restaurant directly; even better go and collect. Oh, yes, I did manage to get my money back but only after my wife called Just Eat out on social media.

Title: The Just Eat driver failed to deliver…
Review: The Just Eat driver failed to deliver our food order, but marked it as delivered. So this means they couldn't find the place and gave up; or delivered the order to the wrong house and the person took it! Either way I am out of pocket with no food. The chat function was terrible with appalling customer service - I was on there for nearly 50mins being asked the same questions again and again - then only to be told that because the order was marked as delivered they couldn't reorder the food or issue a refund. Basically they took the drivers word for it. I then called the helpline (had to google it as not obvious on their website) only to be told that I have to contact the restaurant! It wasn't the restaurant's fault - it was the Just Eat driver! I will never use them again.

Title: I have been refused a refund for an…
Review: I have been refused a refund for an error caused by just eat!! I have been told numerous times that there is nothing they can do about this!! This I highly doubt!! I am sure there is a way a big firm like this could compensate me!!! Ridiculous!

Title: I will not be using just eat again as…
Review: I will not be using just eat again as they do not refund the delivery from rubbish food I had from Uxbridge Macdonalds delivered last night everything was cold and unedible

Title: Company is a joke for handling…
Review: Company is a joke for handling complaints and refunds, I was in Leeds with my partner and was there as my son was getting a life changing operation to help him breathe. So didn't know my way around so had to order food via Uber Eats ordered from the local Taco Bell. It arrived and when in got to my room it was freezing cold, so went through the app to put in a complaint, after live chat because that's the only way they sort stuff out, I was speaking to someone for it that person to leave and I ended speaking to another person who asked me to start again as they wanted me to send pictures of the items I could send 4 due to email limitations.Half way through it kicked me and ended speaking someone else for a 3rd time.It's been 1 week since I've heard anything and it's supposed to take 72 hours, yeah right. The company is a joke they owe me £16 and I've got no reply when email to ask what's happening with the investigation heard nothing yet.Uber Eats you get instant refund on most items straightaway

Title: No refund on wrong order only Credit
Review: I had gone on to complain about the level of service, I’m clearly not alone. Please understand that if the order is wrong that will not refund the part that is wrong. They try and give you a credit. And they can’t do this if the restaurant who messed up the order don’t close the order. Don’t use them.

Title: Unsatisfactory solution…
Review: I phoned Just Eat after a KFC order came missing a major Item they kept me on the phone over 15 minutes just to tell me all they could do was credit my just Eat account that I won't be using again

Title: Ordered some food and it never turned…
Review: Ordered some food and it never turned up but was still charged on my card. Contacted Just Eat the day after the delivery was meant to turn up and was promised a full refund. It’s been 3 weeks, and I still haven’t received a refund even after contacting them 3 more times with them again promising it would be refunded. They even tried to blame my bank for me “not receiving my refund”. Appalling service. Stay clear!

Title: Disgusting service
Review: Disgusting service. Cannot get refunded for cold food due to the restaurant knowing how to play the game and not mark it as delivered... Online. Chat agents are no good at helping as they don't seem to speak very good English. Happy to take my money but not sort issue.

Title: A miracle of bad service
Review: Hard to believe, isn't it, in this day and age, when people can get refunded for anything, that you can order a pizza that never arrives from a big name company and no one anywhere will acknowledge what happened or give you your money back. Seriously, f* these guys, stick to Delivr-whatsit

Title: Rubbish customer support service. Pure rubbish.
Review: I had cause to complain about a delivery from KFC(a) the person I spoke to did not understand my complaint at all. It says justeat.co.uk but this person was not even in the UK. I required him to escalate it to a supervisor, and was told I would get a call back.(b) the supervisor called me back two days later and directed me to a place on the website which says KFC does not get the message you type in the message to the kitchen box. I asked what is the point of hiding that "footnote" and why I am permitted to enter a message to supplier anyhow? And when she told me I need to approach the supplier for redress I asked why she had taken two days to call me back with this nonsense - would the supplier even recognise the order? And in any case the duplicity was Just Eat's website not KFC's. This agent too was not in the UK.I will not order using Just Eat again, ever. Too big for their boots and why should I be supporting them in these tough times?

Title: Avoid - no refunds after cancelling
Review: Avoid. Currently waiting for 2 "refunds" in after cancelling orders and being promised the money would go straight back in my account (paid with debit card). Two weeks after the orders, I've had nothing back. They claim they can't even provide proof of payment- the money certainly has not gone back in my account. Absolute scam.

Title: Food never arrived  - JustEat very unhelpful
Review: Food was ordered via JustEat at 21:58 for delivery by 23:10. It Never arrived. The staff were rude and unhelpful when we called. Eventually the "manager" called us at 23:45 to tell us our order had been delivered to someone else! By then we were starving but so tired we just asked for a refund. Was told I would have to get JustEat to sort it. We paid our money for nothing and were treated disgustingly. Fighting to get our money back from an unhelpful JustEat who tell us we have to take it up with the restaurant - both just passing the buck. I will never order from this dump again and will never be using JustEat again at this rate.

Title: Terrible service
Review: Made an order with Dixy Chicken in Northampton and it turned up an hour late cold and inedible. Trying to get a refund but the restaurant wouldn’t complete the order on the system so JustEat won’t issue a refund. Will never use again

Title: Never purchase a JUST EAT GIFT CARD
Review: My husband received a Just Eat gift card, tried on 4 occasions to use it, PIN number not recognised apparently, each time I have spoken to an operative in it appears an Indian call centre, all whom read from a script, none have been able to resolve problem.Now attempting to make an official complaint via emai, that too is proving difficult.  Just received what appears to be an automated response, which isn’t helpful at all..

Title: Hi everyone
Review: Hi everyone, never buy gift cards from them, now ive been 2 hours on phone to help team , spoken to 3 people who still not helped to sort my problem, going sleep hungry. Last thing they advice to pay by credit card ! Worst experience and help i had in my life ! If want help me Just Eat and sort problem out call 07731085221 .

Title: 2 hours wait for food and arrived…
Review: 2 hours wait for food and arrived upturned. They could only reorder not refund. Tried to cancel after 40 mins in when still no driver assigned but it took so long via their chat page that by that time they had started making the food so couldn't cancel. Our got cut off three times so had to start the conversation again. They didn't even know what order I was talking about and switching the page stopped the chat again. Painful experience.

Title: Ordered more then two hours ago
Review: Ordered more then two hours ago. Never received the food. Driver put the name of the house as street number not looking on all provided details. I saw that on the tracing map. He was never on my address. Helpline is useless I've spend almost 1,5 hour with them and they cannot contact the driver. It's all just a joke they've left me without food snd money for it.

Title: Disgusting service
Review: I placed an order through just eat 3 hours later I have been accused of being a liar never received my order the delivery driver completed the status as delivered the chat team online refused to give me a refund or place another order ive been cut off twice whilst I've been on hold for over 30mins. How is this acceptable

Title: Won't bother again
Review: Ordered using Just Eat three times in the last week and it's just been shocking. First time our good was 3 hours late and we assumed it was a screw up at the restaurant.Second time they cancelled my order entirely after an hour and a half because no delivery driver could be found. Tonight I've been waiting an hour and a half and the shop didn't have my address! What even is the point of just eat, seriously?

Title: The worst company ever don’t ever use…
Review: The worst company ever don’t ever use them I’ve deleted my account and I will never order from them again. Tried to change delivery address because I was at a friends house.i have them plenty of time to ether chasing the address or cancel my order. they said they would change to correct address. Then 2 hours later they said they’ve already delivered my order. But the driver took the food and drove of with my food. I have him on cctv. So I didn’t receive the food, yet Iv paid for it.

Title: Money taken - no delivery
Review: Money taken, food not delivered, and then pointing to the restaurant and that they are a mediator only. Absolute joke. In the chat they admit it.The app doesn't even have a "not delivered" option.Guess why.

Title: So who is eating my food???
Review: My last two experiences with just eat have been terrible. I have never had any problems with them in the past however a few weeks ago I had a restaurant call me repeatedly asking me to change my review of their service which I think I seriously unacceptable. Then today I ordered food which never made it. The driver arrived and found our buzzer not working (which I didn't know about as I use the back door only so didn't write in the notes section) the driver phones me twice within a minute which I didn't answer as my phone was on silent. I called back asap and was met with the message 'incorrect number'. I looked out of the window to see the driver was still there so grabbed my shoes to go catch him. When I got downstairs he wasn't there so I tracked him on the app to see he was on his way back to the restaurant. I called just eat and was told they couldn't deliver the food again (I was given no reason why they couldn't) and I could only have a 50% refund because the restaurant has already used electricity to make the food. I even tried calling the restaurant and they said they hadn't had any food returned. So the food can't be delivered but hasn't made it too the restaurant... so who is eating my food??? After this I won't be using just eat again.

Title: Tasty food delivered hot and tasty
Review: Great company! Enables me to stay at my home and have food delivered straight to my door, what more could I ask? Excellent

Title: Never had a problem with this site and…
Review: Never had a problem with this site and surprised to see so many negative reviews. The app can’t be held responsible for a takeaway delivering a pizza late but apparently they can judging by some of the reviews 🤣

Title: Charging extra on items on the menu…
Review: Charging extra on items on the menu £1.50 more than the shop, but other shops are showing the correct price as if just eat are punishing the owners, not only does this stop people using the shop but the customer is getting ripped off.

Title: Rubbish
Review: Rubbish. Waiting two hours now and no way to get a refund. Dont bother. Quicker to cook.

Title: Refund yeah right
Review: Your not eligible for a refund if the restaurant does not update delivery status.So what happens then is you get no refund even though the food was wrong cold.Oh and this is even the case when the restaurant swore at and called a liar you when you phoned to complain.It's the first time in a decade I've made a complaint and this is the treatment you get. I have been waiting 2 weeks for a refund at this point.

Title: Expensive and very poor quality
Review: Expensive and very poor quality. Order direct from the restaurant itself and cut out this useless extra cost to their overheads.

Title: Received inedible food
Review: Received inedible food. It was so bad I took photographs as evidence. Contacted the takeaway, manager just wanted to argue.Got in touch with Just Eat head office who URGED me to leave an honest review.I left the review, however no words were recorded on the review just my 2.5 stars.Totally dishonest practice. Just eat you are a disgrace.

Title: Death to just eat!!!!
Review: I would give less than 1   Star if I could I’ve been waiting 5 days after I complained and got told I would get a phone call from their supervisor within 24h. My complaint was to do with the delivery service and how slow it was!! I got told that the delivery service wasn’t anything to do with them. They could only grant credit for what was affected but they didn’t include delivery as their fault or part of their service. Just eat is a delivery service that doesn’t Think that the delivery is part of their service!!

Title: AVOID
Review: This company are crooks, your disgusting, inedible, cold order (which you have already paid £45 for arrives) and is missing items, juice, dips etc. You ask for a refund but their downright rude customer service refuse. They will offer credit nowhere near the value of your spend meaning you have to use them again. They will refuse to assist with any complaints and you’ll never get your money back.Best bit of advice. Search your local take away on the App Store, many have apps and the food is cheaper and it helps the business too because they don’t have to pay these scumbags a commission. Or call them, they can take card payments over the phone! Avoid this mob like the plague.

Title: never use JUST EAT- higher price than restaurant or food hub
Review: Do not use JUST EAT. They charge extra for delivery and commission. Order from food hub or directly from restaurant.my order was 18+ and delivery charges  and commission 2.50£. If you order from food hub this order only cost 14£.Customers dont get any extra protection or service for these extra cost.on top of these we cant log complain against just eat.

Title: Rubbish customer service
Review: Rubbish customer service.  Item missing from delivery and when I advised them they said they could not do anything without photographic evidence.   They owe me money....to me that is theft

Title: DISGUSTINGLY BAD SERVICE
Review: DISGUSTINGLY BAD SERVICE.  THE DRIVER LEFT THE PREMISES WITHOUT LEAVING THE FOOD AFTER TRYING MY PHONE WITHOUT SUCCESS BECAUSE OF BAD RECEPTION.  PERHAPS THERE WAS A RESAON FOR ACTION LIKE BEING BUSY BUT WHEN I SPOKE TO JUST EAT THEY SIMPLY SAID WE CAN ONLY OFFER YOU A 50% REFUND.  I DEMANDED TO SPEAK TO HIGHER MANAGEMENT AND AM AWAITING A CALL.

Title: Rubbish service - Pickering North Yorkshire
Review: Pickering North Yorkshire. Don’t use service is appalling. Almost an hour later than promised.

Title: Utter rubbish
Review: Utter rubbish. Food came cold with items missing but just eat refused to refund me. Just a credit on an account I will never use again. 2 hours & still no refund. After 2 days of arguing with them & waiting for a supervisor call that never came. They owe me money & I have reported them to everyone organisation I can. Do not use just eat!!

Title: Just eat thermal bag
Review: Bought a bag to deliver as a courier. After a month and a half have yet to recieve. Had to call up justeat multiple times was given the promise that it would arrive never did. Had to contact my credit agency to refund the payment.

Title: Wish I could give 0 stars...
Review: When I first ordered at 7:05pm on the Just Eat app it was expected to come at 7:40pm however as soon as the order was processed it immediately jumped up to 8:10pm. Considering all we had ordered was a wrap, chicken doner and chips, and a drink, we were very surprised it was going to take so long to prepare our order. We ended up calling the restaurant at about 8:15pm and because the order hadn't moved at all on the app. After chasing several times (the restaurant didn't know where their delivery driver was and could not get in contact with him) our order finally arrived at 8:50pm which was close to 2 hours after we had originally ordered. The delivery driver just dropped our food at the door and didn't check to see if it was the right house which is incredibly unprofessional. Every time I spoke to the restaurant, the person I spoke to kept interrupting me which was very rude. The food was all cold when it arrived except for the drink which was hot. The chips were terrible, tasted completely like cardboard and we didn't end up eating them. We asked for a refund and proceeded to chase them for a week for this which still hasn't been received. Considering the name of the restaurant is Speedy's, this could not have been more inaccurate as neither the food, delivery driver or refund have been speedy. Just Eat was also incredibly unhelpful throughout the entire process and refused to process the refund despite agreeing to it a week earlier. They kept saying that the restaurant would have to do this from their end however the restaurant had apparently called them and was told that I would have to process for a refund.So unimpressed about the service, delivery, quality of food and handling of my enquiry.

Title: This company is so useless I paid with…
Review: This company is so useless I paid with my card and they never saw a charge trucking ideots

Title: Food wasn’t delivered and was made out…
Review: Food wasn’t delivered and was made out that I was lying. No refund, replacement or apology. About just eat or if no choice strictly pay by cash!!

Title: If I could give less than one star
Review: If I could give less than one star, I would. I had a LARGE hair in my food, sent a picture to Just Eat and their ‘investigations’ team said they didn’t see anything wrong. The picture was of a piece of bread suspended by a LONG hair!!!!!! The service is appalling, the company is a joke. UberEats and Deliveroo are in a different league. More fool me for trying Just Eat

Title: useless, rubbish customer services
Review: useless, driver tried to deliver to an address 5 miles away from us, they got lost for over a hour. we told them we didn't want our cold order delivered.just eat told me that they will offer only 50% refund?????? complete shambles

Title: Improvement from kfc and just eat needed
Review: I think it is joint poor service. I ordered from kfc and an item was missing. Phoned just eat to see what could be done. Either reorder and pay delivery again for 1 item or a credit refund. I don't use just eat often at all so this is pointless. There should be a system in place to help this. Either call the restaurant and do redelivery or if the person can go out which would be pointless because delivery is so you don't have to go out. Also you should be able to refund back to customer card. You would be able to see on their account if they constantly requesting refunds and then issue credit. There is room for improvement on both sides. Checking that an order is correct and better service on the phone line for more options. I am fuming over this as this has ruined our meal.

Title: NO REFUNDS BACK TO DEBIT CARD
Review: Customer service is just a joke, they seriously need to train their staff in basic communication skills. Asking simple questions only to be half answered and even that went off topic. I'd even accept generic replies you normally get off less experienced staff reading off a screen. ALSO.... PLEASE BE AWARE THEY DO NOT ISSUE REFUNDS BACK TO DEBIT CARDS. DUE TO CHANGES IN THEIR SYSTEM. Very hard to believe with a company that size not issuing refunds especially for something you never received.

Title: winterbourne grill
Review: Ordered from winterbourne grill for my daughters birthday..forgot my daughters food off the order was told it would be brought to me..to then find 1 hour later the had no intetions to bring it..refused to give me my money back..they got very aggressive on the phone and put the phone down.. i  have not receive my money back..spoke to just eat to tell me can do anything cause i paid in cash..so not only my daughters birthday treat ruined i have not received my money..im sure if i was to give them not enough money they will soon be trying to get it back..will never use again

Title: Absolutely appalling service
Review: Absolutely appalling service. I placed an order for KFC delivery. When my order arrived, half was missing. I contacted Just Eat to ask for this to be sent but they told me they couldn’t but would give me a credit for the missing items. I asked for a refund but they have apparently changed their policy and only give credits to your account. The customer service is non existent, I had a web chat with an agent who was uninterested and sarcastic. I will never be using this service again.

Title: Forced to contact CEO
Review: My email to JustEat CEO after appalling service and non-receipt of correct order below.  I suggest anyone this happens to does the same. Search JustEat CEO email online and you'll find it.Dear Mr Duffy,I have had a serious issue with a wrong delivery made today and I’m very unhappy with how the staff were actively unhelpful with the situation.I placed an order with JustEat today and when the driver came, I realised right away that the order was wrong. The driver and I stood at my door while he contacted your staff and I tried to call the restaurant.  I couldn’t get through to them so the driver advised me to speak to Customer Service online chat and they would be able to fix it.  I told him to take the order back because it was not what I wanted and was no use to me, I assume someone else went without or received a wrong order as well.I spoke to the customer service team and their only response is it will be investigated and I’ll hear back within 72 hours.  I asked them to replace the order or refund me so I could place it again but they just kept saying it needs investigating.  I don’t have any money to place a new order and I won’t get my money or order from JustEat for at least 48-72 hours. I will go hungry tonight because of this.  I asked the staff to help me out, I suggested could they put credit on my account so I can reorder but all I got was ‘sorry we can’t do that, it has to be investigated’.  I asked to speak with a manager or supervisor and was told no-one was available and I’d have to wait.  I don’t understand that.  I even asked the staff member if there were supervisors present in the office they are based, the answer was yes but for some reason I still was not allowed to escalate it.  I was made to feel like you don’t believe me when I say what happened and now I have to wait 3 days for someone to decide whether I should get my money back or not!I don’t see why an investigation is needed to be honest.  Your own driver told them it was a wrong order at the exact time it was being delivered and took it away again.  After I had no luck with your online staff, I tried the restaurant again and when I got through explained the situation.  They said the driver had never returned with an order and it was likely they just kept it or threw it out.I’ve provided my order and complaints references below.  I’m fully aware that you might not receive this message in enough time to do anything about it right away but I really need this to be fixed ASAP because I don’t know what I’ll do tonight.  What I do know is I won’t be using JustEat again after this.  I must use the service at least 2-3 times a week and have never had any problems until today, and the first issue that comes up no-one is willing to try and help.  I just can’t believe that I wouldn’t be given an immediate refund or replacement when I didn’t receive my order.  If I’d called the restaurant directly and the wrong order arrived, it would be resolved right away.  If I’d done it through Deliveroo, they would refund instantly or credit my account so I could place it again.I received a response the next day as follows:"Jason.C (Just Eat UK)28 Jun 2020, 11:39 BSTHello PaulMy name is Jason and I work in the Investigations & Escalations department and your query has been passed to me by the executive team to review.I'm very sorry to hear that your order was not delivered and an incorrect order was delivered to you instead. Unfortunately this does seem to be a common issue however these issues need to be investigated thoroughly and professionally.I can see that you are unhappy with waiting up to 72 hours for us to investigate, this is just a time period that our advisors give to our customers, however these may not take 72 hours and we can sort these queries rather quickly depending on the volume of our requests. Unfortunately we would need to investigate these situations and we cannot just give you a refund without proof.I'm happy to confirm that I have processed a refund for the affected items for you, this is for £9.64. The funds will return to your account within 3-7 working days.I'd like to reassure you that Just Eat takes matters like this very seriously and we will be sharing your feedback with the delivery company directly to ensure that they take action with the driver.In future, please may I ask that you provide photographic evidence of the incorrect order with the receipt clearly showing. I have refunded you on this occasion as you did not know however, this is a new policy and I cannot guarantee another refund in future.We apologise for any inconvenience caused, please let me know if you require any further questions or assistance and I will be more than happy to help."However to date, 16 July, I've still not received my refund. Called them again and they suggest an admin error was the issue. They are bloody useless and actively ripping people off. Avoid JustEat!

Title: Had a fab takeaway tonight
Review: Had a fab takeaway tonight, cheated a little bit and ordered burgers but did a fake BBQ at home. Salads, nibbles and posh burgers delivered, saves lighting the BBQ on a Friday.

Title: Absolutely disgusting
Review: Absolutely disgusting. Drivers actively avoid doing orders and complain about mistakes in the order I didn't even make. In the three seperate times I ordered from them, they wasted 4 hours of my time in total by not taking up the asignment to take my order or even just the simplicity that is driving to the store and picking up my food. My last order had three seperate drivers take it on, none of them turned up to the store and then I procided to get a snarky helpcenter call where I was finally able to cancel the order that had wasted my time and money Waiting for Two items. Avoid them at all costs.

Title: Appalling customer service. Avoid at all cost
Review: Placed an order for pizza at 1845hrs today. Called the restaurant twice who blamed the driver. Contacted JustEat who offered a £5 voucher for our next order. I confirmed they could keep their voucher as we would never order through JustEat again. Their customer service is non-existent. Order was finally delivered at 2110hrs hot so in other words the restaurant lied and blamed the poor driver. Perhaps JustEat should take some lessons in customer service from Deliveroo

Title: The customer service is absolutely…
Review: The customer service is absolutely appalling, truly awful people who lie. My order did not arrive after I’ve been waiting outside my house looking for the driver. I called customer service for them to contact the driver, but as the driver had already marked the order as delivered, they could not issue me my order or my money back. They lied and told me it was the restaurants drivers, but after I had called the restaurant and asked about the driver, the restaurant stated it was just eats third party drivers. So I called just eats customer service again and explained the situation. Paul (the customer service) then repeatedly lied to me saying it was not their drivers, and then said that he has contacted the driver through telephone. I asked if he could call the driver, and Paul responded that he couldn’t because he had not been able to contact him. So I am back in square one after being repeatedly lied to, asked to speak to the manager. Paul then lied and said the manager will contact me. However the manager has not, and just eat are very sneaky for not providing an on-site manager and have just ignored my complaints. I am now down £23, just eat are also very sneaky for not hanging up the phone for me to do a review of the service, and put me on hold for about 20 minutes. Because I wanted to review their customer service I could not because Paul just put me on hold. I am NEVER ordering again and I want my refund. Deliveroo is better because they have contact with their own drivers

Title: Restaurant reviews don't mean anything…
Review: Restaurant reviews don't mean anything because of a badly designed app. Ordered some food from a restaurant, it arrived late and fries were really cold and tasteless so I thought I'd leave a 2 star review for the restaurant. So I left the 2 star review and the next day I get an email saying my order has been cancelled and will be refunded even though it had been delivered the night before and paid in cash. So the restaurant cancelled my order the next day so 2 star review wouldn't be posted and thus wouldn't affect their restaurant ratings and since I paid in cash they won't refund. So any restaurant can decide to cancel the order if the customer has paid in cash and left them a bad review. So I suppose the ratings don't mean anything since the restaurant can control to an extent what reviews can be left for them. So in essence only bad reviews that can be left are if the customers paid by card because that way if the restaurant cancels the order they will have to ACTUALLY refund the money back into their account.

Title: Absolute discrace just eat not helpful…
Review: Absolute discrace just eat not helpful , customer service is shocking and yes I'm making a formal complaint,If you can do not use just eat , just go to your food outlook Web page, If you're wanting to know ,,just eat just stole £25 off me and no helpful

Title: So disappointed with Just Eat
Review: So disappointed with Just Eat. All fine when things go well but if you have a problem it’s awful. Stock responses to emails and on the ‘chat’ service on the app. Lots of “we totally understand...” buttons pressed, fobbing off, promised call-backs that don’t happen. Still waiting for my chat transcript to be emailed to me. I am deleting my app and will order direct with restaurants from now on.

Title: DO NOT USE - NO FOOD, NO REFUND
Review: I was conned out of money by Balti Spice in Newbury. The restaurant marked the order as delivered so Just Eat did not want to process a refund even though this is what they promised the night before when I got in touch with them. Pretty shocking experience to be honest. I definitely would encourage to use some other app. I got a call from the restaurant the night before saying they won't fulfill the order and they hang up on a Just Eat representative when she called which got completely ignored

Title: Meal delivery
Review: First Class Meal. Cooked to perfection.Also from the time of ordering, it was delivered in 30 minutes. The dilivery driver was also very pleasant.Comes highly recommended.

Title: Just eat is a terrible service the last…
Review: Just eat is a terrible service the last two times items been missed I tried to call Just eat was on the phone for over 20 minutes passed from department to department put on hold and refused to refund debit card could only credit just eat account legally they should refund debit card if the customer requests this said no because it was company policy and I am awaiting a manager calling horrendous service stay clear

Title: All the one star reviews are blaming…
Review: All the one star reviews are blaming just eat when it is the restaurant at fault.  I have never had any problems with them.

Title: Appalling
Review: Appalling. The restaurant l used food turned up 40 minutes late after a 1 hour wait all the food cold and very salty!  This restaurant has numerous complaints on it's own web site! Contacted customer service on line spoke to 3 ppl giving me all different information! The last one SAID THEY HAVE TURNED OFF YOUR OPTION TO GET A REFUND!!! I told the restaurant to collect the food they agreed to refund but didnt! I've used just eat for years! I've noticed a sharp decline. Poor quality food being delivered and often judging by the complaints it doesnt turn up! Ppl unable to get refunds! or any sence from the appalling customer service! The first person l spoke to wasnt interested at all. The second was very nice! but l couldnt access the option she told me to! The 3rd told me why!! JUSTEAT has turned off the option for you to actually get a refund!! I'm trying to find out how l remove all my details from this site. lve had some very poor take away of late! Not acceptable the customer service, if you can call it that arent interested or capable of sorting anything out. They are breaking consumer law and I've reported them to trading standards!

Title: Avoid Just Eat, Uber Eats far superior.
Review: Ordered food, never arrived. Your customer service and outlook towards your customers is truly shocking. I work in hospitality for over 12 years and the experience I've had tonight as a 1st time user is the worst customer experience I've ever had. Reading through the reviews on here and on their Facebook page just highlights to me im not the only one. Just Eat you should be ashamed. Peter Duffy as the CEO needs to take drastic action to improve the experience his customers get. The whole way they manage the customer experience needs improving. Uber Eats is far superior.

Title: Have your CV ready if you wish to cancel
Review: Waiting for a driver for over 45mins so decided to cancelOMG, how difficult and awkward are they about this.I logged in using the app. I was asked to provide my full name and email address to cancel, fair enough i thoughtThey then wanted my mobile numberThen wanted the first line of my home addressThen the post code. At this point i was getting a bit annoyed. They then said i need to confirm where the last place i ordered was from (like i could remember that). As i was on the phone i couldnt go in to the app to check. Luckily i had my laptop on, so logged on there.To really irritate me they then said i needed to state one item from that place that was ordered.All that to just cancel. Why cant you have a cancel function on the app. NEVER using these again

Title: STAY AWAY!
Review: STAY AWAY!! Awful company that doesn’t care about it’s customers or restaurant partners!! Customer service staff doesn’t understand English and whatever the nature of your complaint, they always tell you to go onto their partner app to send an email. After you send your email, the response is always unrelated to your email but if you call customer service and report this, they then tell you to send another email on the partner centre! Frustrating company !! For your sanity, Stay away !!

Title: The most appalling customer service…
Review: The most appalling customer service ever experienced. Meal ordered but not delivered. Just Eat online chat reaction? No sympathy, no refund. Why? Just Eat said the meal was delivered. I was made out to be a liar. Inept online chat 'personnel' with not a clue how to handle the situation. Restaurant admitted the rider had probably made off with the food....not for the first time, the restaurant owner stated. A shambles of a service. Does taking my money and not providing the service mean nothing to Just Eat? Apparently not. Stay well clear!

Title: Appalling service
Review: Appalling service. But now I see your score here it all makes sense.Why do you provide a customer service number when you dont answer?Why do you promote answer in calls in an average time of 2 minutes. You never answered any of my 3 calls all over 2 minutes.Wont be using you again . In fact I may just drop Trading Standards an email. You cannot get away with taking people's  hard earned money and not supply the product.

Title: Just eat removing negative reviews from…
Review: Just eat removing negative reviews from restaurants why??

Title: I’ve never known such awful customer…
Review: I’ve never known such awful customer service. We had a delivery not arrive last weekend. £27 worth. The restaurant marked their system saying they had completed delivery. We saw it happen while on the phone to the restaurant. So basically Just Eat say they can’t refund you. The restaurant are not interested and send us to Just Eat. Just eat keep saying we need to contact the restaurant. Their online chat is rubbish - and the telephone number is only automated with no option to speak with anyone.  They also removed our feedback comments as it included my awful customer service experience with themselves. We’ve removed the App and will not be using them again. What a nightmare trying to get a refund. Still got nowhere a week later. Abysmal

Title: Customer service is a joke
Review: Customer service is a joke. The driver delivered someone else’s order and the live chat service said ‘ there’s nothing I can do from my end’ and need 48hrs to investigate. I was told to call the shop but NO ONE ANSWERED. They should refund straight away this is totally their fault,AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID

Title: I hope you are happy with this resolution!  Hahaha
Review: I have used them lots and never had a problem. I ordered a KFC and when I seen a message saying "delivered" i called them to say it hadnt been delivered.I was told they could see the delivery was refused (makes sense as the driver had not been here). then was told I would not get a refund and they could not get the driver to come back. The to my amazement was told, "I hope you are happy with this resolution". Comical!!I said this was not a resolution. I got a call from a supervisor 2 days later offering me a 50% refund. I refused this and said I wanted her manager to call me. Conversation went on for some time (still comical) and got no refund.I will not use them again.

Title: Ordered 35 pound from Burger King they…
Review: Ordered 35 pound from Burger King they have delivered it to the flat behind us and are refusing to accept we have not had the food. 35 quid down and a dishonest neighbour. Wonderful.

Title: Absolutely poor service having used…
Review: Absolutely poor service having used them many times for lunch orders. Food ordered BUT no delivery! Customer service relatively ok but poor command of English by Spanish-speaking call handlers. Hard to understand what they were saying and not providing me the confidence of having my order refunded.I won't use again after weeks of use during the lockdown.

Title: JustEat steals from customers.
Review: I was their regular customer but today and many times before they stole my money and didn't deliver food. A multi-million pounds company can't keep an eye on their thieving drivers and blames its customers. I highly suggest ordering from somewhere else BUT NEVER FROM JUSTEAT.

Title: Useless Customer Support
Review: Customer support is a waste of time. Bots are more competent than agents and give the same information.

Title: Paid £40 for a kfc that never got delivered, won't refund
Review: Paid £40 for a kfc that got delivered to the wrong address, courier did not confirm address by knocking on the door he just left it in a random place. After spending hours of being hung up on and getting no where at all with customer service i got through to sanjay at the resolution centre, he said a full refund is out of question because one digit in my number was wrong (common mistake) and that it was my fault.. it was my fault the delivery driver did not knock on the door to check the address because my phone number was wrong... utter waste of time and money. This is going through small claims court as we speak, truly appalled at the service from start to finish. And Sanjay the manager of the resolution centre needs firing, he couldn't manage his way through a 2 foot corn maze the scammer.

Title: Awful customer service!
Review: Awful customer service! They really let the restaurants to get your money and don’t provide the requested food! I have got my order in short and I cannot do anything. They didn’t respond to anything; I have tried all the ways to get my partially refund but actually there is no way for it!

Title: Just Eat - Broken Service Awful Company
Review: Just Eat - Well what can I say, what a terrible company. I ordered food for the driver to have been 3 mins away when the driver disappeared from the map. No food delivered, Just Eat were rude, unhelpful and I have not received a refund. I’m absolutely disgusted. I will never use them again. It’s daylight robbery.

Title: I left a review about poor food…
Review: I left a review about poor food received and gave a detailed account of this. They ajudsted star rating to be higher and didn’t actually include my comments! So it seems just eat are fixing their comments on their website.

Title: Theiving company with zero customer support
Review: I had placed an order through feedme online to a restaurant I frequent regularly. During the order confirmation phase the order wasnt being accepted even though i waited 15 minutes or so. Foolishly rather than call I placed an order through justeat instead. Low and behold both orders were accepted at the same time.Immediately i called the restaurant who said they were happy to not provide the justeat order and if I call them they can cancel the order as they cant remove orders from their machine in the restaurant. You would think this would be a relatively easy thing for justeat to do right? Wrong!! 3 days of bickering with them and I gave up trying to receive my £25 back. Absolute thieves who know full well no product was received and they basically just took my money regardless even though it was reported immediately after both orders were accepted. I will never ever use justeat again.

Title: Not too bad
Review: Not too bad. They should make it compulsory for tracking so we can see where our food is. Uber wins for that. But most of the time if you have an issue then they can sort it but sometimes they will tell you to call the resturant who will do nothing

Title: For second time now I have ordered via…
Review: For second time now I have ordered via Justeat and meals not arrived although received email advising ‘arrived’. Spent 30 mins talking to 3 ‘advisors’ re the problem, two of which appear to have cut me off. Feel Justeat don’t give a toss. Won’t use them ever again.

Title: Poor service!! Charged me twice
Review: I have noticed that the last review was also double charged and they are having problems getting their monies back also.How can a company run like this without a complaints department so you can speak to somebody instead of talking through chat rooms??I ordered food from KFC and I went through the app with Just Eat and went through the app to pay for the food totalling £26.98. it first said that the restaurant was closed at 3pm and then it said my card payment could not be approved. There was clearly an issue with the app so I decided to try again at 4pm. I went through again to the payment stage and it said the same thing that the restaurant was closed but then it took me though payment and used a different card this time which went through however I received 2 emails with two order numbers both coming through at the same time. When I tried to cancel one of the orders I was directed to a chat and holding on for some time.
