When I did get through on the chat and talk with someone, they were arragont and rude telling me it's my fault!!I asked them to cancel one of the orders but they said that it's too late to cancel as the restaurant is already preparing the food....what??It hasn't left the restaurant, I just wanted it cancelled but he them said I would have to pay 50% cancellation charge as it's short notice!!This was getting more pathetic!!I made a complaint through Resolver and I got a computer generated response which didn't answer my complaint or how I would get my refund.With the issue of lack of funds at the moment as I cannot work, I can't afford to lose £26.98. I'm livid and KFC have been no help either!!

Title: They have double charged me and now…
Review: They have double charged me and now having spoken to 5 customer advisors and been promised call backs that have never happened I am loathed to even give 1 star. There is apparently no complaints department and no wag to speak to a manager. They are refusing to give me my refund. This is theft!

Title: I ordered via Just-Eat and food never…
Review: I ordered via Just-Eat and food never turned up.  I informed them of this and just noticed now that they never refunded me.  Now they claim I need to take it up with the restaurant.  But I paid Just-Eat - they are now saying they are just an intermediary - So bad

Title: No food, no customer service, no refund.
Review: Ordered from KFC Greenbridge Swindon, food was marked delayed, then delivered but never arrived. Driver was last seen driving to the other side of town, then conveniently lost connection. Tried calling the restaurant multiple times over an hour, no response. The food was marked delivered, even though it had never arrived, so Just Eat refused to refund us. My elderly grandparents purchased this to treat us, it's disgusting that Just Eat will not refund them. I asked about making a complaint with Just Eat, but the CSA I spoke with disregarded it and left the chat. Just eat has devolved into such an untrustworthy company going by similar complaints. I would advise everyone with similar issues to open a visa dispute with the bank, as just eat themselves will not help. Thoroughly ashamed as I've been a customer of Just Eat for years. Avoid.

Title: Please shut these scamming clowns…
Review: Please shut these scamming clowns down,I want my god dame money back,payed for food that never arrived but they marked it as delivered,Saturday night with four kids waiting for food that never arrived tottaly out or order,and to top it all they wont give my money back,I'm fuming, PLEASE BE WARNED DO NOT USE

Title: Gutted that I have to give Just Eat one…
Review: Gutted that I have to give Just Eat one star really. Waited over 2 hours for food. Never turned up. Just Eat say it was confirmed as delivered. Restaurant wont refund me, Just Eat wont refund me. Avoid at all costs. Find food elsewhere. Nothing but a racket in my mind. Utter joke.

Title: Ordered my food last night from cube in…
Review: Ordered my food last night from cube in Bolton and waited 3 hours it never arrived cube marked it as delivered and iv contacted just eat for a refund on my order and they are refusing and saying it has been delivered it’s joke of company I will never be using again it’s useless and the customer services is shocking !

Title: Just bad.
Review: Just bad.Worryingly bad and incompetent.Horrible.

Title: An awful service
Review: Ordered food from kfc 2hours ago. Told initially it would arrive at 5.27. Then changed to 6.17. Has been with the driver for 40 mins according to the app. The chat bot tells me to ring the restaurant. Mysteriously, the signal from the driver has been lost. Convenient that I can’t see where the driver is. First and last time I use them. Just cooking our dinner now.

Title: I was not refunded for missing items I…
Review: I was not refunded for missing items I ordered from Charcoal Chicken Bournemouth through the just eat app. Even though I made a complaint I was only offered credit off my next order. I have now deactivated my account with them.

Title: No food, no refund
Review: I order food from kfc waiting and hour an half still nothing so checked on app where it was, well it said delivered. So ring up had to wait an hour to get through to someone very rude telling me the driver said they delivered it so no refund and put the phone down on me. Out of pocket and fuming. If I could give 0 stars I would. Complete fraudsters!!!

Title: Absolutely appalling service
Review: Absolutely appalling service. My last order was the final straw, with a missing item that they are point blank refusing to refund. Do everything you can to avoid using this service. Complaints are met with copy and pasted pre-written templates (that contain errors) and no actually interest in the experience of the customer.

Title: Ordered a meal for the family on just…
Review: Ordered a meal for the family on just eat from KFC, which arrived freezing cold and was missing the kids main part of the meal. I called KFC who told me they can't do anything about it and that we can have the missing item another day when we are passing, which is obviously no good when the kids are hungry and waiting for their dinner. I then tried to contact just eat and was on a live chat, but no one responded in approx. 35-40 mins. What is the point of just eat if you can't speak to them to make a complaint for food we received cold and also was incomplete?

Title: Incredibly bad service!
Review: I ordered food from a restaurant called "TAKA TAKA" to arrive on my lunch break at 1 pm, it was running a couple of minutes late according to the Just Eat app, no big deal. The delivery driver called me as instructed so I could meet him at the front gate, "he was struggling to find my location". After a 15-minute phone call of back and forth, I assume he had enough of trying to find me and hung up! I tried calling him back as I thought he just got disconnected, no answer. After several attempts, I got fed up and decided to call the restaurant. The guy I spoke to informed me that the food had left just before 1 pm and all the delivery drivers work for just eat, not the actual restaurant, he advised me to call just eat. I decided to talk to Just Eat Via the app, First a BOT and secondly a real person. Never in my life have I come across such a condescending and patronizing person, they first offered me a partial refund of 50% to cover the costs of the restaurant making the food "still hadn't arrived, it was 1:45 pm at this point" Much lunch break was over. I explained even if the food does arrive I will not have time to eat it as I have to go back to work so I will require a refund. At this point, I was offered a £5 voucher because my food was late and was advised to give them a further 5 - 10 mins, I wasn't best pleased with this outcome as I had to go back to work and I felt I clearly wasn't being listened to. It all felt a bit scripted. More back and forth messages were exchanged and easily 15 minutes had passed. "STILL NO FOOD". I was told to wait a further 20 minutes. Completely fed up I ended the messaging and decided to wait a little bit and try talking to someone else. I got through to someone else and they were happy to cancel my order " so I wouldn't get charged". I was pleased with this outcome until the person I was speaking to said they couldn't process a refund as I have accepted £5 credit on my account! I specifically said I didn't want the £5 I just wanted my money back as goods were not received, I felt this first-person did this intentionally to hinder my refund. At this point, I was at my wit's end and was begging for my money back so I could go back to work so I wouldn't get in trouble with management. The person I was speaking to had the cheek to ask am I willing to still wait for the food, I actually couldn't believe they asked me that. Around 2:45 Just Eat agreed to cancel my order and that I wouldn't be charged. I was told my balance would take between 15 and 20 minutes to receive the funds " I know those two statements do not make sense, that's what I was told. I was told feel free to order something else whenever I'm ready! I couldn't help but laugh as I will N.E.V.E.R be using just eat again! The rest of their reviews speak for themselves!!!!

Title: Awful customer service
Review: Awful customer service. Recieved a 36 pound order where half the items were undercooked. Told them due to this I wasnt able to eat any of the food. As I'm sure most would be worried about the rest of the food being contaminated, and for health reasons wouldnt risk it. Apparently they can offer me 15 pounds refund for the food that was undercooked but not for the rest which was likely also contaminated and isnt worth risking giving to children.  Actually fuming as I'm 36 pound out of pocket for inedible food and only 15 is coming back to me.

Title: I would honestly give it a 0 star if I…
Review: I would honestly give it a 0 star if I could, I ordered Burger King at 5:45pm on card and it was supposed to be here at 6:03, it’s now 8.36 and still no Burger King, even though my parents and other sister ordered kfc from just eat at the same time and got theirs at 6:15 it’s awful, now I’ve lost out on £35 worth of food, been on hold with them for 45 minutes but they charge you when on the phone to them so had to hang up really really disappointed and angry,will never ever been ordering from them again

Title: Just Eat should not be allowed to trade with such disgusting service
Review: Just Eat have the most disgusting customer service I have ever experienced and I wouldn't use them again if you paid me. Too bad I am forced to leave 1 star, I would left 0 if I had the option.I had a terrible Chinese meal which I contacted the restaurant about; they informed me that if I wanted my money back I would need to contact  Just Eat themselves (who apparently hold the money for 2 weeks), which I did so by phone. I was then sent an email with a complaint number and told to reply with a detailed explanation and some photos, which I did. I should probably mention that by this point I had given up enough of my time to deal with the matter, however this would prove fruitless as after many ridiculous and illogical email exchanges Just Eat refused to offer anything in the way of actual help at all. They manage to write long, fluffy nonsensical emails without actually saying or doing anything. The photos clearly supported the written claim (eg a special fried rice with prawns, chicken and beef that was clearly plain boiled rice with some peas). Just Eat were also dumb enough to reply that 'the photos don't support your claim (regarding flavour)'.... Obviously photos cant really tell you much about flavour. Clearly getting a job as one of Just Eats' 'Investigations Team' doesn't require much in the way of logic, rationality, accountability, ability to use eyes, general abundance of brain cells.... I seriously wonder if just eat would have accepted any responsibility if the meal caused food poisoning to someone, or if they would have just referred to their 'T's and C's'.It's quite disgusting for a company to take so much and offer so little. I have also noticed that many restaurants seem to come and go from the Just Eat site, perhaps they also offer bad service to the restaurant industry. They certainly do to their customers.

Title: Useless More Like Never Eat
Review: Down to 1*. Tried many times to order from Pret, takes ages to "not confirm", no way of cancelling even though it pretends you can. Absolutely useless.May 2020 2* Not great. Ok when it works however complete waste of time if any items are missing, don't turn up etc etc. Been fortunate enough that sometimes the business where ordered from will sort however have been times when the restaurant will not take responsibility and have referred me back to Just Eat so have got nowhere.

Title: Poor customer service
Review: Poor customer service. Waste of time and money!

Title: Order was not recieved in full and just…
Review: Order was not recieved in full and just eat apparently couldn’t help!. £12.00 out of pocket now

Title: Food not delivered to us
Review: Food not delivered to us, probably stolen. This was not the first time that happened to us with Justeat.co.uk. Do not recommend! Customer service is a joke, tells us to contact restaurant even when we tell them that the restaurant is not answering calls.

Title: Just Eat is a fraud
Review: Just Eat is a fraud. I leann my lesson and will never ever user it again. Order KFC, £19.99, order no. 936175124. The app said delivered. But I got no food. Contact Just East for help via its only option, chatbot. They gave me no refund and just said that the manager will contact me in 2 to 3 days!  I asked for proof that my food is delivered at the correct address. Here is their proof, "the driver confirmed that it is delivered at the correct address"; hence no refund. Really? But I got no food, what am I supposed to do? Just accept their "proof"?I will come to update later if I will ever get a refund. Anyone is welcome to give me advice on how to pursue things like this; I mean a real legal challenge.

Title: 4 orders attempted over 3 hours
Review: 4 orders attempted over 3 hours, charged 3 times, still no food and still no chance of getting it for another few hours yet. Unmitigated total disaster. Overpriced food and excessive delivery charges and fees. Should be shut down.

Title: Impossible to order from for 3 years  …
Review: Impossible to order from for 3 years   no card I use is accepted, new address, new card, new bank everything declined,  waste hours talking to support always say it's our payment processor we will get back to you, 3 years on and still cant order, incredible.  Avoid it's a waste of your life and energy.  Use deliveroo, or get in the kitchen and cook.

Title: Ordered a KFC.( £26 worth) Said on the…
Review: Ordered a KFC.( £26 worth) Said on the app it would be an hour. 2 hours later still no sign of it. Then 2 and a half hours later the app says it has been delivered when we’ve had F all!! Starving and fuming! Just Eat say they won’t refund as it ‘says it’s been delivered’! NOT HAPPY!! Told them to get back to me with someone who can do their job properly as I want my money back!

Title: Do not use ever
Review: Do not use ever. We placed an order and after an hour and a half we rang to find it would be another hour. We therefore cancelled our order however they still took our money. After two months of emails and phone calls we have given up on our refund.

Title: Seventh review attempt to correct…
Review: Seventh review attempt to correct names.I updated the menu items. Upon receipt of action email the owners name is mentioned wrong. Not corrected yet. This is the review number seven to let just eat know that they are holding alien name to direct emails to. Make correction, as at some point it will be another disaster by your selves.

Title: scam employer. Will take money, give no job
Review: Applied for a delivery driver job back in February while between jobs and was told there were no delivery positions available in Aberdeen. Fair enough. Registered my interest and thought nothing more of it. Received a text at the beginning of May stating they were now taking on drivers and to upload my documents so they could send for my criminal disclosure. Was told this would take a few days. Paid £5.99 for the Just Eat bag and deposited £25 into my Zego account for business insurance. Received no order confirmation. Have had no update regarding disclosure (which I know will be fine because I have already had 2 completed this year) and have no response to my emails.I am £31 out of pocket and it leaves me to wonder how many others have done the same? How many people have Just Eat contacted regarding potential jobs who have went and purchased bags only to fill the pockets of the Just Eat management who had no intention of providing jobs to any. How many city’s has this been done in? Charging people money for a service or product you have no intention of providing is theft. I fully intent on getting my money back one way or another and reporting this predatory behaviour. During a global pandemic, with a global depression on the way and when people are in a desperate position with little money to prey on those people is a disgrace.Update: got my money back after a month of nothing. Only started hearing back from them once this review was posted. Avoid!

Title: Never received my order
Review: Never received my order. Spoke to the restaurant and they said they were just too busy. Cancelled the order with justeat. Two weeks later still no refund. Just getting fobbed off when ringing them up. I will never use them again.

Title: Awful customer service
Review: Awful customer service. Still waiting on a refund for an order that went wrong, two weeks later. Avoid just eat if you value service.

Title: Terrible and rude service
Review: Decided to order a kfc from the just eat site And never recieved my order found it was delivered to the wrong address,They wont refund me the money.Customer services hung upon me three times when I finally got  speaking to someone they were very rude to me I've emailed the managing director about this and yet had no reply from anybody

Title: I wish I could give 0 stars
Review: They impose a minimum price for delivery (or at least they allow restaurants to do so) and if you're lucky you get cutlery with your food but you will never get your dips and they will always get away with it and when you ask for a refund they say it's been awarded in a form of JustEat credit which obviously is no use to anyone as you would have to spend their minimum price again and you'd probably have to complain again because THEY ARE going to forget something else in your next order.Avoid this website at all costs and do not even bother calling the restaurants they work with because they are super rude and you won't get anywhere.

Title: Never order from this app they only…
Review: Never order from this app they only worried about customers, It’s 100% bad for all restaurants We made fresh foodDelivered on timeThen customer cancelled the order for none reason  just after receiving the foodJusteat refunded customer 100% The told us unfortunately we cannot do anything! Robbery system

Title: Just eat wont refund for their mistake
Review: The driver came and did not try to call us on the intercom and left the building. and just eat is not refunding us. This is ridiculous. It is obvious in our building, every delivery person comes and dials on the intercom to call us. Why am i responsible for his lack of logic??? Never ever using this site again.

Title: Just Eat Order no – 931401519-KFC Order
Review: This Item never received and I’m totally disappointed abut this. I spoke to your customer service twice and they told me that the diver was unable to reach me.?,? I am a regular customer of your company and never ever happened this kind of situation. My phone number is fully working and the doorbell/buzzer working perfectly. All the drivers from previous just eat orders were OK to contact me and reach to my address without any issues. The colleague of your customer service team told me to contact the Gillingham branch and I tried but unable to them. The colleague of your customer service team said that THEY ARE UNABLE TO REFUND THE MONEY.This is totally unacceptable and unprofessional. I never receive the product and I would like to have my money back please.

Title: No food, no refund!!!
Review: Waited nearly 2 hours, order said delivered, went downstairs there was a delivery driver who shouted “you cancelled order” five times and drove off. The app showed the order as delivered. Just Eat won’t refund the delivery fee!!! And offered £5 account credit. what’s the point? Surely this isn’t legal?

Title: Avoid them like plague
Review: Avoid them like plague. Take away foods in London is pure crap. Better don't even imagine kitchens you order from. There is no control over hygiene and quality of food, also delivery drivers have no proper qualifications for to handle the food you eat, they are totally strangers some even evil with mental conditions...

Title: Very poor service
Review: Very poor service. Food didn’t arrive until 10pm after 6pm pre order for 19:30. Cancelled at 21pm via app for full refund. Then it arrived an hour later. Tried to contact restaurant and just eat. One has phone off the hook and just eat said ‘nothing they can do’. Asked for customer complaints process four times on the online chat and ignored.

Title: Disgusting fraudsters.
Review: Disgusting fraudsters.Order expected at 20:16. I call them at 21.00. Lady says sorry driver is 'unresponsive, we will send a 2nd driver.Get an email 20 mins later to say food has been delivered. I call back. Lady says sorry that was wrong, the driver actually refused to deliver the food as he was finishing. She organises a 3rd driver.It will be delivered at 21.49. I will call back at 21.55 to make sure you have it.I stand outside at 21.40. I call them at 22.15. Bernadette says driver said he came to door but got no answer (lies I was outside waiting).Bernadette then says as its saying delivered they weren't going to do any AND "don't even try for a refund as it has been removed from your account as you rejected the £5 voucher". Food was £14.She should be sacked and they should be shut down. They are fraudsters who have stolen my money and told me basically to get stuffed.

Title: I am disgusted by the service I…
Review: I am disgusted by the service I received from just eat. They don’t take any responsibility and just waste your time. I had a food order which made me sick and just eat kept telling me to contact the restaurant myself to try and obtain a refund. What’s the point of just eat then? So now I’ve paid for food which I can’t eat and has made me sick and just eat didn’t even offer a voucher or anything for compensation

Title: Rude customer service
Review: I placed an order through just eat for it not to turn up I spoke to a rude unhelpful lady who has just said contact the restaurant... now this wouldn’t have been an issue but myself and daughter tried numerous times for them to not answer their phone ... when I spoke to just eat customer service they said that the order had been marked as complete and been delivered LIE !!! Now just eat are represents of the restaurants they have on their site as far as I’m concerned I placed my order with just eat and paid my money to just eat so when my food doesn’t turn up I would expect the person whom I paid the money to to refund me !!! That being just eat .... this whole thing is a complete joke and waste of my money I wasn’t aware that just eat have a donate button now for individual restaurants to keep your money but not deliver!!! Last time I will use just eat !!!

Title: Indicated deliver time upto 50mins and…
Review: Indicated deliver time upto 50mins and then delivery was confirmed at 1.30mins and I had to pay half the cost of the food to cancel. No co-operation from the restaurant, they just said call just eat. After a few lengthy waits on the phone I've just decided to write this one off.

Title: Beware using your debit or credit card with Just eat
Review: Just eat arbitrarily changed my home address to one I lived in 5 years ago, this caused my ability to pay by card impossible. Having spoken and emailed Just eat about this problem, they say that it is not possible to sort out this problem, and I can only use cash. With Covid 19 prevalent, the advice given is NOT to use cash. Just eat have not been at all helpful and told me to go away. BEWARE DO NOT TRUST JUST EAT.

Title: Unbelievably bad experience
Review: Unbelievably bad experience. If the mad hatter from Alice In Wonderland ran a business it would still be less of a nightmare to deal with. My story is similar to the other reviews on here only it happened to me 2 consecutive times in the same night. (please learn from my mistakes, seems i didn't) minus 1 star.

Title: Just Eat support are happy to facilitate fraud as long as they can profit from it.
Review: Ordered from a restaurant and my food never arrived. I later found that lots of people have had the same issue with this venue. Everyday new reviews are added to say the same as mine "ordered but take away, didn't arrive, driver gave it to wrong house (everytime it's the drivers fault), now I'm waiting for a refund" unless they couldn't get in touch with restaurant and no hope of refund. This business doesn't exist in real life, the address they listed is a home address and the owner doesn't know anything about this restaurant, the contact number is a mobile number which is now disconnected, no email address and can not be located on Google, Facebook, twitter, etc.I told just eat, compiled all the evidence to inform them of this scam, they don't care, the scam company is still operating in my postal area, I can place an order with them right now and everyday new people are being scammed while just eat line their pockets with profit made from fraudulent activity. Was nothing short of a battle to get just-eat to agree to give me my money back. And only after I made it public by commenting on their Facebook page about them facilitating a scam. No apology or even gesture of goodwill for their obvious mistake in not vetting this restaurant before promoting it to their customers. I got "refund will be with you in 7 days", lovely lady but did the bare minimum with no acknowledgement of what they're doing and how inconvenient it is to lose £31 and have to chase, spam and hound them for my money back. I will never order via Just Eat again, I'll use them as a guide to restaurant menus and then call the venue directly to place my order.

Title: Order pizzas from top hut pizza and…
Review: Order pizzas from top hut pizza and chicken restaurant in 403 hither green se13 6tr through just eat on 11/05/20 at about 18 : 40 and the pizzas was to arrive at 19:25, after 7 they said the driver was on the way, 19 30 I was still waiting,  checked through my window ahout 19 35 still no sign, by then the I decided to call the restaurant and I was told that the driver had come to my place and no body, that they try calling me and texting no answers so the driver left. I ask to refund my money they said I should contact just eat, when I contacted just eat they said I can't refund me because the restaurant didn't authorise them to do so that I should wait for couple of days and call the restaurant again. I just contacted the restaurant now after 2 days they said they can't refund me because it has passed 12 hours. So my £25.68 lost and just eat is doing nothing about it. What a joke.

Title: Utterly useless!
Review: If there was an option I wouldn't even give one star. I ordered food on 18 April which was due to arrive at 8.30pm. To cut a long story short it hadn't arrived by 10pm so I went to bed. At 10.30pm I got a call to say the driver was outside with my food, needless to say I told him to go away!! I am now still waiting for the refund, even though I did online chat the following morning and had the refund confirmed. I've since had three further online chats, each have left me pulling my hair out. I have also sent several emails, all of which have been ignored. I have had to complete a debit dispute form and hand it over to my bank to deal with. My bank asked me to get an ARN number from them and they refused to provide it. I certainly won't ever be using them again and wouldn't recommend to anyone else.

Title: Just East Review System is a joke
Review: Just East Review System is a joke.  I have had terrible food on a few occasions and wanted to make this clear in a review to anyone looking at ordering.  Sometimes the food has come early or on time so ive rated that slot 4/5 star, and the food one star. But when you do this it affects the overall rating that shows, so the horrid takeaway ends up with 5 Stars!! so this is very misleading to new customers looking at reviews.  Also on a number of occasions the description ive wrote does not show, just the stars!!! I often wondered why people give one or two stars for takeaways but dont leave a description, now I know why, probably gets deleted!!!!! When this recently happened again I decided enough was enough and went to report it.  What a joke!!!!!!  Live chat customer service, didnt give me any answers just kept apologising and repeatedly asking if there was anything else they could help me with.???? They hadnt helped with ANYTHING let alone anything Else??!!!! I tried to get answers and then one agent just stopped responding but was still showing on Live Chat, I eventually ended call and tried again.  The same happened with two other agents!!!!!  Disgusting and I am currently now waiting for a phone call from a so called supervisor after I telephoned them. We all need to stick together and stop using them and ring takeaways direct, GET THEM SHUT DOWN, expecially now they have started sticking a 50p service charge on??? May not sound a lot but its a lot of 50ps for them plus the commissions and membership fees they get from the takeaways.

Title: Would never use this company again
Review: Would never use this company again, never received our order the proprietor then stalked me through Facebook and started hassling me, Just Eat were absolutely no use in resolving this

Title: Customer Service is a joke. I had to go through FOUR people for 1 problem
Review: Here is my experience with Just Eat thus far: 1) ordered food from KFC last night. Driver spent 10 minutes driving in the wrong direction. After finally making his way in my direction, he called me at 8:29 to say he was on the street over. I advised that’s not where I’m located, gave directions and waited for him to show. Tried calling him at 8:46PM but the call wouldn’t go through. (The food was supposed to be delivered at 8:08)2) 8:52 and still no show (but it was marked as delivered at 8:29) so I called just eat for a solution. Explained to the representative the issue who put me on hold and came back to say the driver has been waiting for 30 minutes. She said I have his number and can call him and basically was telling me to sort it myself. I had to beg her not to hang up on me and explain I tried calling him but the number didn’t work. She found my number in their call logs, tried to call him and realised for herself that the number wasn’t working. I asked for a refund which I received immediately and the representative also offered a £5 credit for the inconvenience caused. At this point I was satisfied with the outcome as I got my money back plus credit. 3) Decided to use the credit from last night today but when going through checkout I don’t see the option so went to online chat.  Guada Marie told me try a different browser (didn’t work). Char Louis said my account is at £0 because I used the credit already. Explained it should have been credited last night and I haven’t ordered anything since. She disappeared for a while and then exited the chat because I rated it bad (she ignored my following messages asking if I would be credited). The final person I connected to (Kristel L) realised I never got the £5 credit added to my account and rectified this for me. It seems that Customer Service at this company is to throw the first solution and get rid of you rather than to listen to what the client has to say. This review could have been avoided if people just did their job properly. I’ll be sticking to Deliveroo and Ubereats from now on.

Title: Thank you for sorting out my issue…
Review: Thank you for sorting out my issue quickly, always find you better than the alternatives and better prices for delivery too!

Title: Ordered through "Just Eat" last night
Review: Ordered through "Just Eat" last night, it took 90 mins to arrive. The Butterfly King Prawns I ordered must have flown away on route and left some rubber King Prawns in their place, even the cat turned them down. The Prawns over cooked, cold and wrong ones. The rice was cold, the banana fritters seemed to have lost the syrup on route too. When I complained to the resturant, they informed me I was entitled to a full refund but needed to take it up with "Just Eat". I did this but because I paid cash they cant issue me with a refund and it has to be the Resturant that pays the refund as they issued the bad food. They of course refused and passed me over and told me its "Just Eat" that have to pay.. Im a disabled guy of almost 60yrs and have written off my refund, bever again will I use "New Kwun Sing" or "Just Eat" again

Title: Ordered food at 6pm it's now 8:04pm
Review: Ordered food at 6pm it's now 8:04pm and still not here, tried to cancel but they won't let me, tried to ring the restaurant and they send me back to just eat!!!!! I asked for a refund and they're like just wait... Unbelievable never ever AGAIN

Title: Did not receive food and bad customer service
Review: Made an order, it did not arrive, the restaurant did not receive food back from delivery person and it took 2 hours via chat to get a refund, worse customer service I’ve experienced.

Title: Paid but no meal and no refund!!!
Review: I ordered my meal to be delivered for 7pm. By 8pm when my order never arrived I called the restaurant. They claimed to have called me and even left me a voicemail saying that it would be an extra £5.50 delivery charge if I wanted the meal, however I had no missed calls or voicemails!!! I refused to pay the extra and asked for a refund. I was told to contact Justeat directly for the refund which I did, and was told I'd be refunded within 5 to 7 working days. I contacted them again a week later and was told to wait the full 7 working days before contacting them again. I contacted them again today which is now been over 2 weeks since I made the order and they claim to not have anything on record about a refund!!!! Absolute joke of a place,,, conning and robbing company!!Stay clear if you don't want ripped off!!!

Title: Awful service
Review: Awful service, people and food!

Title: Just had tooth in my burger and chip…
Review: Just had tooth in my burger and chip white thing in my donner not happy person I’m going complain to newspapers if things don’t get sorted

Title: I paid "justeat.co.uk" for food. I got nothing in return. Not even a refund.
Review: I paid "justeat.co.uk" for food. I got nothing in return.I called the food shop the next day, and I asked for a refund. They said they made the food, and gave it to the driver who delivered it. They accused me of lying. I simply pointed out: There is CCTV on my road, around my area, in fact nearly everywhere. I could not lie about this, even if I wanted to (!) They quickly changed their story, and said: ok, the driver must have got lost and not been able to find your address. So I repeated: there is CCTV around the area that I live in, (it will show if your driver even made a delivery attempt) are you sure you are telling me the truth? Then they asked: Why did you not call to ask about the order? I replied: I called many times. I can even send you my mobile phone bill as evidence if you want to see it.Then they said: ok, well, I will make your order today, and it will arrive in 30 mins. I just asked for a refund. He kept me on the phone, and insisting that they would send the food, a day late.So I went online. I complained, and the online chat bot/customer service agent, said that a refund was not possible, since I had written a review saying that the order had been delivered. There is a big problem with that...in the review, I clearly stated in my comment that: "I paid justeat.co.uk; I got nothing in return". In fact I ticked the box which stated that "ALL items were missing in the order". I cannot believe the website tried to evade their responsibility like this. It seems like they are paying their employees to set up a total scam website! (Or at least that is my singular experience. Maybe others get their food, maybe they don't. Well on current evidence, I can only go on what happened to me, and I did not get anything). They took my money. Promised food. Then when I asked for a refund, they refuse! In any other world, isn't that theft? Or fraud? I cannot believe the food shop accused me of lying by saying I had got the food - and then handily backtracked, when I said there is almost blanket CCTV coverage of the roads. If I got the order. It will show your delivery driver in my area. If he got lost, it will show him driving around these streets.I have nothing more to say. To repeat: I donated money for free. Got nothing in return. Was falsely accused of getting the order. Refused a refund from the food maker. And was told by the website that "nothing can be done about your refund".Do I sue them? (Seems to be no point - the lawyer will cost more) Do I go the police and say that I have been fraudulently scammed out of a £24.49 order? (i.e. I paid. I got exactly zero food. I got refused a refund).Seems like I got robbed.

Title: Lost my money with Just eat - Avoid if you value your money. Rip off.
Review: Lost my money with Just eat - order did not arrive. Just eat are useless when you ask for help. Refused to refund me despite 5 online chats and 2 calls to restaurant. All agreed i didn't  get my order but still could not refund me blaming each other. Please don't pay them anything until you see your food.  The restaurant stole my money and Just Eat did nothing accept sympathize.

Title: 12 fraudulent transactions
Review: 12 fraudulent transactions on my wife’s bank card on a Sunday afternoon all within 10 minutes. She’s not a customer of theirs - never has been. Bank called to query if they are suspicious and have had to cancel card now but transactions have cleared, so need to raise a claim with the Bank.Just eat have had issues before and clearly their own fraud systems are lacking.

Title: 0 stars should be an option
Review: 0 stars should be an option. No food - no refund - refuses refund - driver smoking with food in car - driver sat I car and didn’t ring my flat buzzer and didn’t call mobile - 2 hours later after several phone calls - nothing but a stress headache

Title: Stop using just eat and buy directly from takeaway they are useless and charge you for a useless service
Review: There customer service recently is non existent, we ordered food from a takeaway who’s food is normally up to standard, however on our last order the food was heavily over cooked and the cheese on top of the Hotshot chicken parmo’s was burnt to a crisp along with the pepperoni which was also incinerated, there was also no béchamel sauce under the cheese, we complained to just eat and the advisor told us that just because the food wasn’t up to our preferred standard didn’t mean they had to refund us, we refused to accept this and threatened to take them to the evening gazette if they didn’t refund us, they then agreed a refund and credit our account, they then recalled the refund and when we complained to another agent he tried to deny that they had agreed to refund us , claiming that there was no records on the system to say a refund had been agreed, even though we had received an email confirming this, and refused to give his name so we could complain about him, his excuse was this was an invasion of his privacy ,he wouldn’t put us through to a manager, this is totally disgusting behaviour for company of this scale, if they customer service advisors are unwilling to refund us for poor service then what are they there for. This will be the last time we ever order from just eat again and we order a lot so it’s there loss I hope they fall into Administration they will soon learn the customer is the most important aspect of there business not the restaurant owner, if food isn’t up to standard why should we accept it, we are not dogs

Title: Terrible service - Horrid customer service
Review: Terrible service, Restaurant messed up my order just eat would not take liability.

Title: there is a loophole where if the…
Review: there is a loophole where if the restaurant do not tick the order as complete which not many do, they can mess with you and just eat does nothing to help you

Title: Worst customer service ever!
Review: Worst customer service ever!! Order never arrived as driver stole our food!! Was told to wait a day until they can speak to the driver to verify if he delivered it! OBVIOUSLY HE WILL SAY YES ! Justeat then told us to contact them a day after to see if we are entitled to a refund? OUR FOOD NEVER ARRIVED! OF COURSE WE SHOULD BE

Title: Rip off
Review: Did you know that they charge at least 50p per item, on top of the prices on the restaurant menu. Will NEVER use them again.

Title: Just eat as a buisness show be aware…
Review: Just eat as a buisness should be aware that You the buisness are the middle man between customer and takeaway. You take the money take a surcharge and also a percentage of the takeaways cost per meal ordered roughly 15%.However your system is flawed.these greedy takeaways not all but a high percentage accept all just eat orders even though impossible to deliver to the time and not even talking 3hrs late. The fact they dont get deliveried. Before you say anything all orders accepted and time stated for delivery on the just eat machine as you know when getting  close to final time it goes yellow then red...... however after this your system  then clears the order and sends the customer as been sent and delivered even when it hasn't. This is fraud on your part due to the system. Also you should have representatives going to all these outlets that use justeat to review their use of your buisness and if abusing it. As regardless you are as much to blame as you should be policing it... ignorance to this isnt an excuse. You should put in place to all that use your service that they can only accept a workable amount of orders. Ie no more than 25 to 30 in at any time. As I know of a takeaway had upwards of 70 plus in at one time and never delivered either on time or at all. As stated you need to sort this. Feel free to reply to me. As I'm going to take this so it goes to parliament and the authorities of trading standards. Since the lockdown as you know you have made a killing look forward to seeing the profits when published at end of the tax year in comparison to the years before.Sort this out !!!!   Surprised that this has been allowed to happen for so long

Title: Cold food arrived 20 minutes late
Review: Cold food arrived 20 minutes late. I contacted the restaurant / Just Eat, and was told that nothing can be done. The online chat advisor then left the chat, with the issue still remaining unresolved. Avoid! I expected more from this company!

Title: Appalling customer service who refuse…
Review: Appalling customer service who refuse refunds of missing food. Avoid!

Title: Dont bother
Review: Dont bother, charge for deliveries that arrive more than 1 hour late. Awful, no support from the website.

Title: My bank details where used to order food…
Review: My bank details where used order food from just eat 3 times last Sunday at 1am,rang them,got to report it to actionfraud,got a crn, told just eat ,now I don't know what happens next as they were very unclear.never had an account ever with them.

Title: I would like to give zero several…
Review: I would like to give zero several occasions of bad customer services however after this latest event we will not be using just eat app ever again, my son ordered his lunch from there, food did not arrive called restaurant who said I had to contact just eat chatted to an agent Jaycob A, who acted like a robot kept repeating himself, no resolution into what happened to the order, so no food no refund, after reading some other reviews on here  it would appear that Is a regular occurrence with their own delivery drivers that they doing nothing about.

Title: I was jerked around by customer support…
Review: I was jerked around by customer support for 3 HOURS and finally the delivery never came!I was offered a refund which I would have gotten anyway when I chargeback, so no compensation for me wasting 3 hours of my weekend. Their support did NOTHING for me!The website first showed that it's waiting for a driver to be assigned. This went on for 2 hours. Afterwards, the order was closed and marked as delivered. Another 30 minutes later, it was re-opened and marked as "Driver assigned". Success! Or so I though... I contacted them again and it turns out the website was LYING! The customer support agent had asked and was told there is actually no driver assigned so I was waiting for an order that wasn't coming.Absolutely useless, never use these degenerates, ever.

Title: Yet again website was too busy to take…
Review: Yet again website was too busy to take orders or restaurants were? I know Friday is busy but when I could phone local restaurants it was much simpler, just eat and deliveroo are just ripping people off and prices are hiked and service is useless? I will only use local restaurants in future I can phone. Wasted nearly an hour trying to get a a £70 order, restaurants beware!!!

Title: Advice to all do not use them should be…
Review: Advice to all do not use them should be called Just Eat  - Don’t Eat then say they have delivered when they clearly haven’t trying to get a refund well that’s just another story ! Be warned

Title: Order arrived 20 minutes late and was…
Review: Order arrived 20 minutes late and was the wrong order.I could not contact the restaurant as they only take voicemails.On contacting just eat they were not in the least interested so I am fighting for my refund through resolver and I advise anyone to do the same.Feels like I have been scammed by these fraudsters. Avoid at all costs !

Title: The one star review was how easy it was…
Review: The one star review was how easy it was to order the food but I would not recommend just eat to anybody!! We ordered 50 pounds worth of food to cheer our family up during this pandemic and the delivery driver sat outside athen drove off with our food after marking it as delivered, contacted the restaurant and they said the driver is working for just eat and that they cannot help ( they were very apologetic and sincere seeing as they have lost 50 pounds worth of food) just eat said they would pass it on to resolutions team who rung us this morning to say they believe the driver over us and that it was delivered and no refund would be given to us. We are absolutely gutted and disgusted as we’ve lost 50 pound and haven’t even been able to treat our family and to top it off the driver never returned the food to the restaurant so he had a free meal on us!! I will never be using just eat again, customer service was awful not apologetic or sincere in any way, just told us it was our fault that the driver couldn’t contact us via mobile so we can’t have a refund bearing in mind he didn’t even knock on the door.....AVOID AT ALL COST

Title: Order was made, never delivered, no refunds.
Review: Order was made, never delievered, then cancelled, but never refunded. Several phone calls and web chats have been made, but still no refund. Scummy company. You're better off just ordering directly from your local takeaway over the phone.

Title: Never deliver on time
Review: Never deliver on time. Seriously you need to improve your service

Title: Never ordering from justeat again
Review: Recently ordered via Justeat, the order arrived over 2 hours late.  I was informed by the restaurant after several phone calls and lies later that they never received my order via Justeat. I eventually received my order which was partly wrong. I contacted justeat directly to complain roughly 15 hours later.  Justeat chose not to reply until over 48 hours later.  I was first told that they can issue a refund once the restaurant confirm the events. However now they are stating that as it has been over 48 hours  their system will not allow a refund... Even tho it was over 48 hours when they replied to my original complaint. I was informed by the complaints team that I should review them online....Horrendous service , do not order via Justeat!

Title: Food never arrived and Just Eat won’t help
Review: Food never arrived and because the restaurant marked the order as delivered Just Eat telling me to contact the restaurant who fob me off, I paid through a Just Eat so they should issue the refund, why should I have to battle the restaurant!

Title: Lies lies lies and false promises
Ripped off - £50 for meal that went in the bin.
Review: I chose this restaurant for a family takeaway because it came at the top of the selection of local Chinese takeaways on JustEat, due to their 'reviews'.  Huge mistake!!  I should have taken time to read through the reviews elsewhere on other websites and would have seen just how awful the restaurant is.  Food arrived half an hour after the expected delivery time; it was stone cold; the portions for the main meals came in smaller-than-normal sized containers and were barely half full; tasteless and a complete waste of £50.  A lot of it went straight in the bin. The restaurant don't answer their phone.  JustEat washed their hands of the problem, with various excuses, finally saying the restaurant wouldn't approve a refund so hard luck.  They then terminated the online chat abruptly.  Really not sure of the benefit to the customer of using JustEat - pretty pointless as they deny responsibility for poor service. I will make sure that I don't use JustEat again. My one-star ratings apply to both the restaurant and JustEat.  Not many people can afford to waste £50 at the moment, but there will be many businesses seeking to profit from the current social restrictions and limitations and this is certainly an example of just that.

Title: Like others appalling service not once…
Review: Like others appalling service not once but twice. Placed an order last Thursday got a message 2 mins before delivery due to be told could not fulfil. My daughter ordered again tonight as a surprise for me after a gruelling 12 hr NHS shift it was never delivered called customer services called a liar as they had it marked as arrived on app we did manage to work out they had gone to an incorrect address on same estate. So we walked there spoke to the elderly lady who lived there she confirmed that someone had tried to deliver they but they sent them away as always getting incorrect takeaway deliveries attempting to deliver there. Rang back Just Eat who again said nothing they could do cannot contact their drivers and marked as delivered ! After a long NHS shift being told lying no food and no customer service I will never use this service and all I can say is shame on you Just Eat you clearly do not follow the quote of be kind to one another in these challenging and heartbreaking times

Title: Very bad service from Just Eat
Review: Very bad service from Just Eat. I could not get a refund on food  that never even arrived! I contacted the restaurant three times and Just Eat never made contact with them. I will no longer be using Just Eat.

Title: Shocking Fraud
Review: Shocking! 2 Fraudulent transactions in the same evening from Just Eat. I’ve called the customer service number and was basically told there is nothing they could do to help apart from contact the bank (obviously) so thanks for that.Card cancelled via the bank and super p*ssed off.

Title: Shocking service!
Review: Same as everyone else! Ordered a takeaway and it took 3hours to arrive and was stone cold when it did but Just Eat wouldn't offer refund as restaurant hadnt “marked it as complete”! This company is a joke, never will order from here again...Ola Uber Eats!!

Title: Unlike most
Review: Unlike most, i actually love the service

Title: Shocking service
Review: Shocking service, late delivery, told via web one timescale, not realistic at all. Avoid internet ordering service at all cost. Do not use. I have deleted the app.

Title: Absolutely dreadful experience
Review: Absolutely dreadful experience. Ordered on Wednesday for delivery at 6 pm on Friday. Just before 5 PM on Friday we received a notification that our order could not be filled. I will certainly not be using this company in the future.

Title: Worse meal i have ever had
Review: Worse meal i have ever had. Arrogant owner. Avoid them and just eat.

Title: Excellent work trying to keep going…
Review: Excellent work trying to keep going during the pandemic.... always resolve any issues..... always have and will continue to use ..... excellent

Title: Order didn’t turn up, no refund
Review: Paid £43 for an order which never turned up, wouldn’t refund me because the order was showing as delivered on their system, I have reported this as fraud to my back so they will be dealing with it

Title: I ordered from just eat at 6.10 & my…
Review: I ordered from just eat at 6.10 & my food turned up at 9.05 , after several phone calls to the kebab shop the food turned up 3 hrs late stone cold uneadable. When on the phone to just eat they are not helpful in the slightest i will never order from them again not one offer of any refund or part compensation an utter disgraceful service . AVOID AVOID AVOID

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service, never realised this was such a bad company till you look on here. Never again will I order from here

Title: Awful customer service when things go wrong!
Review: Awful customer service when things go wrong...Ordered meal that was more than late and the restaurant wasn’t truthful about timing so cancelled. Over 3 weeks have gone by and still no sign of refund. Contacted Just Eat via email and online chat. Despite promises to resolve on my behalf.. still waiting for a decent response and a refund. I have been a regular user of Just Eat but this has put me off for the future!

Title: Placed an order at 17:45 at 19:50…
Review: Placed an order at 17:45 at 19:50 called the restaurant asking where the food was, they said they never received my order but a few minutes later the status of my order changed to delivered, I contacted just eat asking for a refund, they said they could not give me one because the order showed as delivered, I have wasted 2 days to get back £22 with no luck...i even had a customer advisor leaving the chat in the middle of the conversation.

Title: I ordered a meal via JUST EAT which was…
Review: I ordered a meal via JUST EAT which was sent to the takeaway in Bedford, All delivered but i had problems with the meal its self, The food was disgusting, Chow mien  was dripping in grease and Vermicelli was tasteless/bland, This could not be eaten it was that bad... I contacted just eat the following night as my internet was down, They checked and stated NOTHING could be done as takeaway had not marked as DELIVERED... Well i paid just eat 29.00! And i am phoning to say about the bad food!! Hello! They had my order took my money had a ref number 909784606 and still would not do anything!! Seriously... I then phoned Tiger Lily takeaway and they said they marked as delivered, So basically JUST EAT do NOT want to help but they take your money quick enough... They refused to help so they did not have to compensate.. People be very careful when contacting them if you have a complaint, The two people i did speak with were incompetent with very poor English and reading from scripts. Dreadful customer service.The takeaway advised not to use Just eat as they are useless and would be better to order from them direct, Just shows how much they do not trust them!!I WILL NEVER ORDER AGAIN FROM SUCH AN INCOMPETENT COMPANY as JUST EAT.... Avoid at all costs.

Title: Shocking customer service
Review: Shocking customer service. Didn’t send restaurant the order. Tried to fob us off. Clearly a lot of other unhappy customers as was 99 in help chat queue - waited 25 minutes to get to chat then customer service rep just left the chat. Totally disinterested in their customers .

Title: I’m absolutely disgusting how just eat…
Review: I’m absolutely disgusting how just eat have taken the word of a subway who was meant to deliver £23 worth of food to me and never showed up. I order off just eat all the time, literally most nights (yes I know fat for life!) but if this is how they treat their customers I’ll definitely be using a different delivery app from now on!

Title: Terrible
Review: Terrible - no one can help...its always "another team".

Title: Atrocious service...
Review: Atrocious service, useless and robotic customer service. Food was delivered 4-5 hours late on valentine's day. It took me 3 months and endless hassle, unkept promises and back and forth to get my money back and they even gave me a £10 voucher for my troubles. It was painful.Ordered again using the voucher today, the food was 1 hour late, again. Spoke to family members who complained of the same thing.

Title: Zero stars if I could
Review: Zero stars if I could! Rude customer service and refuse to help you in the event that you’re food doesn’t arrive!

Title: Just Eat
Review: Just Eat, should be Just a waste of time and money.Should be banned and prosecuted

Title: App sucks and you can’t get a refund if it’s marked as “delivered”
Review: I’ve lost out on about £50 now because of JustEat. First time was because the app for some reason didn’t tell the restaurant what my mobile number is even though I updated it. And the restaurant had to phone JustEat to get my number. Order came but an hour late and obviously cold.All the other times the order was either late or doesn’t show up. But for some reason, the order always gets marked as “delivered” on my app. I’m not sure is this just automatic from the app, the delivery driver marks it as such because he is either lying or thinks he delivered to the right place when they didn’t. Some restaurants are nice and they believe me when I say it hasn’t arrive and send out another one. Some say they can’t do anything and ask JustEat for a refund. And I’ve NEVER gotten a refund. Reason being because the order is mark as “delivered” on the app. And they say that’s the process and they can’t do anything about it. So long story short, it’s as easy as that for a company to get away with robbing you and not giving you an refund  because the order is just marked as “delivered” when it isn’t.

Title: Worst customer service I have ever seen…
Review: Worst customer service I have ever seen - I could have gotten as useful help from my pet gecko and not wasted hours.Somehow their terrible system has multiplied my account so I'm told I have 3 accounts with the same email address. They suggest I login and delete the accounts myself. Except their system doesn't let me login because it has given me 3 accounts with the same email address. We're a week in to this conversation and we've gone round 4-5 times now that I'm not able to login as they tell me to login. I'd have put the thing behind me and never used them again, but I've got a £20 gift card on there and I can't stand the idea of them benefitting from being so useless.

Title: Placed 2 orders both cancelled site…
Review: Placed 2 orders both cancelled site should be closed down as not fit for purpose. PRE ORDERS NOT EVEN WORKING

Title: No help at all
Review: Great if the restaurant is OK but no help at all when there is an issue. Sam's chicken charged me for an order but never delivered it, I tried calling but they would not answer and they later refused my refund request. I tried to get help from just eat and they were completely useless.

Title: I ordered food on 10/04/2020 at 19:30…
Review: I ordered food on 10/04/2020 at 19:30 hrs from JUST EAT. I got a message from just eat that the food will be delivered at 20:04. At 20:14 I still did not receive my food and I got the message that it has been delivered. I called the customer care and the person was VERY unhelpful and said mam the delivery is been done. I asked her to get in touch with the delivery person because clearly he has delivered to a wrong address. On this she said I have very limited access and cant get in touch with the driver. She then said that a supervisor will call me in 24 hours to solve this matter. Well, I never got a call, neither I got my Food or my money back. Extremely poor service. They are clearly lying.

Title: I’m not satisfied
Review: I’m not satisfiedFood has been delivered on the wrong address and I called just eat immediately to correct the address The agent didn’t help at all . The way agent was talking if he didn’t know anything how to use his own systemGiving me excuses to call restaurant and wasted my 20mins .guiding me wrongly. And the time I get back to the restaurant again .The food was already delivered to the wrong addressI lost my £16 and I didn’t even get the food.

Title: Justterrible
Review: Tried to order through their app for a takeaway that was opening later. The app failed to take payment and said "try again" (I really wish I had taken screenshots). I tried two more times and both times failed. In the meantime, I found out that the local takeaway had their own app, so I ordered through it.Skip forward two hours and I received 3 emails from justeat, two to say that the order was cancelled/not placed and one to say that the order was "on its way". The app had told me that the order had failed on all 3 attempts. Therefore to stop getting two deliveries, I cancelled through the justeat app and was charged half the order cost. I contacted their customer (lack of) support, and was told there was no fault in their system and because I cancelled the order, that was that.End of the story and end of me using justeat.

Title: Terrible service from both Vindaloo…
Review: Terrible service from both Vindaloo takeaway Liverpool and just eat.Ordered food with a delivery time of 19.30 by 19.51 still not arrived so rang the Takeaway and was told it still hadn’t left. Tried to cancel on just eat app but it had been marked as delivered So could not cancel.When food did arrive was absolutely disgusting. Rang the takeaway and was offered another order later in the evening as they were really busy.Declined the offer as the food was that bad it wouldn’t of been eaten.Rang just eat, spoke to a lady called Nic.She rang the takeaway and said the was nothing wrong with the food and nothing they could do.Have only ever used just eat, never again though as not interested in helping the customer one bit.Plenty more delivery companies out ther.

Title: This happened a long time ago but...
Review: This happened a long time ago but I recently read in their complaints section that you should submit a review and they will deal with negative experiences because they read all reviews. Except one I submitted ages ago because I got food poisoning from an order and missed two days of work due to the terrible quality of the order.I feel it is important to share this information despite how this happened a long time ago because it is outright lies.

Title: All hat, No cattle.
Review: Paid for a order  that didn’t come .

Title: No refunds for failed deliveries
Review: I spent £15 on an order which was never delivered. I left a poor review and tried to contact the restaurant. I had no response and this is after using them for years. Justeat rectified two issues on previous orders in last few years so I contacted them. This time they were useless. They said the restaurant told them it was delivered and I should call the restaurant. I told them I already tried to make contact with the restaurant. Since then, Justeat have not responded. Even though it’s Justeats website your using, they push the blame onto the restaurants and the restaurants blame Justeat so your caught in the middle until you give up. Think of how much money Justeat could make getting away with this. I’m only one guy but say this happens to 100 people a week, that’s £1,500 profit Justeat/restaurants are making for nothing. With millions of customers, who knows how much could be scammed off folk.

Title: I ordered a meal via Just Eat from Papa…
Review: I ordered a meal via Just Eat from Papa Johns in Newark costing c £26 on 27/3/20.  The meal never arrived although the Just Eat system says it was delivered and I've spent several days being shunted from the restaurant to the customer services teams of both Just Eat and Papa Johns, all of whom push the blame onto each other.  It's just not worth putting more effort into trying to get my money back.  What I resent most is that Just Eat take your money before food is delivered and have no secure system for confirming delivery, which is just wrong.  Don't use Just Eat or Papa Johns, it's not worth the risk.

Title: How rude can a company be. Disgrace on the whole company!!
Review: (Firstly this began with a resturant who was to busy to fully completed orders, they decieded to mess us about. Then comes the rude and disgraceful company JUST EAT)What an actual joke. Waited for 2 and half hours for an update on our food, which then was marked as "Delivered" on the app, even though when we rang up, they hadn't even cooked the food yet. When asked if we could cancel and get our money back, we were told that becasue they had marked as "Delievered" that we would have to speak to Just Eat. Spoke to Just Eat who said that we would have to speak to the resturant . However during our "Chat" with a Just Eat representative, we were rudly told that because the food was marked "Delivered" that they couldnt process a refund. When commenting that we found that it was unaccepatable and wanted to take this complaint further, we were rudly cut off from the chat, without the ability to save the transcript. From now on, we shall not be using Just Eat, and be using other means for receiving Takeaways. Considering the currnet times with COVID-19, with the main reason for using Just Eat was to order food that we otherwise cannot go out and collect or buy.If I could put less than 1 Star I would.

Title: Food came late cold and burnt.
Review: Food came late cold and burnt..  just eat said they couldn't do anything!!

Title: Joke of a company
Review: Joke of a company. Food not delivered. Order marked as complete by restaurant so just eat won't refund my money. Will be avoiding just eat from now on and will be using restaurants direct or deliveroo or other competitors

Title: Terrible
Review: Just Eat have got to be one of the worst companies I have dealt with. The customer service agents talk in a robotic type way and don’t listen to your concerns. The service is diabolical. I will not be using them again and will give other companies a go such as Uber Eats and Deliveroo. The service charges and minimum spends are also ridiculous. My advice to anyone is stay away. I can’t see them lasting much longer if things aren’t improved.

Title: Do not use
Review: Do not use. I order yesterday food took 3 hrs 15mins to come. I did phone restaurant at 2 hours to say cancelBut they said they refund (excellent) but when I phone them about refund say talk to just eatJust eat then says restaurant will not refund as they were busyGoing to raise money claim online so I will get my money eventually but what a load hassle

Title: Awful company to deal with
Review: Awful company to deal with, they remove negative reviews of restaurants, do not investigate health and safety issues in relation to restaurants kn their platform, they also make it extremely difficult to gain any sort of refund even when orders not complete. Avoid!

Title: Broken service...dont use
Review: Broken service.... Ordered food at 7.45...its now 11.10...delivery time keeps changing.. Restaurant not interested..not holding out hope of receiving food now. Can't cancel... This is a flawed service. No doubt... Will never use again... Not hopeful of getting my £25 back either based on other reviews

Title: Do not use these guys
Review: Do not use these guys.  I think they're about to go under in 2020 because they have been surpassed by Deliveroo & UberEats.  I used to use them all the time to order my takeaways but my last two orders have not been delivered and i have been charged for both with no refund in sight. Their scam is to take your order, pretend to deliver it, say it has been delivered then it is up to you to chase them for a refund.  Once you chase them, they say to contact the restaurant for a refund.  If pressed further they say they will give you a refund but they don't give it to you.  Don't waste your time, just go straight to your bank and say the charge is fraudulent, the bank will do the foot work for you.

Title: Appalling - AVOID
Review: As others, if I could give zero stars I would. Ordered 3 hours ago, yet to receive anything. Tried to cancel by calling the restaurant (no answer), through the app (you can’t) and by calling (30 mins on hold). Delivery time keeps increasing. Got told the food was here (it still hasn’t been delivered) and I can only get a 50% refund despite having paid for food that hasn’t turned up. Got called by a Scottish number (live in Leeds), presumably the ‘deliverer’- no one on the line, no answer when you call back, no voicemail left. And no one here to deliver food! I have to hope someone calls me tomorrow to resolve this. Really glad I used them for my NHS discount. What a joke. Don’t ever bother. I’ll try and cancel through my credit card for items never received - surely illegal? I think just eat needs to be held to account. It’s appalling they are allowed to operate and take people’s money without delivering their goods.

Title: Save yourself the annoyance
Review: So ordered some food thru this app was told 1hour had to wait three sphinx Glengormley Newtownabbey tried to contact the app but as usual had to talk to s bot first time ever used the app wouldn’t use it again just go pick up your food yourself save yourself the annoyance they lie clearly soo will delete my my account and app and not use it again don’t want to wait three hrs on a fish supper oh ordered curry and sent mayonnaise got order wrong to and haven’t had common decency to even contact me pathetic🙄🙄

Title: Useless, unreliable and rubbish
Review: Ordered three hours ago. Still nothing. They want Fifty percent of the bill to cancel. This is exploitation at its worst. Shockingly bad service even in these challenging times. Never, ever, again!

Title: If I could rate it'd be zero
Review: They steal your money and don't bring food! If I could rate it'd be zero. Is absolutely appalling, I ordered a meal from The restaurant turned up with a 1 burger then wanted me to pay £13.60 for one burger. Told him I didn't want it to take it back. Called just eat they didn't bother at all I had to ring around the burger King to get told my order is now canceled so I ended up with no food and £13.60 down. I've called Just eat for a refund 2 weeks ago and just keep getting told the money will be in the bank. Called again to today to get told money still isn't in the bank to wait another 5-7 days its already been 2 weeks. Just eat has gone down hill won't be ordering from them again there attitude stinks.

Title: Don't bother using just eat
Review: Don't bother using just eat. Ordered food 3 hours later still didn't deliver but marked order as delivered so nothing I could do. Rang just eat the lady said she had called the restaurant and they said delivery is a bit late. Restaurant isnt answering the phone when I ring. Now the next day and still can't get hold of just eat. So basically they've took just short of £20 from my bank and not delivered the food and not given refund.........

Title: Get your act together
Review: Ordered a pizza with salami and olives, received a pizza with salami and ham. Called Basilico who said I had to call Just Eat. Just eat was closed. Do not order food from Just Eat food that arrives after 7-45. You will be stuck with whatever you receive.

Title: Terrible
Review: Terrible. Didn't deliver food and stole my money. Can't get through to so called customer services after they lied on the first call and said they would call back. They have restaurants listed as open when they are shut. In future I will use other services.

Title: Third place. Frank well. Shrewsbury
Review: Just ordered an Indian meal from third place in Frank Well. Shrewsbury. It was 30 mins late. When it came it was stone cold. All of it. The meal was full of water which was swilling around the plate. I rang the restaurant straight away and was told they will knock a bit off next time. Sorry but they were busy and short on drivers. I'm disgusted as this is a real treat for us and it cost over £30.00.very bad customer service. I can not afford to do this again and certainly will not be ordering there again. Please eat else where.

Title: JUST EAT.. just NOT BOTHERED
Review: Justeat ..NOT BOTHERED My daughter has just placed as order with JUST EAT, waited 43 for the delivery  to come from Georges Fish Bar Enfield, once it got here not only was it luke warm but minus my grandsons chicken burger, we tried numerous time to call the fish bar but no one was picking up, so we called just eat,she spoke to an american guy, whose attitude was we will refund the cost of the burger and just leave a bad review, this was a £30, order,meaning that my grandson now had to sit and watch us all eat, as his hadn't turned up,JUST EAT COULDN'T, WOULDN'T AND DIDN'T WANT TO KNOW, even when he kept telling her to hold on on the phone,and he will be right back it was her that had the cost of the phone cal,l her that was hanging on, he son that was left with no dinner,We are now going to try UBER EATS, AS MAYBE THEY CARE MORE ABOUT CUSTOMER SERVICE THAN THE MONEY SIDE OF IT,.Down to this experience just eat have now lost 3 private accounts and 1 work account , really do hope the price of a chicken burger was worth it to you

Title: Dirty thieves that’s all just eat is.
Review: Dirty thieves that’s all this company is,I order last fri from east end tandoori in paisley two large hoagies and Delivery  was about an hr in waiting,so after waiting my hr and extra twenty min called the takeaway shop and was told order was there but wouldn’t b leaving shop till another half hr or as soon as,explained it was already late by now half hr and to cancel,was told that was done,LIARS,try didn’t cancel my order.instaed decided to mark it on rip off just eat,sorry just eat app as delivered.LIARS.called to get my refund and was told they couldn’t get a hold of the restaurant and basically calling me a liar,ie no refund.PLZ PLZ PLZ DONT USE EITHER JUST EAT OR EAST END TANDOORI IN PAISLEY BOTH LIARS AND CHEATS.

Title: Ordered food that was supposed to…
Review: Ordered food that was supposed to arrive by 8:20pm.  At 8:30pm I asked for an updated using the app and it said it would be another hour.  Food never arrived but the app claimed it was delivered.  Could not get through to restaurant or to justeat.  No response to email.  Live chat claimed that they could not do anything because it had been over 48 hours, despite me email within 12 hours.  Told me to contact restaurant despite me repeatedly explaining that restaurant is not contactable.

Title: Stay far away
Review: I can't believe the sheer incompetence of the chat support people here at Just Eat. They would honestly be better off hiring goldfish to do this job. The agents cannot remember something they told you 5 minutes ago. You fight for hours to get a refund and then leave thinking the issue is solved but nothing happens, you return back to chat to ask where your refund is and again for HOURS you get nothing but "I'm sorry there is no record of anyone offering you a refund." You can give screenshots, chat references, forward emails and they still don't believe you. UTTER JOKE. Don't waste your time, go work, do online surveys or something and you would earn more money than the cost of your order in the time it takes to get a refund from here. Literally takes DAYS of fighting.

Title: Took money for oder that never was…
Review: Took money for oder that never was never accepted ..just excuse to take peoples money ...now my banks at fault they say because it's taking 5 days already. Still no refund ..lost my custom

Title: Poor customer service. I will NEVER order again!!! Shame
Review: How do you treat  your customers is really unprofessional!!!Do you have policy for the restaurants? For example, I ordered and they delivered to a wrong address!!   Practically they’ve stolen my money!!!And you, just eat, do nothing!ShameI will delete the app from my phone*the restaurants robbed us ( BBQ express wanstead) do not order from them!!!!!!

Title: Bit concerned over the supposedly…
Review: Bit concerned over the supposedly contactless delivery! Pizza places have got it right, but 2 just eat deliveries have both insisted on passing the food hand to hand, this has to stop!!!

Title: No Delivery, No refund.
Review: Restaurant marked order as delivered but never received. Just eat refusing to answer emails and when I got through last night, the guy on the phone said ‘we can’t do anything because they marked it as delivered and the restaurant won’t answer’. This is essentially theft under CRA 2015 - I will be exploring with trading standards.

Title: Shocking Service
Review: I was refunded £3 after waiting 3 hours for food that cost over £25 was stone cold, soggy and went straight in the bin. Restaurant and Just Eat not answering calls - they shouldn't be operating  if they cant provide a proper service!!!  Feel robbed!

Title: Never ordering drom JustEat again!
Review: Never ordering drom JustEat again!! I would avoid JustEat at all costs at the moment especially during the COVID-19 crisis. Made an order was told it would arrive 50 minutes later which didn’t happen, tried calling restaurant busy, tried calling JustEat nothing,I cancel using their poor chatbot but even that is useless just like the company itself, I thought my order would never arrive  so decided to eat something else, I get a notification two hours after I placed my order saying my order is late then order turns up 30 minutes later (2h30 after placing my order), I turn it away, try to call JustEat to get a refund, their poor call centre in the middle of I don’t know where basically spend 20 patronizing me And stating that I have every right to be frustrated but they won’t give me a refund, they then have the audacity to tell me to call the restaurant which I did and the restaurant (O-Burger, which I also suggest you AVOID) call me a liar. I AM NEVER USING JUSTEAT AGAIN IN MY LIFE - hello Deliveroo and UberEats, AVOID JUSTEAT they are a bunch of thieves

Title: Oreded at 6:10 pm and told would arrive…
Review: Oreded at 6:10 pm and told would arrive at 7:10 pm then changed to 7:40pm, now 21:02pm still not here but now saying delivered... No answer at either restaurant or just eat.. Shocking!!! Please avoid...

Title: We were well and truly robbed for…
Review: We were well and truly robbed for £25.50 last night from Just Eat. After 1.5 hours waiting the app stated it had been delivered but of course it hadn't.Couldn't get through last night so lobbed some goujons in the oven instead and accepted defeat.Mrs called them up today after waiting a long long time. Managed to get through to a lady who was clearly in a call centre in the middle of who knows.According to her, she called Antalya Kebab house in Blackfen, apparently the order was manually collected and they cannot do anything for us.
