Very angry, how can they keep getting away with it. NO customer service.VIAL, THEFT, I feel sorry for some people that cannot afford to lose this money. SORT IT OUT - It's not fair. 0 stars

Title: Just "Wait"
Review: This evening just eat has taken my money and not delivered the food. They have not responded to my calls or messages after hours of attempts. I spoke to the restaurant and the food was ready but just eat delivery drivers have not turned up this evening. However despite this Just eat instead notified me stating the food has been delivered. Surely this is both fraud and theft?

Title: Restaurant were truly amazing
Review: Restaurant were truly amazing! Their first night doing deliveries and the driver doesn't show up, the just eat driver drove past our house and pretended to deliver, we watched him.Then the restaurant called to say he hadn't shown up. Tried calling just est 3 times tonight, couldn't get to speak to an actual human being. The restaurant owner came and delivered the food himself on his way home and it was amazing...truly appalled by just eat, amazed by the service we got from the restaurant. Once lockdown is over we will be in for a sit down meal

Title: Do not use this company to order food…
Review: Do not use this company to order food under ANY circumstances.Food never arrived despite paying for it and no customer service contactable. Tried calling the restaurant multiple times, they just didn't pick up.If I didn't turn up to carry out work for someone that had paid me for it, I would be a thief. Exactly what Just Eat are. Crooks.

Title: delivery driver Facebook messaging me!
Review: In February after receiving my delivery, the Uber eats delivery driver began messaging me via Facebook. Now how did he find me? I messaged back being polite and then it continued. I told him that this should not be happening due to GPDR. Now after a month he has messaged me again saying hey. This is strange and out of order. Not sure how I complain about this driver, but it’s just not on.

Title: Just eat - beyond terrible
Review: Second time in three attempts - food never arrive and the person on the phone kept insisting the food has been delivered.I had to order food through deliveroo and my guests waited 3 hours. Spoilt our whole evening.Then they said they could refund plus compensate (and the latter never happened).Disgusting and don't know how they can get away with this.

Title: Threatened for requesting a refund.
Review: Received stone cold food from Sweet Dreams Desserts in Bearwood. Recieved nothing but abuse from staff after calling to report this. Went to the store and was physically threatened by the thuggish owner and two other men that accompanied him. Whilst there I observed food being delivered that had fallen on the floor and staff cross contaminating food as they were on their phones in the food prep area. Just eat refuse to remove this company from their service.

Title: Didn't recive my order, ROBBERS
Review: Didn't recive my order,phoned the restaurant up twice. They said to contact just eat,they said the driver come to my house he pgoned me and messaged me (definatly didn't) and they wont refund me. Never again will i ise just eat

Title: I ordered just eat last week and I paid…
Review: I ordered just eat last week and I paid for my takeaway on the day and the money went out my account , yesterday I looked at my bank and they had took the same amount out again! And they won’t even try to resolve it. Never use this service.

Title: Thieves!!!
Review: JustEat are thieves! I ordered food that was never delivered, but has been marked as delivered by them. After calling them 3 times (and being hung up on twice), apparently the best they could offer me was 50% refund!So I've ended up with no food and apparently I still pay 50% for it. I'm doubtful that they will even bother to refund the 50%Will NEVER use this company again!!The customer service is rude, they basically call you a liar!Yeah I'm really likely to waste my time calling up 3 times in a row to get less than £15 back - I'm calling for a reason, because the goods ordered were not delivered hence I am not liable to pay.Absolutely disgraceful behaviour from this "company"

Title: JUST FRAUDS, CROOKS AND LIARS!
Review: Worst company ever and appalling customer service. So unprofessional. The attitude of the staff is disgusting and they are pig ignorant. Talking over me when I'm trying to explain my problem and just making grunting noises down the phone. I phoned three days running and raised a case each time. They just keep fobbing you off with excuse after excuse. I even had to phone the pizza shop that I didn't receive my order from myself. Pizza go go, London.The told me that they never received my order but just eat apparently contacted pizza go go and were told that the food was delivered. I even have a recorded phonecall with the pizza shop admitting that the order was never received and the food was not sent out or delivered.I Was promised a phonecall within 24hrs from a supervisor at just eat (Another lie) phoned just eat again repeating myself over and over going around in circles. Seems this is a tactic they use and is what they want and hope you'll eventually give up. I will ring them 10 times a day until I get my money back! I've threatened then with court action and reporting this as fraud to the police and bank. I'll get my money back!

Title: Terrible!
Review: Terrible. Simply terrible.We wanted to have food eat in tonight, made an order around 9 PM, all was good. 1 hour and half past, no signs of our food, no call, no delivery, no nothing.We went to check for an update on the website, and guess what? It said - Delivered!We called the restaurant, they said that they gave the food to Just Eat delivery just around one hour ago!We called Just Eat and they say that all is delivered and to process a refund we will have to wait 24 hours for upper management to investigate and approve!Obviously they have no way of tracking their delivery boys who do not have to check in in terms of where they deliver food, or to whom! They did not even bother to call us to double-check, they just marked it as delivered!And here we are, at 11PM with no food and no money!Please, do not use this service and consider Uber Eats! They have a great tracking and rating platform for both delivery personnel and the customers!Extremely upset and disappointed with this service, will never use it again!These cases should be dealt with instantly and not in 24 hours, and if you cannot afford that make sure that you train your staff properly to ensure that such non-Deliveries do not happen as it will cost your business both reputation and money!

Title: OMG BAD Customer service
Review: OMG BAD Customer servicePlaced order with OMG 29/2/2020 through just eats. Order came to wrong delivery entrance. Ordered multiple orders no bags no cup holder's, order ended up on the floor because everything was piled high! OMG have the worst customer service refused to do anything told us to call just eats for refund. Just eats told us to call OMG etc..Still no answer to our complaint. Do not use them. Just eats using really bad couriers they are just as bad..I have put this review on Tripadvisor

Title: Restaurants should stop using them
Review: Restaurants should stop using them. They don’t seem to have drivers. I ordered a birthday meal for husband who is away in the morning to be delivered in the evening . It didn’t get delivered. Restaurant said it was because they had no driver. They had plenty time to Organise

Title: Not even worth one star
Review: Not even worth one star, ordered £80 worth of food never arrived complained to customer service but was told they had proof it was delivered by looking at the delivery person’s location on their map and said it was delivered there was no way of me proving that it never got delivered and was told will not be investigated further and will not be getting a refund. Now I have to open a dispute with the bank to get my money back.I deleted the app customers are not protected and justeat need to look into this, delivery drivers are defrauding customers and can’t be trusted.

Title: Food arrived 40 minutes later than the…
Review: Food arrived 40 minutes later than the estimate and cold. I had called the restaurant who confirmed it had gone out at the appropriate time so I can't blame them. Also hot food and cold food were kept in the same bag/carrier when the driver delivered, so no shock that it was all cold.

Title: Justeat fraud
Review: We ordered from Abshar Persian restaurant in south Croydon... £29 of food (two meals, and some fresh bread) but only the fresh bread was delivered (£1.70). The delivery driver laughed it off and said it must be the restaurant. We called Just Eat and were offered a £20 refund for the missing £27 of foodWe called just eat and spent an hour on the phone trying to resolve the issue. Just eat refused to share the name of the delivery company, or their company number, or the company number of just eat

Title: Avoid at all costs!
Review: Ordered food with just eat. We ordered 2 meals & 2 drinks. Delivery was a tad late but nothing that overly concerned me. Driver brought drinks but no food. After asking him several times where my food was he just waved his hands in the air and left. I called the restaurant, they explained that they led asked the driver to wait 2 mins for our food, he didn’t. The restaurant called just eat and they explained that they couldn’t redeliver until we called up just eat. I called up just eat to be held on hold for 20 minutes. When someone finally picked up, I was informed that they are unable to redeliver. She informed me that I could have half a refund or I could speak to a manager within the next 24 hours. I couldn’t have both. After getting nowhere, we agreed to collect our food. Kinda defies the point of ordering in but hey, we were starving! So 2 & half hours later we were able to sit down & eat our dinner that was made 2 hours prior. Lovely. It would have been easier to have cooked! I will never ever use just eat again & I would warn everyone to avoid this company at all costs!

Title: Appalling behaviour by Just Eat
Review: I ordered a curry via Just Eat- the restaurant did not deliver the food so I had to go myself to collect it ( I paid £1.50 for deliver). The meal was vile.  Only the rice was edible. I complained to Just Eat. They claimed it was between me and restaurant. I am appalled and will NEVER use these scammers again!

Title: The worst company I have ever usedWorst company ever
Review: The worst company I have ever used, twice we have ordered from just eat and our food did not arrive.The first time the driver picked the food up and then turned off his gps tracker and just disappeared, two long hours later and many of frustrating arguments with just eat they returned my money as the driver had just disappeared and was not answering his phone.Two successful order later we then ordered again and this time the driver must have delivered to the wrong house as our food never arrived we called just eat to the worst customer service ever in history, they kept saying the food had been delivered I asked to speak to a manager to be told no. I have know raised a so called ticket with them to try and get my £50 back for the food I never received and made a complaint. Worst company ever do not use just eat

Title: Was offered a £1.50 shy refund to my…
Review: Was offered a £1.50 shy refund to my card due to service charges, accepted out of pure frustration.They gave me account credit rather than my money back.Robbed me and bank can't help. Liars.

Title: It's been 2 hours since I place my…
Review: It's been 2 hours since I place my order, have been on the phone to just eat twice, still have not received order.

Title: It might as well not exist.
Review: JustEat's customer service, compared to UberEats and deliveroo, is way below par. One of the benefits of ordering through an intermediary is that they should help resolve your issues, which they don't. I've often been told that I have to call the restaurant to resolve the matter with them. If orders are wrong or you are not satisfied,  all they suggest is to write a review. The quality of my food from a particular restaurant once was so poor that I had to throw it away, I requested a refund. Because the restaurant "didn't agree" with my view (no s...) I was refused this.Not even worth contacting them!

Title: A complete joke
Review: A complete joke! Order never turned up, I rang customer services who told me to call the restaurant, they restaurant said “I don’t have time for this” and hung up, I rang just eat and they told me to ring the restaurant even though I explain what happened, I raised a complaint and was told I’d have a call back in 24 hours.  No call 25 hours later I rang back and went through it all again, this went on for 4 days, still no call call back, still no money back, 5 tickets raised!

Title: I ordered burger king and driver did…
Review: I ordered burger king and driver did not deliver food to my door and he put delivered but recieved no food or refund. Am disgusted with this company and should be shut down. I will be going to watchdog and take this company down.

Title: Worst customer service in history…
Review: Worst customer service in the history of a company, it is just non-existent. There are multiple restaurants in my area that don't deliver food - straight up money robbery. They have been on Just-Eat for months now and have not been policed. Never got my refund or phone back that just-eat promised, ofc.

Title: People do not order with Just Eat
Review: People, do not order from Just Eat. I received someone else’s order and they offered me £20 refund. My order was £25.38!!!! They said £20 was most they could give me. I then had to DRIVE to the restaurant to pick up my order. Customer service - what customer service!!!!

Title: Complete joke DO NOT ORDER
Review: Complete jokeOrdered food from kfc, driver didn't bother to call me and say they "delivered" it. Called them, did not give money or food. Complete useless joke. DO NOT ORDER WITH THEM. YOU WILL LOSE MONEY

Title: Ordered kfc and they kept changing the…
Review: Ordered kfc and they kept changing the delivery time.After waiting nearly an hour and half for the food,we discovered it was completely the wrong order for someone else.The delivery driver had sped off,we couldn't get through to kfc and after being on hold for ten minutes to just eat,we were told we couldn't have a full refund,they only refund part of the order cost.Absolutely disgusting,you order in good faith,keep getting messed about,then wrong order,not our fault,but they still keep some of the money for a completely terrible service.do not use just eat.

Title: Pathetic
Review: Pathetic, ordered KFC driver delivered to wrong address, didn't call me. No compensation even though it was the drivers fault. No refund and free reoder. Just lost my money. Joke. Won't be using it again.

Title: Very bad!
Review: I have always liked using just eat so have ordered with the plenty of time But I can not believe the disgusting attitude I received tonight, the driver called me up 10 minutes before going to pick up my order from burger king to ask he to text him my address and post as it would be quicker then looking on the system or the ticket, in which I texted him the details(my own fault I put the wrong post code) but saying that he got to our a area but the wrong side of where our block of flats were, so are we could see him on the tracker we decided to give him a call to tell him that he was on the wrong side and included in telling him the right post code, he told me he couldn't speak much english( which I 100% have no problem with as we can direct him) but he was very rude on the phone when we were directing him the right way, saying I don't understand I don't understand which we kept telling him but he was not listening and just frankly being rude, he told me he couldn't find my address on Google maps with the new post code I had given him but funny enough I could find it on my phone, weird maybe my phone is magic and then when I told him I could find it, he hung up on me and took our food with him.I rung customer service and I was put on hold for 20 minutes, to then be taken off hold as they couldn't get in touch with the delivery team, so there was nothing they could do at this time.I said that was stupid and that I wanted to speak to the manager or the supervisor but typical they were unavailable because they were dealing with call backs from yesturday. And that they would call back as soon as possible.We were very hungry with no food while waiting on people that didn't know what they were doing.Finally they gave us a call back 20mins later/luckily it wasn't the next day to say they got in touch and yes the driver didn't delivery you order(like if I would like phone up and give them attitude if i had my food sitting in front of me!)They said they will be giving me a refund and £5 credit for good gesture Never again will we be using just eat.Very rude And no food!

Title: Literally a Shambles and charged 5.60 to cancel my order
Review: Literally an absolute JOKE.. Take away chicken ordered with a 90 minute wait, it’s 1 mile away, the restaurant. Called them and they said at the moment they have no delivery driver because he’s broken down and will be over and hour, ON TOP OF THE 90 minutes. Called Just Eat to be told that if i wanted to cancel I’d have to pay half of the bill, EVEN THOUGH ITS NOT MY FAULT. Angry isn’t a word to describe this at just eat, and the restaurant. How dare you charge people for this service! I genuinely believe just eat will Go under now there’s a charge toCancel your order, even though it’s not the customers fault. Absolute robbery and a shambles! Disgrace! FYI, your patched through to a random place in the Far East as well when speaking to the clownage at customer service.

Title: 0 stars! Do not order you might not receive your food
Review: I was waiting over 2 hours for a Burger King order that cost me £23 and never turned up we were all starving hungry so I walked to my local kebab shop! Will NEVER be using just eat again because of this occasion, had previously used them and was always pleased with the service received but on this occasion their customer service was shocking it took me ages on hold on the phone to ask where my food was and they still couldn’t tell me. I got a refund but am most disappointed just eat will not be getting my custom in future

Title: Charging for cancelled orders when I had no choice
Review: Ordered at 7.20 with a delivery time of 8.15, still no sign of a driver being assigned at 8.20 so called customer service. 15/20 mins they tell me so I decide to wait. 20 mins passes, call back, it'll be 20 mins they say. That would make the food a total of 55 mins late. They'll offer me a £5 credit as a goodwill gesture. I decide to cancel, they're charging me £10 😳. £10 charge to wait 2 hours for food, 2 long telephone calls where I've ended up majorly frustrated, and no food. Surely that's illegal? Furthermore have been chasing them on Twitter since last night but being ignored. I've had issues before but they have always been quite good at dealing with them. Not this time.

Title: Advertised a takeway on their site as…
Review: Advertised a takeway on their site as free delivery and was charged delivery and a "service charge". Just eat said it was the restaurant but spoke to the restaurant and that isnt the case. Just eat are misleading people and whilst the monetary value was small, i contacted watchdog as they are misleading customers so times that by the number of people i suspect are being conned and just eat are profiting nicely i suspect.Just eat - dont state "free delivery, no minimum order" if what this actually means is delivery is free over £40 and 50p service charge will be added. Last time i use just eat.. find what you want and call the restaurant directly! Really hope watchdog pick this up as their customer service is disgusting!

Title: Order a hour late and incorrect.
Review: Order a hour late and incorrect.. cob cottage btw .. receipt correct so wasn’t mixed up on order .. made contact with just eat and was told 5-7 days to return money to account.. but if I’d have activated the missing order it would have been replaced straight away... very poor and app deleted 👌

Title: what a load of ****!
Review: Order never arrived and Just Eat are absolutely no help and have no regard for their customers. Refused to refund me because they can’t get in contact with the restaurant.....that’s because it’s closed and they have screwed up the opening hours!! Said they will call me back in 4 hours and hung up. Will never use again!!!!

Title: Unauthorised payment taken by Just Eat
Review: Unauthorised payment for £18.48 was taken yesterday from my account by Just Eat.When I called customer service why payment was taken from my account if I didn't place any order response I got "I don't know call your bank". Absolutely useless, deactivated my account with them immediately and will never order from them again.

Title: can't get enough of this app
Review: can't get enough of this app, works great after those long days

Title: The food never came dispite it saying it was delivered on the app
Review: THE FOOD NEVER CAME. I saw the delivery driver come to the road where he stopped and and then the app said it has been delivered. I called customer services and was told because the food has been delivered, there is nothing they can do. JUST EAT IS A CON, they just take your money and don’t deliver what you paid for!!

Title: One of the worst companies operating
Review: One of the worst companies operating in the U.K. and I’m actually surprised that they are still trading given the complete lack of service or regard for their customers. If there is a problem with an order you can bet that Just eat will take no responsibility for helping to sort it out especially if you are unable to get hold of the restaurant or if the restaurant is being unhelpful in resolving the issue directly. The issues seem to be happening every single time near enough and I now refuse to use Just Eat going forward

Title: Slow painful
Review: I have diarrhoea everytime I order from just eat. Today I was sick also.

Title: Never use this waste of time company...
Review: Absolutely f**king ridiculous... I ordered the food for a date and the food never showed up. It was the single most awkward experience explaining why I didnt have any food to offer my f**king date. Waste of time company thanks a f**king bunch d**kheads.

Title: Just eat very bad i give them zero…
Review: Just eat very bad i give them zero rating because they take my money and they did not delivered my order and when i called them they did not want to give me a refund and they told me to phone the restaurant but told them the restaurant has not delivered and they hang up on me they say they cant give me refund so i will never use them and advised people to be carefull if they are ordering from them .

Title: I ordered £47 of Indian take away
Review: I ordered £47 of Indian take away.  1 Hour later a driver had still not been allocated.Just eat blamed the restaurant and made me call them to chase up my own food. When I called the restuarant they informed me that this is a regular occurence with Just eat.  Apparently they do not have enough drivers but accept orders for food they cannot fulfill anyway.This is clearly a scam and I urge users here to tweet your local trading standards.  If they get enough tweets they will investigate and shut them down.Still trying to get my refund. Have tweeted them, emailed and called and they just ignore me.  Shocking.

Title: Pathetic customer service
Review: Like people below have said. Waited 1 hour for a rider and the food was cold and items missing then they said they would only refund me £20. Pathetic customer service.

Title: I waited over an hour for a rider to be…
Review: I waited over an hour for a rider to be assigned to collect my order. Needless to say by the time the food arrived it was stone cold. Having contacted Just Eat customer service via their chat function I was told that beacuse my order exceeded £20 they were unable to provide a refund!? First time I've  heard of this. An absolute joke in my opinion. Managed to get at least £20 refunded but still out of pocket because "their system does not allow them to process refunds over £20."Sort it out Just Eat. Doubt I'll  be using you again.

Title: 871809750 This order number  last week…
Review: 871809750 This order number  last week sunday I order burger king but justeat didnt find driver iwas wait 3 hrs and after cancel this order but justeat get £5.57 cancellation charge this is so funny they stole my moneyIf you havent driver you must close this company

Title: Scammers. Never go near these clowns
Review: I placed an order with Justeat at 5pm yesterday, it took a very long time (well over an hour) to go through the stages of confirmation. I telephoned the local outlet for which the food was coming from; the fish shop's manager told me that she had requested a driver to come three times yet the driver failed to turn up. I requested a cancellation for the order at the the fish shops side, which they duly did. I headed out to a supermarket to get something for dinner instead. After coming home, i rechecked the JustEat app. Now it was saying the food had been delivered. A complete lie, that hadn't happened. I sent a DM on Twitter to JustEat, they ignored it. Their chat service is staffed by bots, the so called human agents are not much better. After waiting for an agent, I explained all of the above. The agent parroted the lie back, saying I had collected the goods! I was nowhere near the retailer's shop. Never been inside their place before. I told the "agent" that I had cancelled the order at the retailer's side, this was swept aside. Now I have gone to my bank to dispute the transaction. This will not permit minus figures, one star is too many! Never touch this place with a bargepole!!

Title: Alright customer service
Review: Managed to sort out a terrible order from a restaurant that refused to give a refund. It did take a bit of back and forth with customer service to get the refund, tho.

Title: Just awful customer service
Review: Every time I have to go through customer service they are just terrible.The most recent problem I've had is with a JustEat driver who took part of my order for himself. JustEats only advice was to leave a review for the restaurant, which is completely inappropriate as it wasn't the restaurant's fault since it was a 3rd party driver employed by JustEat. The they hung up the phone on me midsentence and I had to call back to ask for a refund.I've also had a problem where a restaurant did not have the correct items to complete my order so I cancelled the order completely, then JustEat charged me a cancellation fee (even though the reason I cancelled was because my order couldn't be complete in the first place). Spent about an hour on the phone trying to sort that one out.

Title: Just eat as a company are great BUT!
Review: Just eat as a company are great. But they need to do more background checks on the restaurants using there service. I’ve had arguments with drivers and staff members on occasions for wrong, late or just rude service. I feel that JustEat like to take their share then look in the other direction.

Title: I had problems over new year with…
Review: I had problems over new year with cancelled orders. I understood that was a a busy time with resteraunts either really busy or closed for the holiday period.  I did have to fight with just eat to get my money back which i was not happy about but i did receive a refund. However, skip to today, middle of February and i am having the same problems again. My card has been charged for orders but i have been notified that my order was cancelled by the resteraunt. All i can say is please do not use a card to order through this service. It really is a joke and the so called customer service from just ear is laughable at best. Go direct to your place of choice from now on!

Title: Did not deliver our order.
Review: Did not deliver our order.Claimed no one was in.1) my partner was at the front door from 1900 till 1940 waiting2) claimed to have delivered at 1905Text message said delivery would be at 1907.3) delivery person NOT seen on our CCTVScam do not use

Title: Most annoying horrible
Review: Most annoying horrible, advert ever, the blonde woman's singing voice goes through your head! Whenever this comes on we change the channel its that horrid!

Title: ordered at 9:30 PM
Review: ordered at 9:30 PM, Food was ready at the restaurant at 10 PM, Just eat had no delivery guys, they didnot care to inform us and when called them at 10:40, They cancelled the order, leaving us no other options!. Unprofessional

Title: Absolutely horrible customer service
Review: Absolutely horrible customer service, it is absolutely useless!!! Been on the phone for an hour trying to discuss my order. I received ridiculously salty food that my kid can’t eat! They said they can’t do a refund until they confirm with the restaurant who are obviously gonna say the food is fine!!!! I have been hung up on, they are saying no managers can have live escalations. It’s horrible I’m so exhausted. I need contact details for someone higher this is disgusting

Title: Foods come late and stone cold all…
Review: Foods come late and stone cold all disgusting cant even eat the chips there hard and freezing and just eat refusing too give money back there being so rude on the phone

Title: Very bad service ordered once before…
Review: Very bad service ordered once before food came late decided to give them another chance and same situation happened.

Title: New low in customer service
Review: Placed an order. After it was half an late phoned up to inquire.After chasing through the robots I got to a human. They barely seemed to understand English. Every question I asked they gave me a nonsensical response that didn't address the issue.I was on the phone for 49 minutes! They kept putting me on hold to 'check their resources'. Eventually they told me they had no drivers and offered to cancel the order. This after two hours of waiting for food!When I told them this was not OK they just put me on hold.I switched to the webchat. This was just as bad. Someone just giving me the runaround with a script designed to go nowhere. They clearly just hope you give up in frustration and go away.

Title: I ordered a massive pizza and it was…
Review: I ordered a massive pizza and it was stone cold, Tried to get credit because i paid with cash, I tried and tried, They wouldnt give me one due to change...SCAMMERS, ADVOID!I will not be using you're site again, I will using something else, Got scammed.

Title: Please bring back HungryHouse. Just Eat is terrible.
Review: Please bring back HungryHouse! They were incredible and deserve the market over Just Eat - a company that do not care about their customers but still want your money.I was with wonderful hungry house and had to move over to just eat when they merged but the experience has been awful.I have just tried to talk to customer service again to get help with the problem I experienced but they hung up and put me straight through to the survey! They really don’t want to know or help their customers!I have just made the decision to delete the app and remove my account with them. I will no longer use Just Eat Far better going direct to the restaurant or using other companies.By the way, I wrote a friendly honest review for a restaurant - the food was lovely but the order was incomplete. Just Eat chose to keep my star rating I awarded (4 stars) but omitted the wording for the review. This happened on a couple of occasions. I completely lost my trust in the reviews on Just Eat. Something is not right.

Title: As always - delivery a disgrace
Review: Once again, ordered food, picked up by driver but nothing arrived!When are Just Eat going to see they need to do something about this part of the business??And worst of it is, Just Eat really do not care!!!

Title: Worst delivery experience ever
Review: Worst delivery experience ever Waited for 2 hours ( just eat assured delivery when I contacted them half way through), then got a delivered message with no food, then contacted again when told it'd be another half an hour via the app. Contact customer service and cancelled order. Deleting the app immediately after this review as it's not the first shockingly bad experience.

Title: Appalling customer service
Review: Appalling customer service. Had a problem with a order. Just eat said they would get back to us. It's been 2 weeks now and still not thing from them. They are happy to take your money but when you have a problem they dont want to sort it out.

Title: Same as all the other stories here.
HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
Review: I ordered from KFC and waited 2 1/2 hrs for a driver to be assigned. I called just eat as at this point I was half dead from hunger, and quite hangry understandably! They put me on hold over 10 times while they “contacted the restaurant” - but it was nothing to do with KFC as they told me my food had been waiting for over 2hrs to be picked up. They then went about trying to contact the assigned driver, then informed me they were changing drivers (this continued for another 2 hours) while I was on hold to them the food finally arrived after me telling them I no longer wanted it! The cheeky buggers offered me £5 compensation not even a refund. Their customer service STINKS! They either need to get more drivers or stop taking your money for your order until a driver is assigned because no one should have to wait 4hrs for food, after all you only order food when you’re hungry. Terrible terrible experience in comparison to Deliveroo.

Title: Awful service
Review: Awful service, refused delivery as the pho we ordered has leaked all in the bag, half of the meal gone and I'm not drinking it out a bag. Refused delivery, just eat refused to refund the delivery fee even though no acceptable service was provided. Need to treat customers better

Title: Worst customer service ever! - use local apps & delete these jokers
Review: Worst attitude from any company I have ever dealt with. Received my order and items were missing.(subway meal deal) Just eat said the receipt didn't show the extra items with the sandwich?Every sane person on this planet knows the meal deal includes cookie drink and or crisps... But not Just eat and their customer service talented staff!I got nothing but the sandwich yet they couldn't grasp it and refused a refund. Escalated to a manager and no more sense there either. Deleted app, will stick to local services and deliveroo and never use these jokers again. Arrogance of the highest order which reading these reviews is costing them customers quickly. I will help spread the word on social media.

Title: Refused to refund an order that was never received
Review: I placed my order and it never came. I rang up the help desk and they did absolutely nothing apart from tell me the same thing over and over.  They refused to send a refund and wouldn't let me speak to a manager or give me a number/email in order to get in touch with someone that could actually do something. Needless to say I won't be using this service again!

Title: Refused to refund for an order I never received!
Review: I have ordered a few times with justeat but never had any issue up until now.After ordering, I am getting a call from the restaurant telling me that the driver is not there and they didnt even know when a driver will be appointed. It was not their fault as JustEat sends their drivers, so it is actually their responsibility.The worst wasn't that! After almost 1.5 hrs I saw that there was a driver appointed and was on my way to deliver the order but ...never came!The order was marked as Completed - Delivered...!!!I tried calling them, and apparently after maybe half an hour waiting to speak with someone...they told me they couldnt do anything - not even a refund for the food I payed and never received because the delivery provider has marked the order as Delivered!I will start using deliveroo from now on or another service as it seems they are completely unreliable and worst customer support ever (not even a simple refund!)

Title: worst customer service I’ve ever experienced
Review: Truthfully the worst customer service I have ever experienced. Just eat gives restaurants a bad name. They spend all their money on marketing, but they should be spending it on improving their customer service teams people skills. Shocking. I recommended my local take away to stop using them.

Title: Had KFC
Review: Had KFC, last night.ordered with Just eat,had a code %15 off. ordered meal, did not give me nothing off. Won't be using them again!!

Title: Worst website ever
Review: Worst website ever. They never get your order right, the drivers never double check the order before delivering it. There is always something missing and getting hold of Just Eat is a myth. They’ve changed their contact details to an online chat which disconnects you every single time, once you get connected to someone, they transfer you elsewhere which then the server disconnects anyway. I can’t get my money back for my missing items from my order because how I can speak to them! The drivers are ridiculous as well they do not deliver to your front door like a delivery suppose to be. They call you and tell you to meet them.

Title: Just Eat refuses to refund me for a…
Review: Just Eat refuses to refund me for a duplicate order that never arrived. Last time I order with them.

Title: honestly the worst service i have ever…
Review: honestly the worst service i have ever had, placed an order. waited 2 hours for the driver to get lost and not make a call to see where we are or anything. on calling just eat they had nothing to say. Worst provider going

Title: Liars
Review: I figured I should just add a bit more.I placed an order with a local Italian, food was not what I ordered and terrible. Tried calling the restaurant but no answer, ended up being a bit ill after just a couple of mouthfuls.Spoke to live chat, not that helpful but promised a callback - spoke to a supervisor, went through issues, promised a refund - all happySkip forward a few weeks, no refund.Spoke to livechat who said I was lying as no record of this call or refund, refused to put in a callback request. Went around in circles, got nowehere.Dropped them an email, they didn't read it properly and only tried to fob off same as livechat. Replied with a more detailed overview,  same generic response, now telling me to call the restaurant (who have since left a hostile response to my original review) as unless they agree to refund me, they won't do anything. I just want the refund that was promised and be done with this awful, unhelpful company

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service. Same experience as previous reviewer. My order wasn’t delivered: the restaurant said they would give me a refund but didn’t. I contacted Just Eat who informed me that the order was complete so they can’t help and that I had to go back to the restaurant who had already told me that Just Eat won’t let them process the refund and apparently told them that I have to request it for them to then accept it. Just eat just copies and pasted answers to me in their chat. There is no other way of contacting them.

Title: When it works theres not much added…
Review: When it works theres not much added value by using just eat. When it doesnt, theres nothing that can be done to fix it. Ordered my food through just eat, it came with hair inside. Just eat refuses to refund and directs me to the restaurant, restaurant refuses to refund and directs me to Just eat. Both agree that refund is necessary, but none wants to take responsibility. I did pay JustEat though, not a restaurant.

Title: In this house, nobody says "just eat"
Review: My card payment keeps being declined. Tried my partner's card, tried my daughter's card and even tried her partner's card and it just says declined, even though we have funds and our cards are registered to this address.The help section on the app and website is utter nonsense and never gives me a way to contact anyone for, you know, actual help.Downloading hungry house app in 3, 2, 1...Update... I got through to the online chat support. They kept switching between agents and kept asking for a screenshot of the error. I would have to navigate away from chat and then have to start from scratch. Eventually they just killed the support session. Well done everyone! I'm still not convinced I was speaking to an actual person. Think I will just order direct from the takeaway in future and just pay cash. That way just(don't)eat will not get their cut. I strongly urge anyone reading this to do the same.

Title: UNLAWFUL TRADING
Review: Pretty much the same story as every one else on here. No option for NO STARS.My order turned up cold...more than likely due to the lack of heat bag in the drivers hands. Phoned restaurant they told me it was Just Eats issue. Phoned just eat and got put on hold three times. My favourite question was asking which part of the food was cold....my response being the parts that should be hot!!!They then tried to offer me £20 instead of a full refund....which I refused while quoting the Consumer Goods Act, which they don't understand due to the call centre being based in Canada.I then got told they weren't able to process a full complaint and I would have to wait 24 hours for a call from an appropriate person who could resolve it.I would be very surprised if I do get a call back. I WILL NEVER USE THIS SERVICE AGAIN AND NEITHER WILL ANYONE THAT I SPEAK TO. TRADING STANDARDS WILL DEFINITELY BE GETTING AN EMAIL IN THE MORNING.

Title: I’ve just ordered kfc through just eat…
Review: I’ve just ordered kfc through just eat my Bill was £17 I realised the delivery was going to my old address  I received a call from driver I gave my new address he hung up , even though it was my fault about address had a chat on app and was told sorry nothing they can do for me . Sort it myself basically. I spend lots money each month with just eat but no more. I phoned KFC my meals were there so I drove to collect. Customer service from just eat really poor , what about saying sorry about your delivery and charge me delivery again for 2 nd delivery. Not just sorry nothing we can do

Title: NO DRIVERS! AVOID!
Review: I waited 1 1/2 hours for my food as there were no drivers to deliver it. I contacted them on their app and told by a computer again and again no matter what I said the same thing that my order could not be cancelled. I called their support line and was told i had to wait 2 hours otherwise i would be charged 50% of what I had paid.Im now starving hungry and will never use this service again. Last time I did the food was cold.Terrible company!

Title: Will never use Just Eat again... shambles
Review: Ordered a takeaway and had an issue with my address. I noticed as soon as it went to the restaurant and then began the process... found on their FAQs that you could change the address if you contacted the number on the email, prior to this I’d tried to do online chat but never got anyone answer. Called the number on the email and was put through to Nikola, well, he put me on hold for 5 mins whilst he found the best solution for me. When he came back, it was either pick it up myself or cancel the order and start again. Ok so I’ll cancel and reorder, but what Nikola failed to advise was that if you cancel, you only get a 50% refund. So here’s my dilemma, the FAQs on the website state you can change the address, Nikola the infamous master of customer service (or lack of) said I couldn’t and took half of the money! I asked to speak to a manager, nope, a supervisor will contact me in 24 hours. 72 hours later all I’ve had is an email that say ‘hi’ and no more! Poor service, thieves and will never use Just Eat again! Deliveroo were actually cheaper and faster, with no issues when I actually reordered my food!

Title: The Just Eat App has just made an error…
Review: The Just Eat App has just made an error in my ordercopied an order from a previous one tonight paid and placed the order checking the address to when delivery the address has changed to an old address from 5 years ago.Just eat decide i must be at fault and not their system and are far from helpful

Title: Recently had a really shocking quality…
Review: Recently had a really shocking quality takeaway from @JustEatUK Zero customer service and protection from dodgy restaurants. Not impressed and please be aware, they do not verify their listings! Never again

Title: Stay away! Scam company
Review: I wish I had read these reviews before wasting my money!! I ordered through Justeat, get a notification my driver is nearby. Pull up the map they provide and he's on the adjacent road. Suddenly my order is complete, but I've not got it. Immediately contact JustEat and ask for their assistance. They tell me that it was delivered and suggest it was delivered to me. So basically they call me a liar. I ask for a refund and I'm told the system doesn't allow them to! I ask to speak to a manager and get told the manager would tell me the same thing.Stay away!! Use literally any over courier service of just go to the restaurant yourself. I can't believe these scammers are allowed to operate.

Title: Really disappointed
Review: Really disappointed, not current information on the website

Title: Awful Experience 2 days running. Lesson learned
Review: Awful, awful company and looking at previous reviews it's amazing the company is still going.Two days running ordered KFC. My wife is vegan so ordered vegan burger and creamy mash. No mash turned up with the order. Instead gravy.Who sends KFC gravy to a vegan? Who does that two days running when you already complained about the previous order.Stay away. Go to the restaurant and collect your food.To top it off the bloke on the second day it happened when we complained tried to pass off just eat phone number as the number for the KFC restaurant.

Title: Never delivered food and refused refund…
Review: Never delivered food and refused refund hang up in me 2 times disgusting customer service

Title: terrible
Review: Ended chat whilst receiving confirmation that they were going to help. Terrible

Title: Scam business
Review: Scam business. Onboard any restaurant just to hit numbers. Proper scam. You order food which is never deliver and just eat refuses to refund. Easy money, scam people all day until you go out of business.. never ordering again

Title: Would give zero stars
Review: Would give zero stars. No foodNo apology Difficult to get refund. Concierge service, no delivery attempts at all

Title: if i could give no stars i would
Review: if i could give no stars i would. order never arrived spoke to customer “care” team christian was so rude and said he would not be giving a refund and needed to speak to restaurant which i already did. the worst company going. stay away rather drive or even walk to takeaway to get my order

Title: Took my money cancelled my order left…
Review: Took my money cancelled my order left me without enough to get food from anywhere else told I have to wait for refund so angry why take my money while we were waiting for confirmation from the restaurant Should have learnt from my previous order nearly an hour late with cold food refused refund You are thieves will never order from you again

Title: 2nd time I have ordered through just…
Review: 2nd time I have ordered through just eat thought I would give them another chance after the 1st disaster of a delivery. And 2nd time around it’s even worse. I receive a text at 10.25pm to say it’s on it’s way, then 10.40 I ring up Happy Days (Eccles, Manchester) and get told the delivery man has had an accident with a cyclist and it was cold so there making fresh. So I explained why did no one contact me to let me know to be then told we can deliver ur done cold one if you want. Shocking service, shocking takeaway never again would I order through Justeat or happy days. Disgusting!!!!!!!!!

Title: i would give zero stars if i could
Review: i would give zero stars if i could. They are rubbish. no point in going into depth as to why. Everything about them is terrible, i do not know how they can survive.

Title: Ordered food from just eat from Frankie…
Review: Ordered food from just eat from Frankie and bennies which is 3 minute drive from my house it turned up freezing not warm actually freezing I rang the restaurant and spoke to the manager who was lovely she said she would find out what had happened and ring me back which she did within 5 minutes . They don't supply the drivers just eat do so the food was cooked but it took the driver 10 minute to get into the restaurant.  I rang just eat and explained.  I am not being racist when I say this as I don't believe call centres should have anyone on their phones who have strong accents or can't speak English well. I was on the phone for 34 minutes to be offered only half of my refund.  I asked to speak to a manager and I'm waiting for a call back but was told that if I was going to insist on following up with my complaint I wouldn't recieve the £20 refund today which I found was like a bribe . I'm entitled to it only if I drop the complaint I find this appalling and won't be using just eat again . I have used just eat once a week for years but that's when the restaurant supply the driver which if I've ever had late food the restaurant, chippy ect always deal with your complaint there and then but just eat don't take responsibility for the drivers they employ and told me to chase the restaurant for the other half . It wasn't the restaurant fault that the just eat driver took 10 minute to enter the building.  I'm fuming . And if I could I wouldnt even give them 1 star . Absolute joke . 34 minute on a phone to someone who couldnt speak proper English and wasted my time telling me I could have £20 refund I said I wasn't happy and 3 times I was put on hold for him to come back with the same dribble as before.  I won't be leaving this and will get a full refund even if i have to take it to the ombudsme. These big company's have no sense when it comes to customer services .

Title: restaurants always temporarily closed
Review: restaurants always temporarily closed, doesn't tell you this until you have spent time choosing what you want and try and pay. 3 months its been like this!! don't waste your time with these fools

Title: Fraudulant company
Review: Fraudulant company, DO NOT USE, ordered large order from KFC, 2 hours later got a notification stating that order had been delivered. Not so, had to go collect cold meal from restaurant myself. Called customer service, was closed. Left a message and reported online, not a single response or acknowledgement. Will never use Just Eat again. Advise that you do the same

Title: WHATEVER YOU DO...
Review: WHATEVER YOU DO.... DO NOT!!!!! USE JUST EAT!AN ABSOLUTE SCAM! Made an order with a takeway, it read 'delivered' after 15mins on the app.... Never even recieved food. The driver has 100% taken it for himself.Was told it's been signed for and driver had come to my address, whilst im sitting here starving waiting for my food for over 2hrs. and paid £15 for food i haven't had delivered.Spent hours ringing them up to get my money back, only to be put on hold 35 times for 5-7 minutes at a time, customer service speak awful english as it's an indian company. Expecting a call back tomorrow by a manager.....IF I DONT HEAR FROM THEM WITHIN 24 HOURS, I'LL BE RINGING UP TRADING STANDARDS. This service needs shutting down. It's just eat's that provide the drivers and they're stealing your food after charging you for it and making out it's been delivered. STAY WELL CLEAR!

Title: Very bad service
Review: Very bad service.Stole my card details

Title: Do not order from Just Eat
Review: Ordered from Just Eat, order showed as delivered but not received. Called them to be told they would escalate this, and someone would call within 24 hours. Great, so I have a hungry 6 year old, we're hungry, you've taken my money and I have no food. Fabulous! When I mentioned this I was told 'well you can place another order'. Oh can I?? What for your drivers to cock up, AGAIN??!! I dont think so. Have done a web chat with someone where they told me that the driver assigned to my order may have been unaware of it. Erm sorry what?? How does that happen?? They've agreed to refund but basically refusing to take any blame for anything. Will not be using them again. Very disappointing.

Title: Just eat took money off my bank account…
Review: Just eat took money off my bank account when food didn't turn up I cancelled my food before it came but just eat still took the money and than blamed it on my bank saying it would take 3 till 5 days I think this is a disgusting considering I paid for food and never got it but just just eat still took money from my account I wil not be using your service again

Title: What an absolute joke!!!!
Review: What an absolute joke!!!!! All i can say is i will never ever order through these again! If you want your take away to take 2hrs! And then they have the balls to offer you £5 for the inconvenience! Stay well clear its quicker to fetch it your god dam self

Title: Service from this company is the worst…
Review: Service from this company is the worst ever. I raised a ticket weeks ago and was promised call back/contact within a few days and nothing. Its offshore customer service and they have no idea how to deal with customers.  My complaint is about a take away who they are promoting which sells raw food but they don't care only interested in taking in ££££'s

Title: Save your money
Review: Order once a month from chinese in ashtonFantasticCosts £35 for 2 people hence once a month but...FreshTastyHotLovely This placeColdPut together by blind people Disgusting The attitude of all takeouts round this are isTHAT WILL DO👍when it she beYOU ARE NOT FIT TO SERVE FOOD... HENCE WE ARE CLOSING YOU DOWN😀

Title: Used to be amazing
Review: Used to be amazing, now they rip off the customer, they rip off the restaurants and fill their pockets with your money. Had a ticket for 3 months still not replied

Title: Shocking service never got my food was…
Review: Shocking service never got my food was told I could only get 50% refund that never happened made 4 more calls eventually got my money back will never use again

Title: Over charging
Review: Noticed just eat app charging £3 for delivery when some places say free delivery on app menu or £1.50 plus charging 50p service charge when you pay cash too!

Title: Just Eat didn’t deliver the food but no refund
Review: We just made a order today just before 6pm through Just Eat. One and half hour later, the order status changed to “delivered” without food arriving. Called restaurant, they are not responsible for the order as the driver is from Just Eat. Just Eat just said as long as their internal system says “delivered”, they cannot cancel the order. On top of that, they don’t know where the order is as the driver belongs to a third party.  They cannot provide evidence of delivery, no signature and no photos. Isn’t this like robbery? Hugely disappointed. I have never wrote a public complaint like this, but I felt I am obliged to write one. How can things like this happen in the digital age?!

Title: Absolutely disgusting service,really…
Review: Absolutely disgusting service,really not happy ordered from just eat app KFC,for new vegan burgers etc ,money went out of my account but order cancelled ,as restaurant couldn't cope ,so now no food and no money ,what now ,both been at work ,both hungry ,no food over £20 deducted, absolutely fuming ,big scam do not use

Title: Simple to use!
Review: I personally only had a good experience with Just Eat.The ordering process is smooth and very easy. I havetried various take-away places, most of the food wasvery nice, some of it was average, but that is down tospecific restaurant. No issues with Just Eat as a service.Ease of use and pleasant ordering experience!

Title: Allow the use of stolen cards
Review: I got in contact via online chat with just eat to tell them that someone had used my stolen credit card details on their site. They responded by telling me that they could only track an order with an order number. I explained that I didn't make the order so obviously didn't have an order number because my card details were stolen. They couldn't care less and said there was nothing they could do. Even offering them the date, amount stolen and credit card details, they refused to look into it. Even when I suggested that this person could be using several peoples stolen credit card details and that they obviously had this persons address because food was sent there, they couldnt care less and suggested I report to action fraud. It is scary that there is a company allowing people to use stolen card details and they do nothing to prevent it.

Title: I wish i see this review ealier
Review: I wish i see this review ealier. I just lost money, my order from Just Eat never arrived but money was taken from my account. Customer service is just waste of time. And they dont want give me my money back:( it a scam, be careful people!!!!

Title: If i could give no stars I would - CROOKS - DO NOT USE!!!!!!!
Review: I ordered from my local takeaway on New Years Eve and was told delivery would be at 8:20 - at 8:30 i used the app to ask for an update and the delivery time was changed to 9:05. at 9:25 i rang the takeaway to question when i could expect my food only to be told by the girl on the phone that there were 5 orders before mine was even looked at and that it was Just Eat's fault as 35 minutes delivery time was the maximum allowed at point of order. I requested the order was cancelled and a refund processed. The girl said she would ask the manager to do it as she didn't know how. Today I checked my bank account to find no refund but the payment has gone through. Used live chat to speak to Just Eat to find out the 'restaurant' marked the order as delivered and stating I would have to contact them for a refund as it was Just Eat's policy!!! i've just spoken to my bank and raised a complaint and will be speaking to a colleague in Trading Standards about this!!!

Title: Never order from just eat .. if you do opt for cash so your food isn’t stolen!
Review: after waiting for 2 hours for food to be delivered, it was delivered to the wrong address or none at all. I called just eat to complain/contact the driver/issue refund - whatever.. but they were unwilling to do anything simply as “the driver marked the delivery as complete” they refused to issue any refund as a card was used or any food replacement - absolutely terrible company I hope they go bankrupt soon they’re basically stealing from people.

Title: Just Eat charged 50% for NO food!!
Review: I am unwell so made an order one of many I have made before. The driver called and said I needed to come down from my 1st floor flat to get it as he would not come up. I told him I was sick and in my pyjamas so couldn’t come down. He then replied I will take your food back. I contacted just eat and have just been charged 50% as I did not come down to collect it. This is completely outrageous, has this happened to anyone else???

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service! Cancelled the order after waiting an hour for it to be confirmed. Will not be using again.

Title: Disgusting service
Review: Disgusting service. Ordered at 1pm today a £40 meal to be  delivered tonight at 8pm.Nothing arrived, checked emails at 8.45pm to see they emailed at 8.40pm saying delivery cancelled as not enough delivery  drivers.  They had 7 hours to advise they had to cancel but didn't email until 45 mins after expected delivery time. Avoid at all costs.  Restaurant we wanted food from has now lost our on going custom too.

Title: Ordered burger king from telford and…
Review: Ordered burger king from telford and payed for just eat for delivery. Was told it would be 1 hour which is fair enough. Then had another message saying it would be 2 hours.that is shocking.if you use just eat then pay cash on delivery.all in all it was nearly 3 hours.phoned up to complain and They didn't give a fxxk you have been warned don't pay up front.pay cash on delivery.at least you can tell them to fxxk off.

Title: In a world of poor service, Just Eat stand head and shoulders above everyone else.
Review: Absolutely shocking customer service. Online chat windows that don’t work. Numerous silent calls from customer service. Honestly, just avoid. Ring the restaurant’s direct👍🏻

Title: Food never arrived
Review: Food never arrived. Driver marked it as completed then proceeded to urinate in my garden.Just Eat less than helpful, no refund.A disgrace of a company

Title: Just be careful not to get logged out…
Review: Just be careful not to get logged out otherwise it's a pain to get logged back in. Never use again.

Title: if i could give zero stars i would
Review: if i could give zero stars i would.  terrible company they cannot follow simple instructions.  Do yourself a favour and go directly to your chosen local take away and ask them to deliver. they are far more friendly and accommodating and there is nothing better than making sure local money goes to local businesses.DO not use this company.!!!

Title: Just Eat customer service is appalling
Review: Just Eat customer service is appalling. Waited hours on webchat for my queue number to just keep going up 46, 49, 68, 100 and something.

Title: Just eat are scam artisits
Review: Just eat are scam artisits obtaining money under false pretenses, they take your money and when your food doesn't arrive neither the restaurant or just eat will refund the money.I ordered food that never arrived, the restaurant via a just eat txt denied a refund because they was too busy to deliver, the order was marked as complete. when i questioned just eat they refuse a refund as well.Avoid this scam service at all costs, you have no way of getting your money back, they are dirty scumbags.

Title: Just avoid at all costs
Review: Just avoid at all costs, they literally don't have a customer service email or any points of contact.Their Live Chat workers were super rude and spoke to me like a child. I was told to ring a restaurant, when I had even gotten past their website. So frustrating.

Title: Waited for 2 and half hours
Review: Waited for 2 and half hours,  called 3 times to be told it will be with me soon then it's just gets cancelled! I've now got hungry mouths to try to feed. Apparently no drivers were available but surely they'd have known that when I ordered?! Not almost 3 hours later. Absolute disgrace

Title: Absolutely abysmal customer service
Review: Absolutely abysmal customer service. Left on hold for 25 minutes to have my intelligence insulted and blatantly lied to. Best advice is to avoid Just Eat, however if you do wish to pay for their incompetence, use a restaurant with their own drivers. You may actually receive your food!!

Title: I just arrived today in England from…
Review: I just arrived today in England from germany to visit my brother, my brother hv a take way Restaurant n he has been having Problem with just eat customer Service bcoz thy changed his delivery time from 45mins in 10 or 15 mins.How can I delivery in 10 or 15 mins n Just Eat cant fix this f..... Problem.... Very very poor System n customer Service

Title: Although its Christmas
Review: Although its Christmas, the food got delivered just fine. It's not piping hot, but it's warm enough. The driver was nice. Thank you.

Title: I wish I had seen these reviews before
Review: I wish I had seen these reviews before. Long story short I spent an hour and half on the phone, spoke to 3 different people, all unhelpful and just reading off a sheet. End result NO food, and I've paid 18 pound for the pleasure. I will never use again. AVOID. It's all good when it goes well, but the moment you have a problem you're going to have a bad time and feel bad dealing with just-eat.

Title: Dreadful
Review: Dreadful. Had the same thing my takeaway was not delivered as restaurant hadn’t even started cooking they blamed just eat and when I complained just eat they keep palming me off! Have paid for food I never received and no one is owning up. I am honestly at a loss?!

Title: Stealing off customers.
Review: Got no food, half refund. They have sunk to new low.

Title: Ordered KFC
Review: Ordered KFC. It didn't arrive. I get a message saying it was delivered so I ring Just eat immediately. I got this reply; Hello, Thank you for using Just-Eat. We are sorry to hear that your order was not delivered. We have processed a (50%of the sub-total) refund back to your card as a delivery attempt was made by the courier and also we have to pay the restaurant for food cost as well as the courier fee. Our drivers are trained to call and finalize the delivery not to knock on doors, as we may not know which door the customer is using. If they do not hear from the customer for 10 minutes, they are allowed to move on to other jobs. We deeply apologize for any inconvenience this might have caused you. There was no delivery, no phone call and I am now down 8 pounds.

Title: STEER CLEAR
Review: Like most people on here I wish there was not only a 0 star rating but a minus rating.  Made an order today and tried to pay by VISA.  More than enough money in my account and yet site kept telling me that payment didn't go through.  So, I tried several more times to no avail.  Tried to contact them by 'chat' only to be left holding so long that I gave up.  Then I saw a review by a gentleman who stated that each time he 'retried' payment Just Eat took it but, like my situation, did not acknowledge receipt.  He paid for the same meal several times leaving him broke.  DO NOT USE THEM or KFC (who were  also less than helpful when I rang them) Shocking companies - would rather go hungry

Title: £3 more expensive for 1 item and over…
Review: £3 more expensive for 1 item and over £1.90 more expensive on other items than what the price is if you go to the shop itself.Yes I understand we as the human race are becoming lazier.. but this is a joke.A meal for a family could end up being over £10 more expensive than phoning the take away and getting it delivered rather than going through an app.What a joke

Title: No refunds given.
Review: They act as an agent. They take your money. It says on your credit card bill “just eat”. Yet they won’t refund you and give you a credit for the next order. I am demanding a £5 refund. But I am not getting it. This was due to an item being ordered which wasn’t in stock. I phoned the restaurant and they said it’s fine, just eat will refund you. They didn’t. And they refuse to. Will some sort of ombudsman please get involved in this shockingly bad company.

Title: Don't use justeat
Review: Don't use justeat. I recently made an order with them. I asked them clearly for receipt because I have to claim the amount back from my company. They did not provide any receipt to me. They ask me to call the restaurant and restaurant manager says he can't provide the bill and ask to call the justeat. And the justeat people ask me to call restaurant. Bunch of jokers..poor service..

Title: Do not use Just Eat
Review: Do not use Just Eat. Terrible customer service from both food restaurant and Just Eat. Marked as delivered although I never received the delivery & they still charged me. I had to call the restaurant numerous times asking them to contact just eat so they could process my refund but kept speaking nonsense. Then I called just eat and they wouldn’t authorise refund unless they had confirmation from restaurant so I basically lost £25.

Title: Zero customer service and experience focus
Review: Absolute BS of a company for customer service. Marked as delivered although I've never received the delivery waiting and then keep me on the phone on hold for 45 min just to tell me they've processed my refund but I will have to wait 7 business days (during the holiday period) and can't explain where the food is at. Absolute time waster of a service and a company that definitely does not put the customer at its focus.

Title: Rude advisors and even worse service. Don’t use.
Review: ordered from TGIs via just eat and was told the delivery would be approximately 1 hour. Nearly 2hours 30 mins later, we got our delivery and everything was stone cold. Opened up the boxes and received as a main course of chicken pieces 4 small bits the size of a 50p and was solid due to being burnt. The chicken burger was the same and chips were half raw still due to not being cooked properly. Contacted the restaurant and said it was just eat that was liable. We spent 5 hours on the just eat chat rooms and either the advisors ended the chat and disconnected it meaning we were back in queue 56 again, we were told wrong information or were ignored. We phoned the customer services and again after 2 hours on the call to different advisors, the manager then hung up on us after laughing about refunding us and clearly could hear him talking about us while he thought he put us on hold. We didn’t get any call back. Phoned the next day and got through to a nice advisor that understood and was able to confirm that we’d spoken to 15 advisors that had all disconnected chats, calls or told us wrong info therefore raised a complaint for us and got her manager to call us the next day to sort the refund and was told the full amount of 52.26 would be refunded. 2 weeks later the money wasn’t in my account and again had to go through the exact same process and dealt with either rude or sarcastic advisors that one said I was trying to rip them off to get my money again which is the worst service I’ve ever got, he called me a liar and hung the call up. It’s now been 3 weeks and still don’t have the refund which I was promised and can only say I’d never recommend Just Eat to anyone. The service is terrible, the advisors are even worse and all in all Just Eat is an absolute joke.

Title: Won't issue refunds
Review: I have used just eat for a while. Terrible company. I have no idea why I allowed restaurants to take 2 hours to deliver regularly. Many tend to mark the food as delivered before they would even be out for delivery. The introduction of the 50p "service charge" to circumvent the legislation against charging for card payments is a pretty low move. Isn't their cut from the restaurants enough? A cut that is always put on the customers. The last straw for me is when I ordered from Milano Pizza in Mile End, London. Their reviews also suggest an incompetent deliverer. They did not deliver and rudely refused to speak to me in regards to the missing order. They told me to handle it with just eat.Just eat were very unprofessional and merely told me they "can't do anything about it" and that they'll be "investigating". That was clearly a lie as they did not get back to me. I hardly believe they would "investigate" as it's the word of its customer against an incompetent driver which many reviewers also felt did not deliver if they felt it was inconvenient.  I regret giving all these five stars to terrible restaurants merely because I wanted to be nice. The cheek of one specific restaurant to always tell me to review 5 stars because I was a regular even after 3 hour delays. These restaurants who end up on just eat are the worst of the lot.

Title: Shocking service
Review: Shocking service - Order turned up late, Driver refused to come to the right location. Spent the next 2 hours with Just Eat calling me a liar, as the driver said the food had been delivered. Had to call the Driver, whilst on the phone to Just Eat to ask for a physical description, which he obviously couldn't do, just to be taken seriously. Appalling from service from start to finish and its not the 1st time

Title: Ordered from KFC Thornton Heath- and terrible service from Just Eat
Review: Ordered from KFC Thornton Heath- food items missing, and also food received was cold and soggy. Called Just Eat to complain, had the unfortunate experience of dealing with a useless "call centre handler" Ivan who had no interest in helping and just read off a script. Do not offer a proper refund of missing items, doesn't know name of management when asked who will be calling me back as wanted complaint escalated. YET not allowed to give managements name when probed further?? Both companies very poor customer service! When asked to re-deliver my FULL meal that I had ordered was told no by Just Eat because KFC do not have their own drivers. Not my issue as I paid a delivery fee for my full meal not partial meal! Just do not use either company for food.

Title: Was just about to order a boneless…
Review: Was just about to order a boneless banquette from local KFC usually £6.49When i seen what they are charging........DISGRACEFUL £8.19 for the meal and £2.09 delivery Boneless Banquet £8.19 Beans (Regular)Fries (Regular)Sweet ChilliSelect DrinkPepsi (330ml +£0.13)-Subtotal£8.32Delivery fee£2.09Total£10.41I understand that the delivery driver and just eat have to make money BUT THAT IS JUST TAKIN THE P**S Nearly £4 extra You don't even deserve 1 star Trustpilot should give consumers the option to leave zero stars and just eat would have a lot

Title: Placed an order via JustEat
Review: Placed an order via JustEat, KFC delivered, but items were missing. Phoned KFC, to be told that in order to resolve the issue, I'd have to go to KFC to collect said missing items. UNACCEPTBALE! You messed up, make it right! KFC then told me to claim a refund through JustEat. JustEat have subsequently ignored my complaint. Both are totally s h i t at dealing with 'problems'.

Title: Absolutely terrible food always late…
Review: Absolutely terrible food always late and cold this app should be shut down if I could I’d give 0 stars

Title: Do not use JustEat
Review: Do not use JustEat. When something goes wrong with your order neither JustEat nor the restaurant will help you. And something will go wrong because their app malfunctions. It does not accurately track the status of the order or the driver's location. They recently changed their algorithm and the last 2 orders have been +1hr late. No explanation. No update. No refund. The app said "driver at the restaurant" for over an hour. When in fact he accepted the job 10 minutes before we received the food. This company is not trustworthy.

Title: If I could give less that 1 star I…
Review: If I could give less that 1 star I would. I would say to everyone not to use this company, because if anything goes wrong, you will not get any help. There will be no refund and no care. AVOID like the plague, I got an order from a restaurant that arrived burnt. I called the restaurant and they didn't care after being paid, I immediately contacted Just Eat and they escalated my complaint, I was ensured a call back in 72 hours and that never happened. I called again I was told 24 hours, that call also never happened. Each time you call you give a reference and the representative asks you to tell your story from the start, which is extremely frustrating. The staff do not log the calls and you end up going around in circles. The staff said on numerous occasions that a supervisor will call to issue a a refund and low and behold day 6 and I'm still waiting. So long and short of this 7 phone calls later no sign of a refund. The staff are lovely and I feel really sorry for them, they must get so much abuse and those so-called managers above them have little to no concern. It's a tragic company and I can safely say I will never place an order using this platform ever again. I've taken my case to Resolver out of sheer principle.

Title: Absolutely terrible waited 2 and half…
Review: Absolutely terrible waited 2 and half hours ..contacted just eat twice to then get our order cancelled....waste of time

Title: Appalling!!!!
Review: Appalling!!!!Ordered food from subway arrived with hair. When I rang was told to take a picture and they cannot do anything to resolve my complaint. Investigation team will contact me. I will be contacting FSA. Never again! Rude, unhelpful customer service.

Title: Avoid like the plague
Review: Avoid like the plague - absolutely shockingOrdered from them recently - when my order arrived it was missed most of what was supposed to be delivered and what was there was cold ...Kept me on the phone for over an hour trying to sort this out and then they said their maximum refund was only £20 even though my order cost way more...I will be complaining to their ombudsman and escalating through my bank

Title: Absolutely disgusting service
Review: Absolutely disgusting service, so today my husband ordered a subway for the kids tea through just eat, 2 hours later still waiting for a driver so contact just eat via live chat and asked to cancel it and asked for a refund as he payed on his card, they said they have done that, an hour later subway rang us because they was concerned that we had been waiting 3 hours for our food, we said we have cancelled it and they said it hasn't come through on there end as cancelled so we contacted just eat again and asked them to cancel it, they said we havnt contacted them previous to this when he blatantly did because he screenshot it, I will never use just eat again there costumer service skills are terrible I wouldn't even give them 1 star if I didn't have to, so been waiting another 2 hours for our refund, so we contact them again asking for our refund they say it can take 3 days, I know it only takes about 10 to 15 mins for a refund of just eat because it's not the first time I've complained about there service, next minute the refund is in my bank, never using these again!!

Title: The WORST customer service I've ever…
Review: The WORST customer service I've ever had - my order was 75 minutes late because they couldn't locate a driver which they didn't fancy updating me about. And then when I tried contacting the customer service line, I was passed through 4 different departments over a half an hour wait... Honestly would rather starve than order from this joke of a business

Title: Ordered from KFC Dunstable road in…
Review: Ordered from KFC Dunstable road in Luton. Totalling over £27 including delivery. Order turns up 45 minutes late, stone cold, half the order missing, mayo in burgers when requested plain. Whole order inedible! Call KFC who says no we can’t help you you have to call just eat. Call the number on the website and put on hold for 55 minutes to then be told they don’t deal with these complaints. Passed to another department on hold for roughly another hour. Once answered they say we have to pass this to the resolution team they will call back within 24 hours. Two days later I call again after receiving no call and again the same old pass you from department to department. On hold for 1hr 15 minutes. Shocking customer service from both KFC and just eat! Won’t use again!

Title: Good luck...
