Review: In terms of the ap, that's ok, but when something goes wrong, the customer service just triples the problem making the whole thing worse. Probably the most frustrating experience I've ever had with customer service agents and I am no Karen!!! Ironic really because they kept addressing me as mam, stated many name (Andrew) sounded female to them and then went so far as to inform me usually only women complained!6 different agents to sort one issue which was a some refund on one item on our order that was delivered incorrectly. Still no refund but now an appalling opinion of this company. Good luck...

Title: Awful experience
Review: Awful experience, no help what so ever from customer service. The driver of the restaurant cancelled our order and they put it as delivered and we got no refund. Just Eat firstly hung up on us saying they couldn’t hear at the end of the call. Then second time just said call the restaurant.No support what so ever and will not order through then again

Title: Load of rubbish
Review: Load of rubbish.  I had three Chinese restaurant that apparently delivered to me and they all cancelled my order! As for speaking to a human to complain! What a joke! If I could score them lower I would

Title: Horrible to say the least ordered food…
Review: Horrible to say the least ordered food that arrived over an hour late food freezing burger baps stale , £41 in the bin been waiting 14 days on someone returning my calls emails ect customer service agents don’t want to know , apparently been passed to resolutions team but they don’t have number or email address !! I would advise people to steer well clear of just eat they are nothing short of scam artists

Title: I am disgusted with how just eat have…
Review: I am disgusted with how just eat have dealt with my case and there investigation team is shocking enough to say. I ordered from Bird box, and the app said my food was delivered yet I was standing outside talking to my neighbour for 10 minutes before the app said it was here. No food arrived yet saying delivered. I phoned just eat and was greeted by a Indian woman who customer service was shocking! She wouldn’t phone the restaurant to find out where my food was and she hung up on me. I phoned back and she happened to answer yet again I ask to speak to her manager and she turned around and said to me I have got my food and stop trying to get money out of them. How disgusting is that? No food turned up and she turned around saying I’m trying to steal money off them? Just eat your a joke! I re- phoned again after having the phone put down and got through to someone who was going to investigate it in 24 hours. So just eat you take the money quick enough out my bank but it takes 24 hours just to get through to speak with someone. They investigation team said they couldn’t order to my address because my number was not corrected and delivery drivers do not knock on doors. That was there ridicules response. A delivery driver meant to know not phone when there outside for me to walk out my house and pick it up? Also what’s my number being incorrect got to do with delivering the food, my address was correct and name and door number and post code? Yet you blamed my number because of your lazy driver who couldn’t be bothered to actually deliver the food. You offered me 50% of my money back. Oh so what I get no food, spend 40 mins on my night speaking to your stupid worker who said I was trying to steal from you. You need to train your staff better nothing but Plain was rude! I normally order once a week so does my partner so you have lost us at customers! Will never order again! Disgusting! Guys your better off picking up your food least you know it’s right and you get it. Reading the other reviews looks like others have gone through the same. Definitely scamming going on here people should speak up and put court case against them stealing our money.!

Title: Got order from giovanni chippy freezing…
Review: Got order from giovanni chippy freezing cold sent it back and just eat still took £3.50 delivery no order anything of them again complete robbing b*****ds

Title: Just eat poor delivery
Review: 2nd weekend in a row now just eat has taken an hour more than what they said

Title: We ordered 3 items but only one turned…
Review: We ordered 3 items but only one turned up..so I contacted the restaurant and just eat..they said that I can either get a refund on the 2 missing items..I said I'd like my order..and 2hrs later still nothing..the restaurant is closed and just eat said they have refunded the money but it will take 3-7days...and I wasnt happy I was put on hold for 35mins for the phone to go dead on me on their part...

Title: Terrible service every time now
Review: Terrible service every time now. No longer using. Just eat is no longer convenient because they no longer care about customer service. They say its nothing to do with us even though you order through them. Your better of walking to your local now and saving a few pound because just eat literally so not deliver.

Title: Ordered food and never turned up
Review: Ordered food and never turned up, status showed it was delivered? called restruant and phone engaged, called just eat waited 30 mins before someone answered,  explained to them what had happend and was told to re-order and pay for food again???  What a Joke so they robbed me once and they want to do it again? Asked for refund and they said someone will back in 24hrs, how pathetic, a one for rogue traders me thinks, Matt Alwright get on the case!

Title: Delivered over an hour late
Review: Delivery was over an hour later than advised yet they refuse to refund the delivery charge.  Food was cold by the time it arrived. Customer service not helpful.

Title: Check your payment!
Review: My order was 21.50 had three lots £40 taken took 5 days and hours on phone luckily my bank sorted refund.  Never ever use them again.   No customer service

Title: so i place and order on just eat from…
Review: so i place and order on just eat from kfc yea they said will arrive 16:40 never arrive then they said will arrive 5:05, never arrive then they said 15:24 never arrive then i called them and cancel it a indian lady answered  with no clue about customer service, she said that is no problem will cancel and get full refund ok good, then they called me and say to me that they cannot give me full refund only 50% :))))))) that is a joke, so i never get my food and my money this is just against the low , i hope no one will buy from them again and i hope the owner goes to jail, i hate them so much . please never buy from them, please

Title: Terrible service waiting for half hour…shocking
Review: Terrible service waiting for half hour to speak with someone still position 99 in the queue

Title: Cold food poor customer service and…
Review: Cold food poor customer service and over inflated prices. disappointed  every time. I will never use again. Very poor.

Title: Paid for delivery. Delivery never arrived.
Review: Ordered food. Order said it was arriving at 7:44 and said it got delivered at 8:05. The order never showed up. Can't contact just eat for a refund. Extremely unhappy. I had to go to the restaurant to pay again for food as my family were starving.

Title: completely abysmal late 90% of the…
Review: completely abysmal late 90% of the time, the app says it will be delivered a certain time but never is. tonight its 20:15 now and the app still says its coming at 19:25. My night is ruined and I'm starving. Need to learn my lesson and stop ordering from here.

Title: Did somebody say terrible customer service?
Review: Another terrible review.I ordered a takeaway just over 48 hours ago, after 20 minutes the restaurant called to say they gave the delivery driver the incorrect food. When the delivery driver arrived I confirmed he had the incorrect food (completely wrong) but the driver refused to take it back, telling me to ring the restaurant, the restaurant then said I needed to contact Just Eat to raise a ticket and get the order resent. So begins the wild goose chase.I initially contacted Just Eats online chat helpline, they told me I should ring the restaurant again, so I obliged and they again sent me back to Just Eat. Just Eat then said all they could do was give me a £20 refund (which was around 50% less then what I spent). I said I wanted to speak to a supervisor. I was told I would get a call within the hour. I waited up until nearly midnight and received no phone call. After work the next day I rang up and asked to speak to a supervisor and they said they were really sorry they didn't call and that they would within the hour. At this point I was understanding that it was late the night before and they may of just ran out of time the previous night. Well guess what, 2 hours pass and no call was made.I ring back and I am told it actually takes 24 hours for a supervisor to return their calls. I told them this isn't what I was told twice before and I would like to speak to one now. They insist that the policy is to ring back within 24 hours and I would get a call within backdated to my first request for a supervisor. They still didn't call me.I call back again and a different customer service agent tells me that he had asked his supervisor to call within the hour, and previously it was only raised in their system but now it was raised personally. I wait up until midnight and guess what, no ring. The next day after work I ring again. I ask to speak to a supervisor and she informs me that they are all in a meeting and she would get one to call back. She tells me that the supervisor won't be able to help me either as it is their policy to only refund £20 maximum. I had to hassle them for over 40 mins so that I was left on hold until the supervisor is out of the meeting. Up to this point they had continually reneged on their responsibility to provide adequate services and goods, tried to imply that it was solely the restaurants responsibility and ensured me that this was all they could do because it was 'policy'. I really hate being rude to people but I told them they would have to stop mentioning their policy because it was making me irate.The women from the Customer 'Care' Team then told me to not blame her for waiting on the phone for a long time to speak to her supervisor.It took a further 13 minutes, a fraction of the time I had been on the phone to this point, for her supervisor to come and talk to me. I asked if he could help me immediately and if he was able to refund me the full amount, he said no. But I went off on one telling him I wanted to speak to his supervisor, and if that meant I had to go all the way up to Peter Duffy (the CEO) I would. He quickly changed tact and said he would be happy to help me and then within 5 minutes he had told me they are going to refund the full amount and he was overriding their policy because I was a loyal customer.Apparently the refund will take up to 7 working days, which after reading some of the other reviews I have doubt I will receive. I've took a ticket number in case I have to chase up.I've used Just Eat plenty of times before but I have never had to deal with their woeful Customer Care Team before. It was shocking. I am going to avoid at all costs and I would suggest anyone who has to order from there to pay cash and not give in to the temptation of the convenience of card, because Just Eat pray on it.I would also suggest others in a similar situation to me persist on a full refund, continually bring up the Consumer Rights Act 2015 which gives us some protection, insist that you will take it to small claims court if you have to and demand to speak to the supervisor of who you are speaking with if they say they can't do anything for you. They can they've just got internal policies so consumers are defrauded out of their money. Sickening.

Title: Don’t expect it to arrive
Review: I’ve ordered with them 4 times and only 2 have ever arrived. Even the ones that were delivered were both freezing. Their customer service is unusable. I’ve given up on a refund both times as it’s taken over an hour to speak to someone on both occasions. When you finally speak to someone, they transfer you to someone and then cut you off. Literally the funniest excuse for a company.

Title: Terrible  they owe me 30 pounds they…
Review: Terrible  they owe me 30 pounds they took off me last Thursday 21 11 19 and told me ill have money in 48 hours coming up to 200 hours watch these people this is just the beginning of what ill do 826818011 is my number they gave the person I care for was really disappointed I was well f...ked off phone restaurant  instead I only gave one star because there are no stars pigs pigs pigs

Title: Always have great service and when…
Review: Always have great service and when there is a problem, they fix it straight away unlike Uber Eats.

Title: I rate just eat 0 star for bad customer…
Review: I rate just eat 0 star for bad customer service and hold back money from restaurant! Dear Sir/Madam,Your compliance team has not resolved our restaurant problems for nearly 3 months and we are very upset! We have decided to take to instagram, facebook and all the food rating website! Untitled ticket 256422120I have sent you all the documents required for proving the i am the true owner. Now you still keep my money and still not help me properly! I still can not go online. I still can not get access to partner centres ! Can you please let me know when you can delete 1 of the 2 same account and put me back online? Furthermore, when can you refund me my 2 months money?Please write to me asap because i am sufferring very much!Kind regards,

Title: Are the drivers stealing food???
Review: Drivers appear to steal food (i.e. mark order as delivered when it has not been) and the response is that they will "offer a refund" on the order that was never delivered, as if they are doing you a favour and you should be grateful for that kind act.  That's after it taking 40 minutes to sort out.  Think they should be a bit more worried about the potential criminals they are employing to rip people off and take it a bit more seriously and offer something by way of apology rather than giving you back the refund you are obviously entitled to.

Title: NO DELIVERY FOR A FOOD DELIVERY SERVICE
Review: If I could give a minus I would, this firm takes money quicker than it delivers it is approx 2.5 hours later and I still have not received my food, there was no status update about the order it took me after a hard days work to call and find out what happened with my delivery. when all I needed to do was just eat!!!!  Very poor service indeed, which is a joke as they should be all about the service.  They need a major improvement to ensure there is fulfilment of order placed, and quality control in ensuring that all items are received and customer satisfaction to be increased.

Title: Terrible service waiting for a refund…
Review: Terrible service waiting for a refund contacted my bank because these ppl cant be bothered absolutely terrible service cant speak to a maniger restaurant was just as bad its £12 it's not the money. I will get it back just disappointed

Title: Owed money for a refund
Review: Owed money for a refund, I contacted them and they agreed , saying that the money would be in my bank within a few days. It’s been a couple of months now and still no refund. The customer service is absolute garbage, can never get through to them, the only way I could get in contact was via chat . Absolute rubbish!!

Title: Cleaned my bank out with the wrong amount
Review: Ordered a take away for £11. Just eat completely wiped out my bank account with the wrong amount and left me penniless. Contacted them they said my bank was the problem. Contacted my bank and they say I have to wait for the pending transaction to actually leave my account to see if it rectifies the amount? Just eat are denying taking more money even though I sent them pictures of the amount on my bank account. Horrid customer service. The first person I spoke to cut me off because they couldn’t be bothered obviously.

Title: Just eat they are a joke they steal…
Review: Just eat they are a joke they steal money,  blame the customer for the mistake. They emitted to my credit card people that they have made a mistake. I was on the phone more than 4 hours on Sunday the 23rd they was rude. you speak to people in different countries there's not a UK base for just eat. so why there is a customer service I don't know. I would recommend not to use them because when they do make a mistake it's going to be the customers fault and not theirs because they are a proper joke as a company. Avoid avoid avoid.

Title: Placed on order for Burger King
Review: Placed on order for Burger King.  Food never arrived, phoned just eat twice and they didn’t want to know, complained and they have ignored.  Tried again today and told they can’t help I have to talk to restaurant.  Spoke to BK and told I have to talk to just eat as they handle everything.   Worst experience ever.  Do not use this company

Title: Terrible to use and contact like all big companies they don’t care
Review: Don’t use big company don’t care about customer you are just a number

Title: This app only works when it works
Review: This app only works when it works. If anything goes wrong, good luck getting in touch with somebody. I ordered a (quite expensive) vegan burger that never arrived and two weeks on, I have already spent over 1 hour altogether trying to contact someone for a refund (Yes, I was charged). DO NOT RECOMMEND

Title: DO NOT USE AT ALL
Review: garbage used to be a good site now its trash, 2 times iv tried to pay via card they took my cash but no order came up, both times spend 2 hours arguing with support to get my money back, avoid at all costs, DO NOT USE or ONLY USE CASH, horrid site, horrid support )/100

Title: Complete disgrace
Review: Complete disgrace. Chinese order was wrong. Not one item was what I ordered. Just Eat customer service is the worst I've ever experienced. Dina was her name. Completely brushed me aside and said I would have contact the takeaway. I demanded a full refund. I was told a supervisor would contact me. STILL WAITING 😡😡😡

Title: Poor service
Review: Poor service, extremely late delivery and no sign of support from just eat with this aside from contact the restaurant who hung up on me. Had to pay for delivery that took an hour longer than planned. Demanded a refund but no one is giving me the decency of a phone call to discuss.

Title: I don't know why I use them as they are…
Review: I don't know why I use them as they are a hopeless middle man with some of the worst customer service in the world

Title: I would rather not order again from…
Review: I would rather not order again from Just Eat. They said 30-50 minutes for my food to arrive and it has been 1 hour and 30 minutes and my food is still not here. I spoke in the chat to get my order cancelled as it is too late and my money back and they only offer 50% when it is their fault!! I will never order from here again.

Title: NEVER USE JUST EAT
Review: NEVER USE JUST EATI never received the order, the driver did pick up the food but never delivered it. I called just eat but they told me that they can't call the restaurant I have to deal with the problem and convince the restaurant to refund me and to send them an email, I called the restaurant many times they told me they will refund me but they never sent the email to confirm it to just eat. I can't believe they still exist the customer service is the worst I have ever talk to it's unbelievable !!! please just don't use themOrder 826222248

Title: AVOID !!!
Review: AVOID !!!Ordered via the app. Food never turned up.....and still been charged !!Left numerous messages, email to HQ, and no-one ever responds. Apparently number 81 in support queue.....I will now report it to the Ombudsman and Police, as it is theft !

Title: I don’t believe it was the same restaurant
Review: I just ordered via Just Eat from one of my favourite places and the food was awful! I don’t believe it came from the same place. my experience with Just Eat has always been mediocre, this is the last straw.

Title: awful service!
Review: awful service!! the driver never picked up the food from the restaurant yet the restaurant refused to give the food to my own uber driver as the policy of just eat!! no one picks up the problem and for over 1 hour's waiting and that's for my guests' food, just eat only says that's the system error and 5 pound compensation, which is awfully badddd!!!

Title: My recent complaint to Just Eat
Review: My recent complaint to Just Eat.  10 Days ago I complained and STILL no response received from them:-It has now been 10 days since I originally logged my complaint and I have had no response or assistance from Just Eat. I am extremely disappointed with the level of service I have received from you and I am at a loss as to why you will not assist me or respond to me?I have spent so much time speaking with staff members on your online chat to try and get this rectified and every time, they are unable to assist me.  They tell me that your ‘investigations team’ will be in touch within 48 hours.  Ten days later and still nothing!!?I have requested a telephone number or a complaints email address where I can direct my concerns and I am told that there is nothing and that the ‘investigations team’ will be sending me an email to resolve my complaint. I have never ever experienced such terrible customer service anywhere.  I will no longer be a just eat customer going forward and would appreciate if my account could be deleted.  This is very upsetting to me given how long I have been a just eat customer and the amount of loyal custom I have given you.  I feel like this means absolutely nothing to you..  I will not be leaving this complaint here though, I will be carrying out some research as to where I can direct my complaint to in order to ensure that some kind of resolution is offered for the standard of service I received on Saturday 9 November when ordering food from a company advertised through Just Eat. An urgent response would be appreciated but I will be looking further into my rights.  STAY AWAY FROM THIS DODGY COMPANY!

Title: Quick enough to take your money but…
Review: Quick enough to take your money but when there’s a problem with your order they don’t want to no. They tell you to deal with the restaurant, the restaurant tell you to deal with just eat. Nearly 2 hours on their chat line trying to get refunded and got no-where. Still haven’t been refunded, I would post the whole conversation on here if I could copy photos onto this page. I Will never use this dodgy company again and warn any one else look elsewhere!

Title: NEVER USE JUST EAT
Review: rip off. no food turned up from kfc .happy to take money quick but not quick in refunding it.we called kfc to see what was going on and they said it had been collected 10 mins ago and 2hrs later still not arrived tried there help centre which goes round in circles will never use again total rip offthere help centre is totally useless

Title: Just Eat Rip Off Artists
Review: I ordered a KFC on 12 November, I two minutes drive from the restaurant, my order arrived late, stone cold and was missing items.  I first tried the online chat and was told I have to take it up with the restaurant I told them that it has nothing to do with the restaurant as my contract was with Just Eat, I continued to complain and asked to speak to a manager I was told the manager would tell me the same thing I demanded to speak to them and was told I would get a call back within and hour.  I did not get a callback.  I phoned again went through the whole thing and was promised a full refund (my order was for £24.08). I then received two emails one stating I would receive in total £20.96. I phoned back again and explained yet again what had happened and demanded to speak to a manager, I was put on hold for 40 minutes. I hung up and phoned back (10th in the queue) explained my complaint yet again and again demanded to speak to a manager, put on hold again for 20 minutes, hung up phoned back yet again, (19th in queue) explained again and was told they will refund the remainder but first she needs to see if the other advisor really promised a full refund (implying I was lying) Waited on hold, she came back and said it was not promised there’s nothing more they can do it’s not possible to refund the remainder I have to go to the restaurant to get the delivery and service charge refunded, explained contract law again and the fact that the driver is employed by just eat and not KFC they continued to refuse the full refund promised. I demanded to speak to a manger she stated the manager will tell me the same thing I asked repeatedly to speak to a senior manager (in excess of 50 times I asked) each time was refused she stated she spoke to her manager and has said the same thing in the end she agreed to have a manager call me back within 48 hrs, I argued this down to 2 hour callback, I confirmed the managers name that she had spoken to and told her I don’t want him phoning I want a different manager to call me.  Received call found out he was not a senior manager but a call Center supervisor and the “manager” I didn’t want the call from, he was as ignorant and rude as all the others, he again directed me to the restaurant I informed him I had spoken to them and as suspected they do not get the payment details, contact details or even the customers name and therefore cannot issue any refunds.  I demanded to speak to a senior manager and again was told they will tell me the same thing and my complaint has gone as far as it can. I continued to demand a callback and was promised a 24 hour callback.  I’m still waiting.  I have emailed the chief executive (google peter Duffy ceo just eat for his contact info they won’t allow me to post it here) directly with my formal complaint and this appears to be being ignored as there has not even been an acknowledgement of my complaint.  I will now be taking this to the trading standards and watchdog.  I would urge anyone else who has been ripped off by this company to do the same i was on the phone with my complaint in excess of 5 hours this is completely unacceptable and I will not let this go. I will go to their offices if I have to.

Title: Fraud.
Review: People are committing fraud through Just Eat and it's a problem. Just eat allow people to set up recurring transactions and then using old stolen card details from a card that is now 'inactive'. I have now blocked just eat from being able to ever take money out of my account (fraudsters did manage to get £18.43 out of me) and I will NEVER ever use them. Be vigilant and don't bother using this service. I tried to speak to them to find out who was using my details but they never told me who just told me to contact my bank, which isn't good enough as I want to know WHO is defrauding me.

Title: Ordered from the app at 6pm for KFC
Review: Ordered from the app at 6pm for KFC. Still waiting for food to arrive. Have phoned KFC food waiting to be collected. Called Just Eat and have been told they didnt have a driver. Have changed delivery time 5 times. but if we cancel the order we will loose our money. Company are con artists. They take your money but you dont get your food. Dont use the App.

Title: Worst company to deal with if you want…
Review: Worst company to deal with if you want to get refund for the order you never received

Title: Poor Customer Service
Review: I place an order with Chicken cottage on a regular basis through JustEat. On this occasion I never received my order. JustEat claim their driver delivered and completed the order, although I didn’t receive anything! JustEat now claim that the driver has delivered and “someone” had signed for it - I have never been asked to sign for an order with JustEat! I usually get a call from the driver to say he’s outside and didn’t receive a call this time round. Clearly, the driver has given the delivery to someone else!Having contacted JustEat to claim a refund through their live chat and on the phone, I was advised no refund would be given as the driver has completed the delivery. How can a customer pay for something that’s not been delivered to you? The lady on the phone was shockingly rude! She would not let me speak and cut me off twice! At least the live chat representative was more helpful to pass me on to her supervisor! The supervisor was meant to call me within an hour of me putting the phone down... which obviously did not happen!Having wasted over two hours of my time, I do expect a refund and will pursue it through a small claims court if I have to!

Title: Worst company to join
Review: What a terrible company to join as partners.Nearing 2 weeks and they cant even change my menus for update.Customer service is a total flop to the philipines or bulgaria .The company has grown too big that they just couldnt cope.Dont bother to join them.

Title: The biggest thieves company ever in the…
Review: The biggest thieves company ever in the uk

Title: Terrible customer experience
Review: Terrible customer experience, tried about 5 or 6 times to process a refund. I contacted the restaurant as they requested which they agreed, cannot get just eat to action this though after multiple attempts. After explaining multiple times they have come back to me with a £5 voucher, still waiting for my actual refund. I have no idea what Justeat actually do to justify charging any service fee, when there is an issue they make you contact the restaurant and arrange a refund which has to go through Justeat, they never actually give you your money back. Appalling.

Title: Slow Customer Service
Review: Chatting to customer services seems to take ages.I had to wait for a long time yesterday to resolve a problem as food was not delivered, then today have to wait as the refund was not sorted out properly.The people you chat with are always very helpful and friendly, but the company needs to sort out getting more service staff.

Title: Ordered KFC did not deliver but took my…
Review: Ordered KFC did not deliver but took my money. Just eat have been appalling, this was last Saturday. The Customer Services is shocking. I am being told it is with the escalation team..still after a week. This is theft, they have taken my money without providing the services and now will not return it. Definitely will not be using this useless company again!!

Title: 2 bloody hours not even a phonecall.
Review: I ordered a burger from a local eatery, waited 2 bloody hours and nothing then it said it had been delivered despite its own tracker saying it hadn’t left the shop.Phoned my local Chinese instead and got it in 20minutes.The service is awful, will never use it again

Title: Disgraceful company
Review: Disgraceful company, impossible to get issues resolved and don’t issue full refunds even when entitled to them. Appalling company

Title: Overcharged by Just Eat
Review: Overcharged by Just Eat and customer services said there's nothing they can do about it. My order was for £22.20 + .50p service charge (for what?) but I saw £35.05 deducted from my account. No explanation, no help. Not my first issue with them, last year we had to really push to get a refund on an order when we found several large and small shards of plastic in our milkshakes. Will not trust Just Eat again.

Title: The BIG problem with Just Eat is after…
Review: The BIG problem with Just Eat is after you have chosen your food and paid for it the site states that it is waiting for the restaurant/take-away to accept your order, Guess what? they ACCEPT the order, of course they do. Then your order is LATE! The classic situation then happens, you ring to ask where is my food? They reply 'sorry we are very busy'. OK then WHY did you accept my f-*-c-k-i-n-g order if you KNEW you couldn't fulfil it??? Why don't you sanction food outIets, if they do this, just eat? I have decided to get off my backside after 12 hours working/commuting and walk to my local chinese. Stuff you just eat! You stink!

Title: I’ve been using justeat for years and…
Review: I’ve been using justeat for years and years before it got big ;)It’s always been a great way to learn about new food options in my area and I’ve never had an issue

Title: No refund
Review: No refundtried to get a refund for an order and just eat did not care and said to call the restaurant whom did not help as it's just eat who has to refund it. Just eat still refuses to refund it

Title: Terrible company
Review: Terrible company. If something is wrong with your order, they couldn't care less. Found a foreign object in my food and the customer service people just give you the pre written script and fake sympathy. They might not cook the food but in my opinion they should hold shared responsibility as they list the company in their app, which makes them business. This company will take your money but will not be there for the customer should anything go wrong.

Title: HONESTLY GIVEN UP ON THIS CRAP....
Review: HONESTLY GIVEN UP ON THIS CRAP....LATE FOODNO CUSTOMER SERVICE OVERPRICED ITEMSRATHER GO AND COLLECT MY SELF.

Title: What rubbish experience
Review: What rubbish experience. Liars. I ordered from kfc..waited 30mins.called kfc, told me driver came and no one was around.what the hell??!!! I was literally by the door with my ice in my cup .Justeat tells me it has been delivered and signed for. What!?? Dnt use this app. You will get hungry stressed and loose your money!

Title: Absolutely worst customer service ever! App says delivered order although not delivered in reality!
Review: Absolutely worst customer service ever! Haven’t received the order over an hour. I phoned back the driver who left a voice mail but the Phone number did not take any calls redirecting me to just eat number. After over an hour, still awaiting to be picked up by customer service nobody picking up. I have not received the order! However on the app it says delivered! Absolute joke how it says on the app delivered when it’s not even delivered! Not recommended to anyone ever!

Title: Worst customer service ever!
Review: After waiting nearly three hours for our food I had to turn it away in the end as we had to go out and get our own food because the "restaurant" refused to answer their phone so we didn't know if it would ever arrive. I tried to get a refund as three hours is an unacceptable amount of time to expect anyone to wait and was told by the restaurant it was Just Eats problem and was told by Just Eat (when I eventually got through) to contact the restaurant and they are just ignoring me now. Shocking how they treat their customers. Will never use them again. My advice - stay away!!

Title: Food doesn’t arrive- customer service is non existent
Review: I ordered from just eat last Friday from a restaurant five minutes away from my house. After 40 minutes I checked my order information to see if it was close by but it said it had been successfully delivered. I called just eat and was on hold for over 30 minutes. I started a chat with their “bot”  but no body answered or helped. I ended up trying to call the restaurant directly and asking if they could help but they said it was a just eat order and I would have to contact just eat because they just prepare the food. The next day I called just eat and finally got through for the man to accuse me that I was lying and that I had actually signed for the food which was ridiculous because I’ve never signed for a meal with them before. He proceeded to tell me I must contact the restaurant which I did and they had the same answer to contact just eat. Honestly I will never be ordering off of just eat ever again. They are very unhelpful and I’ve just lost over £50.

Title: Absolutely shocking!
Review: Shocking lack of communication, waited 2 hours but order never arrived! No answer on customer service and no answer at restaurant. What a complete joke! Will never use again!

Title: Worst customer service I've ever…
Review: Worst customer service I've ever experienced. I accept things go wrong sometimes but it's impossible to get a resolution when they do. I got thrown out of an online chat for 'inactivity' when I was #178 in the queue and waiting to connect to a human being. I now go to my local, takeaway in person, which is far more inconvenient as there's no parking, but I'll never give just eat a penny of my money again.

Title: JustEat is an absolutely awful company
Review: JustEat is an absolutely awful company. I will tell you why. I am an app designer, marketer and business consultant and ordered food from JustEat this morning.Order number(814977297) Two and a have hours later after numerous phone calls to the restaurant and to JustEat (the restaurant whom happened to cook my food twice as their reputation would be on the line if they sent out soggy cold food which is wastage to them). I reckon after this fiasco the restaurant may drop JustEat.I told JustEat that my order had not arrived on multiple occassions after waiting to be connected more than 30 minutes each time and JustEat said systems were down with their third party drivers. I had no reply to my Tweet or to my FB message.Your pathetic excuse is frankly not my problem and seeing as I was late for appointmnets Just Eat should at least compensate me, not give me worthless £5.00 credit notes. What makes you think I will ever use JustEat ever again????????????????????What is stopping me building a bigger app and better service and taking away your business???????????????Furthermore I messaged the CEO of Just Eat and told him if I have lost business because of JustEat due to their incompetantance then it is only right that JustEat should loose business too.Trustpilot is only the start of what I can do.What is stopping me to spread my experience far and wide on all social media platforms and on my marketing blogs.I even asked for them to call an independant taxi company and they said it was against their policy and that their hands were tied.I would be extremely worried if I were in their shoes and most of my reviews were 1 star ratings. If I could give minus ten I would. What is stopping me marketing JustEat competitors like Deliveroo or UberEats free of charge just so that JustEat feels a dent in their business, considering I lost a customer because of them as they could not wait around for me.It will be interesting if JustEat respond to this but I am not holding by breath.

Title: Astonishingly bad on multiple…
Review: Astonishingly bad on multiple occasions. Terrible customer service,  basically if there is a problem they just laugh at you .

Title: Best scam ever
Review: Placed an order from just eat Sunderland.Ordered a chicken parmesan and a bottle of coke. (12,40 pounds total) I was charged twice the amount. Tried calling the restaurant they never answered. Spoke with the just eat help line they closed the phone on me immediately when I asked if I was going to get my money back.

Title: Wrong order, ignored my demand for a refund.
Review: Wrong order from Burger King Watford. When I tried calling to resolve it I was 99+ in the chat queue. Called them, same thing. Next day managed to eventually get someone on the chat customer service after a 20 minute wait - and they then ended the chat when I demanded a refund for what was basically an order not delivered.Ive since complained direct to Burger King Head Office.I will never ever use Just Eat again. Worst customer service I think ive ever encountered.And I still havent had my money back.

Title: Take the money and run......
Review: Take no responsibility for service to customer  even though contract is with them. Multiple customers have complained about KFC CARDINAL PARK and yet JE do nothing. They just want the money. Customer is stuck in the middle and gives up eventually because life is too short. I think this is what JE hope will happen as working with the restaurants to achieve good service is not a priority.

Title: Shocking customer service
Review: The worst customer service that I've ever experienced. I ordered a pizza from a nice little pizza place. They duly cooked it and had it ready and the just eat driver didn't turn up. By the time it got to us nearly 2 hours after ordering, it was unsurprisingly stone cold and like cardboard. After spending time with 2 customer services reps and 1 manager, they just kept trying to blame it on the poor restaurant owner and refused to take any responsibility themselves even though the network of riders is theirs alone. Shocking lack of any moral fibre from this company who should be protecting their partners, not throwing them under the bus.

Title: THE ABSOLUTE WORST!
Review: The absolute worst! I received one item from my order. There were 4 items missing and tried calling just eat. Their customer service is a complete joke as they keep you on hold for over 20 mins. Can’t say they helped resolve the issue as I couldn’t reach them after the long hold. So I’ve lost £25 and no promise of a refund.  My advice is to directly order form the restaurant.

Title: Can you give them 0 stars ?
Review: Can you give them 0 stars ?!  Absolutely appalled - ordered 5 pizzas on Friday evening (total cost = £81.45).  Pizzas turned up on time so I thought initially great service ....... until I happened to check my bank account shortly after and found out that they've taken £81.45 TWICE !!  I called their customer service straight away and was holding on for 20 mins ..... I then googled and discovered they close at 9pm (ggrrrr).  I've tried to contact them on their Chat option on my phone and I've also called them many times over the weekend but you just stay on hold - I'm trying them again as I type. I've now been on hold for 18 mins so far and to add insult to injury, just heard a message telling me my place in the queue is number 30 (5 mins ago it told me I was in place 22 !!)  Absolutely appalling ...... and I'm now very worried that I'm not going to get my money back, reading the other reviews on here.

Title: Disgusting!
Review: Disgusting!Totally unreliable!If your order turns up on the same day, you're lucky!!Customer service don't give a ****!UK management have outsourced everything to the Philippines!This company is clearly dying!Order through anyone else!!

Title: BAD EXPERIENCE - AVOID
Review: Waste of time ordering through these guys.  Had an issue with a shortage and they couldn’t care less.  Reported it on the app via a bot which said it’ll need to take up the issue with the restaurant. Asked for an update several days later and it was a case of “report it within 48 hours”. Which is was?  Just help the restaurant out by cutting out the commission and order with them direct.

Title: I can't believe what just happened..
Review: I can't believe what just happened... I can't believe this company are allowed to operate...I didn't think any company was worse than uber but they've managed it...needless to say i will never use this company again - a complete scam

Title: yes im another one .UNFORTUNATELY
Review: yes I'm another one .paid for something that never arrived!  ordered 3 burgers only 0.2m away and driver never arrived don't know why BUT worse think is he mark as DELIVERED and i can't do nothing about it restaurants says contact just eat ..just eat said contact restaurant..really angry now will uninstall app now and never use just eat again time and money wasnt (this time £27 bye bye)...

Title: Will never use again AVOID AVOID AVOID
Review: Had problems with a order it was an hour late, wrong order, damaged and cold. Restaurant wouldn't help just eat wouldn't help! £30 lost this company is a scam, the restaurant says just eat have to refund me and just eat say the restaurant this is the biggest scam ever! Will never use again

Title: Appauling Customer Service
Review: Customer service from JustEat is appalling. Ordered take away and only half our order arrived meaning sharing and cooking to feed us all, ruining our night from there. We then spent the rest of the night (about 4 hours) trying to contact JustEast customer service via live chat and phone and also the restaurant with no luck just hours on end of checking to see if the call or chat had been answered. The next day I called again a handful of times with the same luck, stuck on hold for hours. Live chat again being '99' in the queue and never moving. They wont reply to emails, live chat or calls. The customer service is completely appalling and, unless you know the restaurant and trust then, I would avoid at all costs cause you wont be refunded or even given the time of day otherwise.

Title: Take away wouldn’t deliver due to not…
Review: Take away wouldn’t deliver due to not finding addressJut eat keeping my money tonight Going hungry😡🤬

Title: They never deliver
Review: Never use them, you will starve. They never deliver, long long long waits to get through to customer service advisor.

Title: Justeat are one of the worst companies…
Review: Justeat are one of the worst companies I have ever dealt with. I have owned a Takeaway in the UK for 24 years and was always proud of our industry. They are ruining the good name of thousands of fellow operators with their horrendous lack of customer skills and out right greed. I feel it is time to add to the many dissatisfied  customers the feelings  from our (the operators) side.They withold funds from us at a whim. Delete anything negative about themselves in reviews immediately, negate to respond to requests for help from us, and penalise takeaways with no warning. Although potentially inappropriate my feeling is that they behave like scum.It may be a request on deaf ears against the barrage of justeat advertising but please, please try ordering direct from your local takeaway and witness a superior customer experience first hand!

Title: DO NOT USE!!
Review: DO NOT USE!!! FOOD DID NOT ARRIVE, WAS TOLD THE DRIVER TRIED TO CALL AND RING THE DOOR BELL, DONT HAVE MY NUMBER (this is confirmed on my profile, so the fact they said he tried to call when they can see my number is not on the profile is a lie) AND MY PARTNER WAS OUTSIDE WAITING, AFTER BEING FOBBED OFF 4 TIMES OVER A 2 HOUR PERIOD OF BEING PASSED AROUND WAS TOLD THAT IT WOULD TAKE 24 HOURS TO GET A CALL BACK!!!AFTER BEING HUNG UP ON I DEMANDED TO SPEAK TO A TEAM LEADER REF 25332341 (call to team leader)Ref of order 808396424

Title: Horrible! I'm appalled by the service, or lack there of
Review: Appaling experience. Just eat calls me on behalf of the restaurant because they are missing an item from my pizza, I agree for them to replace it, and then my pizza gets delivered missing a different item. Try to contact the restaurant via the app, but no longer delivering. Try to contact just eat via the app, but chat doesn't work! Then try to call just eat back on the no. They called me. Waited for 1.5 hours in queue (fell asleep otherwise would have given up long time before) and as someone answered they seemed not  to hear me and then hung up on me. The waiting message gives no. in queue but not waiting times. So you just wait and wait... You couldn't have had more than 2 people in that call centre. How do you explain a waiting time of 1.5 hours?unbelievable! It's a high risk to order through them, do not do it, as they clearly don't have the processes in place and don't care about their customers! Avoid using them! They're just not good!

Title: Abysmal
Review: Abysmal, I've been waiting for 2 hours and I've recieved nothing, very inconsistent. This company needs to fix up big time because this is ridiculous

Title: (9:35pm)
Review: (9:35pm)Jean U. : I can see it here that the order is still not complete, which means that our system does not allow us to take any action until an order has been fulfilled. I do apologise about this. You can call the restaurant directly or wait until the order is marked as complete.ME: i have already received the order(10 Mins later)ME: Jean?(15 Mins later)ME: I would appreciate it if you didnt ignore me, if you do not have the time to speak with me, pass me to someone else.(25 Mins later)ME: Hi jean, i saw you type previously(15 mins later)Jean U.The order isn't complete on our system yet.ME: Well it clearly is hereJean U.Thank you for using Just Eat, goodbye for now.(CHAT CLOSED BY JEAN U.)

Title: Will stop using them as they kept my…
Review: Will stop using them as they kept my money and did not want to refund when a restaurant fraudulently marked my order as delivered when I have never received it. Will seek legal action soon. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

Title: Lost a customer
Review: Lost a customer, worst customer service in the whole full worldThis is my review on just eat, and it's not a very good one 😔"Wrong order on hold to just eat customer service 40 mins on hold, won't be using this platform again, poor customer service, I would always pay with a credit card and if they mess your order up, simply do a chargeback, lot easier for us the customer but is terrible for justeat, payment process really don't like it. So, all in all, I would give just customer service a wide berth.Note to just eat, I know this will be deleted, but the same review will be left on Trustpilot and Google reviews etc. "Looking on Trustpilot it seems I am not alone. The customer service from deliveroo is so much better in my opinion, never had a problem. Perhaps just-eat have taken on more than they can chew before they were just a facilitator in the order, but now they are involved in the delivery side and to be fair I have had no problems with there delivery drivers, they have been excellent, but the restaurants and just-eat are just dire.A 40 minutes wait on hold with customer service tells you the story, it's not just me, there are loads and loads of us not getting our correct orders, which does happen granted, but it's how it is dealt with that makes the difference. I have come away feeling sad and hungry, spending my time writing this, to hopefully warn other poor souls like myself, apart from this shoddy company.Food is a very emotional subject, and for all my whining above, I do realise it is a first world problem and will be donating my order value to a homeless charity and would hope just-eat can maybe do the same. 👍Note to just eat, I know this will be deleted, but the same review will be left on trustpilot and Google reviews etc. "Looking on trustpilot it seems I am not alone. The customer service from deliveroo is so much better in my opinion, never had a problem. Perhaps just-eat have took on more than they can chew, before they where just a facilitator in the order, but now they are involved in the delivery side and to be fair I have had no problems with there delivery drivers, they have been excellent, but the restaurants and just-eat are just dire.A 40 minutes wait on hold with customer service tells you the story, it's not just me, there are loads and loads of us not getting our correct orders, which does happen granted, but it's how it is dealt with that makes the difference. I have come away felling sad and hungry, spending my time writing this, to hopefully warn other poor souls like myself, away from this poor company.Food is very emotional subject, and for all my whining above, I do realise it is a first world problem and will be donating my order value to a homeless charity and would hope just-eat can maybe do the same 👍

Title: Bad site give my post code as 10 miles…
Review: Bad site give my post code as 10 miles from where I live and can not send a complant as no where to do it

Title: Do not use them.
Review: Do not use them.They don't even show up.. then say they did and that they can't refund me? They have an app to say they didn't even come close to my door.... yeah but sorry we still can't refund!?

Title: Rip off!!!
Review: Wasn't expecting my pizzas to be over 6 pound more expensive than ordering direct. The first and last time I use Just Eat.  App deleted.

Title: Terrible delivery time and service
Review: Terrible delivery time and service. Not pleased at all.

Title: Didn't receive my food on Saturday. Stole my money
Review: Didn't receive my food on Saturday.  On my account it says delivered. Everytime I call I can't get through.  I have emailed and it bounces back and the web chat is with a robot.They still have my money and I had to order with deliveroo instead

Title: Was checking my order in the basket and…
Review: Was checking my order in the basket and realised I had clicked on one item twice and selected the wrong drink, so I went back to place another order with the correct items in. Bare in mind I was only in the basket on the previous one and did not click to continue, nor did I put my fingerprint in to confirm any payment or confirm in any way, the order was placed as well as my new order. Tried to cancel the first one (that I did not place) only to be told I would have to pay half of the order value!! Contacted the takeaway who told me they cannot cancel the order as it is already being prepared. Just eat customer service closes at 18:00 and not open on sunday! I'm pretty sure this counts as theft as I did not confirm or continue beyond the basket page! Will not be using just eat again.

Title: BEWARE...don’t cancel an order, it’ll cost you
Review: Placed an order at 7pm tonight. Anticipated delivery time was 7.50, not too bad I thought however at 8.10, still no food so after checking with the app I gave the restaurant a call who said that the food was on its way. At 8.30 still hungry and with no food I phoned the restaurant back and said I wasn’t prepared to wait any longer and to cancel the order. I asked for a refund and they said as I had ordered through Just Eat I had to call them. 30mins of holding and someone finally answers the phone to say no worries a refund will be processed. Things we’re looking up I thought as deiveroo had also just delivered my replacement order. Anyway I get my refund confirmation and they have the cheek to advise me that the refund has been processed less a £6.30 cancellation charge. Shocking!!! No food, thoroughly fed up  also out of pocket.... WHAT A SCAM !!!! I’m definitely in the wrong business, sign me up for the first franchise, sounds like easy money

Title: Absolutely appalling service
Review: Absolutely appalling service. No comparison to superior alternatives like uber eats and deliveroo. The food was sat at the restaurant for over an hour with no delivery driver to pick it up. Called their help line and they didn't answer after 30 mins on hold. An absolute scam of a service!

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service. My food never arrived and when I called the number I was on hold for 45 minutes and never actually got to speak to anyone. Definitely will not be buying anything from just eat again.

Title: Worse service ever,scam !!!my food…
Review: Worse service ever,scam !!!my food never arrived. Just eat made no effort to help u just lose your money.I lost my money and was abused by the driver on the phone.

Title: The worst customer service experience ever
Review: The worst customer service experience I have ever had! Was abused by a restaurant manager several times over the phone from a just eat order. I complained to just eat only to be ignored for weeks. Told I had to contact the police as there was nothing they could do and basically informed they didn’t believe me. This after hours of using their on line chat function and being passed from person to person with the chat ended on their behalf not mine so having to repeat my complaint again and again! Utterly useless company DO NOT USE THEY DONT GIVE A DAMB ABOUT YOU AS A CUSTOMER!

Title: Not even worth 1 star- customer service is a joke
Review: If I could have scored no stars I would. Food ordered at 6.30 and arrived at 8.30. In that time I called the restaurant who confirmed just eat drivers had cancelled my order and left it in the restaurant for 30 mins (despite app updates telling me it was round the corner) the restaurant recooked my food and again waited almost 30 mins for a driver. The restaurant could not have been more helpful and advised me to call just eat for a refund. Easier said than done. Tried to use the app chat, 76 people waiting to be dealt with. It took me a further 35 mins on the phone to get through and the solution was a £5 refund. What a joke, customer service did nothing to make me feel like a valued customer with that joke of an offer. In the 45 mins I was on the phone I was repeatedly told no more senior staff were available to speak to me. Thanks just eat for turning what should have been a relaxing evening into a totally unpleasent and stressfull evening. It is now clear that my custom mean nothing to you. As I explained on the phone I will now be deleating my app and tonight will be the last order i place. Thank goodness the restaurant were helpful and understanding (i will order direct from them next time) because its very clear that just eat couldnt care less

Title: Never again ! #justpoop
Review: Ordered food from Just Eat and my food was 1 hour late so I called the restaurant and I was told that it’s on the way . I then contacted the just eat customer service because it was now 2 hours late . I was then told that they can not refund me and I had to contact the restaurant. Tried calling the restaurant again and they said the driver was on the way . I then got a call about 4 hours later saying the driver got lost so he took back the order and they couldn’t refund and I had to contact justeat. So to cut it short  5 hours later I am left with no food and no refund . Will never order from just eat again . They should change their policies and improve their customer service or just shut down . I could have gone out and gotten food for myself in this time . So much stress and inconvenience. I would give it negative stars if I could . Never ordering from them again .

Title: My order never arrived helpdesk is useless
Review: My order never arrived when I called just eat the call centre person just kept repeating from a script and kept contradicting herself.The more I got frustrated the more she contradicted herself and told me a different story while laughing at my issues.

Title: I attempted to place an order but…
Review: I attempted to place an order but discovered my postcode shows as a business park several miles away, I attempted to correct this with the chat function but the customer service rep. either didn't care or couldn't grasp the idea the location showed by my postcode is wrong & therefore any order would be delivered to the wrong place.Seemed easiest to give up

Title: Zero customer service
Review: Zero customer service. Food was more than an hour late with no update and I couldn't get hold of the restaurant or Just Eat and the app wouldn't let me cancel. I just sat on hold for ages and gave up in the end. Just terrible!

Title: Lack of Customer Service.
Review: Absolutely disgusted with the lack of customer service from just eat. I have been on hold with them twice trying to speak to someone - I’ve never been able to get through. Both times I’ve waited for 10 minutes before giving up. I’ve left a review about how horrible our delivery service was regarding a recent order and I’ve gone back to my account and all my orders have now disappeared. I’ve had ZERO communication from Just Eat, my order was 2 weeks ago now, no one human has contacted me, I’ve just waiting on hold with both just eat and the restaurant. Absolutely fed up now and I won’t be using them again. Family and friends have heard all about my complaint as it’s just ridiculous how they’ve not bothered and had a customer on hold for this long. I have had one email regarding a reference for my complaint, no one has actually responded to me in 2 weeks regarding it, not even a holding email from their customer service or complaints teams. What a joke.

Title: Disgraceful customer service
Review: Took my money quick enough but will not refund it following a total failure to delivery the goods and service paid for.Delivery arrived only to be completely different order to what I had ordered, the restaurants number was not supplied only just eats. After 30 minutes of being cut of whilst trying to contact them I was greeted by a rude unhelpful operator only interested in getting me off the phone. Outright refused to refund the total charge to my debit card claiming I had received delivery. Yes the wrong one you incompetent fool. Unable to speak to anyone to resolve, only offered a call back within 24 hours USELESS. So been charged for food I didn’t receive and left with nothing to eat.Update: 24 hours later and no call back, not at all surprised this bunch liars and thief’s. Absolute shocking company clearly run by a useless incompetent bunch of managers. Clearly this is how to make money from people. STEAL IT this is theft and criminal

Title: Worst delivery SERVICE EVER CONMEN
Review: Worst delivery SERVICE EVER CONMEN! stole my EFFING MONEY !! I ordered from KFC Finsbury park and the app said received when I never did - called KFC and they said driver confirms when delivered which is baffling to me - and you don't even know who the driver is to add insult to injury - THeir Customer service line is the worst refused to refund me! froze my account! HA!! to EFFING them

Title: On most occasions it's been a great…
Review: On most occasions it's been a great service for me in the past, apart from some difficulties with logging in to their account on some occasions. Then this suddenly worked again and has been ok for some months now. Then a restaurant cancelled my order and I was still charged however with Just Eat's advice I was able to get a refund from my bank. There was one other occasion where the same restaurant didn't deliver me my food and I was still charged but I didn't contact Just Eat for that but saw the restaurant boss instead and got my food. Then where I actually did have a problem with Just Eat after another restaurant sent me an incomplete order and I couldn't get a refund via their website. Now, all of a sudden I am having difficulties in making any purchases via Just Eat's website, it keeps saying that my payment has been declined and to try again but it keeps failing to work on me trying it. I would recommend the service and they have tried to assist me with this on Live Chat earlier today (thank you), however I am wondering if there's a bug on their website as nothing is making it work and so i have no choice to deactivate my account for now

Title: Scam...take money and don't deliver!
Review: Terrible service after service. Yet again food not delivered cannot get through to restaraunt and spent 30 mins on hold with no answer to Just Eat. Another £17 wasted and no refund totally disgusted and will complain to ombudsman as in breach of service. Plain theft ..dont recommend and avoud arcall costs just a SCAM!

Title: Stay away !
Review: Stay away ! They just don’t care ! Waste your money on orders that are not going to be delivered

Title: Food 40 mins late
Review: Food 40 mins late, and just to add insult to injury, the driver had crossed out the original bill of £14.20, and made it £15.20 £1.00 for himself..... ok then! Do one you little thief, never use Just eat again, stick to deliveroo!!

Title: Disgusting!!!!
Review: Disgusting!!!!We ordered through just eat for the payment to decline on 2 cards. Phoned up the shop and was told we can pay by card on delivery. We got charged £1 surcharge to deliver through just eat and the £3 for delivery. To top it all off another £1 for using the card machine. Wouldn’t mind so much but the food was not edible. The kebab looked About 3 days old it was hard and cold. The pizza wasn’t great. The chips were cold. Please avoid this place.

Title: F****** bulls***
Review: F****** bulls***! I ordered food on Sunday, which arrived over 2 hours late and lukewarm!I have tried to call Just Eat to get a refund because that is unacceptable. I have called the customer service line everyday since (it's been almost a week!) and I have not gotten through spoken to anyone. I even tried their "live chat" and same problem.Do they even hire anyone to answer the complaints or do they think listening to the hold music is enough???Total frauds.

Title: Absolutely shocking!!
Review: Absolutely shocking!!Orderd Kfc at 18:57 and delivery time was 19:40.At 20:00 when the food was already 20 minute late I rang KFC restaurant and explained my situation and they said that there waiting for a driver. I rang back 30 minutes later and was told by a unhelpful rude lady that my order had nothing to do with them and ring just eat where I had no answer from them again!!!Now it is 21:06 and apparently my food has been 'deliverd' but yet still NO FOOD. I've been waiting 2 hours for KFC to tell me it's nothing to do with them only just eat can help yet they dont want to answer my calls!!NEVER AGAIN

Title: Horrible delivery service!
Review: Delivery driver just sit in the car and wait for you to find him! Totally ridiculous! Their delivery driver DO NOT use maps and lazy to find out the building location!

Title: Absolutely horrendous
Review: Absolutely horrendousIn my view this platform enables thieves to take your money even when they don't deliver food and have policies in place which require the restaurants authorisation - protecting them not the consumer.Restaurant lied and marked the order as delivered when it wasn't. Just eat require the restaurants approval to process my refund. Restaurant already told me nothings wrong. DAYLIGHT ROBBERY ENABLED BY JUST EAT no refund and no compensation for the horrid customer service from just eatdelete the app and use uber eats

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service, they took payment twice for one order and refuse to refund my money. Do not store your bank details with these guys as they can just take money out of your bank with no authorisation then refuse to return it. Very dodgey, avoid at all costs

Title: Useless app, excruciating customer Helpdesk.
Review: Useless app, keeps crashing.Worst customer service / helpline experience ever.Still waiting for answers about their data breach,  completely ignoring me.Getting refunds for wrong orders impossible.Refusing to get involved if a restaurant doesn’t deliver on time. Avoid.

Title: Just Eat are absolute thieves..
Review: Just Eat are absolute thieves... twice 2 different restaurants (on 2 separate occasions) have failed to deliver what we paid for, the restaurants lied & marked it as “delivered” & refused to give a full refund.So basically you end up ordering, waiting for several hours & paying only for nothing to arrive & just end up with stress trying to hold the restaurant to account & Just Eat don’t even care or take care of their loyal customers! It’s disgusting.At the very least a full refund is required considering the orders never arrived. These restaurants are disgusting, to rob customers, lie & get away with it. They should all be ashamed! Just Eat have gone down-hill & you would never get this kind of service elsewhere. Don’t use them!

Title: Just Eat doesnt deserve even a single…
Review: Just Eat doesnt deserve even a single star.I ordered a Regency takeaway on Monday 30th September 2019.  The food should have been delivered to me by 745pm.  I was celebrating my Birthday with a delivery meal at home.At 8pm, I called Regency to see the situation about my food delivery.   Spike to Gotham, he said the food has been ready since 1935... but the driver isn't here to collect.  I tried to call Just eat several times... no answer. I called Regency again, and Gotham tried to call Justeat for me.  They never picked up.I asked Regency to cancel the order,  and ordered a pizza instead.... delivered on time.At 2155 the door bell rings.... it's the Regency food delivery from justeat.  I asked the driver to take the food back as I had cancelled the order.Complained to Justeat the next day via webchat and they also called back in the evening. They offered a refund for the food order and a £5 credit to my account..... which is a joke.  They caused me inconvenience the night before, and all they can do is offer a £5 credit. Would anyone be happy with that!!!Never use JustEat.... they are cheats and should be called JustCheats.Stick to Ubereats.... they are more professional and understanding.

Title: Bunch of thieves
Review: Bunch of thieves. Ordered from wimpy, said delivered, it wasn't.Pay by cash never card with these conmen

Title: Ordered from KFC
Review: Ordered from KFC, food never arrived, but it says delivered, contacted KFC and they don't no where my food is and I cant get a refund. Contacted just eat after an hour got to talk to someone, they cant give me a refund, but someone will contact me in the next hour, that was 24 hours ago. And the chat hasn't worked tried that for the last 24 hours!!

Title: Avoid at all costs
Review: Such a bad company. Awful. Avoid it. Charged the money for the thing they never delivered. False advertise: the places are actually closed.

Title: Just Eat is a fraudulant company
Review: Just Eat is a fraudulant company. Ordered meal from KFC for over £100, an hour later i get a notification that it had been delivered. Phoned restaurant and confirmed it had not even been collected by the driver. Just Eat help app bot informs me that restaurant must be busy and that revised time for delivery is now 4 hours later than originally stated. Had to go collect COLD meal myself. DO NOT USE JUST EAT THEY TAKE NO RESPONSIBILITY AND OPENLY COMMIT FRAUD WITH NO RECOURSE.

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service, food never turned up, so decided to call when it was an hour over due. Took 40 minutes to get through, eventually the handler told me the package had been delivered to the wrong address and then returned as damaged.I had never been contacted or even informed of these problems by just eat.Decided to call the resteraunt directly as I was curious. It seems they have been having issues with Just eat even assigning drivers, but in this case the driver had taken it, but then called up to say he had spilt the gravy and not delivered. Resteraunt manager was as perplexed as I was as to why he never came back to get a replacement.. Or had contacted us to let us know.. Now I just use the app to see what open and what's on their menu before contacting the resteraunt directly. Usually get better deals and service anyway

Title: Failed to deliver and can't get a refund
Review: Ordered from restaurant, one of the just eat drivers rode down my street so he could mark it as delivered and keep it for himself. Just Eat are refusing to do anything about this are saying I should phone the restaurant even though it's an issue with their own delivery drivers.

Title: I wish I could give a 0 star rating
Review: I wish I could give a 0 star rating! Worst experience ever. Restaurant was Paya in Winchester Road, london E4 9LH. Food arrived 2.5hrs late freezing cold, I handed it straight back to driver and told him to tell restaurant I want my money back. At 2hs late I actually cancelled the order. Restaurant says not refunding as they were busier than expected via just eat text message. I cannot get through to the restaurant.So they get £41.30 and I get no dinner. Just eat offered me £5 which I refused as it's a disgraceful offer. Full refund demanded.

Title: Food never arrived and I cannot believe…
Review: Food never arrived and I cannot believe how unprofessional they are! No apology and rude as hell. Didn't want to help me with my order. Said nothing they can do! Avoid the company at all costs! They are RIP offs.. poor customer service and rude esp someone called Ayell and team manager Jopth!

Title: Where are your drivers?
Review: I made an order using JustEat tonight. Once the delivery was 30 minutes late, I tried to reach JustEat customer service for assistance. Needless to say that the customer service is the most useless crap you'll every see. First you are told to call the restaurant, as JustEat will always assume that they are at fault. Unfortunately for me, the poor restaurant was helpless, as the problem came from JustEat drivers who... decided to not show up to work. No one was coming to pick my food, for whatever reason.I tried to reach the customer service by phone, but they stopped answering, and by Twitter, but no one answered. So I had to try to find a solution directly with the restaurant, who offered to cancel the order despite having it ready so I could get a refund.In conclusion: JustEat is useless, their drivers are completely lazy, and if you need help you better go via the restaurant directly, despite JustEat being the source of your issues.

Title: This ###### app site thing is just…
Review: This ###### app site thing is just rubbish! It's a joke! Ordered food. 2 hours late. Never arrived. Didnt cancel it. Took my money and ran. It's a fraud and I ##### hate this thing so much!

Title: Favourita gourmet kitchen bed
Review: I ordered from favourite gourmet kitchen in Bedford from just eat. The order was originally supposed to arrive within 45-60 minutes.  At the 60 minute mark I received a phone call from a woman who didn't seem to understand what she should be telling me. She said she'd forgotten to.give the delivery driver our order. I said ok, how long will it take? 30 minutes she replied. An hour later it arrived. When the food turned up it was cold, congealed and soggy. We also received an incredibly spicy burger,  which I didn't order. My son was in tears. My partner even said it was too hot for him ( he loves spicy). We'd spent almost £50 on food. When I asked for a refund the delivery driver offered us £5, which I said wasn't good enough. Then I received a  text message saying that they will give us nothing as they'd given us extra food. It must of been invisible as I couldn't see it.After another hour I finally managed to talk to someone on the just eat live chat ( which took another hour) they would only refund the food. Not our drinks. What a joke. To top it all off the restaurant won't close the order so I can't review them on just eat.

Title: Had chicken karahi from gourmet curry…
Review: Had chicken karahi from gourmet curry house on Ecclesall Road, it was delicious and the chicken was good quality, would definetly recommend this takeaway.

Title: Ordered Burger King via Just Eat
Review: Ordered Burger King via Just Eat. The food arrived in a despicable state, so i drove my car to the store to complain and get a refund. After waiting in store for 20 minutes the store and Just Eat managed to communicate and give me back my refund. Here is the kicker, they refunded me minus the delivery charge. I was told by 2 members of staff on including the staff manager at Burger King that I would receive a FULL REFUND. JUST EAT tried to say "It was the stores fault but they will put it back". I then said imagine all they people you have stolen from that have not complained. Please people do not use this fake service which also damages small buisness with there charges.....

Title: Impossible to get your money back if…
Review: Impossible to get your money back if there is a problem with your order. My order to our local Greek takeaway was never delivered but because the takeaway marked it as delivered JustEat said there was nothing they could do. Their app makes  it very easy to order but do yourself and your wallet a favour and ring direct to the food outlet.

Title: Disgusting Customer Services
Review: Disgusting Customer Services. Will hang up on you for no reason after waiting in a queue for 40 mins. I wanted to chat to them abt an order that arrived over 2 hours late, explained the situation, the man said he will help me and then disconnected the chat. 40 mins waiting and then that! Saved the chat transcript but cant do a thing about ir!!

Title: Worst customer service
Review: Worst customer service, do not order from this app is completely awful. Most restaurants are using better apps that provide customer service such as deliveroo or Uber...I paid for food that never arrived and I have been on the phone for two hours with no refund. They just stole my money, the restaurant actually confirmed they had passed the food to a driver 15 mins after I ordered it and it never came . The app chat service is awful there were 174 people waiting to be charged to and I'm still number twenty in the phone queue. I will never order from this app again, wil stick to a service that provides value for money. I hope it's competitors make this company void

Title: Don't stop till they refund you
Review: Anytime you have to contact just eat for a refund they will always tell you it takes 48-72hrs for their investigation team to look into it. This is a lie. Just keep arguing with them. Tell them you know for a fact that they can refund you there and then and that their customer service is shocking. I have had to do this twice now and both times I have ended up refunded right away. They just flat out lie saying it's impossible for them to refund you right away. They can and they will if you keep at them.

Title: Customer service is terrible
Review: Was sent bleeding chicken, I asked for a refund!! 6 days later still waiting for someone to contact me to provide pictures after being told 48 hours. Fuming!!!

Title: No refund once driver marks as complete.
Review: As soon as the driver marks the order as complete or delivered, you cannot get a refund. I had asked for a redelivery and it was confirmed, the driver then marked it as delivered however I never got the food. And then on chat I was told that there was no way to refund and it wasn’t possible because it was marked as complete. Maybe I should become a delivery driver and when I’m hungry mark one of the orders as complete, free, paid for meal.

Title: I havent received my food yet but…
Review: I havent received my food yet but online your website said pay by cash or card I wanted pay by cash your system wouldn't let me . I called the shop up girl says your mistake to do with Just Eat .  Just wasnt happy.

Title: Dishonest or highly incompetent
Review: Dishonest or highly incompetent. I guess this is what happens when a company has a monopoly.

Title: Avoid Avoid Avoid
Review: How can this company get away with not refunding money when food hasn't been delivered? Surely this is against the law. The amount of complaints is breathtaking. Whatever you do DO NOT ORDER from just eat. Leave poor reviews all over the net. In my case the restaurant and just eat are both saying it's the other and I've wasted hours trying to get my money refunded for my none delivery. After this review I don't plan on wasting anymore time. It's just not worth it. Avoid this company whatever you do. You wouldn't think a company in the UK could operate and get away with this. Some serious action should be taken against them.

Title: Disgusted the way I’ve been treated by…
Review: Disgusted the way I’ve been treated by just eat I made a complaint they said I will here in 48 hours it’s been over 48 days and I’ve sent about ten emails since no response you don’t treat loyal customers like that, I’m thinking about moving to uber eats there quicker food comes hot.

Title: Awful service from restaurant and just…
