Review: Awful service from restaurant and just eat .Food late and cold .some food was almost raw .complained told to ring restaurant, did to no avail  they take your money quick enough but when there's a problem .......DONT SEAM TOO HELP

Title: 1 star is unbelivably generous
Review: 1 star is unbelivably generous, I wish I could give negative stars!! Ordered my food at 6.30 PM, for the next hour i had someone on just eat chat telling me the driver is on the way (i live 10 minutes from the restaurant) they are refusing to process a full refund despite half the order missing and what did turn up was stone cold. F**king disgusting service from just eat, wont be using again.

Title: very poor service and support system from Justeat
Review: I placed an order at 18.53 for a pizza. The order was being supplied by Pizza Co.I rang at 20.11, 20.40, 21.02 and 21.06.my order never arrived.I tried to ring Justeat, office closed.I went online with Justeat Chat service, after waiting 10 minutes, I was told to contact Pizza Co, who were no help.I went back unto Justeat Chat, after waiting another 10 mins, the operator JeanU, ended the chat.I will never use Justeat again and would not recommended to anyone.

Title: Totenham area
Review: Totenham area, drivers are by and large very good, the restaurants Ive used have all been very good. WHY ONLY ONE STAR?Their computer system has crashed on me as a customer and also on the restaurants end, could we get through?  NO we were on hold over 30 mins then call got disconnected. NOT A HAPPY BUNNY WITH them!

Title: Can I put no stars?
Review: We are away on holiday in the UK and ordered a takeaway through Just Eat to our holiday park. (Funnily enough, one that was recommended by the holiday park themselves!)Our order was over 40 minutes late so we attempted to contact the restaurant via phone. No answer for ages, time and time again, eventually got through and no one speaks English! Food finally came nearly an hour late. Stone cold and inedible. Can't contact the restaurant as it had conveniently closed! Tried to contact just eat, eventually got through to a 'real person' (although that's debatable) on their chat feature, who repeatedly tells me that it is not showing as delivered on their system and until the restaurant updates this, they can do nothing. How strange when it shows on the app in front of me that it's status is delivered! And then whilst the 'person' on chat is still insisting that their system still hasn't updated the status to delivered, I get a text from just eat (as I had tried to tell them via the app that the delivery was late) saying that the order status had been updated to delivered by the restaurant. Yet the 'person' on the chat still insisted that not to be the case. So we're nearly £30 out of pocket and looks as though we won't be getting a refund as the complaints process on Just Eat is basically non existent!

Title: Very poor customer service
Review: Absolute joke! The wrong food order was delivered so subsequently was sent back to the restaurant. I then contacted Just Eat who advised that a refund would be processed in 5-7 working days! This is utterly unacceptable and appalling of their part. I now have no food and will be out of pocket by £25 until the refund is processed. I won’t be using them again.

Title: Just Eat are a massive waste of space
Review: Just Eat are a massive waste of space.  They do zero verification of customers. God forbid your phone number ends up in the hands morons who have nothing better to do that waste restaurants time and money generating fake orders.I've had dozens of fake orders and Just Eat do absolutely nothing to stop it.  Pathetic company.

Title: I ordered food from Just eat
Review: I ordered food from Just eat . and you trust me , this is second time and Item were missing. I called and they just have one thing .. we will refund money back for missing item. So I received nan and no curry and Just eat wants me to eat NAN with no curry...What a Joke.... Closed my account .. these jerks just wan to earn commission .. Avoid and order directly with restaurant and kill this middle man

Title: Absolutly appalling company
Review: Absolutly appalling service. I placed an order for delivery from burger king through just eat of wich my order never arrived and the order had to be canceled by just eat due to the resturant not responding to them. this was fine by me it wasnt an issue but it was the fact that just eat had charged me around £5 to cancel my order even though it wasnt my fault that the resturant couldnt deliver. so in effect i paid for a takeaway i never received and around £5 taken off for a cancelation fee.When i contacted just eat by phone the advisor didn't really care she asked me to repeat it several times as she didn't understand what the issue was as if this happens all the time.

Title: I ordered food I gave them notice to…
Review: I ordered food I gave them notice to call me when they will arrive and they didn't call me and I lost my food and money. disgusting service don't never order with them! Don't do this mistake!!!!! Be aware!!!!!

Title: Tottaly disappointed with just eat
Review: Tottaly disappointed with just eat, ordered a Chinese for supper tonight waited well over an hour for it to be delivered. When it arrived the platter was burnt and soggy, shredded beef and shredded honey chicken was disgusting it smelled so bad rancid like oil that had been used hadn't been changed in a long time, rice was cold and looked like it had been sitting out a while. It was inedible and my kitchen still smelling so bad. This was from the tasy in portobello and I'm so shocked that they would even send food out smelling so bad. I have phoned just eat and they are investigating but this after looking at other reviews seems to be a common problem. I want a total refund not a voucher as I won't be using this service again. This ruined our night as after working a long shift and looking forward to a treat was let down badly shame on both party's 😞

Title: Awful customer service
Review: I ordered through their website and the restaurant was over 2 hours late with our order. They promised a full refund through justeat, well that never happened. I contacted Justeats customer care and they refused to help. No customer care or service skills at all, they just leave their consumers to the mercy of rougue deliveries.

Title: CON artists
Review: Joined as a courier it’s just one big con after jumping through loop holes and buying a bag and insurance they told me yet again my schedule got messed up I work as a lorry driver and had one week off which I usually only have weekends off so can’t work the following week and what’s to say that won’t happen again just one big CON

Title: Awful customer service and rude…
Review: Awful customer service and rude advisors - issue still not resolved after a live chat, several emails and a phone call!!!

Title: Surprised to see all the bad reviews as…
Review: Surprised to see all the bad reviews as I have never had an issue.

Title: Never again
Review: I have been using Just Eat occasionally for years, because our local food places usually quite good but occassional minor delayed with drivers. My last order got delayed more than an hour, the driver got totally lost or forget about my order. I contacted the restaurant twice they told me they already sent the food. I contacted just eat to cancel my order. They told me that I would be charged 50% - on my original order!!That is nothing but a ridiculous approach. I have de-activated my account and contacted my bank for a full refund. I would recommend everyone not to use or trust this company, they should be immediately inspected by trading standards.

Title: If I could give 1 star I would
Review: If I could give 1 star I would! We called to confirm our order when the app was taking a long time and, whilst on the phone, it was confirmed. We got confirmation that it was going to arrive but, when it never showed, we called the restaurant who said no such order had gone through. This made me so angry especially given the fact I had it confirmed by the restaurant over an hour earlier. I was told to pay again and wait an additional half hour which I wasn’t prepared to do. I was told to call Just Eat for a refund which I did. I was then told they would only refund me 50% as ‘I’m cancelling the order’ I couldn’t believe my ears! I was already told my order wasn’t on route unless I put it through again so I hadn’t cancelled it, the restaurant had failed! I told the person on the phone to contact the restaurant which she did and only then agreed to refund the whole amount plus a measly £5 credit on our account. I’ve had numerous phone calls, gone without dinner and been let down by two establishments and that’s worth £5! I was then told to hold for the satisfaction survey which conveniently didn’t work. I held for ages. They deliberately ensured I wasn’t able to take that survey. Likely because my feedback would have been about as friendly as your customer service. Just eat, just awful!

Title: Should be 0 star
Review: Should be 0 star. Advertised delivery at 45 minutes. Placed order automatically changed time to 1 hour 25 minutes. Already got my money. Disgusting practice false advertising liars.

Title: Terrible company
Review: Terrible company, ordered food, it arrived on time.Then I opened it and started eating it! It was horrible. I requested my money back, was told no, and they took the restaurants side! The food was in the bin 5 minutes after, also I'm stil waiting for juice and dips. Terrible terrible company, really needs to be looked in to! Wheres Martin Lewis or someone like that!! £29.80 in the bin!!

Title: Terrible partner centre customer service,rude and lazy.
Review: Terrible partner centre customer service, rude and lazy. Kept telling us to send email to partner centre and couldn't leave feedback as she deliberately leaves us on hold for more than 30 mins.

Title: NEVER USE JUST EAT - There are better alternatives
Review: Ok, we all know Nando’s make good food - however tonight’s experience of their online delivery service has left me never wanting to eat in one of their restaurants again.We placed an order at 4:00pm, fairly sizeable for 4 people and spent £45 - when the delivery turned up we were missing a double chicken burger, a pretty important part of someone’s meal, no problem - I’ll simply give them a bell and they can whip one round to us... as long as it comes pretty sharpies it’s not going to ruin the meal is it?Well, what should have been a simple ‘common sense’ solution has been dealt with such ineptitude that I honestly thought I was in a carry on film. The situation with the delivery mechanism they have chosen to implement is so confusing that I don’t even think either party (Nando’s or their delivery partner; Just Eat) have any communication between them and it almost feels like their UK CEO don’t have any idea that Just Eat are delivering on their behalf or that they even offer delivery at all, if they did they surely would have implements some simple service level agreements to ensure the following does not happen1. When I phoned up Nando’s to ask them to send the forgotten burger they told me that they can’t do anything and I need to call the delivery company to get it sorted out (we had just sat down to our meal, on what planet did they think I want to make a call, press 1 then 5 then 2 and then be put on hold for 5 minutes while my food is going cold?2. When I convinced the Nando’s staff member to make the call on our behalf as we didn’t mess up the order and it should not ruin everybody else’s meal we did not hear back from them for an hour, when we called we were told to call the delivery company again3. When we called Just Eat we were connected to a member of staff who claimed to be in “Canada” and kept telling me he “understands” but did not listen at all to what I was saying - I tried to explain it’s a simple solution, get one of the drivers to go to Nando’s, collect the forgotten food and bring it round, they said they can’t do that, so I asked if they could arrange for the food to be prepared and I would collect it which they said I would need to speak to the restaurant which annoyed me as I had waited for an hour and been on the phone now to JustEat for 10 minutes so I asked for a full refund as the whole experience has been ruined and I was told we can’t get a refund, I asked to speak to his supervisor which he refused to give me a name of or put me through he then decided to finally hang up on me, no doubt his supervisor was listening in on another headset and told him to do this (I have worked in a customer service call centre myself and know this happens)3. We called back Nando’s to see if they could make the burger and the sides again for that meal (as suggested by Just Eat) and I would go and pick it up which they said they can’t do and we need to speak to the delivery company.....Can you see why I was getting so frustrated???!!!In the end we got nowhere, don’t be fooled when we log onto the Nando’s website to place the order, it is just a rebranded JustEat site and the two companies seem to have no desire to communicate with each other to provide suitable solutions to simple problems like this one which must happen at least once each day at every Nando’s restaurant across the UK that offers a delivery serviceSince I have started writing this I have had a Nando’s call back and also express their disgust at how we were treated by JustEat and gave a full refund and promise of free meals in the future, although this is a fantastic gesture it was too much too late, all we wanted was our simple burger.We have ordered twice this week (£70 spend) and on both occasions have had issues with the system and will never use it again and I am also giving JustEat a swerve from now on, that’s what happens when you hang up on me mofo’s!This is the first review I have ever written and usually I just walk with my feet and never use the company again but felt compelled to share my experience

Title: Just Eat or Just cheat more like
Review: I ordered a takeaway from Just eat and paid by card the restaurant cancelled the order and just eat still took the money from my account I phone just eat to get them to refund my money they had taken only to be told I would have to phone my bank to get my money back I told them that under consumer law it's there responsibility to refund as under law this is classed as a claim back they did not want to know the second time I phoned I spoke to a rude customer service assistant who refused to listen and just put me on hold this company policy started that if a order was cancelled they will refund straight back to your account with in 5 to 10 minutes it 3 day still no money what a joke of a company

Title: Just to reiterate what a lot of people…
Review: Just to reiterate what a lot of people are saying. I think some takeaways do make there own reviews up, just to make it out their food is nice. I was ordering food through just eat on a regular basis, at least once a week for a good 2+ years. Now bearing in mind, in all that time, and all the money just eat have made from my orders, you would think that if and when the day came along for a refund, then just eat would be 100% on my side. I bought a Chineese and the food was very poor quality, yet the takeaway had 5+ stars, which I could hardly believe with such disgusting food. £16.50 literally was thrown in the bin with in 2 mins of arriving. Just Eat never were completely on the takeaways side and never issued a refund. I had to get the money back through my credit card supplier, for them to refund me, which I felt I shouldn't of had to do. Anyway  , just eat have now lost a loyal customer and I no longer have the app.

Title: Love Love Love justeat
Review: Love Love Love justeat! When ever me and my partner get a take away its always through justeat! its quick and simple and we have only had issues once or twice over the years but Just eat were extremely helpful and resolved the issues promptly ... I have friends and family who also order through justeat and have never had any issues ... I cant fault this site! 1000% recommend to future customers :)

Title: Just Eat (or not!)
Review: Placed an order for delivery ASAP from Subway. Website stated out for delivery for driver. Waited nearly an hour and nothing. Contacted local Subway who said that the meal was ready and still there. Then received a call from JustEat saying it was the driver who had marked it delivered and they could not reassign the order. Subway confirmed J Just Eat arrange the driver so could rearrange. Told by JustEat I’d have to reorder again. Have to wait 5-7 days for a refund to my visa (if they process a refund). No Subway not happy! Would not use again!

Title: This is not far short of a scam
Review: This is not far short of a scam. The driver got totally lost and when he rang me could hardly speak a word of English so after an hour of waiting in vain I contacted just eat to cancel my order. They informed me that if I cancelled I would be charged 50% - on a £30 order!That is a novel approach - our service breaks down due to our incompetence but we would still like you to pay half...I don't live in a remote rural setting I live in the centre of a major city. It is on every GPS updated in the last 10 years.I will be deleting the app and I have contacted my bank as I paid by credit card as I think that Just Eat is actually not a reputable business which is borne out by the 80% of bad reviews on this site.They have lost my custom and I would strongly advise anyone else to use a competitor.

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service, rude and unhelpful

Title: Beware there are lots of fake reviews…
Review: Beware there are lots of fake reviews on Just Eat which some restaurants are generating themselves. Ze-We-Ton from NW10 is a good example. I recently had an awful meal costing £23 delivered which I purchased due to the high volume of positive reviews. I checked the review section the day after the awful meal and can now see that many are fake.

Title: Just eat will not publish all bad…
Review: Just eat will not publish all bad reviews. I had a dreadful meal & service ordering through them & left a bad review. I did not use any bad language etc, yet they would not publish it! I use this app regularly, but don't think I will any longer, nor recommend my friends to either!

Title: shocking customer service
Review: Made a order with them today I was made to wait for 2 hours no food was delivered I called just eat only to be told sorry we  sent help you leave the restaurant a bad review. I come home after leaving the house to get food to find my order left at my door absolutely appalling KEEP AWELL AWAY I will never be using just eat again and most definitely tell others to avoid.

Title: Absolutely ridiculous.
Review: Absolutely ridiculous..  We ordered some food from (Cafe Fresco Grill ) (order number 773206615) whilst on holiday and the food we received was disgusting. The annoying thing is that we left a review and the next day when I checked, our comment was not published so I called just eat customer service and got told that it probably was removed by the restaurant. I told the guy who I was talking to that it was fraud for Just Eat to allow their restaurants to mess around and create fake profiles.I asked to be put to someone in charge who I can speak to and  put a formal complaint in but the guy kept on putting on hold without telling me who he speaking  to. The guy seemed clueless and very useless. After being put on hold 3 times without being given any useful information whatsoever, I decided to the phone down and enjoy the rest of our holiday. Now I understand why Just Eat do not allow reviews on their Facebook and google page, Guys do not trust restaurant reviews left on Just eat, just check the restaurant google/Facebook reviews before ordering .

Title: Absolute joke
Review: Will not help a customer who has had a very very bad experience... Then proceeded to lie to me, stating that they have resolved it. With me. When they have done no such thing. Not to mention ignoring the fact that one of the restaurants they list are very bad and dodgy. Avoid like the plauge

Title: HELPFUL AND QUICK LIVE CHAT
Review: THEY ALWAYS REFUND YOU IF THEY ARE IN THe wrong WITH NO ISSUES. YOU CAN BE WAITING SOMETIMES IN LIVE CHAT FOR A WHILE BUT IT GETS THE JOB DONE AY!

Title: Not wanting to give this star I would…
Review: Not wanting to give this star I would choose ZERO stars and i am tired of being stolen from JUST EAT issues are no refund no true customer service and a bad ability to take money when the restaurant cancelled.Do not order this way because this is fraud and abysmal performance on all pretended accountability.BEST CANCEL YOUR ACCOUNT for those lucky not to use them you are blessed😤

Title: Only gave one star because in I couldnt…
Review: Only gave one star because in I couldnt give none. This company will do everything in there power to avoid giving u a refund. Absolute joke of a company. Made an order tonight and when I got it it was missing items and to be fair was horrible. Phoned company I got food from, they refused to send a new mea or even send missing items. They gave me a mouth of cheek and threatened me with police all because I was within my rights to complain. Complained to just eat(who I ordered through) asking for a refund and to check which company's there dealing with. Was refused refund(even though food was binned and they were told about phone experience) and I was totally brushed off. I will NEVER use this company again. There are other better alternatives out there.

Title: DO NOT ORDER FROM JUST EAT
Review: Absolutely disgusted with JUST EAT, never received my order again. Third time, I have now told them that I will be charging them 25% plus £50 per day until I receive my refund. They say they are Customer Service’s but no help what so ever. I am absolutely fuming as I was on the mobile for 2 hours for them to tell me (after speaking to 4 different people) “I’m sorry and I understand” but then I ask for them to contact the driver and ask him or her what the person looked like who was supposed to have received the food but then I’m told they do not have contact with drivers?.. work that one out? I will certainly be charging them per day and I will certainly take this right to court. Driver probably ate my son’s order. NEVER EVER ORDER FROM THESE. sending to investigation but never here anything back but they will from me. Been thrown from pillow to post with this incapable company. My poor son had no dinner and all because of JUST EAT. I certainly will be taking this case further with the extra charges per day and court. Did not want to give any stars at all but had to.

Title: Just Eat has become another generic…
Review: Just Eat has become another generic business which outsources it's customer service team to the Philippines meaning you will not receive any help at all when raising an issue with poor quality food that arrives through Just Eat. Avoid this business like the plague now. There are so many alternatives to go with now, Just Eat needs to realise that and pull its finger out.

Title: Missing loads from large KFC order
Review: Missing loads from large KFC order, phoned what I thought was the restaurant but was picked up by Just Eat. I said I have children to feed and can they have the missing items delivered. Just said no we can only refund for the items that are missing. Right, so are you going to refund the charges you have taken for a failure to deliver on the order? “ no. We have done what you paid for” the cheek of it. So just eat thinks that they £3 for not delivering what you order through their app! What a poor business model on what you would imagine relies on repeat custom. They will be out of business soon.

Title: Scam, go with any other delivery service.
Review: Same as everyone else here. Worst customer service ever. Take money upfront, no food. Refuse to refund.100% scam.

Title: Food was cancelled by restarant due to…
Review: Food was cancelled by restarant due to no available delivery driver. Just eatr will not process my refund. Going through my bank statement and realising they have not processed a refund for the last few cancelations, when they said they would. Company has literally stolen money from me

Title: FOOD DIDN'T ARRIVE!!
Review: Twice we have ordered from just eat, and confirmed the order, yet both times without fail we wait over four hours for our food before giving up. They won't even give us a refund!

Title: My food didn't arrive and now there not giving me a refund
Review: My food didn't arrive and now there saying I'm not getting a refund.im so frustrated especially seeing the reviews on here as it seems they do it regularly

Title: Food didn't arrive
Review: Food didn't arrive, was marked as dispatched so just eat won't provide a refund

Title: My local restaurant delivers free over…
Review: My local restaurant delivers free over £8. But just eat has always charged delivery which was a £1. And know £1.50. Amd then a surcharge of 50p. Absolutely disgusting. You should be ashamed abusing customers.

Title: If it wasn't for the diversity of…
Review: If it wasn't for the diversity of places that work with just eat, I'd probably never use them again. I'm honestly okay to find the locations, browse their menus and order over the phone instead of dealing with the pathetic customer service and useless representatives of just eat.

Title: Worst ever company
Review: Worst ever company, ordered food which smelt rancid and was dry brittle and off. Got in touch with just eat and escalated issue including emails and pictures of the rancid food and they tell me food looks ok and your  not getting a refund. A fake company that is so desperate for business that it will take any food restaurant under its whim without checking the actual food or service being delivered. I have now resorted to take this directly to the Food standards agency and trading standards and have also reached out to a national newspaper to highlight this cowboy company . People stay away from these crooks. I was sick for 2 days after wards and they did not even apologise.  Just Eat is a massive con stay away and stay healthy.

Title: Just Eat Rakuten Promo is a scam.
Review: The Just Eat Rakuten Video promotion is a scam. The codes Do NOT WORK! spoke to customer service asked me to forward the code onto them but no reply!

Title: absolutely rubbish!! (restaurant owner)
Review: absolutely rubbish!!! as a restaurant owner i have just decided to go through just eat to promote my takeaway they tell you to amend your menu through the partner centre which i spent time writing it all out ect only for them to copy & paste it  with out using their common sense at all & working out to put meals separate i have complained & constantly phoned for them to tell me to re do it when they are at fault why is it so hard to speak to some to one from that department to rectify their problem!! so before i go live on monday i have decided to cancel & leave just eat if they are making problems already then i can't imagine them working with me properly through out dont use just eat night mare company

Title: I’ve never had a positive experience…
Review: I’ve never had a positive experience with the customer service team. One time I was asking for help regarding a discount code and the adviser had no idea what was going on and almost appeared... robotic? Like none of the replies they gave over live chat was at all relevant to what I was saying. Another time, I made a complaint regarding a ride driver at one of my local restaurants. The query was going to be passed on to their complaints team and I’d hear back from them with an outcome. However after chasing it up one more time after this , I’m still awaiting a reply a month and a half later. I’m not going to chase it up again as it’s not worth the stress, even if I was left crying after this altercation with the driver.Just don’t bother. Go with Ubereats or Deliveroo where you’re actually protected as a customer. Vote with your dollar and don’t waste your time trying to chase queries because it’s out of your control.

Title: Just terrible
Review: Just terrible. I placed an order as I had done many times before, only this time the order never arrived. I contacted just eat and they say that as the restaurant has marked the order as having been completed that they will not refund.Avoid like the plague.

Title: No stars just been on live chat with…
Review: No stars just been on live chat with Juvie about a complaint was asked to wait 2 to 3 mins waited 6 and found  he/ she had left the chat. Appalling customer service. Hate all that, we value you as a customer bull. Won’t be using them again

Title: Wont use again or recommend it
Review: Awful. Waited over 3 hours for my food which then said delivered, never got our food.Rang the take away and just eat which never helped me. Until i rang the main head office which then sort of helped me. Never again will i use. Considering. I use it all the time. Wouldnt even give it a star! Had the same scenario last week when ordering a kfc

Title: I have ordered numerous meals
Review: I have ordered numerous meals, but now dont bother.  I had chips that were reheated, ordered some chicken that was thrown in a polystyrene box.  I have also had currys that tasted like some tomatoes slush and onion bhaji's that were so hard you could break your teeth.  When you complain they dont care just pass you by or offer you 10 per cent off further orders.  Avoid like the plague cook at home or pick up yourself from takeaways you can trust.

Title: Drivers are rude
Review: Drivers are rude, complain about distance of delivery. What the hell does it have to do with me how far the delivery was. You set the damn distances and accept the money.Yes I made sure it was a just eat driver and not a driver employed by the restaurant. Ofc I got the we will investigate and update in 48 hours response. Done with Just Eat. This is what happens when you get a monopoly. Standards drop.Account deactivated. So long.

Title: I have recently ordered from Subway…
Review: I have recently ordered from Subway through the JustEat website and came down with food poisoning. Now I understand that it is Subway who made the food, but it is JustEat who charged me for it. I had to pay £10 for a baguette, a dirty looking cookie and a tango drink and after eating one half of the baguette, it made me feel sick, I had stomach pains and a bad taste at the back of my throat. I called JustEat to try and get a refund, but was told by several agents that due to it being a sickness, they couldn't intervene due to legal reasons. I have tried to discuss the matter with Subway manager, but they were no help either. All I want is my refund and if I don't get it, I will report it to the newspapers.

Title: AVOID at all cost!
Review: AVOID at all cost!This company is now actively scamming clients. My experience mirrors dozens of recent complaints.Placed my order, it was confirmed, appeared as Delivered but never was, they charged me nonetheless. Raised it with their Customer Service on the day itself and was told the "Investigations Team" would get back to me in 48h. That never happened and we're already on the 10th day without any update. All contacts I make are met with "We're investigating and get back to you asap".This is obviously a lie and they are actively scamming clients. I  encourage EVERYONE to report them to the Citizens Advice Consumer Service and hopefully take them out of business.

Title: Very poor customer care
Review: Very poor customer care. They're working with dirty, unreliable food outlets. Orders not arriving or late.

Title: Absolutely disgusting
Review: Absolutely disgusting. Told to wait 72 hours for a refund, after waiting 2 weeks,  they’re trying to tell me I won’t even get half of my money back. Absolutely disgusting service. Wouldn’t bother with them anymore, they’re a total joke. And this was after almost £40 worth of food was COVERED in hair and made my partner ill. Obviously that is the fault of the restaurant, but don’t be a company that deals with complaints and then not follow through. Bloody joke.

Title: Ordered 14 pieces chicken from KFC last…
Review: Ordered 14 pieces chicken from KFC last night, it showed delivered but I never got it.  Called and they said it will take 48 hours to refund, after reading all the reviews here, I doubt I will get the refund.  Will stop using them until money refund.How can they delivered it to some other random house, I live in a road with houses good distance from each other !!!!

Title: I would give no stars if it was an…
Review: I would give no stars if it was an option.My 17 year old son made an order from KFC last Wednesday. Order never arrived, called Just Eat to be told it had been delivered, clearly not or we wouldn't of contacted them. We were told it would take 48 hours to investigate, 8 days and 2 phone calls later, my son has still not been refunded. AVOID AT ALL COSTS

Title: I ordered a take away from raj in york
Review: I ordered a take away from raj in york. Just eat cancelled the order. They told me that raj had stopped the order so i rang Raj. They said that juat eat had told them i had stopped the order. So i guess just eat didnt have a driver and instead of been honest. Played ud of. Raj resent my food via a friend, i.piad over the odds but the food was great. Just eat lie and should be ashamed. The food was fab.

Title: Bad Experience
Review: Bad ExperienceI ordered food one evening, which didn't arrive and on my app it said delivered.. contacted the restaurant to be told it is liable to just eat as their drivers picked this up. I called Just Eat and was told they will investigate this and I will have feedback in 48 hours.. It's been over a week, I contacted again to be told the investigation team is "too busy" and they are reviewing this as soon as possible? This is my money being held for food which I did NOT receive?Are we suppose to pay for a service we haven't received? - They haven't refunded me, and refused to at this moment, very poor service and I will NEVER be using this again. Terrible service, if anything happens with your order, it is a nightmare to get your money back. Do not use at all costs. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Title: Stop using this service
Review: Stop using this service. Not only do they harm the businesses you order from using them (especially if you order from the same place frequently), they take money from you too by adding a service charge on top. Use foodhub, you don't get charged a delivery fee I've noticed, I'd not be surprised if it's Just Eat's doing rather than the restaurant to get a bit more money.Using foodhub you can help yourself save money, and the restaurant to keep the majority (or it might be all, not sure how food hub makes money exactly).

Title: Just Sheat !
Review: The best way is to order through the restaurant always ! I am a restaurant owner on just eat as unsitisfied as you are , just we lose thousands of pounds for this mess called Just Sheat. I strongly believe that the restaurant is much likely to give you a 10 % off by calling straight to place an order and mention that you want to skip this circus with online order and buy straight from them . That’s my case . All the best guys !

Title: Absolutely disgusted with the place…
Review: Absolutely disgusted with the place cant see how they are still in business such a terrible experience that I will never do again.

Title: Where is my order
Review: Placed an order from KFC after 10 minutes my order been marked as delivered how i don't know called the costumer service they said you need to wait 48 hours to investigate what happened  .. what a joke . not recommended at all

Title: Absolute joke!
Review: Ok so orderd lastnight on just eat from the usual place we order, 10 mins later get a message from just eat sayen the order had been cancelled so i rang the shop they said theyd never getting my order to cancel it and asked me 2 call just eat. A load of waffle later i was told it was there mistake, a system error n that i could reorder from the resturant. Asked if u get charged for this fonecall the guy sed oh no its free. Today checked my phonebill n ive been charged almost £15! Ive tried the just eat chat while a robot replied i understand your concern i can offer u a £5 voucher... erm no its not a concern its daylight robbery and i dont want a £5 voucher to spend on just eat coz i dont paticularly wana pay your charges! Only wanted a frigging chicken kebab which was lush when it came but now i have another £15 to pay on a fonebill! Absolute daylight robbery, conen the lot of us!

Title: I ordered from Burger King a total of…
Review: I ordered from Burger King a total of £13.94 of food paid for on my card, on Thursday 27th June 2019. Order number 74926952x, - ticket 2229227xAfter waiting, i phoned just eat to find out where my food was and was told it had been delivered, i assured Just Eat it was not delivered, so i phoned the restraunt (Burger King) who told me they employ the drivers, they told me they had done their job and sent food to be delivered to my address by driver employed by Just Eat, the restraunt spoke to the driver who was at the shop, who said "no, i did not deliver the food, because she did not answer the phone", so i phoned Just Eat again, who spoke to the resturaunt themself and was told the same thing.So i requested my money back, as i a not paying for somthing i have not recieved, i was told Just Eat were sending to their investagation team as driver has put the food had been delivered, even though restraunt told them it had NOT been delivered straight from drivers mouth.The driver said he did not deliver my food "beacuse i did not answer the phone", not only did he NOT phone me, his excuse is that i did not answer the phone, did he expected me to run outside and COLLECT from him ?, even if i did not answer my phone, why would that stop him delivering to my address ?, its because the driver is a liar, i have been skanked out of £13.94.I was told to wait 72 hours, it has now been 96 hours !!!!.If i get my money back, which i can not see or they would have credited my money back when the restruant told them the driver said its not been delivered, but he put down as had been delivered, clearly this was so driver and just eat get paid and he likely ate my food along the way !, i order 3/4 times a week, i will be deleting my account and for the hassle and messing round i am seriously considering taking to court, not because of the money because of their attitude and that they know its a lot hassle for a small amount of money and 99.99% will let them off with it !!!!, Am still waitingAmanda H

Title: Worst company ever 4 times in a row no…
Review: Worst company ever 4 times in a row no order came I have given up on them now Then they offer you £5 I told them to keep they will need it when they are liquidating

Title: Love Just Eat!
Review: Quite clearly the majority of people leaving reviews have no idea how JustEat works which is worrying considering it's a very simple business plan! JustEat do not control your food quality or delivery. They simply act as a hub for your local takeaways to advertise on and send your order to the restaurant who then make the delivery. I order from JustEat 2-3 times per week (for the last 5 years) and I have never had a bad experience with their customer services. Sometimes the restaurant you order from makes mistakes but it's not down to JustEat!

Title: Don't order from them
Review: Don't order from them. I shet you not every time I've ordered from just eat my food has been wrong i ordered a whopper from burger king and specifically selected no onions or tomatoes and what did it have in it? Shetty tomatoes and onions and it was stone cold feking stupid kents I'd rather go out in my car and get the food myself stupid useless twts also most of the food isn't from where you're ordering from. I can spell i just added e's into the swear words so it let my post and if this gets remove ill keep posting it you kents

Title: Just dont use
Review: Just dont use ! If you want cold food delivery 4 hours late go ahead and order from this backward overcharging uninspiring company ps your complaints procedure is none exsistant and expect a call from trading standards.

Title: My order was 2.5 hours late
Review: My order was 2.5 hours late. I had to chat to 3 agents I finally got a refund! One of them lied and said the order had been picked up and it clearly had not. Massive scam, pay the extra pound and use Deliveroo or Uber eats if you dont want to be waiting all night for your food (that may never arrive!)

Title: Placed a order two hours ago never…
Review: Placed a order two hours ago never received it to be told it was delivered but won't refund me on a order I didn't receive worsted ever ever again

Title: Terrible company, go direct to your local restaurant
Review: Terrible companyWhere to start...Yes it gives you a range of restaurants that are open within the local area, but the reviews for most of the restaurants are very misleading and slimiest sound made up.Time and time again I have tried to use this service but as time goes on it keeps getting worse. Vouchers have been the reason that I keep trying but now it’s not even worth it for a free meal. Every meal has been to such a poor standard. Cold, greasy, tasteless and food missing or not even showed up. Justeat customer service offer to help but 9/10 times they just say contact the restaurant. If that’s the case why am I using justeat?? Plus you have to pay an admin fee each time you use this service. It’s much easier to order direct from the restaurant these days and most places now have their very own online ordering system with discounts. Cheaper, more efficient and dealing with the restaurant directly can confirm you get the correct order and no additional admin fees to pay.My opinion don’t waste your time with justeat, order direct from the restaurant and make sure the restaurant receive 100% of the money rather than just eat taking commission.

Title: Ordered a KFC which was not delivered
Review: Ordered a KFC which was not delivered, i rang just eat to let them know as i had paid for the food online, just eat did not refund me immediately, they said it would investigate what had happened which would take 48hours, they then returned to me the following day to say as far as they were concerned the delivery driver said he had delivered the food so would not be returning my money!!! Absolutely disgusting that they treat their customers this way, along with the fact they have been listing food places with zero hygiene rating means i will never use them again and would advise others not to use them, they are thieves out to rob their customers and the food places they scam

Title: Just sad
Review: Honestly? What pains me the most is that just eat actually used to be better... Not amazing, but good enough. I have 50 orders with them behind my belt, and up until recently they were a dream to order from. Even if something went wrong, the staff was professional and responsive, never making any problems with refunds or vouchers, apologising for the issues, helping in the communication with the restaurant.My most recent orders, though... One ended in 40 minutes late delivery (adding up to 1.5 hour wait!), another got caught up in a system error (!) where the driver was not notified and never picked up my food no matter how long I waited (which should have ended in a FULL REFUND, but the money never arrived back >:I ), and the most recent one was the standard late n cold treatment (progress, I suppose? At least it got there XD), I have enough. Just eat ruins businesses. And it's becoming a ruin itself. I'm switching to other services.

Title: Parasites
Review: They charge a restaurant £700 to join then 14% of the bill when anyone orders through the app. Bear that in mind when considering what value these chancers actually add.We waited nearly 3 hours for an order that was supposed to come in 40 minutes and when we investigated it became clear that they had delivered a whole lot of orders to the restaurant late with the result that the place descended into total chaos. They then abdicated all responsibility and left the restauranteur to clear up the mess.You get better service by picking up the phone and calling the restaurant direct.

Title: Discount codes a con
Review: The second time I have used a discount code and been told on the app that it has worked and my bill has been reduced only to find the full amount has been debited from my account. I've been on an online chat now for over 2 hours. Apparently just eat don't think it's illegal to fraudulently take money from their customers accounts

Title: Ordered from top tastey kebab and it…
Review: Ordered from top tastey kebab and it was Greecy and the after taste was like cardboard.... don’t suggest waste of money

Title: Food ordered 8/6
Review: Food ordered 8/6. Order cancelled by JE. Money out of my bank account 10/6. Still waiting for a refund. Been given the run around on online chat. They blame the bank. Opened a case with Resolver to try and get my money back. Will never use them again.

Title: Customer for years, Not anymore - Disgraceful Response On fraud
Review: Customer for years - Fraudulent transaction 2019 - Zero help : I was in Liverpool and a transaction for an Indian restaurant in Stoke was posted , contacted just eat, they take 10 days to tell me the same info and I have to report to bank and police. No explanation, no apology, passed from pillar to post, no one seems to have a clue what they are doing there. Used them since inception and now they treat me like this. Absolute joke. I will be ordering from Uber or deliveroo from now on.  AVOID ,

Title: Very poor service
Review: Very poor service, my order was cancelled the very last minute and I was told I'll receive a £5 voucher code, never happened. They clearly lied. Not just that, customer service is very poor, not being able to understand a simple plain question, keep repeating same thing over and over again, seems they've employed chatbots (Robots) without informing consumers - another lie. Authorities should pay attention to this company practices.

Title: just eat is s**t
Review: just eat is s**t. you  receive a voucher from them and it never works with the take away you normally order from or the take away add a service charge plus a delivery charge . never using again just eat is just s**t. used to be good but they are just ripping off the customer or the take away.

Title: Company on the decline
Review: Had food delivered late (ok, it happens)Restaurant was rude over the phone.Food arrived whilst on chat with Just-Eat.Transpired parts were burnt and others were spoiled food.Agent said it would take 3 days to resolve.Now I've only got a partial refund and they're saying they'll do no more.Terrible service from the restaurant but absolutely disgraceful attitude from Just-Eat who I ultimately traded with.Won't be using again as judging by other reviews it's going downhill fast.

Title: Has been better..
Review: Was great a couple years ago..These days it seems to have gone downhill though, not enough places listed & delivery times aren't the best.. The place we use to order from regularly would take anything up to an hour longer to arrive when ordered from the app, compared to order by phone..Presumably these orders are a low priority compared to people contacting places directly.. The convenience of the app is good, but for the sake of a phone call, the delay in service doesn't really seem worth it.

Title: worst delivery ever
Review: Similar bad experience to what has been described in other reviews. Order was placed at 20:23 and confirmed it would be delivered by 20:55.I contacted Justeat at 21:15 as no signs of my order arriving.They said they couldn’t do anything and blamed the delivery people.They informed me that I could cancel my order but as it had already been placed and accepted they would only refund 50% of the cost ( what a nonsense!) The order alternative was to call back 10-15min later and they will try to give me a new update then(what for! I just wanted my food!)They ended up giving me a new delivery slot at 21:43 (1h20min) after I placed my order.Any other food delivery app I have previously used seem to work and have a much better customer service.Will never used them again, why should anyone put up with such a lousy service when there is No need really, the market is offering lots of other apps for food delivery that work really well.I tried to make a complaint on their app and website but of course I was not able to find the complaints procedure for customers to refer to and was not able to leave the feedback in their website hence me doing it here.I do not expect this company to stay around for much longer with such an unprofessional and uncompetitive service.

Title: Scam
Review: Our food was late and was charged 50% for cancelling my order.

Title: Modern day theifs!
Review: Modern day theifs!Half of Food ordered was missing from my order, complained and all excuses under the sun to not do anything to resolve. SCAVENGERS! THEIFS! SCAMMERS!

Title: Absolute terrible customer service…
Review: Absolute terrible customer service experience. A food order was late and I had to cancel the order as I had to go out. I couldn't get through to the takeaway and decided to call just-eat.co.uk hoping they could help. The guy just said he could cancel but will charge me 50 per cent. I asked why as they are late and its not my fault. His response was it's a Friday. I never knew I could turn up late to work on a Friday, news to me. I could understand if it was Friday night evening but this was at 1pm. He said he would contact the restaurant which he got through but never asked them to cancel just what time they would arrive. He said I have to wait few minutes for the food which I waited another 10 minutes and still no food. I finally got through to the takeaway and they understood and cancelled straight away. Why I'm I wasting my time placing an order through this website if I get responses like its not our fault your food is late it's the takeawa, if they are not even going to help the customer. Worse experience I've had. Request a SAR to show people how terrible they treat their customers

Title: This company are greedy beyond belief
Review: This company are greedy beyond belief, pardon the pun. Because of the card charge ban for payments made with debit or credit cards, they then decide to impose a 50p charge for all transactions. Aparantly to 'be fair to cash paying customers', in the words of a company spokesperson. The cost of food has risen higher and higher because of the money the squeeze out of local takeaways. Now, if I'm going to eat fast food I'll stop being lazy and walk the few yards. I hope their greediness comes back to bite them on their fat cat arses and they lose money and customers. .a service once aimed at the benefit of customers is now just a greedy company thinking only of profits.

Title: Terrible. Loose your money and get nothing for it
Review: Tried to.persevere with this company as a lifeline for a disabled family, but today it has been made apparent by the company they have no concept of customer service, no compassion or respect for customers. And it is a complete rip off. Hit a problem and you find the numbers for the FOOD providers is in correct. The just eat apps have supposedly forms you can fill in but they don't work. And doesn't matter how you pay should your meal be totally ruined as ours was they couldn't give a monkeys.Given that you cannot get refunds when things go wrong I recommend you pay by credit card as cash is a total rip off as these days drivers cannot be bothered to give you change.  If you pay by debit card again you get ripped off.No one bothers if you have missing items which mean you cannot eat any of the food. Its tough  luck .Starving has better quality than using Justeat as you dont waste your time and money.No refunds, often only half an order, no control, no contact numbers correct, and I have seen people listed on there selling meals from their council house... as a business.Just better to save your money and have a slice of toast as you wont get your food, wont get a refund and mo one cares

Title: Do not use.
Review: Good business concept. Not good in reality. Been waiting for ages for our delivery. Next time I’ll just go grab it myself.

Title: Food Poisoning
Review: Ordered a Chinese takeaway through Just Eat which gave me food poisoning, I was violently sick 5 times within a matter of hours after eating the food, as well as other unmentionables. Rang Just Eat to complain and to let them know and to ask for a refund. They were not helpful whatsoever. They did not log any details, they did not help, they did not offer me a refund. They did... Nothing. Customer Service is terrible. They should be worried about a customer who gets food poisoning from one of their restaurants..!? But no... as long as they get money that's all they care about. Also no details of how to take the complaint further. Absolutely shocking. Won't use ever again.

Title: Failure to provide the service
Review: Failure to provide the service as stated. Offer facility of choosing time of your food delivery. However food is delivered two hours early. No obvious information about this provided. When call to complain have to wait 15 minutes on phone. Complaint handler shifts blame onto takeaway provider. Complaint handler states no way to resolve issue save for a 48 hour investigation. Then you are left with no food but just eat have taken your money. They are advertising that they will offer a certain service but no redress available to customer when they clearly fail to fulfil that promise.

Title: They delete negative reviews!
Review: I ordered food from them and paid for it online, but because I had had a few too many beers I paid the driver as well when he delivered it. He knew I had already paid but he took my money anyway. So I left a very polite review stating what had had happened, and within two days JustEat had removed my review. What is the point of a review feature if the restaurant can just demand that negative reviews be taken down? Deleted my JustEat account because of this disgusting action. Will have to try alternatives now.

Title: They’re stealing people’s money
Review: They’re stealing people’s money. Offering u only 50% refund of the money u paid, for an order that did not arrive! This company is a joke. I’ve been told i’d get full refund if order do not arrive after an hour when it was due. Food was delivered late for more than an hr. did they refund me in full? No. Was given £10 credit on my acct for future order when i have no plans on using their svc ever again!

Title: Awful
Review: Awful. Had food delivered with an item I’m allergic to in it. Their compliance team, after 5 days offer me a voucher for HALF my money. Emailed to say I wanted the entire amount back on my card. No reply despite repeated requests.

Title: Simply appalling
Review: Things go wrong, and that's life.  But how we judge service companies is not just about when things go right, but perhaps more importantly about when things go wrong.  How responsive, engaging, polite, flexible and willing to help are they?  Just Eat Customer Service fail abysmally on all of these points.  They are interested in one thing only: making money, and dam anyone who may have a problem.  We will now never use this company again as a matter of principle now that the company has revealed its true colours.What happened?  First things first.  This is a review about Just Eat - not the associated restaurants in Southend.  Secondly; we have used Just Eat a number of times.  Thirdly, we'd used Just Eat to order from same restaurant not two weeks previously with no issues.  Scene: Sunday, hungry, ordered dinner at 18:30.  First delivery time given: 19:24.  At 19:40 it was updated to 19:46.  At this point we'd been waiting for over an hour and were pretty hungry.  Had  missed calls from driver at 19:50, 19:52 and 19:55, and she called back at 20:10.  Driver told my partner that he couldn't find address, told her we 'weren't on the map' (quote), and when she asked him where he was, he said he didn't know!  She asked him if he knew area; he said he didn't need to as he had a map.  it was very difficult to understand the gentleman as English was clearly not his first language - this in itself is not a problem as we've had to give directions to a few drivers in the past with limited English.  But when she said she couldn't understand him, he hung up.She called Just Eat at 20:14, and that is when the real issues began.  She explained to customers services what had happened, including that the driver had hung up, and asked when we could expect our meal.  CS rep tried to look on map to see where driver was in relation to us, but she (apparently) couldn't see where the driver was.  CS rep then started talking about sending driver back to us, so my partner asked when he'd picked food up: was told he had collected it from restaurant at 19:32, so she pointed out that food would be cold by now.  CS rep response was apathetic and vague at best.  My partner asked if someone else could collect a new order and deliver it, only to be told that Just Eat would have cancel order and we'd have to reorder from scratch.   Having to go through loop again would mean we wouldn't eat until probably 21:30 at earliest.  CS Rep then tried to say that our address did not exist on the map ( a blatant lie as she'd already confirmed that she COULD see us on map), and tried to offer us an insulting fifty per cent refund, which, funnily enough, she declined and demanded a full refund.  Bear in mind that no Just Eat driver has ever failed to deliver to us before.CS rep then agreed to full refund, plus a £5 credit (?), and asked if she wanted to speak to supervisor.  When my partner asked to do so, she was told that there was no supervisor present!!!!  When my partner asked when she would get her refund CS rep told her 3-7 working days because restaurant had accepted the order.  Given that the transaction is with Just Eat, this is a complete nonsense and they should be able to action refund immediately - at worst case within 24 hours.  When challenged CS rep said she would 'put request through' to get refund earlier.  This is supposed to be a service company.It is worth mentioning that someone who we assume was a supervisor called us at 22:47 (!), failed to introduce himself, and asked if our food had been delivered!!  My partner replied that order had been cancelled, and before she could say anything else he said 'Ordered cancelled, ok, thanks, bye', and hung up.  What was point of call?  If this was a supervisor then perhaps he should of been calling to actually deal with complaint?  Apparently not.

Title: Pointless “service”
Review: Just Eat are the worst for customer service - they not only didn’t help me at all, but removed my review from the restaurant page that I ordered from! And I can’t seem to be able to repost it so I’m guessing they’ve blocked me from doing so!My GBK order never arrived despite waiting nearly 2hrs for it. When I called Just Eat the woman was totally unhelpful. She didn’t want to call the restaurant or the driver. She refused to provide the drivers details to me. Apparently, despite my tracker stating differently at the timeframe, the driver had marked it as ‘delivery complete’ when it hadn’t. Her response was that I should wait an extra 15mins for the driver - food never came and the restaurant wouldn’t pick up the phone despite me calling them 6 flipping times.Outcome: no food; no refund; a lot of stress; wasted time; deleted my review; won’t let me add another replacement review - THE WORST!

Title: Should be reported to the ombudsman...
Review: I am so furious and upset right now...The summary is my account got hacked and they weren’t suspicious about someone ordering food under a different name and address...Called them ... waited forever to speak to someone (20 mins) and asked them to delete my account... was told this takes up to 30 days! I told them I wasn’t happy with my personal details being left on there ( name address cards etc) I wanted it deleted ASAP... I was told to “hold on” ... then she came back on the phone and told me it was done.Since then I’m still receiving constant advertising emails.... so came to find out it’s not closed..... on the live chat... spent 5/10 mins explaining to someone what’s going on... they just leave the chat ... and your not notified... only way you know is when you type something ( like are you still there) ... and then some new person joins the chat... so you have to start all over again...and you do this 3-4 times Then you spend 20 mins explaining ... to be told that your account has been requested to close but it takes 30 days when you have spent ages now explaining you want it closed ASAP...your waiting now for a response to this... what happens... yes the person leaves chat without notice... I’m waiting for a response... I type something to realise yet a new person has joined the chat! And person number 6 joins the chat.... who then asks for your order number as she clearly doesn’t have a clue about anything that has just been typed! So 35 mins of your evening later you are in the same position you started. Disgraceful company that I would never use again. It’s bad enough having an issue with your food and not getting anywhere but think about how you will feel when this unreputable company has your personal details on an account that’s been hacked and says they will take 30 days to delete it!

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service. Their answer to every issue is “contact the restaurant directly”.Well, next time contact the restaurant directly to order, no need to bother with Just Eat and don’t fill their wallets because they are providing no real service.

Title: I am not one to complain unless I feel…
Review: I am not one to complain unless I feel that something has NOT met the mark.  However, I do have to say that the "Customer Care" at Just Eat is very poor. I think they are keen to get as many restaurants/cafés on their site in order to maximise their profits/commissions, but they are not providing any real customer care for the end user i.e. the people who wish to order food.  For example, if something is wrong with the order they are not really interested, you are told to go to place where food has come from, but they then tell you to contact Just Eat to administer a refund.  It takes ages to get through to Just Eat, they do not seem interested.  I complained about a previous order (one item didn't turn up even though I had paid).  I asked for a refund to my bank account but they put the credit onto my just eat account.  I thought I would place another order and then the order was running late and then cancelled.  I asked Just Eat for a refund but got referred to by a different name and contact details were for someone else. I think they are very disorganised and not truly interested in the customer.  So instead of just writing reviews about the restaurants, we should definitely be writing reviews about getting Just Eat to "step up the plate".........

Title: Good!!!!!
Review: Food was rubbish they have refunded me all of my money AND given me credit! Excellent customer service! Don’t get why people are moaning tbf...

Title: F**king terrible
Review: F**king terrible. I ordered my food at 1:40, pre paid, order is supposed to come at 2:15... it doesnt, then i contact support and ask about it and they say it has been delivered, and dont offer to pay or help in anyway. Never, ever f**king order from this sh!t company

Title: They remove negative reviews
Review: They remove negative reviews - terrible service can not get through to customer support. I left an honest negative review as the food delivered was both incorrect and very very low quality also cold. No profanities were used and my review although negative was an honest one. The review system can not be trusted. I will never use Just Eat again.

Title: Waste of time ordering from just eat…
Review: Waste of time ordering from just eat twice in one week food was of terrible quality on one of the orders and incomplete (I realise they don't actually make the food but could at least enforce some standards on who can actually sell on their website) and was incomplete as they forgot part of the order, and second time was was incomplete again and took over and hour to get to us.I would have rated higher as they did credit our account with £3.00 but on the second order they kept giving us the message that we had to wait 24 hours before we could complain so and that was 3 days ago.This is just recent issues I've had with Just Eat and I've had enough  Im just going to order direct from now on and I suggested others should do the same.

Title: Food came straight away and was hot..
Review: Food came straight away and was hot... dont know why everyone complains

Title: Used chat service as the telephone…
Review: Used chat service as the telephone number provided for restaurant was invalid and I had waited almost 2hours for my delivery. The chat was just as bad as the delivery time, give me a moment,  then after I chased again I got "please bear with me a moment" never once explaining what she was doing. 15 mins later I got a response with still no explanation... terrible service!

Title: AVOID JUST EAT AT ALL COSTS
Review: Avoid this garbage company.Here’s my honest experience.I ordered a KFC stacker burger from Just Eat, the order was late but then I though, it would eventually comes but no, I was wrong the order never came and was marked as delivered. Customer Service is terrible, telling you the same thing over and over again. They told me to wait 24 hours for investigation, I waited, contact them again, told me to wait 24 hours again, contacted them again and guess what? They keep sending you to different people to say the same crap over and over and over again.Avoid this company, save your time and money.1*

Title: JustEat is bad. #BoycottJustEat
Review: JustEat is cheaper for a reason. Use UBER EATS or Deliveroo if you want to guarantee that your order is delivered. If you really have to use JustEat, order your food on cash on delivery, never pay it upfront. Don't trust. Sometimes your order don't arrive when you order with JustEat and their restaurants just stop answering their phones.

Title: Order cancelled and they don't care
Review: Not impressed.  Cancelled my order as it was due to be delivered, over two hours after placing it, with no explanation and no means of contacting them.  Apparently I'll be refunded (we shall see) but it hardly makes up for the inconvenience of convenience food failure.  Their only recommendation is to order from somebody else so they can still skim off the profit for an even later delivery.

Title: Terrible company
Review: Terrible company.  The web page should be terminate and the company shut down. Terrible customer service. Long waits to no delivery. Won't use these them again.

Title: Unreliable
Review: Orders don’t turn, the app doesn’t track them so you don’t find out until you chase it yourself. When you complain they just say well you haven’t been charged just order something else. Third time it’s happened on the row so I’ve deleted the app and will use deliveroo from now on

Title: Manipulated review system
Review: As a new customer to JustEat I have experienced many positive outcomes but it’s not until you incur a problem do you see the true transparency of a poorly run business.Having experience an extremely poor customer experience with a particular vendor I was shocked to see JustEat had manipulated my review to further protect future business for themselves. Talking to customers services they simply hang up mid conversation - I find the whole organisation in its entirety to be unethical and morelly wrong in how it miss represents vendors for sake of sales.The company are uninterested and have no customer care or focus on what could be a great new platform for the future. I have deleted the app.

Title: Terrible customer service none of them…
Review: Terrible customer service none of them have any experience of how to deal with customers. Robbed me off a 25% discount went through 6 chat sessions in total who all restarted chat and two phone calls. Never got resolved even though I spend about £400 a month now going to greener pastures beginning with the letter “D” cheers just eat!!! And thanks for all the fish 🎣

Title: Wont be using again
Review: I have used Just Eat twice and won't be using them again. The first takeaway arrive inedible and freezing cold. We were told they would not refund in cash, only voucher.  Therefore we are being tied into ordering from them again.  We tried somewhere else today only for the wrong items to be sent out so had to return these myself for an exchange.I have decided that its less hassle to go to the takeaways themselves as at least you know what you are getting before you part with your cash and it it much quicker.

Title: They Have No Teeth
Review: They have no teeth a restaurant will deliver dodgy food cold or burnt usually both, so you complain to Just Eat after all you ordered from there site and they say ow sorry the restaurant is refusing to refund you. So what does Just Eat do kick these dodgy outfits off there site, fine them, I know give the customer a full refund maybe even a full credit to try a different restaurant. No they offer a credit for a whole £5 and when you refuse they disconnect your 25 minute chat.

Title: Wrong food delivered
Review: Wrong food delivered. Just eat simply said why not leave a review. Pointless. When pushed said would call restaurant, never heard back anything since. Save yourself the admin fee and avoid using them.

Title: Let down yet again by Just Eat
Review: Let down yet again by Just Eat. Order was 45mins late, called restaurant to be told the order was thrown away 50mins early because of no rider/driver. Just Eat had been notified but hadn’t told us. #hangry

Title: JUST EAT COST US OUR MEAL
Review: Just Eat has cost us a meal! We ordered a pizza an hour ago from Chico’s in Harrogate but won’t be in Harrogate until tomorrow afternoon! What kind of service if this! Guessing we are never seeing our money or food ever again! THANKS GUYS!!!

Title: Four hours down and many tweets later
Review: Four hours down and many tweets later - we have no food from kfc welling (apparently not their problem) and about a billion excuses from just eat. Fabulous customer service to you both!

Title: I can’t believe what I’m dealing with!!!! Stay away!!
Review: I can’t believe what I’m dealing with at the moment, ordered food on just eat and waited and watched the time it was supposed to arrive and one minute I got a text it was on its way so I waited a further 20 minutes and looked on just eat and it was marked as “delivered” I couldn’t believe it I called the restaurant but they don’t handle the delivery they just pass the food to the just eat driver! Called a total of 18 times now and the customer services keep saying “I’m not able to help you so il get you a call back” or “I’m not the department so il request a call back” or “I’ll put you through to a rds agent (that’s the fave the last 5 calls!!) even the restaurants manager was frustrated with them as he called several times aswell only to get the same as me! Oh and they keep trying to give me the same customer service number but in a 0203 format saying that it’s the “rda agents number” I fell for it once only to realise they fobbed me onto another person from the same department that CANT DO ANYTHING but repeat the same things I’ve listed! Oh and no manager to be seen or heard from and this has been going on since yesterday!!!! I’ve paid for food I never received and still haven’t been able to request a refund as everyone in their customer services department isn’t aloud to do anything at all (I don’t know why they pretend to have a customer service at all) I’ve wasted hours calling and texting just eat and I’m not someone who has this time to spare but frustration is driving me! I’m in a wheelchair with 3 kids with CP and this is the most frustration I’ve had in a long time!

Title: Poor service.
Review: It would be good if all the food was delivered. Ordered from kfc using Just Eat.We order from such companies for convenience but it seems just eat don’t seem to care about customer service.Will definitely not be using again.

Title: I will not be ordering through Just Eat…
Review: I will not be ordering through Just Eat again.  If I had order through the restaurant’s own app, I would have saved 10% on menu price and would not have had to pay rip off service charge. I thought that the restaurant would recieve that service charge however when I queried it with the restaurant, I was told that in fact Just Eat profit from the charge and the restaurant is charged 20% commission. Avoid.

Title: Just Eat has ruined the takeaway industry
Review: Just Eat has ruined the takeaway industry. The quality of all the takeaways has dropped considerably because the restaurants no longer care about quality because they don't have to, because they will get orders no matter how good or bad they are - so they now focus on meeting the demands of the increased volume. Bad service/food does not reflect in the flawed and manipulated Just Eat review system. Read the other reviews and you'll see this is happening across the board.

Title: I wrote an honest negative review about…
Review: I wrote an honest negative review about an extremely poor experience I had with a restaurant via just eat. The review was published but then I saw it had been removed an hour later, along with two other one star reviews that had been submitted the same evening. This is a complete joke! Removing genuine reviews of customers’ poor experiences with restaurants is an extremely underhand and unethical business practice.

Title: Better of calling for a takeaway & pay cash
Review: It s a great app to use however I find it very disappointing that they add on delivery fees of £2.00 - £3.00 and services charges on top of your bill when in fact it should be free. I have noticed by calling them and placing the order over the phone and confirming the bill over the phone is cheaper then using the app. You will save £2.00 - £3.00 every order you make.

Title: Feels like a weird cover up...
Review: Shame that after years of using Just Eat and being really happy with my local restaurants on there I don't feel comfortable using them. Had a strange situation where someone had managed to get hold of my card details and place an order on Just Eat. Just Eat denied that the transaction had been placed with them even after my bank gave me the approval number and I shared with them a screenshot of my bank statement with the transaction on there. Obviously when I went back to my bank they said it was Just Eat and could cancel the recurring transaction on my card. However it means I might not be able to place an order with Just Eat on that card. Not to worry, I will be using Deliveroo from now on as I've got no trust that Just Eat will be helpful when something goes wrong.

Title: This is a scam
Review: This is a scam. Do not use. Ordered a meal which was not delivered and they offer me a voucher? Takes 7 days to refund your money- but it did not take 7 days for them to take my money?

Title: Just eat
Review: Just eat, the biggest con going, never NEVER reports the bad reviews, therefore, people ordering are getting scammed while just eat are earning money off t h e customers and retailers, that is a scam,Some of these so called restaurant /takeaway are so disgusting and should not be trading but on the just eat recommendations people order food from takeaways and restaurants because just eat DO NOT PUBLISH BAD REVIEWS

Title: i had a missing food item and when i…
Review: i had a missing food item and when i phoned the restaurant i was told i will receive it. I received nothing and when i called back the manager was rude and hanged up on me. Terrible customer service.

Title: Was writing a complaint about a…
Review: Was writing a complaint about a delivery. Was in the middle of replying to a chat & was told because I hadn't replied they were ending the chat.  It was a matter of seconds!!

Title: Sent the wrong order
Review: Sent the wrong order. Not impressed AGAIN

Title: The worst ever
Review: The worst ever, always late and even they dont have a phone number or customer service to complain, and they r not replying to chat, extremely bad service

Title: Incompetent. Liars. Charlatans.
Review: Their CMS banner says 'free pizza' when you order 2. You order 2 pizzas but third pizza the restaurant don't deliver. The restaurant blames deliveroo, deliveroo blames the restaurant. I speak with customer service and I have to write another email, I now need to do an hoja de reclamacion as their customer service didn't send me one

Title: AVOID!!!
Review: AVOID!!!! THEY ARE THE WORST. Their driver decided to just NOT delivery my food from Nandos. I called deliveroo and they said they won't send another driver. WHAT THE HELL. THAT MAKES NO SENSE.

Title: DONT DELIVEROO
Review: Judy Ann (Deliveroo UK)Oct 15, 2020, 10:24 GMT+1Hello Paul,Thanks for your email. We apologise for the delay of your order. To make it up to you, I've added the £2.00 credit to your Deliveroo account that you can use right away and it will be automatically applied on your next order, valid for 90 days.Your issue clearly expresses your disappointment and I would like to extend my sincere apologies for any negative impression that this issue may have created.Best Regards,Judy AnnDeliveroo Customer Care for the reply Judy ,Dear JudyI am not looking for any credits , although £2 is a ridiculous offer that compounds the initial dissapointement of a ruined saturday evening . £2 wouldnt even buy a starter from waga mammas . My whole main course was ruined after being cooked twice to keep it hot. The cost of the course that was ruined wouldve been a more satisfactory amount to offer a customer that regualrly has deliveries on the weekend.As i already stated , i wont be re using your companyYour clumsy offer and reply reflects the disdain you show customers, Kind regards Paul

Title: Excellent Deliveries
Review: My experience has been excellent with the deliveries. i deduct 1 star because customer services are shockingly cold and unhelpful and that's sad given the excellent work of the delivers and restaurants.

Title: As a restaurant owner
Review: As a restaurant owner, I would say deliveroo is rubbish with customer support. 14 emails in 3 month and no (Zero) response. Pathetic. Management needs to change or some competitor should takeover this service. They have built a system but the kids running it are overwhelmed by the real-world aspects of an unfortunately great system. Try other delivery systems, you will be missing small part of the pie.

Title: The driver took over and hour to get to my house
