Review: The driver took over and hour to get to my house and then took his time to bring the food to the door, the chips were cold. Would unlikely use the service again.

Title: A cynical and irresponsible operation. Avoid.
Review: Would love to give zero stars.The customer service at Deliveroo is bordering on sociopathic. I ordered food that was three hours late (expected at 8.30 and arrived at 11.30 - obviously forgotten, as I'd had to chase the restaurant several times - by which time my partner had ordered something else and gone to bed). Deliveroo's own statement to restaurants is that customers can get a refund for delayed food. The next day I spoke to no fewer than three agents on their ridiculous live chat (that ends automatically if you move tabs or to a different app). One of them ended the chat suddenly, obviously bored with my problem (and after asking me what I'd had for dinner instead of the meal I'd ordered), the next offered me £5 credit instead of a refund on the food we'd not been able to eat, and the last just had no clue, kept telling me it was the restaurant who had to refund me (thereby removing Deliveroo from any position of responsibility for the restaurants they choose to host - very handy eh!). Finally I sent an email of complaint via email, simply wanting a sufficient response. No reply. I emailed again to say I was going to deactivate my account as I hadn't heard from them (I use Deliveroo a few times a month) and I received a generic email in response "We are sorry about your experience etc etc, we take all feedback into consideration to improve our service blah blah." Clearly a robot, or copied and pasted response. Deliveroo works in cynical ways and I will not be using it again. It is impossible to resolve issues, as you are chasing your tail - nothing is their fault, yet restaurants cannot act without Deliveroo's involvement. It would have been easier to get a refund on a well-used pair of running shoes. Above all, their idea of customer service and satisfaction is so incredibly unacceptable that I wonder how they are still operating. It makes me sad. Avoid them at all costs and use Uber Eats instead.

Title: the worst delivery company going ..
Review: the worst delivery company going ... avoid ... plenty on the market ... complaints never addressed a disgrace

Title: Absolutely perfectic rude
Review: Absolutely perfectic rude, abrurpt, poor customer service rubbish company had bbery bad experience with  nandos order via Deliveroo over 3hrs incorrect order then told just refund no 2nd delivery even tho nandos apologised was prepared to re do the order deliveroo cancelled it you people are gutless and waste of time I will be reporting to trading standards and higher up as this service if not acceptable company like you should not be trading and I will keep making noise how perfetic you are!!!!

Title: Wrong order
Review: First time eating from Ashford Kaspas as I’d heard good reviews about the food. Ordered via Deliveroo for the first time, spending about £30 on 3 premium waffles with extra sauce and strawberries.Got completely wrong order: one normal waffle and one crepe. I flagged down the driver who said he was given that order only and the mistake is with the restaurant. A very simple mistake; can also be fixed quite easily.Called the restaurant who immediately declined to help, saying they are unable to do anything. We said we have the food, untouched. We would just like our food, that we were looking forward to. The lady was snappy and insistent nothing can be done (including dropping our call at one point). She said to call deliveroo instead.We called and waited for deliveroo, who could also not help, except escalating the problem and hopefully processing a refund in the next 48 hours. Calling back the restaurant they agreed to call deliveroo, but then informed us that no we would not be able to get our order.The solution seemed quite simple to us; the wrong delivery was made, just re-deliver the correct order. We could wait slightly longer. We could happily trade back the wrong delivery as tokens we’re not liars trying to gain anything. We just wanted our food.But all we got was attitude and no apology.

Title: Don't bother
Review: Don't bother. Here is my chat log. My food didn't arrive after trying to explain to the driver numerous times how to get to my flat. The driver didn't seem to understand what I was saying at all, and kept just saying unintelligible words and shouting "you come" before cutting off the phone. I wrote in the delivery notes that I was unable to come out due to being in isolation because of COVID and to call me if they needed further directions. You would think the driver would be able to understand directions as a minimum... (Btw, I went through my bank to get the refund. They will open a fraud investigation if you speak with them. Seems like overkill, but I didn't receive a service I paid for.)xxxxxxx183Hello, I have tried directing the driver but he doesn't understand what I am saying. Now it says my order has been left with the conciergeI don't know where they mean. I put in the notes that I am in isolation so I cannot come outside.Chat startedDeliveroo SupportThanks for getting in touch. One of our agents will be with you shortly.Pat joined the chatPat Hi xxxx ,Let me look into that for you.I'm sorry that this is not the outcome you had hoped for.xxxx183thank youPatPlease can you confirm the delivery address with postcode, as well as the phone number associated with your order?xxxxx183 address and numberPat Thanks for confirming.Your rider arrived at your address, with your order at 17:45 and waited for 12 minutes.I can see here that the rider was able to get through and speak to you on the phone before marking it as delivered. Because of this, you will still be charged.xxxx183 Well I haven't received anythingPat I understand. Sorry, but this order is no longer expected to arrive now.We are not supposed to offer you anything at this point as the rider did all he can to get this order delivered to you.xxxx183 He did notI explained numerous times how to get to my flatand he just cut offso how is that trying all he canPat I hear you. Allow me to consult this with my team and check what else I can do for you.I'm still looking into this for you, please stay on this chat.xxxx183 okPat Thanks for waiting.We often carry out routine reviews of refund requests. In this instance, your refund request has been passed onto our Customer Accounts team to review and process. They will come back to you within 24-48 hours to confirm your refund. I am sorry that I am unable to resolve this matter for you right now, but please keep an eye out for their email which you should receive within 48 hours.Thanks for getting in touch with us today. I'll be ending this chat now so please let me know if you need anything else.xxxx183Are you able to find out exactly where the delivery driver left the food? I have no food and I am down 15 pounds. I stated in the note that I am in isolation and to call me if they needed directions, but I was sent a delivery driver who could not understand what I was saying or that I was in isolation? This is pretty useless for me right now as this leaves me with nothing to eat.Pat Rest assured that we'll continue to investigate what happened with your order.We often carry out routine reviews of refund requests to ensure that they comply with our Terms of Service. We try to ensure that these checks are completed as quickly as possible, but it can take up to 48 hours.xxxx183Thanks for the copy and paste responsePat First of all, I'm extending my sincere apologies for what happened, it is certainly not the outcome we desired. Regrettably, we're unable to provide you any form of reimbursement on this occasion, as we do not have the authority. Hence, we've escalated it to our specialists that could help, which are the customer accounts team.xxxx183I was asking whether you would be able to find out from the driver where he left the food exactly.we don't have a concierge herePat I am unable to establish what really happened. This will be looked into further.As we've not heard from you for a few minutes now, I'm going to end the chat. If you need help with anything else, please use the Order Help feature on our website or app. Thanks for getting in touch.

Title: My Order From Son Of Steak Nottingham
Review: 12th October, approximately 7:00pm, I placed an order with deliveroo for a son of steak ribeye steak meal for one-£25:43. At 7:40pm the tracking app showed a driver on his way saying, due to arrive 7:50pm. At 7:50pm I got a message from the driver “ can you help me, I don’t know where you are” I message him back, asking his position but got no reply, by this time it was 7:55 but I could see his position on a route map on the app, which was the other side of the city, nowhere near my home or the restaurant!!! I went out side to wait for him and I continued to watch the tracking as he closed in on my home. The app was rescheduling the ETA as I watch his progress, now giving 8:00pm for the delivery. I then got a message at 8:00pm from the driver saying “ I am sorry but they gave me your job but did not tell me the restaurant address?? The driver eventually arrived at 8:10pm but sat in his vehicle for about 10 minutes before I came back outside to see what he was doing. He then got out of the car to say he had no food. I was furious to say he least. He asked me for the post code of the restaurant and said he would fetch my food for me, I promptly told him to leave it and went into my house. It then took me several attempts on the live chat app to get a refund. It kept saying I could not cancel because my food was being prepared?? I kept repeating I did not want food now because my evening had been spoiled. The agent who had been corresponding with me from 8:15pm eventually said to hold on while she consulted with the senior team member. I decided to go out to the shops to get a ready meal at 8:25 and she had still not got back to me. As soon as I got to the shop 8:30pm I got a call from another driver outside my home, saying “I’ve got your food, where are you” (poor sole) I told him where to put it! as I was so upset and I disconnected the call. I made my way back home from the shop at 8:44pm and just got a message from the agent saying she had arranged a refund. I arrived home and by the time I cooked and ate my food, it was 9:30pm. What a terrible experience but never again will I use deliveroo.

Title: Ordered from etci kitchen at 7
Review: Ordered from etci kitchen at 7. By 8.30 I realised the food was 30 minutes late so I called the restaurant up who informed me that the food is ready to be collected but there’s no deliveroo driver. I called deliveroo to see what’s going on - the person on the phone was completely careless about the situation and offered me my refund but didn’t suggest to assign a driver so I can receive my food. It’s shocking that I was left waiting for an hour and neither the restaurant or deliveroo thought to contact me about this and left me waiting longer. Absolutely ridiculous

Title: I have had enough of Deliveroo and Uber…
Review: I have had enough of Deliveroo and Uber eats cyclist living there own rules in the middle of a pandemic and just wondered if anyone else feels the way i do or experience the same - 1) I was cycling in the rain, there was an accident and an ambulance was assisting an injured cyclist into the ambulance blocking the cycle lane. This was by the Heinekenplein, I moved over to the central lane to make space for the ambulance men and injured person. Directly behind me comes a speeding  Deliveroo cyclist, ringing his bell at the ambulance, oblivious to the situation ahead or demanding his right of way, realizing there was no longer space to maneuver, he then swerved to miss the injured person, Cut me up on the inside causing me to run my wheels into the tram track and crash my bike, causing injuring my leg and damaging my bike. I shouted after him but he was off in a hurry. Luckily the ambulance men came to my assistance too. 2) You go by the McDonalds in the Pijp and all the Delivery guys hang out there. Often you see them bunched together smoking and socializing, hugging and greeting each other without a care for social distancing and apparently completely oblivious to the fact we are in the middle of a pandemic. Looks like I’ll be getting a healthy dose of Corvid-19 with my delivery order. 3) Your standing in the bike lane at the traffic lights making  space and keeping a safe distance from other riders, then these delivery guys come sailing through, forcing there way to the front hoping to get the chance to jump the lights ahead of everyone else, taking up the distancing space and breathing over the cyclist next to them, again oblivious to the fact everyone else is doing their best to protect their Health and lives.  I am not usually one for complaining but I have just had enough of these delivery cyclist making up their own rules when others are trying so hard to stay safe. I understand these guys are making their money by getting from A to Z as fast as possible, but at what cost to their own and everyone else’s health.  I wish Deliveroo and Uber Eats would do more to control and educate these guys on the health risks to others, maybe these cyclist need to pass a test before being able to deliver and maybe there should be hefty fines for reckless behavior. I for one, will  no longer be using any of these delivery services again.

Title: absolute rubbish customer service
Review: absolute rubbish customer service. £3.49 for delivery from literally next door, plus £0.49 for service charge is ridiculous . wont use them again

Title: Disgusting service
Review: I usually give any company that can provide their service or product a 5 star, as they have done what is expected. Pretty low as a standard I admit, but Deliveroo are not customer oriented at all. They have a slopey shoulder response to customer issues and bounce you around until nothing can be done.

Title: I ordered food for before work
Review: I ordered food for before work, watched on the map, they came to the end of my road, as they were nearly here i left my phone in the house so missed the call. Stood at front door and nothing. When I looked it said delivered. I messaged customer services and they said I could have a refund in 48hrs and I went to work without dinner as I do nights

Title: Tried for over an hour to complete an…
Review: Tried for over an hour to complete an order, error message kept coming up. Tried calling, just waiting to dead sound.What was supposed to be a stress free tea time option turn very frustrating  !!

Title: Is Deliveroo a honest company
Review: Is Deliveroo a honest company. Ordered food.... Food was delivered to wrong location... Only solution was refund.... Can refund satisfy hunger... Manager call back to prove they are right. Customer if not delivered with food that they ordered should keep mouth shut and sleep in hunger.... Total dissatisfaction. People with children don’t order with Deliveroo or you will also face my situation of putting the kid to sleep with hunger

Title: Good customer support
Review: I recommend it over Ubereats. Once I didn't receive the delivery, but they refunded the money in a timely manner. When Ubereats didn't deliver they refused to refund.

Title: It's a scam
Review: They scammed me out of money and I did not even get my order for my birthday.... I had no food after promising people and the money they have me for the delivery was not even functional.

Title: Ordered twice so far. Always friendly.
Review: Ordered twice so far from here, to two different locations in Bristol. There was a slight delay with one order, but that was down to the restaurant cooking time, not the deliveroo driver (cyclist). Very friendly when handing over food.During pandemic, they also offer contactless delivery, which is great. Will definitely order again soon.

Title: Coop groceries (Deliveroo)
Review: Placed order for groceries from Coop at 13:20. Deliveroo delivered them (up many stairs) at 13:40. Pleasant, polite and cheerful. Excellent service.

Title: I have ordered 4 times in the past 3…
Review: I have ordered 4 times in the past 3 years and only once has the food been delivered, just ordered from pizza hut who use deliveroo, tracked the driver close to my street then it suddenly said that the order had been delivered even though i was outside looking, spoke to customer service who suggest that i just reorder as the driver had difficulty finding my address, when i refused they offered me half of what the order is worth in credit redeemable in the next few weeks. previous orders have not turned up and the one order that did turned up 2 hours late and cold.

Title: First order and great
Review: Only made one order so far, so early days...so for now 5 stars with the hope it continues! My order was super quick and super hot. Fabulous!

Title: What a scam nando's and deliveroo have…
Review: What a scam nando's and deliveroo have going on. Ordered food through nando's online who use deliveroo to deliver. But that's just it they didn't deliver. So £35 later and no food with neither nando's or deliveroo wanting to take responsibility when called to complain. Will not be using either ever again BOYCOTE AT ALL COSTS.

Title: Shocking customer service
Review: Shocking customer service. Cold food or order doesn't arrive and they couldn't care less. No refunds or compensation offered. Abs shocking. Use Uber Eats instead

Title: Never again!!!
Review: Ordered 5 times this year... two out of those times, the food never arrived and we were left waiting for over 2 hours since we kept getting told the the driver is coming. AVOID AVOID AVOID!

Title: Will  ever ever order with theese liars…
Review: Will  ever ever order with theese liars again they lied told me they delivered my food which coat 20 pound jus fonshed long day in hospital an they lied after i waited an hour an half .lied an took my food im so angry

Title: Deliver-Poo
Review: There should be an option to give zero stars. Nandos order arrived with one main meal and other items missing. We called Nandos but their recorded message advised us to ring Deliveroo. So we rang Deliveroo to be told that the only option was a refund of the missing items in the form of vouchers, so one of us had to go hungry. The call handler was totally unwilling (doubtless due to company policy) to arrange for the missed items to be delivered, to give a monetary refund or add compensation for the considerable inconvenience. She was also unable to pass us to someone who could deal with a complaint - or even to register a complaint on our behalf. To add insult to injury, the value of the refund voucher was significantly less than the missed items! Avoid Deliver-poo at all costs.

Title: Do NOT use this app
Review: Do NOT use this app. I had a TERRIBLE experience with them. I noticed my rider was close so I went to the front door of my apartment block. I got a text via the app from my rider saying they can’t find me. I tried calling them, she hung up on me. I messaged her via the app and said I was standing outside the apartment door under a specific sign. I got a message back (an automated one) saying my rider couldn’t find me and left my delivery at the door. They didn’t!! I was the only apt door and my post code was perfect. the worst part was their customer service. I called their customer service line and over 1.5 HOURS later having spoken to two people, one being a manager they couldn’t help. They wouldn’t re-order my order-apparently they can’t do it on their side. They supposedly rang my rider and she said she left it at the door. She didn’t. I felt all they did was read of a script in front of them and wouldn’t help. They wouldn’t give an explanation. The alarming thing was 4 days earlier the EXACT same thing happened my housemate at a different address where the rider said they couldn’t find them-yet they were outside the door, they supposedly left the delivery at that door too but somehow Deliveroo did re-order their order. It was an appalling service where I felt they did not care about the customer and kept saying they would look into it.

Title: Deliveroo in bedford are excellent…
Review: Deliveroo in bedford are excellent sorry just eat but they are so much better we have found . Thanks guys u doing a great job 😁

Title: They brought my food to the wrong…
Review: They brought my food to the wrong address and they didn’t give us a refund

Title: My first order as I was enticed by the…
Review: My first order as I was enticed by the free delivery offer..I received a message saying the food was delivered but it was not.The telephone customer service is absolutely awful. The operator could not understand a word I was speaking. The live chat was a bit better and eventually told me the same information and that I 'might' get a refund.. I will find out within 48 hours. And they have the nerve to charge for service? Crap.

Title: If I could leave a zero star I would!
Review: If I could leave a zero star I would!You place an order then EVERYTIME the delivery time is reached the slot moves.Now they have just called us 1hour 30 minutes after delivery was ordered  and explained the restaurant is closing so our order is cancelled!!!100% guarantee will not use again.

Title: Customer Support Manager Left Me Without Help
Review: A customer service manager really condescendingly explained an issue over and over again and did not meaningfully listen to my request or take my feedback onboard. They did not offer a resolution, but kept saying the same things. They just exited the chat saying they didn't want to waste their time helping me and left me without a resolution. So unprofessional and quite shocking. The quality of your team is abysmal and they are not trained properly to give a good service.

Title: Fraud!
Review: I placed an order with a restaurant hosted on Deliveroo platform that uses its own riders for delivery. As always I paid up. The food never arrived even after 1 hour past the stated delivery time. The restaurant fraudulently updated the app as having the food delivered when this is untrue. Deliveroo now tells me they cannot do anything about this and I have to settle this with the restaurant. Hullo, this is on the Deliveroo platform. What kind of crap reply is this??? Am steering clear of Deliveroo after this bad experience.

Title: Fantastic when I needed groceries on bedrest...
Review: I live alone and I was in hospital 3 times this week with severe chest pain and dizziness, and I'm on bedrest with some pretty hefty painkillers. Unfortunately I found myself stuck with no food in the house and had nobody who could collect my groceries for me. I am so grateful this service can deliver basic groceries same day and they were very helpful, I had my shopping done within the hour and it saved me from wheezing my way around the supermarket and making myself ill for longer. Thank you! If you're really in need the service is great.

Title: Put an order and no one came to…
Review: Put an order and no one came to deliver! Waste of time and effort. Worse, now being hassled "Deliveroo Support" - have they taken my money and run??AVOID _ AVOID

Title: I don’t even want to give 1 star
Review: I don’t even want to give 1 star, but had too to give a review! I placed an order at 18:52, to say the waiting time is 1.5-2 hours and my deliver will be delivered by 9pm. I spent 25 minutes back and forth speaking to 2 customer service reps, as the driver could not find the address? Then later to say sorry he has left the area and they can issue me a refund!??? How can someone have one job, to deliver food, and not even get that right? And all she could offer is a refund.... sorry not good enough! Where is my food? Guess the driver gets a free meal tonight! To top it off, I couldn’t even order direct from the restaurant to collect as by 9pm, they had closed! Disgusting service and will never use this service again! Unhelpful and left me hangry!!

Title: Very poor…
Review: Try to order some food with a delivery time confirmed. After waiting 1hr for the food we found out that the restaurant we ordered from was closed... very poor customer service and communication.

Title: Rubbish!!!!
Review: Delivery apperently arrived 10mins early but never arrived at all. Reason being the deliverer had a problem??? 🙄 but why then say it has been delivered at all? When suggested the driver might have taken the food for himself Deliveroo agreed that could be the case lol 😳 This service doesn't look like it works by my experience and other reviews. Keep up your unsatisfactory work Deliveroo  😁 great job 👎 and enjoy our food to the guy who was ment to deliver.

Title: Wish i could give negative stars for…
Review: Wish i could give negative stars for this company of thieves, tried to do my usual order from my local chip shop to help shield a member of my family website was stuck on waiting on confirmation for an hour would not allow me to cencel my order ended up going to the chip shop my self they said they had not had the order come through and even told me to use just eat next time as they are more reliable, so i end up paying for the order my self and taking it home my self get back to see what the website says and lo and behold they have a your food has been delivered i look at the time it was the moment i walked through my front door no one in my house has seen any driver pull up at all they even charged me for an order i tried to cancel about 14 times their call centre was not available and live chat down i tried again the enxt day to see if i could get a refund same no call centre or live chat available managed to find an email told them what happend and they refused to refund me because i had not told them with in 48 hours i even said in the email i had tried to contact them but their live chat, call centre and website was saying stuff was unavailble so do not use Deliveroo they will charge you for services they have not provided.

Title: robots
Review: the eat out to help out scheme wasn't applied although it was on the front of the screen, talking to customer service its like speaking to a robot... doesn't answer questions at all , terrible cs

Title: Fast places stuff comes cold
Review: Fast places stuff comes cold, but from independent takeaway, no worries

Title: Order arrives cold they take no responsibility
Review: Order arrives stone cold, when reported on the app I was advised I’d be refunded for this within 48 hours, over a week later, 3 emails to the deliveroo customer service ignored, I email again asking for a response re my outstanding refund they give me various excuses as to why I can’t have a refund. Completely unacceptable. I won’t be using this service any longer, it’s not convenient just a waste of money for cold food.

Title: Taking money without permission
Review: Have used deliveroo for a while with absolutely no issues but recently went through my finances and noticed they had been taking a monthly charge from my bank account for no reason whatsoever (no emails or details on my account to suggest what this might be for). Ended up totalling £114.90 that they have taken without permission - contacted customer service nearly 2 weeks ago and have still had no cohesive explanation as to why this has happened. Incredibly disappointed and will be deleting my account as soon as I receive a refund.

Title: At first had no issues using this app
Review: At first had no issues using this app, was going just fine till last week my account got hacked perpetrator used my account and card to pay for food in London and I was based in Manchester what amazes me that how they got the money to go from my account you need the 3 digits on back of the card this service is very poor got no refund or compensation I have screen shots to proof that they said cause they haven't be compromised they can't compensate they don't give a crap about your information and how its used stay away dont use you bank for this piece of crap service

Title: Terrible service from the driver
Review: Terrible service from the driver. He was late, wouldn't come to the door to deliver our food.   He was very rude on the phone, too lazy to get out of his car and bring food to door, instead he wanted me to go outside and walk to his car. He didn't even say a word when I went to grab the food. Don't know why delieveroo are hiring lazy rude staff. I found most of the staff a joke to be honest

Title: Thieves and liars they work with…
Review: Thieves and liars they work with restaurants to rip you off

Title: Half food delivered, no refund
Review: On what was supposed to be a special evening only half the order was delivered. No explanation, no resolution. A decent company would have made a simple apology and refund.Apparently there is just a brief window to use a credit on the account, which being subsequently ill and often in hospital I missed. They are aware of this but they have chosen to make a profit out of their failure.We won’t be touching Deliveroo again.

Title: This is a Scam
Review: This is a fraud scam  be careful you will never received the food or your Money bak from DELIVEROO. and it was not only one bur repeat few order they have same system robbery.

Title: Pretty and tasty 🍭🥤🍓
Review: Simply the best milkshake I’ve tasted, thanks @pickl Dcc. Y’all just put a smile on my face :)

Title: Do not waste your time !
Review: Do not waste your time !! Unable to deliver your food even after you pay 30% more because they control the market ,

Title: Insane Delays, Zero Updates
Review: Ordered food at 20:30, intended for delivery at 21:15. Got delayed until 23:30, at which point the order was cancelled with zero information given along the way. At least I'm getting refunded, which is better than most get.Most food delivery apps are garbage, but Deliveroo is genuinely the worst of the bunch.

Title: Horrible awful customer service never…
Review: Horrible awful customer service never ever going to use such a awful experience

Title: Deliveroo are awful.
Review: Have ordered from a few different places using Deliveroo and am appalled at their service. It’s not the restaurant/shops that are at fault either. It is the terrible drivers, awful tracking and updating, and terrible customer service. I will absolutely not be using them again, and will warn people off from using them as well

Title: Did not receive product
Review: Did not receive product, got denied a refund.

Title: Ordered KFC only half the delivery…
Review: Ordered KFC only half the delivery arrived and was stone cold! Trying to get a refund is a nightmare! Worst customer service experience ever

Title: Terrible service from Deliveroo.
Review: Terrible service from Deliveroo.I ordered some food from KFC in Warrington, to an address just around the corner. Waited over an hour, only to be told that the rider had been, tried to contact me, then left. Nobody has been in contact with me and I have no food. I will never use deliveroo again.

Title: Terrible customer service please just…
Review: Terrible customer service please just shut your company down and let Uber eats take over Overpriced for terrible quality of food

Title: Deliver screwed
Review: Seams you have to give one star just to be able to write a review. No stars from me really. Two weeks ago I ordered a meal which never arrived. I phoned the restaurant up and they said that the order had been cancelled by Deliveroo because they couldn't deliver in the time quoted. I reordered from another restaurant which arrived safely. However I was charged for both meals.I emailed Deliveroo to which they replied that I would hear from them within 24hrs. Nothing. I emailed them again after four days. Nothing. Finally I find the live chat is working and explained once again, The guy said he would ring the restaurant and find out where my food was. It was two weeks ago, I said. long story short Deliveroo cancelled my order according to the restaurant, they should know that! He then said he could not refund me, so we are done now, account has been cancelled and you have lost a customer.So my review is quick too take your money, uninterested to solve your problems.

Title: Can I leave 0 stars
Review: Can I leave 0 stars? I ordered over £100 worth of food and they only delivered a side salad. I questioned the rider and they said another rider would deliver the rest which never happened. I'm doing a chargeback on my bank if they don't refund.AVOID THIS POS COMPANY.

Title: ZERO STARS IF IT WAS AN OPTION Had family round so as a treat decided…
Review: Had family round so as a treat decided to order a Nando’s through Deliveroo. They delivered the totally wrong order and refused to correct it. They said they would refund me but it would take up to 48hrs. So I am left with no food for my guests and no money to order anything else.

Title: Rider
Review: It's a great place to work. Average earnings are £10-£12 per hour. Flexibility is great as you choose when to work. You can use car, bike, moped, bicycle or even a scooter. Register as a rider and if you put my referral bonus code DA197628 you will get up to £150 extra on top of your normal earnings after completing 30 orders.

Title: bad customer service
Review: bad customer service, basically the call handler didn't deal with my call, put me on hold, and then ended the call. Had to call twice, waste of time.

Title: Piece of sh#t customer service
Review: Piece of sh#t customer service. Ordered a pizza from Papa Johns and was very unclear unless you looked carefully that I was getting a mini pizza for £20!! They offered no help nothing. Horrible company who are quick to take money from customers but don’t remunerate or offer help when things go wrong

Title: Used deliveroo for the first time when…
Review: Used deliveroo for the first time when staying in Norwich, had a very rude man deliver. I had put the right address in as copied it from the piece of paper in the hotel room. He had got lost and was very rude and told us we were the people who put the wrong postcode and address in and sarcastically said 'I am the one who's lived in norwich not yous'

Title: Illegal cycling
Review: I an totally fed up with both Deliveroo and Stuart  delivery cyclists  speeding up the pedestrianised  Queen Street in Cardiff  . It has been ILLEGAL  to ride a bike or even a push scooter in Queen street  since the 1960's and your riders can be stopped and cautioned and your firm fined  . Your cyclists MUST wheel their  bike through it DO I MAKE MYSELF  UNDERSTOOD !!!????? Happens at least twice a day  Monday through to Friday   . Could you kindly  train your staff to abide by the law  or I shall have the regional area manager  called to order . so to speak .  I am fed up of dodging your riders  sometimes falling   . I am registered disabled   I often walk with a frame  I am not elderly  just disabled  . Your riders "think " they are nifty on their  bikes  NO  they are dangerous & inconsiderate . Time to sort it .

Title: All these food delivery apps are the same
Review: I have tried a few different app for food delivery and pretty much had problems with all of them. But when I saw this is does make me wonder what the other del companies are doing.Deliveroos-dark-kitchens-Investigation-reveals-meals-famous-brands-cooked-CAR-PARKS

Title: Driver just left delivery beside my…
Review: Driver just left delivery beside my doors on the rain without giving me any notice about this (I left a note for him asking to give me a call,, he also could use intercom). When I found food outside the building it was totally cold and wet so I had to skip it. Deliveroo issued just 50% refund. Very sad experience.

Title: Rubbish service from both Deliveroo and…
Review: Rubbish service from both Deliveroo and Cube Deserts Preston. - Order at 19:15- Was meant to be here for 19:45- Still being prepped at 20:15- Tried to cancel as kids were tired and wanting to go to bed.- Couldn't, and was still being prepped at 20:30- Contacted again and was in live chat the that said order was delivered at 20:41, which it wasn't- order came ar 20:08 to which I refused to accept. Now, if when ordering they said it was going to be two hours I just wouldn't have bothered and I would have understood. But to tell me it will be here shortly, cookies and waffles so not the hardest thing to make but then being nearly two hours just isn't on. That's £26 I won't see again. Might go in, order my food and leave without paying and tell them they stole my money yesterday.

Title: One missed call, no order, no money.
Review: Ordered two bottles of wine and some sweets from a local supermarket. One bottle got removed immediately after checkout because of stock levels. Immediately  tried to cancel the order through the appalling live chat (last night it was a queue of 300 other customers that resets if you close the app) they said they would contact the shop. Great. I set off to another supermarket in the rain to buy another bottle, leaving my girlfriend at home, when I get back I have one missed call. The order had gone ahead anyway and the driver now couldn't find my very obvious house, my girlfriend had no idea, so he just left. Back to the live chat, they will not refund my money, £13, or give me my disappeared order (where did that go, I still own it?!). Never using again.

Title: Bad experience with the amount paid
Review: Bad experience with the amount paid, while ordering it said just below 17£ but after some time checking my bank statement they charged me 20£ how does that work? Not the first problem occurring with them, but this was the last straw. Not using this company again.

Title: If I could leave no stars I would
Review: If I could leave no stars I would. Ordered from deliveroo and only the drinks turned up. Phoned the restaurant who advised they couldn't do anything and couldn't send a replacement order. They told us to use the chat option on the deliveroo app. There isn't a chat option on the deliveroo app. Clicked for help on our order and advised that all the food had been missing. I'm still waiting for a response 6 hours later. We had to place another order for food and pay a second delivery fee. Once this is sorted I'll be deleting the app and not using deliveroo again. Please don't waste your time and effort on this app, you'll be disappointed, they obviously have poor customer service and only care about taking your money.

Title: Deliveroo Dave
Review: So I gets my bubble tea. I goes to get it fo me an the homies ans the deliveroo driver he says. He says “you are beautiful you know”. Shocked I stares into the rain. Ma feets are bares and ma hairs are messy. So thankyou and good tidings: deliveroo dave, for giving me self confidence.

Title: It was not a great service by deliveroo…
Review: It was not a great service by deliveroo at all

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service.  Recieved wrong order, phone lines took 20 minutes. Offered refund but refused any sort of goodwill.  Left hungry.  Clearly don't care about their customers.

Title: Stole money
Review: Took money, restaurant had disconnected phone number, food never arrived. The company has still not refunded over £50. No one has come back to me. Terrible service. Will not use again.

Title: No food delivered.
Review: Ordered food and estimated delivery time was 45 minutes. The delivery time was postponed again and again and it got to over 1.5 hours. Then the message was that the food was delivered but no food outside. Then a phone call to say there was an issue with the order and they could reorder and the delivery time was between 45 and 70 min! You would have thought they would have known there was a problem with the order before. Don't use Deliveroo often and last time we did, the order took 2 hours to arrive with the estimated delivery time of 45 min when it was booked. Never again will we use Deliveroo.

Title: Appalling service yet again
Review: Ordered a delivery and the alert popped up to say the driver is nearby so went downstairs to wait. 5mins later wondering why he hasn’t knocked and look on my phone and it says order delivered. No order to be seen outside and no driver in sight. Customer support took 20mins to figure out my issue (1st support disconnected) and another 10mins to arrange a redelivery which is now going to take 1 hour. Won’t even refund the £7 charges (incl £2 tip). Previous orders we had the same issue, we had one where it said out for delivery and we rang the restaurant and they hadn’t even received the order and another where the driver left half our order on the restaurant counter. Another order was cold and late and various orders with missing items. Service is getting worse and worse each week but company has sapped all the competition and can’t get delivery direct from restaurants anymore. You should be ashamed Deliveroo.

Title: They do not refund you when they do not…
Review: They do not refund you when they do not deliver items. You have to kick up a fuss. The drivers are not trained and often cannot speak English. A good idea executed poorly by people who do not care about their customers one bit.

Title: Orinato pizza ( pizzeria dista 500mt da…
Review: Orinato pizza ( pizzeria dista 500mt da casa)arrivata tardi e fredda 😡😡

Title: Poor delivery experience
Review: Driver drove down our avenue, then listed food as delivered before I could call him to check where he was parked. Looked up and down the street, no food left anywhere and no call to advise where he had left it. CS arranged for a redelivery, but has really put me off from ordering again.

Title: Stay Away from Deliveroo
Review: It was my first order and they took my payment no delivery and no communication no refund horrible company We were hungry and scammed

Title: Deliveroo took the money and did not deliver
Review: Deliveroo did not bother to deliver my our food. They did not try to even investigate why it wasn't delivered. Instead they asked me to co tact the restaurant directly for a refund! How on earth is this business being allowed to operate. They are a bunch of crooks!

Title: First time I have used Deliveroo
Review: First time I have used Deliveroo. It will be the last.Driver did not deliver my order, tried to say he left at door step so no refund will be given.Had to raise a complaint before the lady refunded my balance of 18.00Will never use again. If the driver cannot communicate with its customer, then you should not work in a public environment.

Title: I will never give order from deliveroo…
Review: I will never give order from deliveroo again. I’ve paid the money, the restaurant havent bring the order and deliveroo says that i need to call the restaurant to refund my money. They leaved me alone! I couldnt eat the food and i lost my money

Title: Deliveroo has awful service
Review: Deliveroo has awful service. I have had many  bad experiences with Deliveroo over three years, and nothing has changed. A few days ago me and my house mates ordered shopping online and they only delivered 8 of 30 items, and we had to walk an hour to collect the rest from Morrisons ourselves. Now we have used a refund voucher from that experience tonight and we are experiencing more problems with delivery. Awful service. Just use Uber Eats

Title: I’ve spent 100s of pounds with…
Review: I’ve spent 100s of pounds with deliveroo. They used to be so great. But now, hugely extortionate delivery and service fees, dreadful treatment of their staff, and a buggy app which rarely works properly. It really says something when Uber eats has a better service.

Title: An anti-Semitic company?
Review: Recently outside an Exeter hall of residence I was subject to a torrent of anti-Semitic abuse and threatened with a weapon by a Deliveroo driver. He wanted to drive along the payment I was walking on, and that was enough to make this driver get out of his Deliveroo branded car and start screaming at me about how Jews need to learn their place, how they need to be dealt with, and if he saw me again he would run me down, all whilst waving a hammer in my face.He hated Jews so much even my dog was Jewish and would be "put down" like the rest of the Jewish race.Of course the language was a little...riper.Oddly enough I got the police involved, and they have video recorded by a friendly passerby. Except...It wasn't his car, he is not insured to drive it, the owner (in a city several hundred miles away) claims not to know him. So the police contacted Deliveroo, and who have declined to help identify their driver.-So do they agree with their employees claim that Jews need to be "out down"?-Don't see anything wrong with it?-Simply don't care?-Have no idea about the uninsured drivers they have working for them?Tricky one, still I won't use them on the off chance this driver finds where I live.

Title: Delete the app.
Review: The worst delivery service out there. The delivery time just gets pushed back and when the food eventually arrives it is so cold it is inedible. Luke warm chicken is not safe to eat. Deliveroo are slow to respond , the customer service team are out to do anything to avoid a refund. I had to threaten to call the police to get a refund. Absolutely dreadful. Don't use them. There are much better services out there.

Title: This’s the worst app I used so far
Review: This’s the worst app I used so far. I ordered my food and waited for like an hour. It said my food was delivered but nothing was actually delivered to me. I tried to call the customer service but they don’t even try to help. I kept asking them to call the driver and check upon my food while they talk about The process of refunding my money. I told them that I want the food not the money after waiting all that time, again they failed to help me. After so many tries, they told me they gonna call the driver but unsurprisingly he was not responding to his phone and now she told me that he was dealing with another order. They wasn’t giving me a definite answer whether my food is going to be delivered or whether not. So I waited another hour but nothing was delivered. One advice I would say to people ‘don’t use this app, unless you have food in your fridge incase the drive fail to make it to your door’. This’s my first time using this app and I am very disappointed and it will be my last time using it. I rate this as 1 star but hope there was a zero because even 1 star is too much for this app.

Title: App not working or website and staff…
Review: App not working or website and staff rude and unhelpfulI wanted to place an order for later today but in the app and on the website the schedule button would not let me change the time. I did everything suggested on help. The help line o ring wasn’t helpful either. The person I spoke to spoke over the top of me when I explained the problem he offered to place the order over the phone, which I decided to do. I asked if there would be confirmation and he kept saying “you have to place the order madam’ I told him I understood that and had said confirmation after the order. He didn’t seem to understand the word ‘ confirmation’ I decided not to place the order in the end.I have used a Deliveroo before with no problems, but never again!!

Title: Always overcharging for every food item…
Review: Always overcharging for every food item my cigarette are £10 normally and they charge £13 or more

Title: Thieves
Review: Thieves Ordered for the first and last time, order was not complete and they are refusing to refund the missed order. Crocked and rotten company AVOID.

Title: Incomplete order with driver admitting…
Review: Incomplete order with driver admitting the restaurant made a mistake never got a refund...dishonest company...avoid at all cost

Title: ABSOLUTE SHAMBLES. RUDE
Review: Ordered from Nando’s tonight. Driver kept getting later and later. He then arrived 1.5 hours after ordering. Gave us the order then knocked on the door panicked and said he had given us the wrong order (he hadn’t) then went. Before he drove off we realised that out things weren’t in the bag.... sides but no CHICKEN. He was very rude and refused to sort it for us. He denied that he had any contact number for deliveroo and refused to try to sort it. It was terrible service and took ages. Absolute shambles! Had to go back and pick it up our self as he refused to sort anything for it.

Title: If there was a ZERO start rating I…
Review: If there was a ZERO start rating I would rate it that. Absolutely shocking. Ordered food twice and money has been taken but they do not deliver the food. Waited for 2 and half hours. Unable to reach the driver nor the actual food place to ask what was happening. AVOID!

Title: Absolutely awful - Lies and Untrustworthy
Review: Absolutely awful, please DON’T USE !!!! We waited for our order, called restaurant as we had waited over an hour and a half, to be told the order had been picked up and was delivered. This is impossible as we didn’t receive any food. We were then told that the driver had called us three times, which was a lie as when we had chased deliveroo to find out where our order was, we were told that the driver had left our order at some ‘black gates’. We live in a three story flat in a cup de sac with open access with absolutely no black gates. The dishonesty from the driver was enough to put me off completely, we now have a contact number for deliveroo and will be called when our order is delivered, to ensure that it does intact arrive. All we can do now is wait another 45 minutes and instead of being very hungry, we will have more than likely gone past it. Overall, I can see why I haven’t heard people talking about deliveroo and in future will return to Just Eat for my food orders. Definitely my worst first time ordering experience !!

Title: So so angry
Review: So so angry . Just order 40 quids worth of food.  Didnt get delivered, spent 45 mins on live chat with a nice guy very polite.  But in the end couldn't offer a refund . First time using won't be using again.  Not even worth a one star

Title: Ghost rider
Review: If I could leave zero I would. Rider didn’t attempt delivery was already running late so as we suspected he had totally missed our delivery to get to others on time. We live on a main road so easy to get to and accessible and yet the rider didn’t try contacting us. Deliveroo have offered us a refund, so after waiting two hours for an order for 5 people totalling up to over 60 pound we are now in the same position as before.

Title: Very inaccurate delivery time and…
Review: Very inaccurate delivery time and forgot to include the requested cutlery. At least the correct items arrived.

Title: Very poor service
Review: Very poor service. Principle is "deliver as fast as possible". Which means the delivery driver would randomly drop your order somewhere, without giving you a call, and complete the order. The only way Customer Service helps is by saying "It takes up to 48 hours to refund".

Title: No delivery and no explanation
Review: Delivery didn’t arrive and nobody was prepared to follow this up. It took approx. 15 mins on the live chat function for someone to even try to call the “rider”.If it goes well, it’s a good app. If you have problems, there is no easy resolution.I raised a complaint and was given a £5 voucher. They still took payment for the food that didn’t arrive and I had to await a refund. If someone would have explained the problem and there had been some way to call the rider when a problem arose, it would have been better dealt with. Nobody tried to contact me at the time and I have had one generic email since the complaint.I will not being using the service again.

Title: They deserve no stars, Truly incompetent!
Review: Order never arrived despite waiting in the porch as the driver approached on the map! Driver apparently couldn't find address so was told by the delivery team to leave it in a safe place! No effort made by the delivery driver or the delivery team to ring and ask where the address was. So he's basically either stolen it for himself or handed a random person my dinner. Ive even walked up and down the street to see if there is my food dumped on the street.Call centre are useless and read from a script repeating over and over that its been escalated and ill receive an email to let me know if they have decided to refund my money but that it will take 48 hrs before they decide. Disgusting service! They deserve no stars!

Title: Poor service
Review: My food didn’t arrive & the only refunded half of what I paid. Their service is shocking. Never in my life hsve I experienced such poor service. Never again

Title: Sneaky no map, stacking orders and cold food…
Review: Stacked orders delivered an hour after picking up via moped, they quoted 15 mins,  food stone cold. £20 down the drain and they won't offer a refund.  They don't offer a map until the rider is close by in order to prevent you from noticing how many orders are being stacked. Dreadful service, app deleted.

Title: Useless thieving company
Review: Useless thieving company! Used them twice, both times had food items missing or totally incorrect. Haven’t replied to e-mails I’ve sent and no refund. Deleted the app. NEVER again will I use this appalling excuse for a delivery service.

Title: Worst delivery service I’ve ever…
Review: Worst delivery service I’ve ever experienced. Spent over £100 on an order, only for it to be picked up and delivered an hour later. Next time ill walk there.

Title: Food doesn't arrive and customer support is useless
Review: About 50% of the time the rider gets lost and orders are late.The last order I placed never arrived and yet deliveroo claimed it was delivered. Their phone line was unavailable, and the live chat on the website didn't work. I tried contacting them over twitter and they asked for my details and then went AWOL for about an hour. Eventually they offer me £15 off my next order, which is the same amount I paid for the order that never arrived.

Title: Very Hangry!
Review: Ordered twice.First was fine. Second time no food came. Customer service was slow and continually said it was busy. After 20 minutes they said it wouldn't be turning up and took another 10 before they would process a refund.Very hangry!!!

Title: Sneaky and Underhanded - deleted App!
Review: Made a one off order once back in July, was checking my credit card statement to find that they have been charging me an additional £11.00+ from July claiming I had joined a subscription service for deliveries. I have made zero orders since the original, that ought to be a clue that I never intended to sign up to anything plus email they claim to have sent in July nowhere to be found. Agreed to refund this month only, absolutely fuming. Sneaky and underhanded. App deleted

Title: Charged for 2 orders, only placed 1, no refund!
Review: Deliveroo charged me for two orders when I only placed one order, and I did not even receive the food for the second order as I assumed the restaurant had made a mistake. £40 out of pocket for an order that wasn't placed or received and they have refused to refund me. I have been a regular customer for some time but have now deactivated my account.

Title: Order not delivered! Driver at wrong address!
Review: Placed an order for some deserts, driver says he is outside but no where to be found. I told him the address he said 'no, this is not the address he has' - he was miles away. I explained to him he was at the wrong address but the order was marked delivered. My order was never delivered!  Bearing in mind this was my first order with Deliveroo I was extremely puzzled. I checked my account and delivery address they were both correct. I spoke to live chat who just seem to copy and paste stuff saying I have to wait for an email but not explained how or what the process is. Extremely annoyed, I then spoke to customer services who advised the address was indeed correct on my account and delivery address on the app. I was not at fault! I was offered a full refund. I need to wait for an email to come through which could up to  24 -72 hours to confirm the refund. Refund will arrive based on the bank - so an extra wait. I will not be using these services again. Extremely disappointed. Now have to wait for a refund if it ever arrives. So frustrating!

Title: Criminals. Wish I could give zero.
Review: Wish I could give zero.Ordered food driver said he was outside but he was not.Customer advice centre said he had gone and we could not get refund I repeatedly said he was not outside the house ( even sent kids out looking for him) he was nowhere to be seen. Customer service said they could not refund for 48 hours. Reordered and paid again for exactly the same order which did arrive this time. Total order £120 with Wagamama's. Now refusing refund for the food that never arrived. Service centrE repeatedly hung up- I was not rude to them. Emailed and asked for an address to write to as I am willing to take to court and they responded with a ban from Deliveroo. Never experienced anything like this in my life. I am taking it to the ombudsman and out of principle am taking it further.

Title: Did not delivered my pizza....
Review: Have ordered a pizza but it was never delivered!! The guy did ring my bell and after that I was waiting for him to knock my door perhaps but he never appeared...It was such a frustration for my family that was waiting for 45 minutes, also the worst is the customer centre that literally does not exist and I wanted to have my money refunded but not even that they are capable doing it and instead are giving me a credit...I don't want any credit as I do not wish to use them never again!!!

Title: Still waiting for the food after it was…
Review: Still waiting for the food after it was meant to be delivered over 1hr 15 mins ago. Phoned deliveroo and said I wasnt happy they put the phone down on me.

Title: Food spilt in the bag - no refund or response
Review: My Wagamama ramen spilt all over the bottom of the bag and ruined some of the food. Whilst trying to sort the issue out the rest of the food went cold. I was told to email email customer support, which I did along with some photographs. I haven’t heard back and no refund. That’s the last time I use Deliveroo.

Title: Dishonest business practices
Review: Dishonest business practices. I have now deleted my account with Deliveroo after a string of really bad experiences.The latest was a mistake that they will not correct. An order from Maroush restaurant of free beer with every main course order should have been removed (according to restaurant) but Deliveroo have not removed it and no beer was delivered. Deliveroo will not correct their mistake so they lost me for good. Disgraceful company

Title: Ordered food
Review: Ordered food, delivery guy rocked up, the drinks and ice cream bag were tipping drink everywhere, all the contents ruined, he said he would be back in twenty mins, he didn’t come back, I had to tidy the hall stairs and landing so no one else slipped so ended up eating my food cold, I had to contact them the following day and was offered a few quid off my next order, there won’t be a next order!!!

Title: Stupid drivers.
Review: Me and the guys from work always order out because the hotel food is always trash.the drivers are so useless!!! We clearly state THE FOUR SEASONS HOTEL but they always go somewhere like The hilton or something and claim their lost despite clearly marking the postcode and the pin.Total bunch of incompetent losers and tired of having the same idiot arguments with different drivers.Why would I want my food at The hilton if im at The Four Seasons?!?! Bunch of losers i swear.Have the nerve to blame it on the pin and sometimes the food is cold because they've been driving around on a moped.had a guy drive up in a car blaring music & ask me "is this the four seasons" despite parking next to the sign.Want a job? Become a delivery driver.they clearly will hire any idiot.

Title: Food didn't turn up even though marked…
Review: Food didn't turn up even though marked as delivered. Got in touch with the customer service department and got told the food must have been delivered to the wrong address as marked as delivered! That didn’t help me much as I was sat there waiting and starving! So guess what my dinner date and I ended up with beans on toast! Not happy hopefully I’ll get a refund if not I’ll put in a further complaint don’t use them awful.... never again!! Very poor.......and still starving!

Title: Food didn't turn even though marked as…
Review: Food didn't turn even though marked as delivered. Got in touch and got told the vechile had broken down, yet nobody was going to notify me. First and last time I'll try using them.

Title: Scam
Review: Created a new account via a link sent from a friend. The offer was supposed to take off £10.00 across my first four orders. It never worked. SCAM.

Title: Unreliable and terrible customer service.
Review: My first order didn't even go through. We waited 20 minutes past the latest delivery time and finally called the restaurant to find out they didn't even recieve our order, and that they quit business with deliveroo (!!). I looked for their alleged help options in the app and found nothing. Why is it impossible to find contact information to speak to someone live? I emailed and 2 days later got an apology which explained nothing about why my order was not sent through. We were left starving as we had no other food except bread (hence why we ordred delivery). I can't imagine someone who doesn't have any food at home, and was unable to leave for whatever reason, just starving because Deliveroo does not want to be contacted.My second order, I recieved the wrong item. This time I messaged their twitter team and was told that I would recieve credit. I was livid. You're forcing me to order through you so you can keep they money, despite providing dreadful service? They also provided me with a number to call which did not work, surprise surprise. I asked for a refund for the incorrect item and they obliged, without offering any apology. I asked them where the help options were in-app, they told me it would be found somewhere in the app. I showed them it doesn't exist except when an order has been delivered, and they ignored me completely! I don't understand why they make it so difficult for you to contact them. And almost impossible to recieve any support when it's needed because of a missing or incorrect delivery. Do yourself a flavour and delete the app, it's not worth the stress.

Title: Horrible service
Review: Ordered once, driver was horribly rude, food was cold. Second time I order from Nando’s and I was redirected for the deliver to the Deliveroo website. Order never arrived, there is no Valid phone number to call (the two provided were not Reachable), the live chat is unavailable. The worst service ever.Avoid!

Title: Hi guys
Review: Hi guys, I really sorry this guy’s service, I was order foot few times, and 2 times delivery was badly, I am tried upload photos, service and costumer very bad

Title: NEVER again
Review: NEVER again. Ordered 2 pizzas from Pizza Express in Hertford tonight and they arrived stone cold. Phoned Pizza Express and they said have to deal with Deliveroo. Their website wasn’t working properly and live chat wasn’t available. Contacted them on Twitter. They said my ordered was delivered earlier than the ETA (which is what is says - just an estimated time) and therefore they can’t do anything! What a con. £28.39 for nothing. It’s outrageous and shameful. 1st and last time I’ll ever use them.

Title: Waited over 3 hours
Review: Placed order at 5.20 pm, still waiting at 8.30.Unable to contact Deliveroo or Restaurant for update.Disgusted & hangry

Title: Absolutely shocking customer service
Review: Absolutely shocking customer service. Used to be very quick and efficient but for some reason, ever since getting deliveroo plus the service has been HORRIFIC. Example: I ordered something today, the order took an hour for the app to only say that delivery could not be done due to driver not reaching you. Noone called, noone rang the buzzer. I asked to investigate and the customer support rep just said he created a re-delivery, which would take another hour... Long story short, I spent an hour waiting another half hour speaking with support team only for them to refund my order once the restaurant rejected it, NOT because they were willing to provide a refund due to their incompetence. A joke. Use uber eats or any other delivery service.

Title: New customers DO NOT USE!
Review: As a new customer this is absolutely pathetic. The service you provide is one job, one job.The driver delivered me someone else's food which was very clear on the receipt attached and he quickly ran off.Speaking to their customer service and they said  they cannot do anything for 2 days. So they basically robbed my money, gave a terrible service and they are not refunding my money until they've investigated the issue.

Title: Pointless ordering from Morrisons
Review: Tried several times to order deliveries from Morrisons, less than half of the items are delivered each time. Seems like you are only allowed 1 carrier bag of groceries. You do not get a refund either but a credit to your deliveroo account, what happens if I do not want to use deliveroo again?? Money gone!!.

Title: Non Existant Order Deliveries
Review: Always having orders not turn up to my house, simply not good enough, who the hell is hiring your drivers?!?!

Title: Delivered my food to the wrong place
Review: Delivered my food to the wrong place. Said they followed the map and not the address of my house??Called to complain and get a refund and asked them to send me a free order- which they should but of course they didn’t. Can’t complain on the receipt because live chat is not available nor can you call. Sad

Title: Missing items in our order and deliveroo fails to amend anything
Review: Some items were missing from our order, there isn't any support or live chat available from deliveroo to contact them about the missing item. Deliveroo did have a page where they allow you to report missing items in your order, which we did - however, the only reply we got was that they are sorry but can't do anything about it, no refund for the missing item or even issue a lousy credit. Granted there are people who abuse the system, but they seriously cannot apply to everyone, especially in the case where they genuinely missed items in our order. Frustrating, this is the last time we will ever order from deliveroo. Never again.

Title: Deliveroo London - an outstandingly bad experience
Review: My girlfriend and I have had a series of awful experience with Deliveroo. The first time the order did not arrive at all: despite the rider did ring my building door, the delivery never made to my flat. The second time, we got a wrong order and they delivered someone else's order. Our order attive only much later. The third time I didn't want to order on Deliveroo, but my girlfriend insisted d on giving them another chance. As a result the order arrived over 20 minutes late (that is later than the latest side of the order arrival range). On top of that, we had ordered all hot dishes and they all arrived completely cold. I don't know what is going on with Deliveroo in September, but it's been a complete disaster!

Title: Consistent good service
Review: Consistently delivers on time, great food selection, good customer service.

Title: never ordering from here again
Review: never ordering from here again waited about an hour for my delivery that never turnt up turns out they sent it to someone els and then said it’ll take up to 70hours to go into my account bit of a p*ss take can’t even order from no where els now

Title: Absolutely RUBBISH SERVICE-food i…
Review: Absolutely RUBBISH SERVICE-food i ordered never arrived even though it was picked up from restaurant-Deliveroo is UNRELIABLE-will never use it!

Title: Deliveroo are considered one of the…
Review: Deliveroo are considered one of the biggest fraudsters in Uk. I have ordered 4 times now from deliveroo and I did not receive my order. I called them and they said they couldn’t do anything and it was the restaurants fault but when I call the restaurant they say it’s deliveroo’s fault. Deliveroo are making more money than ever by making there customers order then giving them excuses on why they can’t give you your money back.

Title: Terrible Service
Review: I was using the service for the first time and the order did not arrive, order status says delivered but no one came to our door. I was told by customer services that the pin was incorrectly placed, we have no control over this pin what so ever on the website, we are just required to enter the address. Absolute joke of a service.

Title: Nando’s deliveroo
Review: I ordered from Nando’s deliveroo service, and had 1 missing item. They told me the only options I have is to either reorder the same item and pay for everything myself again (including delivery fee) or refund. The refund was late, and there was no formal email or text to say I had been refunded. They had not given me the refund I was awaiting in my bank account, instead just changing how much I paid for my original order. The customer service try to be understanding but I feel we’re very insincere with their responses. Will not be using this service again.

Title: Order delivered with items missing
Review: I ordered online but didn’t receive an item. Reported on Order Help several times. No response. Wrote an email and was told Deliveroo will not do anything as email received after 48 hours. They are running a fraud business taking our money and stealing the goods. Filing police complaint and legal case.

Title: First time deliveroo user and last…
Review: First time deliveroo user and last absolutely worst service ever used and customer service What customer service , save yourself a lot of grief and never use !!!

Title: Like Just(ch)eat, but good weed prices.
Review: Like Just(ch)eat, another vapourware business: charge the customer for `delivering` an order; but sometimes the order won`t arrive, or it is stone cold, or it has been lost (while the customer has been charged). Judging by what others have said, it would seem that the delivery staff might even help themselves to your order if they feel peckish. Not to mention that Deliveroo cyclists are often a law unto themselves, nearly knocking someone over while cycling on a pedestrian-only pavement. Deliveroo? Delivernoo I`d say! (I`ll say one thing though: hats off to the one decent delivery person who got the order on time for a mate`s pizza. He was also impressed that he was offered a choice of 1gm of Northern Lights, White Widow or Girl Scout Cookies for a tenner! Nice to see a bit of entrepreneurial spirit!)

Title: Missing items, not returning the delivery
Review: Missing items,Have to reorder and pay a delivery fee again as well as a small order fee. Asked customer service representative what could be done and she said nothing. I am reading reviews now where people are being refunded the delivery fee as well and just feel awful. Why am I being treated worse than the other customers? My order was messed up and all you can do is credit me for the missing item but then have me reorder it and pay the fees again? Never will use your service again. So disappointed.

Title: Crap and deceitful with voucher codes
Terrible customer service experience
Review: Terrible customer service experience. 6 hours on the phone and internet trying to raise a complaint underThe Consumer Rights Act 2015.No formal complaints process and company does website states “ . We are required by EU law to provide this link to the EU’s online dispute resolution portal, however we do not participate in dispute resolution under this process.This company is a registered limited company in England.Deliveroo is not an  CTSI approved company. Awaiting refund Extremely disappointed

Title: We have ordered a few times through…
Review: We have ordered a few times through Deliveroo and twice they have got the order wrong. The first time we made do with what we got and they refunded the incorrect item but the second time we had to reorder the correct items where they charged me a delivery fee!!! I contacted them and they said they don’t usually refund the delivery to which I said that it was there fault so why am I paying for the delivery again! Their respond to that was as a valued customer they will credit my account. Shocking as I won’t be ordering again or recommending them so why would I want a refund on my food and delivery as credit! Eventually they credited my account - the person I spoke to unfortunately did not understand what I was saying which made it more frustrating. All in all terrible service - waited another 45 mins and the original dishes were stone cold by the time we got the full order.

Title: Threatening a Customer - Awful
Review: I have made a serious complaint to Deliveroo as the manager had threatened me. My orders have come cold on numerous occasions so as a customer I am  within my rights to complain. Now, when being on the call for hours on end, all I got was ‘we can only give you half the refund and I was threatened by a manager Edward S that my account will be closed due to breach of there terms i.e myself complaining about my order no even turning up correctly. Hold on, if my food is cold or the order in incorrect, I well within my rights to claim back what is mine. Don’t use Deliveroo. They are a bunch of money grabbers. They do not cate about there customers, just money in their pockets. I have already advised my co workers and family and friends not use Deliveroo and as we are big family and close they have already stopped using them. If it wasn’t for the customers you wouldn’t even be in business, remember that.

Title: Order never arrived / no effort to reorder
Review: Order never arrived. Instead of CS reordering and checking details. They just said they’d investigate in 48hrsThat doesn’t help get 6 sandwiches to 6 hungry firefighters. Will never be ordering from this company again. It’s not like your organising something complicated!! 0-5 stars

Title: If there was a zero or minus would give…
Review: If there was a zero or minus would give that. Just ordered from wagammama..order #9416. The food portions were half of what is normal when we collect ourselves! So either Wagammama has reduced it’s portions by half or the Deliveroo siphoned off half..  and the remainder was cold and limp..nasty.. i could attach a picture.. looks like a major scam. There should be an enquiry and they should be shut down. We called Deliveroo they said nothing they could do, it was Wagammama’s problem.. wagammama said it was Deliveroo’s problems! £25 worth of garbage.  You’ve been warned.

Title: Use UberEats instead!
Review: Ordered food and was told it had been delivered, it hadn’t. Contacted Deliveroo they said it was 2 mins away. Waited 15 mins still nothing. Contacted them and they said food wasn’t coming, no reason why. Terrible service. 4 days for refund!!

Title: Despicaroo
Review: Despicaroo! Ordered grocery shop at 6pm. Bread expired same day but wanted it for next couple of days to save going out. Am disabled & will cost me £7 to go out. Deliveroo charged £3-99 delivery+49p service fee. Offered me £1-50 to my account. Regularly spend £100+p.m. with them. Offended doesn't come close! They'll need me before I need them!

Title: If It was able to add no stars I would…
Review: If It was able to add no stars I would have! They left my items of an order from Co-op. I reordered my missed items and now they don’t have an option to refund, the additional delivery or small order charge which is their fault. I then said of I will take a discount voucher to get my money back which they are now steeling, sorry still automated response of they understand and will improve, same response as last time.

Title: They overcharged me
Review: They overcharged me, I complained and asked for my money back, they said no and stopped answering my emails. Truly appalling

Title: 70% of the drivers are total mongs
Review: 70% of the drivers are total mongs and can't even find my address even though we have Google maps and stuff these days, literally only ever have a problem with deliveroo drivers everyone else is fine, they're a bunch of dunces round here, other than the mentally challenged drivers deliveroo is pretty good value when subscribed to deliveroo plus otherwise don't bother it's too expensive just eat out you know it's cheaper

Title: Absolutely terrible
Review: Absolutely terrible. Always takes long and then they miss items and have the wrong items. Only an account credit received.

Title: Deliveroo aid fraudulent activity
Review: Deliveroo allowed someone to add my card details to another account and fraudulently transact 4 orders. Deliveroo have not apologised, provided any form of compensation or provided an explanation as to why they have allowed this to happen, pushing the blame on my bank - this is hands down a Deliveroo issue. Their customer service team are entitled and extremely unhelpful. I have requested that they delete my account immediately and I have advised my friends and family to do the same.  Deliveroo are NOT safe to use and clearly have a major security issue which they are either too arrogant to address or they are aware of already and simply do not care enough about their customers to invest in doing something about it. Either way I urge you to avoid using this platform.

Title: I don't have complaints with Deliveroo
Review: I don't have complaints with Deliveroo, they are always reliable and customer service is great and always supportive. I have a Deliveroo plus account and I think if you use them even once a week is very convenient, much better than Just eat and more restaurants than Uber eat, plus kudos to the drivers for braving the streets with every weather just to bring us food! Thank you thank you thank you!

Title: Driver damaged property and escaped
Review: Driver damaged property and escaped, insurance never covered costs.

Title: What a let down...
Review: In theory deliveroo is a good idea but what a rip off!!I have two kids who wanted a burger king kids meal my car's broken down and I decided to see what my options were.In burger king we pay around £2.50 / 2.79 something like that, I'm not sure exactly how much for a kids meal but around there.Anyway you can only get an orange juice as a drink so that was a bummer, and it cost me £5 for delivery plus £2 because I hadn't ordered alot. I paid £15 almost for 2 kids meals. I also just read online there ripping off the restaurants aswell taking 30% as if they aren't charging the customer enough as it is. I definitely would not recommend unless you want to pay 3 times the usual price and want squashed cold food when it arrives. What a disappointment for my kids.

Title: Never ordering with Deliveroo again
Review: Never ordering with Deliveroo again! Ordered a pizza that got 'lost' as driver was assigned to wrong person instead of me, by restaurant was closed. and then ordered another pizza from somewhere else, waited over an hour whilst my already made pizza went cold, had to ring deliveroo to manually to assign me a driver. Kept updating arrival time on app and eventually got a cold shrivelled pizza as driver was over 2 hours late!!!!
