Title: Applying for Deliveroo
Review: Garbage customer service, I have sent multiple emails inquiring about an application I made to them over a month ago to become a deliveroo rider, and had no response from them for over two weeks... I'm absolutely appalled at how useless the customer service is, why is it you can never get someone to respond to a simple enquiry?

Title: Worst service ever
Review: Worst service ever. Over priced, delivery driver said he could not find my house and then said he left the food in my front garden. Wrong you left it 2 miles away. Absolutely worst service ever. Customer service said it was my fault because of wrong address. Really? Your confirmed my address on the phone when i made a complaint.

Title: This company is changing to a scam…
Review: This company is changing to a scam company. Literally in 30 minutes I saw 3-4 reviews basically having the same experience as me. Order didn’t arrive. The driver not picking up the phone when he arrives,the customer service said its gonna take 2 days to get my refund? Which i dont know if i will get a refund. Please shut down this company please wth

Title: Avoid using this so called delivery…
Review: Avoid using this so called delivery serviceDid not delivery food that was ordered. Said they had been to my front door. Absolute LIES they told After I complained got an email to say they’ll refund my £20.Then got another to say will not be refunding. I don’t know how they get away with stealing people’s money. Something needs to be done they are stealing people’s money and getting away with it I work hard for my money I’m reporting them to the police 1st and last time using them. I should of used Uber eats they have never let me down.

Title: Driver didnt deliver everything
Review: Driver didnt deliver everything, we asked they and they couldn't understand a word we were saying. We rang the restaurant they said they definitely put everything in the bag and we would need to contact delveroo which is never easy

Title: 8 perfect deliveries....
Review: 8 perfect deliveries, on the 9th I sat waiting at my door for 20 minutes when I saw they were on their way. The driver never approached the door let alone buzzed our suite. Extremely simple address with lots of parking. They said because I didn't answer my phone-- which I left upstairs because I was meeting at the door as per usual, every time. no one buzzed, nothing. Nobody approached with food, yet we paid 30€ and were left hungry. Terrible experience.One would think that the phone call would be a last resort, when the service is specifically meant to deliver to the door-- we're in quarantine and not allowed to leave our building.They said that because I didn't answer their call I lost my food AND my money.They know they are one of the few places that will deliver to phones outside of their region.Do yourself a favour and get a sim card so you can order from businesses who value their customers. This place definitely doesn't.

Title: Hello and goodbye deliveroo within 1 hour!
Review: Absolutely despicable customer service. Simple food order that didn't arrive. Customer service offered zero explanation as to why it didn't arrive then directly said another team would contact me in 24 to 48 hours for a possible refund. No attempt to resolve the current situation and jumped to a POSSIBLE REFUND. Application deleted within 1 hour. Hello and by deliveroo.

Title: AVOID!!! Cold food, no refund.
Review: AVOID!!!Ordered takeaway in June and it arrived cold and inedible and logged straight away on the app. Nothing happened. Then received an email asking how it was, so I gave feedback that I was unhappy and requested a refund. Nothing happened.Then back and forth emails trying to get a refund which they still declined. I contacted the restaurant who said they would refund the money if Deliveroo authorised this. Spent 30mins on a chat trying to resolve it sending screenshots of emails to prove and still they would not refund me. £18 on two cold meals is not acceptable and dangerous to eat. When I pay for takeaway it is a rare treat and expect it to be hot and edible!!Also I demanded a formal complaint be logged and I have not received contact to confirm this therefore is a breach.Disgusted by the customer service and the decline to refund me. Clearly they don't care about the health of their customers and are happy to take their money.

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service. I was charged for a deliveroo plus subscription even though I have never used deliveroo before they said they would investigate the situation and never got back to me. Called them a second time & they said they would escalate the situation and still heard nothing back for a week. Called again and they hung up on me.

Title: Appalling - I ordered food via Deliveroo.
Review: I ordered food via Deliveroo.An hour and a half later it still hadn't arrived.Contacted Deliveroo via live chat.They told me that there had been a mishap and that they had tried to call me.Noone had tried to call me.I asked what the mishap was. They said that the driver had a broken down vehicle. Noone had told me my order had been cancelled until I made contact asking where my food was.I asked would there be any form of a small sorry compensation. They said no and goodbye.Absolutely appalling service. Kelly WOrder placed on Sunday 20th September.

Title: No food delivered to me
Review: I order from Deliveroo and I never get the order. And It shows that it has been delivered to me. I am really unhappy. And I contact the customer services and they told me that they can not help it and I am sorry... Never again I will order food from them. I can not give 0 Starts if not I will do it.

Title: Abysmal
Review: Delivery time kept being pushed back.  After 1.5 hours we called the restaurant - our order had been ready 1.5 hours earlier and sitting in the restaurant!  They agreed to remake and we collected it.  Deliveroo have refused to refund the £2.50 delivery charge because we made the claim over 48 hours later (because we couldn't get through to them and they kept closing the chats!). Will never use them again.

Title: Terrible service
Review: Terrible service. They disposed my food without delivering it!!! I had placed an order automatically and then realised the saved address was my work address rather than home. They wouldn’t allow my to change the address as despite offering to pay extra delivery fees, so I asked them to just deliver it at work and give it to some of my colleagues who are oncall at the hospital. They said they can’t as they had already disposed the food!!!

Title: Deliveroo - Poor delivery service
Review: Ordered food through Deliveroo, delivery took two hours, first attempt at the order was taken by one of the drivers (never made it to me). Took one and a half hours before it got sent out again, food arrived cold. I won't be using them again, despite the offer of credit as an apology, this unfortunately is not the first time something like this has happened to one of my orders.

Title: Used twice in Andover  both times cold…
Review: Used twice in Andover  both times cold and I mean cold not slightly warm but freezing bloody cold an absolute joke do not use

Title: Absolutely disgusting
Review: Absolutely disgusting! Burnt inedible food (that the restaurant Zizi’s were also aware of) and yet deliveroo refused to help or advise us. “Not my department” “you’ll have to wait 24-48hrs” f**king ridiculous!

Title: Definitely won't be ordering with them…again
Review: Definitely won't be ordering with them again lost my first order so reordered 2 hrs later received it it was just about warm never again

Title: Week after week, month after month, year after year
Review: Week after week, month after month, year after year all I ever get from deliveroo is issues after issue. If it's not cold food cause a driver took a long route or decided drop off 3 deliveries before mine, it's the driver forgetting to check the order and forgetting to deliver and item or delver the wrong item. Their customer service fight with you as they never want to give a refund for cold food, slow delivery and sometime they wont give a refund for a missing item. A person named Dennis on the app just told me That i don't have to use Deliveroo if I am unhappy and don't like their tool. All I want is my food and drink to arrive on time, correct order and nothing missing.

Title: Worst service. Poor poor service
Review: The food was delivered to me from wagamama unsealed, no bag. When i tried talking to the guy he rode off. The worst service ever. I will never use deliveroo again. The deserve zero star.I took it back to wagamama and they told me I should not have taken it as they always put the food in a sealed bag. In this corona virus time, how can deliveroo put customers at risk.

Title: Delivery late it’s a joke
Review: Ordered food before going to work nights placed order at 630 left for work at 8pm food still not arrived, turns up at 815pm and my son said it’s cold tried to complain on the app but they where a joke

Title: Getting worst and worst everyday they…
Review: Getting worst and worst everyday they keep you waiting 1h and 1hr and half

Title: Really strange culture going on here
Review: Ok, I ordered from a place called Smoke via Deliveroo, extremely high rating and quite expensive so thought yay let’s pig out on some quality scran. When the food eventually (late) arrived I was astonished to find that the food was actually horrific. Like it had been made by children and also like it had been made from joke ingredients like dog food. The actual worst food I have ever consumed, from any country, ever. Yet when I try to query Deliveroo over the massively high rating and why can’t I leave a review to warn other customers, they blanked me and refused to engage in conversation about it. I suspect there’s some sort of mate-propping scheme going on, or backhanders, because there’s no way 268 people could have left an average of nearly 5 stars. These food delivery companies are not fit for purpose and their attitude towards customers is disgusting. I wish they’d either just fail completely and disappear or realise that they are becoming hated by folk for their lackadaisical business practises.

Title: awful experience every time
Review: awful experience every time. never again!

Title: Company obviously doesn't want business
Review: This company obviously doesn't want my business. You can order goods but they won't accept payment. It seems there's a problem with Visa Verified and Deliveroo. I've spent hours on this in the last couple of weeks, now I'm fed up. It's not my problem. They don't seem interested in fixing the problem. I'm the customer, they can't deliver, I go elsewhere.  I've cancelled my subscription and will be trying"Just Eats" and "Uber Eats" instead.

Title: Very efficient service
Review: Very efficient service. Deliveroo driver Gary was really nice. Got here 10 mins early. Very impressed!!

Title: BE AWARE - DELIVEROO / VISA PROBLEMS
Review: BE AWARE.. THERE IS PROBLEMS WITH VISA VERIFIED and DELIVEROO. I had $537(aud) of transactions made on my credit card. Deliveroo and VISA is aware of this situation.PLEASE spread the word to stop anybody else being scammed / ripped off.Thankyou - goodluck

Title: Rating of 1 is being overly generous
Review: Rating of 1 is being overly generous. Ordered food for myself and guests and after 2 hours food still not delivered. Rang the restaurant to find out that my order had been delivered to someone else. Rang deliveroo and they had the cheek to tell me that they were going to compensate me £66.89, penny dropped they meant they were going to refund me my money back. I complained a little more and was told that they would put £10 in my deliveroo account, I told them to stick it where the sun doesn't shine! Disgusting service, definitely won't be using them again and I'll spread the word to family and friends.

Title: Lost Nando's order.
Review: I ordered Nandos from deliveroo today and spent over £50. My order was not delivered to my address, when i contacted deliveroo i was told that it was contact free delivery. So I payed for something that was then left outside for someone to walk past and help themself to my food. I didn't receive any notifications that my food was being left. I'm so disgusted with deliveroo. So quick to take my money but not interested to resolving the issue that I have raised with them. They have also refused to refund me, I will now have to take this up with my bank. Unbelievable

Title: RIP OFF
Review: They have arranged the app so you order food to 'pick up" in the middle fo the pandemic, against UK law. when confronted, they will not give you a refund and will answer with a script. CON ARTISTS. never again.

Title: ZERO ZERO STARS
Review: ZERO ZERO STARS THE MOST HORRIBLE MONEY THEIFS EVER! All their drivers can’t speak English or know how to read maps. Taking money without providing the food you have been waiting for 40 mins . DO NOT ORDER FROM DELIVEROO

Title: If I could a minus review I would
Review: If I could a minus review I would, they have been charging me 11.49 since December for a subscription i never signed up to!! Called my bank was told to call them which I did, 30 mins on hold and no sign of a resolution, it's a joke of a company they read of a script and no one knows what can be done about refunds! They should shut them done in my opinion

Title: Too Greedy to provide proper customer care
Review: The major issue with this company that I have is the greed they allow their drivers to show. I am sick of ordering food and the notification pops up ‘driver is delivering another order’ you know you are getting cold food and there is nothing Deliveroo will do about it. I once refused to accept the food as it was freezing cold and had been on a round the town trip stopping at three addresses first and Deliveroo still made me pay. I DIDNT EVEN HAVE THE FOOD!!! And if you do a chargeback then you will be blocked from using the company

Title: did not deliver my 35-pound order and…
Review: did not deliver my 35-pound order and refused to give me a refund.

Title: Money grabbing thieves
Review: All icecreams missing from desserts which cost over £43. Got fobbed off by dessert place who told me to contact deliveroo. Contacted deliveroo who has the most useless and incompetent staff and just carry on reading from a script. DO NOT USE DELIVEROO they'll take your money and then it's none of their business.

Title: Worst customer service
Review: Worst customer service. They charged me twice for Deliveroo Plus on the same day and when I complained and asked for a refund the chat was several times broken up and I was constantly provided with a new customer service representative who had no idea what I was talking about.

Title: Company of Thieves
Review: paid for items, items not delivered, still took the money and replied with “ We’re sorry that not all of your items were delivered. We can’t offer you credit right now. We will take your feedback on board and work on improving the experience next time”

Title: Missing item in the order!
Review: Missing item in the order!I should have read reviews first before I signed up! After all these years I avoided this, but cos when u're desperate & can't go out, u rely on this kind of service. But pleeeeease, on these Covid times, get a grip, do your job properly, & don't CON people.*An item missing in the order, went out straight away & rider's gone-& the bag says "checked & sealed" Wow.*1 Burger inside was all over the bag! What?Covid safe joke?*K**original chicken flavour!---the fillets are so SALTY!-i know it's not their fault.*But worst part....there's no way any problems of any sort on whatsoever can be rectified! As long as they've collected your MONEY, nobody cares.

Title: Rubbish
Review: I'm on a review roll so I'll do these...Don't mind paying for a service but these are chancers. Firstly police your site. People are struggling and you are letting people charge three quid for a bag of crisps with a £1 RRP. Secondly, sort your drivers out. COVID secure my backside. If it wasn't easier than messing about with stuff I wouldn't use it. Someone else will do this model better. If I was so slack in my job I'd be replaced by someone better.

Title: My food was delivered somewhere else
Review: My food was delivered somewhere else. I placed an order with deliveroo through the app and after making the payment I landed into a confirmation page stating one very old address of mine (def not the one I use to have as the main one). I realised straight away and I got in contact with the Deliveroo customer service to amend the address, using the chat option in within the app. They told me that this wasn't possible at all even though the driver hadn't even picked up the food yet. I then tried calling in the customer support and a girl said that she could do it, however she mentioned having a bad internet connection and the call cut off. I called once again and another customer service representative told me that there was no way of getting my food, that it would be delivered somewhere else and I wouldn't be able to get a refund. They were all quite rude apart of the girl with the bad internet. I had this problem before with Uber eats and they kindly solved my problem straight away. I will never use Deliveroo again.

Title: Misleading Delivery Times
Review: Short delivery times entice you to place an order and then the time trebles or quadruples causing massive delays all because of misleading information from Deliveroo and a lack of delivery drivers. The result is that you don't want to order again from your chosen restaurant which is a shame as the delays are not their fault. Oh and food nearly always arrives cold too, the whole service is flawed.

Title: Appalling service
Review: My order never arrived despite stating it had been delivered. Spoke to the customer service team on the online chat who said they could not arrange it to be redelivered despite admitting it had been delivered to the wrong address. They continued to vaguely say it would be passed to another team who would investigate and contact me in the next few days. The manager I spoke to then said repeated the same thing without promising that I would be refunded. I stated I wanted to make a formal complaint to which she said 'this is your formal complaint' before ending the chat. They did not seem bothered in the slightest. Shocking service considering they have taken the money, delivered my order to the wrong address or not at all and not even guaranteed me a refund! The customer service team were extremely unhelpful and Deliveroo should have better procedures in place to stop this happening to paying customers! Do not recommend!

Title: Didn't get the food that was ordered…
Review: Didn't get the food that was ordered despite the app saying it was delivered. 2nd time this has happened, I couldn't take that risk again especially as had guests on both occasions.

Title: Absolutely Appalling - Con Artists
Review: I have ordered from Deliveroo regularly for the last five years, however I placed an order this evening totalling £18.58 from one of my favourite local restaurants.I received the usual notifications stating the driver had collected my order from the restaurant and was nearby however there was no sign of the driver.The Deliveroo app stated that my order was delivered, I went outside into the street and checked the outside of my property and also the next door property however there was no sign of my order.I then contacted Deliveroo on the app and told them my order had not arrived, I have CCTV covering the front of my property and I sent them the footage showing no one had been outside since 17:30pm, I ordered around 19:31.Despite showing the CCTV footage showing that no one had attempted delivery, Deliveroo refused to refund or credit my account - although all I actually wanted to know was where the food had been delivered and for them to ask the driver where it was, which they refused to do and just left the chat.I opened a second chat to try and get further clarity however I was again sent a generic message and the chat was closed by Deliveroo.Essentially I haven’t received my order, I have CCTV footage showing no Deliveroo driver approaching my property and yet they refuse to resend the order or compensate me? An absolute farce and scam with appalling customer service, I am actually shocked!

Title: misleading and fraud
Review: deliveroo sent me email for 7 pounds credit for next order.. so i ordered nandos worth 6.75..and used credit..i got billed for £8.50when i spoke to customer service they said, my order was worth 15.50( 6.75 food plus 1.99 delivery plus .50 service fee plus £5 small fee)small fee for ordering under £10 they said..so that £7 credit was misleading and charging 15.50 for 6.75 meal is ridiculous..never again ordering deliveroo

Title: Cold and inedible
Review: I ordered from a local restaurant I've been to before. The food is usually good, but when it arrived via Deliveroo it was stone cold and inedible.

Title: Avoid
Review: Had an order through them the restaurant messed up the order and called them up they said to contact Deliveroo. Had to leave an email with Deliveroo as there live chat was unavailable. Email said 48 hours and we will get back to you. How is that going to help when I’ve ordered my food now

Title: No standards at all !
Review: Ordered food from Helios in St. James Street,Walthamstow.  Food arrived after 1 hour which was fine on a Saturday. We ordered the mixed grill for 4 and calamari total £45.99. Only a salad and calamari arrived to our disgust. We called the restaurant and they said it was not there fault as it happens alot. So instead of the restaurant trying to help they hid behind deliveroo (no one picked up from deliveroo). Helios should be ashamed to as its there name above the door and their choice to trust a poor courier.  I will float this review to as many platforms as possible. What a joke and it ruined the Saturday night  leaving us with no food.  A very angry and now ex customer.

Title: I have had no problems with them
Review: I have had no problems with them, orders always get delivered on time and polite delivery drivers.

Title: A solution at last.
Review: Absolutely disapointed by Taste of China Gravesend  ,ordered a chinese tonight ,Special hordeause ,unpacked first to notice the ribs 1 had no meat on the other had hardly any on ,barbecue ribs had hardly any meat on them .I rang them at the restaurant and spoke to the manager who said what do you want me to do i said can you come to pick the food up .The lady said she hasnt got a driver to pick it upShe said if we accept she would refund us half the money back .I said can they pay it back into bank account or paypal.I then  got in touch with Deliveroo through web chat and explained web chat .I explained what has happened the lady said £8.something refund .I said no i told her what happened also other food was not good crispy beef was hard. carrots and onion hard.She said to ring the company and find a solution .I rang them and said what happened ,what she had promised is misleading .I said you promised half the money back .£24.00 .The lady owner said she would ring Deliveroo later to reach a solution .I said i am going to contact them again too.I contacted  Deliveroo through chat .The man was only interested what had happened at first not what happened fully It then went offline then i cant contact them .It says web chat offline.Kept clicking on it still no luck what a joke with Taste of China and Deliveroo .Steer clear and boycot this chinese and Deliveroo .                            I have contacted Taste of china tonight who said there was a miunderstanding on her part and they have agreed to pay me half the money back.

Title: DO NOT USE.   YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED
Review: Crooks.    I used to be anti amazon but i tell you what they have never ripped me off in over 20 years.    I’ll never use deliveroo again and when you get ripped off you can say you didn't know

Title: Deliveroo is awful, rubbish values
Review: I cannot understand how Deliveroo can decline to pay any refund on a missed Grocery delivery.  Blaming that it's my fault they just kept £40 on a Grocery delivery order. Why isn't there a redelivery service?  Where are the groceries and why can't I pick them up? They are overpriced and service has been getting worse, and now this.

Title: Bread and soup missing from order
Review: Bread and soup missing from order. Restaurant suggested I go and collect them myself. Reported to Deliveroo and two weeks later heard nothing. Went on live chat and offered £2.99.

Title: Don’t take the gamble by ordering…
Review: Don’t take the gamble by ordering through Deliveroo! I ordered from a piece of velvet, the order went through as they wouldn’t let me a order again and money had been taken out of my account . The lady on the phone was not helpful she cancelled my order and kept telling me to call my bank and that I would receive my money back in 24 hours . She also had me on hold for over 20 mins waiting for her to get a manager . Mark was extremely rude on the phone he was not able to help instead he kept saying that on his system it didn’t go through . So up till now they have taken money from my account and I have waited hours for cake that will never come .i received no apologies or compensation  Thanks deliveroo I will never be using you again .

Title: DON'T ORDER THROUGH DELIVEROO!!
Review: Once again DELIVEROO are scamming people! When oh when will the financial ombudsman do something about it? They have taken money from my account and now my grandsons account! How many more millions of people are they doing it to?They say they will refund but they do not and how on earth they get new card details (which I got to try and stop them taking further payments) I don't know. Well I'm putting in a complaint to the FSA it is the biggest scam going! DON'T ORDER THROUGH DELIVEROO!!

Title: Ordered for the first time and it…
Review: Ordered for the first time and it arrived 30 minutes late. Will not be using them again and would recommend that everyone stays away from this company.

Title: Absolutely disgusting service
Review: Absolutely disgusting service! I ordered Pap John pizza on deliveroo website, and because of the stupid way they built their website by mistake instead of 3 large pizzas I ended up ordering 3 small pizzas for £65!!! The bloody website made it so hard to see for people the different options and actually pointing out to the customer what he/she orders at the end of the order confirmation. None of the receipts confirm what pizza I ordered in terms of size and the prices for the product are way higher then those on company’s website! £21 for small pizza ordered thinking that I was ordering large - are you kidding me????? I believe such disgusting services ripping off people on a simple things should not exist!

Title: USE ANOTHER APP DELIVEROO ARE THE WORST
Review: Please use any other app but Deliveroo they are the worst. If I could give 0 stars I would, they took my money and never delivered. I don’t think this company deserves even one star. DO NOT USE. They are claiming they delivered but nothing showed up. DO NOT USE

Title: If I could give zero stars I would
Review: If I could give zero stars I would. I waited 40 minutes for food, and even though I paid £50.00 for the meals (which didn't even come from a restaurant with restaurant overheads, so I'm not sure where that pricing comes from), plus 49p 'service charge' (um, shouldn't the restaurants be paying this to Deliveroo or are they double dipping?) plus £4.50 for delivery - and then the driver goes to two other homes first - then when the driver arrives at mine he does not have the correct order, he has a much smaller order - so presumably, one of the earlier deliveries got my larger food order and therefore a bunch of free food and drinks they know they didn't pay for, (...lucky them, right). When I pointed out that it was wrong the driver takes that food, which I guess he then eats? And I am left waiting another hour for a replacement. First time I had ordered food with them in 9 months, how on earth are these guys still in business??

Title: Orders are nearly always late
Review: Orders are nearly always late - specifically compared with others like just eat, the performance is horrific

Title: Don’t use Deliveroo!!
Review: I ordered some Sushi tonight from Staines Food Court via Deliveroo and seriously disappointed with the food and we received a mash of rice & fish. Deliveroo just said that as it was a quality issue that they couldn’t offer us a credit or compensation albeit costing us £40! Not the service expected from this company and I wouldn’t recommend ordering Sushi from them.If I could post a picture I would! Disgusting!!!!

Title: Worst customer service!
Review: Worst customer service!Ordered through Deliveroo but my order never arrived. I spoke to the restaurant twice and both times they said it would be 10 minutes. After an hour I then spoke to a customer service representative for Deliveroo and I screen shot the conversation.My order never arrived and Deliveroo and refusing to give me my money back and keep telling me to speak to the restaurant to resolve the issue.Will never use them again!

Title: Order never arrived
Review: Order never arrived, delivery driver supposedly left it on step but walked around the street and adjacent street and no sign of driver or food. An agent said the driver waited 10 minutes but they clearly didn’t.They tried to ring me but had poor signal, then talked to me on the app but then didn’t reply when I answered their message.The customer service rep tried to just say I wasn’t eligible for any compensation but ended up giving me credit. I wanted a refund as I had already got food elsewhere at this point.Delivery drivers should obviously post a photo of the food and where they have left it. Common sense!

Title: Absolute waste of my time
Review: Absolute waste of my time. My food arrived and it wasn’t correct, I contacted the restaurant and they were willing to do it again but I had to speak to Deliveroo. The customer service is absolutely awful, they were just willing to give me the money back for the item but not willing to re deliver when the restaurant was.  I was told that they were going to escalate the case and should hear back soon, then they tell me that it will take 48hrs.

Title: Classic excuse of "your delivery…
Review: Classic excuse of "your delivery cyclist had a flat tyre" but then when i said so i can order the same again if i want it was suddenly out of stock.. Just give the correct reason for not delivering and don't lie. I'd respect the company more if they were honest.

Title: Meal not delivered
Review: I ordered my meal to be delivered between 13:15 and 13:45.which wS confirmed by email. At 13:30 I was eung and asked by Waleema if I had changed delivery time to 20:22. I sad no and was expecting it at any moment. By 13:45 it hadn't arrived. As restaurant  closed at 14:00 I rang them and they said 4 riders had turned up but were to deliver at 20:22. I told them to get it ready and  left my guests to collect it myself by which time another rider was at the restaurant. Absolutely hopeless. Will never use them again. ZERO STARS Order no #195   09/09/×020

Title: Absolute joke of a company!! 0 STARS
Review: Absolute joke of a company, driver didn't even attempt to deliver my food, didn't knock, didn't call me and just drove off.I attempted to contact the driver via the number for him listed on the app but it was for a landline in Leeds (which is 220miles from my flat according to Google maps) unsurprisingly there was no answer.Their customer service agent tried to offer me a voucher which after some arguing the said they would refund back to the card but offered zero compensation for the 2½ hours of wasted time and the fact I still had to try and get something else to eat at 9:45pm when thanks to covid the vast majority of places were closed.Pathetic customer service and will never use them again.

Title: Worst service
Review: Worst service! Worst application! worst experience! Unprofessional people! Delivery guys disrespectful and rude! Customer service - no help. Orders always lost!

Title: If I could give it 0 stars I would…
Review: If I could give it 0 stars I would After the first two orders I should’ve known better as they took over an hour to arrive and when they did they were freezing cold so I thought I’d give them another try like an idiot yet again the order took over an hour to arrive there was items missing out of my order and my order was opened when the driver handed it to me I asked him why it was open and he just ran off I spoke via email to deliverCold customer services they think that they are doing me a favour by refund me my money that they are doing me a favour jokers and ten gesture of good will is to refund me the money that I paid and they think that’s an apology don’t waste your money on their overpriced food and the customer service is abysmal hopefully the company will go under.

Title: Beware of EATIN promo code
Review: There was a £5 discount voucher supposedly offered for orders over £20 . I put in code and got a tick and an acknowledgment that I have £5 reduction .On checking the receipt it was not there !! Called them and they said to try it again next time ?!So beware of promo codes , they seem to be a bait and are not genuine .

Title: Started out very good
Review: Started out very good. Initially, I gave them 5/5, but sadly I no longer gave any trust in this delivery partnership. Today, I wanted ice cream. I didn't want a major supermarket order, so Deliveroo + the Co-op looked ideal.I ordered two types of excellent quality ice cream; two ready made sandwiches; and two sorts of spirits (White Rum & Vodka) for stocking the drinks cabinet. "DELIVEROO" is what these people claim to do. Sure, they took my money, but they DID NOT DELIVER the Ice Cream which was my reason for going onto Deliveroo to order ICE CREAM.What these swine did was to charge me for additional items -- some sandwiches and some alcohol -- then failed to deliver my main item of Ice Cream, leaving me out of pocket.End.

Title: ref getting a refund
Review: ref getting a refund, deliveroo took money out of my daughter's account. with out ordering, Now  day 6 still no refund no call from them as they said will call back .as it takes 48hrs to get a refund.  now time to call the police ref this

Title: Order was incomplete and I got no…
Review: Order was incomplete and I got no response, I contacted Deliveroo 4 times now. We’ll switch to food panda

Title: Great selection and always deliver on time
Review: I've used Deliveroo regularly (1-2 times a month) for about 9 months now. The selection of restaurants in my local area is good on the app (which is half the battle!) and I've never had any issues with my orders. The ability to add tips to the delivery riders is a great add on feature as well. Maybe I'm lucky based on where I live (London), but ultimately all you want when you order food to be delivered is for it to be on time, not thrown about during the journey, and delivered to your house (rather than down the road).

Title: Taco Bell Holborn on Deliveroo
Review: Taco Bell Holborn ( LONDON) page on DELIVEROO says " FOR TODAY ONLY, FREE DELIVERY WHEN YOU ORDER FROM THIS RESTAURANT" but Deliveroo still charges delivery fee. I have reported this on the 1st of September and Deliveroo managers said that promotion has ended and we will remove this note from TACO BELL HOLBORN page. 9 days passed and FREE DELIVERY note still on Taco Bell page, Deliveroo still charging people for delivery.

Title: I'm not happy at all they have taken…
Review: I'm not happy at all they have taken 11.49 out of my bank account without me even signing up to deliveroo plus. I want the money putting back in my account and they are not getting back to me about it either. If not I will be going through the bank about it.

Title: Absolutely awful
Review: Absolutely awful. We ordered a £50 family meal from Five Guys Solihull on Monday 7th September 2020. The driver arrived, dumped a single milkshake on our doorstep and immediately drive off before getting a chance to speak. I had to drive to the restaurant myself who told me this is standard from Deliveroo and who gave me the full meal for free as well as an additional fresh shake. The manager said he would call Deliveroo to obtain a refund for me which he clearly did but Deliveroo has given me only £1.50 back and isn’t responding to e-mails. Clearly they have no intention of refunding the money and acting in a highly Fraudulent manner - they provided no service whatsoever and the restaurant decided to not charge me but Deliveroo is trying to get away with only giving back a tiny fraction of the service charge. Absolutely disgusting business practice. I’m tired of this - I’ve used them maybe 5 times before and there is always, always an issue but this one - no refund and deliberate communications silence shows what this company really is.

Title: Pathetic
Review: Pathetic. No customer service when you complain. No responsibility for the pathetic delivery service. There is an alternative. Don’t waste your time with this crowd

Title: I ordered KFC with Deliveroo at 6:46pm and waited 3 hours for it not to arrive.
Review: I ordered KFC with Deliveroo at 6:46pm. I was constanly checking the tracking, and Deliveroo claimed that it would be here at 7:45pm at the latest. After an hour or so, I asked for a refund but they told me that I would still receive my food, At 10pm (still no food, obvs) I called KFC myself (at closing time) and they said my food had been made at 6:53pm but no driver was ever assigned - yet seeing a BUNCH of Deliveroo drivers roaming around my area. After waiting THREE hours, KFC closed and I wasn't able to get my food. It is fair to say that I am very dissapointed with this experience, and have decided to order my food with Just Eat on this occasion. On the plus side Mary Grace and Anne Clariza, customer service representatives at Deliveroo provided quick service on the live chat. However, one of the representatives told me that a driver would be dispatched within 5-8 minutes but that didn't happen at all.

Title: Do not use !!!
Review: If I could give a minus i would ordered food from kfc originally said 35 mins hour and half later still no food had 3 riders who all cancelled spoke to chat they said  driver was at restaurant deliver  will be there in 10 mins 20 mins later still nothing contacted chat again said driver was too far away and unassigned from the delivery  they then said another had been assigned and was on way to restaurant to collect and would be 10-20 mins waiting again 20 mins later  went onto chat again rider had unassigned from delivery so no food again said no one in area and don't know what time it will be there so cancelled  2 and a half hours wait and still nothing all they do is tell you what you want to hear then as soon as chat disconnects driver magically unassigned from job will not use again

Title: Inconvenience food
Review: Ordered food, Food never arrivedLooked at customer support, said calls not avaiable, livechat also not availableLooked up their number, called their number; was asked for my mobile number email and address before they would help me.Told my delivery was delivered to the wrong address and they would refund meI've now had to order to collect from the resturant

Title: I had ordered food on last Thursday
Review: I had ordered food on last Thursday. I was been charged S$18 for small order and S$8 for Delivery. I was not aware of been charged S$18 for small order. Actually, it was not small order. The order was S$42. I have wrote email to Deliveroo but still no response. I need the clarification, why it was charged S$18 ?

Title: Money Stealers
Review: So I ordered my friend and her father some shopping including tobacco, deliveroo delivered it to them but the lady who delivered it doesn't like me.... So she decided to be difficult and ask for my ID (I was not there as it was a delivery for them)... She would not accept theirs even though the delivery was for them and took everything away refusing to hand over the shopping. Spoke to a manager and he said its their policy to ask for ID (nowhere does it say the person who made the order needs to be present for their ID). They stole £110 from me and left me in bits...manager hung up after I asked his name. Foul.....

Title: I ordered from deliveroo and did not…
Review: I ordered from deliveroo and did not receive my order, so I rang restaurant.They said the lady had delivered it but dont know what happened to order as she could not speak english. Wrote an email to deliveroo but still no reply and that was 4 days ago. No meal, theft of my money and still waiting for some sort of reply to know where I stand. Will have to call ACCC if not fixed by end of week.

Title: This is ridiculous
Review: This is ridiculous, My order never arrived but was marked as delivered. Then customer service told me that the rider came, and couldn't find my place but was waiting for 10min in my door without ring me, how is that even possible and how in hell they expected me to know he was on the street if the order was marked as delivered and I couldn't check where the rider was. Now 1 to 2 days for the refund and not dinner. Hope the rider get sack, well all the riders doing this get sack as I can see on the reviews for the last 3 hours is the 3 time happening tonight.

Title: Overcharged again
Review: Overcharged again. The website congratulated me on free delivery, then added a delivery charge. When I rang was told the free delivery only applied to plus members. The prices are higher than at the stores so this company is making money in every way they can. I wont be using them again.

Title: I have been a customer for years
Review: I have been a customer for years, but tonight ordered a delivery that now says delivered but was NOT delivered to me. And they now say they will not give me a refund as it was delivered. Appalling, will not use again.

Title: Absolutely the most dishonest service
Review: Absolutely the most dishonest customer services staff. I just don't understand w by they need to lie. The delivery person who I could see from my flat window parked exactly outside the flat. Looked around a little and at their noone for a while and then marked the food as ordered.  No call, nothing. Fine, whatever. But then I contacted customer services. LIED and siad they had tried to call. Definitely not, I had my phone in my hand. Then said the food had been spilled and therefore wasn't delivered. Then why was it marked as delivered and how did the delivery person know that without ever looking at the food? Lie after lie and why!? Don't use. They're ripping us off and ripping off local restaurants that have to use them

Title: Terrible and rude customer service
Review: Terrible and rude customer service, The order was delivered incomplete and when called to speak to restaurant about it, I was told "it happens, we can't do anything about it, request your partial refund for undelivered items." And hung up. Worth knowing when people place large orders with you, it is usually for something that they have planned. If the order arrives incomplete, the evening will be effected... No one cares about the cost of the chips to be refunded, your just not a reliable service to use. Why bother?

Title: Didn't tell me they couldn't deliver until they had all my details
Review: Downloaded the App; it took my address and then a load of my details. Afterwards couldn't figure out why the app was blank.Turns out they don't deliver to where I live but they waited till after I input my details before telling me.

Title: Last time I will use Deliveroo
Review: Last time I will use Deliveroo.  Each time the driver gets lost even though my address is clearly stated.  This time my food arrived stone cold. It was chucked straight in the bin as I have no oven at the moment and ordered because of this.  Food was inedible as it was so cold.

Title: The worst service I’ve ever encountered
Review: If I could rate their service and customer service less than one star I would. I ordered some food for lunch using their website and all my address details were correct. I received a notification to say it had been delivered and seeing as I definitely didn’t have my food I was very confused. When I looked at the pin drop it was no where near my house. I rang them to explain and to get it resolved and was met with such terrible customer service. I was told this was a common error with their website and that the pin drop often goes wrong. I was then told I should of used their app instead.. basically implying this was my fault. No where does it state this and if this is a well known error with their website they should not accept orders through it. I then asked them to call the driver as he has my address and still wanted my food but was told the driver had actually dropped the food at the pin drop- so on some random street over 7 minutes away. I mean.. common sense would surely tell you here that the pin did not match the address?! What sort of idiot would do that? I was then offered credit but no real apology. I demanded a Full refund instead. Shocking service and even worse customer care. They just didn’t give a damn basically.

Title: Deliveroos Customer Service is spot on
Review: Unlike UberEats, you can actually contact customer service by chat or the phone. Order from co-op not delivered but said it was. Within 20mins new delivery sent out and apology from Deliveroo. I assumed UberEats was the same - not the case. No chat or phone function when an order has been marked "done". They delivered someone else's order, and when I ran out to get the drivers attention, he just biked off. No refund from UberEats either, and you have to "raise a ticket" and there's no confirmation or correspondence to confirm whether they got it and it takes 24hrs to even begin investigating. People complaining on Deliveroo sound like trolls compared to the experience I had with UberEats with a real simple mistake that could have easily been rectified, and would have with Deliveroo. Deliveroo just needs more choice of restaurants. After UberEats stole my £31.77 I am definitely only using Deliveroo in the future and will have to do without my Barburitto until they make the switch to Deliveroo.

Title: Awful service.
Review: Awful service.Realised after putting in an order that the wrong address was submitted. I immediately tried to change this and it was not an option.. I was not allowed to contact anyone until the driver was already at the wrong address. Zero logic and 40 euro worth of food was gone to waste and no refund was given even though I tried to get in touch several times.

Title: Awful service.
Review: Awful service.Advertised free delivery but nothing says you have to order over £20. Ordered food and was charged a delivery fee. Order directly from the restaurants it's a lot cheaper trust me. Deleted my deliveroo account.

Title: I had an item missing from Maison…
Review: I had an item missing from Maison Puget, plus a note from Maison Puget explaining they were sorry about it but had ran out of that £13 Puff. I had no idea how to claim for the refun but was not really worried about it. After a few days I discovered I could easily claim back for a missing item via 'my orders' and did it. I then received an email from Deliveroo saying I would get no refund because there was a deadline of 48hours. What sort of businesses does that? They don't provide the service, knows about it, and still charge you for it. I cannot believe it. I have since sent other emails to Deliveroo but everytime receive the exact same response without an explanation to my questions.Deliveroo just love making money on the back of their clients.

Title: I ordered groceries from local co-op to…
Review: I ordered groceries from local co-op to be delivered by deliveroo.order never arrived although on website said it had and driver said he had phoned me yet no call logged on myPhone. Then had to be on phone to them for 35 mins. Just for them to tell me I had to wait 48 hrs for refund despite having told them I am an oap and self isolating and couldn’t afford to order again.shame on you deliveroo. You left me angry exasperated and in tears. Well done. Your customer service stinks

Title: We have used Sorrento many times and…
Review: We have used Sorrento many times and the food is always amazing. This time around we ordered through deliveroo...what a mistake. Food turned up an 1 hour 10 minutes late, barely warm and no apology from the driver. Appreciate its not the drivers fault personally but what a joke of a company. Feel sorry for the restaurants that use this shocking company. My advice...go direct to the restaurant and skip this cowboy outfit

Title: I've had 3 years of delivery from…
Review: I've had 3 years of delivery from Deliveroo. I'd say roughly 1 in 50 orders cause some frustration or disappointment - that's good rate in my book.

Title: Such bad service
Review: Such bad service - I was duped with a small order fee of £17 for an order of less than £10 and Deliveroo just palmed me off - so yeah, Uber Eats has a new customer!

Title: Have an item missing from your order…
Review: Have an item missing from your order then its your loss. Phones the restaurant (subway) and they advised me to apply for a refund on the deliveroo app. I have since applied for the refund and 2 weeks later received nothing. Refuse to use the site till the problem is resolved.UPDATE: THEY WILL NOT REFUND ME FOR THE MISSING ITEM SO ITS MY LOSS.THIEVES

Title: Good support
Review: Good support, but their delivery time estimate isn't always accurate.

Title: Worst customer service I've ever experienced
Review: I could write a series of novels about how ridiculously bad Deliveroo's "customer service" is. Truth is, it's pretty much non existent. I've never known a food business to show such blatant disregard towards the satisfaction of their customers. I find them to be patronising and condescending in their responses and will never use their platform ever again. Having had problems with deliveries two days running totaling around £35 I was told they had "good news" for me. £7 credit to use. Wow! I can pay £3.99 for a delivery that will undoubtedly arrive at least half an hour after the advertised time and still have £3 left to spend? Thanks but no thanks. Hopefully they'll disappear soon enough and take their horrible service with them.

Title: If I could give 0 stars I would
Review: If I could give 0 stars I would, Avoid at all costs. I tried to cancel my delivery (before it arrived) as I was charged extras that I wasn’t told about. I was also told I would have free delivery and they charged the delivery at the end after I pressed confirm so didn’t see it until I had paid. I have called them 6 times and 4 of them I was cut off and 1 told me I HAVE to take the delivery. I spoke with a manager and was told they won’t do anything about it. I am now calling trading standards as this is not on and I have seen loads of reviews saying the same thing. This needs to stop.

Title: Terrible organisation
Review: Terrible organisation. Your riders have been assaulted, beaten, regularly have their deliveries and bikes stolen. One of your personnel dies representing you and you've issued no statement or any acknowledgement of your responsibility towards your riders. Boycotting.

Title: Robbery!! Check their prices vs restaurants - hidden charges everywhere
Review: About half way through lockdown Deliveroo decided to add between £1-£3 (per dish) on every item from our local restaurants. Can you imagine every item being just a little bit more expensive than it was, and how many customers who haven't noticed this. Nothing is communicated about these hidden charges, but guaranteed if you check the restaurant menu on their own websites versus Deliveroo's menu you will see how much they've stolen from you in these last few months. Outrageous scam. Be aware

Title: If I could give 0 I would
Review: If I could give 0 I would. No customer service provided no number to call so had to go through chat. They kept effectively 'hanging up' and didn't respond to our request. They delivered one meal (we ordered two) because it was not available instead of replacing it with something else. We had to order from somewhere else and provided no response when we attempted to contact them.

Title: No delivery
Review: No delivery. AGAIN.Late night is a huge issue. why take money when they are not delivering?  Customers trust you to deliver..Ive had many issues. but today Im out for good.

Title: Didn't even receive my food
Review: Honestly absolute shambles I ordered my food it said it was delivered which wasn't the case then the customer service people said the driver left it near a garden but I dont have a garden. The they said the gps signal used was wrong so the driver just dumped it in an unknown location.

Title: I have had mostly a good experience…
Review: I have had mostly a good experience with Deliveroo.

Title: Scam with hidden charges
Review: Scam with hidden charges. They make you pay then once you have placed the order turns out its full of hidden charges. Avoid!!

Title: Rude driver made my little brother cry
Review: Practically got shouted at by a driver claiming we were outside the zone as if it was our fault but restaurant accepted the order knowing where we were. The whole thing greatly upset my little brother. Appalling

Title: It doesn't even deserve a 1 star
Review: Poor customer service. Seriously, my order gets canceled after waiting for 30 mins for the food. I am contacting the customer service about what happened, someone answers me just saying sorry and she just left the chat. I tried to contact again because i need more clarification, and she just left the chat again. F you for screwing my night seriously

Title: Yep their reviews say it all
Review: Yep their reviews say it all. Terrible customer service, ended up having to pay 8 quid just for some rice and Yoghurt after a bad experience with an Indian place. Had a way better experience with Uber eats. will be sticking with them from now.

Title: Won’t refund me for a order I never recieved.
Review: I recently placed an order through deliveroo. I was waiting an hour for my food so messaged deliveroos help to find out where it was. I was advised they had called the restaurant and it would be 10 minutes. An hour later my order said it had been delivered - which it hadn’t, so I called the restaurant and they advised they had cancelled the order almost 2 hours ago due to being too busy. I then asked deliveroo for a refund and they advised I had to wait 72 hours for this. Well it has now been 5 days and I have not received a refund. Wouldn’t bother using this service, other delivery services such as uber eats have far better customer service and I will never use deliveroo again.

Title: No refund for undelivered food!
Review: Customer services very poor. I've paid for food to be delivered, it hasn't been delivered the rider has told them it has. Imagine marking something as delivered when it hasn't been? what kind of company works lik e this? They refused to refund me for the missing goods even though they weren't received absolutely atrocious. So so Poor such as shame as regularly used before on business account with no issues.

Title: Order on its way then never delivered six times
Review: The last 6 times I have ordered through deliveroo since March I've been told the order was delivered but it wasn't it just went missing! On the map it shows the rider is nearby and then just disappears and says delivered. And this has been at 2 different addresses. Each time I've rung customer services who have been nice and have immediately reordered for free. But it's not good enough, you wait an hour for the delivery and then another hour once you've spoken to customer services. It's my own fault that I keep using them. Not any more. Someone is dining out well!

Title: We ordered food thru one their…
Review: We ordered food thru one their restaurants and upon waiting over an hour for the food it never came! We contacted their customer support and were told to wait and keep on phoning (which there line had been busy the whole time), we were then told they had delivered to us, which was a lie. We were then told we'd get no refund, even after providing clear evidence of us attempting to contact them, and them making no contact back, apparently, we're still the one not telling the truth?? Don't use this place, so many better alternatives.

Title: After visiting this page I was like fml…
Review: After visiting this page I was like fml why didn't I look first cause the reputation is a joke. Rude customer service, wrong orders, wrong charges joke of a service

Title: First time ordered as working nights
Review: First time ordered as working nights . I’m in a hotel .over the road from the restaurant. Wish I went there myself now . The driver was 45 min late and shouting at me and he actually made me cry. I can’t find you I can’t find you he kept saying . The food was Ruined and I feel like I just got scammed out of my money. First time and last time . I can’t believe the customer service the driver was absolutely out of order talking to me like a piece of crap.

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service! Rang up to give some feedback and all they wanted to do was chuck money at the problem. You guys are fast becoming a hated company for deliveries and that’s due to you being greedy, but just as fast as you grow is as fast as you will fall most likely faster. Remember that. It’s the people who made you and it’s the people who will break you. Just Eat and Uber are both cheaper than you and your trying to charge restaurants up to 35% just to deliver food. You guys really need to re-evaluate what moves your making because we’re watching mate. Also I will not be using that 7 pounds off voucher that was reluctantly sent as a way to keep people from eating out and supporting their local restaurants which means cutting you out. I’ll take my hard earned money and get a Uber eats or Just Eat either way I won’t be spending it with you guys!

Title: undercooked rip off
Review: Sent me undercooked chicken and seafood. Refused refund. I can’t believe companies can still get away with this

Title: Very dissatisfied
Review: Thought I would try them as I was a bit annoyed with uber eats service charge plus delivery fee.... Wow how rubbish wish I hadn't bothered almost an hour late then the guy came to the door nothing was in a bag no gloves no mask didn't read delivery instructions so came to the wrong door rang the bell and woke the kids up so not impressed back to uber eats it is

Title: Terrible
Review: Terrible, always late, ALWAYS! I’m currently waiting on a delivery form a restaurant I’ve just found out online is closed permanently...

Title: Every time that I place an order from…
Review: Every time that I place an order from them, there is an issue with items missing etc.

Title: Keep complaining and we will block your account
Review: Wife and I like KFC so we order from time to time via delivery services and in this case Deliveroo. 9 out of 10 the order is wrong, so I complain. They have started to say I am not entitled to any refund or compensation which I challenge, because they have entered into a contract to delivery the correct food. I was basically told, keep complaining and we will block you account.So, the customer is always wrong, there is no come back for wrong orders. Don't waste your time with this company.

Title: DO NOT ORDER ITS A F***ing SCAM
Review: DO NOT ORDER ITS A F****** scam. Stole my money. Delivery driver blocked me, I phoned him to ask where my order was as it said it had been delivered. I contacted deliveroo and they said he phoned me 4 times?? Never got a phone call. Got scammed for £15. Won’t talk to me on live chat or phone.

Title: Generally I’ve had good experiences…
Review: Generally I’ve had good experiences ordering from Deliveroo and far less problems than with their competitors. We do tend to order not at the peak times though as we eat very early.

Title: They never deliver the correct order
Review: They never deliver the correct order. If they're sent with two bags you'll only get one.Pretty sure at this point their poor, underpaid drivers are stealing meals and saying they didn't get it from the restaurant

Title: Don't waste your time
Review: Did my first order.Downloaded app.Asked to turn on location what i did.Also entered my address manually.Driver came to another place.I am very dissapointed with my first and last experience with Deliveroo.Called to customer service.Waiting for refund.

Title: terrible
Review: Places orders that restaurants apparently don't receive, then marks them as delivered. If you do get your order there's usually items missing. Customer service is crap. Hate deliveroo, it needs shutting down

Title: A restaurant stool my money as they…
Review: A restaurant stool my money as they accept my order, then they called me saying that they don’t deliver in my area and that they will send me the money back, they didn’t . I tried two times to contact the delivero costumer service and they said that if the restaurant doesn’t pick up to the phone, they cannot help me That’s unbelievable this is the worst app I’ve ever use

Title: I had no problem with the driver very…
Review: I had no problem with the driver very much a gentleman however deliveroo is not the best they do orders different from what you would order through other companies it is nothing but terrible I urge people to use another way

Title: EXCELLENCE
Review: I seriously can’t fault the service! It practically kept me alive in London when I was recovering from the virus and I’ve only ever experienced really nice pleasant young men doing their job really well.

Title: Terrible
Review: Terrible service, terrible app and don’t expect to get any help from customer service if something goes wrong with your order. Don’t waste your time when there are so many other food delivery options

Title: Brewdog smelled of farts
Review: I placed on order with deliveroo from brewdog union square in Aberdeen. The order took 2 and half hours to be delivered, the entire order was wrong and the wrong food that was delivered was colder than a dead body. The guy on the phone at the restaurant was an inconsiderate weirdo and offered no help. I honestly wouldnt feed it to a starving dog. The place should be shut down I would've been less offended if they just farted in a Tupperware box and sent me that instead.

Title: Won’t order from deliveroo again
Review: Ordered a meal from our favourite restaurant for our wedding anniversary. After a 2 hour wait the status was changed to delivered, yet it had never shown up. A further hour was spent trying to get through to someone on their customer helpline, however, they weren’t able to advise what had happened to our food. We only received a refund for the meal which we never received, nothing to compensate the evening being totally ruined, or the subsequent pizza we had to order late as we were so hungry. Never using deliveroo again, have had too many bad experiences to date.

Title: Went through all the bulls..t to order…
Review: Went through all the bulls..t to order a burger king only to get told I need to verify though online banking which I don't have f..k deliveroo and f..k burgerking.

Title: BAD BAD BAD BAD
Review: I’m furious ! Spent a fortune on a chineese , only for the delivery driver to come on a bike parked right at the end of my road!!! I was stood at the door and trying to signal him hoping to get some acknowledgement . but the b*strd drove Right passed me with my food and waved at me!!!! I then asked for a refund but they declined as he was “waiting 7 minutes” YES HE WAS WAITING, IN THE F**CKIMG FIELD AT THE END OF MY ROAD!!

Title: Honestly the worst customer service
Review: Honestly the worst customer service. I explained my problem and they basically ignored it and just told me to place an order. I would recommend using a different delivery service. Ubereats is much better when it comes to solving problems so I think I'll just use them in the future.

Title: Total fraud
Review: Total fraud. So expensive. We were already paying at least £2 for every order and a while ago they added £0.5 "service fee". What are you going to make us pay for next? Electricity bill? Maintenance of bikes? Weather tax? So miserable and pathetic. I am enjoying watching you going down.Also if you have £10 delivery fee at some restaurants gives us the fckn option to select according to delivery fee you fckn cxnts. Are you so brainless or do you have a real deal moron manager? Why do you have be so miserable?

Title: Disgraceful service who doesn't care about the customer
Review: Ordered some food for the office where it never arrived. Used the ONLINE help chat and they were very unhelpful to the point they said we will still charge you and you'll have to order again.Times like this, where they care so little about it's customer service and all about the money. I'll vote with my wallet and use a competitor who actually cares about quality customer service.

Title: Waste of time!
Review: Waste of time!I've only ordered from Deliveroo twice and both times there's been problems with deliveries not arriving at all or being incomplete when they do arrive.I just ordered groceries and there was an item missing. I'm pleased that they refunded the missing item immediately but now I either have to pay another £2 for the item to be re-delivered or go to the shop an buy it - what a waste of time!

Title: Your lucky to get 1*....Driver took 30…
Review: Your lucky to get 1*....Driver took 30 minutes to do a 10 minute max ride and turned up missing part of my order! The rest was stone cold! Asked for a refund to use someone else to me told I can only have credit?? I don't want to use you I just want my money back!!!!

Title: I placed an order with Nandos through…
Review: I placed an order with Nandos through deliveroo on 27th of August around 7.30pm. Nandis 71-73 Lothians Road, Edinburgh. After 40 minutes of waiting it says order has been delivered. I am not sure where the hell has it delivered. Contacted the customer service. They said they will investigate   this next day as the Nadose has closed. They tried to contact the delivery driver 4 times but he did mot picked up the call. I am with my little kids. Kids are starving. All the shops are closed right now. No other access to get some food for these kids. Such a horrible experience from deliveroo.

Title: This company has turned into a total…
Review: This company has turned into a total fraud. Two orders were registered delivered over the space of two hours but neither arrived. One was left sitting at the restaurant and one dissapeared into the ether. Deliveroo have no idea what their drivers are up to. Do not bother using this company to deliver your food or you will be hungry all evening and very cross like we are now!

Title: Really horrible logistics and customer…
Review: Really horrible logistics and customer service - 30min longer than initial ETA, wrong driver took the order, customer service agent ended the chat without resolving the issue. Uber Eats a much better option

Title: Deliveroo refused to give refund for…
Review: Deliveroo refused to give refund for the food that NEVER arrived! Live chat only offered apologies saying they will feedback to the restaurant. That was it!They refused to refund the money!£38 out of my account and NO FOOD!

Title: I recieved a discount voucher
Review: I recieved a discount voucher, offering money off on orders over £15. Placed order, followed instructions as described, but no field presented to add your discount code and no way to cancel order. Spent 15min on a webchat a support staff member called Dawn Pauline, got all the chat records stored and she turned around and rudely ended the chat, citing that the offer was from the 31st of Aug! it was apparent that she couldn't read the screenshot she requested.This is terrible and highly disappointing, the first and last time I'll use their services obviously. I'll advise people to stay away.

Title: Food vanished, no where to be seen
Review: At least 5 times my order has gone missing, when asked they have no idea where it has gone or why it has gone missing. I would of gave them one star however, the live chat system they have is helpful and they have always fixed the problem.

Title: If I could rate them a Zero I would
Review: If I could rate them a Zero I would. Placed an order, driver drove round the corner and pressed delivered, did not even drive onto our street. £25 pounds worth of food was not delivered. Contacted customer services via their online chat. Utterly unhelpful. Provided no explanation as to why the driver pressed delivered. Would only offer credit. Appalling customer service. Don't bother. Save your money. They need to learn how to provide good customer service like their competitors - Uber Eats. If you are reading this review and contemplating ordering with them - DON'T.

Title: Needed a new bike
Review: Ordered a fat scran cause a had heavy munchies like, am gawnty gee u some background info, ma bike got bumped last week n am no happy. Never the less the delivery driver came on a bicycle n it looked nothing like mine, if a cant have a bike NOONE CAN so a cracked um n bumped his bike turns out it was mike tyson so a done 10 round wae um, a got the better off um but he threw a lucky hook n CAUGHT ME CLEAN FAM, would recommend very quick delivery

Title: Unfortunately I can’t give a zero but I…
Review: Unfortunately I can’t give a zero but I feel Deliveroo won’t care anyway I  never give a bad review but customer care is awful, I put in a large order  it arrived late after driver got lost and rang to ask where I lived, which is fair enough, so it arrived late cold and with half the order missing,  we finally got the food they hadn’t delivered I texted “customer service” or haven’t got a clue to even understand how to read an email they refunded £12.99, no sorry it was late, no sorry it was cold, no sorry your family didn’t to eat together pathetic company won’t be using again

Title: There scamming people
Review: There scamming people, Everytime I ordered they charge £1 bank authorisation which is not told to you at the point of paying for order. This comes out of your account and sits in pending then disappear from pending funds do not go back into your account I have £12 worth of these and they never returned monies back to my account. If you don’t take a screenshot bank will claim they know nothing about this.

Title: Order food from kfc through deliveroo
Review: Order food from kfc through deliveroo. Time of arrival kept going up and up. Went from being prepared to on it's way then cancelled after 2 hours of waiting. Spoke to some clown called Melvin ha ha melvin. Tried telling me the restaurant was closed and they tried phoning me to tell me... then MELVIN closed the chat on me once I pointed out it wasnt closed when I ordered it. Great customer service that. Disgusting service. First and last time. I'll stick to just eat

Title: Please.do not use these people
Review: Please.do not use these people, we ordered kfc and they really took our money. And we waited ... and waited.No one turned up despite them saying on there track order that delivery had taken place. You have been warned.If I could give a minus 0 I would AVOID

Title: First and last experience of Deliveroo
Review: First and last experience of Deliveroo! Food was cold, parts of order missing, driver couldn't care less and customer service was useless!

Title: Awful awful
Review: Awful awful - now 50% of my orders between myself and my wife are wrong. We are repeatedly having to go through the live chat process. And worst thing is they credit the account rather than refund the money. Additionally if living in a high rise block of flats, we are having to pay the same delivery fee yet have (because of Covid) to come down to pick up the meal. I won’t ordering from Deliveroo again - Just Eat here I come!

Title: Very poor C/S team experience
Review: I ordered a Burger King Summer meal via Deliveroo, and kept an eye on the delivery times & rider on their App.To my surprise, my order was delivered to one of my neighbours as the rider had mixed up door numbers, & delivered without actually confirming who he was delivering to.Thankfully, I'd heard the scooter & saw him driving off so I figured he'd delivered to the wrong address & then had to go out to knock on the neighbours door for my food...As you can imagine, during the current pandemic I was a little weary of how many hands had touched my package, but thankfully all looked well.I immediately got in touch with their C/S team via their chat service, (as the telephone service was unavailable) and had chats with Terence & Catherine...My exchanges came to no avail as they said they'd escalate but came back saying there was nothing they could do in respect of compensation as the meal was delivered, and they both ended the chat abruptly.I understand mistakes do happen, but I was expecting a bit more empathy from the C/S team, especially with the current pandemic and issues around the spread of Covid-19.

Title: very useless customer service
Review: very useless customer service! very bad manners , very bad drivers took the driver 2h to have my food i have to drive to him to get my food, never use delivero again bad company bad food delivery , drivers don't speak English and cannot read the instruction when u chat with them

Title: I am actually putting 1 star because I…
Review: I am actually putting 1 star because I can’t put 0 star! Terrible Service. Not helpful at all. Once an order is placed you can’t change anything. Made a mistake a placed an order with my previous address started calling immediately for more than 40mins and all they all could say was sorry they can’t do anything about it.Please look into it and update your app so update can be made.

Title: Ordered £40 TGI dinner.......it arrived…
Review: Ordered £40 TGI dinner.......it arrived late, chips cold, ribs burnt!!  Generally an awful first time experience. WON'T BE USING AGAIN!!

Title: Hurrendous service and disgusting…
Review: Hurrendous service and disgusting attitude! To start with the wrong order was delivered to me when I showed the delivery rider it wasn’t my name on the bag he was practically in tears calling deliveroo up to take responsibility for the order being wrong The poor lad seemed fearful to admit he made a mistake , when the order was delivered for a second time the same rider was sent again even though myself and the rider had said its wasn’t appropriate for him to be sent as he was on a push bike during storm like weather and the distance he had to travelTo get the order to my house, when the order arrived for the second time there was no ticket on the bag this timeAnd there was 4 items missing, when I called deliveroo for the second time they were extremely rude no apology have the attitude that they didn’t care and i had to repeat myself several time’s requesting a refund before I was granted one , I will never use this service again and neither will family and friends who are equally disgusted by the service provided especially for such and expensive delivery fee #sticktojusteat!

Title: Utterly Pathetic
Review: Utterly Pathetic, giving them a one star is more than I want to. They got my order wrong, ok not happy but it happens. Then they say we can redeliver. No refund/ money back for it being late or getting the wrong order. So I choose to get my money bak rather than wait another hour for a new order. Absoultely pathetic customer service. Never ordering from them again

Title: Delivery 1 hour late
Review: Ordered one pizza - arrived an hour after the ETA (a total of 2 hours!). Tried to cancel the delivery but not allowed... instead of a refund, they’re offering me 50% off the next time I order with the same restaurant. No chance!!!

Title: took an order when they knew the place…
Review: took an order when they knew the place was closed, made me wait for a refund, when i asked for a complainty to be raised the ignored me, terible service, will never use again!

Title: UPDATE 28th August 2020, Have had my account closed when I asked for the chat logs, Have been treated DISGUSTINGLY Left my kids hungry, honestly, I'm skint and to you ruined my order, NOT Covid Friend
Review: AFTER COMPLAINING TO DELIVEROO AND ASKING FOR MY CHAT LOG I HAVE MYSTERIOUSLY HAD MY ACCOUT CLOSED So I decided to use deliveroos new service delivering Co-ops items, I ordered 2 x super saver deals as I have kids and they needed a quick fix, I don't drive due to medical reasons so this is perfect  (1 X Deal is 2 pizzas and 1 Ben & Jerry's Ice cream Tub it is £5), Now this is where the confusion begins, I ordered:2 x super saver deals which is is 4 pizzas and to Ben and Jerry ice cream tubsI paid £10, it clearly says on the order and the receipt and online and on the Drivers phone,2 X Supersaver DealsThe driver arrives with only 1 Supersaver Deal, I said it wasn't correct, I expected 2 Deals, he said "yes 2 pizzas" I said "No, I ordered 2 deals, that's 4 pizzas and 2 Ice creams) he just looked at me and said "call Deliveroo", I said "Can't you just go back and pick up the rest of the order, I've got kids", "No, they just give me the order", no interest in helping at all, So, I have to "Chat" with you, I explained my situation, he said "sorry, we'll refund you plus give you a £5 Deliveroo voucher" great!, But I've got order again and I'll be charged £2.50 delivery AGAIN, I don't have the money in my account, I had EXACTLY the correct money in my account for my first order, I don't have the money to order again plus I have to make a £10 or over order and I'll end up with 3 Saver Deals, I don't want that, If I even paid again my total delivery (Including the first order YOU got wrong) would be £5.00, so 50% of my order???????.I tried to explain that it was extremely unfair and I shouldn't have to to reorder, pay double, plus pay 50% of the order in delivery fee,I received a condesending reply "Yes, Robert" that was it,So thanks ever so much for ruining my evening with my 4 children, I get to see them once in the week and I now have half the food for my kids (who eat like locusts that are REALLY hungry) with no resolution agreed tonight so you could redeem yourselves, BUT no, saving £2.50 delivery is more important to deliveroo that assisting me to feed my kids when it was your fault as I ordered through you,Absolutely disgusting Customer Service, If I can avoid using you or dissuade people from using you I'll relay my experienceOh and Co-Vid compliant I don't know, I REALLY think ALL your drivers should wear masks when interacting with the public, It says your drivers are contactless "So keep a look out", well my driver couldn't be bothered to get out of his car, no mask, I had.to approach him and he only then put one foot in the floor and just
