gave me my food, I told him about the mistake and he just swung closer to me so he could look at my phone, your driver did the same last week, Maybe you're not directing drivers wear masks because you don't have to but how about making customers feel safe and implement the change,28th August 2020Went to my deliveroo account expecting to find £10 in their £5 from the order they messed up and I've only received half,  £5 for the refund owed because only half the order arrived  but no Voucher for £5 (that I was promised from the last chat advisor)Unbelievably again the person I spoke to you on chat was so unhelpful his name was DJ and I also spoke to Robin on deliveroo chat who's also equally as unhelpful, he even put the chat down on me and just cut the conversation short, I was disgusted,I asked them for the copy of my web chat which they won't give me, but they say they can't see anything about a gesture of Goodwill, so I asked them to send me the chat log which they refuse to do and this time DJ put the chat down on me, so equally as rude, unhelpful and disgusting customer services and a definate need to be trained. I'd also like the managers to check the chat logs of these customer service advisors as they said they were going to speak to managers but they obviously never did, this is also listed on the chat log, luckily this time I have screenshot both the conversations I had which I can't post here but I will do on Facebook and Twitter,Your advisors need to understand some people are in difficult financial situations and have children to feed I tried to take the offer from co-op for the super saver deal all I've ended up with was half the order and 4 well 5 including me hungry people and extremely rude customer service advisors, Please just remember if you speak to customer services on the chat service with deliveroo heaven help you if you deal with Robin or DJ, I'd rather go back in the queue because these two won't help, it was obvious they were just playing immature games and not trying to help,£5 is a lot of money to us, £5 to deliveroo due to their mistakes not my mistakes is nothing I am owed this money because I was promised it and the chat logs will prove it

Title: deliveroo is absolutely awful to use
Review: deliveroo is absolutely awful to use. They need to take a page out of uber eats book! Your app needs to be more like uber eats because yours is currently shocking.

Title: Ordered KFC
Review: Ordered KFC, one 10 piece bargain bucket incl 4 chips as shown on KFC and deliveroo app, but when ordering it list extras as options, so i ordered beans but system wouldnt continue until you order more extras, but unbeknown to me the chips have to be one of the additonal extras. When we got our meals there were only chicken and beans No chips, i had to clntact KFC and go pick up chips. Deliveroo app is pants I wont be ordering through them again. The KFC bargain buckets come with chips, just for Deliveroo information

Title: Useless, overpriced and need to restructure their business
Review: I have been using deliveroo for a while now and never really had any major issues, however recently orders I have been making haven’t exactly been delivered according to description, it’s hard to accuse deliveroo for these issues, however hosting these restaurants within their app and charging the companies and the customer soo much extra fees, service charge etc. I personally think they should start taking responsibility and vetting these restaurants and wether they deem worthy to be on their app and trade business, such as amazon takes responsibility to whoever sells through their company. Whoever reads this, I would like to give you an alternative option app, Foodhub, it’s quite new, however there don’t charge customers a service charge and a lot of the delivery’s are free and not to mention a lot of restaurants offer a good discount, not sure what they will be like as a company in the future! But, I can’t complain.

Title: Very poor food delivery service
Review: Very poor food delivery service! My first order was that I had waited for more than 1 hour and became very hungry, then found that the food delivered to wrong location and I cannot get the food finally! My second order was that I used much time to fill in all the information and especially the delivery address in the app, finally, the app showed that “the delivery cannot done to this address! That is, I waste much of my time and also my money （It said it can only refund in 5 to 10 days, but I don’t know refunded or not now!）but could get nothing! Very bad experience for the delivery service in Liverpool uk!

Title: I am currently waiting part of my order…
Review: I am currently waiting part of my order (the rest arrived nearly an hour ago) and the update keeps updating with a later time.  I suspect this will go on until the restaurant closes this evening.  As soon as my order turned up, I mentioned that it was incomplete and the delivery guy got on the phone to Deliveroo.  He did not speak very good English so asked me to speak instead.  Deliveroo said that they would complete the order within 10 minutes.  I should have laughed.  I have since called the restaurant because the driver seemed to be saying that the missing part was not with the order.  The restaurant do not give a rat's a*** either.

Title: Atrocious Customer Service
Review: As the other reviews for this company demonstrate there is absolutely poor customer service. My order took over three hours to arrive, initially claimed to have been delivered with no sight of the driver. When I tried to cancel I was not allowed to as the driver was already at the restaurant.  In compensation for a 45 pound order I was given 20 pounds.  The customer service manager went from a 5 pound to 10 to 20 pounds compensation before saying she could do no further.  Stay away from this company at all costs. They don't deserve your money

Title: Poor customer service
Review: After receiving my order 10minutes late, it was the wrong order. I was then told I would receive my order in 35-55minutes. They refused to give any sort of refund or credit to rectify this (not even the delivery charge!)

Title: Deliveroo is convenient but that’s …
Review: Deliveroo is convenient but that’s  about it. They charge top delivery And many times deliver with missing items despite asking to check before it’s left. They don’t offer to bring the item and while a refund is great when prt of your meal is missing is doesn’t help refunding which also automatically goes as credit so you have to buy again!! Fed up and deleted my account. Just eat is much more reliable.

Title: If I could review this less than a zero…
Review: If I could review this less than a zero I would! Waiting 2 hours for delivery and we have still not received our order! I would never use them again!

Title: The worst
Review: The worst,  had to use them and waited over 2 hours for food to be delivered.

Title: Very handy during lockdown and social…
Review: Very handy during lockdown and social distancing but sometimes the delivery is much longer than they say!

Title: I ordered nandos today and the driver…
Review: I ordered nandos today and the driver only delivered my sides and not my mains so i call customers service to tell them my situation and their response is to tell me i have to wait 24-48 hours to see if i can get a refund and that their is nothing they can do worst expirence ever just to deliver a bag back.

Title: Deliveroo is the worst
Review: Deliveroo is the worst. 1. Allow cyclists to take food miles away from restaurant. It's 100000% gunna be cold every time this is stupid! 2. Always late3. Always cold4. Always hugely overpriced5. The customer support in complaining about an order is like we take no responsibility in the food or the delivery thanks. What the hell do you do then!? It's like a new wave of scamming consumers through these middle men apps who take all your money and card details, allow you to order, advertise themselves as a food delivery service. Yet they don't take any responsibility of the delivery service and always blame it on the restaurants who also can't do anything. The customer support here is diabolical

Title: Awful charged me THREE times for a…
Review: Awful charged me THREE times for a order and still have not received a refund I’m not made of money 👍🏻

Title: Not surprised the score is so low
Review: Not surprised the score is so low on here. I have experienced deliveroo as a trader and as a customer. They should be ashamed for the sh*tshow they call a business. Absolutely useless customer service, system goes down for hours occasionally and traders and riders are left in the dark waiting to make money through these clowns. they give all the emphasis on lining their pockets and no attention to traders or riders.

Title: It is really hard to describe how bad…
Review: It is really hard to describe how bad their service is.I stopped using them a while ago, and I was stupid enough to try again. It was a big mistake:- the promised delivery time was 20-30 minutes, it arrived in 110 minutes- the driver has been changed in mid delivery (?)- the food arrived cold, and it was not recognizable. I mean it. The chips looked only half of what I’ve ordered, but becasue everything was mixed into one big mess, I couldn’t tell. I had to throw it out, it was not edible.I asked my money back, and I learnt my lesson. I will never use deliveroo again.

Title: Just don't bother
Review: Just don't bother. Food hours late so given a voucher. Redeemed voucher only to have driver not deliver full order.  Not worth it, don't use.

Title: Awful
Review: Don’t use deliveroo, live chat employees are rude and ended a chat abruptly without sorting a problem..

Title: If I could give a minus rating here I…
Review: If I could give a minus rating here I would!In April I had trialled the Deliveroo plus, however, due to being furloughed during lockdown I had cancelled this subscription and my last order with them was on the 29th April. However, I recently started to get emails about not paying my Deliveroo plus and to set this up. Knowing I had cancelled and not used them for ANY takeaways for now 4 months, I had assumed this was a scam. However, after the 3rd email, I checked my account I use for these types of things, seeing they had tried to take the money out 6+ times over 2 months. This now also explains why the last 2 months my credit rating had been dropping!I went onto the app to check what was happening and there it says, I do not have a Delieroo Plus account. So, I sent a nice email explaining this and the trouble they have caused me. Asking for the 2 unauthorised payments to be reimbursed. Only to be sent the most unempathetic email back just stating I'm outside of the 14 days cooling-off period and they would not do this. No acknowledgement, apology or even to try and give an also unacceptable voucher code. NOTHING. just dismissed, as if I have the funds to go around paying £11.49 per month for things and NEVER using it! I'm so shocked and appalled - I and my household will no longer use this service and I suggest you do the same.

Title: App doesn’t work
Review: App doesn’t work, crashes every time I’m trying to order. In the and I have to order directly from restaurant 👎🏻

Title: Poor service for local food
Review: Me and my GF ordered 2 wraps from nandos on deliverroo, we waited an hour and a half with no update of the delivery. We messaged someone on the app who advised the driver had been waiting at the restaurant for 56 mins and offered us £5 credit as a result and advised to wait a further 10-15 mins which we did. Still no update and no food so we messaged again and was told the driver couldn't find our address, which is only a 6 min drive from the restaurant and that the best thing deliverroo could do was cancel the order. With no apology or compensation the lady left the chat and cancelled the order. This for me is totally unacceptable service and has put me off ever using deliveroo again, there similar apps which from my experience are much better with service.

Title: Will never order with deliveroo again.
Review: Will never order with deliveroo again.Got a meal delivered on Sunday from Wagamama and it was pretty cold, so reported it straight away on the app. Got an automatic notification on the app saying I'd hear back within 48 hours, which I never did, so I contacted them on twitter to be told that as it was over 48 hours since delivery I was not entitled to any money back. I explained that I had reported it on the app straight away, but they wouldn't accept that. It's really unfair and I will not use them again as it seems a bit of a dodgy company to have this policy.

Title: Good stuff
Review: I've only used them for supermarket deliveries. Nearly always within the estimated time and the deliverers are usually friendly. Just have to avoid smaller shops because they hike their prices up massively.

Title: I wouldn’t even give one star if I…
Review: I wouldn’t even give one star if I could give less. Always late. And the poor businesses that have to recook meals at their expense due to lack of Deliveroo customer service is disgusting. Sham of a business. They have a cheek to ask for a tip too?? Lol

Title: Order late of over one hour and half and I can't cancel it anymore
Review: Order food that was supposed to arrive in 25 minutes, well one hour and half later and 2 chats with support later, I still don't have my food and I can't get a refund, this should not be allowed.Never going to use this again

Title: Not good customer service
Review: Not good customer service. I placed an order and received an email letting us know that our order was deliver. But we didn’t receive anything. I called to speak to the manager. Who was rude, not helpful at all and he also hanged up the phone on me. We provided our delivery number and all the information required but still he wasn’t able to help. This is unacceptable because I paid for food to be delivered and nothing was delivered.

Title: Criminal behaviour
Review: In short, I initially used the wrong address as I just moved house. When the driver phoned, we realised our mistake. The address was only 3 minutes walk away, so I would have gone and got it.When my wife spoke to the driver, he was extremely rude and tried to bribe her for money to deliver the food (which included a bottle of wine). When my wife refused, the rider put the phone down. We went to the address and nothing was there. I phoned Pizza Express and it was not returned.Essentially, this is theft.Deliveroo refused to refund the order and essentially washed their hands of the situation because of the wrong address. They do not care that their riders will steal delivers and that their policy encourages it.Subsequent emails to ‘Serious Complaints’ have been met with the usual insipid customer service speak.Very, very poor on a number of levels.

Title: Received cold frozen uncooked food last…
Review: Received cold frozen uncooked food last month, nearly got food poisoning even with having to cook it. They said they refunded me but haven’t. My bank has checked multiple times and no refund has been processed. Deliveroo are an awful service

Title: Bad service ....
Review: Bad service ..... Food never come despite the app said the driver is 1 minute away. I had to wait 15 minutes to speak with an agent on the live chat ...... Crap service .. deleted this poor quality app

Title: Never gonna order again
Review: Never gonna order again. Disgusting

Title: I ordered a delivery via Deliveroo and…
Review: I ordered a delivery via Deliveroo and it eventually arrived 2 hours after being ordered. It was cold on arrival. Deliveroo said they can not refund because they were not the delivery service! But they took the money for the shoddy service! Would avoid this company at all costs. I would have put no stars but can’t!

Title: Theft
Review: My order never arrived.  The driver came to the top of my road and remained there for some time. I telephoned but there was no answer. Immediately after, the status changed to 'delivered' and suddenly the number would no longer ring. I tried to report the issue on their website immediately but the option to call was conveniently greyed out and the option to have a live chat was also very conveniently unavailable. Why?The driver's number remained switched off. I called the restaurant who confirmed he had picked up the order. So what did he do with it?This has never happened before and the door numbers on all the houses on my road are very clearly marked and visible. I asked Deliveroo to investigate, report back and then cancel my account as the above was the last straw (most orders arrive cold and after long delays). They did not respond.An appalling, thieving company.

Title: NEVER WILL I ORDER AGAIN USING THEIR…
Review: NEVER WILL I ORDER AGAIN USING THEIR COMPANY. THE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS VERY RUDE THEY DID NOT DELIVER MY ORDER AND REFUSED TO ISSUE A REFUND. THEY REFUSED TO GIVE DETAILS OF THEIR COMPLAINTS DEPARTMENT. WORST COMPANY EVER, I WILL CONTINUE USING UBER OR JUST EAT

Title: Poor experience more than once
Review: Poor experience more than once.  Either orders don't show up or more often, missing items.  Funny how it's always for the orders where I think I am doing the right thing by tipping.  A few of the drivers have had too many free lunches and undeserved tips for taking 5 minutes to have a leisurely drive right by my home and have the cheek to mark my order as 'delivered'!

Title: Enough is enough!
Review: I keep making excuses for why I still use Deliveroo but they continue to provide consistently bad service. 8/10 time my order turns up cold, incorrect or missing items. There should be so many levels of quality check, i.e. the order being verified by the restaurant, being checked correctly when being packaged and then being checked again by the driver but none of this seems to be happening. The Plus service is scam, as you always have to order over £10 which if is above the restaurant minimum means you are paying the same as if you were to pay the delivery charge. Customer service is shocking - yesterday I was missing half my order and have only received a template email from them stating I cannot receive credit, no other explanation. Deleting my account as I have had enough of this shambles of a service.

Title: I don't like your service
Review: I don't like your service, you show in your app that it is free delivery offer but charge for it after order. When I complained for this issue you answer that you have to investigate and takes time bla bla,,..

Title: It dosnt even deserve 1 star if I'm…
Review: It dosnt even deserve 1 star if I'm honest I ordered from my local coop the driver delivered the wrong items I spoke to the coop they said my order was still in store and the They told deliveroo this which they dismissed and refused to refund me and even went to block my account for fraudulent activity how they worked this out I will never know the coop staff were brilliant and very apologetic I must say deliveroo kept my money refused to refund and the coop still had my shopping I will never use or recommend deliveroo again absolute disgusting customer service they really do not care at all but are happy to keep your money frauduantly tho

Title: Placed an order via deliveroo
Review: Placed an order via deliveroo, shown as picked up at 17:43 and delivered to my home address, 2.2 miles away at 18:21. Food on arrival was freezing cold. Would not recommend or use this company again.

Title: Awful service
Review: The quality of the service has decreased massively compare to what it used to be.It happened regularly on my last orders with them that items were missing, I sent a complaint straight away afterwards and been told someone would get back to me within 2 days. That never happened except for the last time. When I asked for a refund I have been told that because the order was more than 2 days before submitting my claim they couldn't refund me. I have basically been charged for items I never received and Deliveroo refused to give me my money back which I find outrageous.Besides those problems drivers sent to my place lied on several occasions stating my doorbell doesn't work and forced me to get outside, I proved them the bell was working absolutely fine and the drivers still managed to lie saying "it didn't work when I tried".Will never use them again and hope they will go out of business as it is all they deserve.

Title: Recently I was nearly run over on a…
Review: Recently I was nearly run over on a zebra crossing by a Deliveroo driver who deliberately overtook a lorry on the wrong of the road and then went through the zebra crossing. My complaint was not taken seriously and despite four attempts Deliveroo 'customer service' are refusing to escalate the complaint or put me in touch with anyone from head office.

Title: Outstanding Customer Service
Review: I tried over a year Uber Eats and Deliveroo! Uber Eats was a horror story experience, I ordered once vegetarian noodles only to receive it with chicken skin and pieces two hours later. I contacted customer service and they said they couldn’t do anything and couldn’t refund me.As for deliveroo, they once gave me a voucher because the food was a bit late. Outstanding customer service! I will never ever use Uber ever again! I recommend Deliveroo

Title: Deliveroo Colchester - you wont get your correct order
Review: Deliveroo only recently started delivering to my area.  Out of the four times I have ordered items, I’ve only received that correct order and no hassle on one occasion.  On the first occasion I ordered a pizza plus a few other items. The pizza was just cheese and tomato however a pepperoni one was delivered.  I didn’t realise this until after the driver had left.  As I do not eat pepperoni, I went to bed without any dinner (toddler was already asleep and I’m a single parent). I reported through the Deliveroo site that I had received the incorrect item and the response was that they would let their partner know.  Nothing about receiving a refund. Tonight, I order a bundle deal and the driver turned up and took my photo (without permission) as I opened the door.  He then asked for me to confirm my name and address and date of birth.  I asked why and he said that I had ordered alcohol.  I had ordered Diet Coke not alcohol so showed him the order that was in the bag.  At this point I realised that the ice cream part of the bundle was missing but the driver refused to do anything unless I gave him my DOB.  I refused again and he said he couldn’t leave without my DOB.  In the end I told him I wouldn’t except the order with an item missing and was not giving him my DOB.  I then closed my front door on him.  I have now cancelled my Deliveroo account.  I will NEVER use them again!

Title: Appalling customer service and missing over half the order and what was delivered was cold
Review: My wife ordered 2 lots of the £25 summer meal deal so £50, only 1 lot was delivered with a receipt for £25 the 1 meal deal that was delivered was stone cold and missing items, she went on live chat with someone who said they could offer deliveroo credit of £37 but not send out the full order again so I phoned and spoke to a chap call Ron who wasn't very helpful either but in the end after about 40 minute's chatting and phoning I was told they would offer a full refund but I have to wait 3 to 5 days, not great service at all, use at your own risk

Title: Ordered our tea via Deliveroo last night...
Review: Ordered our tea via Deliveroo last night on my pc and all looked good. Food was on schedule with no hold ups or problems. I left the deliveroo screen on my pc so i could monitor where our food was. When it said the driver was here but the driver couldn't find us (first time ever as I live on a road about 100m long) I went to find him. There was no one in sight so I looked on the deliveroo app on my phone, and although the driver was apparently "waiting to find me" , the map showed he had already left and he was miles away! Thankfully i got a screenshot of this info/map from my phone (thanks Android!) And got a refund but inevitably, no tea that night from them! Won't ever be using then again!

Title: Deliveroo Ruined my 78th Birthday Party AND CONNED ME OUT OF MONEY
Review: We ordered meals from Pizza Express for our guests BUT two meals were not delivered - so we had to order again with nearly an hour's delay - because the order was not of sufficient value we were charged a delivery cost, plus the cost of the missing items from the first order!! We were offered some of the cost as a credit against future orders - but I have asked Deliveroo to put it, plus delivery charge, plus service cost back on my Credit Card,since I am unlikely to use Deliveroo again. I am awaiting their response. I leave readers to judge for themselvesI have jut received the following from Deliveroo Custome support:"We're sorry to hear there was a problem with your order. Unfortunately, we're only able to offer compensation or a refund if you tell us about the problem within 48 hours.We hope we can make it up to you next time."This blatantly not true. A visit to the small claims court is probably in order.I SHALL NOT USE DELIVEROOO AGAIN - THE WHOLE COMPANY STINKS

Title: Deliveroo in Dublin
Review: Deliveroo in Dublin. We ordered and never arrived, on the map we could see the driver but it never arrive to our address and we were at the door waiting. The order was marked as delivered which never happen.

Title: Order NEVER arrived and Deliveroo customer service were appalling!
Review: We ordered off of delivery and delivery was meant to arrive between a certain time. We then get a notification stating that our order was ‘delivered in 35minutes’. So confused, as we didn’t hear the buzzer or doorbell, we check outside our front door...nothing. We then head downstairs to the main entrance...nothing. We immediately notify deliveroo via their Live Chat platform and the agent proceeds to asking for my name, number, address and order number. Only to now say, ‘Sorry I am unable to resolve with issue. We are reviewing your refund with customer accounts and will get back to you in 24- 48hours’!I couldn’t understand why they didn’t see the Huge imminent inconvenience or why they were even reviewing it. They refused to confirm where my order was or what the status says on their system. Instead they just kept saying ‘this chat will end now unless their is anything else I can help with’. They haven’t even helped with the current issue! Unbelievable! Will definitely not be using deliveroo to order food again.

Title: Your Riders and customer service are awful
Review: Rider attempted to extort more money from me for my food after I attempted to correct an address error. Customer service did nothing. I'm mad that the rider was a greedy sod, not about the food.

Title: Deliveroo a fantastic service
Review: Fantastic idea. Great service. I find placing an order with Deliveroo, whether using the app or their website, to be very user friendly. Depending whether you want a meal or shopping there are lots of choices from restaurants and takeaway establishments to shops and a larger supermarket. Pricing is fair and affordable. The delivery drivers who I have dealt with have all been polite and professional. Delivery usually takes between 30 minutes to an hour. But in My experience the order is usually between 25 to 45 minutes. My latest order took 30 minutes and was placed on my door step with the delivery driver waiting at the gate to make sure I received the order. I started using Deliveroo in April. Due to underlying health conditions I'm in the highly vulnerable group for COVID-19 and have been in shielding since the end of March. Deliveroo has been a God send when I can't get an online delivery for shopping. Or I want some treats or a takeaway but don't want to trouble my friend, who has been helping get my shopping if I can't get a delivery slot, when I only need some essentials and/or treats. Even though lockdown has been eased and shielding paused I will continue to use Deliveroo because it's easy, affordable, quick and safe. I would definitely recommend them.

Title: Ordered food was over 30 minutes late and freezing cold…
Review: Ordered food was over 30 minutes late and was stone cold on arrival,was put straight in bin.On complaining recieved an e mail saying they would try harder next time lol there wont be a next time terrible service

Title: NO MASK AND DRIVER ARROGANT!!!
Review: A DELIVEROO driver just delivered to someone on the second floor.I was in a lift which stopped on that floor and at first he hesitated to get in because the lift is small and I was already in there but as I was closing the doors he decided that actually he was coming in.I said NO because it was a small lift 1.5M x 1M and he STARTED ARGUING WITH ME IN THE SMALL LIFT! HE DIDN'T EVEN HAVE A MASK ON - but I did!HE PROCEEDED to come in anyway even though he could've gotten the other lift right next it - there are 2 lifts next to each other.He came in so I took the stairs and all he did was LAUGH AT ME and shout at me to "GO! GO THEN! GO!" as he was laughing as if COVID-19 IS A JOKE!I'm trying to stay safe in an ENCLOSED SPACE and that man MOCKED ME AND IGNORED ME!I'm describing him because I actually want this d!ck dealt with.He was quite dark skinned,looked Ethiopian or Somalianhad an accentand was between 5'6-5'8. I saw him get on a Motorcycle and it was around 12:30pm on Saturday 15th August in SW8.Pushing your way into a lift WITH NO MASK ON after a member of the public has asked you not to is as immature and as bad as deliberately coughing on someone who's trying to stay safe! You don't know what other peoples health issues may be. AND AGAIN HE HAD NO MASK ON! DELIVEROO SORT YOUR IGNORANT STAFF OUT!!!

Title: By far the worst delivery service in the UK
Review: By far the worst service in the UK! Ive witnessed Rude delivery personnel and total lack of empathy from customer service! Food was delivered cold and spilling out of containers. this leads me to believe they also lack sanitation precautions the reason it took me so long to even use any delivery service... and then they denied me the credit i had as it was out of date during the lockdown restrictions.  I used them just a few times and each time there was a negative experience. If you can use another service they do not deserve the business.

Title: They charged me twice for a delivery…
Review: They charged me twice for a delivery and denied knowledge that this happened. The fraud squad are now looking into it Please be aware of this company. They do not answer the phone frequently

Title: Gave them another go but......
Review: Gave them another go when m and s came on board. Watched the delivery driver fiddling with my bag of shopping whilst sitting outside my house in his car. Found cream cakes and chilled carton of juice missing from my shopping. Hope he enjoyed his lunch along with the tip I gave him! Disgraceful. Cancelled my trial week of free delivery and will close my account once my refund has been processed for missing items.

Title: I just placed an order and within…
Review: I just placed an order and within seconds realised I left something out of the order. They would not amend my order or add , but they wanted to add another £5 delivery what a scam Won’t be using them again!

Title: Waste service ever!!
Review: Waste service ever! Keep thinking they will get better, but always let you down!

Title: Forgot the entire food order.
Review: The driver, initially, couldn't find my location despite my extra instructions and it being attached to a local landmark in the city, the football club. When he did eventually find my location he had forgotten to collect the main part of my order being the actual food! I was left with two drinks and an empty stomach. I have deactivated my account and won't be using deliveroo again. Frustrating experience and no lunch for me today.

Title: Very poor service!!!!👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
Review: Very poor service!!!!! My order didn't get delivered ( I’ve received a notification saying it has been delivered when it wasn't) and when I contacted the customer service chat, they didn't even bother asking if I would like a refund. Straight away I was told that my Deliveroo account will be credited with what I’ve paid for my order; I don't want your credit, I want my money back!...because the Deliveroo app will be deleted...waste of memory on my phone! Then, when I asked for the chat conversation to be emailed to me, I was told it wasn't possible due to privacy protection...huh(?)😳...privacy from who?🤔...is my conversation with an agent. Not to mention that the agent was not aware to inform me that once I ended the chat , I will automatically be asked if I want a transcript to be emailed. He advised me to take screenshots😂. And when I asked him to confirm again the amount refunded and the method of refund, he said he will email me😐..and left the chat in a hurry before I could type my next phrase 😒. Oh, and the agent’s name was Jayson Von (there’s your privacy!).👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

Title: Absolute rubbish
Review: Absolute rubbish. The drivers they use don't speak a word of English so they don't read your notes, they don't answer the phone so you can't contact them and they can't read a map so many times they drive around for ages and then give up when they can't find the address.

Title: Very unhelpful with fraudulent transaction
Review: Got a charge on my credit card from Deliveroo for something I did not order. Initially happy to tell me I must have authorised someone called Olivia to use my card - I don’t know anyone by that name. Then after a long wait claimed they’d refunded me the money / blocked my card when in fact my credit card company had done so days before. Refused to tell me what was ordered and even what town delivery was to, hiding behind GDPR (even though they were initially happy to give me a name).

Title: Every delivery is fast and delivered by…
Review: Every delivery is fast and delivered by very friendly and courteous people. Well done Gary, the delivery guy from the Socketts Heath Co op.

Title: Wrong food. Wrong refund. Shambles.
Review: - Delivered the wrong food. - Was impossible to contact them / get replacement.- When I reported problem in app, they refunded me less than the amount I'd paid.- Reported the problem again; no response. Really disappointed with the service I received, will be using Uber Eats or other competitors from now on.

Title: Not all my food arrived
Review: Not all my food arrived, no one responded to my complaint. Deliveroo sucks

Title: You can't complain about the crap food you get
Review: You can't change your order because they put it through customer service who keep you hanging on for several minutes and then say sorry it's too late, and you can't review the restaurants or complain about the food.

Title: Explaing the same complaint to 3 customer service reps gave me RSI
Review: I’ve been a very loyal customer of deliveroo for a number years until now  They used to be good. But recently Every single time I order from deliveroo the order is much longer than the expected delivery time, there have been multiple items missing in previous orders. More recently I ordered from A resteaurant on deliveroo that uses its own drivers....what a mistake that was, deliveroo customer service did not care when 45mins after the expected divery time my order had not arrived, I was passed between 3 different customer service agents on the same live chat session...each as useless as the last one, after explaining my complaint for the third time I decided I was getting nowhere...I've since deleted the app and will not be using them again.

Title: Never got food and refused us a refund
Review: Placed an order through deliveroo, the estimated time for delivery was 4.25am. Tried calling the restaurant a few times and they cut us off. They tried to deliver the food at 5.30am, we had fallen asleep by that point. Tried to getting a refund through deliveroo but they said that the takeaway had delivered the food (which is a lie), so they couldn’t refund us. TIM the deliveroo agent refused to refund me even though I explained we never received the food and it was attempted to be delivered an hour later than agreeed. TIM also cut me off even though I said my complaint was unresolved, literally terrible customer service. I have money down the drain!!! I’ll never use deliveroo again. TIM at deliveroo seriously needs a new job!!

Title: Avoid Sun Bo Chinese Restaurant AND Deliveroo
Review: I ordered from Sun Bo Restaurant in Lewisham - after 90 mins there was no food.  Deliveroo don’t care.  They ‘cancelled’ my order and there is no way to leave a review on the restaurant in question, which according to TrustPilot is how Deliveroo operate.  Avoid if hungry.

Title: Ordered a KFC approx £40.00 from…
Review: Ordered a KFC approx £40.00 from Glasgow KFC to be delivered by deliveroo.We watched on the App time ticking down to delivery. KFC called us twice asking if food had been delivered and the last time they admitted the delivery driver had taken the food!!! and there was nothing they could do.My partner got a phone number for deliveroo and they were great by expediting another food delivery within 40mins.Surely , this is theft by the Delivery driver!!

Title: DO NOT USE DELIVEROO
Review: DO NOT USE DELIVEROO. BE AWARE - some restaurants on Deliveroo do not use Deliveroo riders, but their own delivery drivers. As a result, the restaurant take your money and do not deliver your order and Deliveroo will not get involved and allow the restaurant to take the money. If you are based in London they are awful for this and you’ll end up losing money and receive no compensation or refund or even a satisfactory response from Deliveroo. Use UberEats who are much more efficient and will properly handle any issues.

Title: Deliveroo Plus subscription
Review: I’ve only ever ordered from Deliveroo twice in my life. I’ve been signed up unknowingly to the ‘Delivery Plus’ service for 15 months without being informed. Not once did I get a statement or a receipt from Deliveroo to tell me I was on such an expensive subscription service. I did not sign up to this. When I emailed customer services I got a copy and paste reply back to say that they can see I’ve not used the service that month and can refund one month. If they look further, they can see I have not used it for 15 months and I would be grateful for a full refund.

Title: Gone below downhill
Review: I’ve been a loyal customer of deliveroo for 6 years now and I have been ordering on a daily basis, sometimes even twice. They used to be good. But recently Every single time I order from deliveroo there is always items missing, and those are items that show up on my receipt. Which means that it not items that the restaurant ran out of. More than once I received a wrong order, basically someone else’s food and it was clear from the order number on the bag that didn’t match my order number. Their drivers are clueless, they don’t even bother reading what they are picking up.Ok they will always refund you sure, but that doesn’t replace the meal that you are not going to eat because of their incompetence.All I can say is that what used to be a great company is now a waste of time and money.I have recently started using Uber eats and ordered the same orders that deliveroo got wrong more than once, and Uber eats gets it right every time.Dear deliveroo, if you even bother reading/replying, it’s time you did something to implement a verification of the orders at pick up.

Title: Absolutely disgusting service they…
Review: Absolutely disgusting service they market deliver they never bring the food crazy f driver They said apologise I have to wait 48 hours to get my money forget food tonight Forget Deliveroo to.

Title: Creams Eastleigh, If I could leave a zero I would
Review: If I could leave a zero I would, we ordered ice cream this evening from Creams at 7pm, we know that it always takes a while so knew we'd left enough time as it shuts at 9pm. Have been on chat for the past hour, only to be told that the driver hadn't turned up and they had issues getting there (other places still showing as 20 mins for delivery). They cancelled our order without our authorisation and logged off with no response and we now can't order from anywhere else as it's too late. Absolutely awful service!!!

Title: My partner and I bought food
Review: My partner and I bought food, it never arrived and the driver marked it as delivered, at this point it had been a good hour and a half. The very unhelpful agent Gian processed a new delivery without confirmation and tried to pass it off as ‘making it up to us’. After the inconvenience we should have at least gotten gotten credit not an offer of food we’ve already paid for.

Title: Missing Item in Order.
Review: So let me tell you about my recent experience with Deliveroo. About 4 days my account was hacked and somebody spent £220 on chinese using my card details. I actually thought atleast somebody was fed from my expense, I received a full refund from my bank account so was happy! I placed my next order tonight for 3 items, 2 for me and 1 for my girlfriend. When receiving our order and looking through the bag, my girlfriend noticed her item was missing! We called the restaurant directly to ask about this, and they confirmed the 3 items were definitely given to the Deliveroo delivery driver. They even sent CCTV footage of this to us! They also mentioned they had received feedback previously stating they had complaints about this same delivery driver. I then called Deliveroo who to be fair to them instantly gave me credit for the item we had not received. As soon as I went to replace the order using the credit I noticed that we had to repay the delivery charge. When I spoke to Deliveroo again they said there was nothing they could do. So there’s me sitting eating my food, whilst my girlfriend sits with no food (she can’t eat mine as she’s vegan) and as all guys know an unhappy girlfriend is an unhappy boyfriend! So rather than paying for delivery again she has had to make her own meal tonight. These things happy but customer experience comes first and I feel more could have been done to rectify this issue!

Title: I would literally rather go pick food up for you then you use this service
Review: The indicator for your order is just fabricated. They say the restaurant has accepted it then you get a call hours later saying the restaurant is closed. They say the drivers on there way then just push it back 10 mins at a time. Contacting support you get 'sorry for that well feed it back' then they disconnect. They purposefully make the customer service difficult so you give up on it. It would have been quicker to crawl to the restaurant using my tongue.

Title: Didn’t even receive the delivery.
Review: Didn’t even receive the delivery.Ordered for £26. The delivery guy even didn’t contact me. And the customer service is not helpful at all. Don’t trust to Deliveroo. Will never use it again !

Title: KFC in haywards heath
Review: order KFC in haywards heath, waiting for 45mnts then driver just return our order, never knock door or ring my phone as they do normally incase lost address. now they just want to reorder it and takes for another 45mnts... there delivery people are worst if they cant find house number just go back and return your order, and refund you. you must used the refund money or lose after a month.. money making company.....

Title: I got the wrong orders delivered twice!!
Review: I ordered a Thai meal from a restaurant in Nottinghill on Friday evening the 7th of August.I had already ordered the same dishes in the earlier part of the week from the same restaurant.On Friday evening, I reordered the same dishes again, and a receipt with my name was attached to a meal, I had not ordered. I wanted the restaurant to call the driver to return and take the meal that was not mine away and return with my correct order.The assistant said there was nothing she could do, but advised us to call deliveroo and get my funds credited back to my bank card so that we could order the meals again, that took 20 mins to sort out over deliveroo "chat."We ordered again, from the same restaurant, because I liked the food they serve there—especially the vegetation meals.The delivery driver, delivered my second order, I tipped him, tell him to wait while I checked the receipt! Sure enough, it was the wrong order; I said this is not the food I ordered.I felt sorry for the clients waiting for their food to be delivered, that was now in my procession. value £65.00I asked the Deliveroo driver to return with my correct food, and he could take the wrong dinner back to the restaurant, he said he would do that task. However, he did not return.Can you imagine ordering twice from the same restaurant and both times got the wrong order delivered by deliverooDeliveroo you are an awful company and need to up your game!!!I would say, always check your receipt in front of the driver, when deliveroo delivered your food to make sure it's your correct order.

Title: Deliveroo is in receivership
Review: Deliveroo is in receivership. Don't expect to get your order. They take your money and that's it. I ordered from a shop purely because I needed what the shop had, late a night, and the order never came but said delivered. Left my number to call me. So I'm now going to sue the shop and I've put a legal complaint against the company running deliveroo so that the law suit follows the company when they change name. Only way around it. Avoid the company

Title: Timings on deliveroo are lies
Review: Deliveroo does not properly vet it’s restaurants and lets the restaurants such as Superstar Chinese lie about their delivery times where after you order and pay (at which point you cannot cancel), it turns out that it will take 3x as long as to deliver. Deliveroo and the restaurant do not let you cancel even though it’s false information that had you buying from the restaurant! Use the competitor app of Uber eats instead!

Title: CUSTOMER SERVICE
Review: CUSTOMER SERVICEGive a one because that the lowest i can find shocking.I order a KFC the driver rang me to say that he is at he is at the coop , give him direction to find me even offer to meet him at a cornerv closer to my flat, instead he demands that i meet him at the coop and pointb blankly told me that he will return my order. Send an email to their customer service - got automated reply to call number if its urgent done that and was routed through to a number that keeps repeating same options no matter what number you select. So here i am  without my food and no one to contact at Deliveroo. If only i had done my review before using this service. Stay clear people or you will starve.

Title: I've used delivero first time
Review: I've used delivero first time, I ordered two items from KFC i received only one, will never use it again

Title: Would rate it zero if I could
Review: Would rate it zero if I could. My account details are used by an unknown third party (ies), who keep trying to place large orders on Deliveroo website. I called them and wrote to them many times to delete my account. But what I got in return are the automatic emails asking me to reset my password. This is a serious online security issue and they simply don't care about it.

Title: Absolutely waste of time
Review: Absolutely waste of time. Didn't deliver but said had done. Customer service is appalling, can't even get past the options as it wasn't accepting numpad input. Live chat was about as useful as a Teapot made of Ice. Uninstalling the App and recommend anyone else who reads this does the same. Had to drive down to the Restaurant, show them the live-chat and got my food then. God knows what happened to my actual food.  Wish I could give a 0/5

Title: Pathetic
Review: First time we used deliveroo and definitely our last... 1.5h after ordering our food we asked customer service where was our order... apparently it was already delivered... well not to us. Four very unhappy and hungry children and a very angry wife....Never again

Title: Very bad
Review: Received a call saying that the delivery guy was lost looking for my address, the driver didn’t even call me to ask for directions. Just gave up straight away. I did not get refund either :/

Title: Food arrived cold
Review: Food arrived cold, twice I’ve used Deliveroo and fromTwo separate restaurants the food arrives cold or luke warm.

Title: Always get good service from deliveroo
Shocking!
Review: After returning home after a few drinks we chose our Deliveroo meal from our favourite Greek restaurant The Olive Tree in Chester and ordered.Then waited, and waited, nothing came!We had no notification from the Deliveroo that the driver “MARTIN” had picked our order up, which he had, because we later rang the restaurant to confirm it had been picked up.We had no contact to say the order was on its way, or a call from the driver asking for directions if he had needed them.On our Deliveroo App it said order delivered which had not been!Deliveroo after we called said that our money would be refunded in 24 to 72 hours!So the driver MARTIN from Chester couldn’t find us, he gave the reason to Deliveroo as not being able to find our pin on the map! although we have had several from Deliveroo before, whose drivers obviously use the same system.A question to Deliveroo, what would happen to our £45 Anniversary food order, would MARTIN take it home to his family to enjoy for free?By the way MARTIN we had soup for our anniversary meal, I hope you enjoyed ours!

Title: Too big for your Deliveroo’s
Review: Typical Deliveroo ABANDONED ORDER? At close to 22:00 at night just before the pizza restaurant we ordered from closed the driver called to confirm the address of delivery. We expect within 10 minutes the delivery to be made but to no avail. We try to call the driver but wouldn’t connect as he had disappeared. We contact the deliveroo online chat who were very quick to say cancel the order and order again knowing full well the restaurant was now closed. Very poor Deliveroo. Seems no coincidence that on a Friday the phone lines are down, this must be due to the volume of complaints maybe? We now have to fight for a refund and go to bed hungry even with expressing that my partner is heavily pregnant and we have waited for this food. In the current situation that we all face some of us more vulnerable than others we may rely on companies such as these to DELIVER (clue is in the name) if demand outweighs what you can actually service then have the professional decency to effectively manage the capacity of your business and be honest with your customers. It’s not surprising you achieve 1.4 stars on trustpilot and it won’t be long before someone realises they can do this better.

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service. Unable to write reviews on a very bad order. In this pandemic times every penny counts and it seems that some will take advantage and provide substandard food by the help of deliveroo... Deliveroo app will not easily allow you to voice your opinion on their platform (or if they do, they'll make it extremely difficult)... I regret paying monthly fees to this company who really doesn't care much about customer services.

Title: Ordered £35 worth of food which was…
Review: Ordered £35 worth of food which was delivered in appalling state, with not even an apology offered.

Title: They take my money 3 times in the row…
Review: They take my money 3 times in the row and I never received food .. After 1 hour live chat that end the conversation.. I call them and they said the food was delivered as they live with me and see what is happen .. especially after COVID-19 they became thief .. I never had this problem in year and now they behave bad with a good customers.. and plus had some other issue as well when food was totally raw , anyway never mind .. just eat or uber eat more professional and cheap

Title: Horrendous experience
Review: Horrendous experience. I ordered food from a restaurant that was actually closed. The order was taken by Deliveroo and I was charged. No updates. I tried to contact them but could only reach them on Facebook. They said unfortunately the restaurant could mot fulfill my order. Obviously as it was closed. Don’t blame the restaurant that you’re actually charging and take responsibility for your mistakes. Pathetic.

Title: Incredibly lax security from Deliveroo…
Review: Incredibly lax security from Deliveroo meant that scammers got into my account and helped themselves to large amounts of booze. No questions asked by deliveroo as to why I had suddenly moved to London and developed a taste for Hennessy - absolute joke of a service, I hope they go bust.

Title: Missing and wrong delivery
Review: Missing and wrong delivery - no refund or help

Title: What a bunch of cowboys!
Review: I ordered a Nandos yesterday for delivery by Deliveroo. I was informed that the delivery would be between 40 minutes to an hour which was fine by me. Having worked an appetite, I then tracked the driver via the app telling me he was on his way. On the map it showed that he had driven way past my address and then the next message I received was that it had been delivered. I called customer services to enquire and the representative tried to call the driver but was unable to get in touch with him. I am now fighting to get my refund with their customer services as Deliveroo never delivered my delivery as promised.

Title: Deliveroo was very helpful with a disappointing meal I had received
Review: The other day I ordered a Sunday Roast from a little local pub. The first time I ordered from them it was absolutely divine and I was super thrilled to have stumbled upon some nice pub food! Second time it was not good at all, the food was overcooked and items were missing. I paid a good amount for this meal too, so without being to negative or Debbie Downer, I described how I wasn’t pleased with what I had spent money on, and an hour later I came to find out Deliveroo had refunded me for everything. That’s attentive service and genuine care of the quality a customer receives, and has my full respect. This is what it’s all about. Thanks Deliveroo!

Title: Utter disgrace , spent loads of money , now they won't refund missing item
Review: Over the last few years I've spent loads of dough with this lot , now 1 item was missing and they're refusing to refundAvoid like the plague , they're rip off merchants

Title: I wish there was a zero star
Review: I wish there was a zero star. Absolutely shocking service. Took £28.55 from me and will not return. Basically food arrived but had leaked everywhere And part order missing. I complained and they put a credit on my account. Was fine with this only to get an email Later to say account suspended and they will not communicate further on the matter with me. I tried to contact them and they said they cannot speak To me. So basically they stole my money and I ended up with zero food I could eat.

Title: Bad service
Review: Bad service! If something goes wrong with your order they will not refund your money. Will be lucky if you get a voucher. Will be careful next time signing with a delivery company.

Title: No refunds available after waiting over an hour!
Review: I placed an order, given a delivery time of 30 mins later, another 35 mins after that, still no delivery.   Tried to cancel & get a refund due to time constraints - not possible apparently - offered me a £2.50 credit after wasting £15 !!Ridiculously poor customer service!!Update:  arrived 50 minutes after given delivery time - had to bin it !!

Title: Deliveroo Driver Stealing
Review: Left an umbrella outside my door to dry, and it was stolen by the Deliveroo driver. Unfortunately by the time I noticed, it was already too late. While getting food delivered is really convenient, I am only now realising what a massive security risk it is to have all these strangers coming and going around the property!

Title: reorder a previous order on…
Review: Went to reorder a previous order on nandos website via deliveroo. Wanted 10 wings primarily,with corn on cob and 4 thighs and paid for order which was 17.98 total. On the actual delivery order I was getting corn on cob and 4 thighs NO WINGS!!!!!Absolutely disgraceful,take your money and don't give you what ordered. Apparently the nandos had run out of chicken wings. Might as well call it a non chicken restaurant.Why ratings can't include 0.5 or zero stars I'll never know.

Title: Order never arrived and no refund!
Review: Order never arrived and no refund!I have ordered pizzas on Deliveroo from a place called Sicilian Pizza.It has never arrived. After 2 hours of waiting I’ve contacted Deliveroo, who said they’ll get back to me within 72 hours as they couldn’t get hold of the restaurant.The next morning after contacting them again they said they still can’t get hold of the restaurant and I should try myself. After that they asked if there’s anything else they can help me with and ended the chat without waiting for my reply.The day after I contacted them again asking for the details of the restaurant, so that I can see it actually exists.They replied saying they can’t provide this information.That’s when it gets really funny: Deliveroo tells me to contact the restaurant, which never picks up the phone, at the same time ‘there’s nothing they can do’ regarding my order whereabouts and refund, but they also can’t disclose where I have ordered from!!!Never mind the fact that I was charged by the restaurant for the order which never arrived and by Deliveroo for the service who is totally unwilling to do anything to provide any. Finally, they are not able to get hold of the restaurant either. Let’s create a platform where we just charge people for nothing, then put couple of robots who will reply the same thing to every complain: ‘we are sorry for the inconvenience, but on this occasion we can’t help you’.Thats a very sustainable business model!

Title: Awfull!!!!Will not order from here…
Review: Awfull!!!!Will not order from here ever!!Bad customer service ,useless delivery drivers!!AVOID!!UBER and JUST EAT are much better!

Title: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY, THEY STOLE £80 FROM ME
Review: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! THEY STOLE £80 FROM TWO DIFFERENT BANK ACCOUNTS, AND THEY REFUSED TO COOPERATE. THE CUSTOMER SERVICE AGENTS WHERE RUDE AND DISMISSIVE. I HAVE NEVER ENCOUNTERED CUSTOMER SERVICE LIKE THIS IN MY WHOLE LIFE. DESPICABLE! I HAVE GONE OUT OF MY WAY TO TELL ALL RESTAURANTS HOW THEY TREAT THEIR CUSTOMERS. USE UBER EATS OR JUST EAT. #SHUTDOWNDELIVEROO

Title: Customer service is very very poor…
Review: Customer service is very very poor and we have lost a lot of clients due to their lack of support. the Tablet has stopped working and we have been waiting for a replacement and never got one just yet, called more than a week and every day keeps calling and all I get is to email the team and I do that and no responses from their end. call the direct center and they don't even know my account manager, what a company.

Title: Very unreliable
Review: Very unreliable, my orders are always much later than the expected time up to an hour which is annoying  as I can walk 5 minutes to the restaurants. I’ve now deleted the app

Title: I've used Deliveroo 3 times now.....poor! ☹
Review: I've used Deliveroo 3 times now for different restaurants.Food comes warm at best, and all 3 times items have been missing!I will never use them again...... poor, rubbish,  don't use! 😕

Title: Ordered from Fat Boy Chinese
Review: Ordered from Fat Boy Chinese.  We have had foot from there before. Tonight one dish was wrong and one was missing the food that did arrive was disgusting, cold tasteless and soggy. The mandarin beef had one small piece of meat in it. I tried to resolve this through chat where one person signed off before I could reply and the second one said that two dishes would be compensated. Then he went. What about the rest of the so called food that was delivered. I will never use that restaurant again and not too sure about Deliveroo either. Vicki Lawson. London

Title: 5 stars for Trish
Review: I recently experienced an error with the current location option not actually choosing my current location, resulting in my order being delivered elsewhere and I unfortunately noticed too late as the rider was arriving at the incorrect address. Due to company procedure, the rider understandably reserved the right to decline delivering my order to the new address, due to the distance and the lack of pay to reflect the change (although I did offer to tip him in cash for the trouble or pay another delivery fee), however after contacting customer service again to explore any other options available I had the pleasure of speaking to the lovely Trish, who was so very attentive, professional and polite when dealing with my request and she really went the extra mile to help resolve my problem. If you're reading this Deliveroo, give her a payrise from me 😊

Title: Awful
Review: Customer service chat line rep Raphael M was so incredibly rude and degrading. Error was deliveroo's mapping system but I was blamed. After the driver demanded I pay him if I want my food the rep told me to tip him. Then the chat was closed and I was shut off from contacting them again on live chat. Luckily the phone rep was much more helpful and actually bothered to resolve the situation.

Title: Every order I make things are missing
Review: Every order I make things are missing. And sometimes when I order they change the amount of items I have ask for on the bill a few minutes b4 delivery. This gives me no time cancel as this is not what I ask for.

Title: Money taken
Review: Money taken, company cancelled order 30 minutes before it was due, now got to wait upto 5 working days for my money to be refunded, ridiculous, this shouldn't be allowed, if a place is closed then deliveroo should make this absolutely clear to the customers, now I've no money in my bank, thanks ya thrives

Title: Avoid at all costs for groceries
Review: It just goes wrong too many times. Have now given up and deleted the app. If you order groceries, 90% of the time items will be missing - sometimes up to half the order.  Instead of getting back to you and letting you know, giving you the chance to reorder or cancel,  They simply take the full payment anyway and deliver - you are not allowed to cancel your order. This means that if you’ve ordered a lunch and half of it doesn’t appear, you have to go out to the shops anyway! This has happened to me three times in the last fortnight. Customer advisors are robotic and just apologise but say that’s all they can do. Refunds for the items you’ve already paid for but never received take days and days, which seems like a total scam to me. Deliveroo is just about okay for restaurant meals but avoid at all costs for groceries – complete waste of time and money.

Title: BEYOND MADNESS DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE
Review: I can honestly say this is by the worst place to place an order and their customer service does not exist. I do not know where to even begin. I made an order on Friday from Five Guys- 2 burgers,  fries and milkshakes. and what did I get after paying my 30 something pounds, 2 milkshakes... The driver 'called the restaurant and placed them on speaker- driver refused to go back and I called customer services straight away. Was told I could re order or get my money back- I attempted to reorder but the store was closed so requested the money back. The money was not given back. Instead I called several times and complained about this order but the first 2 people I spoke to didn't understand English very well and 3rd lady put the phone down on me when I caught her in a lie. She said she was going to send me an email address after i told her my name- she said she had it (my email address in my first and last name, but my last name is not a simple smith sort) so she hung up. Long story short- they blocked my account even though the credited my account with a 'refund' but will refuse to give me the money and they wont allow me to spend the credit. WHY because I have complained TOO much. This is beyond madness!! BEYOND MADNESS!!

Title: Overpriced and poor service
Review: It's an absolutely terrible service. Also gone up in price. By the time you order your meal for 12euros plus their outrageous delivery charge and then a tip for the poor driver you end up spending over 22 euros at least. Always get my address wrong eventhough I've written clear instructions and never give you a refund eventhough your delivery has not arrived. Language barriers are a huge issue also. Never using them again.

Title: Poor service
Review: I have ordered twice now and on both occasions had my food delivered last and arrived Luke warm.  I live 2 miles from the restaurant but for some reason the delivery drivers go to the furthest  point before delivering to me.  Today's delivery was delivered 30mins after being collected from the restaurant, this is unacceptable

Title: Terrible service....Never get an order right!
Review: Terrible service....every time order via Deliveroo they can never seem to get an order right..... when you then chat with them, they fail to answer simple questions and provide you with the same response. Never again!!How this business is still running is a miracle!!

Title: Everything timely delivered during lockdown
Review: I come to trustpilot to make sure the companies exist so I'm not being scam. I understand some people may have had bad experiences but for us it has worked well all 5 times. (Bristol BS6 area). So I do recomend it.

Title: Order came late and cold and it wasn't…
Review: Order came late and cold and it wasn't the first time

Title: Honest & Fair Review
Review: To be fair this company completed several deliveries to me sucessfully. Everything was as it should be for the most part.However on this last delivery, the app offered and accepted an order when the restaurant was closed.Again to be fair the driver/cyclist had the courtesy to call me to inform me first. Shortly after the order was listed as "Delivered". Which frankly was a second error. Then after I contacted them by email, customer service rang from an international phone number at 1.15am to ask me in broken english if I wanted a "refund or Deliveroo credit for the same amount?" Accepting the refund, I was told I should receive it in several days time. No verdict there yet.Then the call ended with customer service telling me to "have a nice day" at 1.30am.So someone in a call centre at the other side of the planet(in daylight) has my phone number now as well.The 3 stars are for previous services rendered and the simple courtesy shown by the driver/cyclist.The sudden rise of this company looks as though it will be mirrored by a sudden fall in the near future at present.I can only wish them luck.

Title: Order came but someone else's cold food…
Review: Order came but someone else's cold food was in the bag, did not think much of it till I spoke to customer services who offered to refund or to send our order again and not refund. We should not have to wait 2.5hrs for our order to arrive at full price. The wrong order did not meet our dietary requirements so we could only refund or await the new food, the food that came was of no good to us

Title: Late
Review: Late, after waiting 2 hours, they can’t give me arrival time, however on the app saying delivered. Joke, don’t bother, waste of money. Ridiculous there is no refund... You might just spend your money on lottery. First & last time definitely.

Title: Thieving scum
Review: Thieving scum paid £30 for groceries, waited 2 hours for delivery, nothing. Then order is marked as delivered! When I call them they say that the rider couldn’t find my house ( which is impossible for anyone without a blindfold on) when I asked what happens to my groceries I find out there going to the “homeless”. What a crock of ****

Title: Useless!
Review: Useless. Says delivered! When speaking to customer service they confirm it’s delivered however to a different address... we have to now wait 24-48 hours for them to investigate. So no food and lost money! Even though you type in your exact address they only look at a pin drop...

Title: Has anyone else tried pressing 1 if…
Review: Has anyone else tried pressing 1 if you’re a customers and nothing happens!!!! Your order Then arrived several hours later ? Our order was ready, it was being delivered by xxxxx and then all went tits up....... useless, unbelievably useless

Title: Disgraceful order came wrong and not…
Review: Disgraceful order came wrong and not cooked messaged them to explain that it wasn't edible and they put £3.18 credit on account when the food was £30 absolute joke

Title: Don't bother with either
Review: food took an hour and 10 mins to arrive, by which time it was cold! and best of all, part of the order was missing. I had to chase deliveroo for a refund as German Doner Kebab,washed it's hands of the issue! never again,either deliveroo or German Diner Kebab loughborough

Title: One star is obviously too much as I…
Review: One star is obviously too much as I never received my order and, despite lengthy correspondence with customer services, Anne Kristine was not prepared to reimburse us or even  give us a credit note for our food. Moreover, their explanation of why they could not compensate us was totally inaccurate. This was the first time we have used deliveroo and it will most certainly be the last time. Pure robbery!

Title: Simply frauds..
Review: Simply frauds... Multiple occasions on a short period where my delivery doesn't get to me. I had no way of getting in touch with anyone on both occasions the restaurant didn't reply to a phone call. To make matters worse the day after they order status gets put on delivered and they keep the money unless you actually are able to get in touch with them. I wonder how many people actually don't get there money back after a similar experience. As I have encountered this in 2 orders out of 5...Never ordering again with deliveroo. I advise to keep away...

Title: Driver was lovely, terrible service via chat
Review: Falsely advertising £5 back if order takes over 35 minutes. Raised this to customer service via chat, extremely unhelpful and couldn't answer my query. I was being polite in my enquiry and the Deliveroo worked left the chat while I was typing something. Never got an answer on this.

Title: Terrible service..never ordering food…
Review: Terrible service..never ordering food through deliveroo ever again. Ordered food through deliveroo..never got the food nor the money back when we asked for it.

Title: Horrendous service and even worse…
Review: Horrendous service and even worse delivery times.

Title: Order didn't arrive
Review: My order said it had arrived 6 min early when it hadn't arrived at all. The best customer service would offer is to reorder the food, which meant another wait. The second orders time got moved back, twice and even then was late.

Title: Great experience. Swift delivery. Polite driver. Lovely food.
Review: I see many negative comments on here so maybe it’s the restaurant that comes out tops but after my second order on Deliveroo, the experience was quick, easy, on time, and friendly polite driver. Food from The Blue Orchid was extremely good.

Title: Won't be using deliveroo again
Review: Won't be using deliveroo again! Mistake with my order and I went on a live chat they told me to ring the restaurant up. I did this and they said they couldn't do anything only deliveroo could do it for me. I explained this to them on the live chat and they ended my chat after going me being on repeat because they weren't listening to what I was saying. In the end the restaurant sorted my order out after explaining all the problems with the love chat. So won't be using these again! Will be sticking with uber eats or just eat!

Title: My delivery did not arrive
Review: Do not use this service! They take your money and breach their side of the trading by not giving you your product. My delivery did not arrive. On their records it states that it has been delivered. This is not the first time this has happened, only this time live chat is unavailable as well as contacting them in other ways. They are a crap service. They are unlawful.

Title: My first time ordering here won’t be…
Review: My first time ordering here won’t be ordering here again deleted the app . Didn’t receive my order still waiting fir my refund or any updates on it . Bad service won’t recommend

Title: Hey I was chicken cottage franchise in…
Review: Hey I was chicken cottage franchise in Harrow as soon I disfranchised chicken cottage brand deliveroo started descrimation against my company they are not opening are account for delivery service because they just listening to chicken cottage I don’t how they should be treating there drivers and customers well soon I’m taking them to court on this unfair treatment.

Title: Thank you to all the drivers especially through a pandemic
Review: I use deliveroo all the time and yeah sometimes they are late and sometimes the orders are wrong (but thats usually the restaurants fault) and  everytime iv had a problem they have credited the full amount and been really apologetic, I completely understand why they cant refund cause they would never make any money ! And the drivers my god do they work hard, always really friendly and polite, I think people need to stop moaning so much, these guys (and girls) work in all weathers with the risk of being robbed and abused everyday, they are human not robots stop expecting perfection, thank you to all the drivers, I appreciate the work you do.

Title: Possibly the worst service I have ever…
Review: Possibly the worst service I have ever encountered. The deliverer could not find the well known Motel I was staying at so the food was not delivered. Not only that when I managed to contact the delivery person I was met with aggressive, rude, arrogant attack. If I could give -5 star rating I would.

Title: Horrible service
Review: Horrible service from a company that cares absolutely zero about the customer

Title: Awful
Review: Awful. Every order this year has been either wrong, late or missing items

Title: I'm shielding during lockdown and have…
Review: I'm shielding during lockdown and have had to rely on Deliveroo amongst other options. I've made four orders in the space of a month and three of them have been completely, unacceptably wrong. I'm a vegetarian, so imagine my delight at being presented with a beef burger and a pepperoni pizza to be thrown straight into the bin on two seperate occasions.As I'm sure has been mentioned plenty of times before, their refund scheme amounts to a scam. Firstly, you can only get credit applied to your account. Secondly, I have asked multiple times to not just have my items refunded, but the delivery charge too, for this to be refused. The upshot: they've sent me food I can't eat, and if I want to order more, I'll have to pay a second delivery fee. I'm totally shocked by the cookie-cutter responses from customer service staff. Any other sane company would go above and beyond to make amends after being responsbile for so many errors, particularly at this time.

Title: I wish I could leave a minus rating!!!
Review: I wish I could leave a minus rating!!!Ordered vegetarian meal from Fuji Bento on Deliveroo delivery take aways.  Driver got lost, despite being given directions. Meal was completely ruined when, on eating 2 of the 4 gyvoas, they were filled with meat.It made us feel very sick, ruined the meal and spoiled our appetite. Disrespectful to those with special dietary needs.Tried to get immediate response from Deliveroo, but not forthcoming. Absolutely awful when you cannot trust what is in food.Should at least receive full refund.

Title: Absolutely Rubbish
Review: If I could leave a zero I would. Order never got to us, I assume delivery driver went to the wrong place. We are not hard to find. Called deliveroo to find out what happened and all they could do is say they'll send an email within 24 hours to sort refund. Email did not come. Called again and they said it takes 48 hours for email. Which is it? Email never came and I had to call to get my refund. I will never use deliveroo ever again.

Title: NEVER AGAIN!!!
Review: I just completed a positive survey for Deliveroo today, then I made an order. Wish I’d done it the other way round. When I opened the app I got a message saying that if I make an order between now and the 8th August for £20 or more that I would not have to pay the delivery fee. So of course I took advantage of this. My order number 6895 was placed but I’d noticed they were still charging me £4.99 delivery. When I called customer service they told me that this offer is only for new customers and that I’d still have to pay delivery. They apologised for the app been faulty and that they’d have it looked into. But in the mean time imagine all the hundreds of customers using the app each day that this has happened too. Deliveroo must be making a huge profit on customers loss. I’m not happy and I will not be using them again. As far as I’m concerned they could have apologised and promised to pay back the money they’d stolen from me. NEVER AGAIN!!!!#JUSTEAT love them!!! 🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽

Title: Horrible customers service
Review: Horrible customers service! I was asking for help for my machine error for the past 3 weeks and nothing was done. I simply cannot understand how such bad service survive!

Title: Never trust Deliveroo when giving your credit card details
Review: I wish I could give them a rating of minus 5.  Deliveroo preys on peoples naivety and innocence so they can milk them.  Be extremely careful when ordering, as they will store your credit card on their system and put you on a subscription whereby they will take £11.49 per month from your credit card without ever realising it.  If you are like most people you'll probably only realise what's happened after few months and by then it is too late, as they would have extracted enough cash from your credit card.  Imagine how many millions of pounds they get through these devious schemes.  You can complain until the cows come home but you will get nothing back from them.

Title: Ordered a delivery via deliveroo…
Review: Ordered a delivery via deliveroo yesterday and it didn't arrive. The delivery rider who they employed, was foreign spoke very little English and had no knowledge of the area he was delivering too. I gave the correct address and postcode which worked fine for me on my GPS apps I checked. I was tracking the rider on their app, he was over the other side of Cardiff to where I was. After 7 phone calls, where the rider was shouting at me cause he was lost and speaking to the general public cause of of his poor english to give directions,  he still didn't get it right. Telling him where he needed to be i.e "he was on the right main road but needed to turn around and ride miles in the opposite direction, he needed to be at 16 and not 316". Tracking him again he kept heading further away from me. I spoke to deliveroo about the issue via chat, the first person left the conversation early.
