They stated, because the delivery was in transit, i had to wait 15mins which actually at this point was 45mins. The second person who i spoke to didn't offer my money back for the food I didnt receive. Instead applied £10 credit to my account which is and offer they have anyway. I requested a refund via my banking app and found this morning they have taken the money back out of my account. I am not paying for food I did not get. Especially after receiving abuse from one of their riders down the phone because he was lost, idiot.

Title: If I could give zero I would
Review: If I could give zero I would! Absolute worst company. My order did not arrive AT ALL and when I contacted Deliveroo they said I had to deal with it directly with the restaurant. Obviously the restaurant refused a refund so apparently there was nothing else I could do. If I pay the money directly to deliveroo then surely it is their responsibility to refund me for any issues! Money stealing rude and unhelpful. No point even trying to live chat because they’ll just leave the chat with out resolving anything.

Title: Absolute joke.
Review: Absolute joke.Ordered food @ 19:30 delivery getting being put back and back and then it got delivered to someone! (By a delivery man called Misbaul) But not me! Went onto Live Chat and spoke to 'Carl' who basically just said we can put a new order in or refund you your choice... Absolutely no customer service or common courtesy! AVOID!

Title: Ohh there have been multiple things that have led to this…
Review: Ohh there have been multiple times that have led me to this reviews. Today though, the food came damaged (Pho spilled into the plastic bag, making the prawn crackers soggy and the juice warm) Deliveroo would only offer me a replacement of the food but I was leaving at a specific time so would miss the redelivery, I hadn't even finished talking to the person on the live chat and they left it.If this happens to you make sure you ask for a refund first and foremost as whilst I was contemplating whether I could accept a re-delivery the live chat rep said that was me accepting it.

Title: Worst
Review: Worst! Please never use this app. They made us wait 2 hours for our order and their is no way to contact them. This company is a scam

Title: Just greedy parasites
Review: After they added the service charge just to satisfy their greed, they can suck on this

Title: Never ever ever going to use them again.  Security breach, account deleted.
Review: Never ever ever going to use them again. Firstly, my account was hacked (even with a very complex password).  Secondly, my “order” was delivered to a workplace I left over 1 year ago.Thirdly, I kept getting calls from the driver - outside my former employer’s building in Canary Wharf going nuts how long he’d been waiting, all the while I’m 50 miles away at home.  Terrible service, cancelling them and now have to change all my passwords for everything. Don’t use them!If you’ve a Deliveroo account, delete it or if you’re desperate to stay with them, good luck.

Title: Wrong items delivered all the time
Review: Wrong items delivered all the time - I fill in the “ help “ section , they say they’ll get back - never happens and I never get a refund . Will be stopping using them .

Title: Never again cancelling my subscription.
Review: I received an order with items I removed for good reason. I contacted Chosen Bun to be told that it was received via the app without any amendments.Contacted deliveroo who's customer service was poor.I wished I had read the reviews before using.Being a patient in hospital for 2 months in an unfamiliar area, I hoped a gourmet burger might lift my spirits...... sadly not.

Title: DO NOT USE DELIVEROO!
Review: DO NOT USE! I don't even know why companies use this service. Delivery driver said he delivered but didn't. Said he knocked but surprisingly no-one in the flat heard him. It's not a big flat. Then when I called deliveroo, they said he had waited outside for ten minutes before being told (don't know by who) to dispose of the order. These thieves should not be allowed to continue trading. Unhelpful. Don't ensure their delivery drivers are not thieving criminals. And don't want to compensate when their drivers f*** up.

Title: 1 Star sad about that won’t be using…
Review: 1 Star sad about that won’t be using again

Title: Food not delivered - very disappointing
Review: Would give 0 stars if I could. Not worth the risk of not getting your food. We ordered food and put in the correct address, I have a receipt to prove it. We waited over an hour for the food and then I received a phone call saying that the app had directed the driver to the wrong address. The customer service assistant on the phone refused to tell me where the food was or what the driver had done with it. They refused to redeliver even though by the time I received this call it was past 9pm and the restaurant was closed. They tried to give me a refund in credits for the app instead of a full cash refund. I refused the credits because I won't be using the app again.Even if your favourite restaurant only delivers through deliveroo, don't risk it. It will be even more disappointing when your food doesn't come. Do click and collect directly from the restaurant instead.

Title: i contacted this company as they charged my bank card without my consent or knowlwdge
Review: i contacted this company as they charged my debit card for £52.37. they were worse than useless despite all the details being provided to them  they "couldnt find the transaction"  i had never used this company yet they took money from my account unauthorised and when challenged told me to contact my bank. they reffered me to an independent company who found the transaction in less than a minute confirming time and date. yet deliveroo were un willing or unable to do so or to tell me what the charge was. i have little doubt that unless you check your bank regular this company will scam you if they can get away with it. disgusting exploitative company who are complicit in credit card fraud.   DO not use this company find one who is reliable and honest

Title: Nigel Steane
Review: My friend and I ordered a takeaway from wagamama. When it came by deliveroo the rider had dropped it. The bag it was in sopping wet. So the weight of food tubs went threw bottom. Rider young boy looked about sixteen could not speak English. Did not no tel number to complain. Wagamama did not want to no. We spent a hour trying to email threw web sites. Trying to get refund

Title: Absolutely horrible
Review: Absolutely horrible experience with Deliveroo tonight.Was waiting for 1:30h for food to be 'prepared' just to have it cancelled at 1am because the restaurant closed before they got it. No support or options were offered. Appalling service and 0 reliability for this company.

Title: Ordered my food through the app after 2…
Review: Ordered my food through the app after 2 hours of waiting I contacted them through the live chat which said they have contacted the restaurant and it would be with me in 5-10minutes, another hour passed and contacted them again which they again said it would be 15 minutes, I ask for a refund which I got told no but we will give you 2.50 off your next order which I never received, so I contacted the restaurant my self and they hadn't had any calls from deliveroo and knew nothing about my order. Trading standards will be contacted

Title: I actually give it 0 stars.
Review: I actually give it 0 stars.Ordering food and waiting 2 hours to be told there was wa driver error who didn't follow protical and unfortunately we can't issue food but we can a refund that takes 2days to process. I called and explained that was mylast bit of money for food and the children are waiting to be fed is there anything we can sort or do? No was the answer after 30minutes of backwards and forwards. Have access to restaurants and couldn't send anything. DO NOT USE DELIVEROO FOR ANYTHING NOT WORTH IT!

Title: TERRIBLE SERVICE
Review: Absolutely disgusted food always turns up stone cold, customer services and managers are useless, they either argue with you or cut your call off, do not order from deliveroo 😡

Title: Disgusting customer service manager is…
Review: Disgusting customer service manager is rude and lazy and useless.. do not order as that take no responsibility for errors on their end ...

Title: Avoid deliveroo and Wings restaurant at all costs
Review: I ordered around £40 of food from ‘wings’ restaurant: address 22 Boston Parade, Boston Manor, London yesterday evening. This is the worst restaurant I have ever ordered from and deliveroo have been simply pathetic in any attempts to rectify the order.Not a single item was correct - instead of ‘homemade cheesy garlic bread’ we got a single tortilla with some butter in the folds. Instead of mozzarella stuffed garlic mushrooms, we received 3 tiny falafel balls. Instead of 2 portions of skinny fries and one portion of sweet potato skinny fries, we received a handful of what I can only describe as Iceland style oven chips. Not to mention the missing nachos, and portion of 9 buttermilk chicken wings.An absolute car crash, steer clear of this awful ‘restaurant’ and deliveroo have only sent two automated responses and absolutely no customer support.

Title: So much better than UberEats
Review: So much better than UberEats. Occasionally get things wrong but always put it right.

Title: (Deliver)booh
Review: Ordered food at 21.13 on 24/07/20, expected within 50-60 minutes. 22.14 on deliveroo platform I received notification the driver was outside at 22.04, waited 7 minutes and left. No bell rang and no phone, deliveroo report tool directs you to call and when you call it says they are not available at the time. Called the restaurant, they called the driver who said would not attempt second delivery and would not return the food... He had probably eaten it already but deliveroo who is charging delivery fee (£5.49) and service fee (£0.49) doesn't have support on Friday night. Your call...

Title: Terrible service I did not receive my…my deliveroo are poo
Review: Terrible service I did not receive my food that i ordered they took the money out of my bank the tracking of the car said they were not where they said they were and i got phone call saying they were outside they were not there i then got a text saying they could not find me I rang  customer services and they said I would get an e mail investigating this in 24 to 48 hours I am fuming just want my money back I just got an e mail saying I had 2.50 in my account what a joke

Title: Terrible company
Review: Terrible company. Customer services are absolutely USELESS, Riders are rude and impatient

Title: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING!!!
Review: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING!!!! They leave the food on the doorstep for 45 minutes, before you get an email to say your food has been delivered !!!! Oh, they are supposed to call you to let you know they are outside....... like “@ck do they!!! Deliveroo drivers are like taxi drivers.......... the reason they are drivers is because they are unemployable in any other job!! Well done..... yet another SH@&  service from Deliveroo

Title: Consistently gets the order wrong and…
Review: Consistently gets the order wrong and they literally do not care when you contact them. They employ people that do not care at all. We will never use them again.

Title: Deliveroo - absolutely terrible.
Review: Absolutely terrible, again!Deliveroo, no sorry, deliverpoo!This is at least the 3rd time this year we have not had an order turn up, after spending more than £40!When checking where the order was, I was informed it had been delivered 20 mins prior. How on earth does this even happen?Obviously I explained nothing had arrived, instantly accepting this, I was abruptly told, I could have a refund, or I could wait an additional hour, for something similar.The final message simply said, "This is actually the last thing I want to say to you, we process a refund, or a replacement, no discounts"Is this how a paying customer should be communicated with / treated?Clearly, a percentage of your drivers / riders are obviously out doing their own thing, not actually bothered about delivering whats been paid for & expected in good time.Your service is completely & utterly unacceptable.

Title: Hopeless 75% of the time. Never again.
Review: I have used Deliveroo 4 times to deliver KFC, which is actually located about 2 minutes from my office.  Only once out of 4 did my order arrive on time and had the correct items in it!  Customer service is non-existent and complaints are met with a "..sorry it didn't go well - but we'll try harder next time."  Hopeless.  Don't use this company - it's far easier and quicker to get it yourself!

Title: The worst customer service I have ever experienced
Review: The service is fine, if you order from a competent restaurant you'll generally get tasty, hot food. The customer communication, however, is by far the worst I have ever experienced. I was receiving calls for orders that weren't mine, the support staff failed to properly read my email 3 times, and 3 times gave me a load of completely irrelevant advice. They also claimed they couldn't do anything about their staff calling me about orders which weren't mine. I ended up blocking all their numbers, so this is of course the end of my use of their service. This is of course a failure to protect customer data, and complete apathy to a customer's concern about their data, so if I receive any more unwanted calls I will be lodging a complaint with the information commissioner's office.I am stunned at how terrible their customer support is, and they have no formal complaints procedure, presumably because it would be immediately overwhelmed with angry customers. If they had simply read my emails and responded thoughtfully, they would still have a long time customer that until that point had enjoyed their service.

Title: Deliveroo started off OK then...
Review: Deliveroo started off OK, nice pricing structure, quick deliveries and a good monthly subscriptions service. Then it got slightly worse service charges then monthly went up from 7.99 to 11.99 and NO minimum order removed it had to be a certain value from now. Ok fine then another change.. Deliveries are based on cost to location ok fine but its not correctly setup and pricy. Then here come the all mega worst issue of all time..... STACKING Orders to maximise profits. That right the driver is part of multiple companies I. E uber eats. They sit they waiting while you food is getting cold deliver to everyone else, but then your food is cold so you complain. The live chat service is disgusting they never want to give you refund its hard to even get credit even when your order has been out for delivery for an Hour since pickup they won't ask the kitchen you ordered on to send more. The main problem I have is with the stacking. I pay for your drivers to deliver my food hot and in good condition 4 out of my 5 last deliveries have not been and its just getting worse. They wait for multiple orders for multiple providers not showing deliveroo (or whichever company they at picking up for) the real story but you are aware of this issue for sure you just keep it hidden from the public. You uber eats and others need to pull your stuff together I'm not ordering off any of you. Just another shady thing they stated KFC was only on deliveroo that's a lie, not the only company they have stated is exclusive when it's not 😉I'm not joking here it went from 5 stars to 0 in just under two years. It all screams Bad Business model and whoever is at the top should be ashamed of how they have let this company go into complete dog dinner.

Title: My order never came …
Review: Worst service ever was so hungry and tired so I decided to order from nando's takeaway.ie with deliveroo after 20mins a number called me that my order has arrived so I went downstairs but I couldn't see anyone delivery I tried to call the number back the number keep going to voicemail and saying what I dont no that was how I lost my 20e and my order never came I had to start cooking when I couldn't wait anymore because after calling the restaurant they said my order has already left and there is nothing they can do saying I have to contact deliveroo worst experience I will never use this ever again

Title: Tried to get a delivery in Brighton
Review: Tried to get a delivery in Brighton, despite giving Hotel name and post code, they couldn’t find us, so we’re down the cash and still hungry!

Title: used  deliveroo once  to buy a pizza…
Review: used  deliveroo once  to buy a pizza from a papa johns never signed up for an account since then  my card hasbeen used on 4 separate occasions to purchase food and even a cab i will never use any take away that uses this service ever again

Title: Check your emails when they’re outside???
Review: They forgot my dessert, So i had to reorder with the credit they gave me but the credit didnt cover delivery charge so I had to pay extra to get it redelivered, waited 45 minutes still nothing so I rang them asking where it was and they said the guy was outside our house (didn’t knock our door) and rode off because we didnt respond to an email to say be was outside? What??? Who checks their emails? So he said i had to re order again & pay delivery again (£4.99) so i asked for a refund, will never order again

Title: I wish I had read the reviews
Review: I wish I had read the reviews about deliveroo before I ordered from Burger King, my order was late and wrong. Burger king were not interested so I rang deliveroo direct and they have refunded me the whole amount which is good I suppose.  I'm not sure if burger king got the order wrong or the missing items are elsewhere.  The driver was also rude.  Definitely won't be using deliveroo or Burger King again.

Title: One star is way too much for this…
Review: One star is way too much for this 'service'. I say service with the loosest of terms. Nothing but disappointment. Order is wrong 100% of the time i have ordered from them and i get the usual email 'we're sorry, we'll do better next time' whilst we keep your money and not care. Enjoy your cold, wrong, missing order. If you do manage to get your money back, you'll get the credit you have to use in 10 days instead of actually getting your money back that you can spend at a place that will provide you with the correct order.

Title: I experienced a very bad customer…
Review: I experienced a very bad customer serivice. My order didn't arrive, the app said "Delivered". I contacted the customer service, after asking some questions for the credential, they did nothing, except asked me to wait 2 days. Until now, I am writing this comment, (nearly 1 week), I'm still waiting hopelessly their reply, my money 99% is lost. If you plan to use Deliveroo, be careful.

Title: Had better service since my last…
Review: Had better service since my last review, but still prefer to use the rival when I can as the takeaways from there tend to use there own delivery drivers so the food is looked after better.  However, have used Deliveroo a few times this year and although some packaging damaged and food spilled out not as bad as when my other review was writtenl.

Title: Issues more often than not.
Review: Usually have issues, just convenient enough to avoid me moaning.  However, most recent example was very infurating  so had to write up.So made an 'emergency' groceries delivery from M&S.  One item was missed for about £5.  Wasn't that bothered, so reported it an received a credit and quite happy to leave it at that.  Mistakes happen and  for a fiver I wasn't going to kick up a fuss.Then a week or so later receive a note saying the credit was going to expire!This blew my mind.  The sheer arrogance of a company to try and charge you for an item their service failed to deliver is beyond me.Rather justifies their rating here!Have asked for a full refund instead and if I can be bothered will try to purge my account in the future...no doubt that is a major challenge!

Title: Swear word bad
Review: Swear word bad. Ordered via them with reputable establishment. No food. No communication. Don’t use this company EVER*had to add that they gave me a £10 credit. Still not a big fan, but after Phone call to lady called Appole I will give them a last try. **2017 I didn’t realise I also gave 1/5 for awful service. ***this market is booming - up your game (I will attempt again)

Title: FCK DELIVEROO
Review: worst experience. rude drivers, call centre was absolutely useless in resolving any issues - almost like they didn't care. cheats, don't order if you're counting on eating dinner tonight.

Title: Three orders failed. Never again.
Review: Three orders in a row , on the same evening failed to be delivered due to delays / spilled drinks and other excuses. Tracking never moved any of the times and each time it was pushed to a new order. Utterly shambolic and deserving of zero stars for terrible service.

Title: Will NEVER use again
Review: Will NEVER use again. I dont even want to give 1 star - minus 10 stars would be more appropriate. I didnt get my food - waited for an hour and then the order was cancelled after I followed up, I am still waiting for my refund and was totally fobbed off by support team.

Title: Awful company
Review: I genuinely can not comprehend how this company is not bust. The worst customer service ever, failing in every aspect. Was delivered the wrong order (with someone else's personal details on) and only half of their order. Deliveroo customer service refused to deal with it and just gave me a credit to re-order after waiting well over an hour for a can of coke. No compensation and no apology - moving to just eat.

Title: Deliveroo didnt deliver my order of £40…
Review: Deliveroo didnt deliver my order of £40 of food and called once and hung up on our call and claimed that was the delivery.

Title: Dear Sir / Madam,
Review: Dear Sir / Madam,I am writing to you to raise an issue about: DeliverooThe issue that I have experienced was: I was a head chef and I applied for deliveroo to be a rider my mom so sick i need this work so much they hire everyone after me accept me they put me in the waiting list when I email them i ask them please please i need this job please its will not effect the company if you hire me you don’t know what i have my mom very sick and they keep ignoring me and hire other who apply after me It occurred on:  1/05/2020This meant that Its effect my family my mother my live and am sure even you will ignore  my message I asking you please send it to them my email address is office ad   shamaa.ukOnly to be a rider all my decument ready and I already submitted my email application is Office  ad   shamaa.ukI look forward to your prompt response on this matter. As recommended by Trading Standards, I would like to keep a complete record of my case, so please reply to this email address.Yours faithfully,Ahmed Yakout

Title: Worst company ever
Review: Worst company everWe ordered for an ASAP delivery of KFC which stated between 30-45 minutes in Weymouth.. 1hour and 15 minutes in I contacted customer services to which they said they’re trying to find a rider and sent a £5 credit for the inconvenience, 2 hours in without the food I decided to contact them again (all through their we chat service) they said the delivery would be with us in the next 5-10 minutes (no offer of compensation this time but said I could cancel if I wish and receive the money back) I said I’d wait if it’s only that long they assured me it would still be hot on arrival.3 hours in and I decided to call deliveroo.. raging at this point after being lied to, the person on the other end said their driver was there but there’s a problem at kfc, tried to contact both kfc and the rider with no answer.. about 5-10 minutes later told me that multiple people had cancelled and kfc in Weymouth had 0 successful deliveries today. Turns out kfc was closed, the man on the phone blamed kfc for not telling them they were closed yet none of their riders (staff) told them either hence the 0 successful deliveries and the refunds. We ended up having a refund but this then takes 1-3 days to come back into the account So we’re also £40 down for a few days, ended up with delivery from dominos within 25minutesAvoid deliveroo at all costs, worst delivery company ever should have just gone down to get it myself and if they were closed I’d have known straight away

Title: Appalling service
Review: Ordered from Harry Ramsden for a charity virtual supper. Placed order at 12.00, clearly marked for delivery at 18.30.Got a reply to say order was en route immediately.Phoned restaurant to delay delivery. Got a phone call from a very shirty lady to say that I had inconveniencedThe driver and she had cancelled the order, and I should reorder.I ordered again at 18.00 for delivery at 18.30.Reply came delivery at 18.40, then 18.50, then “hopefully by 19.22”.Delivery arrived , but half missing, and lukewarm.I had to send one of my guests out to buy his own supper.Reported shortage, offered a credit note, which I have refused, as I will never use them again.

Title: Not worth it
Review: Missing items, cold food, riders getting lost, very rude, they don't apologise when late. Food quite expensive. they pretend they don't speak English.Please don't use deliveroo. Would give zero if possible.

Title: Horrendous customer service.
Review: Horrendous customer service.Really don't want to know when Riders verbally abuse female customers, they are party to a culture where this sort of behaviour is acceptable.  My complaint wasn't even slightly investigated.  How this company is still even functioning is beyond me.  They disgust me.

Title: Terrible service AVOID
Review: Terrible service. Placed order at 7.20. Order never arrived after an hour of waiting despite the tracker saying it had been delivered. No proper explanation from Deliveroo. Awful.

Title: Disappointed!!!
Review: this is the second time our order was delivered by a really slow and rude rider ..he literally threw our order on our doorstep !!

Title: UTTERLY useless service
Review: I will never ever use this useless service again even phone support was useless

Title: Bad attitude
Review: First time with dealing with deliveroo and I will never use again. customer service is shocking aswell as your delivery drivers attitude. He was lucky he wasn't wearing the pizza!!!

Title: Deliveroo customer service is…
Review: Deliveroo customer service is appalling. if you try to complain, like posts below say, they keep you on phone/chat for hours so you have to take cold and ruined food that has been an hour or more lat of them saying, 5 minutes more, 5 minutes more, ad infinitum... then they say, we'll give you a £2.50 credit, which is insulting. they actually owe all of us wages for the labour hours we've used to complain. Shame on you deliveroo. sort yourself you money hungry £$%£@

Title: Deliveroo burger up a delivery!!!
Review: I placed an order with a local burger restaurant on Friday, we’ve ordered many times before with no issues however on this occasion they got the order wrong. I started a chat with Deliveroo and I was told to cancel and reorder and I would get a refund. Bearing in mind it was Friday night, wait time was 45 mins and it was now 9pm I wasn’t happy with that. Whilst in the chat the restaurant called direct to say they recognised the error and wanted to put it right but Deliveroo would not allow them to do so until I had spoken to them. I asked Deliveroo for some compensation towards a reorder if was to be forced into placing another order and waiting another 40 mins but they flatly refused. As I had guests I felt I couldn’t push this so reluctantly accepted a refund and re ordered. I called the restaurant again to let them know this and to ask for a quick delivery. They told me the food could be ready in 10 mins but that Deliveroo would not expedite a rider so we were forced to wait a further 40 mins. Bottom line is that the restaraunt seemed to be trying hard to make good whereas Deliveroo behaved like a big corporate with a “computer says no attitude” pretty poor service in my view and I will think twice about using them in the future.

Title: Very bad company
Review: Deliveroo send email register now but only 30% finish try one more time exactly same I wait 1 year now come 3 email why not finish the registration I check the application no more option on the continues

Title: Account was hacked
Review: Account was hacked. Account was hacked thought it was just fishing emails but the money had actually come out of my account. Over £200 worth of deliveries. Deliveroo done nothing to try and compensate and said they engineer teams will look into it. There systems are clearly not secure. I would never put my email, Password and defiantly not my bank details ever again. It could have been a lot worse if they would have emptied my bank account. Deliveroo connects to facebook and loads of other apps. Be careful using Deliveroo

Title: Yet again Deliveroo fails to refund missing items.
Review: This is now the third time where I've had groceries delivered since they started doing grocery deliveries during the Covid crisis where an item, or two has been missing.This time I had a small selection of items delivered from the Co Op, missing were 2x 4 pints of whole milk, which WAS auto refunded (Why don't they substitute for semi skimmed?), but a more costly item (1 litre of the posh scottish ice cream at £4.XX) was not.Again I reported it as soon as I noticed it missing and again I get an email back to say no credit/refund and we're sorry.This is outright fraudLuckily for me the driver forgot to remove the credit card receipt, which clearly shows the ice cream was never purchased in the store, so now I await their refund decisionI've used Deliveroo for a few years now and have spent what must be £800 or more in those yearsNever again

Title: The Beijing palace Guildford
Review: The Beijing palace Guildford. The food was delivered hot & the best takeaway i have ever had !!! The taste woz superb & fantastic value 4 money. Will definitely be recommending this place, cant wait 4 my next delivery. 😁

Title: Wish I could give a lower score
Review: We ordered through Deliveroo and the food arrived 48 minutes after it was prepared, and 30 minutes after time. The driver delivered to us last and the food was stone cold. Will never use them again

Title: cant get even the simplest of orders…
Review: cant get even the simplest of orders right, and they think holding onto your money and giving you credit will fix it they're delusional absolutely rubbish.

Title: pushed the time back by 15 mins
Review: pushed the time back by 15 mins, can't select the time of delivery they just told you ( for the 5 guys i was using), also they don;t follow up for feedback to improve their service, guess what I won't be using them or the restaurant again.

Title: I ordered to a place of work
Review: I ordered to a place of work. The driver said he had arrived however when I went to find him I could not see him. I had to walk around the whole premises for 15 minutes only to be informed by the app that the driver had waited and I did not pick up the delivery. Really disappointed as I wasted 18 pounds and each time I tried to call the delivery man he disconnected the call. Shocking service !!!!

Title: No notification of failed order
Review: The previous 4 times of trying Deliveroo I've been impressed with the end to end system and service.However, this evening we placed an order, got the confirmation, only no food arrived an hour later. So I check the website only to see the order had failed. I connected Support to find out what happened and it appears my card had been declined (which I'll work with the bank on), the issue is zero proactive notification from Deliveroo. So it's now 21:20 on Friday evening and no dinner, facing a +1hr wait for other local alternatives. Not impressed

Title: Thieves
Review: Thieves. And since I have to write more than 10 characters I'll say it again. Thieves.

Title: Food order never arrived!!
Review: Food order never arrived!!! After I placed it on the app, 20 mins later I checked to see a message saying my order had been delivered. I checked the porch and outside NOTHING. No call from the driver and the bell did not ring. Customer service is useless and make you wait 24 hours to get back to you. NEVER AGAIN with Deliveroo. There are plenty of other better choices: Uber Eats, Just Eat to name a few!

Title: Great app, good service
Review: Generally had very good service. A few times when there's an issue customer support have been very helpful.

Title: ABSOLUTELY  APPALLING!!
Review: ABSOLUTELY  APPALLING!!! Spent £70 on an order. The driver marked it as delivered and nothing came. After being on the phone for an hour we had to CONVINCE THEM to finally bring us our food. When the food finally came, another 30mins later than expected it was worth a fraction of the price in burgers (2 instead of 5), contained items my family was allergic to and didn’t have a vegetarian option that we needed! We then had to get back on the phone to convince them once again to give us the order we actually paid for and after 5 hours of waiting we got to eat... and after all that we were told we could get a refund for the poor service, which we got only a week after of back and forwards emails.... the refund was only a £5 Voucher for Deliveroo... as if I’d be using that on this poor excuse of a company again🤣🤣🤣 NEVER USE THIS SERVICE

Title: Use Uber Eats or Just Eat instead :)
Review: I would give zero stars if I could. Actually even a minus rating. The 'customer service' with this company is non existent. They charge ridiculous amounts and aren't even willing to help customers out. Apparently managers do not have the authority to override anything, I think they need the CEO of the company present when something goes wrong with a customer's order or better yet, they'll do nothing about it. I would not recommend anyone to use Deliveroo as you'll get ripped off. Use Uber Eats, they charge less for delivery and they care about the people who keep the company running.

Title: The customer service is non existent
Review: The customer service is non existent. Would much rather use Uber eats, or just eat. Nowadays amazon prime now is great and so much cheaper for groceries than deliveroo

Title: Cold, late & no resolution
Review: Ordered for the first time, food arrived late and freezing cold. Immediately raised the issue through the app and binned the cold food. No solution offered other than 'we hope we will do better next time'. Totally unacceptable solution, if this were in a restaurant the food would have been sent back or at least refunded. Uber Eats offer a far superior service.

Title: Don't use Deliveroo
Review: Just a follow up on my review yesterday of this dreadful company and a real warning to not use Deliveroo. My food order was collected from wagamama and never delivered. No one from Deliveroo has told me what happened to my order. I was passed almost immediately to another team at Deliveroo without explanation, for a refund. This team would be in touch with me in 24/48 hours and I did get a template email message from them 24 hours later with again no explanation or apology just confirmation that my refund had been processed but will take 5-10 days to go back into my account. I got nothing throughout. A fake map on the app or someone who has worked out how to corrupt it that suggests a rider is on their way and even outside your property when they are not. Someone did get a nice meal from wagamama, but not me. I have lost money out of my bank account for 5-10 days. This is a total rip off

Title: Can't find an address in the middle of…
Review: Can't find an address in the middle of london (using a laptop) - the next screen shows a map with the 'find' button greyed out. Banter  ecomm team, as this works on mobile - genuinely hilarious from such a big company :L hit me up, I can probably sort thisSW12 9PR

Title: Lost and hapless, blame the customer once you have their money.
Review: Is it so hard to try a concierge when “lost” in a block of flats or are you too lazy or stupid to do that Deliveroo driver? So now you have a free meal on us and were paid for a delivery which you didn’t complete. Everyone else manages! Thieving scumbags!

Title: Poor
Review: had a voucher, wouldn't work. Emailed Deliveroo,  asked for multiple information which i provided. Kept asking for more information after every email. Going round in circles.  Poor customer service

Title: It was a superior pizza
Review: It was a superior pizza, without doubt. I only saw this new pizza place on deliveroo and ordered an anchovy pizza. It reminded me of the time I visited Naples in Italy. I intend to go through the entire menu now. Superb.

Title: Delivery is rubbish
Review: The restaurant selection is great. The system for ordering is great. The delivery did not arrive despite registering as delivered.  Was offered another attempt 40 minutes later, which was too late, we were starving. Refund was provided.

Title: Reasonable food, good delivery
Review: The food was fine.  The delivery guy was lovely and should be promoted and given a payrise.

Title: Ice cold food delivered today
Review: Ice cold food delivered today, from Burger King, in Brussels (couldn't find Belgian review page which is odd) Why? They have only one mission!

Title: - Drivers are obviously not paid enough…
Review: - Drivers are obviously not paid enough so most of them do not care about their jobs. They are rude, late and not give a sh** about the food they are carrying.- Drivers arrive at the restaurant smoking, watching tv series, talking on the phone. Many times not even saying hello. This guy the other day came to pickup an order and had a used face covering mask INSIDE his heating bag. This is SO UNHYGIENIC. I asked him to remove the mask before i could put my bags inside his and he throw his mask on the ground. He thought i didn’t see him so before he left i asked him to take it and throw it into a bin. WHAT CAN YOU SAY?? I can’t be teaching hygiene practises or politeness to your drivers!!! Another one was smoking from one hand and picking up the order with his other hand. Then, he went next to his bike (with my hot food getting cold) and slowly finished his cigarette!!- Deliveroo is taking loads of money from restaurants and the service provided in return is soooo bad. Takes them ages to reply over email (phone is just for live orders) if they ever do since they are super ignorant.- if you can use your own drivers to deliver then do that!!!

Title: Driver who delivered was very rude
Review: Driver who delivered was very rudeWill never use deliveroo ever again.

Title: ABSOLUTELY FUMING
Review: So we ordered food on Wagamama’s & after 30 minutes of waiting we didn’t receive one of the meals. We then called Wagamama’s and they apologised and refunded us and then gave us the number to call Deliveroo so we could order through again. After being hung up on the first time, they finally picked up and then told us that they were taking the money back and they had to start another order which is going to take another hour. Our other food has gone cold and they didn’t offer any help or give us an apology! We should have at least had money back, or something extra for this absolute waste of time. DONT USE THIS SERVICE

Title: Slightly disappointing
Review: The service the company provides is good, however, the staff are useless and are prone to making mistakes which is disappointing.

Title: SAY NO TO DELIVEROO
Review: Don’t help you out with any issue, I ordered food A restaurant and it never came but it says delivered on my phone, I emailed deliveroo and they literally just took the restaurant side and said “We won't be able to offer you any compensation this time.”DO NOT USE DELIVEROO I PROMISE YOU’LL REGRET IT.STICK WITH UBER EATS & JUST EAT

Title: Don't call customer service
Review: I cant give 0 stars but this needs to be said.I ordered £67 worth of food to be delivered which was picked up, i then watched the driver drive around for 30+ minutes before I contacted them to ask if they were lost as I didn't want cold food. I was told by my delivery agent that there was no need to worry, it had just been picked up and was on the way. 30+ minutes later I get a call (whilst on the phone complaining) that the delivery is delayed.Well I could have guessed that at this point. The order was then, without my asking, cancelled. I asked for a full refund and was told that the money wasn't taking so all was good. I then ordered another meal to be delivered because I was starving by this point. After ordering the second meal I recieved the first order, which I was told had been cancelled, so I thought I'd go ahead and cancel the second order.Then insured the madness that is biz and whoever else I spoke to. No matter how many times I explained I only ordered the second meal as the first was cancelled by them, I now had to pay and receive another order I didn't want in the first God damn place. So I asked if they could do one of the following :-Donate the food to the next homeless person they saw-Pay the restaurant and also the same amount to a charity for people struggling for food. By this point it was my fault for ordering more food. As explained above I only ordered the food because of the first cancellation that wasn't coming. I had the same response throughout my conversation with 'biz' (real name not made up) that this was paid for by me and I now have 2 full meals in the bin. I may be fat but not that god damn fat. Through all of this I will admit the swear words came out as the hours rolled on but I think you'll agree it was well over due by this point. My advice, any issue, just take it on the chin and dear God I hope you don't have to get a script reading phone jockey who doesn't know their ass from their elbow. I hope your orders go well. Rant overEss

Title: Ordered some food with deliveroo
Review: Ordered some food with deliveroo, could see the driver on the map and waited for the driver to appear on our road before heading to the door. No knock, nothing. No one appeared. Food was then later described as being delivered but we didn't receive anything? Phoned deliveroo customer services and that was a nightmare in itself. Had to ask the lady 3 times the same question and instead of answering honestly she just kept avoiding the question. We are getting a refund but still a little irked about the situation as waited almost an hour for nothing.

Title: Always a bad experience with them
Review: Restaurant said free delivery and they still charged me. I spoke to them on live chat and they were so useless.I had a really bad experience with them a few months ago and I decided to give them another chance and they disappoint me again. UBEREATS have better customer services.

Title: Order Resolved Quickly
Review: Had a problem with my order, rang up their customer service helpline and had great service from them. Immediatley sorted out my order with no hassle. Would reccomend them because of their fast quick service. And the guy was super friendly and nice too.

Title: GOT ORDER WRONG, EXPENSIVE KFC
Review: I ordered KFC and it was far too overpriced. I get KFCs expensive but this was a bit much. Over 30 pounds for 3 meals. I only gave 2 stars because well 1 because it's KFC and another because they actually managed to come on time. But they got my order COMPLETLY wrong. Ordered corn got gravy. Ordered tango yet got pepsi. Terrible.

Title: Pathetic service
Review: Food never arrived and deliveroo customer service tells me wait 24/48hr for a refund. App updated as food delivered . No attempt made to contact rider, follow up with restaurant.. I wasn’t after a refund, I was after my food. Amount charged to my account but no food delivered. Waiting for a refund. Pathetic. Will never ever use deliveroo.Update 48 hrs later.No one has contacted me from deliveroo, to discuss my refund. I will keep you posted, how I get on.

Title: Never using the Deliveroo app !!
Review: Never using this app!! A family member had just been hacked through their account and loads of money taken from their account. They rang and said “their driver was outside” when they hadn’t ordered anything and They said that to the lady on the phone yet they still took money out of the accounts!!

Title: 1 star is even pushing it
Review: 1 star is even pushing it. Delivered half my order and when you go to call the restaurant they never pick up and it’s like they dont exist when you search them up on google using deliveroo is a nightmare

Title: Never using Deliveroo again!
Review: Awful! Ordered food, half of the order was missing. The driver had an extra bag but insisted it wasn't part of my order. Phoned customer services, they rearranged a delivery for the missing items however got the new order completely wrong. The driver, according to the tracking, never left the restaurant. We phoned customer services, they stated the driver made his way to the property and attempted to call us, which never happened, and then said they gave the food to a homeless man outside a pub, which is the other direction from the premises than our address!!3 times I have used Deliveroo and every time I have had to call customer services as the drivers have either not turned up or lied and said they attempted delivery when they blatant haven't

Title: Absolutely useless
Review: Absolutely useless! Food never arrived and deliveroo tell me wait 24/48hr! No help so i will never be using deliveroo again!

Title: Can't add to an order after placing
Review: Can't add to an order after placing. Stupid.

Title: Order never arrived.
Review: I ordered pizza from metro pizza, after waiting for one hour , the Deliveroo driver never turned up. Even more annoying the app showed the order as delivered...I got a full refund after calling customer service. I don’t use Deliveroo very often but this was enough to put me off...

Title: Disappointing
Review: Again, the pizza arrived destroyed! Certainly the rider Petra dropped it on her way... but had the courage to deliver my pizza completely messy, the toppings were all on the side, the box was dirty and greasy... unbelievable. Zero stars.

Title: The worst service I have ever…
Review: The worst service I have ever experienced. After a tiring week as an NHS worker, I decided to order my dinner from Nando's and have it delivered. My address and necessary details had been provided to ensure my dinner was delivered. The deliveroo biker never showed at my address, when I contacted the company I was told that the biker had left my dinner in  the garden. I do not have a garden so as you can see the biker was in a rush to get to his next delivery job and could not be bothered to locate the right address. I ended up with no meal and I have been charged for it.  Pathetic Service!!!!!!!I hope another  competitor comes on board to take the businesses from them. The customers service agents were more pathetic. They had no service skills. This is my first and last time of using this service.

Title: Ordered Nando’s for my kids half the…
Review: Ordered Nando’s for my kids half the order arrives, call Nando’s to get automated message telling me to ring Deliveroo. Click on order help on Deliveroo app, “Thank you we aim to respond in 2 days” not happy with that response I call Deliveroo to speak to Jacob at Deliveroo. Jacob says sorry not much I can do we’ll refund you what’s missing? Never, has this been an issue with any other takeaway, missing items happen, surely just re-send the missing part of the order! Angry half children eating one without his meal. Not happy!

Title: Ordered KFC at 7:55pm
Review: Ordered KFC at 7:55pm. Predicted delivery at 8:20pm. At 9:20pm contacted chat online, they said driver on way to collect. Contacted again at 10:20pm, they apologised and said on wya. Soon. Contacted at 11pm absolutely livid ... They said restaurant had closed at 9pm and offered refund. What a bloody joke. I doubt they're blatantly lying but they clearly just say what you want to hear to calm you down. Absolutely rubbish. Never have this #@£& with Uber eats.

Title: Very dissapointed’
Review: I have never had an issue with Deliveroo. But this was my first time ordering from Subway. I ordered a meal deal. Driver turned up with 4 bags full of food and drink. I told him it’s defo not my order. He was helpful and they issued me a refund. However the driver was a bit too friendly and kept trying to hug me and flirt. It made me feel very uncomfortable. There’s no way to document that on the Deliveroo app like you can with Ola or something.

Title: Zero will be to much
Review: Just gave 1 star as zero is not possible!I have just paid the dinner for my driver as food never arrived. I have basically been robbed. Tried to speak with the “live chat” they cut me off while I was talking 3 times!! So I decide to call the costumer service where the same phrase was told me “they were investigating and in 24-48 they will be in contact with a resolution”!!! This is daylight robbery! You need to pay your money in advance for a service that doesn’t exist! To improve you should shut down! Dishonest service! Please if you can avoid like plague!

Title: If I could give them zero I would
Review: If I could give them zero I would . I have about 10 emails with the same set answer telling me nothing in reply to my question. no phone number anywhere  to talk to a person. A disgraceful company who are always right.Dont use them there are lots of better delivery companies out the who care.

Title: Braintree Friday’s Branch
Review: The ribs were lovely and hot! And all of the chips (surprisingly) were pretty hot too, and they still had a crunch (if a little unseasoned) But the burgers. . . I’ve never seen so much disregard for a bit of meat in all my years of eating food. Unseasoned, almost cold (as if they were sitting there for 5/10 mins on a hot counter before the order was made), the cheap cheese used wasn’t melted and the sauce looked like it’d been squirted on from a distance to see if they could hit a bullseye.If I do order from there again it won’t be for the burgers

Title: Courier dropped food on our carpets
Review: Courier dropped food on our carpets. Deliveroo refuses taking responsibility and blames cafe where food came from. Now I'm being ping-ponged by both parties that it's not their fault. "Amazing"

Title: I ordered my food through Deliveroo…
Review: I ordered my food through Deliveroo with this Nando's restaurant (#6858) and it was missing my two Sprites Zero that I have ordered. I called the restaurant to find out why and I can't believe that the incompetent lady said to me that "we have put it in the bag". One hour later and I am still trying to find out why she blatantly lied to me since I ALWAYS check if everything I ordered is in fact, inside the bag. I am not happy with this outcome and throughout all my time ordering with this restaurant I never had one single problem and now all of sudden I am getting lied to. To make a mistake is one thing, but to blatantly lie to me about it is wrong. She could of said "Oh sorry about that but sometimes mistakes do happen" and have advised me further on what to do.I do hope that you take my feedback very seriously and take into consideration how this has inconvenienced me so much as I had nothing to drink whilst eating. Furthermore, I believe that Nando's should train their employees to NOT lie to customers when they make a mistake BUT apologize to it.

Title: There is not a score low enough
Review: There is not a score low enough. A treat for the wife and myself after 4 months of lockdown with a new born and our food is delivered to wrong address the opposite side of town to where we live.  Complete shambles and customer service just said refund in up to 48 hours. Absolute disgrace of a company. My grandmother could run a delivery company better.

Title: Terrible
Review: Terrible! If a minus was an option I would of chosen that. First time using Deliveroo NEVER again. Took our money and never delivered our order.  Now we have to wait 24- 48 hrs for a refund. A treat for a first time mum and dad on a hard day of parenting this company is a joke

Title: Shocking, never again
Review: Within 3 months, Deliveroo have managed to mess up 3 of my orders.  App states order has arrived in record time.....what????? Still waiting.  You'd think with all the competition out there, they'd value their customers and focus largely on customer satisfaction.Never, ever again....bye bye Deliveroo

Title: Terrible customer service when things go wrong
Review: I had several issues with orders in the past, but today capped it all. Apart from missing my lunch due to order arrived damaged and not having enough time to organise an alternative, I also tried using the live chat to get the refund process. Terrible customer service, you get assigned random agents who will look into your query forever, and then drop out. And then it starts all over again. Hopefully I will get my refund in the bank in the next 5-10 days. I deleted my account and erased the app from my phone. Never again.

Title: ALERT BEWARE OF FRAUD
Review: So yesterday our account on deliveroo was hacked and over £250 worth of orders were placed including alcohol etc. Deliveroo used the same excuse saying it's the Banks fault there security system didnt flag it up yet different addresses in different locations in the uk high amount of orders you would expect some sort of red flag to come up but not to deliveroo. After spending hours trying to resolve this issue I receive an email admitting fraud had occurred on the account and that it's down to my bank to refund the payment, absolute nonsense how about upgrade security systems and be more wary of fraudulent activity. And just so people are aware Deliveroo was also hacked in June 2019 again passing the blame. I WOULD ADVISE EVERYBODY TO EITHER CHANGE PASSWORDS IMMEDIATELY OR CLOSE DOWN YOUR ACCOUNT ALTOGETHER

Title: Terrible, poor, rubbish
Review: I ordered twice in two weeks and on both occasions deliveroo got the order wrong. I was issued with a voucher instead of a full refund which meant I am forced to reorder. The voucher has an expiry date, this system is highly unfair and I will be escalating this to industry standards. I have lost out both on incomplete orders and money. The company is awful, I will be deleting the app.

Title: WARNING!!!  Do not use!!!
Review: Beware of this company!  I wish I had read these reviews before placing an online order.  I meal never arrived... reason, it got delivered to the wrong address?!  They've now got your money but you need to wait 48hrs for it to be investigated?!  So I ordered another meal from a different restaurant and during the online process in check out it shows that delivery is free but when you check your back withdrawals, an extra £4+ was taken for delivery charges!  This is fraudulent, a total con and nothing short of extreme misleading marketing. Deliveroo is taking advantage of Covid vulnerable people who are self isolating and therefore relying on take away services.  Last night over £46 was taken from my bank account for one meal... the most expensive dining experience ever!!!

Title: Absolutely awful and organised service
Review: Absolutely awful and disorganised service. I actually cannot believe that the likes of Nandos and big food retailers actually work with such a terrible company. I have lost confidence in Nandos and Deliveroo. Awful. They need to improve their software application to at least find addresses. They need to improve their customer services and processes. My food was delivered to the wrong address and actually left on someone doorstep. No refund nothing. Just an apology absolutely effing ridiculous! NPS score needs to be 0% do not order through this service and definitely do not partner with them if you want to maintain brand loyalty or customer relations.

Title: WORST COMPANY EVER
Review: WORST COMPANY EVER. This is the 5th time our food hasn’t showed. Tonight it happened twice, our food just “disappeared” we call them (this happened the previous times too) & they said they can’t contact there riders. THEY CANT CONTACT THEIR EMPLOYEES?! They don’t even call you or ring the door bell but say it has been delivered? This is appalling. I can’t believe I even went back to use this company & they still repeated there actions. Never again will I order from here.

Title: Serves only it's businesses not it's customers
Review: Uninstalled this app as it's the third time I've had issues with restaurants on it! Deliveroo's customer service is non existent! No wonder they're struggling financially, and they really shouldn't be. Especially in a lockdown situation where most people are ordering in!! How Just Eat can create such a great working app & Deliveroo can't is flummoxing to say the least! I ordered from Subway at the garage near me for delivery, a delicious sounding subway melt! four layers of cheese on top of turkey, ham & crispy bacon, all toasted up nice, yum. What arrived was a cheeeless untoasted sandwich!( Yes I actually had to add my own cheese & toast the bugger myself 🤨) a queried this with deliveroo & got the standard answer we'll get back to you in a couple big day's!!! What!!! Ridiculous! I did try complaining to the restaurant but no answer on the phone. From now on I'm gonna avoid that Subway & not use Deliveroo until the reviews improve 👍

Title: Terrible experience
Review: Pretty much a similar experience as some people below. Absolutely horrible customer service. Waiting 3h for delivery without success. Contacted customer service over chat during wait time and lady offered.... £10 off next order and promised delivery will be dobe soon. Status changed to "delivered" but goods have nowhere to be seen. Phoned their customer service and refund supposed to be issued within 24h and I'll be contacted back by e-mail. Ofcourse no reply and no comunication made ever since. Contacted again after 24h and was told to wait.... another 24h. Also have to chat transcript so giving them a moment and will not leave it like that. Absolutely avoid deliveroo. It was my first and definitely the last time I have used them.

Title: Worst company ever !
Review: Worst company ever !! Don’t touch this place HorribleExperience my first time using this app. Was last night I paid £10For a Pepsi and a small kebab. It turned up looking like someone had snotty spit in the kebab. ( feel sick even now gross! ) I called the restaurant they apologised and offered full refund. Deliveroo kept me on the phone for 3 and a half hours refusing to give me a full refund. In the end they only gave me the price of the kebab. I’m disgusted because I was passed from agent to agent on the phone for 3hours while they laughed and poked fun. Your company is disgusting. I don’t even think they will refund my money but I will make sure everyone knows about my experience. I’m not even upset with the restaurant they had the decency to apologise but deliveroo were rude and abhorrent in their treatment and behaviour towards this customer. I’m sure I’m not the only one either. I kept the transcript because I don’t think the morons realised they were being monitored. And the customer can get a transcript of the conversation they passed me from one person to the next and would each come online and pretend that my contact had been disconnected when it had not been. Horrible people. DONT USE THEM. Check out other reviews if you don’t believe me.

Title: Worst experience
Review: Worst experience. Complete waste of time and money. I made an order that was not delivered but I was charged. I complained to Deliveroo but they refused to issue a refund. Appalling customer service.

Title: Thoroughbreds pizza
Review: Me and my friend tried the new pizza place called Thoroughbreds pizza. We've ordered Fun Guy pizza and garlic bread with mozzarella. Absolutely delicious pizza . Cannot wait to try different flavours. Big selection of veggie and vegan pizza's . Great pizza

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Restaurants can fraudulently advertise drinks that they don't have, then delete them from your order and refuse to let you cancel and buy elsewhere. I wouldn't have bought from them if I'd known I wouldn't get drinks with my food, but Deliveroo help is completely unhelpful and restaurants go unpunished.

Title: First time using Deliveroo and will…
Review: First time using Deliveroo and will never make use of them again. After waiting an hour for delivery we were told that our order has been delivered, on phoning we were then told they will refund us our money in 24 hours, didn’t even bother finding out if they could place the order again for us. Back to Uber eats for us!

Title: The rider left without notifying me and…
Review: The rider left without notifying me and they hardly accepted to give a refund.

Title: Don’t bother
Review: Ordered food at 8:54pm, delivery time was 9:15-9:25pm. It changed 3 more times after this, the latest delivery time being 9:50. Then the tracker changed to ‘order not accepted’!! Absolutely disgusted! Waited all that time to be told my order wouldn’t be coming! Won’t be using this company again

Title: Food never arrived, appalling customer service
Review: Ordered food at 16:55 was due to arrive by 17:45, gave it till 18:00 still not arrived so contacted chat, they could not contact the restaurant neither could I. Contacted chat another 3 times, and DM on Twitter, to say the Customer service was useless would be a compliment. Back to Uber for me!

Title: Getting a refund for missing items
Review: When getting that email that says they can't refund/credit for missing items call their phone number for live orders (it's the only one I know of that goes straight through to someone) 020 3699 9977. Explain you want a refund (be nice, it's Deliveroo that initially refused the refund not the person you're talking to) and they will refund you (well they have for me so far). Overall I've had problems with the orders but not so much with Deliveroo themselves. One driver couldn't find my address and unfortunately had limited English vocabulary so instead he just cancelled my order but that was once out of 50+ orders.

Title: Simply ridiculous...
Review: Simply ridiculous.... You take and order and it's impossible to change the delivery time before you order and also after..... Sorry but probably Deliveroo doesn't know that we are living in 2020.... I Should order directly from the restaurant.

Title: Awful. Don’t even deliver!
Review: Order never arrived. App says delivered. Contact deliveroo, they say the order was spilled and they phoned, they didn’t. Customer service person rude and unhelpful. 0 stars if I could. Never using them again. Not the first problem. Save your money and spend with a better company.

Title: Disgusting customer service
Review: Disgusting customer service, cold dishes and i have to throw away and they are not refunding claiming it may not be hot enough and they will improve. This company is a joke. if you receive cold food, you are supposed to eat it and thats their standard

Title: 0 if possible!!!
Review: 0 if possible! Ordered 2 pizzas, one arrived, when tried to tell the driver he was on the phone and simply shrugged and drove off. Contacted deliveroo who wont offer a refund! Just half on credit! Like I'd like to use them again!!!

Title: 0 stars and ridiculous customer service
Review: Order arrived almost 2 hours late and when it did it was a completely wrong order. Was promised a refund for my order and for courtesy a redelivery of my order which took another 49min  Not to forget  this was all stated on a online chat so both of us have proof.Not knowingly refund was never processed and Now asking why I never received it they are trying to say it was a miscommunication from them and they can’t do nothing about it.Very bad customer service and agents give out wrong information even with proof of this communication they are not willing to do nothing.Deliveroo is fraud as you cannot be promising people something and then telling people “my bad”!!!And now being on hold for over 40min to speak to a supervisor or manager!!

Title: Disgusting customer service
Review: Disgusting customer service, I have several restaurants. This company is a joke. Since day one Iv never spoken to anyone inside the UK who can speak English or understand my issues. They take a heavy percentage for nothing and the service they provide is vile.If your thinking of working with Deliveroo... DONTYou will regret it

Title: It is a really big shame such an…
Review: It is a really big shame such an innovative service is operated by so many incompetent people.Delivery service is absolute s**t, particularly when promising a door delivery and the drivers complain about their parking fees.

Title: Atrocious customer service do not use
Review: First time using deliveroo in Newcastle and will definitely be my last. After a long day of travelling my boyfriend decided to order a pizza. We waited about half an hour and then got our phone call to let us know the driver was outside. To our surprise he was not outside. So my boyfriend phoned the driver who did not speak English at all and all we could make out was that the driver was at a hopsital??? And then hung up the phone and wouldn’t answer again.When we rang customer service they told us they had contacted the driver and because the driver was waiting for 10 minutes outside the wrong address, he gave our £30 worth of food to homeless people. Then the advisor decided to hang up once we mentioned compensation. We then rang again and were offered £5 deliveroo voucher as compensation but we will not be using them again.

Title: Deliveroo charges restaurants 48%…
Review: Deliveroo charges restaurants 48% commission in total and sometimes up to 60% or 70% if the restaurant runs an offer. They charge 35% on the orders but they charge their commission on the VAT of an order as well pushing their rate to 48% of the net order value, which either is or should be illegal as the VAT does not belong to the restaurant or to Deliveroo. When restaurants run an offer of 20% for customers, Deliveroo charges the discount to the restaurant and keeps it for themselves. So for example if a restaurant runs a 20% offer and you make an order of £10 that is discounted to £8, deliveroo will charge the restaurant £4.8 commission on the £10, regardless if the amount paid was actually 8, they will will then charge the restaurant the £2 discount they offered you the end-consumer as a fee and keep £6.8 for themselves. From a £10 order the restaurant will receive £2.8 inclusive of VAT. This is totally preposterous with restaurants receiving 25-30% of an orders value at the end of the week!!!!!

Title: Awful customer service and misleading app
Review: Ordered takeaway through Deliveroo as a birthday treat. When it got to the delivery window the app told me the driver was waiting to pick the order up. The app then proceeded to change delivery window by 5 minutes every 5 minutes. I had to wait a full hour before the app would actually let me contact anyone at Deliveroo who informed me the restaurant had closed.I rang the restaurant and they told me my order had been sitting there for an hour and no-one had been to pick it up. The app deliberately misleads customers as to the status of the order in order to shift blame onto their restaurant partners rather than themselves.When I got in touch to complain and ask what happened, why it happened and what steps they would be taking to make sure it doesn’t happen again I just received a slew of stock responses. Unfortunately I’ve had a history of really poor service with Deliveroo and this was the straw that broke the camels back. Uber Eats has its own issues but it has cheaper delivery and better customer service so I’ll just stick to them.

Title: Pathetic app
Review: Don’t wanna give 1 star also. Drivers are pathetic. Orders are never delivered. Very bad service.

Title: My favourite app
Review: My favourite app. And has been a God sent since lockdown.When I have a problem. They are quick to resolve it. Ok I’ve had some small issues but overall I am a very happy customer and been using the app since it launched..💙

Title: Worst experience and useless costumer services …
Review: Awful first time used and I had an email to say food was delivered so contacted them they said they called twice they didn’t and didn’t ring flat buzzer just came in main door and left food on stairs which was then taken, refusing to refund as they delivered it sorry leaving on stairs it not delivering. Lost £40

Title: Driver issues
Review: The driver complained at my mum that we lived too far away as if it was her fault. The restaurant came up as on option when I typed in my postcode so he shouldn't have been taking it out on us that he had to driver further.

Title: Bad Service
Review: The food, that was delivered 30mins earlier than expected, was stone cold. They said the food order was in time, with special packaging to keep it warm :(

Title: Provided an extremely poor service
Review: Provided an extremely poor service when I was unable to receive my food. driver didn't care and took the food with him, regardless of 24 hour conceirege, and a apartment buzzer he couldn't be bothered to ring. Customer service still charged me for the food, and told me it was my problem. Companies a joke treating customers terribly. - UPDATE: they have recently called me back offering credit on deliveroo for the value of the order and also apologised for the inconvenience, I consider the issue resolved. I still think the orignal agent really was bad and would not want to deal with them again.

Title: Just awful...
Review: Just awful.... Spent 27 quid on two burgers two sides and a drink (at the time this was a sacrifice i was willing to make) and the food comes an hour later. We halved the burgers and literally the very middle of the patties were stone cold. I rang the restaurant who admitted that there werent enough drivers to accomodate the demand of the service that evening. I contacted deliveroo and they offered 13.95 credit. I responded saying it was an outrage and I should be at least receiving a full refund. After that all they said was basically theyve taken my complaint on board. Awful....

Title: Deliveroo driver in wok n go 13:20 bold…
Review: Deliveroo driver in wok n go 13:20 bold street Liverpool go too close to a drink I’d placed on a table, literally had his mouth a foot away from it. His response was ‘you should’ve hung on to it then!’ No acknowledgement that he’d entered another’s personal space what so ever. I’ll never use deliveroo since your drivers are rude and have no concept of social distancing.

Title: fees and delivery can ad up to £5 to…
Review: fees and delivery can ad up to £5 to your order

Title: This Guys are FRAUD
Review: This Guys are FRAUD , Be carefuller when making order on their site, They never deliver your order.SO , don't order from deliveroo.fr, There are Craps in France.They will take your money and never deliver you.

Title: absolute cowboys ruining the restaurant…
Review: absolute cowboys ruining the restaurant trade and delivering the worst customer service on earth.stick with the one the only slightly better apps like ubereats or even better get some menus from your local restaurants with clearly stated hygiene ratings

Title: KFC order was cold ........
Review: I got kfc from Deliveroo my order cone it was cold so I started live chat bare in Mind my order was £22.45p, all I wanted  was make them aware off my experience, instantly he said I’m not giving you a refund, so I explained I’m a customer and that the food is cold .. basically didn’t get no where but than wanted to offer me only £9.49credit and Said that was it. So after throwing to food in the bin as I don’t know how long it was sitting there to be cold not only did I have no food but lost more than half my money, head office are total rubbish aswell not helpful what so ever there excuse is that they have a large amount off Deliveirs so couldn’t re deliver, my advice don’t use these people you will lose in the long run..

Title: I wish I could rate Deliveroo zero rating!
Review: I wish I could rate them a zero star!!  Please do not use Deliveroo!! I paid for a meal which never arrived!!! Stick to Uber eats!!

Title: Used deliveroo for the first time…
Review: Used deliveroo for the first time today. Ordered a nandos and was missing 3 chips, garlic bread, halloumi sticks and peas, Was literally left just chicken.The live chat said can't help and will get back in 48 hours. Called their number and still didn't want to help. Bunch of useless C***S. No customer service at all, AVOID... SCAMMING P****S

Title: Negligent and careless
Review: Appalling. If you value your time never use this service. First order was spilt all over the bag. Deliveroo customer service blamed Wagamama. Second order exactly the same problem despite this being from another restaurant. Common denominator is Deliveroo. Refused to compensate me apart from a refund I have to wait three days for! It is now 9-15 and still no food. Disgraceful

Title: ONLY BECAUSE I COULDNT PUT ZERO!!
Review: ONLY BECAUSE I COULDNT PUT ZERO!!! Three hours we have been waiting for our food! Use a different service or walk! You could book a fishing holiday, fish, come home and cook it quicker then deliveroo will get it to you!

Title: I wanted to give zero stars!
Review: USE A DIFFERENT DELIVERY SERVICE...I wanted to give zero stars but you can't! My food order was delivered a  hour late with sides and drinks missing, the food that was delivered was cold and there was pink lipstick on a chip bag! Absolutely appalling Deliveroo Customer Service.

Title: My drink is missing for the second time…
Review: My drink is missing for the second time in a row, third time in two months time!!! First time I can forgive, but the second and third?! I feel very dissapointed as all I want is that drink really, the milkshake costs like 5.75 pounds as well...

Title: However I wanted to bring to your…
Review: However I wanted to bring to your attention a reoccurring problem I have with rating my favourite takeaways/restaurants. It flashes up on screen and before I’ve had a chance to rate 5 stars 🌟 🌟🌟🌟🌟 It disappears abruptly after I’ve touched the 1st star leaving me frustrated and unable to score my favourite ones what I want to. Please tell me how to correct the wrong ones.. Bhindis should have 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟and so should Black Sheep Cafe likewise should have my rating for it at 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

Title: Can someone from Deliveroo please tell…
Review: Can someone from Deliveroo please tell my why I'm paying for a plus membership whilst other people's deliveries are coming before mine? I don't pay for a premium service to be 2nd.

Title: Drinks leaked everywhere...
Review: Very hit & miss.  Orders often missing items or incorrect.Drinks rarely survive the process, leaking everywhere.Chap was friendly enough but that doesn't help when food you have paid for is ruined by the time it arrives.

Title: The perfect delivery service..... if you like cold food delivered way later than you wanted
Review: Deliveroo is a joke.They give you a time window for delivery, which often gets pushed back multiple times, while they still consider this to be "on time".They take orders even if they have nobody currently available to deliver it.Sometimes the person delivering your food will drive/ride around for 20 minutes or more with your food while doing other deliveries before they get to you.As a result of the above, food is sometimes delivered barely warm or even stone cold.

Title: STOLE MONEY OFF MY CARD I AM IN THE…
Review: STOLE MONEY OFF MY CARD I AM IN THE UNITED STATED AND DID NOT MAKE THESE PURCHASES !!! I want my money back this is fraud!!!

Title: How do I leave reviews for restaurant…
Review: How do I leave reviews for restaurant on Deliveroo?

Title: Over an hour late and melted
Review: Went to order from Kaspas at 8pm. Advertised 20-25 minute delivery time. After choosing items we checked out at 8.10pm. We were told it would be delivered between 8.30-8.45. Perfect! In the advertised time. We monitored the location of the driver and were advised they left the restaurant at 8.30. We watched the driver go all over and finally arrived with us at 9.23pm.  Considering our order contained icecream and took over 1 hour 10 minutes to arrive you can imagine what the icecream was like.

Title: Ordered from uncle sams for the first…
Review: Ordered from uncle sams for the first time.on menu couldnt order blue chesse dip.so call branch and advised they would change dips to help with our order. Then not getting dips to with food didnt taste right.for spending over £24.00 then not getting what you requested.i was very disappointed

Title: Try a bit harder
Review: To be fair during covid19 this has been a good service with the occasional hiccup. I think the drivers and riders choose their own routes which are not always logical and food often arrives cold. If you live in a place with lots of one way systems you're going to be unhappy half of the time. Usually refunded by deliveroo if I can be bothered to complain. They avoid feedback because there is no quick way to rate your experience on the app.

Title: Surreptitious Charges
Review: Surreptitious ChargesI ordered a takeaway and the delivery in the top right hand corner came up as £2.48. I pressed the pay button and a window appeared stating I would be charged £3.48 because I had changed my address. I then cancelled the process thinking it was an error as I had not changed my address. I then pressed pay again and the message did not appear but I was charged £3.48. I also paid .48 for customer services admin charge. I have notified them three times and I get the same message that there prices are clear when you purchase. This is not the case because I should not have been charged £3.48, and as they have not dealt with the issue satisfactorily I should not have been charged the .48 customer service fee.

Title: terrible company
Review: terrible company. fake reviews. closed ecosystem pushing their own low grade food as and crap restaurants that play their game and pay higher fees

Title: Awful
Review: Awful. Random voice message received from them and they marked my food as delivered yet it hadn’t been. Rang to advise driver tired to deliver it but couldn’t, I asked if she could maybe try again, was told it’s normally eaten by the driver if not delivered !!!! Did get a full refund though after I was initially offered a credit note

Title: I have never had a problem with…
Review: I have never had a problem with deliveroo... I’ve had food that didn’t taste nice/ cold ect and incorrect items a couple times from co-op but that’s not deliveroos fault that’s the restaurants! All the people moaning on here about there tasted bland ect well it’s not deliveroo that make your food is it!! No so you should leave a review to the restaurant for those reasons not deliveroo

Title: I really rate Deliveroo in the Sheffield city area
Review: Deliveroo have being fantastic throughout the pandemic. I have used them a lot for emergency groceries (Co-op, Morrisons) and some takeaway food deliveries.
