In the Sheffield area they have being great! Very friendly drivers, no cancelled deliveries at busy times and the only dispute I had for a missing item was refunded straight away. I would definitely recommend Deliveroo in this area.

Title: Thankful for the delivery cyclist that…
Review: Thankful for the delivery cyclist that delivered my food. I have to say during this time but its bad that you're charging so much for delivery

Title: Absolute waste of time
Review: Absolute waste of time! Ordered food to pick up outside of Nados ( as the click and collect amp was not working ) and was on Time instead of the driver!. Leaving it back in nados for us to collect He drove off with our food!. I would not recommend my worst enemy! Using them! And well not be using them again!!!

Title: To be honest the best customer for…
Review: My previous review while lived down south: "To be honest the best customer for delivery service. Always had my problems resolved. The only issue is the delivery price is very high"Now I am editing it since I moved up north: "SORRY LOVE I WONT DELIVER IT TO YOUR FLAT COME DOWNSTAIRS OR I WILL LEAVE" Yeah right. Paid the same as London guys with cheaper quality of life!

Title: "We cant offer you CREDIT right now"
Review: How dare they!Here is my experience in a nutshell, order food, don't receive food but instead receive this automated email - AVOID at all costs:Hi chris,Thanks for getting in touch.Our restaurant partners and riders do their best to get your order to you in perfect condition.We’re sorry that you received incorrect items. We can’t offer you credit right now.We will take your feedback on board and work on improving the experience next time.If you’d like to contact our customer service team at support@deliverooDOTCODOTUK they can look into this further for you.

Title: Easy to order and the food it's was…
Review: Easy to order and the food it's was delicious. we will order again.Thanks

Title: Ho ordinato da mc Donald's due menu goloso
Review: Ho ordinato da mc Donald's due menu small il goloso è però arrivato solo un panino

Title: Awful customer service!
Review: Awful customer service!! Ordered some burgers which arrived completely moulding and been told our refund can take up to 72 hours to even be accepted!!

Title: If I could leave zero stars I would
Review: If I could leave zero stars I would. Ordered a meal which arrived cold and was bland - a complete waste of money. Complained to Deliveroo who initially said they would send a voucher for 50% back. Told them not good enough and they said that is all they would do. After more emails they said the refund would go back onto my card as requested. I've emailed Wagamama for the other 50%. Explained I am Autistic and this whole process was stressful and not streamlined in the slightest. It is one of the worst customer services I have ever dealt with.

Title: Worst experience ever
Review: Worst experience ever . Ordered food to wait for an hour and got a ring that delivery is outside . Went to get it and saw no one . Then again received a call saying driver is at the wrong address and couldn’t locate this address.Asked me to order again and when I did there restaurant was closed . Worst ever service , won’t be using them ever again

Title: Disgraceful
Review: Disgraceful. Order made, it was clearly not my order and Deliveroo have been informed. The food we received was binned as it was already 20 minutes late and not ours. They have given a credit note of 50% against a future order...not good enough, refund the full (unlike my stomach) amount you cheapskates, I don't order often enough for this to be relevant. I will be contacting my credit card company to refund the order.

Title: I would actually give you a rating 0 Stars
Review: I would actually give you a rating 0 stars after the appalling service we received from you last night. We made an order for Hubbox using Deliveroo at 6.50pm at 8.30pm our order had not been received so we chased Deliveroo to be told it would be 7 mins. At 9pm we still had no order and chased through web chat to be told the restaurant was closed and our order had been cancelled. We were in contact with Hubbox who told us that they had prepared our order twice and nobody from Deliveroo had been to collect. When we spoke to Hubbox at 9pm after Deliveroo cancelled our order they were still prepared to make our order again but Deliveroo refused to collect it. The real stars are Hubbox as we collected our order from them ourselves  tonight and they gave it to us for free due to the poor service by Deliveroo. Deliveroo you could do with learning about customer service from Hubbox otherwise you will continue to lose customers. We will certainly not be using you again and your customer service response to our complaint was also very poor.

Title: Had to give one star so that I could…
Review: Had to give one star so that I could write this.otherwise it would have been zero. Ordered a meal from Wagamama waited 45 minutes and received a message on the app saying it had been delivered 5 mins early. Not to me hadn't. Phoned Wagamama who said we would have to contact deliveroo. Contacted them and told them what had happened, and was told I would have to go online and re-order my meal and pay for it again and they would arrange a refund for the first one. I said what if he delivers to the wrong address again, to be told that the pin on the App was showing the wrong street and that I would have to go into the App and change it to my address. If the rider can't read the proper  address he should not be delivering food. I will not use Deliveroo again I will stick to JUST EAT who never get it wrong.

Title: Uber eats much better
Review: Unlike Uber eats you can not customise an order , you also can not add to your order once your order has been placed

Title: customer service non existent
Review: I ordered food from Marks and Spencer, the fresh chicken and sausages has tomorrows date on, I expected at least 3 days but usually get more. I complained to Deliveroo who told me I have to phone Marks and Spencer directly, they delivered the order so they should sort it. Is this response even legal?

Title: Ordered off Burger King and they missed…
Review: Ordered off Burger King and they missed an item. Burger King were useless and blamed the driver even though they clearly didn't put the item in themselves. Contacted deliveroo and they weren't the most useful either.

Title: Deliveroo - A Bunch of Legalised Thieves
Review: Received an order with items missing, immediately notified Deliveroo and placed another order.  Heard nothing from them within the supposed two days it takes for them to reply only to be told that I hadn't reported the problem according to their system. Suspect the "person" at the other end of the live chat was a bot or else told to follow company script. It wouldn't take a genius to look at my order history to work out that something had gone wrong. Would give zero star rating if possible.

Title: Rubbish customer service when there is a problem
Review: We have used Deliveroo twenty-nine times over the past three years. Usually our experience has been good to fine. Yesterday was a different story, however. The food arrived within the hour but was the wrong order - the deliverer was very apologetic, saying she had given or order to someone else. She sat outside, I presume messaging Deliveroo to reorder. We then heard nothing for the next hour while the app said the order had been delivered. Eventually my partner rang the restaurant and they were very apologetic but said we should talk to Deliveroo, in London. He rang them and had a difficult conversation trying to get them to understand the problem. The correct order arrived an hour and a half after the wrong order, so about two and a half hours after we ordered. When emailed Deliveroo customer service have sent out a standard response, 'we cannot give a refund as you received your order...'. By the time it arrived we had lost our appetites - most of it is still sitting in the kitchen, uneaten. Very poor customer service - I doubt I will use them again, collecting would have been so much easier and more pleasant.

Title: Would have given it zero stars if I…
Review: Would have given it zero stars if I could. Two orders in a row from the same place they left items off my order but they dont have a problem charging me for deliveroo plus when my free trial ended. Complete joke of a company. Will never waste my money on these clowns ever again.

Title: Very poor service
Review: Very poor service, i waited 2 hours for a dessert delivery. Upon arrival the desserts were spilt in bags with open lids.Dont waste your money. Disgusting service.

Title: Doesn’t even deserve a star
Review: Doesn’t even deserve a star. Rubbish customer service.

Title: Fraudulently taken my money for 10…
Review: Fraudulently taken my money for 10 months despite dozens of conversations they still have not dealt with it and took yet another payment today!  Have now had to open a fraud case with my bank - will never order from here again.

Title: For us, Deliveroo is the best delivery service
Review: We usually order our weekly takeaway through Deliveroo and if there have been issues, we have never had problems with either getting a full refund or partial refund if items have been missing. In addition, it’s the same 3 delivery guys that deliver our food. Always friendly and more often than not, our food is delivered early. For us, Deliveroo is without question the best delivery service. Im surprised to see so many poor reviews as we have not had any negative experiences with Deliveroo

Title: They do not deserve a rating
Review: They do not deserve a rating. They took no responsibility for delivering crap food and taking the money. The restaurant were apologetic but said Deliveroo needed to be contacted regarding reimbursement but Deliveroo were not interested and refused to help

Title: Order late and rider never arrived
Review: Order late and rider never arrived, just the live chat they help. But i don't know what happen to my order and tge driver is lost!!! Never anymore

Title: Fricken fuming
Review: Fricken fuming! Order never arrived, and when I checked the update on my order it had apparently already been delivered. So it must have meant the delivery guy had dropped off my order to a completely different address... I’m guessing the courier did not know exactly where my address is. If that’s the case they should have called me. There are contact details there for a reason (smh).I could be saying worse but luckily the man I spoke to on the Deliveroo contact line was very lovely and helpful, giving me back a full refund and apologised on behalf of the courier with no common sense.

Title: Consistently useless.
Review: Deliveroo is one of these companies where the concept is great but the customer service is absolutely useless!! I made a complaint and it took a week for someone to come back to me, and this was only through me sending a further two follow ups. They delivered the wrong order, which had been sealed incorrectly and spilt all over our carpet and doormat when we took it out of the drivers bag. We then spent a Friday night cleaning up somebody else’s order - which is obviously exactly how I wanted to spend my Friday night!! The driver Louis was actually really helpful throughout and was a credit to the company. The call I got from deliveroo to ask the seemingly pointless question of if I still wanted my food and to apologise was as useless as always. I then wrote a customer complaint to which their clearly automated response was that they have taken my feedback onboard and will make improvements but cannot provide any compensation on this occasion. A great idea but poor execution. The food is usually great but that isn’t down to deliveroo, some serious improvement needed on their side.

Title: Utter crap
Review: Utter crap. Said they had delivered when they hadn't and then tried to tell me it was my fault but wouldn't say why. Had to speak to 3 people to get a refund because the staff on live chat kept hanging up. They only got one star because I couldn't give them less. Seriously, one to avoid.

Title: I have had two transactions taken from…
Review: I have had two transactions taken from my bank account from Deliveroo that I did not order or authorise! Quite a large sum too! Terrible I would never expect this from this company.

Title: How come are you taking 11.49 monthly…
Review: How come are you taking 11.49 monthly from my account? I occasionally buy food and give tips BUT my drinks never arrives AFTER BEEN PAID. Never no apologies nor offered a solution. Now I struggle with my Bank to stop the monthly transactions. This is a very sad, depressing and bad service.

Title: Every time I ordered with Deliveroo I…
Review: Every time I ordered with Deliveroo I had bad experience. Sometimes the food arrived poorly, pancakes upside down, other times it showed we received the order and we never did receive it, other times they'd cancel after calling to ask why it's so late. Now I ordered and it already shows late 20 minutes. I just don't get it why this company is still working or why they don't improve their services, it's frustrating.

Title: Uncaring all round Service
Review: Deleted App as several paid for items were not delivered. Everything was in stock when store confirmed Order. Customer service refunded some of the money, but would of preferred the items redelivered instead.  Re ordered missing items using the App BUT costing me more money for delivery charges each time. Deliveroo was reliable, now it is not.

Title: Cold food, poor customer service
Review: Cold food, terrible customer service (a bot within the app to brush off complaints), therefore deleted app. with other delivery options, never experienced it before or since. Deliveroo is a total waste of time and money. And judging from the other complaints here and the overall rating I can see I'm not the only one...

Title: Account hacked with £608 of wine…
Review: Account hacked with £608 of wine purchases made during the night and delivery address changed 3 times. trying to be helped by the customer service but at no avail

Title: Incredibly bad customer service. First and Last time!
Review: Incredibly bad customer service.I have been trying to use a voucher provided by my employer, however I cannot.I wrote to Deliveroo customer service via their online form and email, and got a vague response, obviously customer service sent me a templated response without even checking my Deliveroo profile, nor the voucher, after 10 days, and only 3 responses from Deliveroo, I haven't resolved my problem.As soon as I am able to use my voucher, I will leave the Deliveroo platform. Uber eats and other platforms are much better, and don't come up with so many excuses to solve problems as Deliveroo does.No wonder that Deliveroo is struggling financially as a company, who would want to be a long term customer of such a bad service, right?

Title: First and Last time!
Review: Restaurant was very fast but Deliveroo can't deliver within an hour, cold food arrived. They didn't seem to care. 0/5 and deleted app, Back to Uber Eats.

Title: My food was stolen
Review: My food was stolen. I told Deliveroo immediately. They told me someone will email me in the AM. Woke up to a email saying my account has been closed. Not heard nothing since.

Title: My Deliveroo account was hacked
Review: Yesterday i had my bank contacting me confirming some unusual transactions made on my card. I confirmed it wasnt me and checked my bank to see 2 deliveroo transactions i didnt make. Checked my emails and someone had hacked my account and used my bank details on there to put 5 orders through, 2 thay were accepted and delivered and 3 of which were luckily declined once my bank were able to intervene and stop it.Deliveroo had sent me an email to say there was a new log in on my account that seemed suspicious and to reply if this wasnt me, but still allowed the order to go through anyway before my confirmation.My bank have had to cancel my card and send me a new one and now Im chasing up deliveroo for 40pounds worth of food bought fraudulently with my deliveroo details.I unfortunately dont feel my details are safe and will no longer use their service

Title: How rude
Review: How rude. Use my parking bay then drive off being rude at me shouting threw my kitchen window.  When I asked him not to park they politely.  I have now deleted their app will use Uber eats

Title: DO NOT USE DELIVEROO !!!
Review: I ordered from one of my favourite Moroccan restaurant thru deliveroo.The app showed the rider had left the restaurant and then showed it delivered. I went outside and found a bag of 2 meals from a different restaurant ??  How on earth can this happen? (Unsafe data management I think.) when I asked for a refund from Deliveroo they refused. This cowboy outfit needs to be investigated by trading standards.. Avoid at all costs.

Title: Disappointing customer service
Review: Food arrived but it looked as though it had been dropped or squashed, one of the containers was broken- crushed and sauce had leaked out from one container into another as a result, the bottom of the bag was also ripped, plus there was an item missing. I sent a picture to Deliveroo of the mess I received and asked for a refund, but never received one :( I tend to use Deliveroo because they have a larger choice of options to order from in comparison to other companies that deliver here, but I'm continually disappointed by their customer service.

Title: Sitting  in the sun decided  to order …
Review: Sitting  in the sun decided  to order  some food. Picked an order from Burger King it arrived within 25 minutes  piping  hot. When i logged into my app i saw that they now deliver fron the co.op  so thought id give it a try. Ordered essentials eggs milk etc came  within 20 was so impressed  the times  i have queued outside supermarkets  just to get essentials  this has made a difference.  Well done guys

Title: Unsafe service!
Review: Had my deliveroo account hacked and deliveroo sent me an email saying there was a new sign in to my account but they still accepted the order anyway! Didn’t even wait for me to confirm it was me so I had £56 taken out of my account. I phoned them and they closed my account and said the accounts team will phone me within 72 hours to organise a refund and it’s been nearly a week and I’m still waiting. Do not feel safe using this service again!

Title: Absolutely disgusting!!
Review: Absolutely disgusting!!! Customer service is outrageous. Disgusting company. Spent £60 and forgot half our meal. Ring customer service got through to London and had an argument  with them over they can’t send half the order and give us nothing back. What an utter cheek of a company.

Title: Cappadocia and deliveroo
Review: Find it hard to give one star. Useless , delivered food 49 minutes late after watching the halfwit moped rider seemingly drop off up the 7 other meals.  Stone cold and congealed food from cappadocia in Kingston. Half a mile up the road. Beware of both of them. If you pay for a delivery it should come to you straight away not just one of 10 deliveries in his box. Interesting deliveroo don’t have a feedback form.

Title: Horrible Customer Service & Company
Review: Never used this company before. I had to download it as the restaurant I wanted to order from was not in UberEats. Big mistake.Ended up food not being delivered and already tipped the rider £2. He was probably way too happy with it as he was impossible to reach. Trying to get a refund still. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

Title: 1 star is being generous
Review: 1 star is being generous. Myself and my partner are not able to go out at the moment and we desperately needed some shopping bits, some of the delivery prices are reasonable but the price of some of the groceries is disgusting, when we looked at getting items delivered from our local shop (and we know how much things cost) the prices were a joke. Many of the items were £1s more per item compared to what the items were costing when we were able to go to the shop ourselves. All companies seem to be doing during this pandemic is exploiting people.

Title: AWFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE
Review: ordered food for my family 6pm - it is now 8pm and I am still waiting for my food! I was advised by deliveroo on a LIVE CHAT that they cannot help as they aren't the company delivering the food. It is being delivered direct from the restaurant so there isn't anything they can do. So why are you advertising this company on your site? My daughter who usually goes to bed at 8pm is still sat here waiting.... deliveroo won't help and told me to take it up with the restaurant. Thank you deliveroo you have been amazing... NOT. Will never use them again to deliver ANYTHING! Awful customer service!

Title: Ordered food which when it arrived was…
Review: Ordered food which when it arrived was stone cold.  On contacting them I was informed someone would get back to me within 24hrs.  On receiving an email from their Customer Service they stated they would not refund money on this occasion.  I eventually managed to speak to a customer service advisor and on informing her of the issue of cold food she wasn’t interested and simply said the same as the initial correspondence.  I then wrote another email which outlined their so called policy of a full refund if the food was cold.  Overall they go against their own policy and also of Consumer rights.  Will now take the food back to the restaurant where it was purchased.

Title: garbage customer service
Review: garbage customer service, they refuse to change the delivery address or refund or even contact the driver leading him to a wrong address and i end up with no food or refund. deliveroo is a scamming delivery service base on their stupid rules, strongly recommend ubereats instead.

Title: THIS IS THE WORST DELIVERY COMPANY…
Review: THIS IS THE WORST DELIVERY COMPANY EVER! absolutely awful, rude staff. they don’t even deliver what you ask for and I got an allergic reaction due to them putting something else in my order. I should take further action as they were abusive in emails and threatened to have me deleted from deliveroo website.

Title: Delivered everything we asked for
Review: Delivered everything we asked for. It was hot and the driver was curtious.

Title: Don’t waste your time.....they promote…
Review: Don’t waste your time.....they promote rubbish restaurants 👎

Title: their driver cant wait ten twenty…
Review: their driver cant wait ten twenty minutes for an order they are so inpatient and very unprofessional and rude and arrogant and their so no respect

Title: Disappointing and unapologetic
Review: Late, dishonest, frustrating, understaffed.

Title: A* Delivery
Review: The driver (Mas**d) was very cooperative in finding the right place. I would recommend this service to anyone. Thank you!

Title: If you drove sensibly people's food would arrive in one piece...
Review: Third time in a row that due to the way the motorbike drivers speed around, the food had leaked everywhere and then the paper bag being so soggy gave way before he passed it to me.Called customer services and asked who they'd send to clean up the mess but after being transferred to the manager she just hung up on me.Food was reordered and arrived 30 minutes after original order time.Your loss Deliveroo as in London we can now use Supper or Uber Eats.  Recommend everyone does the same as your food is treated with more respect.  As I say once might be forgivable, but this was the third time and to then be hung up on was what tipped me over the edge to ensure I never use again.

Title: Food never arrived
Review: Food never arrived. Also, "full refund" doesn't mean the money is returned to your credit card / bank account, instead it stays with Deliveroo for future orders. Can't wait to place my final order with them.

Title: Incomplete delivery, family meal spoiled
Review: Similar experience to many others, £50 order delivered with missing items, told by customer 'service' 48 hours before any action could be taken. So family treat spoiled because only some had food. Deliveroo is a good idea done badly.

Title: Good app in Brugge
Review: in Bruges,Belgium this is a really good app only a bit expensive i never had something delivered outside the delivery time and there are so many options and the drivers here are also friendly

Title: Disgusting
Review: This is not regarding the food since it never arrived..No support offered and flat out refused a refund from the get go and still fighting them for it.Customer service team are unhelpful and misdirecting, they will tell you it’s being looked into when it isn’t, anything just to get you off the phone or chat.. Worst customer service experience of my entire life at 31

Title: I would not recommend.
Review: I would not recommend.Food delivery arrived over 30 mins past the expected time - the food arrived cold and messy (pizza boxes transported on their side). Food also arrived in an Uber Eats courier that did not speak English and no apology. I left a message on the order for them to buzz up to be let in, but the message was ignored. Long wait for a refund to be issued so we had to order food elsewhere in the meanwhile.

Title: Deliveroo - misleading menu, poor service
Review: Menu incorrect, our order was delivered with missing items. Contacted the resturant, they said this was know, but we had to complain to Deliveroo, which we did.  Deliveroo conformed the menu was misleading but said we had to wait for a email to get a correct order refund.  I asked for the order to be rectified there and then but said I had to wait for an email! As of 3 hours later no email, joke.  Do not use Deliveroo, we have used uber eats for 2 years with no issue. So, so disappointed !!!!

Title: Poor help experience when items missing
Review: Placed an order for delivery. Was delivered however with a missing main dish. Pressed "Help" in the app and marked the missing item. Rather than be given an option to have it delivered, the message is simply "we will contact you within 2 days". Not helpful when multiple diners place a single order and actually want to eat together. Poor product experience and no real-time help when ordering at dinner time. Fail. I will stick with Uber Eats.

Title: DELIVEROO DON'T CARE ABOUT NHS
Review: Order No6242. Absolutely pathetic service. Ordered meal for 6 of us to be delivered at the Luton & Dunstable Hospital parking to help the driver to not be lost in the big hospital. Delivered 1 meal less, when called Deliveroo to complain on the phone, response was rude and pathetic. Plainly refused to get the missing meal delivered. Do not have complaints system, instead of logging my complaint I was told to raise my concerns by e-mail - classic don't care attitude, you speak to a weird non English person in an overseas call centre, no concept of customer service. I even spoke to the manager who was as useless as his other staff member. Beware of these thugs, extremely unprofessional Company.

Title: Food doesn't arrive
Review: I ordered a meal, the driver was clearly most and rather than calling marked it as delivered. I called up, they were hesitant to believe me and only offered credit. Absolute shambles - hire competent delivery crew.

Title: Bad experience and this is only my second order
Review: This is my second order with them and they did not delivered my meal so not good at all.The driver was also lying pretending he left my food on the front of my door which they did not. I got a refund but I am starving. They distroy my evening.

Title: Absolutely rubbish
Review: Absolutely rubbish. The driver didn’t reply to me on the phone. Kept buzzing in but didn’t enter the building at all. Said they had been there for 10 minutes waiting but completely a lie because he had messaged us himself after like 2 minutes saying he left. Didn’t even get a refund. They really think I’m going to order again AND pay again.

Title: Wouldnt even recommend 1star
Review: Wouldnt even recommend 1star. Absolutely disgusting service. Ordered my food and sat with my door wide open awaiting delivery to get a notification saying "delivered" so I got in touch with customer service to be told I'll get a refund in 48 hours... when I kept asking where the actual food is or what's happened too it they then cut me off and kept repeating 48 hours... well I'm not being funny but it's very rare I can afford a take away and for them to take my money and then gotta wait 48 hours to get it back it's already late so now I've got to cook, I dont mind cooking but I have a severe back issue thays playing up hence why i ordered food to be delivered but once again you took my money and didnt deliver the food and now I have to wait 48 hours!! Ridiculous.

Title: Zero rating from me
Review: Zero rating from me, used them four times now and three of the orders were screwed up or not delivered, the last one the driver had left the food outside the door and not called me, we were at a premier inn!! phoned up for a refund and they wanted to give me a credit instead! Deleting app now. Ordered dominos, perfect delivery on time as always.

Title: If I could give a Zero I would
Review: If I could give a Zero I would. Every delivery seems to have a problem with it which I understand is not particularly Deliveroo's fault (more the delivery people and the restaurants) but they are responsible nonetheless as the company that is marketing and charging for the service. You would hope that when an order arrives very late, or the food that arrives is not what was ordered, or if the order is cancelled, they would understand this has put you out and at least be commiseratory even if they did not offer some sort of financial compensation. None of this was the case tonight and I won't be using them again. The idea is great but do not count on them to deliver even the core aspects of their business.How a company run like this got so big is beyond me.

Title: Oro Pizza..tastic!!!
Review: Ordered from Oro Pizza and Chicken at Seaham. Had a £20 voucher for Deliveroo through Sky. Lad on the phone was really helpful when site was not open-after that, ordered and came within 20 minutes which is brilliant as asked because mam is diabetic. All was sppt on-really tasty Cheesburgers and Onion Rings. Piping hot and Calzone was chock full of meat -Amazing quality with pleasant staff. Makes a nice change!

Title: The delivery guy lost my delivery
They are rude and dont tell the truth
Review: They are rude and ont tell the truth. I ordered from a company for a 2 hour delivery . After three hours I phoned the company to be told it was never coming that day . Would be next day. Next day afternoon came. Spoke again to company who said deliveroo cancelled order and gave me refund. I cannot find refund and on a live chat the stupid person kept telling me that they would have to contact company to see where the order was . IT WAS NEVERSENT!

Title: Order Never arrived
Review: Awful, placed an order for over for £90 never arrived!! deliveroo said their policy is not to refund new customer's they have to wait 48 hours!  It never took them 48 hours to take my money. I will  request the bank charge back my money thieves. I have also reported them to trading standards unlawfully refusing to refund me. It was the first and last time I order from them never again.

Title: Simply awful
Review: Simply awful, order value >£100 goes missing, then shows as delivered(not to me) then an identical order is pending for delivery 2hrs later. After queuing for CS agent, she told me driver screwed up, order was given to the homeless, and she would issued full refund and not charge me cancellation fee(aw bless)

Title: Always delivered on time
Review: Always delivered on time, no issues here!!

Title: I've used Deliveroo on about 4…
Review: I've used Deliveroo on about 4 occasions now. It has been perfect every time. Will def be using again :)

Title: Never ordered from this company
Review: Never ordered from this company, had £32 scamed on our card, how the hell they got the details is beyond me and were not replying to our messages to get it sorted, awful company!

Title: Absolutely awful wish I would have read…
Review: Absolutely awful wish I would have read the reviews before using Deliveroo. My order was almost 2 hours late the people who I spoke to was far from helpful it seemed like they didn’t want to cancel my order or even suggest a way to resolve the issue. When my delivery finally got here the driver was rude I watched her chuck my food down on the floor didn’t even knock my door and walked off! Disgusting service by the time I got my delivery we had already eaten and my children had gone to bed!!

Title: Terrible terrible service drivers…
Review: Terrible terrible service drivers absolute joke littrily rude and food gets there cold because they dont care fact is the poor restaurant that cooked it gets the blame when it was ready on time just all down to the lazy drivers

Title: Poor customer service
Review: We had trouble with them in the past, but thought we'd try again now since times are strange. We ordered from a local restaurant which messed up our order - not Deliveroo's fault. But the app gave no way to contact the restaurant to request a solution, just a complex form asking what was wrong in the order, which did not allow me to enter the accurate details in one go. Soon after filling it in, I got an unsolicited call from someone claiming to be from Deliveroo, whose accent was very thick and hard to understand, but who I could work out was asking for my date of birth. I refused, because nobody should be calling unsolicited and asking for personal data.The fact is that Deliveroo want to take a cut of the food-providing service, but are doing little quality control on the suppliers and are doing the bare minimum of customer service when things go wrong. Provide a more effective problem resolution issue in your app, and employ people who can speak clearly if they're going to work in call centres.

Title: You can’t give 0 stars but if I could
Review: You can’t give 0 stars but if I could, I would. Terrible Company. Have taken money from my account for good that were never received. Now I am seeking a refund from this there is radio silence. Have had to report it as a fraudulent deduction with my bank. Was reluctant to use them again as both my partner and I experienced our accounts being hacked with no support from Deliveroo. Have deactivated my account and certainly won’t be using ever again.

Title: I never write reviews usually but this…
Review: I never write reviews usually but this is incredibly disappointing. My food never arrived yet when I contacted them they claimed it was delivered but I never received it. Then they tried to blame it on the restaurant but the restaurant told me to contact Deliveroo so it was a back and forth waste of time and money. I would just switch to Uber eats these people don’t deserve your money. Customer service incredibly rude

Title: Unsafe!! Hacked account
Review: My account yesterday was hacked and used to order £70 worth of alcohol. Tried to cancel the order as soon as i could but according to deliveroos app this wasn’t available. Phoned my bank they said they have no idea how this could of happened and i need to contact deliveroo asap. When I finally got in contact, there was zero apology and no explanation. It was unlikely my card had been cloned according to my bank. Sending out a warning to customers using deliveroo as ur details are not safe at all !! Please remove any personal details from the app! still waiting for a phone call of apology, was told on the phone my refund would take 24-72 hours but then had an email saying could take from 5-10 days so zero communication from their part. Your website is not safe!!

Title: Delivery drivers should learn how to…
Review: Delivery drivers should learn how to read. What's the point inputting "Driver Instructions" option if it's just going to be a suggestion for drivers. I'm literally paying for you to deliver which essentially goes towards your wages and your going to argue with me.

Title: So many bodged orders
Review: So many bodged orders. Terrible customer service. I'm done with them. Never again!

Title: refused to credit missing food
Review: We ordered 3 meals and one meal was missing when delivered.  after emailing deliveroo they refused to give us credit for the missing meal or send the meal out.

Title: Waste of money
Review: Waste of money! terrible dinner missing item and rude customer service!

Title: It was a worst experience i ever had in…
Review: It was a worst experience i ever had in my life!!! I have ordered coffee from starbucks, it took one hour to be delivered, obviously by the time my coffee was cold already. I have sent a location pin twice to the driver, but somehow he end up going to the wrong place. When i finally got my cup of coffee half of it was spilled...... never will order through delivroo again ....

Title: Absolutely ridiculous
Review: Absolutely ridiculous. NEVER, EVER USE DELIVEROO! We had decided we wanted takeaway so ordered taco bell. Long story short, they arrived late, gave us the wrong order which was lukewarm, lied to us on customer service saying they would send a reorder and actually hadn't, and refused refunds.Not happy.

Title: Terrible customer service and…
Review: Terrible customer service and ridiculously high delivery charges which is especially annoying when their drivers doing multiple drops at the same time and your food arrives cold!

Title: Very poor customer service
Review: Very poor customer service. Close the chat window if you don't respond within 2 minutes even when they can see you are typing and your issue hasn't been resolved. A mistake with my order meant I recieved a main meal that had meat (I'm vegetarian) AND ingredients I have an adverse reaction to. Luckily, I noticed this before I ate any. I was only issued a partial refund and initially only as a credit note, which I had to complain to have issued as an actual refund. They've raised delivery charges ridiculously during COVID & it's hard not to interpret their credit notes as transparent ways to rip off customers further by making them repay these costs to get a replacement meal.

Title: I have not used Deliveroo in a while…
Review: I have not used Deliveroo in a while and when they first came to London they were great and they do have a really good variety of restaurants etc. However, it had been a while since I had used them and I have to say I am not impressed. I often get told that my driver is making a delivery before mine (which in terms of logistic and the environment is understandable) however, what this has lead to is less that lukewarm food which when you are paying for delivery (and now their new thing) of a service fee, I expect my food to be reasonably hot but unfortunately this has not been the case even from establishments that are less than 10 minutes drive away. Or I have an issue with a driver sitting outside a restaurant for almost 15 minutes once my order had been collected (this was according to their GPS) and yet again my food was almost cold. Their service has gone down, and Uber Eats are are now my first choice.

Title: Doesn’t deserve Even one star
Review: Doesn’t deserve Even one star! Do not use this or any food delivery app. They are not safe!My daughters Deliveroo account was hacked And they spent nearly £130 on two separate food orders that then got delivered to our house! This happened within the space of half an hour. Fortunately I have online banking open on my phone and blocked my card otherwise I’m sure they’d have ordered more, wasn’t the first amount enough imagine if I didn’t have cash in my account. Going overdrawn without a overdraft facility setup interest Mmmmm. It was a almighty shock and I contacted Deliveroo straight away. They were extremely unhelpful and unapologetic towards my experience. I’ve had to get the action fraud involved as two crimes have been committed. Deliveroo haven’t acknowledged they have a huge security problem or even acknowledged responsibility. My bank are now dealing with Deliveroo and they are hopeful I’ll get my money back but it could take 4 weeks or more.This has been a real eye opener for me, the police and bank advisor both said similar things have happened to them using other Food delivery Sites. This is also very damaging for the restaurants as they are losing  money to these sites every time we order. People if you can walk or drive to your restaurants and collect your order then my advise do so. I know it’s a convenience having food delivered to our homes watching television feet up. Then you hear ding dong or in our case the dog barking her head off. But please trust me seriously don’t use deliveroo am telling you me am done. Never again

Title: I have been using Deliveroo during this…
Review: I have been using Deliveroo during this whole pandemic. I have had some good experiences but some very bad, for example, getting sick from an order. Cold food, wrong items, damaged items, poor standards of food. I usually order at least twice a day from Deliveroo. I got refunded today for items which were inedible and when I tried to place an order it won’t work. I was told by customer services several times it can take up to 72 hours to resolve this! I mean what about vulnerable elderly people for example who rely on them to eat at the moment. Say this happened to them and they didn’t know how to go about using technology to order somewhere else. I mean they would be without for 72 hours! It is ridiculous that they cannot sort this out quicker. From looking at other reviews on here I can see that Deliveroo will eventually go out of business... I have no doubt most likely in the near future and rightly so.

Title: Honestly I don't even know where to…
Review: Honestly I don't even know where to begin. Couple of days have passed already, so that bad feeling has somewhat calmed down.Couple days back we made an order, when placing an order it said delivery time up to 10mins. After order was confirmed it moved to 40 mins. OK. Stuff happens. Gladly we only had waited 30 mins, I go open the door the order has been put on by the front door no bags nothing. I questioned the driver as I thought there was supposed to be more items than what they had bought over. The driver instantly called the restaurant, and put it on loudspeaker so I could speak to the restaurant. The restaurant man completely ignored my question - to why there's less items than what I ordered. Insulted me, and told the driver to pick up the order and cancel it. And left. I quickly called the restaurant, asking why was the order taken back. I got INSULTED, SHOUTED AT AND THREATENED! All by that restaurant man. Of course I tried to get in touch with deliveroo. Call lines are not available, so it's all via chat and email. I was told to wait 24 hours, then again 24 - 48 hours and now again 24hours. Can I also add that the order was still going live for couple of hours after the driver left me with my order. And money was charged!! So no sign of my money being refunded, looks as if that restaurant is still operating, no real explanation on what they decide to do with this. Luckily I have a video recording of what's gone on.Overall its been a horrible experience

Title: Can NO delivery ‘service’ get anything right?
Review: This dodgy service sent me a partial refund for some reason, I told them this and I was told to wait 10 working days for the remaining which I did and to contact them if the rest wasn’t received. After emailing them back I was told the refund was sent WHICH IT WASNT. I replied saying it was only partial and now I haven’t heard from them since. There needs to be stricter punishments for these dodgy companies, they’re all nightmares!

Title: Food was never delivered
Review: Food was never delivered, customer service was shockingly bad, refused to compensate for goods not received, have had to escalate to my bank.Deliveroo subcontract and allow for food to be delivered directly by restaurant. Food never turned up, 2 hours later after asking for numerous refunds, restaurant had incorrect trading name and number on their app.Customer service since has been dismissive, uneducated and rude. Can't seem to read an email without replying to the content. Have explained my primary contract is with Deliveroo and they are responsible for goods received, I shouldn't be chasing second parties or having to argue.Since writing this I have now received an email reimbursing for the full amount, I still stand with my above comments. I begrudge leaving negative reviews and would much rather praise and highlight the positives.I will think again before using

Title: REFUSED REFUND
Review: Ordered from a certain restaurant and my food arrived freezing cold. I reported this to Deliveroo to which they told me due to the fact my food arrived on time they can’t issue me a refund! I contact the restaurant who profusely apologised and agreed I deserved a refund however because I had ordered it through Deliveroo I would have to go through them to get the refund.After 2 live chats and 3 emails which take 24hours for a reply from each I get told by what appears to be a robot repeating itself that I can’t get a refund because it arrived on time. So frustrating and upsetting. Due to the current circumstances we are having to rely on delivery services you would think that the so called customer service would have more empathy and understanding. Strongly recommend not using them- try collect from the restaurant yourself if you can! At least that way your more likely to deal with a person who cares.

Title: Food never arrived, indifferent customer service
Review: Ordered food. An hour later the app pinged to say it had been delivered but there was no one outside, no knock on the door, no food delivered. Called customer service only to be told that there had been a 'rider error' and that I should order again. I asked for a refund and compensation for the fact that I had not been provided with the service I paid for but I was told that was not possible. This is not the first time I've had problems with orders placed through deliveroo either. Terrible company. Will not be giving them any more chances.

Title: Order never delivered
Review: Order never delivered, although showing as delivered on app. Worst customer service ever.

Title: If you pay for the membership
Review: If you pay for the membership, the experience could be very good.

Title: Thieving bunch of c**ts!!
Review: Thieving bunch of c**ts!!! End of! Missing items, Poor service and will never accept fault and return credit for this! Awful delivery service that should be shut down 🤬

Title: A two hour wait for food
Review: A two hour wait for food. Customer service promised three times that it would arrive within 15 minutes but it did not. Explanation given was that the riders went onto different orders. When I called the restaurant they told me that the system was not functioning and they were not receiving orders from deliveroo. Deliveroo offered me credit for the inconvenience but I felt fobbed off and by 9pm with two hungry children (we’d ordered just before 7pm) we cancelled the order and boiled up some pasta. There are much bigger problems in the world than a deliveroo order not arriving but I wish they’d been more straight forward about what went wrong - blaming the riders did not seem very professional.

Title: Poor customer service
Review: Poor customer service, expensive, and frequently delivers the wrong order. One £300 order for a professional event just never turned up and Deliveroo refused to even investigate. Gives a bad name to your favourite local restaurants. Just order from them directly.

Title: Lost a loyal customer.
Review: Problem with my order, didn't arrive after an hour, was told I'd have to place another order (the restaurant I wanted was no longer accepting orders) and offered a refund after significant time on the phone. When I said that wasn't good enough, I was basically told tough. After escalating to a manager, I was offered £5 credit. I've used deliveroo a few times a week for some time now and accepted cold takeaways, late orders etc and not complained. Was it really worth losing a long time customer deliveroo?

Title: Delivery didn't arrive, crap customer service
Review: Order said it had been delivered but it had not arrived. Talked to a chat bot and this was also useless. No explanation as to why the order had been lost. Very disappointed and hungry.

Title: This was the worse decision I’ve ever…
Review: This was the worse decision I’ve ever made with regards to take away the customer service was appalling and the fact my delivery was never delivered makes this experience even worse no offer of another delivery just some poor excuse for a refund. NEVER USE AGAIN.

Title: Wrong order, credit taken away, suspended account. APPALLING
Review: Firstly, my order came completely wrong. Nothing was what I had ordered. I then contacted the customer service team and they thankfully gave me the full credit of what I had spent so I could reorder. However, the next day I got an email from 'Erin Mckeon' who is the customer accounts executive saying that I have breached agreement by sending unnecessary complaints so she took my credit away AND suspended my account. So I received the wrong food, got my credit taken away and my account got suspended. They won't even respond to my emails about the matter anymore.

Title: The worst by far
Review: Never look for help, as they won't care. Never except order to arrive in due time. Never expect food to arrive hot. The only thing you can expect is bad service and high fees.

Title: My order didn’t arrive...!!!??
Review: WOW I wish I’d read the reviews first....I couldn’t rate any less than 1 star. 1st time using and most definitely the last!!! Order didn’t even arrive.. order marked as delivered but he didn’t even arrive.. I was waiting outside for 30mins. When I eventually found a number for Customer service they answered Quick and I was on the call for nearly 30 minutes and the best they could offer was Sorry... someone will email you in 24 hrs.,??!!  For a very laid back person I am still extremely livid with the experience I had over 8 hours ago.

Title: Don't want to waste time so here goes.
Review: Don't want to waste time so here goes.Sh1te

Title: Boycott Deliveroo
Review: This company should be shut down for terrible service! Especially as they just don’t seem to care. Their slogan should be:“It’s not my job”That’s what the delivery driver says whenever I ask where’s the rest of my order, and I get to ask that question 80% of the time!

Title: Terrible customer service
Review: Terrible customer service. I get missing item in two orders and when i contact them by email and chat the only answer is : "we are sorry... but we can not do anything" stay away, your money is not safe! Also you can not rate the restaurant or the delivery. They are worried about transparency.

Title: Missing items always on my orders and…
Review: Missing items always on my orders and customer service is nor great either

Title: We ordered a KFC! Deliveroo are the worse
Review: We ordered a KFC but we were missing three bags of fries.  Normally I would get a little annoyed but when you spend extra through deliveroo you expect the best.  I have had no response from deliveroo or KFC after numerous emails and phone calls.  I guess three bags of fries isn’t worth worrying about if you’re a big company!!!  However how many bags of fries have not been delivered (£1.59) a bag.  No one complains they don’t respond that’s a lot of free money these companies are making.

Title: Disappointed
Review: We made an order as I did not wantto cook dinner and thought that my toddler would eat pizza with me that evening and would happily sleep after.The delivery guy DID NOT deliver the order and MARKED ON THE SYSTEM AS DELIVERED. To say that I was disappointed is not even close to what I was feeling. By the time a new order arrived, my toddler was already in bed, almost without dinner as after a while he was to tired to eat.

Title: Just ordered
Review: Just ordered. It cost me £40 and turns up cold. Message deliveroo and what do I get? Nothing absolutely nothing!

Title: Since when did Deliveroo forget to use…
Review: Since when did Deliveroo forget to use their customer service skills. I placed an order through their application and the delivery time said 17:30-17:40. At 17:24 apparently the driver 'called 4 times' and an email was sent at 17:30 to alert me that the food has arrived, so 6 minutes later than it arrived. There was no call made, I wrote on the notes for the driver to call our door number at the main gates as I live in an apartment, they also failed to do that. After contacting customer service, they're 'unable' to provide me a refund because the driver 'contacted me 4 times' which to clarify I RECEIVED NO CALL. As well as this, I requested to speak to a member of management, and I was placed on hold to then someone just hang up. Absolute the scammers. SAVE YOUR MONEY.

Title: Do not order from this place
Review: Do not order from this place, they will fail to deliver your food and won’t refund you.

Title: used for ages
Review: used for ages, never let me down

Title: Awful company
Review: Awful company, nearly all deliveries have been warm at best - my most recent and final order arrived stone cold. I have been offered a £5 voucher compensation for a £35 spoiled meal that I had to reorder with someone else. Disgraceful.

Title: Good customer service :)
Review: Although my order did not arrive due to the rider arriving at the wrong address, and initially I was worried about this as I have found that in other cases of this sort no refund has been offered, the customer service team were brilliant and so easy to deal with. There was practically no waiting time to speak to somebody, and I was offered a refund due to me being a first time customer. While the logistics may be questionable with some riders - the customer service team are lovely!

Title: capitalist pigs
Review: They take 35% from the restaurants and takeaways as commission. After all said and done we only make money on orders over £30. This maybe hard to believe as a customer but Deliveroo commission 35%, food cost 35%, Staff cost 35% and VAT 20%. you do the maths! Not only that they pay their drivers nothing and they are forced to speed and break the law to achieve minimum wage.If the app was good and they offered any level of service I wouldnt have as much of an issue.They look after the big chains with sweetheart deals and lower commission but the average joe has to slave away and scrape by.When I first signed up we paid 25% commission and now its 35%. Uber is just as bad but at least offer a decent app and service.

Title: Poor customer service
Review: Will never use deliveroo again. Used them twice 1st time was ok. The next time, after placing my order and then them giving me my order number with tgi Friday I contacted the restaurant to see if there was a reason my food still wasn’t here over an hour later to find out my order wasn’t even placed!! So after contacting delivery and talking to someone through live chat was told I would be contacted regarding this matter and to this day have never received any sort of contact. Very poor customer service will be using another delivery service from now on

Title: Nobody rang! No food!
Review: After waiting for 40 mins. Got a message saying " nobody answered and food was left in the front door" nobody even rang or knocked the door ( and i live with more people in the house) but i specifically left a message to ring me on arrival. And my phone never rang. But yeah. Just leave my food at the door. Which is missing and the restaurant closed already. Awesome service.

Title: CRAP SERVICE,!! 😠😠😠😠😠😠
Review: 😲😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠I am raging at the lack of service from DELIVEROO,,!!!I have just started using deliveroo this week and EVERYDAY and I mean EVERY ORDER there was SOMETHING MISSING, FROM CIGERETTES, JUICE, BREAD,......EVERY SINGLE ORDER WAS WRONG and I ordered deliveroo from different shops so it's obvious its the drivers that the problem is with,...costs me a fortune because when they don't deliver and can't leave the house I need to order AGAIN which costs me money AGAIN, tryed to contact them delivery driver Bailey speak English there not interested! Tried to call number on website ofvourse can't get through to no one, had to write 5 emails to them and that's only fist order I now have to complain about ANOTHER 5 TIMES GETTING ORDER WRONG MISSING ITEMS, on one order they put a bbq how random is that, had to open a case against them because they just don't get back to you its disgusting who runs a business this way!!!  RAGING,!! And out of pocket...PLEASE save yourself all the hassle and order elsewhere!!!👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠

Title: I have been ordering from Deliveroo for…
Review: I have been ordering from Deliveroo for a couple of years now. however, I do not like the fact that the rider are not always presentable and can't speak much English.

Title: Do not trust this app
Review: Do not trust this app! Placed on order for a hot meal and two croissants.  Total including a 2 pound tip to the rider came to over 14 pounds.  The rider only delivered the croissants.  I contacted the restaurant who confirmed the rider failed to take the hot meal.  Then contacted Deliveroo who gave me a credit for the meal then informed me that I would have to pay the delivery charge again if I wanted the meal.  I even told them that I am currently having trouble walking, but they only could offer empty apologies and to add insult to injury, asked me to provide feedback to improve their service.  Simply put, Deliveroo is a THIEF!!!

Title: I didn't receive 75% of my order but…
Review: I didn't receive 75% of my order but Deliveroo tells me I have to take the loss. Just unacceptable. I placed an order with Marks and Spencer through Deliveroo and most of the items were missing. Deliveroo is taking the easy way out and telling me it's my loss. They are quick to take your money but when it comes to helping you as a customer they fall far short. **UPDATE: I raised the issue with the Deliveroo team using Facebook Messenger and they have now processed a refund for the missing items. ***

Title: We ordered a meal last night via…
Review: We ordered a meal last night via deliveroo from a nearby Turkish restaurant (I received confirmation and  order no. and receipt for payment), but after a 1 hour wait I rang the restaurant and was told they had not received the food order. They said I had to ring deliveroo which I did, and after a difficult conversation with someone in a faraway call centre I was informed that the order had been 'voided' - why and who by I was not told....amazing stuff!This was the first (and last) time I tried this lot. Useless.Why do restaurants use them?

Title: Deliveroo is a scam
Review: I wish I woud have read the reviews here before registering and ordering with Deliveroo. They operate a scam.I never got my order and I have sincere doubts that it was ever even prepared. I waited for 20 minutes outside my house and nothing ever arrived. The Deliveroo website claimed that the order was delivered and outside my door. That was not true. When I tried to contact the restaurant (La Parma Pizzeria) , they did not pick up the phone. Go figure.I called Deliveroo who were very friendly but did not help. No sign of a refund, nor of, well, anything. I suppose Deliveroo trains its customer service team in deflection.I am so annoyed that I spent money witht Deliveroo. Trading Standards really needs to get involved here to protect consumers.Do not order from Deliveroo. I sincerely doubt that half the restaurants on there exist.Hopefully I can help people with this. Don't fall into the same trap. Do not order rom Deliveroo.

Title: Ordered food
Review: Ordered food, restaurant rejected because it was to busy. Received an email saying I won't be charged. Checked my bank and was charged anyway. Avoid.

Title: AVOID!!!
Review: Save your money and get your food from just eat or Uber eat. I used first time Deliveroo and never ever again! Food was totally damaged !!! I send them pictures andI requested refund which was not accepted!!! AVOID!!!!

Title: Cold food and customer service who don’t care
Review: My food arrive not just cold but stone cold and it was completely inedible. I raised this with Deliveroo and asked for my money back in which they told me the food was delivered in 10 mins so it can’t be cold. Not only is deliveroo customer service absolutely shocking they are now making Wagamams look bad. All I keep getting back from deliveroo is we will make it up to you next time, no you won’t as I won’t every be using you again.

Title: Ordered Nando’s from a restaurant 10…
Review: Ordered Nando’s from a restaurant 10 minutes away, 1 hour and half later, 3 calls and still waiting. Absolutely shambolic service. Order 2/3 times a week and this is how they treat their customers! Disgusting.

Title: No chance of a refund even with no delivery!
Review: Had a number of deliveries which went okay but when one did not turn up they refused to give a refund. The only complaint procedure is via resolver and it will get you no ware. There are other delivery places in most areas. I have just noticed they were charging more for the same food from the same restaurant. As other reviews have said the customer response poor and in my case arrogant. They just say it all the fault of the restaurant. They clearly have zero interest in customer service and you are really unlikely to get a refund even as in my case you did not receive the order.

Title: Ah, your still letting me down.
Review: Ah, your still teasing me Ubereats. Why you email me a code BRINGITON50, yet when I try to redeem it, it says "oops your not eligible for this promotion"Poor show.Either let me use the code or stop sending these eh.

Title: App was buggy and white screened often
Review: App was buggy and white screened often, Driver tracking did not track. they do not allow you to remove the last payment option from your account if you don't want to leave your credit card on file with them forcing you to deactivate the card and reissue.you had one job be uber at getting eats and you have failed.

Title: Worst experience ever.
Review: Worst experience ever.Worst company 😡

Title: Ordered on this app and waited an hour…
Review: Ordered on this app and waited an hour & 1/2 and then just drive to the restaurant myself just to find out that this restaurant HAS NEVER ISED ANY DELIVERY SERVICE! If I was this restaurant I’d sue Uber Eats!

Title: Was charged for food that never arrived
Review: Horrible ordered food for arriving guests- food never came - ABSOLUTLEY NO  ISTOMER SERVICE - I have been trying in every way to contact them amd I get an error message - they charged me in full.  I will never use this service again. If I could give a zero rating I would.

Title: If I could give this 0 I would
Review: If I could give this 0 I would. No support no contact. Paid for priority delivery, food came over 40 mins late. Litterally worst company ever. And if u have an issue they send you back in circles on the help page.

Title: Ubereats sucks
Review: Ubereats sucks. This is my 3rd time using them and they still suck. It’s only because they had the earliest delivery time for coffee. And they push back my time more and more. Like how long does it take to put donuts in a bag and pour coffee but I gotta wait and pay $15 to wait longer and longer. It takes the convenience out of using the service. You suck!!!!! We pay more for them to have less drivers as well like so I’m paying for your slack. Nope 👎🏽

Title: Food didn’t arrive
Review: Food didn’t arrive, been over 6 hours and I can’t get hold of anyone to sort it out. Awful service.

Title: Abysmal Customer Service
Review: Would give less than 1 star if I could. 9 times out of 10 the food arrives cold or there are missing items, or both. Forget about getting any help or assistance from their "customer service team" which appears to just be bots sending automated messages. Absolutely terrible customer service and not worth the extortionate prices. Just stick to deliveroo or just eat. I will never order from uber eats again.

Title: Best choice to EAT with ANGER
Review: You all tell me how this company (only for food part) can have sales for 2,51 billion USD !!! I have never seen a worse app in my life.1 when abroad cannot translate, Even when you use the DESKTOP site version, not even Google Chrome is capable to translate the pages!2 Once you are in a supermarket, YOU CANNOT SEARCH for ITEMS, you need to scroll thousands of items in foreign language hoping to find the picture of what you are searching for3 When item OUT OF STOCK, No message and no info on a replacement. If i cannot find a brand of OATS it is very LIKELY that i would easily replace with another, NO, you get your package and only THEN you discover that your brand was not available!@!!!!!4 from desk top version you cannot get any detail of driver and cannot communicate with him.5 driver had my phone n. and could not find me, he did not call me, on the desk top version you only get prompt the order will be forfeited and your money lost6 cannot save a KART7 favourite items disappearI rather STARVE than using it again!

Title: Uber eats don't help you when you have…
Review: Uber eats don't help you when you have a problem. They never give you your money back they give support "credit" that you can't even use!!! No uber eats for me again!!!!!!

Title: Shocking customer service - Wouldn’t even give one star
Review: Wouldn’t even give one star. For some reason, Uber eats will no longer give me a refund on anything because I’ve contacted them ‘too many times’. The second to last time I contacted them about missing items I had PAID for, they gave me an automated reply saying there’s nothing they can do. I chased it and eventually gave up. I now ordered something else and it came late & was cold, and I was told that my account was once again ‘suspicious’ and wouldn’t help me. Shocking treatment of customers that frequently use the service and terrible communication. I recommend deliveroo or just eat over this rubbish any day. Extortionate delivery & service fees with Uber eats anyway.

Title: We were stuck in our hotel on Maui
Review: We were stuck in our hotel on Maui.  We ordered from a local restaurant and waited 1 1/2 hours only to be cancelled by Uber eats.  My family still hungry we had to eat from the sundry shop.  I called the restaurant and there had never received our order.  I deleted all apps for Uber.   Tried to chat with them...waste of time.

Title: sharing deliveries while being a member
Review: it pisses me off that i am a paying member and still have to share deliveries with other orders...my food comes cold!!!

Title: Standard & Represent : Uber eats drivers deliver your food in…
Review: Uber eats drivers deliver your food in dirty cars & they have a passenger in the car withthem holding your food !!! Not fair !! You are the only one inthe picture!!! Uber drivers need to have set standards for working uber eats !!! There should be rules while they ( uber drivers ) work !!!!

Title: Apparently take 2 hours to deliver…
Review: Apparently take 2 hours to deliver street tacos that were originally supposed to take 30 minutes. Along with the fees, this service is broken. Makes me never want to order again. Should have just toasted bread at this rate. Lame

Title: Awful experience....DON'T EVER use Uber…
Review: Awful experience....DON'T EVER use Uber Eats...$35 promo code removed from the order....with no accountability by them....they said I approved the order and that it was my fault....

Title: Took too long for the driver to place…
Review: Took too long for the driver to place the order, order was twice as much and after the restaurant completed the order the driver still didn't come. The driver told me he took long because the order wasn't ready.... Anyways, my mom lives in another state and I wanted her birthday to be special with food that she likes. Next,  time she'll have a late bday and I will eat with her.

Title: First time to try Uber eats and I don’t…
Review: First time to try Uber eats and I don’t want to use it again.  My order was cancelled 8 minutes AFTER it was scheduled to arrive.  No explanation at all, just cancelled.  Not good!

Title: Unacceptable service
Review: In the last few times I have ordered from Uber eats, it has been a total screw up. The drivers do not communicate with the customer. They have gotten the order wrong. And this last time, my entire order was wrong to which is also on the restaurant's part. This is not how you tend to a paying customer and I have been burned for the last time, therefore, I will NEVER order off of Uber Eats again. Ever. And I plan on telling others not to either

Title: No cuz y’all be playing too much cancel…
Review: No cuz y’all be playing too much cancel this ghetto ass app....

Title: The worst experience ever
Review: The worst experience ever. I had to call the driver, he was somewhere else, some food ingredients were uncooked, portions very small. Also they cancel your order and charge you on top. All this and still you don’t have a person to call or chat right away so you can solve the situation. The worst

Title: Worst delivery I never had.
Review: Long story short. 20th anniversary. Waited in a hotel room for our order 2 and 1/2 hours. Kept saying can't locate a driver after they promised a 40 to 45 minute delivery. No way to contact Uber Eats. Contacted the restaurant and told them to throw the food in the trash. Went to a burger place drive-thru instead. Soon after, the delivery driver was there to pick up the food that was probably poisonous. They were willing to deliver it. They suck, completely and utterly without a question suck. I will never use this app again and I would not recommend it to my worst enemy. I have stock in this company that I bought with their IPO. I will be selling it the first thing Monday. This is the poorest excuse for a f****** company I've ever seen in my life. If you have stock in the company, get the hell out. It has to have the poorest management that ever existed. Somehow their price has went up with the pandemic, but it is complete crap.

Title: It’s taking almost 3hrs to get my…
Review: It’s taking almost 3hrs to get my pizza....enough said about this company.

Title: A joke
Review: A joke. Couldn’t be worse. Stay away from them.

Title: Horrible service
Review: Horrible service Can’t add special instructions for foodWould not return money for items I ordered but the restaurant did not have. The fees are extremely high. Skip the dishes is way better!

Title: This company dont even deserve a star…
Review: This company dont even deserve a star afew days ago ordered kfc so the driver delivered someone else's order, I asked for a refund and got refused, I just fail to understand how they charged me for not getting my food. Today I ordered and had an error with the discount code which vanished after payment I requested the discount be added and was given alot of excuses like the code isn't valid when clearly it is even after explaining got told they will not refund. THE WORST COMPANY WILL NEVER USE AGAIN

Title: Awful
Review: Awful, used twice in the last week due to illness, first order arrived half eaten and then this evenings order arrived freezing cold and the food was old, when i complain i get a response saying i will hear with 24 hours and that never happens, appalling

Title: Worst customer service.
Review: I have never in my life experienced such horrible customer service. I will never order from Uber eats again. If anyone is looking for a better company, I use skip at least 3 times a week and they have incredible customer service. Uber Eats is absolutely disgusting.

Title: Send me codes which do not work
Review: Send me codes which do not work, waste of time

Title: Thieves
Review: The last 2 times I ordered through Ubereats I had items I paid for missing entirely. I wrote to them in the help section and asked for a refund for the items that didn’t arrive and they told me they can’t offer a refund. They’re a scam app, use deliveroo instead

Title: Ordered from el poco loco and the guy…
Review: Ordered from el poco loco and the guy was on way and literally on the map showed “TREYVON” stopped forLike 5-10 min I messaged him and said hello and then 2 min later order cancelled. Worst first time experience with Uber eats! 0 stars! Refunddddd. Sure he had a good meal for first time his life!

Title: Order from uber eats
Review: Order fro. Uber eats last night the burgers were stale and had no taste complaints to uber eats got same same stock answer 4 times. Have deleted my account and the app. Will never use them again.

Title: This is a message sent to the Takeaway…
Review: This is a message sent to the Takeaway Bombay Dining in Yeovil UK regarding a delivery the other evening I am appalled that there is a voucher (shown in email) for 50% off but it was not appliedAlso the information on delivery was 20-40 min so did not reflect the actual delivery of 2 hoursI think the voucher must be a con as it deceived regarding discount and that a refund onto my card should be madeNeil Owen---------- Forwarded message ---------From: neil owen Date: Tue, 13 Apr 2021 at 11:23Subject: takeaway Bombay Dining 12 April 2021To:Sir I ordered a takeaway from you yesterday evening through Ubereats in the sum of £58.70I was disappointed for a number of reasonsYour meal1) was advised by Uber delivery in 20 -40 min took 2 hours (5.30 - 7.30)2) not hot on arrival3) Specific request - no sauce (vegetable curry) with Biryani but side salad - ignored4) requested extra chilli in Biryani - ignoredSo a very very disappointed customer - Meal not good value - some refund should be madeUberEats do not appear to add value to your service 1) this is the coupon displayed and it says voucher will be automatically applied - it wasntimage.pngIf this is not applied it is a con and reflects badly on your restaurant2) The time for delivery was given by Uber as 20-40 min , when I phoned you you said you were very busy (I understand) and that delivery would be abot 30 min more but was an hour (ok 1 understand) but when asking Uber for update Uber said be with you soonI will not use Ubereats again as they add nothingI feel that some recompense should be made for our problemsThe receipt was not in the delivery bagNeil OwenNOTE - I have been offered a discount by the restaurant but it seems there is nowhere to compain to ubereats!!!

Title: Food is awful and cold
Review: Food is awful and cold. It tasted old. Never again and will use Doordash

Title: One delivery along the way
Review: Literally, no order goes by without ‘driver X is making one delivery along the way’. Often the food arrives cold.

Title: Absolute dogsh*t!!!
Review: Absolute dogsh*t!!!! Spent an hour trying to order from four different places!! Doesn't accept collection or delivery!! Waste of time!!!

Title: They suck!!!
Review: It seems like the more you order from Ubereats the longer it takes. I always order from them and for the past couple weeks my food has taken 2 hrs. The restaurants I choose are all within 5 miles of my job and I still have to wait forever.  Then there is no one to contact!!. This sucks. Never Alain

Title: If I could leave minus stars I would
Review: If I could leave minus stars I would. I ordered from them last night from Dumpling Dumpling in Nepean. It is about 25 minutes from my house. It accepted my order and then after they hacked my payment I got a notice shortly after that Maxime my driver was making another delivery on the way.  My food was on the road for over 40 minutes after having been picked up and arrived lukewarm. The first delivery was all the way in Kanata and then he doubled back to make my delivery. I reached out to Uber and they are experts in passive bullying saying they gave a 4.99 refund on an almost $40 order and as far as they were concerned they were happy. They also tried to blame the restaurant for not packing it well. If dumplings are going to go on a grand tour of Ottawa before getting to the customer there is no way they could pack it any better. They have a very slick team with slick answers being sympathetic and thanking me for their input but not taking ownership. Why do they not give the customer a choice if we want our food not running around in a car to other destinations. That is bad business. And obviously reading all of the reviews now this is a common practice. They exploit the restaurant, they exploit the drivers and they rip off the customer by not taking the care of the meal that the restaurant worked so hard to make. I will never use them again and I will just get in my car an order no matter where and it will still arrive hot because I go right home. The BS that they write including "no need to reply to this e mail" comment is arrogant and shows what a horrible corporate culture they have. Shame on them for wiping the floor with all of us. Stay away from Ubereats they just don't care except how much to make off the three parties involved.

Title: What a load of rubbish...I waited…
Review: What a load of rubbish...I waited 30mins for my food to be delivered, the driver was two streets away, got stuck in road closures that have been there for the past year so what he's doing driving in the city centre and not knowing how to drive is clearly an issue...then my food is 1 minute away before the whole order just disappears.  I wasted another 20minutes trying to contact ubereats to no success because they don't want to communicate with their customers at all...I followed all the help links round and round for 20 minutes, I am fuming!  Just some damn communication would be appreciated instead of being sent around the houses wasting time and no food to show for it!!! You're a joke!

Title: Ordered a takeout as Uber eats offered…
Review: Ordered a takeout as Uber eats offered 25% off my next 10 orders, order total was £24.06 before the discount, was supposed to be charged £18.04 however Uber charged the full amount. Uber eats have argued that I don't qualify for the offer as I didn't receive it directly from Uber, I sent them the email proof that I did. They then said only some restaurants qualify for that offer but this one didn't, so I took screenshots of me reordering the same food, from the same place, with the same discount showing the 25% off however Uber still refused to refund me anything and said they aren't going to offer me a refund or an adjustment and I quote "that is the final decision". Uber eats support is absolutely useless, I've contacted trading standards and will fight to get my money back, it's not much but I'd rather Uber didn't have it, don't use Uber eats it's just a scam!

Title: Awful customer service
Review: Awful customer service! My order was cancelled they still took payment in full, I raised a dispute through PayPal which ruled in my favour and refund issued not Uber eats are trying to take the payment again!
