IM NOT PAYING FOR A CANCELLED ORDER! The service you received from Uber eats is non existant and a copy paste job! I will never use them again

Title: Awful awful service
Review: Awful awful service. I have been trying to access by own funds that have been credited to my uber account via a gifted voucher. I have been trying to use this since January and just keep getting error messages. Uber helps have been useless and keep answering questions not even relevant to my complaint. I just want to access my own money. I've reported to trading standards as I'm getting nowhere and Uber are effectively holding my money back! 3 months later and still no help!

Title: Not recommended
Review: Out of the three main food delivery companies in the UK, Uber Eats is the most sketchy. You can't cancel your order within the first 10 seconds like Deliveroo, you can't chat with anyone if you have a problem, the fees are sky high, it uses Uber's network of drivers who can accept then reject your order as they wish after they decide it's out of their way. I have no idea how they managed to get all the top takeaway brands to sign up with them. Best advice: avoid.

Title: Horrible Company
Review: Horrible Company. The fees are out of this world high. Super expensive company fees and delivery fees and they have the nerve to ask for a tip. To top it off customer service is even worse, no way to contact Customer service via phone or email. I’m definitely deleting my account and not doing business with Uber anymore.

Title: Food is always late or cold
Review: Food is always late or cold. Driver will make a few stops to drop off food. Time will get pushed back and back.

Title: Never delivered my order and still…
Review: Never delivered my order and still charged me for it. Customer service was absolutely useless and didn’t offer me any help. I won’t be ordering from Uber eats again. Left me hungry and upset.

Title: Orders canceled without warning...
Review: I tried ordering twice from a couple fast food restaurants using Uber Eats...both time were painful experiences and when the orders finally went through after waiting over 2 hours for my food...I received an email saying my order was cancelled (both times).  No advanced notice and no reasons were given.  still hungry and still unable to get food through Uber Eats.  Rethink your business model.

Title: DO NOT USE UBEREATS...SCAMMERS
Review: We used the first time user promo code for £15 off when you spend £20 and was charged full price even after confirming the order with the correct price! After a difficult time finding some customer service email they refused to look into it and provide a partial refund for the money we are owed. We will not be using Ubereats again. Disgusting customer service. SCAM!

Title: I ordered 4 meals for my family:
Review: I ordered 4 meals for my family:I ordered 4 meals for my family:1 x Happy Meal1 x 6 McChicken Nuggets Meal1 x Big Tasty Meal1 x McChicken Sandwich Meal1 x Apple PieUberEats UK delivered but without 2 Large fries for the adult meals.I contacted their "help" function on the app and they auto-refunded me £4. £4!!!! I am missing the key component of what constitutes a "meal". If I wanted a burger I would have ordered just a burger! I have messaged SEVERAL times and get no reply. I called the restaurant (Tilbury McDonalds) and told it was not their problem. I got given a customer services number... pressed 3 and got told "You do not have an ongoing dispute... goodbye".This app is a joke. McDonalds should be ashamed to have such a company representing their service. This is ridiculous. I have requested a full refund of the meals, as because of all of the aggro trying to contact "someone" at Uber Eats, the burger was stone cold. I will NEVER be ordering Uber Eats again, and am now seriously considering legal action, as every consumer in the UK has the RIGHT to request a refund from a company which does not provide a service as described. This is no exception. You cannot hide behind an app and "auto AI robots". You refuse to respond to me because you know I am correct.This is my honest review of Uber Eats UK and would not recommend anyone else to use this until they sort out HUMAN customer services which actually care and address their problems. The number one priority for ANY company should be customer service and Uber Eats UK, you have fell severely short.

Title: Absolutely shambolic customer service…
Review: Absolutely shambolic customer service and genuine daylight robbery, was charged for them cancelling an order, they stated that I would not be charged, was then charged and refused a refund, completely ignored after that, absolutely useless and criminal, never use them

Title: Terrible service and can't even complain
Review: Terrible. I can't find a place to even complain to Uber Ears so this seems to be my only option. We ordered sushi at 5.30pm this evening. The uber eats app estimated that our sushi would arrive at 6.10pm and at one point showed the driver just minutes away. It then suddenly went up by 20 minutes and said 'sorry for the delay but your driver has to drop off another delivery on the way'. But even still, the app said the latest it would arrive 6.30pm.It eventually arrived at 6.45, the hot dishes obviously cold.This is terrible, terrible service. I know they have now changed things so that drivers make multiple stops unless you pay extra, but you still expect the delivery to arrive in good time, not and hour and 10 (or more) after you ordered. I now just wish I'd have ordered with any other app and will be deleting Uber Eats. Have deleted the app and unsubscribed from all emails. Will never use again.

Title: Placed an order that never arrived
Review: Placed an order that never arrived. When I contacted restaurant was told it had been collected by driver who then cancelled the order.I was charged & although promised a refund by Uber it has never arrived & they now say its "out of time" to look into my complaint.Taking money for no goods is theft - they should be ashamed

Title: Did not let us post feedback for Slims…
Review: Did not let us post feedback for Slims restaurant, order was delivered by Uber.

Title: Send delivery guy on a bike to my house…
Review: Send delivery guy on a bike to my house with order could not find my address so cancelled my order then got message saying I wouldn't get a refund wont be using uber eats again

Title: Their customer service is terrible
Review: Their customer service is terrible. Just a bunch of ppl in an Indian call center reading from a script. Am thinking of deleting the app.

Title: Thieves
Review: I am a platinum Uber user. Ordered 2 coffees from Starbucks. The rider spilled them both so they were empty... UberEats refuse to refund even after many messages, keep getting the same automated response. Appalling customer service when they advertise platinum accounts as benefiting from flexible refund policies.I have never had an issue getting a refund from Deliveroo. I will stick with them from now on.

Title: I keep getting "$20 off your $25 order"…
Review: I keep getting "$20 off your $25 order" coupons for UberEats which is too good to be true, and it is! After scanning the available restaurants (most of which are duplicated on Seamless and includes a large number of crappy junk food places like Popeye's, KFC and Taco Bell (probably where Uber drivers like to eat), I chose a place that seemed reasonably exotic than my usual local joints and carefully chose three items totaling over $20 (the minimum amount needed). Then I went to checkout and UberEats tried to get me to give the driver a minimum 10% tip. I refused and edited the default setting to 5% because I don't believe a simple delivery is equivalent to tipping a waiter in a sit-down restaurant. Then I made sure the promo code was there and clicked "Submit Order." Nothing. I clicked again and nothing happened. I went back, changed the payment method (I always use Paypal because I refuse to share my card details with Uber) and tried again. Nothing. I tried changing the tip amount, thinking maybe Uber was doing some kind of blackmail and reluctantly put in the 10% tip. Still nothing.I gave up. The UberEats app is pure crap. I wasted my time and luckily, after I calculated how much my meal would have cost me ($5 for delivery charge; $5 for taxes; $6 for a default 10% driver's tip) I would have saved a mere $4 if the order had gone through!! Yuck. Skip this and order through Seamless or just call the restaurant. The so-called "coupon" is a scam. After I let it expire, UberEats sent me yet another coupon for $20 off $25, extending the expiration date. Hah! No wonder - a coupon that doesn't work and when it does, you get only $4 off.

Title: drivers can’t speak English
Review: drivers can’t speak English. Don’t understand when you direct them. Can’t deliver to obvious places. Very very bad service.

Title: Absolutely disgraceful company
Review: Absolutely disgraceful company. Don’t accept any responsibility or liability for their bad service. Fob you offer, ignore you and don’t escalate any complaints. Would not recommend at all. Save your money and order direct from food places you trust. Uber eats is the worst food transport service I’ve used. Waste of money, rip people off. Quick to take your money and never assist you with any issues. I’ve had so many bad experiences with them, I will not be using them again.

Title: Order never arrived
Review: Order never arrived. Driver read but but did not respond to message enquiring about delivery. Will not use again.

Title: If I could give ZERO stars I would
Review: If I could give ZERO stars I would.  Ive tried to use the service twice.  The first time I had to cancel my order after three hours of it not being acknowledged.  Second time I was told the order was received and I would be getting a text when it was on its way which never happened.  When I arrived home there my food was getting nice and cold.  If I had gotten the text as promised I could have told my husband to come in from working and watch for it. I had a hell of a time trying to contact Uber eats for this specific issue and had to choose a category that didn't fit which was that " I didn't receive my food" in order to get an email to them.  They didn't acknowledge anything I wrote about what happened.  They advised they refunded me but they haven't.  Im getting harassing texts at 1AM to rate support that I didn't receive. and the support people emailing me are extremely rude and could care less. WILL NEVER EVER USE THIS COMPANY AGAIN

Title: Shocking inept customer service
Review: Shocking inept customer service. Had an issue with an order and reported this via the app which was not easy to find where to do this.  Then received several stock answers explaining that I was not eligible for a refund as it didnt meet their policy.  Despite 4 requests for a copy of this policy they were unable to provide this.  When I escalated this as a complaint regarding their customer service they again replied using standard responses...ignoring this complaint and failing to send a copy of their complaints procedure or the contact details of who I could escalate this complaint with.  This suggests that they have neither policies in place and simply hide behind an inept app and customers service protocol.  DO NOT use this company they are happy to take your money but do nothing to resolve complaints about the quality of food received, refunds requested or complaints made. Utterly inept service and should be closed! I would give minus stars if this was a feature

Title: Useless company
Review: Useless company. Still waiting on a refund which they claim they've already paid out - nonsense! They then close off the email correspondence not allowing me to have my say.Shocking service. Will never, ever use Uber or Uber Eats again.

Title: One star is being nice
Review: One star is being nice. The past 4 orders have been cancelled after waiting an hour. The last delivery last night the driver claims he waited at my door for 7 minutes except j in have cameras at my door to prove otherwise. I’m owed £70 from Uber eats for deliveries I paid for and didn’t receive. Terrible!!!!

Title: Two weeks of useless cut and paste…
Review: Two weeks of useless cut and paste replies to my pleas to resolve a simple coupon issue requires me to STRONGLY ADVISE all future and present UE customers to drop them. Over 26  emails. Ignorance and thoughtlessness. No I customer service. No accountability. They don't care about you, your hunger, your community, just redirect the injured customer untill they quit. Do not patronize UE. Make a Peanut Butter and Jelly instead. Walk to your local eaterie and tip well. Smile

Title: Absolute Crap
Review: 1 star is already generous for the crap they give their customers. There have been more than 2 accounts of their customer service being completely nonexistent. I placed an order over a year ago that took almost an hour to be confirmed. I called customer service to cancel my order, and the person on the other line had the audacity to say it was my fault that the order didn’t get confirmed. They also put up a fight before they finally agreed to give me a refund. I’ve been trying to delete my account for a while now and every time i try to log in, it tells me my password has been changed. I try to reset it, but they never send the SMS code i need to actually log back in. It’s been a never-ending cycle of inconvenience and lack of support. Do yourselves a favour and delete your accounts right now or don’t even sign up at all.

Title: Do NOT use. Misrepresentation of the total cost you'll pay - false advertising/trading standards
Review: DO NOT USE - False advertising of the final price you'll pay!I successfully applied an Uber Eats promo code and the final discounted price of my order displayed for payment. I then took final steps to add a tip for the rider. However, after adding a tip I was then bounced to a 'payment update' screen where I had to select a different card saved on my account. Having done so I was then taken to the confirmation screen for my order - where the promo code had been REMOVED and the full price of my order charged. I wouldn't have placed the order had it been full price so this amounts to misrepresentation and being wrongfully induced into the purchase. I've since spent over 2.5hrs sending screenshots and messages to the 'Help'/customer services team demonstrating that the problem is with their app, not the restaurant as they have repeatedly claimed/lied. The customer service has been appalling and the latest message reads: "Unfortunately, we will not be able to offer any adjustment with regards to your concern. We are bound by certain policy limitations and would not have the liberty to make any exceptions." I should also add that I have repeatedly asked for their complaints procedure/how I now make a formal complaint (email, address or phone number) and they refuse to answer my question.

Title: Absolutely horrible company to deal…
Review: Absolutely horrible company to deal with when I was sent the completely opposite of what I ordered and paid for through their eats app. I contacted them to inform them and sent pics etc and they basically told me to go away and refused to refund me, then claimed they already had done so and when I replied saying they're hadn't and were confusing themselves they  went further to tell not to bother replying as they've made their decision and won't be changing and for me to basically put up or shut up! Dispicable customer service and horrible way to view what makes them what they. Avoid avoid avoid. I shall be removing all their apps and never using them again and passing this experience on to as many people as possible. I have all the pics and screenshots to prove it!

Title: Do not use them they are scammers
Review: Do not use them they are scammers! Absolute filth! We ordered food which had my old phone number attached to the account the food was “on the way” and called the number which I no longer had and then kicked me from the order. I tried calling the number that was given but it wouldn’t let me go through. The order never showed up and the money was taken. £40 worth of food and no refund because they have no contact number. Tried calling the company that we ordered from to give them the address and order to see what was happening and they were not compliant at all they just told me to take it up with Uber eats. Waste of time and filthy robbing people.

Title: If I could rate them -1000 I would
Review: If I could rate them -1000 I would, I am so angry at them and their service.Last week I made an order and long story short I had to drive to where the driver was in order to collect my order, which is just ridiculously and makes a mockery of the whole delivery service.Today I placed an order to treat my aunt who had just been discharged from hospital, but not only was the order late but I could see from the drivers map they had been given the wrong details, for which he apologised profusely.Then when I took the food out, 50% of my order was missing, which included my disabled aunties meal.  I just can’t understand how the order left your premises without being checked they it was complete, so half of my family have no food and have to make do with a sandwich.I want this escalated as this service and lack of completion of a basic order is customer service at its worst and I want to know what is going to be done to address this complete failure in service.The fact you can not get ahold of them is a joke as well.An extremely unhappy customer!!!

Title: 0 customer support
Review: 0 customer support. Placed an order that was accepted and then never arrived... 2 hours pass by still nothing and I'm unable to cancel the order.. restaurant says they can't do it. Uber eats clearly states to contact them via their live chat link below, yet there is no link and the live chat doesn't exist. Surely this is false advertisement if your reassuring customers that they can receive immediate support when this support does not in fact even exist. I even have screen shots to prove this false information provided to me on their app. Even an apology would of just been nice but no just 2 hours or annoyance and stress trying to cancel my order so we could order elsewhere. It's now almost 10pm absolutely ridiculous.

Title: The worst customer service ever beyond…
Review: The worst customer service ever beyond belief where you'll have ten members of staff asking you to reply to a main thread but not one assisting you with the problem. Useless service just tried to login was unable with my details and no customer service member was able to resolve the issue.

Title: Using 1 star as zero is not an option
Review: Using 1 star as zero is not an option. Ordered kfc through uber eats to wait over an hour and be delivered cold chicken. Uber responded with a pathetic email telling me that was unfortunate but they wouldn't give a refund. £40 down but no food poisoning as I wouldn't of fed that to my dog..

Title: Stealing money out of your account
Review: Stealing money out of your account,  charge me 2 for same order, order never arrived, refunded only once. Their support its like talking to the brick wall. No help whatsoever, can't explain what order they charged me for order, waste a time

Title: I have made an order through the uber…
Review: I have made an order through the uber eats in the restaurant named topplino pizza, they accepted my order but shortly after decided to close the restaurant, it was around 5.30 p.m, they closed 4 hours earlier than they should ve without cancelling an order. So I've contacted the uber eats support to cancel order and refund me the money, I was assured that the refund will go through in next 72 hours. A few days later I contacted them again saying that I didn't get my refund for the food and was told that I'm not eligible for a refund because its been more than 48 hours

Title: Promo code not applied
Review: I wouldn't even give them 1 star. Basically the promo code was not applied when I checked the receipt. At the time of ordering the checkout section showed the discount. I wish I had taken a screenshot at the time. Customer service is absolute rubbish. They sound like robots repeating the same thing. I'm deeply disappointed and wonder why trading standards or any food agency hasn't approached them.

Title: If I could give ubereats 0 stars I…
Review: If I could give ubereats 0 stars I would. My one piece of advise to others would be stick to just eat.Uber eats have taken money from my account when I haven't received any food. They suggest this is from last year when my order didn't go through. They have a shocking customer service and have just blaintantly ignored what I have been asking since Saturday!!!!!Avoidddddd this dodgy company!!!!

Title: Food delivered to wrong address.
Review: Very poor service. Driver never contacted me. Then I find out he delivered my order to the wrong address. Lucky I got my refund. This is not the first time this has happened.

Title: If I could give them a -0000 I would..
Review: If I could give them a -0000 I would... I had an issue with skip the dishes so I transferred over to uber eats well big mistake..... I placed an order over $70 with tip and the driver made 3 stops on the way to my house when food arrive it was COLD so I emailed uber eats they said sry and he would refund me $69.10 which was my order excluding tip said would be refunded in 3-5 business days... didn’t receive anything so I txt back then I was told tht a refund if $. 58.74 was going to be refunded where they got tht amount from idk same thing no refund given so I texted again.... this time they say an amount of $17.10 was refunded which idk where they got tht from and this is all on same order issue... it’s been over a wk and I have not been refunded nothing all I have are withdrawals from uber eats but no refund but they did send an email saying it was refunded but I’m not sure where they sent the refund... all in all I have removed my cards from uber eats and have deleted the app and keeping the delivery tip for myself as I will be picking up my own food from now on... these food services are not reliable and I can’t trust them they are a rip off.... customer service is crap just like skip!!!!! All on the same order was told a refund would be given for COLD FOOD 3 different refund amounts but nothing given!!! Also when payment processed would be withdrawn from my account and I would get an email saying tht payment wasn’t processed to change card when I look at my bank account and the money was withdrawn already.... happened 4 times in a row and 4 times I got in contact with them and nothing done!!!! TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

Title: Disgrace
Review: What more can I say that hasn’t been said by 20,000+ other people already? Just non existent service

Title: Food was delivered cold I have be going…
Review: Food was delivered cold I have be going to cafe in aberdare for over 7 years and my breakfast has always been first class . This is the first time ever I had cold breakfast will collect myself from now on as this company is not keeping to the order of hot fast food .

Title: Horrible customer service
Review: Horrible customer service. Horrible at being allowed to use a promotion THEY SEND YOU. IMPOSSIBLE TO GET A FULL REFUND FOR MISSING AND INCOMPLETE ITEMS.

Title: Customer service is a disgrace
Review: I received food that was ice cold which clearly hadn’t been cooked. Uber eats refunded 30p, what a joke. I have tried contacting support but they just tell me to use the app which says I can’t get help because they already have me 30p.

Title: Awful
Review: The customer service in the app is just bots auto replying to messages with generic garbage not relevant to your issue. They also a name under the message to make you think it's actually someone helping but it's just trash. I'm still trying to get a refund for a smoothie that never showed up with my order.

Title: Horrible service
Review: Horrible service, they took more than 2 hours to deliver my food from a restaurant that is at 5mins distance to the delivery address. Also the customer service guy wasn’t flexible to change the mode from delivery to pickup so i could get the food when they didn’t have enough drivers in the area to serve.

Title: I cannot believe some of you are…
Review: I cannot believe some of you are complaining about cold food, missing items and late deliveries?? This is a platform to order your chosen takeaways. They are not responsible for the issues above?!? Take it out on the place you order it from. How asinine are some folk. 🤦‍♀️Anyway, I visited to complain about the lack of any personal reviews on the takeaways. Should be able to write up how your food was, rather than sending a separate complaint to the place which I did. I've wasted so much money on places that are utterly repugnant. Cheers for that Uber. Won't be using the app again.

Title: They email me all the time with…
Review: They email me all the time with discount code but codes never worked, do not understand why they send it maybe for marketing sly! They charge for delivery that's fine but they overcharge the restaurant's menu price. Looks like very worse service! Always either food is cold/wrong item, food is messed, fed up with them

Title: Have just spent over 40 mins trying to…
Review: Have just spent over 40 mins trying to place an order.  When I reached the payment page, the app kept switching to a notification to choose a leave on the doorstep option.  REALLY frustrating, especially when you are tired, hungry & have no transport to collect it yourself.  Was unable to make payment & complete my order.  Got fed up, cancelled the order & have now unsubscribed.  Was really looking forward to a rare takeaway. Too late & too tired to cook now. Disappointing is an understatement.

Title: Disgusted by the service and company!
Review: Does not even deserve one star! On many occasions been charged twice, the money went through for multiple orders even though, only one was made. Never received the money as they claim it was temporary withhold.Items missing, it’s a regular thing! No refund either! Last time the food was delivered to a different address to the one I’ve given and I’ve had no call whatsoever regarding the updates or that the driver has arrived. How can such company do so many things wrong and yet still exist and get away with it??? That is the question. Disgusting! I wish I had read the reviews it was only until the last time the food got delivered elsewhere, I did and I was amazingly shocked by how much negative feedback it has! Please people, don’t waste money and keep on making the same mistakes. They are not very co-operative either. It’s not that easy to get the lost money back, as all they do is come up with excuses.I will be contracting the bank to cancel the payments that I have authorised to be taken, and never received the order, and hopefully it will work in my benefit. I hope you guys disappear as all you’ve been is a waste. Hard earned money taken away from people just like that.Not even a way to contact in terms of issues! Cannot even call back to the driver as the number is no longer valid the moment they leave without even making sure that the customer has received everything and is actually happy with their order! What a joke of a company. Loss of words.

Title: Stupid app
Review: Stupid app , doesn t work at all !!!! Customer service is s*it but obviusly we talk about uber !!! I will tell you to starve than order from this stupid app !!!!!

Title: Bad customer service
Review: Give them chance after chance. Today got food stone cold with drink missing. Bad customer service - couldn't care less. Just deleted the app and won't be using again.

Title: Shame !!
Review: Shame !!! Promotion was not applied. They charge you the total amount after the delivery of your order. It's a trapUbereats France

Title: Ordered from KK  Malaysian
Review: Ordered from KK  Malaysian. The food was so badly packaged that it was stone cold on arrival. Driver was disinterested in life. No napkin. Why would a restaurant join this scheme if they cannot afford to deliver high standards? KK Malaysian you have lost my business and UBER Eats you are wrecking every market that UBER enters; reducing quality and value by reducing cost.

Title: Pretty much every McDonald’s order is…
Review: Pretty much every McDonald’s order is delayed or a rider is swapped etc... been waiting for 1hr. Still no deliver time. Has happened min 6/6 times I’ve tried last 6 months. consistently inconsistent. Why hasn’t McDonald’s swapped to Deliveroo yet beats me.

Title: Every time I use Uber on browsers I…
Review: Every time I use Uber on browsers I have to keep setting my password which is getting a pain and all the time they have no drivers in your area I was about to place a order and then it suddenly said no drivers when I was about to pay I think if they don’t start with a company to a set time I think both the company and Uber should say what time they will start delivery

Title: Waste
Review: Absolutely horrible customer service and honestly ripping off customer left right and center.I’ll give you a few examples.A while ago, I ordered food from a restaurant that had their own drivers, fair enough that they can’t track the drivers on the app, but my order was supposed to arrive at 2am, and I was still waiting until 4 o’clock to atleast get a response?? Which I didn’t even get. When you go on the app and press the “my order hasn’t arrived yet” button, it litterally says “not long now, your order has left the restaurant”, even if you press the button 50 times over 2 hours. The other option is to call the restaurant, and of course they don’t pick up the phone, because the restaurant closed not long after “your order left the restaurant”. There isn’t even an option to say this ordered didn’t arrive? Just imagine that, coming home from work and you’re starving and this is the waste of time you have to deal with when you could’ve eat and been fast asleep if you ordered from deliveroo. Now another example, This time I ordered a McDonalds, which is about 5 minutes away from my house, I paid a £3.99 delivery fee which shouldn’t even cost a pound, but that’s fine, only for the food to arrive missing one of the main meals. So I went on the app and clicked on the missing items in my order, and instead of giving me a choice of still receiving half my order which I obviously wanted, I just got “you’ve been refunded for this meal” with no options to speak to the customer service team or atleast leave a message. So I had to go and order the meal again and pay an extra £3.99 again for the delivery. Then I thought let me just send them a message on the help section to refund me the £3.99 for the second delivery because obviously it wasn’t my fault that they forgot the order. I litterally turned the whole app inside out and there is no option to speak to the customer service team. The only thing I was able to type a message on, was the “food damage or quality issue”. And guess what the reply was.. an automated reply, saying “you’ve already been refunded for this order, as such we trust this issue has been successfully resolved and will be closing this thread”. Like? What do you mean successfully resolved?? No one even read what I just said. I didn’t ask about the refund? Honestly I don’t even know how to put it down politely.. They need to shut this whole app, website, business down all together because who are they serving? I looked at the rest of the reviews and everyone is just as disappointed! Don’t even get me started on the Uber App for taxi’s, I got dropped off 20 minutes away from the destination i put on the app because the driver decided to “avoid the traffic” in the route i take twice a day to work and turned 2 minutes into 20. I had to walk the same distance that I would’ve if I walked from my house and get there half an hour late. And still paid £8 that they weren’t even willing to give me a refund for after messaging for a whole day to the same automated reply system. Absolute joke.

Title: Avoid at all costs
Review: Avoid at all costs. This company are nothing but a bunch of faceless liars. Appalling meal delivered in March, contacted Uber on receipt and was assured that a refund had been made. Having received nothing two weeks later, I have emailed them every day and asked them for the ARN number which my bank need so as they can trace the supposed refund. Every email sent has been replied to with a generic email from them saying check bank in 3 to 5 days!!  Have taken this through Resolver also but don’t expect anything from them either from this bunch of liars. App now deleted, will never use this useless company again.

Title: I spend hundreds a month with Uber…
Review: I spend hundreds a month with Uber eats. I order breakfest for my girls at 6:30 am and 7:10 am came around and still no one picked up my order so I cancelled and had to pay the full amount. Customer service basically told I am sorry it’s the policy. I cancelled my membership and went to Grubhub. I am happy now.

Title: SHOCKING SERVICE! DONT USE!!
Review: Me and my pregnant wife waited for food and it turnt up freezing cold and I refused to take it. Waited for 4 hours for a response. None of them know what they are talking about. I was promised a refund then I was told I am not getting one. Shocking service. Needs a brand new team. Will never use again. AWFUL!

Title: Didn't refund whole order amount
Review: Didn't refund whole order amount. Order was unable to be deliver so ubereats canceled it, that's fine but when I check the refund they didn't refund some of the fees. Wth? As far as I know that's f***ing fraud, never use this company EVER

Title: Well where to begin
Review: Well where to begin! I placed an order for McDonald’s from a restaurant 5 mins drive from me the driver picked the order up ok the proceeded to drive around my area in circles so sent him a text asking what he was doing no reply then parks up a couple of streets away so I call him and give precise instructions on how to get to us he’s sits there for another 10 mins I try to call him and he hung up on me several times eventually get through to him and he tells me he’s outside my house no your not mate I’m outside he said I’m outside number 12 there ain’t no number 12!!! This goes on for another 20 mins in the end I had to use the app to find him to get my food and he managed to spill the drink!! When I contacted Uber eats to explain what happened they said their usual automated response so they think that’s it’s ok for women to walk the streets late at night to try and find their food which was stone cold by the time I found him so couldn’t eat it anyway and all Uber say is sorry are they swear how dangerous it’s is for women to walk around alone at night that’s days and they think it’s ok DISGUSTING oh but they did refund the drink!!!!!! Not even the delivery charge just the price of the drink NEVER USING THEM AGAIN TOTAL JOKE 😡😡😡😡😡😡

Title: Bad fish and chips that wasn’t edible but struggled to get a refund!
Review: Got burnt black fish and raw fish delivered and the chips were rotten (green and dried up) which is obviously the restaurant’s fault but when I complained to uber eats it took me 3 conversations back and forth for them to refund me and I only got refunded £27 out of the total amount of £50. I also sent pictures which showed clearly how bad the meal arrived so I don’t understand why I didn’t receive the whole amount back.... I’ll stick to my usual food apps in future! (Just eats) Not uber eats! It’s rubbish I knew there was a reason I stopped using it ages ago.

Title: Dreadful company
Review: I was charged for a food delivery that I didn’t order or receive and when I alerted them (after finally finding a way of making contact), they said it was a legitimate charge as the order was made on a device associated with my Uber account (even though I’ve never used Uber Eats before!) and was delivered to an address associated with my account (even though I’ve never ordered a taxi from my address).  Unbelievable.

Title: Won't give me a refund
Review: Having to take Uber eats to the small claims court as they are refusing to give me a refund for items that was stone cold and could not be reheated, would've caused food poisoning.

Title: Shocking Customer Service
Review: I raised an issue with their customer service and they are completely useless. I’m not even sure if there is a human being at the end of it or if it just a bot that spews out completely unrelated standard responses. I will never be using Uber Eats again.

Title: Recently everything I ordered weeks…
Review: Recently everything I ordered weeks after 3040 minutes I received a message saying that your order has been canceled I have no idea my credit card is good I’ve been a customer for the last year and a half but after 30 minutes they cancel my order I don’t know why but this is not to see this company

Title: They give you a discount code which…
Review: They give you a discount code which looks like it's been applied and then they charge you for the whole amount.  Complaining to them gets you nowhere.  Do not use this company, use one of the alternatives such as Deliveroo.

Title: Greed
Review: If they add the option to turn off multiple stop delivery I would come back. Uber your company greed is showing and you should be embarrassed.

Title: First purchase was supposed to include…
Review: First purchase was supposed to include a £15 promotion.  When it processed in the app it said it had been deducted,  but I noticed the payment had taken the full amount without the £15 discount. I informed them.Monday, the takeaway was Saturday night and out of the time you can inform them. Do not use any promotion and expect it to be valid.

Title: Never again
Review: I told while ordering for the driver to leave at door he said he tried to deliver for 7 minutes when no one came to the door lies and more lies I have been trying for days to get a refund think it's time McDonald's stopped using them

Title: Never seen such a consistently bad…
Review: Never seen such a consistently bad service in any company, ever!!  Have made the mistake of giving them another change again.  Will not happen again.  Always lie about delivery time.  Use them at your peril!  You will be disappointed!

Title: Uber eats are utter rubbish
Review: Uber eats are utter rubbish. I will never use this pile of rubbish again. Anyone who does needs there head testing. Disgusting company, DO NOT USE UBER

Title: Wrong order -- support is horrible
Review: If you ever have to contact their customer support, good luck!  An order was almost entirely messed up (vegetarian dishes were ordered but we received the meat versions), and their support was impossible to deal with.  Kept getting sent in circles and getting the same copy and paste response back that didn't address the problem.  The most they offered to fix a $40 dinner that was almost completely wrong was a $5 credit next time.  They didn't seem to understand that I at least wanted the messed up dishes credited.  I literally contacted them over a dozen times over weeks on their help center area, a separate e-mail, and even social media.  Kept getting the same dumb responses like no one was paying attention.  In the end I had to do a chargeback to get credited that back, which I really didn't want to do and warned them I would resort to that if I didn't get a non-copy-and-paste response back not even reading my complaint.Then after the bank sided with me on it (sounds like they have lots of issues like this), UberEats tried to block me from using the app unless I paid the full amount.  So instead of ordering once or twice a week through them, I just switched to one of their competitors.  So dumb of them, as it was such an obvious easy fix, but their support is the worst I've ever dealt with by far.

Title: 0 stars
Review: 0 stars.  Awful app. 3rd different time trying to place a KFC order but doesn't allow me to actually pay for it.  Used phone, tablet and laptop.  Allows you to add to basket but then no option to actually place order...only to clear your basket. Absolutely useless.  KFC please  ditch them.  They are losing you business

Title: misleading promotions and terrible…
Review: misleading promotions and terrible customer service

Title: Ordered a takeaway
Review: Ordered a takeaway, the char siu pork is burnt! All black and cannot be chew, I also toom photos to proof and send to Uber, and they "kindly" refund me £1.29!

Title: None to rely on, only taking money for no reasons
Review: I had a problem with them when ordering for grocery. I ordered lots of stuff from Sainsbury’s, they were all available at the moment I made the order. After 20mins they said that my order got a modification coz most of the items weren’t available and only a few were, so I had to pay a fee for small order. I contact them via chat (coz it’s impossible to find a number), saying that it wasn’t my fault if the order only got a few pieces in the end. They said that they would have work on it. No replies after a month!!And they scammed again buy taking double payment (for another order) and there is no sign of a refund!! If you wanna get food delivered, DO NOT use this app, there is much better way!

Title: Cold food
Review: Cold foodOrder Food for my wife's birthday and the food was keep getting delayed on being pick up then what should of took 5min by bike to deliver took 20 mins to be delivered when food arrived it was cold plus the person who was delivering it was not the same person in the picture on uber eats app ive complained to uber eats and they are blaming the restaurant but knowing its not the restaurants drivers plus they completely blank the fact i told them the person delivering the food it not the same person in the profile picture It seems like uber eats don't like taking responsibility in there services very unprofessional

Title: Had to tell dilevery guy where to go…
Review: Had to tell dilevery guy where to go even thow they use google mapping, come on guys if you don't know where you are going you shouldn't be working the job

Title: Not even worth one star
Review: Not even worth one star. Food was too late and wrong delivery. Customer experience is really bad, takes a long while, but did get my money back. After two days it was gone again.. What is this company.. It's definitely not the Uber service they provide with taxi's.

Title: Poor customer service!
Review: Deliver cold food because they do multiple drops (even though you pay for full delivery) and then say there is nothing they can do about it! I have been using JustEat the last few times because of this and because they refused to do anything and ignored my last response. JustEat are way better! Terrible customer service when I have spent so much money with them. Clearly don’t value customers.

Title: Bait and Switch - Borderline Fraud
Review: So, I received a flyer saying that Uber Eats will give €10 off of the first 2 orders, with a minimum purchase of €15, so I order items worth €37, on top of which Uber Eats charges addition €4.14 for service fees and delivery fees. When I order, I put the promotion code in the "Promo Code" box, but nothing seems to happen.  I try multiple times, but the same thing happens, so I am thinking maybe it accepted.Well, it didn't - and I sent a message to the customer services with the pictures of the promotion flyer as well as the receipt, but nothing but cricket.This will be the first AND the last time I will use Uber Eats, and will share with people I know - and I don't know.  Why Uber would want to resort to this types of behavior is beyond me.  I also now remember how a driver cancelled on me, and Uber still charged 3.50 for the cancellation fee, when the driver who was supposed to show up in 1 minute failed to show up after 25 minutes, and pretty much drove around the whole city, except to come and pick me up.  I ended up using a competing service, and bene using the competitor since.Series of bad business practices are really sowing doubts for the company's future.

Title: Absolutely terrible
Review: Absolutely terrible. Wrong food. No support. Will never use this app again

Title: BE AWARE!
Review: BE AWARE!! £15 AND £10 OFF OFFERS ONLY APPLY TO CERTAIN RESTAURANTS. If your expecting your £15 or £10 to come off at check out " THIS DOES NOT HAPPEN" ,it's only certain restaurants.  This is nowhere explained on the promotion or Web site. In my opinion extremely misleading. I will never trust or use this company in any form in the future.

Title: They lie about discounts.
Review: Multiple orders received with mistakes. Although this isn't their fault, I have a different issue. I was offered a 25% discount via email. When I ordered the discount would not apply to the order. I have had numerous emails with them with no help other than saying not all users are eligible. DO NOT TRUST THEIR DISCOUNT OFFERS!!!

Title: I am a restaurant partner and disgusted with the staff handling complaints. Lack knowledge.
Review: I am a restaurant partner, and been with them for 3 years but recent events have compelled me to put this review as my experience with them tell me they are novices in this field and fail to grasp the concept of customer service. Prepared food leaves my site and I do not even know that it has not been delivered or stolen. No one answers my questions at to what was wrong and a refund is processed.Shehyrar cannot seem to grasp simple questions and emails generic scripts.Very angry that I am supposed to be a business partner and they make decent income out of me and yet have lost grasp of true customer service.Looking at the rating on Trustpilot is appalling and yet they do not care and are out competing with the likes of Deliveroo/Just eat.Their robots need to grasp customer service/empathy and get their act together.

Title: Has anyone ever had issues with…
Review: Has anyone ever had issues with @ubereats_uk or @mcdonaldsuk and reported them to trading standards??.I order an egg and sausage muffin (no cheese i am LACTOSE intolerant), I receive a sausage and cheese muffin (no egg) and @ubereats_uk will only give me 78p refund? Not the £2.59 i paid!  .I cannot call @ubereats_uk and they have closed my online request! I called @mcdonaldsuk their Greenhithe (Bean rd) branch yesterday and was told I paid @ubereats_uk so its nothing to do with them!  You cocked up the order luv, take responsibility!!!!.Give me my £2.59 back at @ubereats_uk or @mcdonaldsuk give me the item I ordered??? If you do not you have acted illegally (under UK law) and have committed Arbitrary deception, I paid you for goods and you haven’t supplied them, and based on that I am now entitled to a full refund!!!!! .Why large supply chains find it acceptable to palm off customers and rip them off, is beyond me.  It may only be £2.59 but its the fact that you think you will get away with this, and more to the point probably do it to more often than not to many other customers too.  🍔🍔🍔🍔

Title: I am absolutely disgusted at the…
Review: I am absolutely disgusted at the service I have received from Uber Eats recently. On Sunday 14th March, I ordered some food via their app from Kick Ass Burrito in Great Park, Birmingham. The food, although ordered by me, was actually bought by my 11 year old son for a Mother's day treat.After waiting a few minutes past the estimated time of arrival, I checked the app and was alarmed to see that my order had in fact been cancelled, with no refund, as (allegedly) the driver had been trying to contact me for 7 minutes. This is absolutely not true and, quite frankly, a blatant lie! From where we were sat, we can see every single person approaching our house and at NO point did we see anyone go past our house, let alone attempt to knock our door. Furthermore, I had my phone in my hand throughout the whole time and at no point did anyone try to call me. Perhaps they were struggling to locate my property? I have no idea. However, I do know that absolutely NO attempt was made to contact by any means, ie. The phone, my door, the email or via the app.Every response I have received via the app just comes back with the same content, repeating that the driver tried to contact me for 7 minutes. This is not true at all. Their responses don't acknowledge a thing I have said, just an awful automated response. This now means that £8.55 of MY money has gone straight down the drain. This is absolutely not acceptable!I want my money or, rather, my 11 year old son's money back immediately. I have tried every means to contact their team, but to no avail. This is nothing short of theft.

Title: Not a customer anymore
Review: I am very upset with the order and especially with the driver!! Uber eats should fire this driver he took my order away and stole it!!! His name was Angelo. I contacted this driver and he said he was on the way picking it up when I saw on a app that my order was still not picked up I asked my boyfriend to go and pick up it in a RAIN and when he got to the restaurant the order was already picked up by this guy Angelo!!! He STole my order! And I have been waiting for this order for 2 hours??? Do you think you can trust driver like this horrible!!!!! I have been a very loyal customer but I don’t think I can trust Uber anymore, if I knew it would take so long and not even get my food would have went myself and pick it up without this app. I am very upset and disappointed.

Title: My credit card was declined for no…
Review: My credit card was declined for no apparent reason.Couldn't contact customer service about the problem.Used Door dash no problem at all

Title: They suck
Review: They suck. Let’s you order and set up payment only to tell you their are no carriers available. HAPPENS EVERYTIME

Title: The worst customer service I've ever…
Review: The worst customer service I've ever seen. Please don't buy from them, they will never refund you and you will lose your money. They are a copy/paste reply and don't take your business seriously. Buy elsewhere

Title: DIDNT EVEN GET THE FRIKIN FOOD FROM UberSH*TS
Review: DIDNT EVEN GETTING THE FRIKIN FOOD. At delivery time, UberSh*ts cancelled my order. I hope they suffer dehydration from Diarrhoea.

Title: ‘Priority’ delivery - what a con
Review: Paying extra for a ‘Priority’ delivery supposedly means getting your order delivered first, i.e. ahead of other orders the driver/rider has.That certainly didn’t happen with my order from DF Tacos. It took more than hour to arrive and was stone cold as the delivery man dropped off at least two orders in locations several miles away before coming to me. So I paid extra for a service I didn’t receive and will be avoiding Uber Eats in future.

Title: Terrible support with ongoing orders
Review: The driver that was assigned to the order didn't pick it up and left. I could see him driving further and further away. Then there was no way to cancel order or chat with someone even when order was taking now more than 1h (supposed to be 20 mins) and my order was ready in the restaurant. Then had to dig on the Internet for a contact phone number which is a call center in India not very helpful and bit rude and only thing they say was we can either cancel or assign you someone else not any sorry for your wait no compensation nothing. They simply don't care

Title: Food delivered cold and inedible and…
Review: Food delivered cold and inedible and support said they are unable to provide a refund so £37 worth of cold food in the bin and nothing.....disgraceful customer service and a joke to be honest

Title: Delivery driver went to wrong address
Review: Appalling will never use again.  Delivery driver went to wrong address.  Apparently stood outside for 10-11 minutes with no contact.  Customer service giving automated responses.  Going round and round in circles.  Human contact not able to claim refund.

Title: We ordered food last night totalling…£51 plus
Review: We ordered food last night totalling £51 plus, the food was disgustingThe rice wet and grainy, like it had gone off the curry no taste at all and wateryThe food was inedible. I complained to Uber and all they could do was insult me by offering £2.99I will not be using ever again I feel like I chucked my money in the dustbin as that’s where the food ended up. Poor customer service from Uber eats

Title: Uber eats discount con
Review: Uber eats send me regular discount codes, 50% off, free delivery etc but they NEVER work. Such a con!!!!

Title: Refer a friend...🤣🤣🤣
Review: So I have used the refer a friend code once before and never received my credit I was told the friend had used the wrong code...strange as I was sat next to the friend when they used the code and they received their £10 credit...if the code was wrong I'm guessing they wouldn't have got the credit!!! I was told sorry its not the outcome you were expecting and basically there is nothing we can do for you...I didn't get the credit and left it at that. Few days ago used the refer code again and again was sat with the person who used it and again didn't get my credit...I went on the help page on the app was told again that my friend had used the wrong code...10-15mins later my credit appeared so I thought I would test them and guess what the reply was ' your friend used the wrong code so sorry it was not the outcome you were looking for!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I have chased again and told them exaclty what has happened and again sorry it was not the outcome you were hoping for!!!!! 🤣😡😠🤬

Title: Disgrace of a company refused a refund…
Review: Disgrace of a company refused a refund after food turned up an hour late freezing cold. Will never use them again.

Title: I paid £25.52 on the uber seats app…
Review: I paid £25.52 on the uber seats app this saturday, to purchase chinese food delivery in Ipswich.One hour after ordering and paying, and despite chasing Mr Wings restaurant, the food allegedly was delivered to another address in Ipswich.These fools not only stole my money, but gave my food to someone else.We have tried so many times to contact uber with our complaint  but in vain.My advice to all is, never go anywhere near them, they are thieving pathetic parasites.

Title: Cold with food missing
Review: Avoid.  Ordered from GBK and didn’t receive chips & rest of order was stone cold.  Uber customer service refused to engage - you can’t call and they just messaged that they aren’t doing anything and the matter is closed.  Previously had similar issue with different restaurant on same site.  Better (and cheaper) to go to restaurants direct.

Title: Worst customer service
Review: Worst customer service I’ve experienced. Slow to respond and do not offer any apology or refund when their drivers mess up orders. Avoid at all costs. Use Deliveroo instead.

Title: Absolutely disgusting
Review: Absolutely disgusting! I ordered food for my 2 children and partner it never arrived so had to re order and PAY AGAIN. We thought they would refund us for the unarrived order but they refused to after we already re ordered. On top of that when the order did come only one of my kids meals arrived again no refund! £50 on food for my partner and one child! Disgraceful. Never using this rubbish app again and will warn others too!

Title: I have had an issue with my uber…
Review: I have had an issue with my uber account not allowing me to use the gift card option. I have contacted their shocking support via PM on twitter and Facebook, it has been now over 5 days and it takes them 8 hours to reply to my messages to then receive the same messages as the 8 hours before. ABSOLOUTLY SHOCKING SERVICE BY SUCH A COMPANY. this needs to be addressed.

Title: Utterly shocking
Review: Utterly shocking. Order was delivered some 3 miles from where we live (different house number, street and postcode) and Uber eats are querying our refund because it’s the second time their inept driver has messed up and we’ve had to complain so they’re insinuating that we’re conducting some kind of fraud.

Title: Ordered a simple chicken meal for my…
Review: Ordered a simple chicken meal for my 10yr old and all cold we have had it hot before and the reply was there's nothing we can do. I think we have come to rely on this firm to much. Hot potatoes again but I'm half irish so it's OK 👌

Title: Eventually you go to small claims court…
Review: Eventually you go to small claims court over criminal theft by Uber.  If their drivers or restaurants make too many mistakes, eventually their algorithm will say you're a liar.  Driver delivered the food to the wrong neighborhood and they refused to refund my money!  WHAT?!  They didn't even bother contacting the driver!  I cancelled/closed my account and opened a chargeback.

Title: DO NOT USE
Review: Spent circa £90 on a meal. Poppadoms which were all smashed into tiny pieces.The beef dish i had was completely devoid of taste and i had to put salt on it to give it any taste.The biryani we had was almost completely rice with almost 0 meat in it.The lamb dish meat was really poor and like dog food.The chicken tikka masala was pretty poor as well.Chips were cold and soggyThe starters were all completely dry and tasteless.A very poor meal is bad enough but the service from UberEats has been really disappointing. Offered me like £1.70 back and comms was repetitive instead of answering my issues.

Title: Missing Food - UberEats wrongly accusing customer of not picking up their phones
Review: Missing food-The driver called me and I picked up to tell him I'll buzz him in and he can just drop off behind the door downstairs to maintain covid safety. He mentioned he buzzed me and I said I didn't hear it. I said, "it is okay. Ill come downstairs ". When I got downstairs,  the driver was no where to be seen. I called him again and he said he gave the food to a child and that he marked it as delivered. It turns out it was delivered to the wrong address 2 doors down. He claims that the delivery was shown as the address he delivered to and I confirmed that my receipt is my own. He offered to come back and pick it up and bring it to me to correct it and I said, "that is no longer needed as it is now unsafe." He apologised and I mentioned it might not be his error and I would take it up with UberEat directly which he thanked me and I appreciated him trying to resolve.I went through chat and email support to get an automated response. Fine, first response is automated, understood. I explained the situation above. After, in 3 responses they said they checked their log and it shows that the driver tried to call me and waited for 8 minutes before marking it as completed and that "in future" I should be by my phone and pick up calls. I was very disappointed and upset that they did not acknowledged my clear explanation that I was in touch with the driver on 3 occasions to ask for my food. The most upsetting response was feeling like i was accused of not checking my phone and being told i should do that in future when they clearly did not address my explanation of being in touch with the driver. I have since sent across screenshot of my call log history to provide proof that I have been wrong accused.Errors can happen and I'm not sure if it was the restaurant who marked it wrong or if there was an issue with the delivery driver. I will not blame either because in this instance I'm simply disappointed with UberEats customer support approach. I will make sure I escalate until they address the response appropriately.  It is also worth to note for UberEats to recognise that automated responses are great but they need to ensure that they don't miss out on their customer's queries and address them correctly without telling the customer off without an accurate investigation.Anyways, from a stats perspective  I've probably order over 30 times and it had all been good. I suppose the issue here is with their customer support.

Title: Bad experience with app navigation and…
Review: Bad experience with app navigation and delivery time estimabtions! Food was mostly cold upon arrival

Title: No stars. POOR SERVICE
Review: No stars. Yesterday i order and the courier called twice while my phone was in silence, my bad but he could ring to my flat, simple. He went away. I called to rhe restaurant and they told me to call to Uber Eats support and a machine answered telling that they don't deal with past orders. I called to the restaurant again to explain but they hanged me the phone. Conclusion: I didn't get my order and they didn't refund. POOR SERVICE both Uber Eats and the restaurant. You've just lost a costumer.

Title: UBER EATS AVOID AT ALL COSTS
Review: I would rate 0 stars, the company don't even deserve 1 star. They have the absolute worst customer service I ever came across. My entire order was wrong, they told me they would refund so if I wanted the right items then to re-order. I re-ordered only then to be told I won't get a refund. So it has now cost me double for food that we couldn't even eat. Don't use this company unless your happy to keep paying for other peoples errors. As for charging me £4 on each delivery, that is disgusting as I shouldn't have had to re-order if it was right the first time. Will never use this company again

Title: If I could give 0 stars I would
Review: If I could give 0 stars I would. I ordered some fries and a soda. My drink arrived half drank out of. With covid that is so unacceptable! I’ve tried to get help from Uber eat several times about this issue and have been ignored.

Title: UberEats is Horrible
Review: Twice I have ordered food, both times the delivery driver was given another order at the same time for a completely different location. Do you guys understand this makes other people’s food cold????? $25 for food and for what reason!!!! It’s gross when it comes cold!!!! Figure your crap out so you don’t need them to do 2 delivers at once!!! You’re sacrificing quality for quantity.... skip the dishes has far better service. Absolute crap.

Title: Worst customer service ever
Review: Worst customer service ever.  When the drivers do something wrong or there's something wrong with the delivery,  it's impossible to get in touch with them.  Going back to Doordash.

Title: Hotel in humble tx. Bad service
Review: We ordered to a hotel in humble tx.. 4/9/21  waited until after 2am with no delivery so we stopped pmt and went to bed. Found our food hours later in front of a door at the other end of the bldg. They have now band US. The food was not edible.

Title: Thank you for ordering with Uber eat I…
Review: Thank you for ordering with Uber eat I hope my service was fast professional if it was leave me a  👍Munna

Title: Uber sucks and is openly trying ro steal from customers...
Review: This week on Uber I was charged for a ride Uber cancelled and then when I re ordered a ride the price went up $4. Return rides from doctor and pharmacy were at 2x's the price it was to get there 30 minutes later. Ordered 2x's from Ubereats and both times was charged a delivery fee when I have an Ubereats pass. Horrible people!

Title: Callous Thives
Review: First of all, the drivers steal food. Second, they can't read addresses, drop the food off anywhere and you cannot contact them. Third, Uber does not do anything to stop this. Callous thieves from top to bottom. They should reveal all complaints to the authorities, throw the crooks in jail and shut Uber Eats down. And sometimes you get hostile drivers that act as if they belong to a gang and threaten you.

Title: Ordered KFC was advised delivery by…
Review: Ordered KFC was advised delivery by 18.10 then received message to state problem with driver so delivery would be 18.20! Fine until next message stated sorry delivery held up will now be 18.40! Changed again to 18.34! Turned up cold and more gravy in delivery bag than in the pot at 18.40. Not happy,  driver knew as he drove off before I even opened the door Delivered 09.04.20

Title: Awful awful awful
Review: Awful awful awful. had to wait 2 and a half hours then cancelled with no warning. Waste of evening and time.

Title: UberEats needs to be shutdown by…
Review: UberEats needs to be shutdown by trading standards, I will be reporting them. I have complained to them on several occasions. I was sent a promo code and it didn’t work. One order I spent £8.50 for the food, delivery charge £2.90 and service charge £2.79. My food from Brown Eagle Caribbean shop was 4 tablespoons of rice, bones and fat. I complained to the restaurant and UberEats. I was told by UberEats ‘sorry we can’t do anything because you never complained within 48hrs. Another order Capital house kebab shop. I received a quarter of the container of rice for £13, service charges and £2.79 delivery charge. I had to cook my own food after.  I complained within an hour and was told oh you need to rate the company and one day someone will look at the ratings for the restaurant. Right forget about ratings for the restaurant, I’m complaining about my order. Another order, I waited 30mins and received a message 5mins before arrival to say ‘your order has been cancelled’ no explanation as to why. I received a support message to say it was cancelled and thanks for my understanding. Unreal, Uber stick to only rides and even that you can’t do right. I’ve removed the app and will use another company. Don’t use UberEat you pay a lot more (restaurants have hike their prices, adding delivery and service charges) and you don’t get what you order, you’re actually cheated by these restaurants and there’s nothing you can do during lockdown. UberEat is useless, all the have to say is oh I’m sorry you lost your money but that’s life.It”s not just restaurants that are feeling the pinch, the country is and world. Good thing there’s furlough and business loans. Not every sector is that lucky. So if you can’t deliver what people are paying for, remove your service, if you can’t give protection from these cheats. You’re safer and it’s cheaper in ordering take away from the company itself I.e Pizza Hut, dominos etc but UberEats is leaving the consumers vulnerable.

Title: Applied discount code provided
Review: Applied discount code provided, page indicated code was applied but I could not see the discount so tried applying again to be told the code had already been applied.  Figured it may show on checkout, it didnt and ended up paying full amount.Reported to UberEats only to be told no code was applied.  Utter rubbish.   App removed, I'll use Just Eat from now on. Proof this company doesn't give a damn about it customers- no response to feedback on Trustpilot at all.  Theres your answer.  See you UberEats.

Title: Terrible Customer Service
Review: If you are unlucky enough to get the wrong items or something missing in your order twice (which of course is annoying for you as a customer), they will flag your account and refuse to give you a refund. Because you reported an issue too many times? So you get effed twice while it’s not even your fault?Thanks UberEat!I have a real job I’m not trying to make a fraudulent report for a 3€ refund.

Title: Absolutely disgusted in what I have…
Review: Absolutely disgusted in what I have received, I ordered from kfc somercoats, I ordered to meals which one was 1x large popcorn chicken meal with gravy and then other 1x twister wrap box meal. I only received one meal, the twister wrap wasn’t a twister wrap it was just a bbq chicken wrap, I paid £7.99 for that meal, the bbq chicken wrap is only £1.79, it’s under “bbq snack wrap” waste of money, I won’t be a returning customer...

Title: Don’t bother...
Review: Ordered food for delivery using promo voucher. Tracking was working well and ‘watched’ our driver collect our order then cycle to our house. But he wasn’t at our house. Then a message on the web page saying the delivery guy had tried to contact us and the order will be cancelled in 7 mins. He had not tried to contact us at all. We called him and it went straight to voicemail. Tried to call again and we were blocked from doing so. We tried to call the restaurant and were told they’d never even had the order and we didn’t exist. We were then notified that our order had been cancelled. I ended up cooking a quiche.

Title: Absolutely abysmal 'customer service'.
Review: Absolutely abysmal 'customer service'.I ordered food to be delivered from a local restaurant. The side dish for one of the meals was missing. Also i noticed on the app after eating that they had charged a tip that i didn't authorise. Contacted their customer service who very quickly agreed to refunds for the missing food and unauthorised tip. When i asked when the refunds would be received, i got fobbed off and nonsense answers. After three weeks (!!!) of me asking questions via Twitter and email, they said they would no longer reply to me. I had to go through my bank to get a refund. Disgusting.

Title: Shockingly bad service delivered my…
Review: Shockingly bad service delivered my food to wrong address then 10 minutes later delivered the same food to me.I was stunned Will never use this company again.

Title: Total money grab
Review: I was a huge fan of Uber Eats and even subscribed to the Uber Eats Pass, because my roommate and I order quite a lot of food in, and many of our favorite restaurants are not on Skip the Dishes. I was quite pleased with the Uber Eats Pass, and was planning to auto subscribe after this month of a trial that I gave it.But then a couple of days ago I ordered KFC and then, immediately after placing the order, got a notification from my bank that I was about to be overdrawn. I needed that twenty or so dollars in my account to cover an automatic bill payment.The order had literally been confirmed by the restaurant for three or four seconds when I canceled. But apparently if you cancel after the restaurant has accepted, you don't get a refund because supposedly the restaurant has already begun to prepare your meal. I highly doubt that they were already preparing my meal only three seconds after it had been accepted, but I was not going to receive a refund? $18 for food that they had not even begun to prepare.I sent several emails and, while they took their time, not replying until the next day while in the meantime, the bill payment was unsuccessful from my account, causing me to be given an overdraft charge from my bank.When I finally did receive the email the next day, I was told that because I apparently didn't know about the cancellation policy they would refund my money this one time.What kind of a policy is that? If you cancel an order, there should not be an issue with getting a refund. I have never heard of such a ridiculous policy.Uber Eats wants you to pay extra for a Pass which really doesn't save you any money when you consider their fees, the jacked-up prices, and tips, and even if you are a regular customer ordering at least several times a week, you're not entitled to a refund the one time you cancel?A complete rip-off. And the customer service is terrible, at best.

Title: Such a poor service
Review: Such a poor service.  I think they just send automated responses and then ignore you.Definitely the worst I have ever experienced.

Title: POOR SERVICE!
Review: POOR SERVICE!I'VE RECEIVED COMPLETELY DIFFERENT ORDER BUT THEY REFUSE TO REFUND MY MONEY.I THREW AWAY THE FOOD, I THREW AWAY MY MONEY!!!STUPID AND POOR COMPANY

Title: A Once Great Company Gone Bad
Review: I’ve spent thousands of dollars and have been a customer for over five years (like most of you I’m sure)... the customer service, rewards program, Uber Pass (including eats), and overall  quality of service has declined; ironic because the cost continues to increase beyond taxes, delivery fees, and Restaurant menu prices (the food cost more $$ on UBER EATS than in-store). With higher cost, customers expect prime delivery service and Better customer service. The Uber rides pass is probably the only “good” thing the company has going which is why I rated this 2 stars instead of 1. The pass actually protects you from “surcharges” during “high demand hours”, plus route protection for your favorite route. Cool. The Uber Eats pass is a joke considering that it charges you to “save” but only if YOU spend over $15 on food. And if you don’t, then you’re charged “A Small Order Fee” (no lunch orders for you). Plus, the more you order, the higher your “service charge “ which is higher than the “delivery fee” and taxes . Last, The Uber rewards program is the biggest rip off I’ve ever seen because it’s supposed to “reward customers “ for being ripped off for the “passes” ($35.99 monthly) while providing you customer service based on  Uber’s tier levels. In order from lowest to highest: Blue (0), Gold (500pt), Platinum (2500 pt), and Diamond (7500 pt) . Pretty much the points are equivalence to dollars. Sounds fine except every year, Uber makes it impossible for the customer to achieve the highest level unless you’re spending thousands (literally) within months (literally) or your tier level expires and bump you down to BLUE. Where you have to restart as if you’re in a real-life Super Mario Game. I’ve managed to reach the Platinum level only to hold it for 3 months and lose it because each tier restarts in 6 months. #Bummer PS. Uber cash in system with the “points” suck because they still require you to spend hella money for a discount that you’ve been deserved since depending on Daddy Uber in the first place. AND they never give you UBer dollars for their mistakes unlike GRUBHUB (who also got cheap). Just buy your own car and pickup your own food... it’s cheaper.

Title: Last night we ordered a Pizza Hut which…
Review: Last night we ordered a Pizza Hut which should have taken 10 minutes to deliver after collection. We tracked the order and the driver went the opposite direction and was stationery for a while, the delivery was over 30 minutes after collection and has you would expect it was cold. When the driver was questioned he said he had been given two deliveries, we paid for standard delivery so no other delivery should have been given. We contacted UberEats to complain and they basically don’t care, won’t be using UberEats again.

Title: Ordered meal last night never turned up…
Review: Ordered meal last night never turned up it was delivered to a house with same number has mine but different street cant get uber to understand i want a refund for a meal we never had cant even phone uber its all done through email even sent photo of my house and photo driver took and but on app to say it was delivered but still no response

Title: Uber eats is great pritty much…
Review: Uber eats is great pritty much everything delivered which is great at the moment, had a problem when an item was missing but Uber eats rectified straight away, it's great!! If you want use code below and you will get £10 off your first order , go on give it a go.    eats-samd14604ue

Title: I never write reviews but Uber eats is…
Review: I never write reviews but Uber eats is so horrific I have to. Every time I have ever ordered from there my food is always an hour plus late the drink is always half full and spilled everywhere and the food is always wrong or cold. Uber eats needs to give you the option to order someone who is not on a bicycle for restaurants far away. It’s incredible how they are still going without changing a thing.

Title: Poor customer satisfaction
Review: On more then one occasion I have had food items missing Most recently I was refused a refund for my ruined meal Delated the app had enough...!

Title: Matin
Review: Matin - driver from Chingford Uber.Thank you so much for delivering my breakfast today. I know your job can’t be easy, delivering food to others. However in so many ways it’s not just food, you gave me extra time today to enjoy my Saturday after a long week. The job you have is as important as any other you could have! Thanks again Matin.

Title: THIS COMPANY IS A MAJOR SCAM!
Review: THIS COMPANY IS A MAJOR SCAM!! They charge Me a 2nd time for original order amount weeks later after the original amount was refunded for getting Someone else’s order and they would not let Me order from the App or Take a Trip with Uber or remove Mu Credit Card without charging Me another $33.77 for the 2nd time so I had to get Bank involved and then 2 weeks later they are trying to charge Me for the 3rd time for the same amount. Beware of this Scam Artist Company they will steal Your Money. The Customer service is also a major waste of time. Smdh

Title: Can't be trusted
Review: I had one and only experience with Uber Eats, this past Wednesday (7th April 21) I ordered food. I paid with PayPal, I had just had surgery two days before and wanted something delivered. Uber Eats gave me an estimated time which grew longer until I without notice was just canceled. No call, no text they just canceled me. I’ll never order with them again.

Title: Honestly some of the worst customer…
Review: Honestly some of the worst customer service, can't answer your questions and then when they get tired of chatting they give you a scripted response and then shut down the chat.This is a terrible experience but I guess the reviews speak for themselves.

Title: Can't get in touch with customer…
Review: Can't get in touch with customer service to save my life!!!!!

Title: I would put 0 stars if i could.
Review: I would put 0 stars if i could.I was at work and ordered a takeaway (the restaurant i was ordering from was only 5 minutes away from my office but you can only order for delivery otherwise i would’ve walked) i ensured i ordered early to allow time for any delivery complications because they do normally come late and i was starving. 3 hours later, its now nearly 3 o'clock and i still haven't eaten, after numerous calls to the merchant and uber eats themselves, i found out the delivery driver abandoned my order and went home.To top it all off, i was told i would receive my refund and i still haven’t. They are useless and i will not be using them again.

Title: Ordered a meal for my 91 year old…
Review: Ordered a meal for my 91 year old father who lives alone and cannot drive.  I live 175 miles away.  The order was scheduled 3 hours in advance.  When it was past due I checked the app only to find that the merchant had cancelled the order.  Called the restaurant and they told me they aren’t accepting Uber Eats orders.  My card was charged but no notification was provided by the app, and my elderly father went hungry.  I’ve ordered a late dinner for him from a different restaurant using Grubhub and hope they will come through.  I’ll never use Uber Eats again.  Extremely disappointed!!

Title: The last order with uber eats. Terrible technical support
Review: The last order with uber eats.  Never again.Terrible technical support!!!!  be aware of the promo code scheme.  Once you put your order, you are screwed.  They make it so difficult for you to change or cancel your order even within the first 5 minutes after you put your order.  Don't waste your time trying to get help with technical support, you will wait forever and you will get kicked out the chat box.  Finally, after you get forced out the chat room, they ask you to rate your experience and if you choose to say that you were not happy with the service, they make sure that your review will never go through!!!!!  The worst ever.  It will be the last time i order with UBER Eats

Title: Its horrible how you cant speak to a…
Review: Its horrible how you cant speak to a real person this electronic custom service is horrible,and the drivers can steal your food and you cant even contact them.

Title: Lost $100 to uber eats
Review: My wife tried using a gift card but her credit card on her account had expired so the order was cancelled. The fee charged for the cancelation was $101.30 which means that they took our $100 gift card and charged us $1.30 for absolutely nothing.

Title: UberScam more like it!
Review: There should be a rating for “scam”.£43 lost on a birthday meal. Don’t use them and if you do start blasting he restaurants on social media. Maybe then they will stop using these cowboys.I tracked the driver on my phone. As the map indicated he was nearby, I went to wait outside. All of the sudden it indicated that the delivery was completed. I called the driver via the app but he pretended that he didn’t know English and could not understand me. ( I dont believe that for one minute. I’m sure he spoke English perfectly and clearly understood “where is my food!”)Then the app block my calls to him.What a scam! I’ve reported this to PayPal so I hope to get some redress.Why these cowboys are allowed continue operating in the UK  and with such poor feed back.   I do not know. Mayor of London please pull their license. Same customer service as it’s Uber parent company.  Rubbish! Run a mile. Don’t be tempted to use.

Title: Dont use uber
Review: Ordered McDonald's from these cowboys only to receive a small meal that was probably someone else's. You simply can't get in touch or complain to them, so your out of pocket and no meal.I have however complained to McDonald's after all they deal with these fools. I'll never use them again driver could hardly speak English which didn't help.

Title: Absolutely shocking company sending you…
Review: Absolutely shocking company sending you promo codes then not adding them to your food and being landed with a big bill that you cant pay when you complain you get an idot that repeats himself tell me code has expired so sent screen  shot of code clearly stating it was valid absolute joke

Title: Took my money, didn’t deliver
Review: Ordered £41 of food, instructed them to ‘meet at door’, heard nothing, raised it in their app, got a standard response saying they can’t assist us any further. Quickest way to lose your money. Next time just use Deliveroo or Just Eat because at least they try to resolve the issue.

Title: Load of crap dont bother
Review: Last 3 times ordering from Uber has been diabolical, well over an hour delivery late on all orders. Am deleting the app and never using this garbage company again. Waste of time

Title: Order cancelled with no notification?
Review: Order cancelled with no notification?I have no issue with an order being cancelled but you could at least let me know!Crap, I’ll stick to Just eat

Title: I ordered a coffee and cake from Uber…
Review: I ordered a coffee and cake from Uber Eats. Around the delivery time I was unable to answer my phone ringing as I have a young baby who was upset. No one knocked on my door or triggered my Ring doorbell. When I next checked my phone my order was cancelled, emails said the driver waited 7 minutes and because I didn’t reply he drove off. And I would be charged - no refund to be issued. I complained several times to be told it was my fault. I explained my doorbell hadn’t captured anyone all evening and my calls from the driver were 3 minutes apart not 7...Shocking. No goods but charged, customer service not willing to even consider my argument. Case closed apparently. Will never use again.
